40001001	U wityatye we ndelwa ya Yesu Kilisito mono yali we ndelwa ya Dawudi, wa mu ndelo ya Abulahamu. Na awuno ahano wo wityatye we mhuga yakwe vyono yinha.
40001002	Abulahamu yakamulela Isaka, nayo Isaka yakamulela Yakobo, nayo Yakobo yakamulela Yuda ne wanduguze.
40001003	Nayo Yuda yakamulela Pelezi na Zela (unyina yawo yali Tamali), nayo yuyo Pelezi yakamulela Hezeloni, Hezeloni nayo yakamulela Lami,
40001004	nayo Lami yakamulela Aminadabu, Aminadabu nayo yakamulela Nasoni, nayo Nasoni, yakamulela Salimoni,
40001005	Salimoni nayo yakamulela Bowazi (unyina wa Bowazi yacemwaga Lahabu). Nawo wa Bowazi na Lutu, wali wo walezi wa Obedi, nayo Obedi yakamulela Yese,
40001006	nayo Yese yo yamulela u mutemi Dawudi. Nayo u mutemi Dawudi, yo yamulela Solomona, (unyina wa Solomona yali yo mugolece wa Uliya).
40001007	Nayo Solomona yakamulela Lehobowamu, nayo Lehobowamu yakamulela Abiya, Abiya nayo yakamulela Asa,
40001008	Asa yakamulela Yehoshafati, nayo Yehoshafati yakamulela Yolamu, na Yolamu nayo yakamulela Uziya,
40001009	Uziya yakamulela Yotamu, nayo Yotamu yakamulela Ahazi, nayo Ahazi yakamulela Hezekiya.
40001010	Nayo Hezekiya yakamulela Manase, Manase nayo yakamulela Amoni, nayo Amoni yakamulela Yosiya.
40001011	Yosiya nayo yakamulela Yekoniya, ne wanduguze. Na mu vilo vivyo, vyali vyo vilo vyono i Wayahudi wahamizizwa no kutegulwa ku Babiloni.
40001012	Ne Wayahudi waza kuwa wasolwa no kutegulwa ku Babiloni, baho Yekoniya yakamulela Salatiyeli, nayo Salatiyeli yakamulela Zelubabeli,
40001013	nayo Zelubabeli yakamulela Abihudi, nayo Abihudi yakamulela Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu nayo yakamulela Azoli.
40001014	Azoli nayo yakamulela Sadoki nayo Sadoki yakamulela Akimu, na Akimu nayo yakamulela Eliwudi.
40001015	Eliwudi nayo yakamulela Eliyeza, Eliyeza yakamulela Matani, nayo Matani yakamulela Yakobo.
40001016	Yakobo yakamulela Yusufu, nayo Yusufu yo yali mulume wa Malyamu u nyina wa Yesu mono kacemwaga Kilisito.
40001017	Ale, kwali na ndelo yikumi na yine, ku wulawilila ha Abulahamu sunga ha Dawudi, na kanyhi ndelo yikumi na yine, ku wulawila ha Dawudi sunga lono i Wayahudi wahamizizwa no kutegulwa ku Babiloni, na kanyhi ndelo yikumi na yine ku wulawilila baho lono i Wayahudi wasolelwa mateka no kutegulwa ku Babiloni sunga mu vilo vya Kilisito.
40001018	Ale, no wulelwe wakwe Yesu Kilisito wali nhavi. U nyina Malyamu yali yakondya kubanywa na Yusufu. Ninga lono wali wakali si nekalana hamonga nha vyono yinha u mulume no mucekulu, Malyamu yakejela yena muda wono yawutuga kwe vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile.
40001019	Nayo Yusufu u mulume wakwe, vyono yali yo munhu we ling'ani, si yenda kumuleka Malyamu cagalanze, langa yasakaga yamulece cinyele.
40001020	Ninga lono yali yakali yakuyihwesa inghani yiyo, malayika wo Muwaha yakamulawila mu ndoto, yakamulonjela, yakatya, “Gwe Yusufu go mwana wa Dawudi, wulece kogopa kumusola Malyamu yawe mugolece wako, hambi u muda wuwo wono yena nawo, nha kawutuga kwe vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile.
40001021	Nayo kolela mwana we cilume, nagwe komucemela ilitagwa lya Yesu, hambi u mwene nha yo kolowaponya iwanhu wakwe mu wubi wawo.”
40001022	Na zizi zose zikejela, ho yifisilizwe inghani yiyilya yono u Muwaha Mulungu yayilonga mu nzila ye wawizi, yono yatya,
40001023	“Langa ta, u musindile kolodinghula muda, nayo kololela u mwana we cilume, nayo kocemwa Emanuweli. Nhunizo yayo wo wutya, ‘U Mulungu yali hamonga nase.’ ”
40001024	Nayo Yusufu yaza kusinhuka mu zinhongo, yaketuma nha vyono yalonjelwa na yuyo Malayika yakamusola u mugolece wakwe, yakamutegula ku kaya kwakwe.
40001025	Ninga Yusufu si yamusejelela yaye, sunga Malyamu yaza kuwa yakondya kumulela u mwana we cilume. Nayo Yusufu yakamucemela ilitagwa lya Yesu.
40002001	Yesu yalelelwa mwi'kaya lya Betelehemu ya ku Yudiya, mu vilo vya Helode, lono yali yakali yatemile. Na lono Yesu yali yakondya kulelwa, we mahala go wizuce we zinyelezi, wakaza ku Yelusalemi lwa kamonga, wakulawa kucilima,
40002002	wakawa kuwuza wakutya, “Yali hayi mwana, u Mutemi we Wayahudi mono yaleligwe? Hambi nha ciyiwona i nyelezi yakwe lono yilawiye kulubavu lwa kucilima, alu nase ciza ho cimuhembe.”
40002003	Nayo u mutemi Helode yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakehwelela muno, u mwene na wanya Yelusalemi wose.
40002004	Hobaho du yakawa kuwacema i wakohani wawaha wose, hamonga ne wejizi wose wo Wulajilize, yakawa kuwawuza yakutya, “Ati, Kilisito kolelelwa hayi?”
40002005	Nawo wakamupitula wakutya, “Mwi'kaya lya Betelehemu mu yisi ya Yudiya. Nayo u muwizi nha vyo yandika, yakutya,
40002006	‘Nagwe go Betelehemu go yisi ya Yuda, agwe si wuli mudodo hali walongola wose wa Yuda, Hambi muli gwegwe, nha mokolawila u mulongola mono kowatonga iwanhu wangu waisilayeli.’ ”
40002007	Hobaho Helode yakawa kuwacema cinyele, wawo i we mahala go wizuce we zinyelezi, yakawawuza yakawa kusaka kumanya icipango ceneco cono yejelela inyelezi yiyo.
40002008	Yakawa kuwatuma wabite ku Betelehemu, yakawatya, “Alu, mubite mukawuza wuze zo mwana yuyo. Mulamweza kuwa mwamuwona, ale, nhondo muze mumanyize, nane ho mbite nghamuhembe.”
40002009	Nawo wawo we mahala go wizuce we zinyelezi, waza kukondya kuzihulika zono u mutemi yawalonjela, hodu wakawa kubita. Kumbe inyelezi yiyilya yono wayiwona ku lubavu lwa kucilima, yikawalongolela, sunga yikabita kwima hacanyha ye hanhu hono hali hoyuli u mwana.
40002010	Nawo wali weza kuyiwona yiyo i nyelezi, wakasangalala muno muno.
40002011	Hobaho wakawa kwinjila mu nyumba, wakamuwona u mwana yuyo, yali hamonga no nyina Malyamu, wakawa kufugama, wakamuhemba. Waza kukondya, wakawa kuwopola izisawo, wakawa kulavyaniza ivipegwa vyawo, wakawa kumupela zahabu, wubani ne manemane.
40002012	Nayo u Mulungu yakawasugulila mu ndoto, ho walece kuwuya kanyhi kuli Helode, holeka nawo wakakolela nzila yinji wakawuya kwawo.
40002013	Iwajenzi wawalya waza kuwuka, hobaho Malayika wo Muwaha Mulungu yakamulawila Yusufu mu ndoto, yakamutya, “Ale, winuce! Wumusolaje mwana, hamonga no nyina, mutizize ku Misili. Mukekalaje kuko du sunga kolo neza kukulonjela, hambi Helode nha yakuhila kumuwulaga u mwana yuyu.”
40002014	Hobaho, Yusufu yakawa kwinuka, yakawa kumusola u mwana hamonga no nyina, wakawa kutuluka cilo cose, wakabita ku Misili.
40002015	Nayo Yusufu, yakekala kuko sunga Helode yakafwa. Inghani yiyo yejela, ho yifisilizwe inghani yono yayilonga u Muwaha Mulungu, mu nzila ye wawizi lono yatya, “Ku wulawa ku Misili, namucema Mwanangu.”
40002016	Nayo Helode yaza kwizuka vyono wawalya we mahala go wizuce we zinyelezi wamukonga, yakakolwa ne likuwo muno muno. Hobaho yakawa kulajiliza vyono, iwana wose we cilume wono wali mumo mwi'kaya lya Betelehemu, sunga na mu mhelomhelo yayo, wono wena myaka myejete na hasi yayo, wose wawulagwe. Nayo yanoza nhavivyo, ku wutyatya ilipango lyono yazimanyila zizo ku wulawa kuli awalya we mahala go wizuce we zinyelezi.
40002017	Nhavivyo vyo zaficilicila zono zalongwa mu nzila yo muwizi Yelemiya, zono zikutya,
40002018	“Ilizi lihulikwa ku wulawa ku Lama, Cililo no wukalale wuwaha, Laheli yakuwalilila iwanagwe, hamba si yakwenda no kutuzwa, hambi wose nha wakondya kufwa.”
40002019	Helode yaza kuwa yafwiza, Malayika wo Muwaha Mulungu yakamulawila Yusufu mu ndoto, kuko ku Misili,
40002020	yakamutya, “Ale winuce! Wumusolaje u mwana, hamonga no nyina, muwuye kanyhi ku yisi ya Isilayeli, hambi awalya wono wali kuhila kumuwulaga u mwana yuyo nha wakondya kufwa.”
40002021	Nayo Yusufu yakenuka, yakamusola u mwana hamonga no nyina, yakawa kuwuya ku yisi ya Isilayeli.
40002022	Ninga Yusufu yaza kuhulika vyono Alikelawo u mwana wa Helode yali yo mutemi wa Yudiya ihanhu ho sogwe Helode, baho yakogopa muno ku wubita kuko. Nayo yaza kuwa yasugulilwa mu ndoto, hobaho yakabita ku yisi ya Galilaya,
40002023	yakahamila mwi'kaya lyono likucemwa lya Nazaleti. Nhavivi vyo zaficilicila izinghani zono zalonjelwa mu nzila ye wawizi, zono zikutya vyono, “Kocemwa Munazili.”
40003001	Na mu vilo vivyo Yohana u Mubaputizi yakalawila, yakawa kwamula kuganula ku nyika ya Yudiya, yakutya,
40003002	“Ale munene, hambi u wutemi wa ku wulanga nha wasejelela.”
40003003	Yuyu Yohana yo yuyulya mono u muwizi Isaya yalonga izakwe, lono yatya, “Ilizi lyo munhu lihulikwa ku nyika, Muwikanizizenyi u Muwaha inzila yakwe, Muwugololaje u wukolo wakwe.”
40003004	Nayo Yohana yavwalaga mwenda wono wali muhonwe no wusinga we ngamiya, kanyhi yali yewopile no musipi we nyhingo mu ciwino cakwe. Ne ndigwa yakwe yali nzije no wuci wa mu mbago.
40003005	Ale, ne wanhu ku wulawa ku Yelusalemi, ne yisi yose ya Yudiya, ne zimbavu zose za mu mhelo mhelo ye likolongo lya Yoludani, wose wakamubitila,
40003006	wakawuvumila u wubi wawo, nayo Yohana yakawabaputiza mwi'kolongo lya Yoludani.
40003007	Ninga yaza kuwawona i Wafalisayo ne Wasadukayo wenji, wakumuziza ho yawabaputize, u mwene yakawalonjela yakatya, “Anye nyo lulelo lwe zinzoka! Alo nani mono yamulonjelenyi vyono mosuma kwilega ilikuwo lyono likuza?”
40003008	Ale, alu, mulajile mu metumo genyu, vyono mwanena mbeka mbeka.
40003009	Mulece kwihwesa 'mba vyono mosuma kwitetela no kutya, “Ase cili wana wa Abulahamu! Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u Mulungu kosuma kuganoza imabwe gaga gawe wana wa Abulahamu.
40003010	Hambi inhemo nha yikondizye kuwikanizwa so wutemanga imilela yo mubici, holeka u mubici wo wose wono si wulelaga mikalo miswanu, wodumulwa no kutagwa mu moto.
40003011	Ane nghumubaputizizenyi mu malenga, kulajila nha vyono mwanena. Ninga ayulya mono yakuza mu nyuma yangu, yo we vilungo yanyhizize na nene. Nane si nghwiliye hamba kugadinghula ne malatu gakwe. U Mwene komubaputizenyi ko Muhe Mono Yelile no ko moto.
40003012	U mwene yebate u luheneko mu mawoko gakwe, ho yezeze lukulu icuga cakwe, no kuwututicila u wuhemba mu nyumba yakwe, ninga i mawaje kogaticimiza no moto wono si wuzimaga.”
40003013	Na mwipango lilyo, Yesu yakawuka ku Galilaya, yakabita kwi'kolongo lya Yoludani, yakamubitila Yohana ho Yohana yamubaputize.
40003014	Ninga Yohana yakajela kumulemeza, yakutya, “Alu, hambi yo gwegwe mono yinojeye wuze kono kwangu? Aa ng'o. Langa ane yo nene mono yinojeye mbaputizwe na gwegwe.”
40003015	Ninga Yesu yakamupitula Yohana, yakamutya, “Ng'o, ye! Wulece du yiwe nhavivyo, hambi nha vyo yinojeye cizifisilize zose zono u Mulungu yakuzisaka.” Nayo Yohana nhondo ho yakawa kuvumila.
40003016	Nayo Yesu yaza kukondya du kubaputizwa, yakalawila mu malenga, no wulanga wukawa kudiguka nhinicizo, nayo yamuwona u Muhe wo Mulungu yehwanile futa ya nziwa, yakumutimila.
40003017	Ne lizi likalawa ku wulanga likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu u mwendece wangu, mono nendezwe nayo.”
40004001	Baho Yesu yakawa kutongwa no Muhe sunga ko ku nyika ho yajelwe na Setani.
40004002	Yakekala si yakulya cinji vilo makumi mane misi ne cilo, hanyuma, yakadabuka.
40004003	Hobaho Setani yakawa kumuziza, yakamutya, “Hono yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu, ale wulonje i mabwe gaga gawe mikate.”
40004004	Nayo Yesu yakapitula yakutya, “Mu Mandiko Gono Gelile yandicigwe nhavi, ‘U munhu si kokwikala mumi so mukate du, langa so nghani yo yose yono yikulongwa no Mulungu.’ ”
40004005	Hanyuma Setani yakawa kumutegula Yesu sunga ko ku Yelusalemi kwi'kaya lyono lyelile, yakawa kumuwika ku cizuli ce litembe lye Nyumba yo Mulungu,
40004006	yakamutya, “Hono yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu, ale ta wilugaje baha sunga ho hasi, hambi nha yandicigwe vyono, ‘U Mulungu kowalajiliza wamalayika wakwe ku soko yako, nawo wokwambila mu mawoko gawo, ho wulece kwikobala mwibwe.’ ”
40004007	Yesu yakamutya, “Kanyhi yandicigwe vyono, ‘Wulece kumujela Muwaha u Mulungu wako.’ ”
40004008	Hanyuma kanyhi Setani yakamutegula Yesu sunga kwi'tunda litali, yakamulajila i matemi gose ga kononze hamonga ne zinhojo zayo,
40004009	Setani yakawa kumutya Yesu, “Hono wufugamile, wuhembe, ale, ivinhu vivi vyose vyono wukuviwona, nokupela gwegwe viwe vyako.”
40004010	Baho nhondo, Yesu yakamulonjela Setani yakatya, “Bita ko Setani! Hambi nha yandikwe vyono, ‘Komuhemba Muwaha u Mulungu wako, nagwe komwitumamila u mweneco yali wene du.’ ”
40004011	Nhondo Setani, yakawa kumuleka, nawo wamalayika wakaza wakamwitumamila.
40004012	Nayo Yesu yali yeza kuhulika vyono, Yohana yadindilwa mu jela, u mwene, yakawa kubita ku Galilaya.
40004013	Yakawuka ku Nazaleti yakabita ku Kapelanawumi, i likaya lyono lyali lili ha mwejelele we lilamba lya Genesaleti, mu mipaka ye zi'si za Zabuloni na Nafutali, yakekala kuko.
40004014	Na vyo yaficilicila inghani yono yalongwa mu nzila yo muwizi Isaya, yono yikutya,
40004015	“Agwe go yisi ya Zabuloni, nagwe go yisi ya Nafutali, kulubavu lwe lilamba, ku nhumbi likolongo lya Yoludani, Galilaya, iyisi ye wanhu wono si Wayahudi!
40004016	Iwanhu wono wekalaga kutitu alu wawona u wuzelu wuwaha. Na walya wono wekalaga mu yisi nhitu ye lifwa, na mu muzizi we lifwa, alu wuzelu wuwabulilila!”
40004017	Na ku wulawa baho, Yesu yakamula kuganula no kutya, “Ale, munene, hambi u wutemi wa ku wulanga nha wasejelela!”
40004018	Nayo Yesu lono yajendaga ha mwejelele we lilamba lya Galilaya, yakawawona wanhu wejete wanimula somba, wana wa munhu monga, nha cinji Simoni (mono kacemwaga Petelo) wena na Andeleya u mwanakwawe, wanimulaga zisomba mwi'lamba no lwavu lwawo.
40004019	Yesu yakawatya, “Muze munhyatye, nane nomunozenyi muwe wanimula wanhu.”
40004020	Nawo lo lulo baho, wakazileka zinyavu zawo, wakawa kumutyatya.
40004021	Nayo yaza kutela hamwande hadodo, yakawawona kanyhi wanji wejete wana wa munhu monga, nha cinji Yakobo na Yohana u mwanakwawe, wana wa Zebedayo. Nawo wawo wali wali mu ngalawa, hamonga no sogo yawo Zebedayo, wakuzinozeleza zinyavu zawo. Yesu yakawacema,
40004022	nawo lo lulolulo wakayileka ingalawa, hamonga no sogo yawo, wakamutyatya.
40004023	Yesu yapilimaga mose mu yisi ya Galilaya, yakwijiza mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, no kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Wutemi wo Mulungu. No kuponya i mawala gose go wutamwa no wunyenyanjice wa muli wanhu.
40004024	Ne zinghani zakwe zikamanyika mu yisi yose ya Siliya. Ne watamwa wose wono wali na wugazice wo wose, kotya, wono wali wena macisi mavu, wono wena lukwale, wanhu we vilema, wose wawo wategulwa kuli mwene, nayo yakawaponya wose.
40004025	Ne mapuga menji ge wanhu, wono walawa ku Galilaya, Dekapoli, Yelusalemi, Yudiya, sunga na ku nhumbi ya Yoludani, wose wakawa kumutyatya.
40005001	Nayo Yesu yaza kugawona imapuga ge wanhu, yakabita kucanyha ye litunda yakekala hasi. Iwejizwa wakwe wakamuziza,
40005002	nayo yakawa kwanza kuwejiza yakatya,
40005003	“Wamoti wono wakwiwona nha waciwa hali Mulungu, hambi u wutemi wo Mulungu nha wawo.
40005004	Wamoti wono wena wukalale, hambi nha wosindamikwa.
40005005	Wamoti iwapolo, hambi nha wopegwa yinze.
40005006	Wamoti wono wena nzala ne nyhilu, yo kwituma zo wuhile wo Mulungu, hambi u Mulungu nha kowegutya.
40005007	Wamoti wono wena lusungu kuli wanji hambi nawo nha wowonelwa lusungu no Mulungu.
40005008	Wamoti wono wena nhumbula nzelu, hambi nha womuwona u Mulungu.
40005009	Wamoti wono wakwituma so wulondola mulamu, hambi nha wocemwa wana wo Mulungu.
40005010	Wamoti wono wakugazwa ku soko yo wituma zo wuhile wo Mulungu, hambi u Wutemi wa ku wulanga nha wawo!
40005011	“Muli wamoti nyenye, kolo wanhu wakumulijenyi, no kumugazenyi, no kumuvilenyi, kanyhi no kumulonjenyi makani mabi ku soko vyono muli watyatyi wangu.
40005012	Musecelele, kanyhi muwe musangalaye, hambi nha mwina wuhumbilizwe wenyu wuwaha ku wulanga. Hambi nha vivyo nha vyo wanhu wawagaza i wawizi wono wamulongolelenyi.
40005013	“Anye mwinha muli mwino mu yinze! Ninga u mwino hono wususulice, wogomolezezwa na cici kanyhi ndaso yayo? Awo wukuwa si wukwiliye cinji kanyhi, langa wutagwaga kunze no kukanyanjilwa ne wanhu.
40005014	“Anye muli wuzelu we yinze! Kaya yono yizenjigwe mwi'tunda mucanyha, siyosuma kwihundika.
40005015	Hamba ne wanhu si wakolelezaga tala no kuyigubiciza ne nhoto, langa yiwikwaga hacanyha, ha wuwiko wayo, ho yiwamulicile wose wono wali mumo mu nyumba.
40005016	Nha vivyo vyo yinojeye no wuzelu wenyu wumulice hali wanhu, ho wagawone imetumo genyu maswanu, nawo wamulumbe u sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga.
40005017	“Mulece kwihwesa vyono ane naza ho niwupate u Wulajilize wa Musa, hamba lunji ne mejizo ge wawizi. Ane si naza ho nizipate zizo, langa naza ho nizisikamye.
40005018	Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono sunga u wulanga ne yinze zilapuluta, ninga hasina hamba nghani ndodo, hamba cipinga cidodo co Wulajilize cono cowuswa, sunga kolo zose zakondya kufisilizwa.
40005019	Holeka muli wose mono kobena ililajilizo hambe lidodo sinha gose, no kuwejiza ne wanji wetume nha vivyo, yuyo yo kowa mudodo muno mu wutemi wa ku wulanga. Ninga mono kosuma kuzibata, sunga no kuwejiza iwanji, yuyo kowa muwaha mu wutemi wa ku wulanga.
40005020	Holeka nghumulonjelenyi nghutya, u wuswanu wenyu, hono wulece kuciza awulya we Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, nanye si mokwinjilila lukulu mu wutemi wa ku wulanga.”
40005021	“Mwahulika vyono iwanhu we katali walonjelwa nhavi, ‘Wulece kuwulaga munhu! Nayo mono kowulaga, yimunojeye yaling'anizwe.’
40005022	Ninga ane nghumutyenyi, muli wose mono yakumuwonela likuwo u nduguye, yuyo yimunojeye yaling'anizwe. Nayo mono yakumubedegala u nduguye, yuyo kotegulwa ku wuling'anizwe. Na mono yakumutya u nduguye ‘Go mulele gwe,’ yuyo yanojeye yenjile mu moto we Gehena.
40005023	Ale, hono wuwe wukulavya icilavywa cako ha cikumbicilo, na kuno hono wukumbucile vyono u nduguyo yena nghani na gwegwe, ale,
40005024	wucilekaje icilavywa cako, ha mwande ye cikumbicilo, wubite wamule mukelamule no nduguyo, hanyuma ho wuze, wukacilavye icilavywa cako.
40005025	“Mwilumbanizaje mbela mbela na mono yakukusitaka lono mukali nayo mu nzila, lono mukubita kuli mahakama. Na hono wulece kulanjilila, mono yakukusitaka, kokuwika mu miwoko ya hakimu, nayo hakimu, kokuwika mu miwoko ye wasilikale, nagwe kudindilwa mu jela.
40005026	Mbeka nghukulonjela, vyono sikolawaniziza lukulu mumo sunga kolo weza kukondya kulipa sendi ye ndumilizo.”
40005027	“Mwahulika vyono iwanhu walonjelwa, ‘Wulece kusenyha!’
40005028	Ninga ane nghumulonjelenyi vyono, umunhu mono komulanga mucekulu sunga yamusulumile, yuyo yakondya kusenyha nayo mu nhumbula yakwe.
40005029	Holeka, hono iliso lyako lyo kulume likusutizye, ale, wuliwusaje wulitaje kutali. Yili ciba muno kuli'gwe, wajilize cilunzwa cimonga co muwili, si nho kutagwa u muwili wako wose mu moto.
40005030	Na hono u muwoko wako wo kulume wukukusutizya, ale, wuwudumulaje no kuwutaga kutali. Yili ciba muno wajilize cilunzwa cimonga co muwili, si nho u muwili wako wose wutegulwe mu moto we Gehena.”
40005031	“Kanyhi yalongwa vyono, ‘Mono komuleka u mugolece wakwe, ale yamupelaje talaka.’
40005032	Ninga ane nghumutyenyi, mono komupela u mugolece wakwe talaka, langa hono si ku soko yo wusenyha, yuyo yakumwambuza du yasenyhe, no munhu yunji hono yamutole u mucekulu mono yapejigwe talaka, nayo yakusenyha.”
40005033	“Mwahulika kanyhi iwanhu we katali vyono walonjelwa, ‘Wulece kukawaniza uwilahize wako, langa yikunojeye wuwufisilize u wilahize wako kuli Muwaha.’
40005034	Ninga ane nghumulonjelenyi nghutya, mulece kwilahiziza lukulu mwi'tagwa lya cinji co cose, hamba ku wulanga, hambi nha lyo ligoda lyo lukumyo lyo Mulungu,
40005035	hamba cinji ca kono'nze, hambi nha wo wukanyago we magulu gakwe, hamba ku Yelusalemi, hambi nha yo kaya yo Mutemi muwaha.
40005036	Hamba wulece kwilahiza mu mutwe wako, hambi nha sikosuma kulunoza u luvwili lwako lumonga, luwe luzelu hamba lutitu.
40005037	Hono wutye, ‘Heya’ ale yiweze ‘Heya du!’ Na hono wutye, ‘Ng'o’ ale yiweze mbeka ‘Ng'o.’ Na yo yose yono yitimile zizo, yilawaga kuli ayulya u Mubi.”
40005038	“Mwahulika vyono yalongwa, ‘Liso na liso liyagwe, lino na lino liyagwe.’
40005039	Ninga ane nghumutyenyi, wulece kumulipiciza u munhu mubi. U munhu hono yakutowe kofi mu luzagasa lo kulume, ale wumupitusizaje no luzagasa luyagwe.
40005040	Munhu hono yakutegule kuli mahakama, ho yakusolele shati yako, wumulecelaje yasole ne likoti lyako.
40005041	No munhu hono yakudindimize wumudinghulile u mutegulo wakwe mu cihinzo ca kilometa monga, agwe wumudinghulilaje wumufise kilometa nyejete.
40005042	Nayo mono yakukulomba, wumupelaje, kanyhi wulece kumulemeza mono yakusaka kukukopa cinji.”
40005043	“Kanyhi mwahulika vyono yalongwa, ‘Wumwendaje u muyago ninga wumusulaje u mulugu wako.’
40005044	Ninga ane nghumutyenyi, ‘Muwendaje iwalugu wenyu, kanyhi mweze kuwalombela wono wakumugazenyi nyenye,
40005045	ho musume kuwa wana wo Sogo yenyu mono yali ku wulanga. Hambi u Mwene nha kawamulicilaga ilizuwa lyakwe iwanhu waswanu ne wabi, no kuwatonyezeza imvula iwanhu waswanu ne wabi.’
40005046	Alu motuga wuhumbilizweci hono muwe kuwenda du wono wakumwendenyi nanye? Hasina! Ku soko sunga ne watoweza kodi nawo wanozaga nhavivyo.
40005047	Na lono muwe mukuwalamusa iwandugu zenyu du, wulenyi mowa mwanoza cinhu cijenzi? Ne wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, nawo nha wanozaga nhavivyo.
40005048	Holeka mweze mukwilaniciye, nha vyono u Senyu wa ku wulanga yakwilaniciye.”
40006001	“Mulanjilile, mulece kwitumila i metumo genyu maswanu ha meso ge wanhu, ho mwilajise hali wene. Hambi hono munoze nhavivyo cagalanze, nha si mosuma kupegwa icihumbilizwa no Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga.
40006002	“Holeka na hono wumutaze u muciwa, wulece kwilajila hali wanhu, wulece kunoza nhe wanhu iwakoci vyono wanozaga mu matanganilo go wuhembelo, na mu zinzila, ho walumbwe ne wanhu. Mbeka nghumutyenyi vyono, wakondya kucituga icihumbilizwa cawo.
40006003	“Ninga agwe, lono wukumutaza u muciwa, ale wunoze mu nzila yono hamba u mwendece wako si kosuma kuyimanya yono wukwituma.
40006004	Ho wulavye wako wuwe mu nzila ye cinyele, no Sogo nayo mono kawonaga ze cinyele, kokuhumbiliza.”
40006005	“Nanye lono mukulomba, mulece kuwa nhe wakoci. Hambi iwene wakoci, nha wendile kwima wima mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, sunga na mu zinzila, no kulomba, ho welajile kuli wanhu. Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono wawo wakondya kucituga icihumbilizwa cawo.
40006006	Ninga agwe lono wukulomba, winjile mu nyumba yako kugati, widindile no mulango, ho wumulombe u Sogo mono sikejelaga. Nayo u Sogo mono kaziwonaga ze cinyele kokuhumbiliza.
40006007	“Na mu wulombe wenyu, mulanjilile, mulece kwilonganjicila nghani za bwete du, nhe wanhu wono si wamumanyile Mulungu. Hambi i wene wawo nha wehwesaga vyono, i milungu yawo ho yowahulika, ku soko yo wulonga nghani nyinji.
40006008	Anye mulece kuwa nha vyono wenha wawo. Hambi u Sogo yenyu nha yavimanyile i visakwa vyenyu, sunga na lono mukali si namulomba.
40006009	Ninga munojeye mweze kulomba nhavi: ‘Baba mono wuli ku wulanga, Ilitagwa lyako lyezwe,
40006010	U wutemi wako wuze yono wukuhila yitumwe kono'nze nha vyono ku wulanga.
40006011	Wucipelaje izindigwa zono zikwiliye izuwali.
40006012	Wucinenelaje imasutya getu, nha vyono nase ciwanenelaga wono wacisutizyaga.
40006013	Wulece kucitegula mu wujelwe, Langa wuciponye na yulya u Mubi.’ ” [Hambi u wutemi ne vilungo, no wuwaha nha vyako, sunga ku cibitilila. Heya.]
40006014	“Hambi hono muwanenele wanhu imasutya gawo, u Sogo yenyu nayo wa ku wulanga, ho kosuma kumunenelenyi nanye imasutya genyu.
40006015	Ninga hono mulece kuwanenela wanhu imasutya gawo, nayo u Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga si kosuma kumunenelenyi nanye imasutya genyu.”
40006016	“Na lono mukuleka kulya, mulece kusininghala ha wusu nhe wanhu wakoci. Hamby iwene nha wasininghalaga ha wusu, ho wejele hali wanhu vyono walecile kulya. Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono wawo, wakondya kucituga icihumbilizwa cawo.
40006017	Ninga agwe lono wukuleka kulya, ale wibakaje imafuta mu mutwe wako, kanyhi wizuguzaje no wusu wako,
40006018	ho munhu wo wose yalece kumanya vyono agwe wulecile kulya, langa wumanyice no Sogo du, mono si kejelaga. Nayo u Sogo mono kaziwonaga ze cinyele, kokuhumbiliza.”
40006019	“Mulece kwiwutila sawo kono'nze, kono imakuni ne nghangaga vihodangaga, ne wahizi wenjilaga no kuhiza.
40006020	Langa mwiyiwicilaje sawo ku wulanga, kono imakuni hamba nghangaga si vyosuma kuyihodanga yaye, hamba ne wahizi si wenjilaga ho wahize.
40006021	Hambi hono hoyili isawo yako, nhavivyo no mutima wako nawo, wowa wuli baho.”
40006022	“Imeso gakuwa nha yo tala yo muwili. Holeka imeso gako hono gawe matelevu, no muwili wako wose nhavivyo nawo wowa wuli mu wuzelu.
40006023	Ninga imeso gako hono gawe mabi, no muwili wako wose wowa wuli mu wutitu. Holeka uwuzelu wono wuli muli gwegwe hono wuwe wutitu, uwutitu wuwo, wowa wa kogofya muno muno.”
40006024	“Hasina mwitumami mono kosuma kuwetumamila watwa wejete. Ku soko nha komusula yumonga, no kumwenda yulya we kejete, hamba lunji komutyatya yumonga du, no kumubedegala ayulya muyagwe. Holeka si mosuma kumwitumamila u Mulungu hamonga ne zisawo.”
40006025	“Si holeka nghumulonjelenyi nghutya, mulece kuwa na mahwele ku soko ye zindigwa mukutya, molya cici hamba mong'wa cici, ku soko yo wumi wenyu, hamba muli ze vivwalo vyono mukuvisaka ku soko ye miwili yenyu. Alu mukwihwesa vyono u wumi wuli mu zindigwa du, hamba hocili cinji cono cicizize? No muwili nawo ma, si wucizize i vivwalo?
40006026	Ale muzilangaje ta izindeje za mu mbago, vyono si zihadikaga, hamba si zidudulaga, kanyhi zisina hamba madongha hanji ho hose. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, u Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga kazilisaga du. Ninga anye ma, si muzicizize zizo?
40006027	Alu mwene, wa hayi ta wa muli nyenye, mono ku soko ye mahwele gakwe, kosuma kwiyonjelezeza ivilo vyo wumi wakwe hambe kwe zuwa limonga du?
40006028	Na muli ze vivwalo, so cici lo mukwihwelela? Mugalangaje ta imaluwa ga mu mbago vyono gawilukaga no kusanula. Sigetumaga mulimo wo wose, hamba si genozezaga vivwalo.
40006029	Ninga nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono sunga no mutemi Solomona mweneco, hamonga ne nhojo yakwe, hamba si yasuma kuvwala myenda miswanu nha vyono linha limonga lye maluwa gaga.
40006030	Alu u Mulungu hono yawe yakugavwika imahanze ga mu migunda nha vivyo gono gali baha izuwali, ninga imitondo gakutagwa mu moto, wulenyi, si kosuma kumuvwicenyi viswanu anye kuciza? Anye mo wanhu mono mwina u wihuwilo wucefu!
40006031	Mulece kuwa na mahwele yaye, mukutya, ‘Alu hamba colya cici, hamba covwala cici!’
40006032	Hambi iwanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, nha wo wakuwa kuzigazicila zizo zose. Ninga u Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga, yamanyile vyono mukuvisaka ivinhu vivyo vyose.
40006033	Ninga hamonga na zizo zose, mwamule kuwulondola u Wutemi wo Mulungu, na zose zono u Mulungu yakuzihila, holeka na zizo zose mokonjelezwa.
40006034	Holeka mulece kuwa na mahwele ku soko ye lizuwa lye mitondo, hambi imitondo nha yowa ne mahwele gayo nayo. Holeka hasina soko yo kutowelela u wugaye, vyono izuwa no wugaye wayo wulikwiliye.”
40007001	“Mulece kuwaling'aniza wanji, holeka nanye simoling'anizwa no Mulungu,
40007002	hambi nha mu nghango yono mukuwaling'aniza wanji, nanye nha vyo moling'anizwa nhavivyo, ne cipimo ci cilya du cono mukucitumamila kuli wanji, co cipimo cico du cono u Mulungu nayo kolomupimilenyi na nyenye.
40007003	Alu nhawule wukucilanga icilagala cono cili mu liso lyo nduguyo, na akuno si wukusuma kuliwona ilibici lyono lili mu liso lyako go mweneco?
40007004	Hamba kosuma nhawule kumulonjela u nduguyo wutye, ‘Gwe ndugu yangu, leka ta nghuwuse icilagala cono cili mu liso lyako,’ na kumbe gwegwe go mweneco, wina libici mu liso lyako?
40007005	Go mukoci gwe! Wamule wuliwuse ilibici lyono lili mu liso lyako go mweneco, ho kosuma kuwona viswanu no kusuma kuwusa icilagala cono cili mu liso lyo nduguyo.
40007006	“Mulece kuzipela izimbwa ivinhu vyono vyelile, ho zilece kupituka no kumulumanjenyi, hamba mulece kuzigumila izilulu zenyu ha mwande ye zingubi, ho zilece kuzikanyanjila.”
40007007	“Lombenyi nanye mopegwa, londolenyi nanye mowona, mukong'onhe nanye modigulilwa.
40007008	Hambi mono yakulomba nha yakupegwa, nayo mono yakulondola yakutuga, na mono yakukong'onha yakudigulilwa.
40007009	Wulenyi, muli nyenye hoyuli yunji hono u mwanagwe yamulombe mukate komupela yibwe?
40007010	Hamba wule, hono yamulombe somba, komupela nzoka?
40007011	Holeka hono anye mono muli wabi, ninga mumanyile kuwapela iwana wenyu ivinhu viswanu, mbeka, u Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga kokwituma nhavivyo yacizilize, nayo kowapela iviswanu wose wono wakumulomba.
40007012	Muwatendelaje wanji nha vyono anye mukusaka wene nawo wamutendelenyi nyenye. Na yiyi yo nhunizo yo wulajilize wa Musa, sunga ne mejizo ge wawizi.”
40007013	“Mwinjilile mu mulango u mufinyu. Hambi inzila yono yibitile ku wongomele nha ngazi, sunga no mulango wo kwinjilila kuko nawo mugazi, nawo wono wakuyikola inzila yiyo, wo wenji.
40007014	Ninga inzila yono yikubita sunga ko ku wumi, finyu, sunga no mulango wo kwinjilila kuko nawo mufinyu, nawo wanhu wacefu du wono wakusuma kuyiwona inzila yiyo.”
40007015	“Mwilanjililaje kuli iwawizi wo wulambi. Wono wakumuzizenyi, akuno wakwijela kunze nha ngholo, ninga mugati yawo ho maminzi makali.
40007016	Ninga mowamanyila du mu metumo gawo. Alu'mbi iwanhu wakuwa kuhepa zi zabibu mu mabici ge mamiya, hamba zinghuyu mu mabijili? Aa, ng'o!
40007017	Holeka u mubici muswanu wulelaga mikalo miswanu, no mubici mubi wulelaga mikalo mibi.
40007018	“U mubici muswanu si wosuma kulela mikalo mibi, hamba u mubici mubi nawo siwosuma kulela mikalo miswanu.
40007019	No mubici wo wose wono si wukulela mikalo miswanu, wukutemangwa no kutajilwa mu moto.
40007020	Holeka mowamanyila du mu metumo gawo.”
40007021	“Si munhu wo wose mono yakunyitya, ‘Muwaha, Muwaha,’ yo kokwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu, langa yuyo du mono yakwituma u wuhile wo Sogo yangu mono yali ku wulanga.
40007022	Wenji wono wolononjela mwizuwa lyo wuling'anizwe wakutya, ‘Muwaha, Muwaha! Mwi'tagwa lyako, cayiganulaga inghani yako, na mwi'tagwa lyako calavyaga macisi, no kunoza vitanjilo vinji.’
40007023	Baho nane nowalonjela nitye, ‘Ane si nghumumanyenyi hamba hadodo, muwuce ha mwande yangu anye wose mo wetuma wubi.’ ”
40007024	“Holeka ku soko yiyo, u munhu wo wose mono ya kuzihulika zinghani zangu no kuzibata, yuyo yehwanile u munhu we mahala, mono yayizenga kaya yakwe mwi'talawe.
40007025	Mvula yikatonya, ne makolongo gakahuluma, ne mbeho mbaha yikakukunza no kuyikundujiza kaya yiyo. Ninga hamba si yagwa yaye ku soko vyono yali yizenjigwe mwi'talawe mucanyha.
40007026	Ninga muli wose mono yakuzihulika zinghani zangu zizi, hamba kuzibata, yuyo yehwanile no munhu mono yasina mahala, mono yazenga kaya yakwe mwi'sangha.
40007027	Imvula yikatonya ne makolongo gakahuluma, ne mbeho mbaha muno yikakukunza, no kuyikundujiza kaya yiyo, nayo yikagwa, no wugwe wayo wali wuwaha muno muno.”
40007028	Nayo Yesu yali yeza kukondya kuzilonga izinghani zizo, imapuga ge wanhu gakezina muno so mejizo gakwe.
40007029	Hambi u mwene nha si yali yenha iwejizi wawo wo Wulajilize, vyono u mwene Yesu yejizaga ko wulajilize.
40008001	Yesu yali yeza kutima yakulawa mwi'tunda, imapuga menji ge wanhu, gakamutyatya.
40008002	Baho u munhu yunji mono yali yena wutamwa wo wukoma yakaza, yakamufugamila Yesu, yakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, hono wende kosuma kunghwema.”
40008003	Nayo Yesu yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakamupamiza, yakatya, “Nyendile wukwemwe.” Hobaho du u munhu yuyo yakakwemwa u wukoma wakwe.
40008004	Yesu yakawa kumutya umunhu yuyo, “Alu, ta wuhulicize, wulece kumulonjela umunhu wo wose ze nghani yiyi, langa wubite wukelajile ko mukohani, wulavye ne cilavywa cako, nha vyono yalajiliza Musa, ho wuwakangazize nha vyono wapona.”
40008005	Nayo Yesu lono yenjilaga mwi'kaya lya Kapelanawumi, u muwaha yunji Mulumi yakamubitila, yakamunena,
40008006	yakutya, “Gwe Muwaha, u mwitumami wangu yagonile mu kaya, yena wutamwa wo wunyenyanjice, nayo mutamwa muno muno.”
40008007	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Ale nokuza nimuponye.”
40008008	U muwaha yuyo yakamutya Yesu, “Muwaha, ane hamba si nghwiliye, ho agwe wusume kwinjila mu nyumba yangu. Ninga agwe wulonje nghani du, no mwitumami wangu kopona.”
40008009	Hambi, hamba sunga na nene nane, mono nili hasi yo wulajilize wa wanji, nha nina wasilikale wono wali hasi yangu. Nghumulonjela ayu “Bita!” nayo yakubita, na yunji nayo nghumutya, “Wuze!” nayo yakuza; u mwitumami wangu nayo nghumutya, “Noza acino! nayo yakunoza.”
40008010	Nayo Yesu yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakezina muno, yakawalonjela iwanhu wono wamutyatyaga, yakatya, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono nghali si namuwona munhu wo wose mu Waisilayeli mono yena u wihuwilo wono winha wuwu.
40008011	Holeka nghumulonjelenyi nha vyono iwanhu wenji wokuza, wakulawa kucilima na kumwezi, nawo wokwikala ha zindigwa mu wutemi wa ku wulanga, wena hamonga na Abulahamu na Isaka, na Yakobo.
40008012	Ninga wawo wono wali wawunojeye uwutemi wuwo, awo wotagwa ku citi kunze, ihanhu hono wowa kulila no kugwezula meno.”
40008013	Hanyuma Yesu yakawa kumulonjela yuyo u muwaha Mulumi yakamutya, “Ale, wubite ku kaya, nayo yiweze nha vyono wihuwiye.” No mwitumami wakwe yakapona mwidaha lilyo du.
40008014	Yesu yakabita ku kaya ya Petelo, na kuko yakamwagana u mukwewe we cicekulu wa Petelo mutamwa mhungo nghali muno muno, yagonile mu citanda.
40008015	Hobaho, Yesu yakawa kumupamiza mu muwoko, nayo mhungo yikawa kumuleka, nayo yakawa kwinuka, yakamwitumamila.
40008016	Na lono yali yeza cinyamihe, wamuletela wanhu wenji wono wali wena macisi, nayo, ko wulonje nghani du, yakagawinga gago imacisi. Yakawaponya wanhu wenji nhavivilya, wono wali watamigwe.
40008017	Yakanoza zizo, ho zifisilizwe izinghani azilya zono zalongwa no muwizi Isaya zono yatya, “U Mwene yawusola u wusocele wetu kanyhi yazidinghula ne zinhamwa zetu.”
40008018	Nayo Yesu yaza kuliwona ilipuga lye wanhu lyamupilima, hobaho yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe walowoce ku nhumbi ye lilamba.
40008019	Mwijizi yunji wo Wulajilize yakamubitila Yesu, yakamutya, “Gwe Mwijizi, ane nokutyatya ko kose kono kobita.”
40008020	Ninga Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Imacewe, gena mamwina, ne zindeje nazo zina manhuli, ninga u Mwana wo Munhu, yasina hamba hanhu ho kuceha.”
40008021	Hanyuma munhu yunji nayo wa muli wejizwa wakwe, yakamutya, “Gwe, Muwaha nghukulomba wunghombole namule nghamuzice baba.”
40008022	Ninga Yesu yakamutya, “Agwe wunhyatyaje! Wuwalekaje iwafu wawazice iwafu wawo.”
40008023	Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa, ne wejizwa wakwe vikabitana hamonga nayo.
40008024	Mukukunzo muwaha muno, likawatimila nhinicizo mwi'lamba, sunga ne mawingo gakawa kwanza kuyigubika ngalawa. Nayo Yesu mwi'daha lilyo, yali yagonile nhongo.
40008025	Iwejizwa wakamubitila, wakamusinhusa wakutya, “Muwaha, wuciponyaje ceza kongomela!”
40008026	Yesu yakawatya, “Nye mo wanhu wo wihuwilo wucefu, nhawulenyi mukogopa?” Hodu yakawa kwinuka, yakavitacila imbeho ne mawingo, navyo vikawa kunyamala twii.
40008027	Iwanhu wakezina muno muno, wakatya, “Alu, nye, u munhu 'yu yenha wule? Nhondo sunga ne mbeho ne mawingo, vyose vikumuhulika!”
40008028	Yesu yakafika ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba mu yisi ya Wagadalene, yaketang'anila kuko na wanhu wejete wono wali wena macisi, wakulawilila ku vitenjelo. Nawo wali wanhu wa kogofya muno muno, hamba hasina munhu wo wose mono yejelelaga kukolela mu nzila yiyo.
40008029	Nawo wakawa kwanza kuzoza wakutya, “Alo cina nghanici nagwe go Mwana wo Mulungu? Alo kuza akuno ho wucigaze na lono icidaha cikali si nafika?”
40008030	Na behi ne hanhu baho, hali holili yitewa lya magubi menji, gadimaga.
40008031	Holeka gago imacisi gakamunena gakutya, “Hono wuciwinje, ale wucikombolaje cinjile mu zingubi azilya.”
40008032	Yesu yakagatya macisi, “Ale, Bitenyi.” Nago gakalawila muli wanhu wawo, gakenjila mu zingubi. Ne litewa lyose lye zingubi likavulumucila he weta, likagwila mwi'lamba mugati, ne zingubi zose zikafwila mu malenga.
40008033	Iwadimi we zingubi zizo, wakatiziza ku kaya. Nawo wakazilonga zose na zono zawejelela awalya iwanhu wono wali wena macisi.
40008034	Ale, ne wanhu wose wa mwi'tumbi lilyo, wakalawila, wakamubitila Yesu, nawo wali weza muwona wakamunena yawuce mu yisi yawo.
40009001	Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakalowoka lilamba, yakabita mwitumbi lyakwe.
40009002	Na baho, iwanhu wakamuletela munhu yumonga mono yali yadejepe u muwili wakwe, yali yagonile mu citanda. Nayo Yesu yaza kuwuwona u wihuwilo wawo, yakawa kumulonjela yuyo u munhu mono yali yadejepe, yakamutya, “Ale wisindamikaje mwanangu! Kunenelwa u wubi wako.”
40009003	Wanji wa muli wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakawa kwanza kwihwesa wakutya, “U munhu ayu yakumutovula u Mulungu!”
40009004	Nayo Yesu yakagamanya i mahweso gawo, yakawatya, “Alo so cici mukwihwesa zimbi mu zinhumbula zenyu?
40009005	Alu ya hayi yono mhelu, yo wutya, ‘Kunenelwa uwubi wako,’ hamba yo wutya, ‘Winuce wujende?’
40009006	Aluno nghusaka anye mumanye vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yena wulajilize wo kuwanenela iwanhu wubi mono'nze.” Baho yakawa kumutya u munhu mono yali yadejepe, “Winuce, wudinghule icitanda cako wubite kukaya yako.”
40009007	Ale, u munhu yuyo mono yali yadejepe, yakenuka, yakabita ku kaya kwakwe.
40009008	Ne wanhu wose wono wali wali mwi'puga lilyo, waza kuziwona zizo, wakezina muno akuno wakogopa, wakamukumya u Mulungu mono yawapelile wanhu ivilungo vinha vivi.
40009009	Yesu yakawuka kuko, na lono yajendaga mu nzila, yakamuwona munhu yunji mono kacemwaga itagwa lyakwe, Matayo, yali yekaye mu hofisi yakwe yo wutowezezo we kodi. Yesu yakamutya, “Wunhyatye.” Nayo Matayo yakenuka yakamutyatya.
40009010	Nayo Yesu lono yali yekaye mu nyumba yakulya zindigwa, iwatoweza kodi wenji, hamonga ne wanyo wubi, wakaza, wakekala hamonga nayo, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe.
40009011	Nawo i Wafalisayo waza kuziwona zizo, hodu wakawa kuwalonjela iwejizwa wakwe wakutya, “Alu nhawulenyi u Mwijizi wenyu yakulizana, hamonga ne watoweza kodi ne wanyo wubi?”
40009012	Yesu nayo yaza kuwahulika, yakawatya, “Iwatamwa, wo wasakaga muganga, hamba si awalya iwaswanu.
40009013	Holeka mwiyijizizaje mu nhunizo ye zinghani azino, ‘Ane nghusaka lusungu du, hamba si makumbiko.’ Hambi ane nha si naza ho niwaceme iwanhu waswanu, ng'o, langa iwanhu wabi.”
40009014	Hanyuma i wejizwa wa Yohana u Mubaputizi, wakamubitila Yesu wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ase sunga ne Wafalisayo, cilekaga kulya kali kenji, Alu nhawule i wejizwa wako si wakuleka kulya?”
40009015	Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Alu mukwihwesa wono walalikwe ku halusi wosuma kulila, lono bwana halusi yakali yali hamonga nawo 'mbi? Aa, ng'o, langa icipango cofika cono bwana halusi kowuswa hali wene, ale mu cipango cico langa, ho woleka kulya.
40009016	“Iwanhu si wawicilaga icilaka co mwenda u mupya, mu civwalo cihuma. Hambi icilaka cico nha cowudemula wuwo u mwenda muhuma, na baho hono hali hademuce, nhondo ho hokonjelezecela lukulu.
40009017	Hamba iwanhu si watajilaga divayi yimhya mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zihuma. Na hono wanoze nhavivyo, imifuko yodemuka, ne divayi yomwajika, ne mifuko nayo yohodanjika. Ninga si yili nhavivyo, langa iwanhu watajilaga divayi yimhya, mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zimhya, navyo vyose vyono vyejete, divayi ne mifuko vyokwikala vitelevu.”
40009018	Nayo Yesu lono yalongaga zizo, yakaza muwaha monga Muyahudi, yakamufugamila, yakutya, “Mwanangu we cicekulu katajika lulu baha. Ninga hamba nhavivyo nghukunena wuze wumuwicile muwoko wako, nayo kowumipa.”
40009019	Yesu nayo yakawa kutuluka, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, wakamutyatya u muwaha yuyo.
40009020	Umucekulu yunji nayo mono yali yena wutamwa wo wuzaze we sakami mu myaka yikumi na myejete, yakamutyatya Yesu mu nyuma, yakapamiza limhembo lyo mwenda wa Yesu.
40009021	Yanoza nha vivyo vyono yehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe nha vyono, “Hono mhamize du icivwalo cakwe, hodu nowa napona.”
40009022	Yesu yakapituka yakamuwona, yakamutya, “Go muhinza, wisindamice! Wihuwilo wako wukuponya.” Nayo u mucekulu yuyo yakawa kupona mu cidaha cico du.
40009023	Hanyuma Yesu yakawa kwinjila mu nyumba yo muwaha yulya. Nayo yaza kuwawona watowa zifilimbi, ne lipuga lye wanhu wono walilaga,
40009024	yakatya, “Ta muwuce bahano! Hambi u muhinza yuyu, nha si yafwiye, langa yagonile du.” Nawo wakamusekanga muno.
40009025	Ilipuga lye wanhu lyaza kuwuswa, Yesu yakenjila kugati, yakamwibata muhinza u muwoko, nayo u muhinza yakema.
40009026	Ne nghani yiyo yikakumuka mu yisi yiyilya yose.
40009027	Yesu yakawuka baho, na lono yajendaga, wabofu wejete wakamutyatya akuno wakuzoza wakutya, “Gwe go Mwana wa Dawudi, wuciwonele lusungu!”
40009028	Nayo Yesu yali yeza kwinjila kugati, awalya i wabofu iwejete nawo wakamubitila, nayo Yesu yakawawuza yakutya, “Wulenyi, mwihuwiye mbeka nha vyono ane nosuma kumutendelenyi inghani yiyo?” Nawo i wabofu wakamutya, “Heya Muwaha.”
40009029	Baho Yesu yakapamiza imeso gawo no kuwatya, “Ale yiwe kuli'nye nha vyono mwihuwiye.”
40009030	Imeso gawo gakanuguzwa. Nayo Yesu yakawakong'onheza ko wukali yakuwatya, “Anye, mulece kumulonjela u munhu wo wose ze nghani yiyi.”
40009031	Ninga wene wakatuluka, wakayitandaza inghani ya Yesu mu yisi yiyilya yose.
40009032	Ne wanhu lono weyagalaga wakubita ku zikwawo, wanji wakamuletela Yesu, u munhu monga mono yali yali cibwibwi, ku soko vyono yali yebatwe ne licisi.
40009033	Ne licisi lyaza kuwa lyalavywa muli munhu yuyo we cibwibwi, lo lulo lulo yakawa kulonga kanyhi. Ne wanhu wakezina muno muno akuno wakutya, “Inghani yono yinha yiyi, yikali si nejela hamba mu Isilayeli!”
40009034	Ninga i Wafalisayo wakawa kutya, “Ayu yakulavizye macisi mu vilungo vyo muwaha we macisi mabi.”
40009035	Nayo Yesu yakagajendela i makaya gose ne vitumbi, yakawa kwijiza mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo no kuganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Wutemi wo Mulungu, hamonga no kuponya imatamwa gose go wusocele we mawala gose.
40009036	Yaza kuwawona iwanhu mapuga na mapuga, yakawawonela lusungu muno, ku soko wali wakataye muno, akuno wehweleye kotya zingholo zono zisina mudimi.
40009037	Baho yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe, yakawatya, “Ndudula yo mbaha, ninga iwetumami wo wacefu.
40009038	Holeka mumulombaje munya mugunda, ho yatume iwaduduzi mu mugunda wakwe.”
40010001	Yesu yakawacema iwejizwa wakwe we likumi na wejete, yakawapela wulajilize wo kulavizya imacisi mavu, no kuponya imatamwa, no wusocele wo wose.
40010002	Ne matagwa ga wawo iwatumwa we likumi na wejete nha gogano; u mulongozi yo Simoni, mono yakucemwa Petelo, na Andeleya u mwanakwawe, Yakobo u mwana wa Zebedayo, na Yohana u mwanakwawe,
40010003	Filipo na Batolomayo, Tomaso na Matayo mono yali mutoweza kodi, na Yakobo u mwana wa Alifayo, na Tadayo,
40010004	Simoni Mukanani, na Yuda Musikaliyota mono yamugaluka Yesu.
40010005	Yesu yawatuma wawo we likumi na wejete hamonga no kuwapela wulajilize awuno, “Mulece kubita kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, hamba mulece kwinjila mu nyumba yo yose ye Wasamaliya.
40010006	Langa mubite du kuli iwanhu wa Isilayeli wono wajiliye nhe zingholo.
40010007	Na lono mweza kubita, ale mweze kuganula mukutya nhavi, ‘U wutemi wo Mulungu wasejelela.’
40010008	Muwaponyaje iwatamwa, muwazukulaje wono wafwiye, muwakwemaje wono wena wukoma, mugalavyaje imacisi. Mupegwa bwete, holeka nanye mulavye bwete.
40010009	Kanyhi mulece kuteguliza zahabu, hamba mapesa, hamba fweza za shaba.
40010010	Hamba mulece kusola imifuko yo kulombela mu nzila, hamba yikoti lyo kukawaniza, hamba malatu, hamba nghome. Hambi u mwitumami nha yanojeye yapegwe i ndigwa yakwe.
40010011	Na lono mukwinjila mwi'kaya lyo lyose, hamba mu citumbi, ale mumulondolaje u munhu wo wose mono yewikanize kumubocelenyi, nanye mwikalanaje na yuyo du sunga kolo mukuwuka ihanhu baho.
40010012	Lono mukwinjila mu nyumba, muwalamusaje wanya kaya.
40010013	Na hono iwanya kaya yiyo wamubocelenyi u mulamu wenyu, ale mulamu wenyu wokwikala hamonga nawo. Ninga hono wekale si wawuboceye u mulamu wenyu, ale u mulamu wenyu womuwuyilenyi nyenye mo weneco.
40010014	Na lono u munhu wo wose yaleme kumubocelenyi, hamba kumuhulicizenyi, ale nanye lono mweza kuwuka mu nyumba yiyo, hamba mwi'kaya lilyo, mukung'unhe ne manghundi gono gali mu migulu yenyu.
40010015	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, Mwizuwa lye ning'aniza, ilikaya lilyo lyolotuga wulipicizwe wuwaha muno kuciza, si nho wulipicizwe wulya wono galipicizwa i makaya ga Sodoma na Gomola.”
40010016	“Alu ane nghumutumenyi anye, kotya zingholo muciligati ye maminzi. Holeka muweze wasugu nha vyono zinha zinzoka, ninga kanyhi muweze wapolo nha vyono zinha zinziwa.
40010017	Mwilanjililaje kuli wanhu, hambi nha womutegulenyi kuli mahakama, kanyhi womukunenyi viboko mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo.
40010018	Kanyhi motegulwa kuli wawaha ne watemi, ku soko yangu, ho musume kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu kuli wene na kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
40010019	Holeka kolo wakumutegulenyi kuli mahakama, anye mulece kuwa na mahwele kuli zono molonga hamba lunji molonga nyhici, hambi nha mopegwa yono molonga mu cipango cico.
40010020	Ku soko vyono si nyenye mono mukulonga, langa u Muhe wo Sogo yenyu, yo yakulonga muli nyenye.
40010021	“Munhu komukombola u mwanakwawe ho yawulagwe, no sogo yo munhu nayo komukombola u mwanagwe, ne wana nawo wowagaluka iwalezi wawo no kuwawulaga.
40010022	Ne wanhu wose wolomusulenyi nyenye, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu. Ninga mono kokangalila sunga ko ku ndumo yo kopona.
40010023	“Iwanhu kolo wakumuwinjenyi mwi'kaya ali, mutizize mwi'kaya linji. Ninga mbeka nghumulonjelenyi vyono, si mosuma kugajendela makaya gose ga Isilayeli mugamale, lono u Mwana wo Munhu yakali si naza.
40010024	“U mwijizwa, si komuciza u mwijizi wakwe, hamba mwitumami si komuciza u muwaha wakwe.
40010025	Ninga yikwiliye kuli mwijizwa yawe nho mwijizi wakwe, no mwitumami nayo yawe nho muwaha wakwe. Alu hono wakumucema Belizebuli u mulongola we mhuga, wowacemela matagwa i mabi muno muno iwanhu wanji wa mu mhuga yiyo.”
40010026	“Holeka anye mulece kuwogopa iwanhu we liwala lilyo. Hambi co cose cono cigubicizwe, nha cologubulwa, na co cose cono cihundicizwe nha cololawila kuzelu.
40010027	Na yono nghumulonjelelenyi mu wutitu, anye muyilonjelaje hazelu, ne nghani yono mukuyihulika yikupwepwa, anye muyanzalikaje cagalanze.
40010028	Kanyhi mulece kuwogopa awalya wono wawulagaga u muwili du, na kumbe si wosuma kuyiwulaga nhumbula. Yili ciba muno hono mumogope ayulya mono kosuma kuwongomeza u muwili, hamonga ne nhumbula mu moto we gehena.
40010029	Vikobobole vyejete viguzagwa sendi yihano. Ninga hamba cimonga si cigwizaga hasi lono u Mulungu si yakomboye.
40010030	Ninga kulubavu lwenyu, sunga ne zimvili za mu mitwe yenyu mbalwe zose.
40010031	Holeka mulece kogopa hambi anye nha muvicizize ivikobobole vinji.”
40010032	“U munhu wo wose mono yakumvumila calinze, nha vyono wangu, ale, nane nhavivyo, nomuvumila hali Baba mono yali ku wulanga.
40010033	Ninga munhu wo wose mono konghana cagalanze, ale nane nomukanila hali Baba mono yali ku wulanga.”
40010034	“Mulece kutya 'mba naza ho ndete mulamu kono'nze. Ane si naza ho ndete mulamu aa ng'o, langa mumaje.
40010035	Hambi nha naza ho ndete matemanuko, hagati yo mwana no sogo yo munhu, no mwana we cicekulu no nyina, na hagati yo mukwemulima no mukwewe we cicekulu.
40010036	Ne walugu wo munhu, wo wanhu wono wali mu kaya yakwe.
40010037	“Nayo mono yamwendile muno muno u sogwe, hambo nyina si nha vyono yanyendile nene, ale yuyo siyanghwiliye yaye. Nayo mono yamwendile muno muno u mwanagwe we cilume hamba we cicekulu si nha nene, ale yuyo hamba si yanghwiliye yaye.
40010038	No munhu mono si yakuwudinghula u musalaba wakwe, no kunhyatya, yuyo nayo hamba si yanghwiliye yaye.
40010039	Nayo mono yakuwibatiliza u wumi wakwe, yo kowajiliza, langa mono yakuwajiliza u wumi wakwe ku soko yangu, yuyo langa kowutuga.”
40010040	“U munhu wo wose mono yakumubocelenyi nyenye, yuyo yakumbocela nene, nayo mono yakumbocela nene, yakumubocela ayulya mono yanhuma.
40010041	Nayo mono yakumubocela u muwizi, vyono muwizi, yuyo kobocela icihumbilizwa co muwizi. Nayo mono yakumubocela u munhu muswanu, yuyo kobocela i cihumbilizwa co munhu muswanu.
40010042	Na mbeka nghumulonjelenyi vyono, muli wose mono komupela yumonga wa muli wadodo wawa i cikombe ce malenga gono gali zizizi, ku soko vyono mwijizwa wangu, yuyo nayo mbeka kopegwa icihumbilizwa cakwe.”
40011001	Nayo Yesu yali yeza kukondya kuwalajiliza i wejizwa wakwe, hodu yakawuka kuko, yakawa kubita kwijiza no kuganula, mu makaya gawo.
40011002	Nayo Yohana mubaputizi, yakazihulika ze metumo ga Yesu lono yali yali mu jela. Holeka yakawa kuwatuma i wejizwa wakwe,
40011003	wamuwuze watye, “Alo yo gwegwe yulya mono yakuza, hamba cimulindilaje yunji?”
40011004	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Mubite mukamulonjele Yohana zose zono mukuzihulika no kuziwona,
40011005	vyono i wabofu wakuwona kanyhi, we vitewe nawo, wakujenda, nawo wono wena wukoma, wakwezwa, na we ciziwi nawo wakuhulika, kanyhi sunga na wono wafwiye, nawo wakuzukulwa, ne waciwa nawo wakuganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu.
40011006	Holeka, yo mumoti u munhu mono si yakuyiwona nghani yo yose yimbi muli nene.”
40011007	Ale, i wanhu wawo wono watumwa na Yohana, wali weza kuwa watuluka, baho Yesu yakawa kwanza kugalonjela i mapuga ge wanhu, i zinghani za Yohana, yakutya, “Alu mwene mwabitaga kulanga cici kuko ku nyika? Lidete lyono likuyumvywa ne mbeho?
40011008	Alo mwabitaga ho mukawone ci cici? Mwabitaga ho mukamulanje u munhu mono yavwalile i vivwalo vye cimalidadi? Ninga i wanhu wono wavwalaga i vivwalo vye cimalidadi wekalaga mu zikaya ze watemi.
40011009	Holeka alu anye mwabitaga ho muwone ci cici? Alo u Muwizi?” Heya mbeka u munhu mono yamucizize muno u muwizi.
40011010	“Yuyu yo yalongwa mu Mandiko Gono Gelile vyono, Lanjenyi ta, nghumutuma u mutumwa wangu, ho yakulongolele no kukunozelezeza i nzila yako.”
40011011	Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono mu wana wose we wanhu, yakali nejela mono muwaha yamucizize Yohana Mubaputizi. Hamba nhavivyo, ayulya mono yakwijela nha yo mudodo muno mu wutemi wa ku wulanga, yo muwaha yamucizize yuyo Yohana.
40011012	Kuwulawilila mu vilo vya Yohana sunga nalu, u Wutemi wa ku wulanga wukwinjilwa kwe vilungo muno muno, ne wanhu i wahidimbazi, wo wakujela kuwutuga kwe vilungo.
40011013	Ne mejizo gose ge wawizi no Wulajilize wa Musa, vyose vyawila muli ze madaha gaga.
40011014	Holeka hono musume kuvumila, ale, yuyu Yohana yo ayulya Eliya mono yali yaze.
40011015	Ale muhulice, hono mwina makutu!
40011016	“Alu 'mba niluhwanicizaje u lulelo lulu na cinhuci? Na lunji lwinha i wazelelo wono wali wekaye mu sokoni, nawo wakawa wakwilonjela i cipuga acino na acilya, wakutya,
40011017	Cimutowelenyi zifilimbi, ninga hamba si muvinile, cimwimbilenyi i zinyimbo zo wukalale, nanye hamba kulila ng'o!”
40011018	Hambi Yohana lono yaziza, nha yaleka kulya, kanyhi hamba si yang'wezaga divayi, nawo wakatya, “Ayo yena yicisi.”
40011019	Alu, u Mwana wo Munhu yakaza, yakulya no kung'wa, nawo wakatya, “Mulanjenyi ta ayu munhu mubuguci, kanyhi mung'wa divayi, mwendece we watoweza kodi ne wahodanji. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, i mahala go Mulungu gakuhomelelwa vyono maswanu ku so i metumo gakwe.”
40011020	Baho yakawa kwanza kugatacila i makaya gono, hamba yawe yanoza mapoto menji mugati yago, ninga iwanhu wayo hamba si wasaka kuwukawaniza zo wuhile wawo wubi, yakutya,
40011021	“Woyi he, kuli'gwe go Kolazini, woyi he, kuli'gwe, go Betesayida. Hambi i mapoto gono ganozezwa kuli'gwe, hono gali ganozezwe ku Tulo na Sidoni, iwanhu wa mumo mhali wavwala katali vivwalo vye magunila, no kwibaka i mavu, ho walajile vyono wanena.
40011022	Hamba nhavivyo ane nghumulonjelenyi vyono, Mwizuwa lye ning'aniza mbeka anye, molotuga wulipicizwe wuwaha muno si nha Tulo na Sidoni.
40011023	Nagwe go Kapelanawumi, wukwihwesa vyono kotegulwa sunga ku wulanga mbi? Aa, ng'o, langa kovulumuswa sunga kono kowali wafu! Ku soko i mapoto gono ganozezwa kuli'gwe, hono gali ganozezwe ku Sodoma, mhali likaya lilyo lili baho sunga nalu.
40011024	Ninga nghumutyenyi mbeka, vyono i lizuwa lye ning'aniza lyolowa lili ciba muno muno kuli wanhu wa Sodoma si nho kwako go mweneco.”
40011025	Mwipango lilyo Yesu yakatya, “Nghukulumba 'gwe Baba, go Muwaha wo wulanga ne yinze, hambi nha kuwahundika we mahala i zinghani zizi, langa wukawagubulila i wana wadodo.
40011026	Heya, Baba, vyo wali wendile go mweneco.
40011027	“Baba yamhela vinhu vyose. Na hasina mono yamumanyile Mwana, langa hono si Baba du, hamba hasina mono yamumanyile Baba, langa hono si Mwana du, kanyhi na wo wose mono u Mwana kokwenda kumumanyiza.
40011028	Ale, muze kuli'ne anye wose mono mukugazika, na mono muvunice ne mitegulo yenyu, nane nomucehezenyi.
40011029	Mwiwicilaje u lubano lwangu, mwiyijize kuli'ne, hambi ane nha nili mupolo, kanyhi nili mwinenenyhezi mu nhumbula, nanye motuga wutuzwe mu zinhumbula zenyu.
40011030	Hambi u lubano lono nghumupelenyi ane, nha lupelu, hamba no mutegulo wangu si muzito yaye.”
40012001	Mu madaha gago, Yesu yakolaga mu migunda yo wuhemba mwizuwa lye Sabato. Nawo i wejizwa wakwe wakawa wadabuka, hodu, wakawa kwanza kubena i maso go wuhemba, no kulya.
40012002	Nawo Wafalisayo waza kuziwona zizo, wakawa kumulonjela Yesu wakutya, “Lanje ta i wejizwa wako wakwituma i nghani yono yili mwiko ku witume mwi'zuwa lye Sabato.”
40012003	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Wulenyi, mukali nasoma vyono yavinozanoza Dawudi, hamonga na wono yali yali hamonga nawo, mu cipango lono wali wadabuka?
40012004	U mwene Dawudi, yenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu hamonga ne wayagwe, wakawa kulya i mikate yiyilya yono yali yiwicigwe hali Mulungu. U mwene, hamba wawo i wayagwe, si wali wakomboywe kuyilya i mikate yiyo, langa i wakohani du wali wene.
40012005	Hamba wulenyi, mukali nasoma mu Wulajilize, vyono mu mazuwa gose ge Sabato, i wakohani wakuwa kuwubena u Wulajilize mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ninga hamba nhavivyo, si wakuwa kwihwesezwa vyono wena wusutye?
40012006	Holeka nghumulonjelenyi vyono, bahano hoyuli u muwaha muno, mono yayicizize sunga ne Nyumba yo Mulungu.
40012007	Mwali muwe mumanyile nhunizo ye zinghani zizi zono zikutya, ‘Nghusaka lusungu, hamba si yikumbiko,’ si mwali muwahose i wanhu wono wasina masutya.
40012008	Hambi u Mwana wo Munhu, nha yo Muwaha we Sabato.”
40012009	Yesu yakawuka baho, yakabita mu nhang'anilo yawo yo wuhembelo.
40012010	Na mumo mwali na munhu yunji mono yali yena muwoko wono wudejepe. Baho i wanhu wakamuwuza Yesu wakutya, “Ati, yikomboligwe kumuponya munhu mwizuwa lye Sabato?” Nawo wamuwuzaga nhavivyo, ho watuje i soko yo kumusitacila.
40012011	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu citye nhavi, lunji yunji muli nyenye, yawe yena ngholo yakwe yono yowa yigwiliye mwikombo, alu sikosuma kuyilavyaniza mumo mwikombo mwizuwa lye Sabato?
40012012	Ninga alu, munhu yayicizize ngholo! Holeka si yilemezwe kwituma nghani swanu mwizuwa lye Sabato.”
40012013	Hobaho yakawa kumulonjela u munhu yuyulya wo muwoko wono wudejepe, yakamutya, “Wugolole u muwoko wako.” Nayo yakawugolola, nawo wukawa muswanu telele nha vyono winha u muwoko muyagwe.
40012014	Hodu i Wafalisayo wakawa kulawila kunze, wakawa kulongana vyono wosuma kumongomeza Yesu.
40012015	Ninga Yesu yaza yimanya nghani yiyo, yakawuka i hanhu baho. Ne wanhu wenji wakamutyatya, nayo yakawaponya watamwa wose.
40012016	Yakawalajiliza vyono walece kuwalonjela wanhu zinghani zakwe,
40012017	ho zifisilizwe zono yazilonga u muwizi Isaya, zono yatya,
40012018	“Langa ta, ayu yo mwitumami wangu mono nimuhaguye, u mwendece wangu mono yakunyendeza mu nhumbula yangu. Nane nowuwika u Muhe wangu muli mwene, nayo koganula ze ning'aniza yangu kuli wanhu wose.
40012019	Si kowanga, hamba kuzoza, hamba i lizi lyakwe, si lyohulikwa mu zinzila.
40012020	Ilidete lyono libinuce, si kolibena yaye, hamba si kowuzimya u wutambi wono wukulawa lyosi, sunga kolo yakondya kuyitemya i ning'aniza ye ling'ani.
40012021	Ne makungugo gowa no witumbilo ku soko ye litagwa lyakwe.”
40012022	Baho i wanhu wakamuletela u munhu yunji mono yali yali cibofu kanyhi yali cibwibwi, ku soko vyono yali yebatwe ne licisi. Yesu yakawa kumuponya, nayo yakasuma kulonga no kuwona kanyhi.
40012023	Ilipuga lyose lye wanhu, likezina muno muno, no kutya, “Ati, Wulenyi, alu yuyu mbeka yadahile kuwa Mwana wa Dawudi?”
40012024	Ninga i Wafalisayo waza kuzihulika zizo wakatya, “U munhu yuyu, kagalavizyaga macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli u muwaha we macisi.”
40012025	Ninga Yesu vyono yali yagamanyile i mahweso gawo, baho yakawatya, “U wutemi wo wose wono witemanuce weneco wose vipuga vipuga vyono si vikwilumvya vyeneco vyose, u wutemi wuwo si wosuma kujendelela hamba hadodo, ne likaya lyo lyose hamba mhuga yo yose yono yitemanuce vipuga vipuga vyono vitemanuye, lilyo lyogwa.
40012026	Holeka hono Setani yakumuwinga Setani, ale, yakwitemanula mweneco. Alu u wutemi wakwe ho wokwima nhawule?
40012027	Nha vyono anye mukutya, ati ane nghugawinjila macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli, alu ma i wana wenyu wakugawinjila mu vilungo vya nani? Holeka ku soko yiyo, wawo wo womuling'anizenyi nyenye.
40012028	Ninga hono ane niwe nghugawinjila macisi mu vilungo vyo Muhe wo Mulungu, ale, mumanye vyono u Wutemi wo Mulungu wakondya kumuficilenyi nyenye.
40012029	“Hamba u munhu kosuma nhawule kwinjila kwa vilungo mu nyumba ya mono yali vilungo, ho yasume kumuboka i viya vyakwe, lono si yamuye kumuwopa yuyo u munhu we vilungo? Langa baho ho kosuma kumuboka i viya vyakwe.
40012030	U munhu wo wose mono si yakwilunza nane, yuyo yali suta nane, yuyo keyagazaga.
40012031	Holeka nghumulonjelenyi, nghutya nhavi, i wanhu wosuma kunenelwa u wubi wawo, hamonga no wutovule wawo wose, ninga si wosuma kunenelwa hamba hadodo u wubi wo kumutovulo u Muhe Mono Yelile.
40012032	Kanyhi sunga na mono kolonga i nghani yo kumutovulo Mwana wo Munhu, yuyo nayo konenelwa, ninga langa mono kolonga i nghani ya kumutovulo Muhe Mono Yelile, yuyo langa si konenelwa hamba hadodo ku wulawa lulu sunga cibitilila.”
40012033	“U mubici hono wuwe muswanu, sunga ne mikalo yayo nayo yowa miswanu, na hono wuwe mubi, ne mikalo yayo yowa mibi. No mubici nawo wumanyicilaga mu mikalo gayo.
40012034	Nye mo lulelo lwe zinzoka! Alu mosuma nhawule kuzilonga i ziswanu, na kumbe nyenye mo weneco muli wabi?” Ku soko u munhu, nha kalongaga zono zimumemile mu nhumbula yakwe.
40012035	U munhu muswanu nha kalavyaga i zinghani ziswanu mu ciwutwa cakwe ciswanu, no munhu mubi nayo, nha kalavyaga izinghani zimbi mu ciwutwa cakwe i cibi.
40012036	“Holeka ane nghumulonjelenyi, nghutya, Mwizuwa lyo wuling'anizwe i wanhu si wololeka kupitula muli ze zinghani zose zono si zinojeye, zono wakuzilonga.
40012037	Holeka mu wulawilila mu zinghani zako, lunji kovumilwa vyono wuli muswanu, hamba lunji koling'anizwa nha wuli muhodanji.”
40012038	Hanyuma yayo, wanji wa mu wejizi wo Wulajilize hamonga ne Wafalisayo, wakamulonjela Yesu wakutya, “Ase cikusaka ciwone citanjilo ku wulawa kwako.”
40012039	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Ululelo lubi kanyhi lono si lumogopile Mulungu! Mukusaka citanjilo, si mopegwa i citanjilo co cose, langa citanjilo ca Yona u muwizi.
40012040	Nha vyono Yona yakekala mu'nda ye lisomba liwaha vilo vidatu misi ne cilo, ale nha vivyo u Mwana wo Munhu nayo, si koleka kwikala vilo vidatu misi ne cilo mugati ye yisi.
40012041	Ne wanhu wa Ninawi, wolokuza he zuwa lyo wuling'anizwe nawo walaluhosa u lulelo lulu nha vyono lusutizye. Hambi Waninawi nha wanena, so wuganule wa Yona. Na kumbe yali baha mono yamucizize Yona!
40012042	U mutemi we cicekulu wa kutakama kolokuza mu cipango lono u lulelo lulu lweza kuling'anizwa, nayo kololuhosa nha vyono lwina masutya. Hambi u mwene nha yajenda muhinzo mutali, kulawa kutali, yakaza kuzihuliciza zinghani ze mahala no wizuce wa Solomona, na kumbe, ahano hoyuli u muwaha mono yamucizize Solomona.”
40012043	“I licisi lyavu, kolo likuwingwa no kulawila muli munhu, likuwa kujenda jenda mu nyika, likulondola i hanhu ho kuceha, hamba kutuga.”
40012044	Hanyuma likutya, “Nowuya ku wikalo wangu wono nekalaga. Nalyo kolo likuwuya no kuwagana u wikalo wuwo wusina yunji, kanyhi wuhambigwe,
40012045	hobaho likubita kugasola macisi ganji mupunghati, gono mabi muno muno kuciza lyeneco, nago gose gakwinjila muli munhu yuyo. Alu nhondo i mikalile yo munhu yuyo, yikuwa mibi muno muno si nha ya halulongozi. Na nhavivyo vyo yowa kuli wanhu wawa i wabi.”
40012046	Nayo Yesu lono yali yakali yakulonga ne mapuga ge wanhu, u nyina, hamonga ne wanduguze wakawa waza, no kwima hanze, wakuhila kulongana nayo.
40012047	Holeka munhu yunji yakabita yakamulonjela Yesu yakutya, “U nyina yako hamonga ne wanduguzo, wali aho hanze, wakusaka kulongana nagwe.”
40012048	Nayo Yesu yakamutya yuyo munhu mono yamulonjela nhavivyo, yakatya, “Alu yaya yo nani? Hamba i wandugu zangu wo wa nani?”
40012049	Hanyuma yakawa kwinula muwoko wakwe yakawa kuwasonhelela i wejizwa wakwe akuno yakutya, “Awa wo wa yaya, ne wandugu zangu!
40012050	Vyono u munhu wo wose mono yakwituma nha vyono yakuhila Baba mono yali ku wulanga, ale, yuyo yo muwaha wangu, yo lumbu lyangu, kanyhi yo nyina yangu.”
40013001	Yesu yakawuka mu nyumba yiyo mwizuwa lilyo du, yakawa kubita ku nhumbi ye lilamba, yakekala hasi yakawa kwanza kuwejiza wanhu.
40013002	Ne mapuga mawaha ge wanhu gakamupilima, sunga Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakekala mumo. Ne wanhu wakawa wemile ku mwejelele we lilamba,
40013003	nayo Yesu yakawa kuwalonjela nghani nyinji mu vihwanicizo, yakutya, “Hulicizenyi ta! U mumiza mbeyu, yalawila ho yayimize i mbeyu yakwe.
40013004	Na lono yamizaga, zinji zikalagala mu nzila, nazo zindeje zikaza zikazilya.
40013005	Nazo zinji zikalagala hono hogali mabwe hono hasina muhangha mwinji. I zimbeyu zene zikota du kamonga, ninga vyono umuhangha wayo si wali wutelile muno hasi.
40013006	Ilizuwa lyali lyeza kuwalika, zikawa kuwomba, na vyono i milela yayo yali si yihimbiye hasi muno muno, hobaho zikawa kunyala.
40013007	Na zinji zikalagala mu mabici ge mamivya mugati, nago i mamivya gago, gakawiluka no kuzititiliza.
40013008	Ninga zinji zikalagala hono howuli muhangha u muswanu, nazo zikota, no kulela, zinji zikalela mhece igana limonga, zinji makumi mutandatu, na zinji nazo makumi madatu.
40013009	Hulicizenyi ta, mono yena makutu go kuhulicila, ale yahulice!”
40013010	I wejizwa wakwe wakamubitila wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alo so cici wukulongana ne wanhu mu vihwanicizo?”
40013011	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Anye mwapegwa u wumanye wa zo Mulungu zono zihundicigwe, ninga wene awa si wapegwa yaye.
40013012	Hambi muli wose mono yena naco nha kopegwa, no kuwa na vinji, ninga ayulya mono yasina cinji, kosolelwa sunga na cono yena naco.
40013013	Holeka nghulonga nawo mu vihwanicizo, vyono wakulanga, ninga siwakuwona, kanyhi, wakuhuliciza, ninga hamba nhavivyo siwakuhulika yaye, hamba kwizuka bwete.
40013014	Holeka kuli wene, zikuficilicila azilya zono zalongwa no muwizi Isaya zono yatya, ‘Kuwuhulice, mohulika, ninga hamba si mokwizuka yaye, nako ku wulanje molanga, ninga hamba si mowona ng'o.
40013015	Hambi i mahala ge wanhu wawa nha galelepe, ne makutu gawo wagaziwaze, ne meso gawo wafufunize. Yali yiwe si nhavivyo, mhali wali wawone ne meso gawo, kanyhi wali wahulice kwe makutu gawo, no kuwa no wizuce mu mahala gawo ho wamhitucile, vyo yakutya u Muwaha, Nane ho nali niwaponye.’
40013016	“Holeka anye muli wamoti, vyono i meso genyu gakuwona, ne makutu genyu gakuhulika.
40013017	Ane mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono i wawizi, ne wanhu wenji i waswanu, wasulumilaga muno muno, ho waziwone zizo zono anye alu mukuziwona, ninga hamba si waziwona yaye, kanyhi wazihulice zizo zono anye mukuzihulika, ninga hamba si wazihulika ng'o.”
40013018	“Ale, alu muhulicize i nhunizo ye cihwanicizo ca yuyo u muhadika mbeyu.
40013019	U munhu wo wose mono yakuyihulika inghani yo Wutemi, hamba kuyizuka yaye, yuyo yo yehwanile i zimbeyu zizilya zono zagwa mu nzila, nayo u Mubi kazaga no kuyisukula ayilya yono yali yakondya kuhadikwa mu nhumbula ya yuyo munhu.
40013020	Nayo i mbeyu yono yahadikwa hono hogali i mabwe, yihwanile u munhu mono yakuyihulika nghani yiyo, na hobaho yakuyibocela na nyemo mbaha.
40013021	Ninga inghani yeneco si yikumwinjila muno muno no kuwa ne milela muli mwene, holeka yakujendelela kuyikamisa inghani yiyo kwa cidaha cidodo vivi du, na kolo gakumuziza i magayo hamba wutamiswe ku soko ye nghani yiyo, u munhu yuyo hodu yakuyileka kamonga.
40013022	I mbeyu ayilya nayo yono yagwila mu mabici ge mamivya, yihwanile u munhu mono yakuyihulika inghani, ninga i mahwele ga mononze yiyi hamonga ne masulumizi gayo ge zisawo, zikuyititiliza inghani yiyo, holeka u munhu yuyo si yakusuma kulela mikalo.
40013023	Nayo i mbeyu yono yagwila mu muhangha muswanu, yihwanile u munhu mono yakuyihulika inghani yiyo no kuyizuka, no munhu yuyo kalelaga i mikalo, ne mbeyu monga yilavyaga mhece igana limonga, na yinji yikulavya makumi mutandatu, na yinji makumi madatu.”
40013024	Yesu yakawalonjela i wanhu cihwanicizo cinji yakatya, “U wutemi wa ku wulanga, wihwanile no munhu mono yahadika i mbeyu swanu mu mugunda wakwe.
40013025	Ninga lono wanhu wali wagona, u mulugu wakwe yakawa kuza, yakawa kugahadika mabalwe muciligati yo wuhemba, yakawa kubita.
40013026	Nazo zimbeyu zali zeza kucindika, no kusanula, hobaho nago i mabalwe gakawa kwijela.
40013027	I wetumami wa munya mugunda wakamubitila, wakamutya, Alu muwaha, si kotya wahadika mbeyu swanu mu mugunda wako, alu mabalwe galawa hayi kanyhi?
40013028	Nayo yakawapitula yakawatya, ‘U mulugu yo yanozize zizo.’ Nawo i wetumami wakwe wakamuwuza wakatya, ‘Alu wule, kokwenda cibite cikagakule?’
40013029	Nayo yakawapitula yakatya, ‘Aa, ng'o, yilece kuwa na lunji mu wukule mabalwe, mukulilize kanyhi no wuhemba.
40013030	Holeka hodu muvilekaje viwilukane hamonga du, sunga mwizuwa lye ndudula. Mwipango lilyo langa ho nowalonjela i waduduzi, ale, mwamule mugakunyanjile i mabalwe mugawope madulu madulu, ho gaticimizwe mu moto. Ninga wuhemba muwututicilaje mu madongha gangu.’ ”
40013031	Yesu yakawalonjela i wanhu kanyhi cihwanicizo cinji yakutya, “U wutemi wa ku wulanga, wihwanile ne mbeyu ya haladali yono u munhu yayisola, yakayihadika mu mugunda wakwe.
40013032	Ne mbeyu yeneco yiyo yo ndodo muno muno si nhe zimbeyu zose, ninga kolo yacindika, yiwilukaga si nhe vilimwa vyose, no kuwa mubici, wono sunga ne zindeje za mucanyha, zikusuma no kuzenga i manhuli gazo mu manhambi gayo.”
40013033	Yesu yakawalonjela kanyhi cihwanicizo cinji yakutya, “U wutemi wa ku wulanga, wihwanile ne cisase cono mucekulu yunji yacisola yakacihanza-hanza no wusaje we debe limonga, nawo wose wukatumba.”
40013034	Nayo Yesu yawalonjela i wanhu zizo zose mu vihwanicizo. Hamba si yasuma kuwalonjela cinji co cose lono si yetumamiye vihwanicizo,
40013035	ho yisume kuficilicila i nghani yono yalongwa no muwizi yono yatya, “Nolonga nawo mu nzila ya vihwanicizo Nane nowaloloseza i zinghani zono zihundicigwe ku wulawa mu wuwumbwe we yinze.”
40013036	Hanyuma Yesu yakawelaga i wanhu wawalya yakawa kwinjila mu nyumba. Nawo i wejizwa wakwe, wakamubitila, wakamutya, “Cikukulomba wuciloloseze ta ze cihwanicizo ce mabalwe ga ku mugunda.”
40013037	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “U muhadici wa azilya i zimbeyu ziswanu, yo yuyo u Mwana wo Munhu.
40013038	Nawo u mugunda yo yinze. Nazo i zimbeyu zi zilya i ziswanu, wo wana wo wutemi. Ninga i mabalwe, wo wanhu wa ayulyo u Mubi.
40013039	No mulugu mono yagahadika gagalya i mabalwe, yo Setani. Ne ndudula nayo, wo u mudumo we yinze, ne waduduzi nawo, wo Wamalayika.
40013040	Nha vyono i mabalwe, wagakunyanjilaga wawa gaticimiza mu moto, ale nhavivyo vyo yolowa ha mudumo we vilo,
40013041	U Mwana wo Munhu kolowatuma wamalayika wakwe, ho wawakongholeze kulawa mu wutemi wakwe, wose wono wambuzaga wanhu wetume wubi, sunga na wose wono wetumaga zo wavu,
40013042	no kuwatajila mwi'lamba lyo moto, na kuko wolowa kulila no kugwezula meno.
40013043	Ninga awalya waswanu, wolong'alala nhe 'zuwa mu Wutemi wo Sogo yawo. Holeka hono mwina i makutu go kuhulicila, ale, muhulice!”
40013044	“U wutemi wa ku wulanga wihwanile ne ciwutwa cono cali cihundikwe mu mugunda. U munhu yunji yaza kuciwona, yakacihundika kanyhi. Nayo yasangalala muno, sunga yakawa kubita kuviguza i vinhu vyakwe vyose vyono yali yena navyo yakawa kuwugula u mugunda wuwulya.”
40013045	“Kanyhi, u Wutemi wa ku wulanga, wihwanile no munhu yunji musuluza, mono yalondolaga yatuje lulu swanu.
40013046	Nayo yaza kuwa yayituga lulu monga yo wuguzi wukamu, yakabita yakaviguza vyose vyono yali yena navyo, yakabita yakayigula i lulu yiyilya.”
40013047	“Kanyhi u Wutemi wa ku wulanga wihwanile no lwavu lono lwagumilwa mwilenga, nalo lukebata somba nyinji ze mawala gose.
40013048	Nalo lwaza kuwa lwamema, i wanhu wakalukwejela ha nhumbi ye lilenga, wakekala, wakawa kwamula kuzihagula i zisomba ziswanu wakazitajila mu zinhoto zawo, na azilya i zimbi wakazitaga.
40013049	Nhavivyo vyo yolowa ha mudumo we vilo, i wamalayika wolokuza nawo wolowatemanula i wanhu wabi ne waswanu.
40013050	No kuwagumila i wabi mwi'lamba lyo moto. Na kuko wowa kulila no kugwezula meno.”
40013051	Yesu yakawawuza yakawatya, “Alu wulenyi, mwezuka zizi zose?” Nawo wakamutya, “Heya.”
40013052	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu holeka u mwijizi wo wose wo Wulajilize, mono yanozwa kuwa mwijizwa mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga, yuyo yehwanile u munhu munya kaya, mono kalavyaga mu viwutwa vyakwe i vinhu i vipya ne vihuma.”
40013053	Yesu yali yeza kukondya kuvilonga i vihwanicizo vivyo, hodu yakawa kuwuka i hanhu baho,
40013054	yakawa kubita ku yisi yakwe. Nako kuko yakawa yakuwejiza wanhu mu nhang'anilo yawo yo wuhembelo, sunga ne wanhu wakezina muno muno, wakatya, “Alu mwene nye, yuyu kagatuga hayi i mahala gaga, sunga ne mezino?
40013055	Ati, wulenyi, yuyu si yo mwana wa ayulya u muselemala? No nyina si yakucemwa Malyamu, ne wanduguze si wa Yakobo, Yusufu, Simoni na Yuda?
40013056	Ne walumbuze ma, si wose wali baha hono hetu? Alu kazisola hayi zizi zose?”
40013057	Holeka wakawa na mahwele no mwene. Ninga u mwene Yesu yakawalonjela yakawatya, “U muwizi katugaga lilumbo hanhu ho hose, langa hono si mu yisi yakwe na mu mhuga yakwe du mo sikatugaga lilumbo!”
40013058	Holeka ku soko yiyo, nayo Yesu si yasuma kwituma mapoto menji i hanhu baho, ku soko yo wula kwihuwila kwawo.
40014001	Na mwipango lilyo, u Mutemi Helode, yakawa yazihulika za Yesu.
40014002	Yakawa kuwatya i wetumami wakwe, “U munhu yuyu, yo Yohana u Mubaputizi, kazuka mu wafu, holeka i vilungo vye metumo go wizine vikwitumilwa muli mwene.”
40014003	Helode yuyu yo yamwibata Yohana, yakamuwopa ne minyolo no kumutajila mu jela, ku soko ya Helodiya, u mugolece wo mwanakwawe Filipo. Ne soko yayo yeneco yali yili nhavi,
40014004	u mwene Yohana yamulonjela Helode, vyono, “Yili mwiko kuli'gwe kwikalana na yuyo u mugolece wa Filipo!”
40014005	Holeka Helode yasakaga yamuwulaje Yohana, ninga hamba nhavivyo yawogopaga wanhu, vyono i wanhu wose, kuli wene, Yohana yali muwizi.
40014006	Na mwizuwa lye sikukuu yo wulelwe wakwe Helode, u mwana we cicekulu wa Helodiya, yakavina viswanu muno ha mwande ye wajenzi. Sunga na Helode mweneco yakendezwa muno muno,
40014007	yakawa kwihuwiza ko kwilahiza, vyono kosuma kumupela yuyo u muhinza, co cose cono kosaka.
40014008	Nayo u muhinza, vyono yafundwa no nyina, yakabita yakalomba yakutya, “Ane nghulomba wumhelaje lulu baha du, u mutwe wa Yohana u Mubaputizi, wunhajilile amuno mu ciya.”
40014009	U Mutemi yakakalala muno muno, ninga ku soko yo wilahize wakwe wono yali yelahiza, kanyhi na ku soko ye wajenzi wono wali wali baho ha zindigwa, hodu yalajiliza du yapegwa.
40014010	Hodu ho baho Helode yakamutuma munhu, yakawa kubita ku jela, yakawa kumudumula Yohana u mutwe.
40014011	No mutwe wa Yohana wukaletwa wuli mu ciya, wakamupela yuyulya u muhinza, nayo muhinza yakamutegulila nyina.
40014012	Nawo i wejizwa wa Yohana wakaza, wakawusola u muwili wakwe wakawuzika. Hanyuma wakabita kumulonjela Yesu.
40014013	Nayo Yesu yali zihulika zizo, yakawuka i hanhu baho, yakatulucila mu ngalawa, yakabita hanhu hanji hono hali helejehile ho yatule yali wene. Ninga i wanhu waza kumanya, wakamutyatya, wakujenda kwe migulu, wakulawilila mu makaya gawo.
40014014	Nayo yaza kutima kwi'sangha, yakawona i lipuga iwaha lye wanhu, baho yakawawonela lusungu, yakawaponya i watamwa wawo.
40014015	Yaza kuwa cinyamihe, i wejizwa wakwe wakamubitila, wakamutya, “Alu ahano nha nyika, ne lizuwa alu lyaswa. Holeka wuwelagaje i wanhu, ho wasume kubita wakegulile ndigwa ku vitumbi.”
40014016	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Hasina soko ya wene yo kubitila kuko, langa, muwapelaje nyenye ndigwa.”
40014017	Ninga i wene nawo wakamutya, “Ase ahano cisina cinhu co cose, langa cina mikate mihano du, na somba nyejete.”
40014018	Yesu yakawatya, “Ale ndetelenyi vivyo hano.”
40014019	Yakawalajiliza i wanhu wekale hasi mu mahanze, Mwene yakayisola yiyilya i mikate mihano, hamonga ne zisomba vyono nyejete, yakagalamila ku wulanga, yakamulumba Mulungu. Hanyuma yakayibegula yiyo i mikate yakawapela i wejizwa wakwe, nawo wakawapela wanhu.
40014020	Ne wanhu wose wakalya, wakeguta. Hanyuma i wejizwa wakatondoleza i vibegulwa vyono vyasigala, wakamemya nhoto yikumi na nyejete.
40014021	Na wono walya wali waficile nha wanhu elufu yihano walume du, ninga i wacekulu ne wana wadodo wose wono wali wali baho, wo si wawalilizwa mwi'walo lilyo.
40014022	Hobaho du Yesu yakawalajiliza i wejizwa wakwe wenjile mu ngalawa, wamulongolele ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba, lono mwene yali yakali yakuwelaga i wanhu.
40014023	Na lono yali yakondya kuwelaga wanhu, yakabita kwi'tunda yali wene, ho yasume kulomba. Na lono lizuwa lyali lyaswa, ha cinyamihe, u mwene yali yali kuko yali wene,
40014024	na mwi'pango lilyo ingalawa nayo yali yakondya kufika behi na ha ciligati ye lilamba, ninga yikugazwa ne mawingo ge lilenga, vyono vyali vidomile ne mbeho.
40014025	Ne cilo lono kwali kweza behi no kudandawuka, Yesu yakawabitila i wejizwa, yakujenda mucanyha ye malenga,
40014026	I wejizwa wakwe waza muwona yakujendela mucanyha ye malenga. Oo! Wakogopa muno muno, wakatya, “Nye, Yisoce.” Baho wakazoza muno muno so woga.
40014027	Baho baho du nayo Yesu yakalongana nawo, yakawatya, “Nye wendece, mutule, nha yo nene. Mulece kogopa!”
40014028	Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Muwaha, hono mbeka yo gwegwe, wunhezaje nane, njende mucanyha mu malenga nize kwako.”
40014029	Yesu yakatya, “Ale, wuze.” Hobaho Petelo yakawa kutima mu ngalawa, yakawa kujenda mucanyha mu malenga, yakumubitila Yesu.
40014030	Ninga mwene Petelo vyaza kwitang'anila ne mbeho yono yakukunzaga muno, yakawa kwinjilwa no woga, hobaho du yakawa kwanza kudodomela, baho yakalila kwa yizi yiwaha, akuno yakutya, “Gwe Muwaha, wumhonye!”
40014031	Hobaho nayo Yesu yakawugolola muwoko wakwe, yakamwibata, akuno yakumutya, “Lanje ta 'gwe, mono wina u wihuwilo wudodo! So cici lo wukwihwelela?”
40014032	Hobaho wakawa kwinjila mu ngalawa, ne mbeho nayo hodu yikawa kutula.
40014033	Na wose wono wali wali mu ngalawa, wakamuhemba, wakatya, “Mbeka agwe yo gwegwe go Mwana wo Mulungu.”
40014034	Nawo wakalilowoka lilamba, wakafika ku yisi ya Genesaleti.
40014035	Ne wanhu wa kuko wali weza kumumanya vyono yo Yesu, hodu wakawa kwanza kuzitandaza i zinghani zakwe mu yisi yiyo yose. Hobaho wakamuletela Yesu, i watamwa wose ku wulawa mu yisi yiyilya yose,
40014036	nawo wakamulomba yawakombole watamwa, ho wapamize du hambe limhembo lye civwalo cakwe, nawo wose wono wamupamiza, wakapona.
40015001	Hanyuma i Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakamuziza Yesu, wakulawa ku Yelusalemi, wakamuwuza wakutya,
40015002	“Alu nhawule i wejizwa wako si wakwibata ze mejizo gono cabocela kuwulawa ku wawaha we katali? Ku soko si wakwizuguza miwoko yawo nha vyono yinojeye lono wakali si namula kulya?”
40015003	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula, yakatya, “Alu so cici nanye mukwenda ze mejizo genyu mo weneco du, na akuno si mukwibata i malajilizo go Mulungu?”
40015004	U Mulungu yalonga yakatya, “U wogopaje u sogo no nyina yako, na kanyhi mono yakulonga vibi kuli sogwe hamba kuli nyina, ale yuyo yimunojeye yafwe.”
40015005	Ninga anye mwijizaga mukutya, ati, hono munhu yawe yena cinhu cono kosuma kumutaza u sogwe hambo nyina, na hono yatye, “I cinhu acino namulavizya u Mulungu,
40015006	holeka ati hodu, siyanojeye kanyhi yamogope u sogwe! Yiyo yo yikuleka mukuyibedegala inghani yo Mulungu ku soko yo kugatyatya i mejizo genyu mo weneco.”
40015007	Mo wakoci nye! Kumbe Isaya yaziwilila mu mbeka izenyu, lono yatya
40015008	“U Mulungu yakutya, Iwanhu awa wakuwa kunumba kwe milomo yawo du. Ninga i zinhumbula zawo, zili kutali nane.
40015009	No wuhembe wawo wono wakuhemba nene, si wukwiliye cinji, ku soko sunga ne zinghani zono wakwijiza, nha malajilizo ge cimunhu-munhu du.”
40015010	Yesu yakagacema i mapuga gagalya ge wanhu, yakawalonjela yakutya, “Ta muhulicize, kanyhi mwizuce!
40015011	I cinhu cono cikumwavufya munhu, si acilya cono cikumwinjila mu mu mulomo wakwe, langa acilya cono cikulawila mu mulomo wakwe. Cico langa co cikumwavufya munhu.”
40015012	Hanyuma i wejizwa wakamubitila, wakamutya, “Wule wumanyile'mbi vyono i Wafalisayo watamiswa mu zinhumbula zawo, ku soko ye zinghani zako?”
40015013	Ninga u mwene Yesu, yakawapitula, yakawatya, “Ibici lyo lyose lyono u Sogo yangu wa ku wulanga si yalihadice, lilyo langa lyokulwa.
40015014	Muwalekaje wene! Hambi wene nha wabofu, kanyhi wene wakuwatonga i wabofu, no mubofu hono yamutonje u mubofu muyagwe, ale, wose vyono wejete wogwila mwikombo.”
40015015	Baho Petelo yakawacilila, yakatya, “Ale, wucilolosezaje ta, ze cihwanicizo cico.”
40015016	Nayo Yesu yakatya, “Wa, kumbe na nyenye si mukwizuka hongo?”
40015017	Alu anye si mukwizuka vyono cinhu co cose cono cinjilaga mu mulomo, cibitaga ku'nda, na hanyuma yayo citagwaga kunze ku coloni?
40015018	Ninga azilya zono zilawaga mu mulomo, zikuwa kulawa mu nhumbula yo munhu, na zo zizo du, zono zikuwa kumwavufya munhu, no kumupela wusemunwe.
40015019	Ku soko mu nhumbula yo munhu nha momulawaga i mahweso mabi gono galetaga no wuwulaji, kanyhi, mulawaga u wusenyha, wuhizi, wuhomelezi wo wulambi, ne maligo.
40015020	Ale zizino zo zikumwavufya munhu. Ninga ku wulya i zindigwa du lono wukali si nezuguza i miwoko, ako si kosuma kumwavufya munhu.
40015021	Yesu yakawuka baho, yakabita kwikala mu zi'si za Tulo na Sidoni.
40015022	Baho, u mucekulu yunji we Cikanani wa mu yisi yiyo, yakamuziza, akuno yakuzoza yakutya, “Gwe Muwaha go Mwana wa Dawudi, wumbonelaje lusungu! U mwanangu we cicekulu yakugazwa ne licisi.”
40015023	Ninga Yesu, hamba si yamupitula cinji ng'o. Ale i wejizwa wakwe, wakamubitila, wakamutya, “Wumulonjelaje u mucekulu yuyo yabite, hambi alu nha yakucityatya tyatya du akuno yakuzoza.”
40015024	Nayo Yesu yakapitula, yakatya, “Ane natumwa ku soko ye wanhu wa Isilayeli, alu wono wajiliye kotya zingholo.”
40015025	Baho nayo u mucekulu yuyo, yakaza, yakafugama hamwande ya Yesu, yakatya, “Gwe, Muwaha, wunhazaje.”
40015026	Yesu yakamupitula, yakamutya, “Si viswanu yaye kusola i zindigwa ze wana, hanyuma kuwa kuzipela i zimbwa.”
40015027	Nayo u mucekulu yuyo yapitula yakamutya, “Yene yiyo yili mbeka Muwaha, ninga sunga ne zimbwa nazo, zilizaga i vifukufuku vyono vigwizaga hasi, kuwulawa mu meza yo mutwa wawo.”
40015028	Baho Yesu nayo yakamupitula yakatya, “Gwe yaya, u wihuwilo wako mbeka wuwaha, holeka yili ciba wunozezwe nha vyono wukuhila.” Hodu, lo lulo baho du u mwanagwe we cicekulu yakawa yapona.
40015029	Yesu yakawuka baho yakabita ku nhumbi ye lilamba lya Galilaya, yakabita kwi'tunda, yakekala hasi.
40015030	Ne wanhu wenji muno muno wakamuziza, wakawaleta we vilema, iwabofu, we citewe, we cibwibwi, sunga wanji wenji muno, wono wali watamigwe, wose wawo wakawikwa ha mwande ya Yesu, nayo Yesu yakawaponya.
40015031	I lipuga lye wanhu, likezina muno muno lono lyaza kuwawona we cibwibwi wakulonga, wono wali walemaye, alu wapona, na we citewe, alu wakujenda, sunga wono wali wali cibofu, nawo luno wakuwona, baho wakawa kumukumya u Mulungu wa Isilayeli.
40015032	Ale, Yesu yakawacema i wejizwa wakwe yakawatya, “Ane nghuwawonela u lusungu i wanhu wawa, vyono wawezana nane mu vilo vidatu, hamba siwaliye cinji. Holeka si nendile niwalece wabite akuno wadabuce, wologwa mu nzila bwete.”
40015033	Nawo i wejizwa wakamulonjela wakatya, “Alu ahano nha cili mu nyika, ho coyituga hayi indigwa yono yowakwila wanhu wenji nha vivi?”
40015034	Yesu yakawawuza yakawatya, “Alo mwina mikate milinga?” Wakamutya, “Cina mikate mupunghati hamonga na visomba vicefu.”
40015035	Baho Yesu yakawa kuwalonjela i wanhu wekale hasi.
40015036	Nayo yakayisola i mikate yiyilya, mupunghati, hamonga ne visomba vivilya, yakamulumba Mulungu, yakavibegula, yakawapela i wejizwa wakwe, nawo wakawagawila wanhu.
40015037	Na wose wakalya wakeguta. Hanyuma wakatondoleza i vibegulwa vyono vyasigala, wakamemya nhoto mupunghati.
40015038	Nawo wono walya, wali waficile elufu yine, walume du, ninga i wacekulu ne wana wadodo wose wono wali wali baho, wo si wawalilizwa mwi'walo.
40015039	U mwene yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakabita ku zimbavu za Magadani.
