40016001	Nawo i Wafalisayo ne Wasadukayo, wakamubitila Yesu, ho wamujele, wakamulomba yanoze citanjilo cono cikulawa ku wulanga.
40016002	Ninga Yesu yakawapitula, yakawatya, “Ilipango lye cinyamihe kolo lyafika, anye mutezaga, ‘Kowa kutulile vyono wulanga wudunghu!’
40016003	Na hakali mitondo naho, mutezaga, ‘Zuwali yowa mbeho mbaha, vyono wulanga wudunghu, kanyhi ne mavunde gatandaye!’ Alu anye hono mumanyile muno muno kulanga wulanga du no kugamanya mapango, alu ku wutanga vitanjilo vye madaha gaga, si mumanyile.
40016004	Anye nyo lulelo lubi na lono lusina wihuwilwa. Anye mukusaka vitanjilo, ninga si mopegwa i citanjilo co cose cilya, langa mopegwa i citanjilo acilya ca Yona du.” Baho yakawa kuwaleka, yakawa kubita.
40016005	Iwejizwa wakwe wali weza kulowoka ku lubavu luyagwe lwe lilamba, ho wakawa kukumbucila vyono wasemwa kusoleleza ne mikate.
40016006	Yesu yakawatya, “Mwikalaje meso, kanyhi mweze musujile kuli cisase ce Wafalisayo ne Wasadukayo!”
40016007	Ninga iwene wakawa kulongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Alo yakulonga nha vivyo vyono cisemwa kusoleleza ne mikate lo.”
40016008	Nayo Yesu yakawamanya i mahweso gawo, holeka yakawatya, “Nye nyo wanhu mono mwina u wihuwilo wucefu! Nhawule mukulongana nyenye wose za vyono musina mikate?
40016009	Alu hongo mukali hamba natanga yaye? Alo si mukukumbucila nha vyono nayibegula ayilya i mikate mihano so wanhu walya elufu yihano? Wulenyi, mwamevya nhoto yilinga muli ze vibegulwa vyono vyasigala?
40016010	Hamba muli za ayilya i mikate mupunghati yono wagawilwa wa walya i wanhu elufu yine, wulenyi, mwatondoleza nhoto yilinga muli vibegulwa vyono vyasigala?
40016011	Alu yosumika nhawule ho mulece kumanya, vyono ane si nali kulonga muli ze mikate? Holeka musuguce kuli cisase ce Wafalisayo ne Wasadukayo!”
40016012	Alu baho nhondo, iwejizwa wakwe ho wakamanya, vyono yali kuwalonjela wasuguce, si ku cisase co mukate, langa kumbe, wasuguce kuli i mejizo ge Wafalisayo na ge Wasadukayo.
40016013	Ale lono Yesu yali yafika ku mbavu za Kayisaliya Filipi, yawawuza i wejizwa wakwe, yakawatya, “Alu i wanhu wamutezaga u Mwana wo Munhu yo nani?”
40016014	Nawo wakamupitula, wakatya, “Wanji watezaga vyono u mwene yo yulya Yohana u Mubaputizi, na wanji watezaga yo Eliya, na wanji wakutya, yo Yelemiya hamba yumonga u muyagwe ne wawizi.”
40016015	Yesu yakawawuza kanyhi yakawatya, “Anye nanye ma, munhezaga vyono ane yo nene nani?”
40016016	Simoni Petelo yakapitula yakatya, “Agwe yo gwegwe Kilisito u Mwana wo Mulungu mumi.”
40016017	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Wuli mulugutwe, agwe Simoni go mwana wa Yona, hambi nha si munhu mono yakugubuliye i mbeka yiyi, langa Baba mono yali ku wulanga.
40016018	Holeka nane nghukulonjela Petelo nghutya, yo gwegwe wuli italawe, na mucanyha ye 'talawe lilino, nolizenga likanisa lyangu, hamba ne lifwa lyeneco du, si lyolisuma yaye.
40016019	Nane nokupela gwegwe zifunguwo zo wutemi wa ku wulanga, na yowa, co cose cono kocidindila mono'nze, cowa cadindilwa nhavivyo na ku wulanga, na co cose cono kocidigulila mono'nze, naco cowa cadigulilwa nhavivyo na ku wulanga.”
40016020	Hanyuma yakawalemeza i wejizwa wakwe vyono walecele lukulu kumulonjela munhu wo wose vyono u mwene yo Kilisito.
40016021	Na vyono kulawa baho, Yesu yakawa kuwamanyiza cagalanze du i wejizwa wakwe, yakawatya, “Yinojeye ane mbite ku Yelusalemi ho nghatuje wugazwe winji wono wolawilila muli wanyamhala ne Wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize. Nane nowulagwa na mwi'zuwa lye kadatu, nozuka.”
40016022	Baho Petelo yakamusola Yesu, yakamuteza hamhelo hadodo, yakamutacila, yakutya, “Gwe Muwaha, yilece kuwa nhavivyo! Inghani yiyi si yo kwijelela ng'o.”
40016023	Ninga Yesu yakapituka, yakamulonjela Petelo yakatya, “Wuwuce hono hangu 'gwe Setani! Agwe wuli cikobazo kuli'ne. Ne mahweso gako, hamba si gakulawa kuli Mulungu ng'o, langa ga cimunhu-munhu du!”
40016024	Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela i wejizwa wakwe, yakawatya, “Hono munhu wo wose yasace kuwa mutyatyi wangu, yimunojeye yekapise mweneco, yawudinghule u musalaba wakwe, yanhyatye.
40016025	Ku soko u munhu mono yakusaka kuwuponya u wumi wakwe mweneco, alu yuyo yo kowajiliza,
40016026	langa u munhu mono kowajiliza u wumi wakwe ku soko yangu, ale yuyo langa yo kowutuga. Alu mbi u munhu ho kotuga cambuzici, hamba yawutuje u wugoli wose wa mononze, na akuno ho yawajilize u wumi wakwe?
40016027	Hambi u Mwana wo Munhu nha kolokuziza mu lukumyo lo Sogwe, hamonga ne wamalayika wakwe, na baho ho kolomulipila munhu wo wose nha vyono genha imetumo gakwe.
40016028	Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono howali wanji wono wali bahano wono si wolofwa, sunga waze wamuwone u Mwana wo Munhu yakuza mu Wutemi wakwe.”
40017001	Vyaza kupuluta vilo mutandatu, Yesu yakawasola Petelo, Yakobo na Yohana u nduguye, yakabitana nawo wali wene sunga ko kwi'tunda litali.
40017002	Na lono wali wamulanjile, u mwene Yesu yakawa kupituka i futa yakwe, u wusu wakwe wukang'alala nhe lizuwa, ne vivwalo vyakwe, vikawa vizelu swee, kotya nha wuzelu we lizuwa.
40017003	Hobaho Musa na Eliya wakawalawila, wakawa wakulongana na Yesu.
40017004	Baho Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Alu Muwaha, ane nghuwona yowa viswanu muno muno vyono cili baha, Holeka hono wende, ane nozenga vibanda vidatu bahano, cimonga cako, na cimonga ca Musa, na cimonga ca Eliya.”
40017005	Nayo lono yali yakali kulonga nha vivyo du, livunde yizelu likawa kuwagubika, ne lizi likahulikwa likulawilila mwi'vunde lilyo, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu, u mwendece wangu, mono nyendezwe nayo, holeka mumuhulikaje.”
40017006	Nawo i wejizwa wali weza kuzihulika zizo, wakagwa gubama, akuno wakogopa muno muno.
40017007	Nayo Yesu yakawabitila, yakawapamiza yakawatya, “Mwinukaje le, mulece kogopa!”
40017008	Nawo waza kwinula i meso gawo, si wawona yunji, langa wakamuwona Yesu yali wene du.
40017009	Nawo lono watimaga wakulawa mwitunda, Yesu yakawakong'onheza muno, yakutya, “Alu, mulece kumulonjela yunji muli zono muziwene, sunga kolo u Mwana wo Munhu yakuzuka kulawa muli wafu.”
40017010	Baho i wejizwa wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu i wejizi wo Wulajilize nha wakutya, ati yinojeye Eliya yo yamule kuza?”
40017011	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Heya mbeka, Eliya kokuza kuziwikaniza zose.
40017012	“Ninga nghumutyenyi, vyono Eliya yakondya kuza, ninga iwene hamba si wamutanga yaye, langa wene wakamunoza nha vyono wasakaga iweneco. U Mwana wo Munhu nayo, kogazwa nha vivyo mu miwoko yawo.”
40017013	Baho nhondo i wejizwa ho wakatanga vyono yawalonjelaga za Yohana u Mubaputizi.
40017014	Nawo wali weza kwitang'anila kanyhi ne lipuga lililya lye wanhu, munhu yunji yakamubitila Yesu, yakamufugamila,
40017015	yakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, wumuwonelaje lusungu mwanangu, hambi nha yena cinzilisa, kanyhi yakugazika muno, na kali kenji mwene kagwizaga mu moto na mu malenga.
40017016	Nane nghamuleta kuli wejizwa wako, ninga hamba si wasuma kumuponya.”
40017017	Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Anye mo lulelo lono lusina u wihuwilo, lulelo lono lwajiliye! Alu nokwikalana nanye sunga nili? Hamba nojendelela kumukangalililenyi sunga nili? Ale mundetele ta umwana yuyo ahano.”
40017018	Waza kumuleta, Yesu yakalitacila lilyo licisi, nalyo likawa kuwuka, no mwana yuyo, yakapona mwidaha lilyo du.
40017019	Hanyuma iwejizwa wakwe, wakawa kumubitila Yesu cinyele wakamuwuza wakatya, “Alu nhawule ase si casuma kulilavya i licisi lilyo?”
40017020	Yesu yakawatya, “Ku soko yo wihuwilo wenyu wucefu. Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, hono muwe mwina u wihuwilo wudodo du nha vyono yinha yi mbeyu ya haladali, mosuma kulilonjela i litunda lili, mukutya, ‘Wuwuce ahano, wubite ahalya,’ nalyo mbeka lyobita. Hasina nghani yo yose yono yali yiwe si yisumice kuli'nye. [
40017021	Ne licisi lye liwala lilino, si lyosumika kuwingwa, langa hono si ko wulombe no wuleka kulya.]”
40017022	Na lono wajendaga wakubita ku Galilaya, Yesu yawalonjela yakatya, “U Mwana wo Munhu kotajilwa mu miwoko ye wanhu.
40017023	Womuwulaga, ninga mwi'zuwa lye kadatu, kozuka.” Nawo wejizwa wakakalala muno muno.
40017024	Nawo waza kufika ku Kapelanawumi, iwanhu wono wakongholaga izipesa ze kodi ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, wakamubitila Petelo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu u Mwijizi wenyu nayo kalipaga izipesa ze kodi?”
40017025	Nayo Petelo yakatya. “Heya kalipaga.” Nayo Petelo yaza kwinjila mu nyumba, na lono yali yakali hamba si yanalonga nghani yinji, Yesu yakamuwuza, yakatya, “Alu, 'gwe Petelo, agwe wukuwona nhawule? Iwatemi wa mono yinze, wakongholaga kodi ku wulawa kuli wa hayi? Ku wulawa kuli iwana wawo, hamba ku wulawa kuli iwajenzi?”
40017026	Nayo Petelo yakapitula yakatya, “Kuwulawa kuli wajenzi.” Yesu yakamutya, “Holeka kumbe iwana si walavyaga.
40017027	Ninga alu ho cilece kuwakobaza, ale wubite kwi'lamba, wukayitajile ndowano, nagwe nhondo wusole somba yinongozi yono koyibata, hanyuma wuyahamulaje mulomo wayo, na mugati koziwona zipesa zono zikwiliye so kodi. Ale wuzisolaje wubite wukawapele, ku soko yangu na gwegwe!”
40018001	Ale, mucipango cico i wejizwa wakamubitila Yesu wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu nani mono muwaha mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga?”
40018002	Nayo Yesu yakamucema u mwana mudodo yumonga, yakamuwika haciligati yawo,
40018003	hanyuma yakawatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono hono mulece kupituka no kuwa nha vyono wenha i wana wadodo, si mosumila lukulu kwinjila mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga.
40018004	Na muli wose mono yakwinenenyheza nho mwana yuyu, ale yuyo yo muwaha mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga.
40018005	Na muli wose mono yakumubocela u mwana yumonga nha vyono yenha yuyu mwi'tagwa lyangu, yuyo yakumbocela nene.
40018006	“U munhu wo wose mono komwiwajiza yumonga wa muli wana wadodo wawa wono wanyihuwiye, yowa ciba kuli munhu yuyo yawopelezwe musingo ilizala liwaha lyo kusajila, no kugumilwa mu cisolo ce lilenga.
40018007	Woyi he, kuli wenze ku soko ye mewajizo gono gakuwagwisa wanji. Imewajizo gago, heya ganojeye gawe gali baho, ninga woyi he kuli munhu yuyo mono yakugaleta.
40018008	“Holeka hono u muwoko wako, hamba u mugulu wako wukwiwajize, ale ciba wuwudumulaje no kuwutaga kutali nagwe. Ku soko yili ciba kuli'gwe winjile mu wumi akuno wina muwoko hamba mugulu monga, si nho kutagwa mu moto we cibitilila, akuno ho wina ne miwoko myejete hamonga ne migulu yako myejete.
40018009	Na hono iliso lyako likwiwajize, ale, wuliwusaje, wulitaje kutali nagwe. Habi nha yili ciba kuli'gwe, kwinjila mu wumi, akuno wina liso limonga, sinho kutagwa mu moto wa ku Gehena, akuno ho wina ne meso gako gose vyono mejete.”
40018010	“Ale mwilanjililaje! Mulece kumubedegala yunji muyagwe ne wadodo wawa. Nghumulonjelenyi imbeka, vyono i wamalayika wawo kuko ku wulanga, wekalaga nhondo zose ha mwande yo Sogo yangu mono yali ku wulanga. [
40018011	Hambi u Mwana wo Munhu nha yaza ho yawaponye wono wajiliye.]
40018012	Alu mukuwona wule? U munhu hono yawe yena ngholo igana limonga, na hono ngholo monga yajilile, kanozaga nhawule? Kozileka azilya ze makumi cenda ne cenda mwi'tunda, nayo yakubita kuyilondola yiyo yono yajiliye.
40018013	Na kolo yakondya kuyiwona nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono kotuga wusangalale muno ku soko ya yiyo ingholo monga, si nha vyono yakuzisangalalila azilya izingholo ze makumi cenda ne cenda zono si zajiliye.
40018014	Yo nhavivyo, sunga no Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga, si yendile yumonga wa muli iwadodo wawa yajilile.”
40018015	“U nduguyo hono yakusutizye, ale, wubite wukamulajile imasutya gakwe, gwegwe na mweneco muli wene. Na hono yakuhulice, ale, kowa wamutuga nduguyo.
40018016	Ninga hono yekale si yakuhulice ale, wumusolaje yunji yumonga, hamba wejete, muwe muli hamonga nagwe, na muwulanjize we wahomelezi wejete, hamba wadatu, zose ho zisume kunozelezwa.
40018017	Nayo hono yekale si yawahulice wawo ale, wulilonjelaje likanisa. Na hono yekale si yalihulice likanisa, ale hodu, kuli'gwe yawe nhe wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, ne watoweza kodi.”
40018018	“Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono co cose cono mocidindila mono'nze, cowa cadindilwa nha vivyo na ku wulanga, na co cose cono mocidigulila mono'nze, ale nha vivyo na ku wulanga cowa cadigulilwa.
40018019	Kanyhi nghumulonjelenyi vyono wanhu wejete wa muli nyenye, hono welumbanize baha mono'nze, so nghani yono wolomba, u Sogo yangu wa ku wulanga, mbeka kowapela inghani yiyi.
40018020	Hambi nha ho hose hono wakwihanguliza wejete hamba wadatu, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu, nane nili baho muciligati yawo.”
40018021	Hanyuma Petelo yakamubitila Yesu, yakamuwuza yakutya, “Alu mwene, hono u ndugu yangu yasutizye, ane yinojeye nimunenele nghanghulo yilinga? Kali mupunghati?”
40018022	Nayo Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Ane si nghutya, yeze kali mupunghati du, aa, ng'o, langa yiweze makumi mupunghati kali mupunghati.
40018023	Holeka u Wutemi wa ku wulanga, wukwihwana no mutemi yunji, mono yakahila kuwona iliwalo lye sawo yakwe kuli wetumami wakwe.”
40018024	Nayo yaza kwinjila mu wuwale, baho yakaletelwa munhu yunji mono yazijilwaga mapesa, talanta elufu yikumi.
40018025	Nayo u munhu yuyo yakawa yasina cinhu co cose cono kosuma kulipa, holeka u muwaha wakwe, yakalajiliza vyono u munhu yuyo yaguzwe, u mwene no mugolece wakwe, ne wanagwe, sunga ne vinhu vyose vyono yali yena navyo, ho mugawa wuwo wulipwe.
40018026	Ninga u mwitumami yuyo, yakafugama ha mwande yo muwaha wakwe, yakatya, “Wayiko wungolelaje nane nokulipa du u mugawa wose.
40018027	Ayulya u muwaha wakwe nayo yakamuwonela lusungu, sunga yakawa kumunenela u mugawa wuwulya wose, hodu yakawa kumuleka yabite.
40018028	“He, ninga u mwitumami yuyo, yali yeza kuwuka bahalya, yakamwagana yunji muyagwe ne wetumami wayagwe, mono u mwene yuyu yamudayaga yuyo muyagwe mapesa, dinali igana limonga. Hodu yakawa kumwibata, yakawa kumukoma mu mumelo, akuno yakutya, ‘Wundipaje umugawa wangu wono nghukudaya.’
40018029	Nayo yuyo u mwitumami muyagwe, yakafugama, yakamunena yakutya, Gwe, muyangu, wungolelaje, nane nokulipa du umugawa wako wose.
40018030	Ninga mwene hamba si yasaka, langa yakamutajila mu jela, sunga kono kowulipila wuwulya u mugawa wose.
40018031	Baho i wetumami wayagwe nawo waza kuyiwona inghani yiyo, mbeka wakakalala muno muno, hodu wakabita wakamulonjela u muwaha wawo muli zizo zono ziweye.
40018032	Hobaho u muwaha yu yulya yakawa kumucema u mwitumami yuyulya, yakamutya, ‘Agwe, mbeka wuli mwitumami mubi. Agwe walomba kuli'ne, nane nghakunenela u mugawa awulya wose.
40018033	Alu, si yali yikunojeye wumuwonele lusungu u mwitumami muyago nha vyono nane nakuwonela lusungu?’
40018034	Holeka u muwaha yuyo yakakolwa muno muno ne likuwo, yakamulavya yuyo u mwitumami ho yalipicizwe, sunga kono komalila kuwulipa u mugawa wuwulya wose.
40018035	Ale, no Sogo yangu wa ku wulanga nayo, komutendelenyi nha vivyo nanye, hono mulece kwiyinenela munhu na nduguye kwe mitima yenyu yose.”
40019001	Yesu yaza kukondya kuzilonga i zinghani zizo, hodu, yakawuka ku Galilaya, yakabita ku yisi ye Wayahudi, ku nhumbi nzagwe ye likolongo lya Yoludani.
40019002	Ne wanhu wenji wakamutyatya kuko, nayo yakawaponya.
40019003	Ne Wafalisayo wanji wakaza, wakamuwuza, ho wamugwize, wakatya, “Ati, yo ling'ani, u munhu yamulece u mugolece wakwe no kumupela talaka ku soko ye lisutya lyolyose?”
40019004	Yesu nayo yakawapitula yakatya, “Alu, nye, ho simwasoma mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, nha vyono u Mulungu mono yamuwumba u munhu ku wulawa ha mwamulizo, yawumba, u mulume no mucekulu,
40019005	nayo yakatya, ku soko yiyo holeka u mulume kowaleka u sogwe no nyina, nayo vyokwilunza no mugolece wakwe, nawo vyono wejete wowa muwili wumonga?
40019006	Holeka iwene si wowa wejete kanyhi, langa waweza wali muwili wumonga. Holeka cono yacilunzize u Mulungu, u munhu wo wose yalece kucitemanulila lukulu.”
40019007	Ninga iwene nawo wakamuwuza, wakatya, “Alu mbi nhawule, Musa yacilajiliza vyono u mugolece yapegwe talaka, no kulekwa?”
40019008	Yesu yakawatya, “Musa yamukombolenyi ho muwalece iwagolece zenyu, ku soko yo wukamu we zinhumbula zenyu.
40019009	Ninga ku wulawa mwamulizo, si yali nha vivyo. Holeka nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u mulume wo wose mono komuleka u mugolece wakwe no kutola yunji, hono si kusoko yo wusenyha du, yuyo langa yakusenyha.”
40019010	I wejizwa wakwe wakamulonjela wakamutya, “Alu kumbe hono izinghani zo mulume no mugolece wakwe, ziwe vyo zinha nha vivi, yili ciba kuleka kutolela lukulu.”
40019011	Yesu yakawatya, “Ninga si wose wono wosuma kulibocela i lifundo lilyo, langa yowa kuli wawalya du, wono wapejigwe no Mulungu.
40019012	Hambi nha kozili soko nyinji zono zikuleka wanji walece kutola, iwanji ku soko vyono walelwa nhavivyo, na wanji, ku soko vyono wanozigwe nha vivyo ne wanhu, na wanji nawo, walamuye weneco du, vyono si wotola, ku soko yo wutemi wa ku wulanga. Holeka mono yakusuma kulibocela i lifundo lilino, ale yalibocelaje.”
40019013	Hanyuma iwanhu wakamuletela Yesu iwana wadodo, ho yawawicile imiwoko yakwe no kuwalombela. Ninga iwejizwa wakawatacila.
40019014	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Muwalekaje iwana wawo wadodo waze kwangu, mulece kuwemila, hambi u wutemi wa ku wulanga nha wa wanhu wono wenha iwana wawa, nha wo wanojeye ku wutemi wa ku wulanga.”
40019015	Hodu, yakawawicila miwoko, hanyuma yakawuka ihanhu baho.
40019016	U munhu yunji yakamuziza Yesu, yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, alu yinojeye noze cinhuci ciswanu, ho niwutuje u wumi we cibitilila?”
40019017	Yesu yakamutya, “Alu nhawule wukumbuza kuli za ya hayi nghani swanu? Hambi nha koyuli yumonga du u muswanu. Na hono wusace kwinjila mu wumi, ale wugebataje i malajilizo.”
40019018	Nayo u munhu yuyo yakamuwuza yakatya, “Alu, malajilizo go ga hayi?” Yesu yakatya, “Wulece kuwulaga munhu, wulece kusenyha, wulece kuhiza, wulece kulavya wuhomelezi wo wulambi,
40019019	wuwogopaje u sogo no nyina yako, kanyhi, wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile gwegwe go mweneco.”
40019020	Nayo yuyo u muzelelo, yakamutya, “Gago gose nigebate kuwulawa wudodo wangu, aluno ma, nitumaje ci cici komuno?”
40019021	Yesu yakamulonjela yakatya, “Ale, hono wukusaka wuwe munhu mono wukwilaniciye, ale wubite wukaviguze ivinhu vyose, wuwapele iwaciwa, nagwe ho kowa na ciwutwa ku wulanga, hanyuma ho wuze wunhyatye.”
40019022	Nayo u muzelelo yuyo yali yeza kuhulika zizo, hodu yakawa kutuluka akuno yena no wukalale muno, hambi nha yali yena sawo nyinji.
40019023	Baho nayo Yesu, yakawa kuwalonjela i wejizwa wakwe yakutya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, vyono yowa kukamu muno muno kuli munhu mugoli, ku winjile mu wutemi wa ku wulanga.
40019024	Kanyhi nghumulonjelenyi nghutya nhavi, kupelu kuli ngamiya yikole mu cilanga co lusing'ani, si nha u munhu mugoli, kuwinjila mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga.”
40019025	Nawo i wejizwa waza kuzihulika zizo, wakezina muno muno, wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu yo nani mbi, mono kosuma kupona?”
40019026	Yesu nayo, yakawalanga, yakawatya, “Ku wuwe wo munhu inghani yiyi, si yisumice, ninga kuli Mulungu zose nha zisumice.”
40019027	Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Alu ase nase ma? Hambi nha cavileka vyose, nase cikakutyatya, alu ho cotuga cinhuci?”
40019028	Yesu yakawalonjela, yakatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yalaza kwikala mwi'goda lye nhojo, lyo lukumyo lwakwe, mu yinze yimhya, nanye mono mukunhyatya, molokwikala mu magoda yikumi na mejete, akuno mukuwaling'aniza we milango yikumi na myejete ya Isilayeli.
40019029	Na muli wose mono yalecile nyumba yakwe, hamba wawahaze, hamba walumbuze, hamba u sogwe, hamba u nyina, hamba wanagwe, hamba migunda ku soko yangu, nayo kobocela kali yigana na kuciza, na hanyuma kowutuga u wumi we cibitilila.
40019030	Ninga i wenji wono aluno wali mu nyuma, wawo wo wolowa wo walongozi. Ne walongozi wolowa wa mu nyuma.”
40020001	“U Wutemi wa ku wulanga wihwanile no munhu mono yali yena u mugunda we mizabibu, mono yelawa hakali mitondo muno, yakawika iwetumami mu mugunda wakwe.
40020002	Vikelumbaniza nawo, vyono kowalipa u musahala we zuwa limonga, yakawa kuwategula ku mugunda wakwe we mizabibu.
40020003	Yakalawila kanyhi mu saa tatu hakali mitondo, yakawawona wanhu wanji wemile du mu sokoni, wasina hamba mulimo
40020004	Nawo yakawalonjela yakatya, ‘Ale, mubite nanye muketume mulimo mu mugunda we mizabibu, nane nomupelenyi yiling'ani yenyu, nha vyono mwitumile.’
40020005	Ale, nawo wakabita. Yuyo u munya mugunda, kanyhi yakatuluka mu saa tisa ne misi, yakanoza nha vivilya kanyhi.
40020006	Nayo yali yeza kufika mu saa kumi na monga, cinyamihe, yakalawila kanyhi, nayo yakawagana wanhu wanji kanyhi wemile bahalya ha sokoni. Yakawawuza, yakatya, ‘Alu nhawulenyi muswa mwimile bahano du misi yose, hamba kwituma mulimo wo wose?’
40020007	Nawo wakapitula wakatya, ‘Alu nha si cimutujile u munhu wo kucipela u mulimo.’ Nayo yakawatya, ‘Ale nanye mubite muketume mu mugunda we mizabibu.’
40020008	“Ilizuwa lyali lyeza kuswa, u munya mugunda yakamulonjela u mukamisi wakwe, we zipesa, yakatya, ‘Ale wuwacemaje iwetumami wose, ho wuwalipe u musahala wawo wulawilile kuli walya wono watumigwe ku mulimo ha ndumilizo wujendelele sunga wumalilizize kuli walya i walongozi.’
40020009	Hodu, wakawa kuza iwetumami wawalya wono wategulwa ku mulimo mu saa kumi na monga cinyamihe, wawo wakabocela, munhu yakapegwa u musahala we zuwa limonga.
40020010	Awalya i walongozi waza kufika, wehwesaga vyono iwene wopegwa kuciza, ninga na wene nawo wakapegwa, munhu musahala we zuwa limonga.
40020011	Hodu du wakazibocela izipesa zizo, ninga akuno wakumung'ung'ulicila yu yulya muwaha.
40020012	Wakatya, ‘Wanhu awano wetuma mulimo mu cipango ca saa monga du, alu nhawule kucipela sawa sawa na wene, na kumbe ase ho cikangalila mu mulimo mukamu mwi'zuwa likali misi yose?’
40020013	Baho nayo munya mugunda yakamupitula muyawo yumonga yakamutya, ‘Gwe muyangu, ane si nghukonyile cinji yaye. Wule, sikotya cilagana nagwe vyono nokupela u musahala we zuwa?
40020014	Ale wusole yako, wubite. Ane nyendile no mweneco, nimupele ayu mono yazize ku mulimo ha ndumilizo, yono yili sawa sawa na gwegwe.
40020015	Alo wukwihwesa ane sina ling'ani yo kwitumila i sawo yangu nha vyono nendile no mweneco? Hamba wukuwona wivu vyono ane nili muswanu?’ ”
40020016	Yesu yakamaliliza u wulonje wakwe ko wutya nhavi, “Holeka wo mudumo, wo wolowa walongozi, nawo i walongozi, wo wolowa wo mudumo.”
40020017	Nayo Yesu lono yabitaga ku Yelusalemi, yakawasoleleza na walya iwejizwa yikumi na wejete, yakawategula hanhu ha cilejeho, na lono wali wali mu nzila, yakawalonjela yakutya,
40020018	“Ta muhulicize, aluno ceza kubita ku Yelusalemi, na kuko, u Mwana wo Munhu kotajilwa mu miwoko ye wakohani wawaha na muli wejizi wo Wulajilize, nawo womuling'aniza yawulagwe.
40020019	Womukombola kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi ho wamuzwajize no kumukuna viboko, no kutumbikwa, ninga mwi'zuwa lye kadatu kozuka.”
40020020	Baho u nyina ye wana wa Zebedayo, yakamuziza Yesu, hamonga ne wanagwe yakafugama ha mwande ya Yesu, akuno yakumulomba cinji.
40020021	Yesu yakamuwuza yakamutya, Alu yaya, wukusaka cici? Nayo yuyo mudala, yakamulonjela yakatya, “Wihuwizaje vyono i wanangu wawa iwejete, wokwikala yumonga ku lubavu lwako lo kulume, no muyagwe nayo kulubavu lwako lo kucekulu, mu Wutemi wako.”
40020022	Yesu yakapitula, yakatya, “Anye si mucimanyile cono mukulomba yaye. Alu mosuma kucing'wela icikombe ce magazo cono nocing'wela nene?” Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Heya cosuma.”
40020023	Yesu yakawalonjela yakatya, “Mbeka mosuma kucing'wela cikombe cangu, ninga ku wikala ku muwoko wangu wo kulume hamba ku muwoko wangu wo kucekulu, wo si mulimo wangu kulamula inghani yiyo, wopegwa du wawalya wono wawikanizizwa na Baba.”
40020024	Awalya i wejizwa wanji we likumi, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakawa kuwasimbila wawo iwejete wa Yakobo na Yohana.
40020025	Holeka Yesu yakawacema, yakawalonjela yakutya, “Mumanyile nha vyono iwatemi we makungugo wawabanile i wanhu wawo kwe vilungo, ne wawaha wawo wakuwa kuwatema I wanhu wawo.
40020026	Ninga yilece kuwa nha vivyo kuli'nye, langa wo wose wa muli nyenye, mono yakusaka yawe muwaha muli nyenye, yimunojeye yo yawe mwitumami wa wose,
40020027	na mono yakusaka kuwa mulongola muli nyenye, ale yimunojeye yo yawe mwitumami wenyu.
40020028	Na vyo nha vivyo, u Mwana wo Munhu nayo, si yaza ho yetumamilwe, langa ho yetumame, no kuwulavya u wumi wakwe ho wuwe wukombozwe wa wanhu wenji.”
40020029	Nayo Yesu lono yalawaga ku Yeliko, i lipuga iwaha lye wanhu likamutyatya.
40020030	Na kwali na wanhu wejete wono wali wali cibofu, nawo wali wekaye hamhelo ye nzila, nawo waza kuhulika du vyono Yesu yazaga yakukolela baho, hodu wakawa kwanza kuzoza wakutya, “Gwe Muwaha go Mwana wa Dawudi, wuciwonele lusungu!”
40020031	Nalyo ilipuga lililya lye wanhu, likawatacila, no kuwalonjela wanyamale twii. Ninga i wabofu ho wakacila kuzoza muno, wakutya, “Gwe Muwaha go Mwana wa Dawudi, wuciwonele lusungu!”
40020032	Nayo Yesu yakawa kwima, yakawacema no kuwawuza, yakutya, “Alo mukusaka nimutendelenyi wule?”
40020033	Nawo wakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, ase cikukulomba wucidigule meso getu.”
40020034	Nayo Yesu yakawawonela lusungu, yakawapamiza meso gawo, na ho baho baho du, wakawa kuwona kanyhi, wakamutyatya.
40021001	Nayo Yesu lono yali yasejelela ku Yelusalemi, no kufika ku Betifage mwitunda lye Mizeyituni, yakawatuma wejete wa muli wejizwa wakwe,
40021002	yakawatya, “Mubite sunga kucitumbi acilya cono cili ha mwande yenyu, na kuko, moyagana ndogowe, mbope, yili hamonga ne nyana yayo. Ale muziwopolelaje mundetele.
40021003	Na hono munhu yunji yamuwuzenyi soko yono yikuleka mukuziwopolela, mutye vyono, ‘U Muwaha yakuzisaka,’ nayo komulecelenyi lwa kamonga du.”
40021004	Ne nghani yiyi yikanozwa nhavivyo, ho zifisilizwe azilya zono zalongwa no muwizi lono yatya,
40021005	“Mulilonjele ilikaya lya Sayuni, Wulanje u Mutemi wako yakukuziza! Mupolo, kanyhi yali mucanyha ye ndogowe.”
40021006	Nawo iwejizwa wakawa kubita no kunoza nha vyono walajilizwa na Yesu.
40021007	Wakawa kuyileta yiyilya i ndogowe hamonga ne nyana yayo, wakawa kuyijeleka i myenda yawo mucanyha yazo, nayo Yesu yakawa kwikala mucanyha yayo.
40021008	Ne lipuga liwaha lye wanhu, wakayitandika i myenda yawo mu balabala, ne wanhu wanji, wakatema i manhambi ge mibici, nawo wakagatandalika nha vivyo mu balabala.
40021009	Ne mapuga ge wanhu wono wali wamulongoleye, sunga na walya wono wamutyatyaga, wakazoza ne mazi mawaha wakutya, “Yalumbwe u Mwana wa Dawudi! Yalugutwe yuyo mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha! Yalumbwe u Mulungu kucanyha!”
40021010	Nayo Yesu lono yenjilaga mu Yelusalemi, i likaya lyose likamema sasamo. Sunga ne wanhu wakawa kuwuza wakutya, “Alu, nye, Yuyu yo nani?”
40021011	Iwanhu wanji wa mwipuga lililya lye wanhu wakatya, “Ayu yo muwizi Yesu, mono yakulawilila ku Nazaleti mu yisi ya Galilaya.”
40021012	Hodu, Yesu yakawa kwinjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yakawa kuwawinjila kunze, iwanhu wono waguzaga no kugula ivinhu mugati ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakazigwisa zimeza za wono wakawaga zipesa, sunga ne magoda ga wono waguzaga zinziwa.
40021013	Akuno yakuwatya, “Yandikwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile nha vyono, ‘I Nyumba yangu yocemwa, nyumba yo kulombela.’ Ninga alu anye, mwayinoza kuwa mhango ye wahizi.”
40021014	Nawo iwabofu, na we vilema, wose wakamubitila kuko ku Nyumba yo Mulungu, nayo Yesu yakawaponya.
40021015	Ale baho, nawo wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize wali weza kugawona i mapoto gono Yesu yanozize, hamonga ne wadodo wono wazozaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu wehindile, wakutya “U lukumyo lweze kuli'gwe, go Mwana wa Dawudi,” wene wakasimba.
40021016	Hobaho wakamutya Yesu, “Alu ho siwukuhulika vyono wakutya?” Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Heya nghuhulika! Alu anye, mukali si nagasoma lo Mandiko gaga Gono Gelile? Gono gakutya, ‘Kuwejiza iwana wadodo, sunga ne wagalika wose, ho wakulavizye lilumbo lyono likwilaniciye!’ ”
40021017	Hodu baho, yakawa kuwaleka, u mwene yakalawila kunze ye likaya, yakabita ku Betaniya, yakagona kuko.
40021018	Nayo Yesu lono yawuyaga mwitumbi, hakali mitondo muno yakadabuka.
40021019	Yakawuwona mukuyu wunji ha mhelo ye nzila, yakawubitila, ho yahepe imikalo yayo, ninga yakawagana wusina mikalo hamba hadodo, langa go mahamha du gali wene. Hodu yakawa kuwulonjela yakawutya, “Wulecele lukulu kulela kanyhi mikalo cibitilila!” Hobaho baho du, no mukuyu wuwo wukawa kunyala.
40021020	Nawo iwejizwa waza kuwuwona, wakezina muno muno, wakatya, “Alu nhawule u mukuyu wuwu wunyala lwa kamonga du?”
40021021	Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono hono muwe no wihuwilo wono wusina mahwele, si mosuma kunoza nha vivi du, langa mosuma sunga na hono mulilonjele ilitunda lili mutye, ‘Wukulice wukegumile mwi'lenga,’ nayo vyo yowa nha vivyo.
40021022	Na hono muwe no wihuwilo du, co cose cono mocilomba mu wulombe wenyu, cico mocituga.”
40021023	Yesu yakenjila kanyhi mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yakawa yakwijiza mumo, na lono yejizaga, i wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wanyamhala we wanhu wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu mwene, wukwitumila zizi zose mu wulajilize wa hayi? Hamba yo nani mwene mono yakupelile u wulajilize wuwuno?”
40021024	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Alu nane nomuwuzenyi yiwuzo limonga na hono mumhitule, ale, nane ho nomulonjelenyi vyono nghwitumila zizi mu wulajilize wa hayi.
40021025	Wulenyi ta, u wulajilize wa Yohana wo kubaputiza walawa kuli nani? Wule, walawa ku wulanga hamba kuli wanhu?” Ninga iwene wakalongana weneco wose wakutya, “Hono citye, ‘Walawa ku wulanga,’ nayo kociwuza yatye, ‘Alu nhawule si mwamwihuwila?’
40021026	Na hono citye, ‘Walawa kuli wanhu,’ baho naho cikogopa i lipuga lye wanhu, hambi wose nha wamuvumiye Yohana nha vyono u mwene yali muwizi.”
40021027	Hodu wakawa kutya, “Ase si cimanyile!” Nayo Yesu, yakawalonjela yakutya, “Ale hodu, hamba na nene sinomulonjelenyi vyono nghuzinozeza zizi mu wulajilize wa nani.”
40021028	“Nanye mukuwona nhawule? U munhu yumonga yali yena wana wejete. Yakamulonjela mulongozi yakamutya, ‘Mwanangu izuwali wubite wuketume mulimo ku mugunda we mizabibu.’
40021029	Nayo muzelelo yulya yakatya, ‘Nema ne!’ Ninga hanyuma yayo, yakapitula lihweso lyakwe, yakabita kuwitumo mulimo.
40021030	Nayo u sogo yawo yakamulonjela na yulya u mwanagwe we kejete, nha vivyo, nayo yakamulonjela sogwe yakatya, ‘Heya baba, nobita!’ Ninga hamba si yabita ku mulimo.
40021031	Alu wa hayi wa muli wawa i wejete mono yetuma u wuhile wo sogwe?” Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Yuyulya u mwana mulongozi.” Yesu yakawatya, “Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono i watoweza kodi, sunga ne wasenyha, womulongolelenyi kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
40021032	Hambi Yohana nha yamuzizenyi yakamulajililenyi i nzila swanu ye mikalile, anye hamba si mwamwihuwila, ninga i watoweza kodi, sunga ne wasenyha wakamwihuwila. Nanye hamba muwe mwaziwona zizo zose, si mukasaka kuzikawaniza i zinhumbula zenyu no kumwihuwila.”
40021033	Yesu yakatya, “Hulicizenyi ta, cihwanicizo cinji, Munhu yunji munya kaya, yakalima mugunda we mizabibu, yakawusitila no mululu, yakahimba ne likombo mumo lyo kuminyila zizabibu, yakazenga ne cilingo. Hanyuma yakawawika walimi, u mwene yakawa kubita ku yisi yinji ya kutali.
40021034	Na mwi'pango lyo wupilo we zizabibu waza kusejelela, yakawatuma i wetumami wakwe wabite kuli wawalya iwalimi, ho wakasole mikalo yakwe.
40021035	I walimi wawo, wakawebata wawo wetumami, yunji wakamutowa na yunji wakamuwulaga, na yunji kanyhi wakamutowanga ne mabwe.
40021036	U munhu yuyo, nayo yakawatuma kanyhi i wetumami wanji, wenji kuciza walongozi, nawo i walimi, wakawatendela nha vivilya du.
40021037	Nhondo ndumilizo, yakamutuma u mwanagwe, akuno yakwihwesa, ‘Magu, hamba womogopa u mwanangu.’
40021038	Ninga i walimi wawalya, waza muwona u muzelelo yuyulya yakuza, wakalongana weneco wose wakatya, ‘Ayu mwene yo muhazi, holeka ciba cimuwulaje, ase ho cisole u wuhazi wakwe!’
40021039	Hodu wakawa kumwibata, wakamulavyaniza kunze yo mugunda we mizabibu, wakamuwulaga.
40021040	Alu yuyu munya mugunda we mizabibu kolo yakuza, ho yawanoze nhawule i walimi wawo?”
40021041	Iwene wakamupitula wakatya, “Kowapela walimi wanji, wono wosuma kumupela mikalo mu cipango co wupilo wayo.”
40021042	Baho nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alo mukali si nayisoma inghani yiyi mu Mandiko Gono Gelile? Yono yikutya, ‘Ilibwe lyono walilema i wazenji alu lyo lyaweza lyo libwe liwaha lyo musinji. No Muwaha yo yayinozize inghani yiyi. Nayo yo nghani yo wizine muno muno kuli'se!’
40021043	“Holeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono, u Wutemi wo Mulungu wowuswa kuli'nye no kupegwa i wanhu we makungugo ganji wono wakulavya mikalo yayo. [
40021044	Ninga mono kogwa mucanyha ye libwe lilyo, yuyo kobenanjika-benanjika, na hono limugwile munhu wo wose, langa lyomupondanjiza tici-tici.]”
40021045	Iwakohani wawaha ne Wafalisayo, wali weza kuzihulika zizo ze vihwanicizo vyakwe Yesu, wakatanga lwa kamonga du nha vyono yawalongaga weneco.
40021046	Holeka wakawa kwanza kulondola londola inzila yo kumwibatila, ninga lu wakogopa wanhu, hambi i wanhu nha wamumanya Yesu vyono u Mwene yo Muwizi.
40022001	Yesu yakalonga nawo kanyhi mu vihwanicizo, yakatya,
40022002	“Uwutemi wa ku wulanga wihwanile no mutemi mono yamunozeza u mwanagwe, zindigwa ze halusi.
40022003	Hanyuma yakawa kuwatuma i wetumami wakwe ho wabite wakawaceme wono walalikwe, waze ku halusi, ninga iwalalikwa hamba si wasaka kuza.
40022004	Yakawatuma kanyhi wetumami wanji, yakatya, ‘Ale, muwalonjelaje i walalikwa vyono, i zindigwa zangu zawikanizwa zakondya, zinghongolo zangu hamonga ne zing'ombe zono zijinile, zose zakondya kucinjwa na vyose vyawikanizwa vyakondya, holeka anye muze du kono halusi.’
40022005	Ninga iwene wanyo kulalikwa, hamba kutununhika bwete, wakabita du munhu na zakwe, yunji yakabita ku mugunda wakwe, na yunji nayo ku zakwe du,
40022006	ne wanji nawo, wakawebata wawalya wetumami, wakawaliganga, wakawawulaga.
40022007	Nayo u Mutemi yakasimba muno muno, yakawatuma i wasilikale wakwe, ho wabite wakawongomeze i wawulaji wawalya, hamonga no kuliticimiza i likaya lyawo.
40022008	Hanyuma yakawalonjela iwetumami wakwe yakatya, ‘Izindigwa ze halusi mbeka zawikanizwa zakondya, ninga iwalalikwa si wanojeye yaye.
40022009	Holeka alu mubite mu zinzila malekano, na wo wose wono mowagana mumo, ale muwacemaje waze ku halusi.’
40022010	Nawo iwetumami wakalawila, wakabita mu zinzila, wakawaleta iwanhu wose, iwabi ne waswanu. Sunga ne nyumba yikamema wajenzi.
40022011	Nayo u mutemi yali yeza kwinjila ho yawawone iwajenzi, baho yakamuwona munhu yunji mono si yali yavwalile ivivwalo vye halusi.
40022012	U mutemi yakamuwuza yakutya, ‘Alu 'gwe muyangu, ho kuvinjila-vinjila nhawule baha, akuno ho wusina ne civwalo ce halusi?’ Ninga mwene munhu yuyo yakanyamala twii.
40022013	Hodu, u mutemi yakawalonjela iwetumami yakatya, ‘Ale mumusolaje yuyu, mumuwope migulu ne miwoko yakwe, hanyuma mukamutaje ku citi, kunze, nayo kuko kowa kulila no kugwezula meno.’ ”
40022014	Nayo Yesu yakamaliliziza u wulonje wakwe, ko wutya, “Wenji wono walalikwe, ninga wono wahaguywe wo wacefu.”
40022015	Hanyuma i Wafalisayo wakawa kubita, wakalongana weneco wose i nzila yono wosuma kumugwiziza Yesu mu wulonje wakwe.
40022016	Holeka wakawatuma i wayawo wanji, hamonga ne watyatyi we cipuga ca Helode. Wakabita kuli Yesu, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Gwe Mwijizi, ase cimanyile vyono kulongaga mbeka, na kanyhi vyono kwijizaga i mbeka yo wuhile wo Mulungu kuli wanhu, hamba sikogopaga munhu wo wose, hambi ililumbo lyo munhu nha si cinji kuli'gwe.
40022017	Ale cilonjelaje ta vyono wukwihwesa. Wule ta, yili viswanu kumulipa kodi Kayisali hamba ng'o?”
40022018	Ninga mwene Yesu yakagamanya i mahweso gawo mabi, yakawa kuwatya, “Nyo wakoci'nye, nhawule lo mukunjela?
40022019	Ndajilenyi ta pesa yo kulipila kodi.” Nawo wakamulajila i pesa yiyo.
40022020	Nayo Yesu yakawawuza yakutya, “Wulenyi, hwani yiyi ne litagwa lili, vya nani?”
40022021	Nawo wakamupitula wakutya, “Vya Kayisali.” Baho nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Ale mupelenyi Kayisali vyakwe Kayisali, nayo Mulungu, ivyakwe Mulungu.”
40022022	Nawo wali weza kuzihulika zizo, wakezina muno muno, hodu wakawa kumuleka no kwibitila munhu na lwakwe.
40022023	Mwizuwa lilyo wanji wa muli Wasadukayo wakamuziza Yesu. Wawo wo wanhu wono watezaga vyono i wanhu si wolozuka yaye.
40022024	Wakamulonjela wakutya, “Go Mwijizi, ase Musa yacilonjela vyono u munhu mono yatolile hono yafwe si yalecile wana, ale yimunojeye u nduguye, yamutole yuyo u mucekulu mufwile, ho yamutujile wana u nduguye.
40022025	Alu, bahano hono hetu, hali howali wanhu mupunghati, walume, wana wa munhu monga. U mulongozi yakatola mucekulu, hanyuma yakafwa si yalecile wana, yakamulecela nduguye yuyo mucekulu wakwe, mufwile.
40022026	Ale yikawa nha vivyo kuli we kejete, na we kadatu, sunga wo mupunghati.
40022027	Na lono wawo wose wali wafwa, hanyuma yayo u mucekulu yuyo nayo yakafwa.
40022028	Alu mwizuwa lyono i wafu wala weza kuzuka, u mucekulu yuyu, ho kolowa mugolece wa wahayi, muli wawa wose vyono wali mupunghati? Vyono wose mupunghati wali wamutolile.”
40022029	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Anye he mbeka mukusutya ku soko vyono si mugamanyile i Mandiko Gono Gelile, hamba ne vilungo vyo Mulungu!”
40022030	Ku soko vyono i wafu kolo wakuzukulwa, si wolotola, hamba si wolotolwa, hambi nha wokwihwana ne wamalayika ku wulanga.
40022031	Ninga kuli zo wuzuce we wafu, ho simwasoma azilya zono u Mulungu yamulonjelenyi?
40022032	Yakutya nhavi, “Ane yo nene u Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na Isaka na Yakobo!” Holeka u Mwene yo si Mulungu wa wono wafwiye, langa yo Mulungu we womi.
40022033	Nalyo ilipuga lye wanhu lyaza kuzihulika zizo, likagezina muno imejizo gakwe.
40022034	Nawo i Wafalisayo, waza kuhulika vyono Yesu yawanyamaza i Wasadukayo, hodu waketang'anila hamonga.
40022035	No muyawo yunji, u mwijizi wo Wulajilize, yakamuwuza Yesu, yakumujela, yakatya,
40022036	“Ati Mwijizi, lilajilizo lya hayi liwaha kuciza, muli gono gali mu Wulajilize wa Musa?”
40022037	Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Wumwendaje u Muwaha Mulungu wako kwe nhumbula yako yose, na ko mutima wako wose, na kwe mahala gako gose.
40022038	Na ali lyo lilajilizo liwaha ililongozi.
40022039	Nalyo lye kejete lihwanile na lilyo, ‘Wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco!’
40022040	U Wulajilize wose wa Musa, sunga ne mejizo gose ge wawizi, gatoweleywe mu malajilizo gaga imejete.”
40022041	Nawo i Wafalisayo wali weza kwitang'anila hamonga, Yesu yakawawuza,
40022042	“Alu anye mukuwona nhawule kuli za Kilisito? Wulenyi, mukwihwesa vyono kowa mwana wa nani?” Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Mwana wa Dawudi.”
40022043	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu ho yosumika nhawule, vyono Dawudi, mu vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, yakumucema yakumutya, mwene ‘Muwaha?’ Nha vyono yatya. [
40022044	‘U Muwaha yamulonjela u Muwaha wangu wikalaje ku muwoko wangu wo kulume, sunga kolo nghuwawika i walugu wako hasi ye migulu yako.’]
40022045	Holeka hono Dawudi yakumutya Kilisito, ‘Muwaha,’ ho kowa mwanagwe nhawule kanyhi?”
40022046	Hamba hasina wo wose mono yasuma kumupitula cinji. No wulawilila mwizuwa lilyo, hasina mono yejelela kanyhi kumuwuza cinji co cose.
40023001	Hanyuma yakawa kuwulonjela u winji we wanhu, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, yakatya,
40023002	“Iwejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wo wapejigwe u wulajilize wo kuwulolosa u Wulajilize wa Musa.
40023003	Holeka munojeye anye mwibataje, no kwituma zose zono womulonjelenyi. Ninga mulece kwiga imetumo gawo, hambi na weneco nha si wakuzituma zizilya zono wakuziganula.
40023004	Wene wawopaga imitegulo mizito, no kuwapiciza iwanhu mu mawega, ninga iweneco si wakusaka kugolola hamba cidole du bwete, ho wayidinghule imitegulo yiyo.
40023005	Iwene izawo zose, wetumaga du ho wanhu wawawone. Hambi nha wendile kuvwala ha wusu wawo na mu miwoko yawo icitambala cono cihonele malajilizo, kanyhi wendile konjeleza ne masune mu majoho gawo.
40023006	Kanyhi, wendile hanhu he lilumbo mu zindigwa ze zisikukuu, no kwikala mu magoda matambule mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo.
40023007	Wendile muno muno ho walamuswe ne wanhu kwe cogopo mu zisokoni, no kucemwa kanyhi ne wanhu, ‘Mwijizi.’
40023008	Ninga anye, mulecele lukulu kucemwa ‘Mwijizi,’ vyono anye mwina mwijizi wenyu yumonga du, ninga anye wose muli ndugu.
40023009	Hamba mulece kumucema munhu wo wose mukumutya, ‘Baba,’ bahano mono yinze, hambi u sogo yenyu, nha yumonga du mono yali ku wulanga.
40023010	Hamba mulece kucemwa, ‘Walongola.’ hambi u mulongola wenyu nha yumonga du, nayo yo Kilisito.
40023011	Nayo u muwaha muli nyenye, yimumojeye yo yawe mwitumami wenyu.
40023012	Nayo mono yakwikumya mweneco, nha konyetywa, na mono yakwinyetya, yuyo langa yo kokumywa.”
40023013	“Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, mo wakoci! Mono mukuwadindila iwanhu u mulango wo Wutemi wa ku wulanga. Nanye mo weneco si mukwinjila mugati, kanyhi hamba si mukusaka kuwakombola wono wakusaka kwinjila ho wenjile. [
40023014	“Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Mono mukuwewonela iwacekulu wafwile, no kuwasolela ivinhu vyawo, akuno mukwinoza nha muli wanhu waswanu, so wulomba wulombe wutali muno muno. Na ku soko yiyi, holeka mopegwa wulipicizwe wuwaha.]
40023015	“Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Mono mukujenda mwi'lenga na mu yisi nghavu ho mutuje munhu monga yatyatye dini yenyu. Na kolo mwamutuga, mukumunoza kanyhi yawe yawunojeye u moto we Gehena kali kejete si nha nyenye mo weneco.
40023016	“Woyi he kuli'nye, mo watonji wabofu! Anye mutezaga ati hono munhu yelahize kuli Nyumba yo Mulungu, si nghani yaye, langa hono yelahize kuli zahabu ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, baho langa yepela nghani.
40023017	Anye mo wabofu, na mo walele! Alu ya hayi yono yine nhunizo mbaha, zahabu, hamba Nyumba yo Mulungu yono yikuyinoza zahabu yiyo ho yiwe yelile?
40023018	Kanyhi mutezaga ati hono munhu yelahize ku cipegwa cono ciwicigwe mucanyha ye cikumbicilo, yuyo langa kepela nghani.
40023019	Anye nyo wabofu, alu co ca hayi cono cina nhunizo mbaha, i cipegwa cico hambe cikumbicilo cono cikucinoza i cipegwa cico ciwe celile?
40023020	Holeka mono yakwilahiza kuli cikumbicilo, yakwilahiza kuli cikumbicilo, na kuli vyose vyono viwicigwe mucanyha yayo.
40023021	Na mono yakwilahiza kuli Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakwilahiza kuli Nyumba yo Mulungu nha vivyo sunga kuli mono yekaye mugati yayo.
40023022	Na mono yakwilahiza kuli wulanga, yakwilahiza kuli ligoda lye nhojo lyo Mulungu, na kuli yuyo mono yekaye mwigoda lilyo.
40023023	Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Mono muwalifyaga iwanhu, zaka sunga na mu mahamha ge mhunjile swanu, ne binzali, ne zi nyanya, na akuno mukuzileka izinghani zimbaha zono zili mu Wulajilize, nha vyono iling'ani, lusungu no wihuwilo. Azi zo zali zinojeye anye muzikamise muno muno, hamba kuzisemwa azilya zinongozi.
40023024	Lanjenyi ta, anye mo walongola wabofu! Mono muwusaga lihazi mu malenga, ninga kuno ho mukumela ngamiya!
40023025	“Woyi he kuli'nye nyo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, mo wakoci! Anye mono mukwemaga kunze i cikombe ne bakuli, ninga mukuleka mugati mono mumemile ivinhu vyono mwavitujila mu nzila yo wuhizi no wubuguci.
40023026	Agwe go Mufalisayo mubofu! Wamule wukweme mugati ye cikombe, holeka na kunze yayo nako kowa kwelile.
40023027	“Woyi he, kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Anye, mono mwihwanile vitenjelo vibakwe swakala, vyono kunze vijelaga viswanu muno muno, ninga mugati, mbeka vimemile mafupa ga wono wafwa, ne takataka yose.
40023028	Alu sunga na nyenye nanye iwanhu wakumuwonenyi mudeha nha muli wanhu waswanu, kumbe mugati yenyu, mumemile wukoci no wavu wose.”
40023029	“Woyi he, anye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, mo wakoci! Hambi nha muzengaga ivitenjelo vye wawizi, no kuvihamba ivitenjelo vye wanhu waswanu.
40023030	Akuno mukutya, ‘Ase mhali cali ciwe cili womi mu vilo vye wakuku zetu, si cali cilumbanize nawo no kuwawulaga iwawizi.’
40023031	Na ku soko yiyo, holeka mukuhomelela vyono anye nanye mo weneco kumbe, muli wana wa wawo wono wawawulagaga i wawizi,
40023032	holeka alu muwufisilizaje mulimo wono wakondya kuwanza i wasogo zenyu!
40023033	Anye mo wana we zinzoka, zono zina sumu! Alo mosuma nhawule kuwilega u wuling'anizwe wo moto we Gehena?
40023034	Ku soko yiyo holeka ane nghumuletelenyi wawizi, ne wanhu we mahala, kanyhi ne wejizi, nanye mowawulaga no kuwatumbika wanji wa muli wene, na wanji mowakuna ne viboko mu matang'anilo genyu go wuhembelo, no kuwalondola londola mu matumbi gose.
40023035	Na mu nzila yiyo, u wuhoswe wose ho womuzizenyi, ku soko ye sakami yose ye wanhu waswanu, yono yamwajika mu muhangha. Heya ku wulawa ha wuwulagwe wa Zekaliya, u mwana wa Balakiya mono mwamuwulajila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu haciligati ya Hono Helile ne cikumbicilo.
40023036	Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u lulelo lulu lotuga wulipicizwe ku soko ye zinghani zizi.”
40023037	“Gwe Yelusalemi, Yelusalemi, mono wukuwa kuwawulaga iwawizi, sunga no kuwatowanga ne mabwe awalya wono watumwagwa u kwako. Kalinga kono nasakaga kuwakongholela iwanago kono kwangu, nha vyono nghuku yivikunyanjililaga viziyoziyo vyayo hasi ye mabawa gayo, ninga hamba si wenda yaye.
40023038	Ale, holeka i Nyumba yo Mulungu wako nagwe yokwikala 'tongo.
40023039	Heya, mbeka, nane nghumutyenyi vyono, si mosuma kumbona kanyhi, sunga mwi'daha lyono molotela, ‘Yo mumoti mono yakuziza Mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha.’ ”
40024001	Yesu yakalawila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na lono yabitaga, iwejizwa wakwe wakamuziza, wakamulajila imizenjele ye Nyumba yo Mulungu.
40024002	Yesu nayo yakawatya, “Heya ho baho, mosuma kugawona gaga gose! Ninga mbeka nghumutyenyi, hasina yibwe hamba limonga lyono lilasigala baha, mucanyha ye libwe liyagwe, langa i vinhu vyose vyologwiswa hasi.”
40024003	Nayo Yesu lono yali yekaye mwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni, i wejizwa wakwe wakamuziza cinyele, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ale ta, wucilonjelaje, i zinghani zizi mwene zolowa za nili uwuze wako nawo, wololajilwa na citanjilo cono cinha wule baho ha ndumilizo ye yinze.”
40024004	Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Mwilanjililaje muno muno, ho mulece kukongwa na munhu wo wose.
40024005	Hambi nha wanhu wenji wono wolokuza, nawo walalitumamila litagwa lyangu wakutya, ‘Ane yo nene Kilisito, nawo wolowajiliza wanhu wenji.’
40024006	Kanyhi molohulika muli zo wulugu, ne zinonga nonga zo wulugu, ninga anye mulece kwihwelela, hambi zizo, nha zinojeye zize, ninga ndumo yeneco yowa yikali si nawa.
40024007	Likungugo lyokwihoma ne likungugo liyagwe, no wutemi nawo wokwihoma no wutemi wuyagwe. Ne mazala nago gokuza ako na ako, sunga ne matulo ge yisi nago gokuza.
40024008	Na gaga gose gokwihwana nho wusungu du, wo kusawa mwana.
40024009	“Kanyhi nawo wolomulavyenyi ho mutamiswe no kuwulagwa. Ne makungugo gose kono galila, golomusulenyi anye, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.
40024010	Na mu vilo vivyo, wanhu wenji wolowuleka u wihuwilo wawo, wolokwigalucila weneco wose no kwisula.
40024011	Kanyhi mu vilo vivyo, wololawila iwawizi wenji wo wulambi, nawo wolowa kuwajiliza wanhu wenji.
40024012	Na vyono u wubi wowa kucila konjelezeka, ale nhavivyo no wendo we wanhu wenji wolopola.
40024013	Ninga u munhu wo wose mono kolokangalila sunga ko ku ndumo, yuyo langa yo kolopona.
40024014	Ninga i yinze yose, yoganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Wutemi wo Mulungu mu makungugo gose, lono i ndumo yikali si naza, ho wuwe wuhomelezi kuli wene.”
40024015	“Kanyhi moliwona, ‘lyono likucemwa.’ Iwifyo lyo wuhodanje, lililya lyono lyalongwa no muwizi Danyeli, lyolowa limile i hanhu hono helile.” (Ale baho, mono yakusoma, yezuce i nhunizo yayo.)
40024016	“Ale, mu vilo vivyo wono wali mu Yudiya, watizize mu matunda.
40024017	Nayo mono yali mucanyha ye litembe lye nyumba yakwe, yalece kutimila lukulu, ho yasole ivinhu vyakwe, vyono vili mu nyumba yakwe.
40024018	Na yulya mono yali ku mugunda yalece kuwuya ne nyuma, ho yasole icivwalo cakwe.
40024019	Woyi he, kuli we cidala wono wali magulu mazito, na wono wena iwana wagalika wono wakali kongha mu vilo vivyo.
40024020	Holeka mulombe ho wutize wenyu wulece kuwa mu vilo vye mbeho ye cinyuli, hamba mwizuwa lye Sabato!
40024021	Hambi mu vilo vivyo nha vyolowa vyo wugaye wuwaha muno muno, wono wukali si nejela hamba hadodo kuwulawa ku mwamulizo we yinze sunga nalu, hamba si wulejelela lukulu kanyhi.
40024022	Ne vilo vivyo hono vyali vilece kucepulwa, hali hawe hasina munhu wo wose mono yali yapone, ninga alu, ivilo vivyo vyocepulwa, ku soko ya awalya iwahagulwa.
40024023	“Holeka mu vilo vivyo, hono munhu yaze yamulonjelenyi yawe kutya, ‘Kilisito yali ahano,’ hamba lunji yatye, ‘Kilisito yali ahalya,’ mbeka mulece kumwihuwila.
40024024	Hambi nha wololawila walambi wenji, wono wokwicema weneco yo Kilisito, kanyhi ne wawizi wo wulambi. Nawo wawo wonoza mapoto mawaha, ne mezino gono gosuma kumwajilizenyi, na hono yisumice sunga ne wahagulwa wo Mulungu.
40024025	Ta hulicizenyi, ane nimulonjelenyi zinghani zizi lono zikali si nawa.
40024026	Holeka hono wamulonjelenyi wawe kutya, ‘Lanjenyi ta yali ku nyika,’ anye mulecele lukulu kubita kuko, na lunji womutyenyi, ‘Lanjenyi ta, yehundice kugati,’ anye mulecele lukulu kwihuwila,
40024027	hambi u wuze wo Mwana wo Munhu, nha wokwihwana nha vyono i limuli likuwa kumulika ku lubavu lwa kucilima sunga ko ku lubavu lwa kumwezi.
40024028	Na kanyhi kuko kono kowuli u muvimba, kuko ne zindi ko zokwikongholela.”
40024029	“Ninga u wugaye kolo wapuluta, lulo baho du ilizuwa lyolotukuwazwa, no mwezi nawo si wolosana ng'o, ne zinyelezi nazo zologwa ku wulawa kucanyha, ne vilungo vyo wulanga, vyolosinjiswa.
40024030	Ale baho langa, icitanjilo co Mwana wo Munhu, ho cilejelela ku wulanga, we makungugo gose ga kono'nze baho ho wololilila, nawo wolomuwona u Mwana wo Munhu, yakuziza mu mavunde mucanyha, akuno yena ne vilungo vinji hamonga no lukumyo luwaha.
40024031	Ne lizi yiwaha lye ndulele, lyolohulikwa, nayo kolowatuma i wamalayika wakwe, nawo wolowakonghola i wahagulwa wakwe ku wulawa ku zimbavu zose vyono yine ze yinze, kuwulawilila ku mudumo awu wo wulanga, sunga ko ku mudumo muyagwe.”
40024032	“Ale ta, mwiyijizizaje mu cihwanicizo co mukuyu, vyono, lono mukugawona manhambi gayo geza kutula no kulavya i mahamha gayo, ho baho ho mumanyilaga vyono i lifuku lyeza lili behi.
40024033	Ale, holeka na nyenye nanye, kolo mukuziwona zizi zikwitumwa, mumanye vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yeza yali behi muno muno.
40024034	Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u lulelo lulu si lopuluta yaye, lono zizi zose zikali nejela.
40024035	U wulanga ne yinze, heya vyopuluta, ninga i zinghani zangu, si zolopulutila lukulu.”
40024036	“Ninga muli ze lizuwa hambe cipango, zizo langa, hasina u munhu wo wose mono yamanyile vyono yowa nili, hamba ne wamalayika wa ku wulanga, hamba no Mwana wo Munhu, siyamanyile, langa yo Baba yali wene du mono yamanyile.
40024037	Langa yene, yolowa nha mu vilo vya Noha.
40024038	Ku soko mu vilo vivyo, lono lihwazi lye malenga lyali likali si naza iwanhu nha walizaga, kanyhi wang'wezaga, watolaga no kutolwa, sunga lono Noha yenjilila mu safina.
40024039	Nawo hamba si wamanya cono cokwijela ci cici, sunga mwizuwa lyono lyaziza ilihwazi lye malenga, likawasola wose. Ale, nhavivyo vyo yolowa, mwizuwa lyono yalaziza u Mwana wo Munhu.
40024040	Mwidaha lilyo, wanhu wejete wolowa ku mugunda, monga kolosolwa, na yunji kololekwa.
40024041	We ciyaya wejete wolowa wakusaga wuhemba he sajilo limonga, monga kolosolwa, na we kejete, kololekwa.
40024042	Holeka munojeye mwikalaje meso, hambi nha simumanyile ilizuwa lyono kokuziza u Muwaha wenyu.
40024043	Ninga mweze kuyikumbucila ne nghani yiyi, vyono hono munya kaya, yali yawe yamanyile ilipango lyono u muhizi kokuziza, mbeka yali yekale meso, hamba si yali yayileceleze kaya yakwe yibenwe.
40024044	Holeka nanye nhavivyo, mweze mwiwikanizize lukulu, hambi Mwana wo Munhu nha kokuziza mwi'pango lyono anye si mwihwesize yaye.”
40024045	Nayo Yesu, yakajendelela kulonga yakutya, “Alu nani 'mbi u mwitumami mwihuwilwa, kanyhi we mahala, mono muwaha wakwe komuwika, ho yawapele zindigwa iwanhu wakwe mucipango cono cinojeye?
40024046	Mbeka u mwitumami yuyo kowa mumoti, hono u muwaha wakwe kolo yakuza, yamwagane yakunoza nhavivyo.
40024047	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, vyono komuwika u mwitumami yuyo, yawe mulanjilizi we sawo yakwe yose.
40024048	Ninga hono yawe mwitumami mubi, nayo ho yatye mu nhumbula yakwe nhavi, ‘U Muwaha wangu nha yacela ku wuwuye,’
40024049	hanyuma ho yanze kuwatowanga i wetumami wayagwe kanyhi akuno yawe kulya no kung'wezana ne wagala wujimbi,
40024050	ninga u muwaha wakwe, kokuziza mwizuwa lyono siyalanjiliye yaye, hamba mu cipango cono si yamanyile.
40024051	Nayo kolo yakuza, kolomukunanga muno, hanyuma komuwika mwi'puga limonga ne wakoci. Na kuko kolowa cililo no wugwezula meno.”
40025001	“Lulo baho, u Wutemi wa ku wulanga wolokwihwananizwa ne wahinza yikumi, wono wasola zitala zawo, wakawa kubita kumuhinjiliza bwana halusi.
40025002	Muli wahinza wawo yikumi, mwali mowali wahinza wahano wono wali walele, na wahano wanji, wali we mahala.
40025003	Wawalya i wahinza wahano iwalele, wasola izitala zawo du, hamba kuteguliza ne ciwutwa ce mafuta ge tala.
40025004	Ninga awalya wahano we mahala, wasola ne ciwutwa ce mafuta ge tala, hamonga ne zitala zawo.
40025005	Alu, vyono bwana halusi yacela kuwuze, hodu iwahinza wawalya wose wakawa kusinzila, wakawa kugona nhongo.
40025006	Ale, mucilo mugati kukawa ne zozo yiwaha, Ale, ale! Bwana halusi kalawila, ale mubite mukamuhinjilize.
40025007	Ale du baho, wawalya i wahinza wose wakenuka, wakawa kwanza kuzinozeleza i zitala zawo.
40025008	Awalya iwalele, wakawatya awalya we mahala, ‘Nye wayetu, ta mucigawilaje nase mafuta genyu madodo, hambi izitala zetu nha zikuzima.’
40025009	Ninga awalya we mahala, wakawatya, ‘Sigocikwila ase na nyenye! Ciba hono mubite kwi duka mukegulile nyo weneco!’
40025010	Ale, baho kunyuma bwana halusi yakawa kuza, awalya i wahinza wono wali wewikanizize lukulu, wakawa kwinjila hamonga na bwana halusi mu nyumba ye halusi, no mulango wukawa kudindwa.
40025011	Hanyuma awalya i wahinza wanji nawo, ho wakawa kuza, wakamula kucema wakutya, ‘Muwaha, Muwaha, wucidigulile.’
40025012	Ninga u mwene yakawapitula yakatya, ‘Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono ane si nghumumanyenyi.’ ”
40025013	Baho Yesu yakawatya, “Holeka munojeye mwikalaje meso, hambi nha si mumanyile ilizuwa hamba cipango.”
40025014	“Yowa nha vyono u munhu yunji, mono yasaka kubita muhinzo wa kutali, mono yawacema iwetumami wakwe, yakawapela i zisawo zakwe wazikamise.
40025015	Nayo yakawapela munhu mu nghango ye mahala gakwe, u mulongozi yakamupela silinje elufu makumi mejete ne'hano, na we kejete yakamupela silinje elufu yikumi, nayo we kadatu, yakamupela silinje elufu yihano, hodu u mwene yakawa kutuluka.
40025016	Ale, yuyulya mono yapegwa silinje ze elufu makumi mejete ne'hano yakazinozeza wusuluza, sunga yakatuga cambuzi ca silinje zinji elufu makumi mejete ne'hano.
40025017	Ayulya nayo nha vivilya mono yapegwa silinje elufu yikumi, nayo yakatuga cambuzi ca silinje elufu yikumi.
40025018	Ninga ayulya mono yapegwa silinje elufu yihano, mwene yabita yakahimba yikombo mu muhangha, yakayifuciza i sawo yo muwaha wakwe.
40025019	“Vyaza kupuluta vilo vicefu, u muwaha yuyulya yakawuya, yakawa kwanza kulanga liwalo lye zipesa zakwe u witumamilwe wayo sunga no wutuje wayo.
40025020	Ale yuyulya u mwitumami mono yapegwa silinje ze elufu makumi mejete ne'hano, yakaza akuno yaleteleze hamonga na azilya ze elufu makumi mejete ne'hano zono yazituga ze cambuzi, yakamutya, ‘Muwaha, wamhela silinje makumi mejete ne'hano du, ninga wulanje, ahano nina zinji kanyhi elufu makumi mejete ne'hano ze cambuzi cono natuga.’
40025021	U Muwaha wakwe nayo yakamutya, ‘Ale viswanu, wuli mwitumami muswanu, kanyhi wuli mwihuwilwa. Wali mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo, ninga alu nokupela zimbaha kuciza. Ale wuze wusangalalane hamonga no muwaha wako.’
40025022	Ayulya nayo mwitumami mono yapegwa silinje elufu yikumi, yakaza, nayo yakalavyaniza silinje zinji elufu yikumi ze cambuzi cono yatuga nayo, yakatya, ‘Muwaha, ane wamhela silinje elufu yikumi, lanje azino zinji elufu yikumi ze cambuzi cono natuga.’
40025023	U Muwaha wakwe yakamutya, ‘Ale viswanu, wuli mwitumami muswanu kanyhi mwihuwilwa. Wali mwihuwilwa muli nghani ndodo du, alu nokupela i zimbaha zono zicizize zizi. Ale wuze wusangalalane hamonga no muwaha wako.’
40025024	Ninga ayulya mono yapegwa silinje elufu yihano, nayo yakaza yakatya, ‘Muwaha, ane manyile vyono agwe wuli munhu mukamu, agwe kududulaga hono si wuhadice, kanyhi, kukunyanjilaga hono si wamiza.
40025025	Holeka ane nghawa kogopa, nghawa kuzihundika i zipesa zako mu muhangha. Holeka alu wusole sawo yako.’
40025026	Nayo u Muwaha wakwe yakamupitula yakamutya, ‘Lanje ta 'gwe waco go mwitumami mubi kanyhi mudoba! Wali wumanyile vyono ane ndudulaga hono si hadice, kanyhi na vyono nghongholaga hono si namiza mbeyu.
40025027	Holeka lu, yali yikunojeye wuyiwice sawo yangu ku benki, nane nali sole sawo yangu hamonga ne cambuzi cayo.
40025028	Holeka mumubokaje pesa zizo, mumupele ayulya mono yena silinje elufu makumi mejete ne'hano.
40025029	Hambi mono yena cinji nha kopegwa no konjelezwa kuciza. Ninga ayulya mono yasina cinji, nha kosolelwa sunga na cico cono yena naco.
40025030	No mwitumami yuyu mono yasina cambuzi, mumutagaje ku citi ca kunze! Kuko kolwa kocili cililo no wugwezula meno.’ ”
40025031	“Mu cipango cono kolokuziza u Mwana wo Munhu mu lukumyo lwakwe, yena hamonga ne wamalayika wakwe, baho ho yalekala mwi'goda lyakwe lye nhojo, lyo lukumyo.
40025032	Ne makungugo gose golokwikongholela hali mwene, nayo kolowatemanula wanhu, nha vyono u mudimi kazitemanulaga zingholo lwayo, ne zimhene lwayo.
40025033	Nayo koziwika zingholo ku lubavu lo muwoko wakwe wo kulume, ne zimhene ku lubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu.
40025034	Hanyuma u mutemi ho kowalonjela awalya wono wali ku lubavu lo muwoko wakwe wo kulume yakutya, ‘Muze anye mono mwalugutizwa na Baba, mubocele u Wutemi wono mwawikanizizwa ku wulawa wuwumbwe we yinze.
40025035	Hambi nha nali ndabuce, nanye mukamhela ndigwa, nali nghaluce, nanye mukamhela malenga, nali mujenzi, ninga anye mukambocela,
40025036	nali sawuce, anye mukamvwika, kanyhi nali nhamigwe, mukaza kunanga, nali nili mu jela, nanye mukaza kunamusa.’
40025037	Baho, nawo wawo iwanhu waswanu, womupitula u mutemi, wawe kutya, ‘Alu Muwaha, ho ha nili, lono cakuwona agwe wudabuce, nase cikakulisa ndigwa, hamba nili lono wali wukaluce nase cikakung'wesa malenga?
40025038	Na nili lono cakuwona agwe wuli mujenzi, nase cikakubocela, hamba wusina myenda, nase cikakuvwika?
40025039	Hamba nili lono cakuwona wutamigwe, hamba lunji wuli mu jela, nase cikaza kukulanga?’
40025040	Nayo u Mutemi kowapitula yawe kutya, ‘Mbeka nghumutyenyi, vyono co cose cono mwamutendela yumonga wa muli wawa i wandugu zangu wadodo, ale, mwanhendela nene.’
40025041	“Ale, baho ho kowalonjela na awalya wono wali ku lubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu yawe kutya, ‘Ale, mbucilenyi anye mono mwalijitwa! Bitenyi mu moto we cibitilila wono wawicilwa Setani ne wamalayika wakwe.
40025042	Hambi nha nali ndabuce hamba si mwamhela ndigwa, nali nghaluce, hamba si mwamhela malenga.
40025043	Nali mujenzi, hamba si mwambocela, nali nhamigwe, kanyhi nali mu jela, ninga hamba si mwaza kunanga.’
40025044	“Baho nawo womupitula wawe kutya, ‘Muwaha, alu lo lwa nili lono cikakuwona wudabuce, kanyhi wina nyhilu, kanyhi nili lono wali mujenzi hamba wusawuce, na lono wali wutamigwe, hamba wuli mu jela, nase si caza kukwitumamila?’
40025045	Nayo kowapitula yawe kutya, ‘Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono bahalya du lono mwalemela kumutendela nghani zizi yunji wo wose wa muli wawa i wadodo wangu, ale, mwalema kunhendela nene.’
40025046	Holeka iwanhu wawa, wolotegulwa ku wulipicizwe we cibitilila, ninga awalya waswanu, awo wopegwa u wumi we cibitilila.”
40026001	Nayo Yesu yaza kukondya kuzilonga zizo zose, yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe, yakawatya,
40026002	“Mumanyile vyono, vilawa vyeza kupuluta vilo vyejete cowa mwizuwa lye sikukuu ya Pasaka, no Mwana wo Munhu kolavywa ho yatumbikwe mu musalaba.”
40026003	Na mwi'pango lilyo i Wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wanyamhala we wanhu, waketang'anila hamonga mwi'kumbo lya Kayafa, Mukohani Muwaha.
40026004	Wakalongana weneco wose, wakulondola nzila yo kumwibatila Yesu ko wusugu, ho wamuwulaje.
40026005	Ninga hamba nha vivyo, si wakasaka inghani yiyo ho yitumwe mwi'pango lye Sikukuu, ho halece kuwa wuma muli wanhu.
40026006	Nayo Yesu lono yali yali kuko ku Betaniya, mu nyumba ya Simoni mono kacemwaga Mukoma,
40026007	hakawa na mucekulu yunji mono yali yena supa ye mafuta ge mhunjile swanu muno go wuguzi wukamu, yakamuziza Yesu lono yali yekaye ha meza ha wulye we zindigwa, yakamujidila mu mutwe gago i mafuta maswanu.
40026008	Nawo i wejizwa wakwe waza kuziwona zizo, wakasimba muno wakatya, “Alu wambuce wose wuwu wa cici?”
40026009	Imafuta gaga, gali gasume kuguzwa ko wuguzi wuwaha, ne waciwa wapegwe izipesa zizo.
40026010	Yesu yakagamanya i mahweso gawo, holeka yakawatya, “Alu nhawule mukumugaza u mucekulu yuyu? Mwene kanyitumamila mulimo muswanu muno muno.
40026011	Iwaciwa mwina nawo nhondo zose, ninga ane si nowa hamonga nanye nhondo zose.
40026012	U mucekulu ayu, kanjidila mafuta, so wuwikanizwe we maziko gangu.
40026013	Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono ho hose mono yinze yiyino, hono lowa kuganulwa u Luganuzi Luswanu, ilitumo lilino lyono yetumile u mucekulu yuyuno, lyowa kulongwa so kumukumbucila mwene.”
40026014	Hanyuma ayulya Yuda Isikaliyota muyagwe na awalya we likumi na wejete, yakabita kuli Wakohani wawaha,
40026015	yakawawuza yakutya, “Alu momhela cinhuci ho nimukombolelenyi Yesu?” Nawo wakamuwalila pesa makumi madatu,
40026016	hodu mwene Yuda kulawa lulo baho, yakawa yakulondola icilejeho co kumugaluka Yesu.
40026017	Na mwizuwa lilongozi, lono lyali likali lizuwa lye sikukuu ye mikate yono siyisasize, iwejizwa wakwe, wakamubitila Yesu, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alo wukusaka cikutenjele hanhuci i sikukuu ye Pasaka?”
40026018	Nayo yakawapitula yakawatya, “Mubite mwinjile mwi'kaya, ku kaya ya nhendu, mukamutye, Mwijizi yakutya, icipango cangu cafika, holeka ane hamonga ne wejizwa wangu, coyinozeza sikukuu ye Pasaka mu kaya yako.”
40026019	Nawo i wejizwa wakwe, wakanoza nha vyono Yesu yawalajiliza, wakayitenga i ndigwa ye Pasaka.
40026020	Na lono yali yeza kuwa cinyamihe, Yesu yakekala ha meza, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe yikumi na wejete.
40026021	Na lono walizaga, Yesu yakawatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u muyenyu yunji muli nyenye, kongaluka.”
40026022	Iwejizwa wakakalala muno muno, wakawa kwanza kuwuza yumonga yumonga wakutya “Ati, Muwaha, wukwihwesa yowa nene?”
40026023	Ninga Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Yuyo mono cililizane nhonje hamonga na nene mu ciya ce mboga, ale yo yuyo mono kongaluka.
40026024	Heya u Mwana wo Munhu yakubita, nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga, ninga woyi he, kuli munhu yuyo, yali yiwe yili ciba hono yali yalece kulelwa.”
40026025	Ale, nayo Yuda yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, alo wukwihwesa kowa nene?” Nayo Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Agwe langa kulonga.”
40026026	Na lono walizaga, Yesu yakawusola mukate, yakalumba, yakawubegula, yakawapela iwejizwa wakwe akuno yakutya, “Ale solenyi mulye, awu wo muwili wangu.”
40026027	Hanyuma kanyhi, yakasola cikombe, yakamulumba u Mulungu, yakawapela, akuno yakutya, “Ale, mung'we wose,
40026028	hambi ayi nha yo sakami yangu yono yikukangaza i cilagane co Mulungu, isakami yono yikwitika ku soko yo kuwanenela i wanhu wubi wawo.
40026029	Ane nghumulonjelenyi nha vyono si nong'wela lukulu divayi ya zabibu, sunga mwi'zuwa alilya lyono nilang'wela divayi 'mhya hamonga nanye mu Wutemi wa Baba.”
40026030	Wali weza kukondya kwimba lwimbo, wakawa kutuluka wakawa kubita ku kwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni.
40026031	Hanyuma Yesu yakawatya, “Icilo cici ce zuwalili, anye wose motiza mondeka nili wene, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, ‘Nomutowa u mudimi, Nazo izingholo zokwiyagala.’
40026032	Ninga kolo nakondya kuzuka, nomulongolelenyi ku Galilaya.”
40026033	Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Hamba wose wawe na mahwele ku soko yako, no kutiza, no kukuleka, ninga ane hamba si nokulecela lukulu.”
40026034	Yesu yakamutya “Petelo, ane nghukulonjela mbeka, vyono i cilo ce zuwalili du, lono i nzogolo yikali nalila, agwe kowa wanghana kali kadatu.”
40026035	Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Hamba hono yiwe yinojeye nifwe hamonga nagwe, ane langa, hamba si nokulecela lukulu.” Ne wejizwa awalya wanji wose, nawo wakalonga nhavivyo.
40026036	Hanyuma Yesu yakawa kubita nawo sunga ku busitani ya Getisemane, yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe yakatya, “Ale mwikalaje bahano, nane mbite hamwande hadodo nghalombe.”
40026037	Yakamusola Petelo hamonga ne wana wejete wa Zebedayo, yakawa kwanza kuwona wuzinguce hamonga no wugazice mu nhumbula yakwe.
40026038	Yakawalonjela yakawatya, “Ane nina wukalale wuwaha mu nhumbula yangu, behi no kufwa. Holeka mwikalaje baha meso hamonga nane.”
40026039	Hanyuma yakatela tela hamwande hadodo, yakagwa funama, yakalomba, yakutya, “Gwe Baba, hono yiwe yisumice, icikombe cicino co wusungu cimhulutaje, ninga yilece kuwa nha vyono nyendile nene, ng'o, langa yiwe nha vyono wendile du gwegwe.”
40026040	Yakawabitila i wejizwa wakwe, kumbe, yakawagana wagona. Yesu yakawa kumutya Petelo, “Alu hongo si musumile kwikala meso hamonga nane hamba saa monga du bwete?
40026041	Ale mwikalaje meso akuno mukulomba ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe. Mbeka nhumbula yendile ninga muwili wusoceye.”
40026042	Yakabita kanyhi lwe kejete, yakalomba yakutya, “Baba, hono yiwe si yisumice icikombe cicino co wusungu cimhulute ndece kucig'wa, ale, hodu, u wuhile wako witumwe.”
40026043	Yakawabitila iwejizwa wakwe, yakawagana kanyhi wagona, hambi i meso gawo nha gali gebatwe na nhongo.
40026044	Hodu, yakawa kuwaleka, yakabita kanyhi, kulomba lwe kadatu, yakulonga izinghani zizilya du.
40026045	Hanyuma yakawabitila wawalya wejizwa yakawatya, “Wulenyi, alu mukali mugonile du no kuceha? Lanjenyi ta! Alu icipango ceneco langa ho cafika, no Mwana wo Munhu kolavywa kuli i wanhu wanyo wubi.
40026046	Holeka alu mwinukaje cibite. Lanjenyi ta, ayulya mono kongaluka yalawila.”
40026047	Nayo Yesu lono yali yakali kulonga nawo, hobaho nayo Yuda yakawa kuza u muyagwe na awalya we likumi na wejete. Wakaza wanhu wenji wali hamonga nayo, nawo wali wena, ne mimaje ne zinhumbi, wono watumwa kulawa kuli wakohani wawaha ne wanyamhala we wanhu.
40026048	Nayo yuyo mono yasakaga kumugaluka Yesu, yali yakondya kuwapela icitanjilo yakutya, “Yuyo mono nomunonela, ale, yo yuyo, yo mumwibataje.”
40026049	Hobaho Yuda yakamusejelela Yesu, yakamutya, “Lamucenyi, Mwijizi!” Hanyuma yakawa kumunonela.
40026050	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Gwe muyangu, witumaje du cono wuzize kwituma.” Baho i wanhu wawalya nawo, wakawa kuza wakawa kumwibata Yesu.
40026051	Yumonga na'walya wono wali wali hamonga na Yesu, yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakawusomola mumaje wakwe, yakamutowa u mwitumami wo Mukohani Muwaha, yakamubuha likutu.
40026052	Baho Yesu yakamulonjela yakutya, “Leka ta, wugomolaje u mumaje hanhu hayo, hambi muli wose mono yakwitumamila mumaje nha kolofwa nayo na mumaje.
40026053	Wulenyi, si mumanyile vyono ndahile kumulomba Baba, nayo kosuma kundetela lwa kamonga, mapuga yikumi na mejete ge wamalayika?
40026054	Ninga alu, ho goficilicila nhawule i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gono gakutya, nhavivyo vyo yinojeye yiwe?”
40026055	Lo lulo lulo, Yesu yakawa kulilonjela ilipuga lye wanhu wono wazaga ho wamwibate, yakawatya, “Alu mwene ho muza kunyibata akuno mwina ne mimaje ne zinhumbi, kotya ane nha nili muhizi? Alu ane, nha nhondo zose nali kuwezaga hamonga nanye mu Nyumba yo Mulungu nghwijiza, nanye kumbe hamba si mwanyibata!
40026056	Ninga azi zose ziwa nhavivi, ho i Mandiko ge wawizi gaficilicile.” Hanyuma iwejizwa wakwe wose wakamuleka wakatiza.
40026057	Hobaho, iwanhu wawalya wono wamwibata Yesu, wakamutegula sunga ku kaya ya Kayafa, Mukohani Muwaha, kuko kono wali wekongholeye i wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wanyamhala.
40026058	Nayo Petelo yakawa yakumutyatya Yesu yakujendela kutali, sunga vikenjilana mwi'kumbo lyo Mukohani Muwaha, nayo yakenjilana hamonga ne walindilizi, ho yasume kuziwona zose vyono zowa zinha.
40026059	Hodu, i Wakohani wawaha ne libalaza lyose, wakalondola wuhomelezi wo wulambi kuli Yesu, ho wamuwulaje,
40026060	ninga hamba nha vivyo, si wasuma kuwutuga wuhomelezi wo wose, hamba yiwe wakaza wahomelezi wenji wo wulambi. Ha ndumilizo wakawa kuza wahomelezi wejete,
40026061	wono watya, “U munhu ayu, yalonga yakatya, ati, ‘Ane nosuma kuyimwagula i Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuyizenga kanyhi mu vilo vidatu du.’ ”
40026062	Hobaho u Mukohani Muwaha yakema yakamuwuza Yesu yakutya, “Ati 'gwe, si wukupitula hamba nghani hongo? Alu i wanhu wawa wakuhomelela nghanici kuli'gwe?”
40026063	Ninga Yesu yakanyamala twii du. Nayo u Mukohani Muwaha yakamutya, “Nghukwilahiza kuli u Mulungu mumi, wucilonjelaje hono yo gwegwe Kilisito u Mwana wo Mulungu!”
40026064	Yesu yakamutya, “Nha kulonga gwegwe! Ninga nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono kulawa lulu momuwona u Mwana wo Munhu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu u Mudaha vyose, yakuziza mu mavunde go wulanga.”
40026065	Baho nayo Mukohani Muwaha yakavidemulanga i vivwalo vyakwe akuno yakutya, “Katovula! Alu cina sokoci kanyhi yo kusaka wahomelezi? Nha muhulika nyo weneco i zinhovu zakwe.
40026066	Alu anye, mukuwona nhawule?”
40026067	Iwene wakapitula wakatya, “Yimunojeye yafwe!”
40026068	Hanyuma wakawa kumufunyila mate mu wusu wakwe, kanyhi wakamutowa ne makofi. Na wanji wamutowaga makofi, akuno wakulonga wakutya, “Ale ta wucitambulilaje, agwe nha wuli muwizi, agwe Kilisito, mono yakutowile lu nani?”
40026069	Nayo Petelo yali yekaye hadeha mwi'kumbo. Hobaho u mwitumami yunji we cicekulu, yakamubitila, yakamutya, “Agwe nagwe wali wuli hamonga na Yesu wa ku Galilaya.”
40026070	Nayo Petelo yakakana ha mwande ya wose yakutya, “Ane si niyimanyile hamba hadodo yono wukuyilonga.”
40026071	Nayo Petelo lono yalawilaga ha mulango, u mwitumami yunji kanyhi we cicekulu yakamuwona, nayo yakawalonjela awalya wono wali wali baho, yakawatya, “U munhu ayu nye, yali yali hamonga na Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.”
40026072	Nayo Petelo yakakana kanyhi, akuno yakwilahiza, yakutya, “Ane si nimumanyile u munhu yuyu ye!”
40026073	Hanyuma kanyhi hadodo iwanhu wono wali wali baho, wakamubitila Petelo, wakamutya, “Ninga mbeka nagwe wuli muyagwe na wawo, ku soko imilonjele yako yikukulajila.”
40026074	Ale baho nhondo, Petelo yakanza kwilijita no kwilahiza, yakutya, “Ane si nimumanyile u munhu yuyo ye.” Hobaho nayo inzogolo nhondo yikawa kulila.
40026075	Nayo Petelo, hobaho yakazikumbucila izinghani zono yalonjelwa na Yesu yakumutya, “Lono inzogolo yikali nalila, agwe Petelo kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu.” Hobaho yakalawila kunze yakalila muno muno.
40027001	Wali weza kwela, hakali mitondo muno muno, i wakohani wawaha wose, hamonga ne wanyamhala we wanhu, wakawumba mahala kuli Yesu ho wamuwulaje.
40027002	Wakamuwopa ne manyolo wakamusola, wakamutegula kuli Pilato u muwaha we yisi.
40027003	Ale, baho Yuda mono yamugaluka Yesu, yaza kuwona vyono Yesu yakondya kuling'anizwa, hodu, yakanena, yakawagomolela i Wakohani wawaha, zizilya zipesa makumi madatu.
40027004	Yakawa kuwalonjela yakutya, “Nye, ane sutya, vyono nimulavizye u munhu mono yasina yisutya, ho yawulagwe.” Ninga iwene wakamutya, “Ale ko kwako, alu ase cina nghanici?”
40027005	Nayo Yuda hodu, yakawa kuzigumila zizilya zipesa hasi mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawa kulawila kunze, yakawa kubita kwinyonga.
40027006	Nawo i wakohani wawaha, wakazisola zipesa zizilya, wakatya, “Si viswanu yaye ziwikwe mu ciwutwa ce zisawo ze Nyumba yo Mulungu, ku soko vyono pesa za cifo ca Sakami.”
40027007	Holeka wakelumbaniza, wakagula mugunda wo muwumbi, ho hawe hanhu ha wuziko we wajenzi.
40027008	Holeka ku soko yiyo u mugunda wuwo, wukucemwa, mugunda we sakami.
40027009	Izinghani zo muwizi Yelemiya, vyo zaficilicila nhavivyo, zono yatya, “Wakasola i zipesa makumi madatu, i cifo ca ayulya mono i wanji wa mu wana wa Isilayeli wamuwajila.
40027010	Nazo wakazigula mugunda wo muwumbi, nha vyono yalajiliza u Muwaha.”
40027011	Yesu yakategulwa hali muwaha we yisi. Hodu, u muwaha we yisi nayo, yakawa kumuwuza yakutya, “Alo yo gwegwe go Mutemi we Wayahudi?” Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Nha kulonga gwegwe.”
40027012	Ninga i wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wanyamhala, lono wamusitakaga, u mwene Yesu, hamba si yapitula cinji co cose.
40027013	Holeka Pilato yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Alo ho si wukuhulika i masitaka gago gose, gono wakukusitaka?”
40027014	Ninga u mwene Yesu si yapitula nghani hamba monga bwete, sunga yuyo u muwaha we yisi yakezina muno muno.
40027015	U muwaha we yisi yali yazoweye mwipango lye sikukuu ye Pasaka, kuwawopolela i Wayahudi mufungwa monga mono wamusakaga.
40027016	Na mwidaha lilyo, kwali koyuli mufungwa yumonga litagwa lyakwe yali Balaba.
40027017	Holeka iwanhu wali weza kwikongholela hamonga, Pilato yakawawuza, yakatya, “Alu mukusaka nimuwopolelenyi wa hayi, muli wawa iwejete, Balaba, hamba Yesu mono kacemwaga Kilisito?”
40027018	Nayo yalongaga nhavivyo ku soko na mweneco yali yamanyile vyono wamuleta Yesu kuli mwene ku soko yo wivu wawo du.
40027019	Nayo Pilato lono yali yekala mwigoda lyakwe lyo wuling'anizi u mugolece wakwe yakamutegulila nghani, yakutya, “Wayiko, wulecele lukulu kwiyinjiza mu zinghani zo munhu yuyu muswanu, ku soko no muyago, izuwali ngazika muno muno mu ndoto, ku soko yakwe.”
40027020	Ninga i wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wanyamhala, wakawalonjela iwanhu, wamusace Balaba yo yawopolelwe, ninga Yesu yawulagwe.
40027021	Nayo u muwaha we yisi, yakawawuza yakatya, “Alu wa hayi, muli wawa i wejete, mono mukusaka nimuwopolele?” Nawo wakatya “Balaba.”
40027022	Nayo Pilato yakawatya, “Alu ho nimunoze nhawule Yesu mono kacemwaga Kilisito?” Wose wakatya, “Yatumbikwe mu musalaba!”
40027023	Pilato yakawawuza yakutya, “Ku sokoci?” Alo cono yasutizye ci cici? Ninga iwene ho wakacila kuzoza muno muno, wakutya, “Yatumbikwe mu Musalaba!”
40027024	Hodu nayo Pilato yaza kumanya vyono si kosuma cinji, na vyono mazozo gali geza kwanza, hodu u mwene yakasola malenga, yakezuguza miwoko yakwe hali wanhu wose akuno yakutya, “Ane ta, sina nghani yo yose kuli ze lifwa lyo munhu yuyu, yo nghani yenyu nyenye nyo weneco.”
40027025	Nawo iwanhu wose wakatya, “Isakami yakwe yiweze muli sese, hamonga ne wana wetu!”
40027026	Hodu, Pilato yakawa kuwawopolela Balaba, kulawa mu jela, ninga yakawa kumulavya Yesu ho yatumbikwe mu musalaba.
40027027	Hanyuma iwasilikale wo muwaha we yisi, wakamwinjiza Yesu mwi'kulu, wakamwikongholela ciwumbi cose.
40027028	Baho wakamuwopola i vivwalo vyakwe, wakamuvwika musweko we liwala lyo lugandu,
40027029	wakatawa cipombelo ce mamivya, wakamuvwika mu mutwe, wakamwibatiza ne lidete mu muwoko wakwe wo kulume. Wakafugama ha mwande yakwe, akuno wakumuzwajiza wakutya, “Lamucenyi go Mutemi we Wayahudi!”
40027030	Wakamufunyila mate, wakalisola lidete lililya, wakamutowela mu mutwe wakwe.
40027031	Wali weza kukondya kumuzwajiza, hodu wakawa kumuwopola wuwulya musweko, wakamuvwika kanyhi myenda yakwe, wakawa kumutegula wakamutumbice mu musalaba.
40027032	Nawo lono wabitaga wakamwagana munhu yunji mono yakucemwa Simoni munya ku Kilene, wakamudindimiza yuyo ho yawudinghule u musalaba wa Yesu.
40027033	Nawo wali weza kufika i hanhu hono hakucemwa Goligota, nhunizo yayo, “Ihanhu he cipala co mutwe.”
40027034	Wakamupela Yesu divayi yono yihangahanjile ne hungwi ho yang'we. Ninga mwene Yesu yaza yijeza du, yakalema kuying'wa.
40027035	Wakamutumbika mu musalaba, hanyuma wakagawana myenda yakwe, mu nzila yo kuyitowela kula.
40027036	Wakekala baho akuno wakumudima.
40027037	Na hacanyha yo mutwe wakwe, wakawika u wusitakwe wakwe wono wali wandicigwe nhavi, “Ayu yo Yesu u Mutemi we Wayahudi.”
40027038	Ne wahizi wejete, nawo wakatumbikanwa hamonga nayo, yumonga ku lubavu lwakwe lo kulume, no muyagwe kulubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu.
40027039	Ne wanhu wono wapulutaga baho, wakawa wakuzugunza i mitwe yawo, akuno wakutya,
40027040	“Alu 'gwe! Si watezaga vyono kosuma kuyimwagula i Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuyizenga kanyhi mu vilo vidatu du? Ale ta, luno wiponyaje go mweneco. Hono agwe wuli Mwana wo Mulungu, ale wutime mu musalaba!”
40027041	Nha vivilya sunga i Wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, ne wanyamhala, wose wakamuzwajiza wakutya.
40027042	“He! Yawaponyaga wanji ninga alu kuwiponya mweneco, hamba si yakusuma yaye! Ati u mwene yo mutemi we Wayahudi! Heya, yatime le, mu musalaba, nase ho cimwihuwile.
40027043	Yali yamwitumbiye u Mulungu, akuno yakutya, ati u mwene yo Mwana wo Mulungu, ale ta, u Mulungu yamuponyaje, hono yawe yendezwe nayo.”
40027044	Sunga na awalya wono wali watumbikanwe hamonga nayo, wakamuliganga.
40027045	Na mu wulawa mu saa sita mu misi, sunga mu saa tisa, yisi yose yikawa mu wutitu.
40027046	Na mu saa tisa, Yesu yakalila ne lizi yiwaha, yakatya, “Eli, Eli, lamasabakatani?” Inhunizo yayo, wo wutya, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, so cici wukundeka?”
40027047	Ninga wawalya wono wali wemile behi na baho, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakatya, “Nye, yakumucema Eliya.”
40027048	Yunji muyawo yakamangha, yakasola sifongo, yakalizabika mu siki, yakalisomeceza mwidete, yakamupela ho yang'we.
40027049	Iwanji wakatya, “Ta mulece ciwone hono Eliya kokuza yamuponye.”
40027050	Baho, Yesu yakalila kanyhi kwe lizi yiwaha muno muno, na hobaho hodu yakawa kufwa.
40027051	Hobaho du nalyo i libupa lyo mwenda lya mu Nyumba yo Mulungu likawa kudemuka hejete, kuwulawilila kucanyha sunga ko kusika yayo, ne yisi yikacicima, ne mabwe gakatulika,
40027052	ne vitenjelo vikagubuka, sunga ne wanhu wenji wo Mulungu wono wali wafwiza, wakazukulwa,
40027053	nawo lono wali wazuka, wakalawila mu vitenjelo, wakenjila mwi'kaya lyono lyelile, wakejela kuli wanhu wenji.
40027054	Hodu, yuyulya u muwaha we wasilikale igana, sunga na wawalya wono wamudimaga Yesu, wali weza kuwona u wucicime we yisi, sunga na zose zono zejela, Oo! Wakogopa muno muno, wakatya, “Mbeka u munhu ayu, yali Mwana wo Mulungu.”
40027055	Na baho hali howali wacekulu wenji wono walanjililaga, akuno wemile kutali. Wawo wo wawalya wono wamutyatya Yesu ku wulawilila ku Galilaya, akuno wakumwitumamila.
40027056	Na muli wawo, mwali moyuli na Malyamu Magadalena, na Malyamu u nyina wa Yakobo na Yusufu hamonga no nyina we wana wa Zebedayo.
40027057	Yaza kuwa cinyamihe, yakaza munhu yunji mugoli, munya Alimataya, ilitagwa lyakwe, Yusufu. Nayo yali nhavivilya mwijizwa wa Yesu.
40027058	Yuyo, yakamubitila Pilato, yakalomba yapegwe u muwili wa Yesu. Nayo Pilato yakalajiliza, wamupele.
40027059	Nayo Yusufu, yakawusola u muwili wuwulya, yakawupalinjiza mu sanda swanu ye bafuta,
40027060	yakawuwika mu citenjelo cakwe i cipya, cono yali yacitulile mwi'talawe. Hanyuma, yakabidusiza libwe yiwaha, ha mulango we citenjelo, hodu yakawa kubita.
40027061	Malyamu Magadalena na ayulya Malyamu yunji, wali wekaye baho vidomile ne citenjelo.
40027062	Imitondo yaco, nha cinji ilizuwa lyono lyali vityatyizye ne lizuwa lyo Wiwikanize, i wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne Wafalisayo, wamubitila Pilato,
40027063	wakamutya, “Gwe muwaha, cikumbuciye vyono ayulya u mukonji yalonga lono yakali mumi vyono ati, ‘Vilaza kupuluta vilo vidatu, nozuka kanyhi.’
40027064	Holeka wulajilize i citenjelo cidimwe muno, sunga mwizuwa lye kadatu, iwejizwa wakwe walece kumuhiza, na hanyuma wawe kuwalonjela wanhu, nha vyono kazuka. No wulambi wuwuno we ndumilizo, nhondo wowa wubi muno muno si nha awulya u wulongozi.”
40027065	Nayo Pilato yakawatya, “Ale, nha mwina nawo i walindilizi, holeka mubite mukacilindilize, munghango nha vyono mumanyile.”
40027066	Nawo wakabita, wakacilindiliza citenjelo, wakaliwicila ilibwe lya ha mulango citanjilo, wakamuwika no musilikale u mulindilizi.
40028001	Ilizuwa lye Sabato lyaza kupuluta, na lono lizuwa lyali behi no kusosomoka mwizuwa lye Jumapili, Malyamu Magadalena hamonga na Malyamu ayulya yunji, wakabita ku cilanga citenjelo.
40028002	No wucicime we yisi wukaza kwa nhinicizo muno, na Malayika wo Muwaha yakatima ku wulawa ku wulanga, yakaliwusa i libwe lililya, nayo yakalikalila mucanyha yayo.
40028003	No wulangwe wakwe, yejelaga yenha limuli, ne vivwalo vyakwe, vyali vizelu swee, kotya seluji.
40028004	Ne walindilizi we citenjelo wakacicima muno so woga wuwaha, wakawa kotya nha wafwiye.
40028005	Ninga Malayika yuyulya yakawatya i wacekulu wawalya, “Anye, mulece kogopa! Ane manyile vyono anye mukumulondola Yesu, mono yatumbikwa mu musalaba.
40028006	Ninga alu, yali hasina ahano, hambi nha kazuka nha vyono yalonga mweneco. Ale, muze muhawone ihanhu hono wali wamuwicile.
40028007	Holeka alu, mubite mbela mbela, mukawalonjele iwejizwa wakwe, vyono yazuka muli wafu, sunga na lulu, komulongolelenyi ku Galilaya, na kuko ko momuwonela. Ale, ane nakondya kumulonjelenyi.”
