40028008	I wacekulu wawo, nawo akuno wena no woga, hamonga ne nyemo mbaha, wakawuka mbela mbela ha citenjelo, wakamangha, wakabita wakawalonjela i wejizwa wakwe.
40028009	Lulo du baho Yesu yakawa kwitang'anila nawo. Nayo yakawalamusa, yakawatya, “Lamucenyi.” Nawo i wacekulu wawo, wakamubitila, wakafugama hali mwene, wakayibata imigulu yakwe.
40028010	Nayo Yesu yakawalonjela yakawatya, “Ale, mulece kogopa! Ninga aluno mubite mukawalonjele wandugu zangu, vyono wabite ku Galilaya, nawo ko wombonela kuko.”
40028011	Iwacekulu wawalya nawo lono wabitaga, i walindilizi we citenjelo wanji nawo, wakabita kwi'kaya, wakawaloloseza i wakohani wawaha, muli zose zono zijeye.
40028012	Wakawa kwikonghola hamonga ne wanyamhala, wakelumbaniza wakawa kuwapela wawalya wasilikale mapesa menji muno muno,
40028013	akuno wakuwatya, “Anye nhondo mutye nhavi, ‘Iwejizwa wakwe waza ne cilo ase lono cali cigonile, wawa kumuhiza.’
40028014	Na hono u muwaha we yisi yayimanye inghani yiyi, ase colongana nayo du, sunga cimanye vyono anye si motuga wugazwe.”
40028015	Nawo i walindilizi wawo wakazibocela i zipesa zizilya, wakanoza nha vyono wafundwa. Ne nghani yiyo, yikatandala kuli Wayahudi sunga nalu.
40028016	Nawo wa walya iwejizwa we likumi na monga, wakabita ku Galilaya sunga ko kwi'tunda lililya lyono Yesu yawalajiliza.
40028017	Nawo waza kumuwona, wakamuhemba, hamba yiwe wanji muli wene, wali wena mahwele.
40028018	Nayo Yesu yakaza sunga behi nawo, yakawatya, “Ane mhegwa u wulajilize wose, wa ku wulanga, sunga na wa kono'nze.
40028019	Holeka, alu, mubite, mukawanoze i wanhu we makungugo gose, wawe watyatyi wangu, muwabaputizizaje mwitagwa lyo Sogo yo Munhu na lyo Mwana, na lyo Muhe Mono Yelile.
40028020	Kanyhi, muwejizaje, webate i malajilizo gose gono namupelenyi. Nane nili hamonga nanye vilo vyose, heya, sunga ko ku ndumilizo ye vilo.”
41001001	Alu lo Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Yesu Kilisito u mwana wo Mulungu.
41001002	Lukanzwa nha vyono lwandikwa mu citabu co muwizi Isaya: “Langa ta, nghumutuma mutumwa wangu yakulongolele; Mono kokunozelezeza i nzila yako.
41001003	I lizi lyo munhu lihulikwa ku nyika: Nozelezenyi i nzila yo Muwaha. Gololenyi wukolo wakwe.”
41001004	Yohana u Mubaputizi yejela ku nyika, yakuganula vyono yinojeye wanhu wanene no kubaputizwa, u Mulungu ho yawanenele u wubi wawo.
41001005	I wanhu kulawa mbavu zose za Yudiya, na wanya Yelusalemi wose wakamuziza Yohana, wakavumila wubi wawo, nayo yakawabaputiziza mwi'kolongo lya Yoludani.
41001006	Yohana, yali yavwalile civwalo cono cali cihonwe ko wusinga we ngamiya, no musipi we nyhingo mu ciwino cakwe. Ne ndigwa yakwe, yali nzije no wuci wa mu mbago.
41001007	Nayo yakaganula yakutya, “U Munhu yunji mono yena vilungo yanyhizize nene, yakuza mu nyuma yangu; nane si nghwiliye hamba kwinama, no kuwopola i mikowa ye malatu gakwe.
41001008	Ane nghumubaputizenyi ne malenga, ninga mwene kolomubaputizenyi mu Muhe Mono Yelile.”
41001009	Mu vilo vivyo, Yesu yakaza yakulawa ku Nazaleti, kwi 'kaya lya Galilaya, nayo yakabaputizwa na Yohana mwi'kolongo lya Yoludani.
41001010	Lo lulolulo Yesu yaza kulawila mu malenga, yakawona wulanga wudiguce, no Muhe yakumutimila mucanyha yakwe yenha nziwa.
41001011	Ne lizi likahulikwa kulawa ku wulanga likutya, “Agwe yo gwegwe mwanangu mwendece; mono nyendezwe nagwe.”
41001012	Lo lulolulo yakategulwa no Muhe ku nyika,
41001013	yakekala kuko vilo makumi mane yakujelwa na Setani. Yakawa kuko hamonga ne malimu ga mu mbago, nawo Wamalayika wakawa wakumwitumamila.
41001014	Nayo Yohana yaza kuwa yadindilwa mu jela, Yesu yakabita ku Galilaya, yakaganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, yakutya,
41001015	“Icidaha cakwila, no wutemi wo Mulungu wasejelela. Nenenyi no kulwihuwila u Luganuzi Luswanu!”
41001016	Na lono yakolaga ha nhumbi ye lilamba lya Galilaya, yakawawona wanimula zisomba wejete, Simoni no muwahawe Andeleya, wakunimula zisomba no lwavu.
41001017	Yesu yakawatya, “Munhyatyaje, nane nomunozenyi muwe wanimula wanhu.”
41001018	Lo lulolulo wakazileka zinyavu zawo, wakamutyatya.
41001019	Nayo yali yeza kutela hamwande hadodo, yakawawona wa Yakobo no mwanakwawe Yohana iwana wa Zebedayo. Nawo nha vivyo wali wali mu ngalawa yawo wakuzinozeleza zinyavu zawo.
41001020	Lo lulolulo Yesu yakawacema, nawo wakamuleka u Sogo yawo Zebedayo mu ngalawa, hamonga ne wetumami, wakamutyatya.
41001021	Wakafika mwikaya lya Kapelanawumi, na mwizuwa lye Sabato, Yesu yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakanza kwijiza.
41001022	Ne wanhu wose wono wamuhulika, wakezina i mejizo gakwe, hambi nha siyejizaga nha vyono wejizaga iwejizi wawo wo Wulajilize, langa yejizaga nha munhu mono yena wulajilize.
41001023	Lo lulolulo munhu yunji we licisi lyavu, yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo,
41001024	yakazoza, yakutya, “Alu wina nghanici nase, agwe Yesu wa Nazaleti? Alo kuza ho wucongomeze? Nghumanyile vyono wuli nani, yo gwegwe mono welile wo Mulungu!”
41001025	Yesu yakalitacila ilicisi lyavu yakutya, “Nyamala! Wulawile muli munhu yuyu.”
41001026	Ale, lilyo licisi lyavu, likamuzuganga munhu yuyo, likazoza muno, likawa kulawila.
41001027	I wanhu wose wakezina, wakewuza wakutya, “Alo cici co cici? Ma, go mejizo mapya lo? U Munhu ayu, yena wulajilize wo kugalajiliza i macisi mavu, sunga nago gakumuhulika!”
41001028	I zinghani za Yesu zikatandala mbela mbela hanhu hose, mu yisi ya Galilaya.
41001029	Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe, hamonga na Yakobo na Yohana, wakawuka mu nghang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wakabita ku kaya ya Simoni na Andeleya.
41001030	Ale, u mukwewe we cicekulu wa Simoni, yali yagonile mu citanda yena mhungo. Nayo Yesu yali yeza kufika, wakamulonjela kamonga muli zo wutamwa wo mudala yuyo.
41001031	Yesu yakamubitila mudala yuyo, yakamwibata muwoko, yakamwinula. Ne mhungo yiyo yikamuleka, nayo yakanza kuwetumamila.
41001032	Icinyamihe, lono lizuwa lyali lyagwililicila, i wanhu wakamuletela Yesu iwatamwa wose, ne wanhu wono wali wena macisi mavu.
41001033	I wanhu wose we likaya lilyo wakekongholela ha mwande yo mulango.
41001034	Nayo Yesu yakawaponya wanhu wenji wono wali wena wutamwa we hayo hayo, yakagalavya macisi menji, ninga siyagakombola galonje cinji, hambi nha gali gamumanyile vyono mwene yo nani.
41001035	I mitondo yaco lono kwali kukali nadandawuka, Yesu yakenuka yakabita kulomba i hanhu ha cilejeho hono hasina wanhu.
41001036	Nawo wa Simoni ne wayagwe wakabita kumulondola.
41001037	Nawo waza kumuwona wakamutya, “I wanhu wose wakukulondola gwegwe.”
41001038	Yesu yakawatya, “Alenyi cibite ku vikaya vinji vye behi behi, ho nghaganule nako kuko, hambi nha ku soko yiyo, holeka naza.”
41001039	Ale, yakapilima hanhu hose mu Galilaya, yakuganula mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo no kulavya macisi.
41001040	U munhu yunji wo wukoma yakamubitila Yesu, yakamufugamila, yakamulomba yakutya, “Hono wende, kosuma kunghwema!”
41001041	Yesu yakamuwonela lusungu, yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakamupamiza yakamutya, “Nyendile, wukwemwe!”
41001042	Lo lulolulo wukoma wukamuleka munhu yuyo, yakawa mutelevu.
41001043	Yesu yakamutya yabite mbela mbela akuno yakumukong'onheza yakutya,
41001044	“Wulece kumulonjela munhu wo wose ze nghani yiyi, langa wubite wukelajile kuli mukohani, na kolo wakondya kuhomelela vyono wapona, ale, wulavye i cilavywa nha vyono yalajiliza Musa, ho yiwe wuhomelezi kuli mwene so wupone wako.”
41001045	Ninga munhu yuyo yakabita yakanza kuyitandaza inghani yiyo hanhu hose, no kulonga nghani nyinji, sunga na Yesu si yasuma kwinjila mwikaya lyo lyose ciwonelela. Ne nghani yiyo yikamunoza yekale kunze ihanhu ha cilejeho hono hasina wanhu. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wakamubitila iwanhu wakulawa mbavu zose.
41002001	Vyaza kupuluta vilo vicefu, Yesu yakawuya ku Kapelanawumi, iwanhu wakahulika vyono yali ha kaya.
41002002	Ale, wakaza wanhu wenji muno, wakamema, sunga na ha mulango hakawa hasina hamba cilejeho. Nayo Yesu yakawaganulila inghani yakwe,
41002003	no munhu yunji mono yali yadejepe, yakaletwa kuli mwene yadinghuywe na wanhu wane.
41002004	Ku soko yo winji we wanhu, siwasuma kumutegula behi na Yesu. Holeka wakapula mwi'tembe hono hali hoyali Yesu. Wali waza kondya kutuga hanhu ho kumukozeza, wakamutimya munhu yuyo mono yali yagonile mu citanda.
41002005	Yesu yaza kuwuwona uwihuwilo wawo, yakamutya munhu yuyo mono yadejepe, “Go mwanangu kunenelwa wubi wako.”
41002006	Iwejizwa wanji wo Wulajilize wono wali wekaye baho, wakehwesa mu zinhumbula zawo wakutya,
41002007	“Yadahile nhawule kulonga nha vivyo? Ayu yakumutovula Mulungu! Vyono hasina munhu mono kosuma kunenela wubi, langa u Mulungu mweneco du, yo yasumile kunenela wubi.”
41002008	Ninga Yesu yakagamanya kamonga i mahweso gawo, yakawatya, “Alu socici mukwihwesa nhavivyo mu zinhumbula zenyu?
41002009	Alu yahayi imhelu muno, yo kumutya u munhu yuyu mono yadejepe, kunenelwa wubi wako, hamba yo kumutya, ‘Winuce, witwice citanda cako wubite?’
41002010	Ale, nghusaka mumanye vyono, u Mwana wo Munhu, yena wulajilize wo kunenela wubi we wanhu kono'nze.” Baho yakamutya u munhu yuyo mono yadejepe,
41002011	“Nghukulonjela, winuce, witwice citanda cako, wubite ku kaya!”
41002012	Ne wanhu wose lono wali wakali wamulanjile, u munhu yuyo yakenuka lwa kamonga yaketwika i citanda cakwe, yakawa kubita.
41002013	Yesu yakabita kanyhi ku nhumbi ye lilamba. Lipuga lye wanhu likamuziza, nayo yakanza kuwejiza.
41002014	Nayo Yesu lono yapulutaga, yakamuwona Lawi mwana wa Alifayo, yekaye ha hofisi yo kutowezeza kodi. Yesu yakamutya, “Wunhyatyaje!” Lawi yakenuka, yakamutyatya.
41002015	Hanyuma, lono Yesu yali yekaye ha meza yakulya zindigwa mu kaya ya Lawi. I watoweza kodi wenji hamonga ne wanyo wubi wali wamutyatizye Yesu, sunga na wenji wa muli wene, wali wekalane hamonga nayo, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe ha meza ye zindigwa.
41002016	Ale, iwejizi wacefu wo Wulajilize wono wali Wafalisayo, waza kumuwona Yesu yakulya zindigwa hamonga ne wanhu wabi ne watoweza kodi, wakawawuza iwejizwa wakwe, wakutya, “Alu socici yakulya zindigwa hamonga ne watoweza kodi ne wanhu wabi?”
41002017	Yesu yaza kuwahulika, yakawatya, “Wono si watamigwe, siwasakaga muganga, langa wawalya du wono watamigwe. Sinizize niwaceme wono wali ling'ani, langa i wanyo wubi.”
41002018	Kukawa mwipango linji, iwejizwa wa Yohana ne wejizwa we Wafalisayo, wali walekaga kulya ndigwa. Ale, iwanhu wakaza, wakamuwuza Yesu, wakutya, “Alu socici iwejizwa wa Yohana ne wejizwa we Wafalisayo, walekaga kulya ndigwa, ninga iwejizwa wako siwalekaga kulya ndigwa?”
41002019	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu wono walalikwe ku halusi, wolecelaci kulya ndigwa hono bwana halusi yakali hamonga nawo? Na mu mapango gose lono wakali hamonga na bwana halusi, siwosuma kuleka kulya ndigwa.
41002020	Ninga lyolofika i lizuwa lono bwana halusi kolosolwa muli wene, baho langa ho wololeka kulya ndigwa.
41002021	“Hasina munhu mono katemaga cilaka mu mwenda mupya, no kucihoneleza mu civwalo cihuma. Na hono yanoze nhavivyo, icilaka cico cipya, cototoloka mu civwalo cihuma, no wudemuce wayo wokwatilila hawaha.
41002022	Hamba hasina munhu mono katajilaga divayi mhya mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zihuma. Na hono yanoze nhavivyo, i divayi nha yoyibahula imifuko, nayo divayi hamonga ne mifuko yiyo vyohodanjika. Langa idivayi 'mhya, yitajilwaga mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zimhya!”
41002023	Kukawa, mwizuwa linji lye Sabato, Yesu yapulutaga yakolile mu migunda yo wuhemba. Nawo i wejizwa wakwe wakanza kubena imaso go wuhemba mu nzila.
41002024	Iwafalisayo wakamutya, “Langata! So cici wakwituma i nghani yono yili mwiko kwituma mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
41002025	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu mukali nasoma yaye, vyono yetuma Dawudi mwipango lono yali yadabuka? U mwene hamonga ne wayagwe wono yali yena nawo,
41002026	mwene yenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu mu vilo vyono Abiyazali yali mukohani muwaha, yakalya i mikate yono yali cilavywa kuli Mulungu. Yono Iwakohani wali wene du wo wali wakomboywe kulya i mikate yiyo. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, Dawudi yakayilya, kanyhi yakawapela ne wayagwe nawo wakalya.”
41002027	Holeka Yesu yakawalonjela yakutya, “Sabato yiwicigwe so cambuzi ce wanhu, ninga iwanhu si wawicigwe so Sabato.”
41002028	Na ku soko yiyo, Mwana wo Munhu yo Muwaha, kanyhi yo Muwaha we Sabato.
41003001	Yesu yakenjila kanyhi mu nghang'anilo yo wuhembelo, na mumo mugati mwali moyuli u munhu mono yali yena muwoko wono wudejepe.
41003002	Baho hali howali wanhu wono wakasaka watuje nghani yo kumusonjezeza Yesu, holeka wakawa walindiye, wawone hono komuponya u munhu yuyo, mwizuwa lye Sabato.
41003003	Nayo Yesu yakamutya u munhu yuyo mono yali yena u muwoko wono wudejepe, “Wuze hano hono mwande!”
41003004	Ale yakawawuza, yakutya, “Wulenyi ti, yili ling'ani mwizuwa lye Sabato kwituma viswanu hamba kwituma vibi? Kuponya wumi hamba kuwulaga?” Ninga iwene hamba siwalonga cinji yaye.
41003005	Baho u mwene Yesu yakawalanga wose kwe 'kuwo, akuno yakukalala ku soko yo wukamu we zinhumbula zawo. Hanyuma yakamulonjela umunhu yuyo, yakutya, “Golola muwoko wako!” Nayo yakawugolola u muwoko wakwe, nawo wukawa wapona kanyhi.
41003006	Lo lulolulo i Wafalisayo wakalawila kunze ye nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, nawo wakeheha hamonga ne cipuga ce wanhu wa Helode, vyono womuwulaga Yesu.
41003007	Yesu yakawuka baho hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, yakabita ku nhumbi ye lilamba, ne lipuga lye wanhu likamutyatya. I wanhu wawo, walawa ku Yelusalemi, Yudiya,
41003008	Idumeya, ku nhumbi ye likolongo lya Yoludani, Tulo na Sidoni. Iwanhu wawo wenji, wakamuziza Yesu ku soko vyono wali wahulika ze metumo menji mawaha, gono Yesu yali yetuma.
41003009	Yesu yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe, wamuwikanizize ingalawa monga, lipuga lye wanhu ho lilece kumumemelela.
41003010	Yali yawaponya wanhu wenji, ne watamwa wose wamumemelelaga ho wamupamize.
41003011	Ne wanhu wono wali wena i macisi mavu, waza kumuwona, wakagwa hali mwene no kuzoza, wakutya, “Agwe yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu!”
41003012	Ninga mwene Yesu yakagakong'onheza muno i macisi mavu, galece kumukumusa kuli wanhu vyono u mwene yo nani.
41003013	Yesu yakabita kwi'tunda, yakawacema kuli mwene wawalya wono yali yendile mweneco. Ale, wakamubitila,
41003014	Nayo yakawahagula wanhu yikumi na wejete wono yawacemela litagwa lye “Watumwa,” yakawatya, nimuhagulenyi anye ho muwezane nane. Nane nomutumenyi mubite mukaganule,
41003015	kanyhi muwe no wulajilize wo kulavizya imacisi mavu.
41003016	Ale, wawo ikumi na wejete wono wahagulwa, wowano, Simoni (mono Yesu yakamucemela litagwa lya Petelo),
41003017	Yakobo na Yohana, iwana wa Zebedayo (Yesu yakawacemela vyono wejete litagwa lya Bowanelege, nhunizo yayo “Wana we lididimo,”)
41003018	Andeleya na Filipo, Batolomayo, na Matayo, na Tomaso, na Yakobo mwana wa Alifayo, na Tadayo, na Simoni Mukanani, na
41003019	Yuda Musikaliyota mono yamugaluka Yesu.
41003020	Ale, Yesu yakabita ku kaya. Ne lipuga lye wanhu likekonghola kanyhi, sunga Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe siwasuma kutuga cilejeho co kulya zindigwa.
41003021	Ale, iwanduguze za Yesu waza kuyihulika inghani yiyo, wakabita kumwibata, hambi i wanhu nha watezaga vyono yamangha lukwale.
41003022	Nawo iwejizi wo Wulajilize wono walawa ku Yelusalemi, wakatya, “Ayu yena Belizebuli! Kanyhi, yakugalavya i macisi, kwe vilungo vyo muwaha we macisi.”
41003023	Baho Yesu yakawacema, yakawalonjela mu vihwanicizo, yakutya, “Alu Setani kosuma wule kumulavya Setani?
41003024	Na hono wutemi wigawe vipuga vipuga vyono vikwihoma, uwutemi wuwo siwojendelela hamba hadodo.
41003025	Na hono kaya yigawe mu vipuga vipuga vyono vikwihoma, i kaya yiyo yotecemela.
41003026	Ale, holeka na hono wutemi wa Setani wigawe vipuga vipuga, siwosuma kujendelela hamba hadodo, langa wotecemelela lukulu.
41003027	“Hasina munhu mono kasumaga kubena kaya yo munhu we vilungo no kumusolela isawo yakwe, langa sunga yamule kumuwopa u munhu yuyo we vilungo, baho ho kosuma kumusolela isawo yakwe.
41003028	“Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, iwanhu wonenelwa wubi wawo wose hamonga ne matovulo gawo gose.
41003029	Ninga mono komutovula u Muhe Mono Yelile, yuyo sikonenelelwa lukulu, langa yeza yena lisutya lyo wubi we cibitilila.”
41003030	(Yesu yalonga nhavivyo ku soko vyono wene watezaga, “Ayu yena licisi lyavu.”)
41003031	U nyina wa Yesu ne wanduguze wakaza baho, wakema hanze, wakamutegulila nghani vyono wakusaka kumuwona.
41003032	Ne lipuga lye wanhu lyali likaye baho limupilime. Ale, wakamulonjela, wakutya, “U nyina yako ne wanduguzo wali kunze wakukusaka wakuwone.”
41003033	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula, yakutya, “Yaya ne wandugu zangu wo wa nani?”
41003034	Baho yakawalanga i wanhu wono wali wamupilime, yakatya, “Lanjenyi ta! Awa wo wa yaya ne wandugu zangu.
41003035	No munhu wo wose mono kokwituma u wuhile wo Mulungu, yuyo yo ndugu yangu, no lumbu lyangu nayo yo yaya.”
41004001	Yesu yakanza kwijiza kanyhi, akuno yali ha nhumbi ye lilamba. Ne lipuga yiwaha lye wanhu likamupilima, sunga yikawa yimunojeye mwene yenjile mu ngalawa no kwikala mwi'lamba. I wanhu wakawa wekaye mu'si nghavu, ha nhumbi ye lilamba.
41004002	Nayo yakawejiza nghani nyinji mu vihwanicizo, na mu mejizo gakwe yakawalonjela, yakutya,
41004003	“Hulicizenyi ta! U mumiza mbeyu yakabita kumiza mbeyu.
41004004	Na lono yazimizaga, zinji zikalagala mu nzila, ne zindeje zikaza zikazilya.
41004005	Zinji zikalagala mu mabwe hono hali hasina muhangha mwinji, nazo zikacindika mbela, mbela, na vyono u muhangha wali siwutelile,
41004006	lizuwa lyaza walika, zikawomba, na vyono milela yayo yali yisina vilungo, zikanyala.
41004007	Zinji zikalagala mu mamivya, ne mamivya gakahoga no kuzititiliza, nazo hamba sizalela mikalo.
41004008	Zinji zikalagala mu muhangha muswanu, zikawiluka no kulela: zinji zikalela mhece makumi madatu, zinji makumi mutandatu, na zinji yigana.”
41004009	Ale Yesu yakawatya, “Hulicizenyi ta, mono yena makutu go kuhulicila, yahulice.”
41004010	Na lono Yesu yali yali wene, wanji wa muli wawalya wono wamuhuliciza, wakamuziza hamonga na walya we likumi na wejete, nawo wakamuwuza ze vihwanicizo vivyo.
41004011	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Anye mupejigwe kumanya ze cinyele zo wutemi wo Mulungu, ninga kuli walya wono wali kunze, wolonjelwa zose mu vihwanicizo.
41004012	‘Ho walanje mbeka, ninga walece kuwona. Wahulicize mbeka, Ninga walece kwizuka. Hono si nhavivyo, wali wamupitucile u Mulungu, nayo yali yawanenele.’ ”
41004013	Ale, Yesu yakawawuza yakutya, “Alu anye simukucimanya i cihwanicizo cici? Alu ho mosuma wule kucimanya icihwanicizo co cose cilya?
41004014	U mumiza mbeyu, kamizaga inghani yo Mulungu. Hanji i nghani yiyo yikuwa kugwiswa mu nzila,
41004015	ne wanhu wa mu nzila wakuyihulika, ninga kolo wayihulika, Setani yakuza no kuyiwusa inghani yiyo yono yihadikwe muli wene.
41004016	I wanhu wanji wehwanile nhe zimbeyu zilya zono zagwila mu mabwe. Kolo wakuyihulika inghani yiyo wakuyibocela mbela mbela na nyemo.
41004017	Ninga siyikuwenjila no kuwa na milela muli wene, nawo wakujendelela kuyibata inghani yiyo cidaha cidodo du, na kolo wukwijela wugaye, hamba wuwinjilizwe so nghani yiyo, hodu wakutukuwike i mitima yawo, no kuyileka kamonga.
41004018	Iwanhu wanji nawo, wehwanile nhe zimbeyu zilya zono zagwila mu mamivya. Aco co cihwanicizo ca wawo wono wakuyihulika inghani yiyo,
41004019	ninga i mahwele ga kononze yiyi, ne makoco ge sawo, ne masulumizi ge mawala gose, gakuwenjila no kuyititiliza inghani yiyo, nawo hamba siwakulela mikalo.
41004020	Ninga iwanhu wanji, wehwanile nhe zimbeyu zilya zono zamizwa mu muhangha muswanu. Awa wo wakuyihulika i nghani yiyo, wakuyibocela, no kulela mikalo: wanji makumi madatu, na wanji makumi mutandatu na wanji igana limonga.”
41004021	Yesu yakajendelela kuwalonjela yakutya, “Ma, i wanhu wakolelezaga tala wayileta kugati no kuyigubika ne bakuli hamba kuyiwika mwi'vungu lye citanda? Ng'o ye! Langa wayiwikaga mucanyha yo wuwiko wayo.
41004022	Holeka co cose cono cihundikwe nha cokwanzalikwa calinze, na co cose cono cigubikwe, cogubulwa.
41004023	Ale, hulicenyi, hono mwina makutu!”
41004024	Yakawatya kanyhi, “Hulicizenyi muno muno cono mukuhulika! I cipimo cico cono mukwitumamila kuwapimila i wanhu wanji, co cico du cono u Mulungu nayo kolokwitumamila kumupimilenyi na nyenye, kanyhi molokonjelezwa.
41004025	Hambi mono yena cinji nha kopegwa kuciza. Nayo mono yasina cinji, sunga na cono yena naco nha kosolelwa.”
41004026	Yesu yakajendelela kutya, “Uwutemi wo Mulungu wihwanile u munhu mono yakuhadika mbeyu mu mugunda.
41004027	Mu cilo yakugona, na mu misi yali meso, na mwipango lilyo, zimbeyu zikucindika no kuwiluka ninga mwene siyamanyile vyono zikunozeka.
41004028	U muhangha weneco wo wunozaga zimbeyu ziwiluce no kulela mikalo; zamulaga kutula mahamha mapya hanyuma yayo yiso, na mu ndumilizo yayo, zimhece zimemile mwi'so.
41004029	Na lono wuhemba wapya, munhu yuyo yakwanza kuyitumamila nzolo yakwe, hambi cipango ce ndudula nha caza.”
41004030	Kanyhi Yesu yakatya, “Alu cowihwaniciza na cici u Wutemi wo Mulungu? Hamba ciwuloloseze mu cihwanicizoci?
41004031	Wihwanile nhe mbeyu ye haladali, yono ndodo kuciza mbeyu zose.
41004032	Ninga kolo yahadikwa, yicindikaga no kuwa ibici iwaha kuciza mabici gose ga mu mugunda. Ne manhambi gayo gawezaga mawaha, sunga ne zindeje za mu mbago zisumaga kuzenga manhuli gazo mu mubeho wayo.”
41004033	Nayo yawaganulila i nghani yakwe mu vihwanicizo vinji vinha vivi, yaduwa nawo sunga mu nghango yono wasuma kwizuka.
41004034	Nayo siyalonga nawo co cose cono cali cisina cihwanicizo, ninga lono yali hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, wene, yawalolosesaga zose.
41004035	Mu cinyamihe, mwi'zuwa lilyo, Yesu yakawatya iwejizwa wakwe, “Alenyi cilowoce, cibite ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba.”
41004036	Ale, wakalileka ilipuga lye wanhu, wakamusola Yesu mu ngalawa yono yali yali mumo. Baho hali hozili ne zingalawa zinji nha vivilya.
41004037	Baho, wukawa kwanza mukukunzo muwaha we mbeho, imawingo gakayitowa i ngalawa yiyo sunga yikanza kumema malenga.
41004038	Nayo Yesu yali yali kunyuma ye ngalawa yagonile, yeciwize muto. Ale, i wejizwa wakamusinhusa wakamutya, “Mwijizi, alu wukuwona si cinji vyono caza kongomela?”
41004039	Ale, Yesu yakasinhuka, yakalitacila lilyo likukunzo liwaha lye mbeho, no kugatya i mawingo ge lilenga, “Nyamala! Tule!” Baho i mbeho yikatula hakanyamala twii.
41004040	Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakawatya iwejizwa wakwe, “Alu nhawule mukogopa?” Alo mukali musina wihuwilo?
41004041	Nawo wakogopa muno, wakawa kwiwuza wakutya, “Alu mwene yuyu yo nani, ta? Mono sunga ne mbeho ne mawingo ge lilenga vikumuhulika?”
41005001	Ale, wakafika ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba, mu'si ye Wagelasene.
41005002	Yesu yaza kutima mu ngalawa, hobaho viketang'anila na munhu yunji mono yali yena licisi lyavu, yakulawa ku vitenjelo.
41005003	U munhu yuyo yekalaga mu vitenjelo, hamba hasina munhu mono yasuma kanyhi kumuwopa ne manyolo.
41005004	Hambi nha kali kenji wamuwopaga ne zipingu hamonga ne manyolo, ninga mapango gose yasumaga kugadumula manyolo gago, no kuzibenanga zipingu zizo, hamba hasina munhu mono yasuma kumwimila.
41005005	Na mu misi ne cilo, yekalaga mu vitenjelo, na mu matunda, yakuzoza no kwidemulanga ne mabwe.
41005006	Nayo yaza kumuwonela Yesu kutali, yakamumanyhilila, yakamuhemba,
41005007	akuno yakulonga kwe'zi 'waha yakutya, “Gwe, Yesu, go Mwana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye, alu wina nghanici nane? Mwi'tagwa lyo Mulungu, nghulomba wulece kungaza!”
41005008	(Nayo yalonga nhavivyo vyono Yesu yali yamulonjela yatya, “Go licisi lyavu, wulawile muli munhu ayu.”)
41005009	Holeka Yesu yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Alu litagwa lyako gwegwe nani?” Nayo yakapitula, yakutya, “Litagwa lyangu nene ‘Mhuga’ hambi ase nha cili wenji.”
41005010	U munhu yuyo yakamunena Yesu, yalece kugawinga gago macisi mavu mu'si yiyilya.
41005011	Ale kwali ne'tewa yiwaha lye zingubi likudima ha mwejelele we litunda.
41005012	Ale, imacisi gago gakamunena Yesu, gakutya, “Wucitegulaje ku zingubi zizo, cikenjile muli zene.”
41005013	Nayo yakagakombola. Ale, gago macisi mavu gakalawila, gakenjila mu zingubi zizilya. Ne litewa lyose lye zingubi elufu nyejete, likavulumucila he weta zikenjila mwi'lamba, no kufwila mumo.
41005014	Nawo wadimi we zingubi zizo wakatiza, wakayiganula i nghani yiyo kwi'kaya na mu migunda. Iwanhu wakaza ho wawone nyhici yono yiweye.
41005015	Wakamuziza Yesu, wakamuwona no munhu yuyulya mono yali yena litewa lye macisi yekaye hasi, yavwalile ne myenda, yena ne mahala gakwe, yatulile, nawo wakogopa muno.
41005016	Ne wanhu wono waziwona zizo, wakawaloloseza wanhu wanji vyono yimuweye u munhu mono yali yena macisi, na ze zingubi zizilya.
41005017	Nawo, wakanza kumunena yawuce mu'si yawo.
41005018	Na lono Yesu yenjilaga mu ngalawa, u munhu yuyulya mono yali yena imacisi, yakamunena yawezane nayo.
41005019	Ninga Yesu siyamuvumila. Langa yakamutya, “Wubite ku kaya yako, ku wanduguzo, wukawalonjele zimbaha zose zono u Muwaha yakutendeye na vyono yakuwoneye lusungu.”
41005020	Ale, munhu yuyo yakabita, yakanza kuganula kuko ku Dekapoli i zimbaha zose zono Yesu yamutendela, ne wanhu wose wakezina muno muno.
41005021	Nayo Yesu yakalowocela kanyhi mu ngalawa ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba. Ne lipuga yiwaha lye wanhu likekongholela ha mwande yakwe, nayo yakawa yemile ha nhumbi ye lilamba.
41005022	Baho yakaza yunji wa muli wawaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, litagwa Iyakwe Yayilo. Nayo yaza kumuwona Yesu, yakagwa hamwande ye magulu gakwe,
41005023	yakamunena muno yakutya, “Umuhinza wangu mudodo yatamigwe, yali behi no kufwa. Cibite nghukunena, wukamuwicile miwoko yako, ho yapone no kuwumipa!”
41005024	Ale, Yesu yakabitana nayo. Ne liwuta yiwaha lye wanhu likamutyatya, likawa limufinhile mbavu zose.
41005025	Na muli wene mwali moyuli mucekulu yunji mono yali yena wutamwa wo wuzaze we sakami myaka yikumi na myejete.
41005026	Umucekulu yuyo yali yagazika muno ne waganga wenji. Na hamba yawe yali yakondya kwitumamila sawo yakwe yose so wulagulwe, ninga siyatuga ciba hamba hadodo, langa wutamwa wakwe ho wukacila kuwa wubi muno muno.
41005027	Yali yakondya kuzihulika zinghani za Yesu, holeka yakaziza ku mugongo wa Yesu, yakekokomeza mu mwinji we wanhu wono wali wumufinhile Yesu mbavu zose,
41005028	akuno yakwiyitya, “Hono mhamize civwalo cakwe du, nopona.”
41005029	Hodu, yakawa kucipamiza i civwalo ca Yesu, no wuzaze wakwe we sakami, wukawa kuduma lwa kamonga, nayo yakehulika mu muwili wakwe nha vyono yaponywa wutamwa wakwe.
41005030	Nayo Yesu yakamanya kamonga vyono vilungo vya muli mwene vyalawa. Hobaho, yakalipitucila lipuga lye wanhu, yakawuza, yakutya, “Alo nani mwene mono yamhamize i civwalo cangu?”
41005031	Iwejizwa wakwe wakamutya, “Wukuwona vyono wanhu wenji wakufinhile mbavu zose, alu nhawule wukuwuza wukutya nani mwene mono yakupamize?”
41005032	Ninga Yesu yakajendelela kulanga langa kose kose ho yamuwone yuyo mono yanozize nhavivyo.
41005033	Baho umucekulu yuyo, vyono yali yamanyile zono zimuweye, yakaza akuno yakucicima so woga, yakagwa hamwande ya Yesu no kulonga ze mbeka zose.
41005034	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Go muhinza, wihuwilo wako wukuponya. Wubite wupolile, no wutamwa wako wuponele lukulu.”
41005035	Na lono Yesu yali yakali yakulonga, iwanhu wakaza kulawa ku kaya yo muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wakamutya, “Umuhinza wako yakondya kufwa. Alu nhawule wukali wukumugaza Mwijizi?”
41005036	Ninga mwene Yesu hamba siyacelelela cono walonga, langa yakamutya muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, “Wulece kogopa, wihuwile du.”
41005037	Hamba siyaleka munhu yunji wo wose vibitane nayo, langa Petelo du, na Yakobo na Yohana u mwanakwawe wa Yakobo.
41005038	Wakafika ku kaya yo muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, nayo Yesu yakahulika lizozo, ne cililo.
41005039	Yakenjila ku gati, yakawatya, “Alu nhawule mukuzoza no kulila? U muhinza nha siyafwiye yaye, langa yagonile du.”
41005040	Ninga wene wakamuseka. Nayo, yakawalavyaniza wose kunze, yakawasola usogwe no nyina wo muhinza yuyo, hamonga na wawalya iwejizwa wakwe, wakenjila kugati kono kwali kowuli u muvimba wo muhinza yuyo.
41005041	Yesu yakamwibata muwoko, yakamutya, “Talita kumi.” Nhunizo yayo, “Go muhinza nghukulonjela, winuce!”
41005042	Lo lulolulo umuhinza yakenuka, yakanza kujenda. (Yali yena myaka ikumi na myejete.) Baho, iwanhu wakezina muno muno kuciza.
41005043	Nayo Yesu yakawakong'onheza muno, walece kuyitandaza inghani yiyo kuli wanhu. Hanyuma yakawa kuwalonjela wamupele muhinza zindigwa.
41006001	Yesu yakawuka baho yakabita ku citumbi cakwe, ne wejizwa wakwe wakamutyatya.
41006002	Ne lizuwa lye Sabato lyaza fika, yakanza kwijiza mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo. Ne wanhu wenji wono wamuhulika wakezina, wakatya, “Alu kazisola hayi i zinghani zizi? Na mahalaci gaga gono yapejigwe? Kanyhi, yakwituma wule i metumo gaga mawaha go wizine gono yakwituma?
41006003	Alu ma, si yo yuyu muselemala, umwana we cilume wa Malyamu u muwahawe wa Yakobo, na Yose na Yuda na Simoni? Ne walumbuze ma, si wali baha hono hetu? Holeka wakatuga mahwele nayo.”
41006004	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Umuwizi katugaga lilumbo hanhu hanji hose, ninga si katugaga lilumbo mu'si yakwe, na mu wanduguze na mu kaya yakwe.”
41006005	Hamba siyasuma kwituma mapoto baho, langa yakawawicila miwoko watamwa wacefu, yakawaponya.
41006006	Yakezina muno so wuleka kwihuwila kwawo. Ale, Yesu yakapilima mu vikaya vyono vyali vili behi behi, yakwijiza wanhu.
41006007	Nayo yakawacema wawalya i wejizwa we likumi na wejete, yakanza kuwatuma wejete wejete. Yakawapela vilungo vyo kulavizya macisi mavu,
41006008	nayo yakawalajiliza yakutya, “Kolo mukubita mu muhinzo, mulece kusoleleza cinji co cose, langa musole nghome du. Mulece kusoleleza mukate, hamba mufuko wo kulombela, hamba pesa mu mifuko yenyu.
41006009	Muvwale malatu, ninga mulece kuvwala kanzo nyejete nyejete.”
41006010	Kanyhi yakawatya, “Ho hose hono mobocelwa mu kaya, mwikalaje mumo, sunga kolo mweza kuwuka i hanhu baho.
41006011	Ne hanhu ho hose hono iwanhu wolema kumubocelenyi hamba kumuhulicenyi, muwuce baho, ninga mukung'unhe manghundi gono gali mu magulu genyu, ho yiwe wuhomelezi kuli wene.”
41006012	Ale, wakatuluka, wakaganula wanhu wanene.
41006013	Wakagalavya macisi menji, wakawabaka watamwa wenji mafuta, wakawaponya.
41006014	Ale, umutemi Helode yakazihulika zizo zose, hambi ilitagwa lya Yesu nha lyali likumucile muno hanhu hose. Ne wanhu wanji watezaga, “Yohana Umubaputizi nha kazuka muli wafu, na ku soko yiyo holeka ivilungo vye mapoto vikwituma mulimo muli mwene.”
41006015	Ninga wanhu wanji wakatya, “Umunhu yuyo yo Eliya.” Iwanji wakatya, “Yuyu yo muwizi kotya muyagwe ne wawizi.”
41006016	Ninga Helode yaza kuzituga zinghani zizi, yakatya, “Yuyu yo Yohana! Namudumula mutwe, ninga'lu yazuka.”
41006017	Baho halulongozi, Helode mweneco yali yalajilize vyono Yohana yebatwe, nayo yakamufunga mu jela. Nayo Helode, yanoza nhavivyo, ku soko ya Helodiyasi mono Helode yali yamutolile, na kuno kumbe ho yali mugolece wa Filipo, u mwanakwawe.
41006018	Vyono Yohana yamutya, Helode, “Mwiko kuli'gwe kumutola u mugolece wo mwanakwenyu.”
41006019	Holeka Helodiyasi yakamusula muno muno Yohana, yakasaka sunga yamuwulaje, ninga hamba nhavivyo, siyasuma yaye.
41006020	Na Helode yamogopaga Yohana, hambi nha yali yamanyile vyono mwene yali munhu we ling'ani kanyhi yelile, holeka yakamukamisa. Helode yali yendile kumuhuliciza Yohana, hamba yiwe kolo yamuhuliciza, yagazikaga muno.
41006021	Ale, mwizuwa linji, cikejela cilejeho, mwizuwa lyo wulelwe wakwe Helode. Nayo Helode yakawanozeza ndigwa iwanyamhala we libalaza lyakwe, iwasilikale ne wawaha wa Galilaya.
41006022	Ale, umwana we cicekulu wa Helodiyasi yakenjila, yakavina, nayo yakawendeza muno, umwene Helode ne wajenzi wakwe. Umutemi yakamutya u muhinza yuyo “Wunombaje co cose cono wendile nane nokupela.”
41006023	Kanyhi yakamwilahila, yakutya, “Co cose cono konomba, nokupela, hamba liwe lipinga lyo wutemi wangu.”
41006024	Baho u muhinza yuyo yakalawila kunze, yakabita kumuwuza unyina yakutya, “Alu yaya, nombeci!” Nayo nyina yakamutya, wulombe “Umutwe wa Yohana u Mubaputizi.”
41006025	No muhinza yakamubitila umutemi ko musunho, yakamulomba yakutya, “Nghusaka wumhele lulu baha mu ciya, umutwe wa Yohana u Mubaputizi.”
41006026	Umutemi yakakalala muno muno, ninga ku so wilahize wakwe, na ku so wajenzi wakwe wono wali ha zindigwa, siyenda kumulemeza.
41006027	Ale, umutemi yakamulajiliza umusilikale yakabita, yakamudumula mutwe Yohana mumo mu jela,
41006028	Yakawuletela mu ciya, yakamupela yuyo muhinza, nayo muhinza yakamupela nyina.
41006029	Nawo Iwejizwa wa Yohana, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakabita wakawusola u muwili wakwe, wakawuzika mu citenjelo.
41006030	Nawo iwatumwa wawalya, wakawuya, wakekongholela ha mwande ya Yesu, wakamulonjela zose zono wanoza na zono wejiza.
41006031	Ne wanhu wenji muno wazaga no kubita, sunga na Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe siwasuma kutuga hamba cilejeho co kulya ndigwa. Holeka Yesu yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe yakutya, “Alenyi cibite sese cili wene hanhu hono hasina wanhu, ho mukacehe hadodo.”
41006032	Wakawuka weneco wali wene mu ngalawa, wakabita hanhu hono hasina wanhu.
41006033	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wanhu wenji wakawawona vyono wakubita, nawo wakawamanya. Holeka wanhu wenji wakalawa mu makaya gose, wakamanyhila kuko kono Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wabitaga, wakalongola kufika.
41006034	Nawo wali weza kutima hasi ye ngalawa, Yesu yakagawona i mapuga mawaha ge wanhu, yakawawonela lusungu, hambi nha wali wenha zingholo zono zisina mudimi. Nayo yakanza kuwejiza nghani nyinji.
41006035	Imapango ge misi gali gakondya puluta. Nawo iwejizwa wakwe wakamubitila Yesu, wakamutya, “Alu ahano nha nyika, ne lizuwa nha lyasweza.
41006036	Holeka wakombolaje wanhu wabite ku migunda na ku vikaya vye behi behi, wakegulile ndigwa.”
41006037	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Nyenye nyo weneco muwapelaje zindigwa.” Nawo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu cibite cikagule mikate ya pesa, dinali magana mejete, ho ciwapele zindigwa?”
41006038	Nayo Yesu yakawawuza, yakatya, “Alu 'nye mwina mikate milinga?” Bitenyi mukayilanje. Waza manya wakamutya, “Hoyili mikate mihano ne zisomba nyejete.”
41006039	Baho, Yesu yakawalajiliza iwejizwa wawalonjele iwanhu wose wekale hasi mu mahanze ge dedede vipuga vipuga.
41006040	Nawo wakekala hasi vipuga vipuga vya wanhu igana limonga limonga, na vye wanhu makumi mahano mahano.
41006041	Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakayisola i mikate yiyilya mihano ne zisomba zizilya zinyejete, yakagalamila kucanyha, yakamulumba Mulungu, yakayibegula i mikate, yakawapela i wejizwa wakwe wawagawile wanhu. Ne zisomba zizilya zinyejete nazo yakawagawila wose.
41006042	Ne wanhu wose wakalya, wakeguta.
41006043	Wakatondoleza ivibegulwa vye mikate na vye zisomba, wakamemya nhoto yikumi na nyejete.
41006044	Nawo wono walya i mikate yiyo, wali walume elufu yihano.
41006045	Lo lulolulo Yesu yakawalajiliza iwejizwa wakwe wenjile mu ngalawa, walongole kubita ku Betesayida, ku nhumbi ye lilamba, lono mwene yali yakali kugelaga i mapuga ge wanhu.
41006046	Na lono yali yawelaga yakondya, yakabita kwi'tunda kulomba.
41006047	Yaza kuwa cinyamihe i ngalawa yali yili ha ciligati ye lilamba, nayo yali mweneco yali wene du mu'si nghavu.
41006048	Ale, yakawawona iwejizwa wakwe wakugazika muno kuyijendya ingalawa, hambi imbeho nha yali vidomile nawo. Na lono kwali kweza behi no kudandawuka, Yesu yakawabitila i wejizwa wakwe yakujenda mucanyha ye malenga. Yakasaka kuwapuluta.
41006049	Ninga wakamuwona yakujenda mucanyha ye malenga, nawo watezaga mba yisoce, wakazoza.
41006050	Hambi nha wose wali weza kumuwona, wakogopa muno muno. Nayo Yesu yakalonga nawo, yakutya, “Mutulane, yo nene, mulece kogopa!”
41006051	Hanyuma yayo, yakenjila mu ngalawa yono wali wali mumo, ne mbeho yikanyamala. Nawo wakezina muno,
41006052	hambi nha wali wakali sinezuka inhunizo yo kuwalisa wawalya i wanhu we elufu yihano. I mahala gawo gali gakali si nazibata yaye.
41006053	Wakalowoka lilamba, wakafika kuyisi ya Genesaleti, wakayiwopa ingalawa ha mwejelele.
41006054	Nawo wali weza kutima hasi ye ngalawa, lo lulolulo iwanhu wakamumanya Yesu lwa kamonga.
41006055	Hobaho wakawa kupilima mbela mbela muyisi yiyilya yose, wakanza kuwadinghula iwatamwa mu vitanda vyawo, wakawategula ko kose, kono wamuhulika Yesu vyono kowa yali kuko.
41006056	Na ko kose kono Yesu yabitaga, mu vikaya na mu makaya, hamba mu migunda, iwanhu wakawawika iwatamwa mu zisokoni, wakamunena wapamize hamba licindo lye civwalo cakwe du. Nawo wose wono wamupamiza, wakapona.
41007001	Iwafalisayo wanji hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wono wali wazize kulawa ku Yelusalemi, wakekongholela ha mwande ya Yesu.
41007002	Wakawona vyono iwejizwa wakwe wanji, walizaga mikate ne miwoko yono yitipiye, yono simizuguzwe.
41007003	(Hambi Iwafalisayo ne Wayahudi wanji wose, nha webate imyoto ye wasewo: siwalizaga cinji, hono wakali sinezuguza miwoko yawo vyono yinojeye.
41007004	Kanyhi, siwalizaga cinji co cose cono ciguligwe ku sokoni, sunga wamule wacizuguze. Kanyhi hoyili myoto yinji yono wayibocela kuwulawa katali, kotya kukwema vikombe, nyungu ne viya vye vyuma vizelu.)
41007005	Holeka Iwafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize wakamuwuza Yesu, wakutya, “Alu so cici wejizwa wako siwakuyicelelela imyoto yono cayibocela kulawa ku wakuku zetu, langa wene walizaga zindigwa ne miwoko yono yitipiye?”
41007006	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Nye nyo wakoci! Umuwizi Isaya yamuwililenyi ze mbeka lono yandika yakutya: ‘U Mulungu yakutya, I wanhu wawa wanumbaga kwe milomo yawo du, ninga mu zinhumbula zawo wali kutali nane.
41007007	No wuhembi wawo wa kuli'ne hamba si wukwiliye cinji, hambi zinghani zono wejizaga, nha malajilizo ga cimunhu-munhu du.’
41007008	“Anye mukulileka lilajilizo lya Mulungu no kwibata imalajilizo ge wanhu.”
41007009	Nayo Yesu yakajendelela kutya, “Anye nha mumanyile kwilega ko wusugu ililajilizo lyo Mulungu, ho muyityatye imyoto yenyu!
41007010	Hambi Musa nha yakalajiliza yakatya, ‘Wuwogopaje Usogo no Nyina yako,’ na ‘Mono yakulonga vibi kuli sogwe hamba kuli nyina, yimunojeye yuyo yafwe.’
41007011	Ninga anye mukwijiza vyono, ‘Hono munhu yena icinhu cono yali yadahile kuwataziza usogwe hamba unyina yakwe, ninga kanyhi ho yatye, icinhu cico yo Kolubani (nhunizo yayo cilavywe kuli Mulungu),
41007012	ati holeka si yimunojeye kanyhi yawataze i walezi wakwe.’
41007013	Holeka nhavivyo vyo mukuyibedegala inghani yo Mulungu, so imejizo genyu gono mukwibocezana. Kanyhi mukwituma makani ganji menji gono genha gago.”
41007014	Yesu kanyhi yakalicema i lipuga lye wanhu, yakalilonjela yakutya, “Muhulicizaje wose, kanyhi mwizuce.
41007015	Hasina cinji cono cikwinjila mugati yo munhu cono cikulawa munze cono cosuma kumwavufya munhu. Langa cono cilawaga mugati yo munhu co cikuwa kumwavufya munhu. [
41007016	Ale hulicenyi hono mwina makutu!]”
41007017	Yaza kulileka i lipuga lye wanhu no kwinjila mu kaya, iwejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza inhunizo ye cihwanicizo cico.
41007018	Nayo yakawatya, “Alu, hamba na nyenye simukwizuka hongo? Alu simukwizuka vyono i cinhu cono cikulawa munze no kwinjila mugati yo munhu si cosuma kumwavufya munhu yaye,
41007019	hambi nha sicikumwinjila mu nhumbula yakwe, langa cikwinjila munda yakwe du, na hanyuma yayo cilawanizaga kunze ku coloni?” (Na lono yalongaga zizo, Yesu yakazinoza ndigwa zose, swanu ku wulye.)
41007020	Yesu yakajendelela kutya, “Cono cilawaga mugati yo munhu co cimwavufya munhu.
41007021	Hambi mugati, mu zinhumbula ze wanhu nha mo galawaga mahweso mabi, gono gakuleta wusenyha, wuhizi, wuwulaji,
41007022	wusulumizi, wutili, wubugu, wubi, wukoci, wusisi, maligo, wiwoni no wulele.
41007023	Imabi gaga gose, go galawaga mugati yo munhu, nago goga kuwa kumwavufya munhu.”
41007024	Nayo Yesu yakawuka baho, yakabita ku yisi ya Tulo. Na kuko yakenjila mu kaya yinji yono siyasaka munhu yunji yamanye, ninga hamba nhavivyo, siyasuma kwihundika.
41007025	Na baho mucekulu yunji mono u muhinza wakwe yali yena licisi, yakazihulika zinghani za Yesu. Hodu yakawa kuza, yakagwa hasi ha mwande ye magulu ga Yesu.
41007026	Nayo umudala yuyo, yali si Muyahudi, yali mulelelwa mu yisi ye Wasilofoyinike. Ale, yakamulomba Yesu yalilavye licisi lyavu muli muhinza wakwe.
41007027	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Wulece ta wana wamule kwiguta, hambi nha si viswanu kusola zindigwa ze wana, kuwa kuzigumilila zimbwa.”
41007028	Ninga umudala yuyo yakatya, “Heya 'gwe Muwaha, ninga hamba ne zimbwa zono zili he 'vungu lye meza ye zindigwa, zilizaga i vidodo dodo vyono vikulagazwa ne wana.”
41007029	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Ku so wulonje wuwo, ale, wubite. Ilicisi lyakondya kulawila mo muhinza wako!”
41007030	Nayo yakabita ku kaya yakwe, yakamwagana umuhinza wakwe yagonile mu citanda, ne licisi lyakondya kumulawa.
41007031	Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakawuka mu'si ya Tulo, yakakolela mu Sidoni, yakafika kwi'lamba lya Galilaya, yakakolela mu'si ya Dekapoli.
41007032	Ale, wakamuletela munhu mono yali cibwibwi kanyhi yali ciziwi, wakamunena yamuwicile miwoko.
41007033	Nayo Yesu yakamutezeza ha mhelo ye lipuga lye wanhu, yakenjiza vidole vyakwe mu makutu, yakafunya mate no kumupamiza mu lulimi lwakwe.
41007034	Hanyuma yayo yakagalamila kucanyha ku wulanga, yakang'ula, yakamutya, “Efata, wo wutya, Diguka.”
41007035	Lo lulolulo imakutu gakwe gakadiguka no wuwopwe wo lulimi lwakwe lukahogoha, yakanza kulonga viswanu.
41007036	Yesu yakawalajiliza walece kumulonjela munhu ze litumo lilyo. Ninga mu nghango vyono yacila kuwalemeza, yo nghango yono nawo wakacila muno kuyitandaza i nghani yiyo.
41007037	I wanhu wakezina muno muno, wakatya, “Kanoza zose viswanu, yakuwanoza we ciziwi wahulice, na we cibwibwi walonje!”
41008001	Mu vilo vivyo lipuga yiwaha lye wanhu likekonghola kanyhi, nawo wali wasina ndigwa. Ale, Yesu yakawacema iwejizwa wakwe, yakawatya,
41008002	“Nghuwawonela lusungu wanhu wawa, hambi nha cekalana nane vilo vidatu, nawo wasina cinji co kulya.
41008003	Nane hono niwakombole wabite kwawo akuno wadabuce, wozilika mu nzila, hambi wayawo wanji nha walawa kutali.”
41008004	Nawo wejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu ahano nha nyika, ho yolawa hayi mikate yono yosuma kuwegutya i wanhu wawa wose?”
41008005	Nayo Yesu wakawawuza, yakutya, “Alu 'nye mwina mikate milinga?” Nawo wakamutya, “Mupunghati.”
41008006	Ale, yakawalajiliza wanhu wekale hasi. Nayo yakayisola mikate yiyilya vyono yili mupunghati, yakamulumba Mulungu, yakayibegula, yakawapela iwejizwa wakwe wawagawile wanhu, nawo wakawagawila.
41008007	Kanyhi wali wena ne visomba vicefu. Nayo Yesu yakavilugutiza, yakalajiliza wavigawe kuli wanhu nhavivyo.
41008008	Iwanhu wakalya, wakeguta. Wakatondoleza ivibegulwa vyono vyasigala wakamemya nhoto mupunghati.
41008009	Nawo wono walya wali waficile nha wanhu elufu yine. Yesu yakawakombola,
41008010	lo lulolulo yakenjila mu ngalawa hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, yakabita ku yisi ya Dalamanuta.
41008011	Iwafalisayo wakaza, wakanza kwiwuza na Yesu. Nawo wakawa kumujela, wakamusaka yawanozeze citanjilo cono cikulajila vyono mwene yena wukombolwe kulawa ku wulanga.
41008012	Yesu yakakalala muno mu nhumbula yakwe, yakatya, “Alu so cici u lulelo lulu lukusaka citanjilo? Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi lulelo lulu silopegwa citanjilo co cose.”
41008013	Hodu yakawaleka, yakenjila kanyhi mu ngalawa, yakalowoka ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba.
41008014	Iwejizwa wakasemwa kusoleleza ne mikate, nawo wali wena mukate monga du mu ngalawa.
41008015	Yesu yakawakong'onheza, yakutya, “Lanjenyi ta! Mweze musujile kuli cisase ce Wafalisayo ne cisase ca Helode.”
41008016	Iwejizwa wakanza kulongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Alu yakulonga nha vivyo vyono cisina mikate.”
41008017	Nayo Yesu yakamanya cono walongaga, yakawatya, “Alu so cici mukulongana nyo weneco wose vyono musina mukate? Alo mukali sinezuka du, hamba kumanya ng'o? Alo i zinhumbula zenyu zikamupe?
41008018	Alu nha mwina ne meso, simukuwona? Nha mwina ne makutu, simukuhulika? Alu simukukumbucila,
41008019	i cidaha cilya lono nayibegula mikate yiyilya mihano, no kuwapela wanhu elufu yihano? Wulenyi, mwatondola nhoto yilinga zono zali zimemile vibegulwa vyono vyasigala?” Wakamutya, “Ikumi na nyejete.”
41008020	“Na lono nayibegula mikate yiyilya mupunghati no kuwapela wanhu elufu yine, ma, mukatondola nhoto yilinga zono zali zimemile vibegulwa vyono vyasigala?” Wakamutya “Mupunghati.”
41008021	Nayo yakawatya, “Alu sunga nalu mukali si nezuka du?”
41008022	Yesu yakafika ku Betesayida hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe. Na kuko, wanhu wakamuletela munhu yunji we cibofu, wakamunena yamupamize.
41008023	Nayo Yesu yakamwibata muwoko munhu yuyo we cibofu, yakamutegula kunze ye cikaya ca Betesayida. Yakamubaka mate mu meso, yakamuwicila miwoko yakwe, yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Wule, wukusuma kuwona cinji.”
41008024	Nayo u munhu yuyo we cibofu yakalanga, yakatya, “Nghuwawona wanhu wakwijela kotya mabici gakujenda.”
41008025	Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakamuwicila kanyhi miwoko yakwe mu meso gakwe, nayo yakanugula muno, ne vilungo vyakwe vyo kuwona vikamuwuyila yakaviwona vyose viswanu nha vyono vinha.
41008026	Yesu yakamutya yabite ku kaya kwawo, yakamukong'onheza, yakutya, “Wulece hamba kwinjila mu cikaya!”
41008027	Hanyuma Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakabita ku vikaya vya Kayisaliya Filipi. Nawo lono wali wali mu nzila, Yesu yakawawuza iwejizwa wakwe, yakutya, “Alu wanhu wanhezaga nene nani?”
41008028	Wakamutya, “Wanhu wanji watezaga gwegwe yo Yohana u Mubaputizi, na wanji Eliya, ninga wanji watezaga wuli yumonga muyagwe ne wawizi.”
41008029	Nayo yakawawuza, yakutya, “Ninga anye nanye ma? Munhezaga nene nani?” Petelo yakamutya, “Agwe yo gwegwe Kilisito.”
41008030	Hanyuma Yesu yakawakong'onheza walece kumulonjela munhu wo wose zinghani zakwe.
41008031	Yesu yakanza kuwejiza iwejizwa wakwe, yakutya, “Yimunojeye u Mwana wo Munhu yatuje magazo menji no kulemwa ne wanyamhala, ne wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize. Kowulagwa na hanyuma ye vilo vidatu, kozuka.”
41008032	Yesu yakawalonjela nghani yiyo calinze. Holeka Petelo yakamuteza Yesu ha mhelo, yakanza kumutacila.
41008033	Ninga Yesu yakapituka, yakawalanga iwejizwa wakwe, yakamutacila Petelo yakutya, “Wuce hali'ne Setani! Imahweso gako si mahweso go Mulungu, langa ga cimunhu-munhu.”
41008034	Hanyuma Yesu yakalicema i lipuga lye wanhu, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, yakawatya, “Hono munhu wo wose yasace yawe mutyatyi wangu, yimunojeye yekapise mweneco, yawudinghule umusalaba wakwe.
41008035	Hambi munhu mono yakuhila kuwuponya wumi wakwe mweneco, nha kowajiliza, langa munhu mono kowajiliza u wumi wakwe, ku soko yangu na ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, yuyo, langa kowuponya u wumi wakwe.
41008036	Alu ma, u munhu kocituga cambuzici, hono yayituje yinze yose kono yalila, ninga yawajilize u wumi wakwe?
41008037	Hamba munhu kolavyaci, cihomele wumi wakwe?
41008038	Umunhu wo wose wa mu lulelo luluno lubi, lono si lukumucelelela Mulungu, hono yambonele soni nene, hamonga ne mejizo gangu, Umwana wo Munhu nayo, kolomuwonela soni u munhu yuyo, mwipango lyono kokuziza mu nhojo yo Sogwe, hamonga ne wamalayika wono welile.”
41009001	Yesu yakajendelela kuwalonjela yakutya, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono, ho wali wanji wono wali bahano, wono si wolofwa, lono wakali si nawuwona wutemi wo Mulungu wukuziza mu vilungo.”
41009002	Vyaza puluta vilo mutandatu, Yesu yakawasola Petelo, na Yakobo na Yohana, yakawategula kwi'tunda litali wali wene. Na kuko lono wali wamulanjile, Yesu yakapituka futa yakwe,
41009003	ne vivwalo vyakwe vikang'alala, vikawa vizelu swee, hamba musina munhu wo wose mononze yose, mono yali yasumile kuvyeza viwe vizelu swee nha vivilya.
41009004	Ale, Eliya na Musa nawo wakaza wakalongana na Yesu.
41009005	Nayo Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Mwijizi, nha viswanu muno muno vyono cili baha. Holeka ciba cizenje vibanda vidatu, cimonga cako, cimonga ca Musa na cimonga ca Eliya.”
41009006	Umwene ne wayagwe wakogopa muno, sunga yikamunoza Petelo yalece kumanya na cono yakulonga.
41009007	Ale, likaza yivunde likawagubika, ne lizi likahulikwa likulawa mwi'vunde lilyo, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu mwendece wangu, mweze kumuhulika.”
41009008	Lo lulolulo iwejizwa wakalanga kanyhi, ninga siwawona munhu yunji, langa Yesu du yali wene, hamonga na weneco hodu.
41009009	Na lono watimaga hasi ye litunda, Yesu yakawakong'onheza, walece kumulonjela munhu wo wose zono waziwene, sunga u Mwana wo Munhu kolo yakuzuka muli wafu.
41009010	Ale, wakebata lilajilizo lilyo, akuno wakwiwuza wuza weneco wose i nhunizo yo wuzuce muli wafu co cici.
41009011	Nawo wakamuwuza Yesu, wakutya, “Alu iwejizi wo Wulajilize nha watezaga vyono yinojeye Eliya yamule kuza?”
41009012	Nayo yakawatya, “Heya, Eliya kokwamula kuza kuviwikaniza vyose. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, nhawule, lu, yandicigwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, vyono, u Mwana wo Munhu kotuga magazo menji no kobedegalwa?
41009013	Ninga nghumutyenyi, vyono Eliya nha yakondya kuza, nawo wakamutendela vyose vyono wahilaga, nha vyono yali yandiciywe mwene.”
41009014	Nawo wali weza kuwagana awalya iwejizwa wanji, wakawona lipuga yiwaha lye wanhu baho. Na wanji wa mu wejizi wo Wulajilize, wewuzaga nawo.
41009015	Lo lulolulo ilipuga lililya lye wanhu lyaza kumuwona Yesu, wose wakezina muno, wakamumanyhilila wamulamuse.
41009016	Nayo Yesu yakawawuza yakutya, “Alu mukwiwuza cici nawo?”
41009017	Baho munhu yunji wa mwipuga lililya lye wanhu yakapitula, yakutya, “Go Mwijizi, ndeta mwanangu kuli 'gwe, yena licisi lyono likamunoza yawe cibwibwi.
41009018	Na nhondo zose kolo lyeza kumwibata, limugwisaga hasi, no kumunoza yalavye cifulo mu mulomo, akuno yakugwezula ne meno gakwe, kanyhi yakuganda muwili wose. Nane nghawalomba iwejizwa wako walilavye licisi lilyo, ninga hamba siwalisuma ng'o.”
41009019	Nayo Yesu yakapitula, yakutya, “Nye nyo lulelo lono lusina wihuwilo! Alu cokwikalana nanye sunga nili? Alu nomukangalilenyi sunga nili? Ale ta, mundetelaje yuyo muzelelo.”
41009020	Wakamuleta kuli mwene. Lo lulolulo licisi lilyo lyeza kumuwona Yesu, likamuzuganga umwana yuyo, nayo mwana yuyo yakagwa hasi, yakegalagaza no kulavya cifulo mu mulomo wakwe. Yesu yakamuwuza u sogwe yo mwana yuyo, yakutya.
41009021	“Alu zizino zamwijelela ku wulawa nili?” Nayo yakapitula, yakatya, “Kulawa wudodo wakwe.
41009022	Na kali kenji licisi lilyo, limugwisizaga mu moto na mu malenga, ho limongomezeze lukulu. Ale, holeka hono wusume, wuciwonele lusungu no kucitaza.”
41009023	Yesu yakamutya, “Ati hono kosuma! Zose nha zisumice kuli munhu mono yena wihuwilo.”
41009024	Baho, u sogo yo mwana yakalila ne'zi iwaha, yakutya, “Nihuwiye! Ninga uwihuwilo wangu wanjiye, wunhazaje.”
41009025	Nayo Yesu yaza kuliwona lipuga lye wanhu lyeza kumwikongholela lumangho hamwande yakwe, yakalitacila lililya licisi lyavu yakulitya, “Agwe go licisi mono wukumunoza u mwana yuyu yawe cibwibwi kanyhi yawe ciziwi, nghukutya, wulawe muli mwana yuyu, hamba wulece kwinjila muli mwene kanyhi!”
41009026	Baho licisi lilyo likazoza, likamugwisa u mwana yuyo hasi, hanyuma ho likawa kulawila muli mwene. No mwana yakawa nha yafwiye, sunga na wanji wakatya, “Yakondya kufwa!”
41009027	Ninga mwene Yesu yakamwibata muwoko wakwe, yakamwinula, nayo yakema.
41009028	Nayo Yesu yaza kwinjila mu kaya, iwejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza cinyele wakutya, “Alu nhawule ase sicasuma kulilavya?”
41009029	Nayo yakawatya, “Licisi lye liwala lili, silisumikaga kulavywa, langa ko wulombe du.”
41009030	Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakawuka baho, wakajendelela no muhinzo, wakakolela mu yisi ya Galilaya. Yesu siyenda iwanhu wakumanye kuko kono yali,
41009031	kusoko yawejizaga iwejizwa wakwe. Yakawatya, “Umwana wo Munhu kolavywa kuli wanhu wono womuwulaga, ninga kolo yawulagwa, hanyuma ye vilo vidatu kozuka kanyhi.”
41009032	Ninga i wejizwa hamba si wezuka ze nghani yiyo. Nawo wakogopa kumuwuza.
41009033	Ale, wakafika ku Kapelanawumi. Na lono yali mu nyumba yakawawuza, yakutya, “Mwali kwiwanganilaci mu nzila?”
41009034	Ninga wene wakanyamala, hambi mu nzila nha wewanganilaga weneco wose vyono nani 'mbi muwaha muli wene.
41009035	Yesu yakekala hasi, yakawacema wawalya we likumi na wejete, yakawatya, “Hono munhu yakuhila yawe mulongozi, yimunojeye yawe wa munyuma wa wose, na mwitumami wa wose.”
41009036	Ale, yakamusola mwana mudodo, yakamuwika haciligati yawo, yakamukumbatila, hanyuma yakawatya,
41009037	“Mono yakumubocela mwana mudodo mono yenha yuyu mwi'tagwa lyangu, yakumbocela nene, na mono yakumbocela nene, siyakumbocela nene du, langa yakumubocela yuyo mono yanhuma.”
41009038	Yohana yakamutya, “Mwijizi, cimuwona munhu yunji yakwitumamila i litagwa lyako no kugalavya macisi, nase cajela kumulemeza vyono mwene si muyagwe na sese.”
41009039	Ninga mwene Yesu yakawatya, “Mulece kumulemeza, hambi nha hasina munhu mono konoza yipoto yiwaha mwi'tagwa lyangu, na kunji kanyhi ho yasume kulonga nghani 'mbi muli'ne.
41009040	Vyono, mono si yali sili nase, ale yuyo yo muyetu.
41009041	Munhu wo wose mono komupelenyi cikombe ce malenga go kung'wa, vyono anye muli wanhu wakwe Kilisito, mbeka sikolokwanjila kutuga i cihumbilizwa cakwe.
41009042	“Munhu wo wose mono komunoza yumonga wa mu wadodo wawa wono wanyihuwiye yetume wubi, yali yiwe yili ciba, u munhu yuyo yawopelezwe mu singo lizala liwaha no kutagwa mwi'lenga.
41009043	No muwoko wako hono wukwiwajize, ale wuwudumulaje! Hambi nha yili ciba kuli'gwe winjile mu wumi, akuno wusina muwoko monga, si nho kuwa ne miwoko yose vyono myejete no kubita ku moto we Gehena. [
41009044	Na mumo, i masomi sigafwizaga, no moto wayo siwuzimaga yaye.]
41009045	No mugulu wako hono wukwiwajize, ale wuwudumulaje! Hambi nha yili ciba kuli'gwe kwinjila mu wumi akuno wusina mugulu monga, si nho kuwa ne migulu yose vyono myejete no kutagwa mu moto we Gehena. [
41009046	Na mumo, i masomi gayo sigafwizaga, no moto wayo siwuzimaga yaye.]
41009047	Ne liso lyako hono likwiwajize, ale wuliwusaje wulitaje, hambi nha yili ciba kuli'gwe winjile mu wutemi wo Mulungu wina liso limonga du, si nho kuwa ne meso gako gose vyono mejete, no kutagwa mu moto we Gehena.
41009048	Na mumo i masomi gayo sigafwizaga, no moto siwuzimaga yaye.
41009049	Hambi wose nha wolopembelwa mu moto.
41009050	Umwino nha muswanu, ninga hono wususulice, cinhuci kanyhi cono cogomoleza indaso yayo? Muweze no mwino muli nyenye nyo weneco, kanyhi mweze kwikala mwilamuye nyenye wose.”
41010001	Nayo Yesu yakawuka baho, yakabita ku yisi ya Yudiya, sunga ko ku nhumbi nzagwe ye likolongo lya Yoludani. Ilipuga lye wanhu likamuziza kanyhi, nayo yakawejiza kanyhi nha vyono yali yazoweye.
41010002	Ale, Iwafalisayo wakamuziza, wakasaka kumujela, wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Wule, munhu yena wukombolwe yamupele u mugolece wakwe talaka.”
41010003	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Ma, Musa yamupelenyi wulajilizeci?”
41010004	Nawo wakatya, “Musa yalajiliza vyono, u mulume kosuma kumupela umugolece wakwe talaka no kumuleka.”
41010005	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Musa, yamwandicilenyi lilajilizo lilyo, ku soko yo wukamu we zinhumbula zenyu.
41010006	Ninga ku wulawa ku mwamulizo wo wuwumbwe we yinze, u Mulungu yawumba mulume no mucekulu.
41010007	Holeka mulume kowaleka u sogwe no nyina, no kwilunza no mugolece wakwe,
41010008	nawo vyono wejete wowa muwili monga. Ku soko yiyo si wejete kanyhi, langa muwili monga.
41010009	Holeka cono yacilunza Mulungu, munhu yalece kucitemanula.”
41010010	Nawo wali weza kwinjila kanyhi mu nyumba, iwejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza ze nghani yiyo.
41010011	Nayo yakapitula yakawatya, “Munhu wo wose mono komuleka mugolece wakwe, no kutola yunji, yakwipela wusenyha kuli mugolece wakwe.
41010012	No mucekulu nayo mono yakumuleka u mulume wakwe, no kutolwa na yunji, nayo yakusenyha.”
41010013	Iwanhu wakamuletela Yesu iwana wadodo ho yawapamize, ninga wene iwejizwa wakawatacila.
41010014	Nayo Yesu yaza kuziwona zizo, yakakolwa yikuwo, yakawatya iwejizwa wakwe, “Walecenyi wawo iwana wadodo wanyizize, mulece kuwemila, hambi u wutemi wo Mulungu nha wuli so wanhu wono wenha iwana wadodo wawa.
41010015	Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono, munhu wo wose mono siyakuwubocela u Wutemi wo Mulungu nha mwana mudodo, hamba sikokwinjila mu wutemi wuwo ng'o.”
41010016	Ale, yakawadinghula mu miwoko yakwe, yakawawicila miwoko, yakawalugutiza.
41010017	Na lono Yesu yatulukaga kanyhi ku muhinzo wakwe, u munhu yunji yakamuziza lumangho, yakafugama hamwande yakwe, yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Go Mwijizi muswanu, nhende wule ho niwutuje u wumi we cibitilila?”
41010018	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Alu so cici wukunyhema muswanu? Hasina yunji mono muswanu, langa Mulungu yali wene du.
41010019	Alu wugamanyile imalajilizo? Wulece kusenyha, wulece kuhiza, wulece kuhomelela wulambi, wuwogopaje usogo no nyina yako.”
41010020	Nayo yakamutya, “Mwijizi, gose gaga nigebate ku wulawa wudodo wangu.”
41010021	Nayo Yesu yakamulanga, yakamwenda, yakamutya, “Alu wukusakwa witume nghani monga du, nayo yoyi, wubite wukaguze ivinhu vyose vyono wina navyo, wukawapele waciwa, nagwe kowa na sawo ku wulanga, hanyuma ho wuze wunhyatye.”
41010022	Nayo yali yeza kuzihulika zizo, hamba si yendezwa yaye, yakawuka akuno yakalaye, hambi nha yali yena sawo nyinji.
41010023	Yesu yakalanga kose kose, yakawatya iwejizwa wakwe, “Nha kukamu ta kuli wagoli, kuwinjila mu Wutemi wo Mulungu.”
41010024	Ne wejizwa wakezina muno so zinghani zakwe. Yesu yakawalonjela kanyhi, yakatya, “Nyo wanangu, kukamu muno kuwinjila mu Wutemi wo Mulungu!
41010025	Ninga kupelu kuli ngamiya yikole mu cilanga co lusing'ani, si nha u munhu mugoli kuwinjila mu Wutemi wo Mulungu.”
41010026	Ne wejizwa wakwe wakezina muno, wakewuza weneco wose, wakutya, “Alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kupona?”
41010027	Nayo Yesu yakawalanga, yakawatya, “Kuli wanhu siyisumice, ninga si nhavivyo kuli Mulungu, hambi kuli Mulungu, zose nha zisumice.”
41010028	Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Ase nase ma? Lanje, ase caleka vyose cikakutyatya!”
41010029	Yesu yakatya, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono, munhu wo wose mono yalecile kaya, hamba wawahaze, hamba walumbuze, hamba nyina, hamba sogwe, hamba migunda ku soko yangu na ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu,
41010030	mu mapango gaga, kopegwa kali 'gana no kuciza, zikaya, wawahaze, walumbuze, nyina, wana, ne migunda, hamonga ne magazo, ne vilo vyono vikuza, kobocela wumi we cibitilila.
41010031	Ninga wenji iwalongozi wolowa wa munyuma, na wa munyuma, wolowa walongozi.”
41010032	Ale, wali wali mu nzila wakubita ku Yelusalemi, nayo yali yawalongoleye. Nawo iwejizwa wakwe wakogopa muno, ne wanhu wono wawatyatyaga wakogopa. Nayo Yesu yakawasola kanyhi wali wene hamhelo, wawalya we likumi na wejete, yakanza kuwalonjela zizo zono zomwagana,
41010033	“Yakawatya, Hulicizenyi ta! Cikubita ku Yelusalemi, na kuko u Mwana wo Munhu, kokombolwa kuli wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, nawo womuling'aniza yawulagwe, no kumukombola kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
41010034	Nawo womuzwajiza, womufunyila mate, womukunanga no kumuwulaga. Hanyuma ye vilo vidatu kozuka.”
41010035	Yakobo na Yohana, wana wa Zebedayo, wakamuziza Yesu wakamutya, “Mwijizi cikusaka wucinozeze cinhu cono cokulomba.”
41010036	Nayo Yesu yakawawuza, yakutya, “Alu mukusaka nimunozezenyi ci?”
41010037	Wakatya, “Wucikombole ase cikale yumonga ku lubavu lwako lo kulume na yunji ku lubavu lwako lo kucekulu, kolo wukwinjila mu nhojo yako.”
41010038	Yesu yakawatya, “Simumanyile cono mukulomba! Ma, mosuma kung'wa cikombe ce Magazo cono ane nong'wa, hamba kubaputizwa nha vyono nobaputizwa 'ne?”
41010039	Wakapitula, wakamutya, “Cosuma.” Yesu yakawatya, “I Cikombe cono nog'wa heya mbeka nanye mong'wa, kanyhi mobaputizwa nha vyono nobaputizwa'ne.
41010040	Ninga ku wikala kulume hamba kucekulu kwangu, si mulimo wangu kunoza, langa wopegwa wawo wono wawikanizizwa.”
41010041	Wawalya iwejizwa wanji we likumi waza kuzihulika zizo, wakanza kuwasimbila wa Yakobo na Yohana.
41010042	Nayo Yesu yakawacema yakawatya, “Mwene mumanyile vyono wono watezwaga watemi we Makungugo, vyono wawatemaga wanhu wawo kwe vilungo, ne wawaha wawo vyono wena wulajilize muli wanhu wawo.
41010043	Ninga kuli'nye, yilece kuwa nhavivyo, langa mono kosaka kuwa muwaha muli nyenye, yimunojeye yawe mwitumami wenyu.
41010044	Mono yakusaka kuwa mulongozi, yimunojeye yawe mwitumami wa wose.
41010045	Hambi u Mwana wo Munhu nha si yaza ho yetumamilwe, langa yetume no kusuza u wumi wakwe so wukombozwe we wanhu wenji.”
41010046	Ale, wakafika ku Yeliko, nayo Yesu lono yawukaga mwi'kaya lilyo, yena ne wejizwa wakwe, hamonga ne lipuga yiwaha lye wanhu, u munhu yunji mwilombelezi we cibofu, mono yacemwaga Batilimayo mwana wa Timayo, yali yekaye ha mhelo ye libalabala.
41010047	Nayo yali yeza kuhulika vyono yo Yesu wa ku Nazaleti mono yakupuluta hanhu baho, hodu yakanza kuzoza, yakutya, “Gwe Yesu, Mwana wa Dawudi Wumbonele lusungu!”
41010048	Ne wanhu wenji wakamutacila ho yanyamale, ninga mwene ho yakacila muno kuzoza, yakutya, “Mwana wa Dawudi, Wumbonele lusungu.”
41010049	Nayo Yesu yakema, yakatya, “Mucemenyi.” Ale, wakamucema yuyo we cibofu, wakamutya, “Wisindamice! Winuce, yakukucema.”
41010050	Nayo yakacigumila icivwalo cakwe, yakazumha, yakamubitila Yesu.
41010051	Yesu yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Alu wukusaka nghutendele wule?” Yuyo we cibofu yakamutya, “Mwijizi, nghulomba sume kuwona kanyhi.”
41010052	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wubite, wihuwilo wako wakuponya.” Lo lulolulo yuyo we cibofu yakasuma kuwona kanyhi, nayo yakamutyatya Yesu mu muhinzo.
41011001	Na lono wali weza behi na Yelusalemi, wakafika ku Betifage na ku Betaniya, behi ne Litunda lye Mizeyituni. Baho yakawatuma wejete wa muli wejizwa wakwe,
41011002	yakawatya, “Bitenyi ku citumbi cono cili kumwande yenyu. Na kolo mukwinjila mumo, mokwagana nyana ya ndogowe mbopwe, yono yikali netumamilwa na munhu. Ale, muyiwopolelaje muyilete.
41011003	Hono munhu yunji yamuwuzenyi, ‘Alu so cici mukunoza nhavivyo? “Muteze,” Umuwaha yakuyisaka, ninga kanyhi koyigomola bahano musunho.’ ”
41011004	Ale, nawo wakabita, wakayagana nyana monga ye ndogowe mu nzila mbopwe ha mulango. Nawo lono wayiwopolaga,
41011005	wanhu wanji wono wali wemile baho, wakawawuza wakutya, “Alu so cici mukuyiwopola nyana yiyo ye ndogowe?”
41011006	Nawo wejizwa wakapitula nha vyono wali walonjeywe na Yesu, nawo wakawaleka wabite.
41011007	Wakamutegulila Yesu yiyo nyana ye ndogowe. Wakatandika myenda yawo mucanyha ya yiyo nyana ye ndogowe, nayo Yesu yakekala mucanyha yayo.
41011008	Ne wanhu wenji wakatandika myenda yawo mu nzila, wanji nawo wakatandika manhambi ge mabici gono watema mu migunda.
41011009	Ne wanhu wose wono wali walongoleye, na wawalya wono watyatyaga mu nyuma, wakazoza wakutya, “Yalumbwe Mulungu! Mumoti yuyo mono yakuziza mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha!
41011010	Nha wumoteswe u wutemi wono wukuza wa Dawudi usogo yetu. Yalumbwe Mulungu kucanyha ku wulanga!”
41011011	Nayo Yesu yali yeza kwinjila mwi'kaya lya Yelusalemi, yakabita sunga ko ku Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakavilanga vinhu vyose. Ninga vyono cali ceza cinyamihe, yakabita ku Betaniya hamonga na wawalya we likumi na wejete.
41011012	Ne mitondo yaco, lono walawaga ku Betaniya, Yesu yakadabuka.
41011013	Baho, yakawuwonela cidaha u mukuyu wono wali wudedewaye mahamha menji. Yakawubitila ho yawone hono wuwe wina mikalo yo yose. Nayo yaza kuwuficila, yakawagana wusina hamba mukalo wo wose, langa mahamha gali wene du, hambi nha cali cikali sinaficila i cipango co mukuyu kulela mikalo.
41011014	Baho yakawutya mukuyu, “Hasina munhu mono kolya kanyhi mikalo yako sunga cibitilila.” Nawo iwejizwa wakwe wakazihulika i zinghani zizo.
41011015	Ale, wakafika ku Yelusalemi. Yesu yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakanza kuwawinjila kunze i wanhu wono waguzaga no kugula vinhu mumo. Yakazigwisanga izimeza za wawalya wono wakawaga zipesa, ne magoda ga wawalya wono waguzaga zinziwa.
41011016	Hamba si yamukombola munhu wo wose yakole mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yadinghuye cinji.
41011017	Hanyuma yakawejiza, yakutya, “Yandikwa, ‘Nyumba yangu yocemwa nyumba yo wulombelo kuli makungugo gose! Ninga 'nye mwayinoza mhango ye wahizi!’ ”
41011018	Nawo Iwakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wali weza kuzihulika zizo, wakanza kulondola nzila yo kumongomezeza. Ninga hamba nhavivyo wamogopa, ku soko i lipuga lye wanhu likezina muno so mejizo gakwe.
41011019	Na lono yali yeza kuwa cinyamihe, Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakawuka mwi'kaya.
41011020	Nawo lono wapulutaga, hakali mitondo muno, wakawuwona mukuyu wuwulya wanyala wose, sunga ne milela yayo.
41011021	Nayo Petelo yakawukumbucila, yakamutya Yesu, “Mwijizi, langa ta! Umukuyu wuwulya wono wawulijita, wanyala!”
41011022	Yesu yakawatya, “Mwihuwilenyi Mulungu.
41011023	Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka vyono, hono munhu yalilonjele litunda lili yatye, ‘Wukulice wutagwe mwi'lenga!’ Hono yalonje kuno yasina mahwele mu nhumbula yakwe, langa yehuwiye vyono zose zono yalonjile zonozeka, heya kotendelwa inghani yiyo.
41011024	Holeka nghumutyenyi, lono mukulomba no kusaka cinji, mwihuwile du vyono mwakondya kupegwa, nanye mozituga.
41011025	Kolo mukwima no kulomba, muwanenelaje wose wono wamusutizyenyi nghani yo yose, nayo u Sogo yenyu mono yali ku wulanga ho komunenelenyi nanye i masutya genyu. [
41011026	Ninga hono mulece kuwanenela wanji i masutya gawo, hambo sogo yenyu mono yali ku wulanga sikomunenelenyi nanye imasutya genyu yaye.]”
41011027	Wakafika kanyhi ku Yelusalemi. Na lono Yesu yajenda jendaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, Iwakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, ne wanyamhala, wakamubitila,
41011028	wakamuwuza, wakumutya, “Alu mwene wukuzinoza zinghani zizi ko wulajilizeci? Alo nani mono yakupelile u wulajilize wo kuzinoza zinghani zizi?”
41011029	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Nane nomuwuzenyi nghani monga, hono mumhitule, ale, nane ho nomulonjelenyi vyono ko wulajilizeci holeka nghuzinoza zinghani zizi.
41011030	Wulenyi, ma, u wulajilize wa Yohana wo kubaputiza walawa ku wulanga hamba kuli wanhu? Ta, mhitulenyi.”
41011031	Nawo wakanza kwiwanganila weneco wose, wakutya, “Hono citye, ‘Walawa ku wulanga.’ Nayo kociwuza yatye, ‘Alu so cici simwamwihuwila?’
41011032	Na hono citye, ‘Walawa kuli wanhu!’ ” Wakogopa i lipuga lye wanhu, hambi wose nha wali wehuwiye vyono Yohana yali muwizi mbeka.
41011033	Holeka wakamupitula Yesu wakatya, “Ase sicimanyile.” Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu hamba na nene kumbe sinomulonjelenyi vyono ko wulajilizeci holeka nghuzinoza i zinghani zizino.”
41012001	Yesu yakanza kulongana nawo mu cihwanicizo yakutya, “Munhu yunji yalima mugunda we mizabibu. Yakawusitila no mululu, na haciligati yayo, yakahimba likombo lyo kukobonjela divayi, yakazenga ne cilingo citali. Yakawukoza mugunda wuwo kuli walimi, u mwene yakatuluka muhinzo sunga ku yisi ya kutali.
41012002	Na mu wupilo we mikalo, yakatuma mwitumami wakwe kuli wawalya iwalimi, ho yamuletele mikalo yo mugunda wakwe.
41012003	Ninga wawalya walimi wakamwibata, wakamutowanga, wakamuwinga yasina hamba cinji.
41012004	Yakatuma kanyhi mwitumami yunji, na yuyu nayo kanyhi, wakamutula mazeya mu mutwe, no kumutendela vibi.
41012005	Nayo yuyulya munya mugunda, yakatuma mwitumami yunji kanyhi, ninga iwalimi wawo wakamuwulaga. Na wanji, wenji wono watumwa, wanji wakatowangwa, na wanji wakawulagwa.
41012006	Nayo yakawa yakali yasigaliywe no munhu monga du, nayo yo mwanagwe mwendece. Na handumilizo, yakamutuma yuyo akuno yakutya, ‘Womogopa mwanangu.’
41012007	Ninga iwalimi wawo wakalongana weneco wose, wakutya, ‘Ayu yo muhazi, alenyi nye cimuwulaje, ho wuhazi wakwe wuwe wetu!’
41012008	Holeka wakamwibata, wakamuwulaga, no kumugumila kunze yo mugunda wuwulya we mizabibu.
41012009	“Ale lu, u munya mugunda ho kotendaci? Kokuza yawongomeze i walimi wawo, no kuwukoza mugunda wuwo we mizabibu kuli wanhu wanji.
41012010	Wulenyi, si mwasoma i Mandiko gaga gono gakutya, ‘Ilibwe lyono walilema iwazenji alu lyanozwa liwe lyo libwe liwaha lyo musinji,
41012011	U Muwaha yoyayinozize inghani yiyi, nayo yo nghani yo wizine kuli'se.’ ”
41012012	Iwakohani wawaha ne Wejizi wo Wulajilize ne wanyamhala, wakatanga vyono i cihwanicizo cico calongaga weneco. Holeka wakajela kumwibata, ninga wakalyogopa i lipuga lye wanhu. Holeka wakamuleka wakawa kubita.
41012013	Ale, Iwafalisayo wanji, hamonga ne watyatyi we cipuga ca Helode, watumwa ho wamugwizize Yesu mu wulonje wakwe.
41012014	Wakamubitila, wakamutya, “Mwijizi, nha cimanyile vyono agwe uli munhu we mbeka, mono kulongaga ze mbeka du, hamba sikucelelelaga munhu wo wose. Hamba lilumbo lya munhu, nha si cinji kuli'gwe, ninga kuwejizaga imbeka ye nzila yo Mulungu. Wule, viswanu kumulipa kodi Kayisali, hamba ng'o? Alu cilavye, hamba cilece kulavya?”
41012015	Ninga mwene Yesu yali yawumanyile u wukoci wawo, holeka yakawatya, “Alu so cici mukunjela? Mundajilaje ta silinje niyilanje.”
41012016	Nawo wakamulajila. Nayo yakawawuza, yakutya, “Hwani yiyi no lwandiko lulu vya nani?” Wakamutya, “Vya Kayisali.”
41012017	Yesu yakawatya, “Mumulavizye Kayisali vyakwe Kayisali, nayo Mulungu vyakwe Mulungu.” Wakamwizina muno.
41012018	Iwasadukayo wono watezaga kusina wuzuce, wakamuziza Yesu wakamuwuza, wakutya,
41012019	“Mwijizi, Musa yacilajiliza yakatya nhavi: ‘Hono munhu yafwe, yalece mugolece yasina mwana, yinojeye umwanakwawe yamuhale mugolece yuyo mufwile, ho yamulelele wana umuwahawe mono yafwa.’
41012020	Ale, kwali na wanhu mupunghati walume, sogo yawo yumonga. Umulongozi yakatola, yakafwa yasina wana.
41012021	Na we kejete yakamutola yuyo mucekulu, nayo kanyhi yakafwa yasina wana, na we kadatu nayo nha vivyo.
41012022	Nawo wose vyono wali wali mupunghati, wakafwa wasina wana. Na hanyuma yayo, nayo yuyo umugolece mufwile yakafwa.
41012023	Ale, mwi'zuwa kolo wanhu wakuzuka, u mucekulu yuyo kolowa mugolece wa nani? Hambi wose vyono wali wali mupunghati nha wali wamutolile.”
41012024	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Anye nyo weneco musutizye muno, vyono si mugamanyile i Mandiko Gono Gelile hamba ivilungo vyo Mulungu.
41012025	Hambi iwanhu kolo wakuzuka, nha siwolotola hamba kutolwa yaye, langa wolowa wehwanile ne wamalayika wa ku wulanga.
41012026	Ninga ze wafu vyono wazukulagwa, Alo simunasoma citabu ca Musa mwifungu lyono likulonga ze cititika cono cakaga moto? U Mulungu yamulonjela Musa yakatya, ‘Ane yonene Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na Isaka na Yakobo.’
41012027	Holeka u mwene yo si Mulungu we wafu langa we womi. Anye mukuwa kusutya muno muno.”
41012028	Yunji wa muli wejizi wo Wulajilize yakaza, nayo yakawuhulika u wiwanganile wawo. Nayo yaza kumuwona Yesu vyono yawapitula viswanu, yakasejelela yakamuwuza yakutya, Ati, mu malajilizo gose, i lilajilizo lilongozi lyo lya hayi?
41012029	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Ililongozi lyoli, ‘Hulicize ta Isilayeli! U Muwaha Mulungu wetu, mweneco du yo Muwaha.
41012030	Nagwe wumwendaje Muwaha Mulungu wako kwe nhumbula yako yose, na ko mutima wako wose, na kwe mahala gako gose, na kwe vilungo vyako vyose.’
41012031	Na lye kejete lyo'li, ‘Wumwendaje muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco. Hasina lilajilizo linji yiwaha lyono licizize gaga.’ ”
41012032	Ale, yuyulya umwijizi wo Wulajilize yakamutya, “Ale viswanu Mwijizi! Kulonga mbeka vyono u Mulungu yumonga du, hamba hasina yunji langa mwene du.
41012033	Holeka yimunojeye munhu yamwende u Mulungu kwe nhumbula yakwe yose, na kwe mahala gakwe gose, na kwe vilungo vyakwe vyose, no kumwenda muyagwe nha vyono yeyendile mweneco. Ne Nghani yiyi yo mbaha muno yicizize sunga ne vilavywa vyo kunyanywa hamonga ne makumbiko ganji gose kuli Mulungu.”
41012034	Nayo Yesu yaza kuwona vyono umunhu yuyu yamupituye kwe mahala, yakamutya, “Agwe si wuli kutali no wutemi wo Mulungu.” Hanyuma ya zizo hasina munhu mono yejelela kanyhi kumuwuza cinji.
41012035	Na lono Yesu yejizaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawuza yakutya, “Alu nhawule iwejizi wo Wulajilize watezaga vyono Kilisito yo mwana wa Dawudi?
41012036	Na Dawudi mweneco mu wutongwe no Muhe Mono Yelile yalonga yakatya, ‘U Muwaha yamulonjela Muwaha wangu yakatya, Wikale ku lubavu lwangu lo kulume, sunga kolo nghuwika iwalugu wako wukanyago we magulu gako.’
41012037	“Na Dawudi mweneco nha yakumucema Kilisito, Muwaha. Alu Kilisito ho kowa wule mwanagwe kanyhi?” Ne lipuga lye wanhu likawa limuhulicize akuno lisangalaye muno.
41012038	Mu mejizo gakwe Yesu yalonga yakutya, “Musuguce kuli wejizi wo Wulajilize, wono wendile kujenda jenda ako, na ako akuno wavwalile zikanzo zinhali no kulamuswa ne wanhu kwe cogopo mu Sokoni, kanyhi wendile kwikala mu magoda matambule mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo,
41012039	no kwikala i hanhu hatambule mu zindigwa ze zisikukuu.
41012040	Wakuwewonela i wacekulu wafwile, no kuwasolela i vinhu vyawo, akuno wakwikonjeleza ko kulomba wulombe wutali muno! Ninga mwizuwa lyo wuling'anizwe, wolotuga wulipicizwe wuwaha muno.”
41012041	Yesu yali yekaye behi ne lisanduku lyo wuwiko we zisawo. Nayo yakawa yakulanjilila vyono wanhu wenji walavyaga zipesa no kuzitajila mu wuwiko we zisawo ze Nyumba yo Mulungu. Iwagoli wenji wakalavya pesa nyinji.
41012042	Baho yakaza mudala yunji muciwa kanyhi mufwile, nayo yakalavya vipesa vyejete vyono vina cifo ca sendi 'kumi.
41012043	Baho Yesu yakawacema iwejizwa wakwe yakawatya, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, mudala ayu muciwa kanyhi mufwile, nha kalavya kuciza wanji wose wono watajiye zipesa mwi'sanduku lyo wuwiko we zisawo.
41012044	Hambi wose nha walavya ku wulawa mu wucizilize wo winji we zisawo zawo, ninga mudala ayu, hamba yawe nha muciwa, ninga kalavya vyose vyono yena navyo, kalavya vyose vyono yali yetumbiye so wuwumipe wakwe.”
41013001	Na lono Yesu yalawilaga kunze ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, yunji wa muli wejizwa wakwe yakamutya, “Mwijizi, langa ta imabwe gaga, ne mazengo gaga vyono ga wizine.”
41013002	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Ma, wukugawona mazengo gaga mawaha? Hasina hamba libwe limonga lyono lyolosigala mucanyha ye libwe liyagwe, hambi gose nha golokumulwa.”
41013003	Na lono Yesu yali yekaye mucanyha ye Litunda lye Mizeyituni vidomile ne Nyumba yo Mulungu, Petelo na Yakobo na Yohana na Andeleya wakamuwuza cinyele, wakutya,
41013004	“Wucilonjelaje ta zinghani zizi zolowa za nili? Ne citanjiloci cono colajila vyono zinghani zizi zili behi kufisilizwa?”
41013005	Yesu yakanza kuwalonjela yakutya, “Musuguce, ho mulece kukongwa na munhu.
41013006	Hambi wenji nha wolokuza, nawo wolokwitumamila i litagwa lyangu, wakutya, ‘Ane yo nene!’ Nawo wolowajiliza wanhu wenji.
41013007	Nanye kolo mukuhulika zo wulugu ne zinganuzi zo wulugu, mulece kogopa. Hambi zinghani zizi nha sizoleka kuza, ninga indumilizo yeneco yikali sinaza.
41013008	Ne likungugo linji lyolokwihoma ne likungugo liyagwe, no wutemi wunji wolokwihoma no wutemi wuyagwe, ne hanhu hose, holowa ne matulo ne mazala. Ne zinghani zizi, wowa kotya nha wo mwamulizo wo wusungu wo kulelela mwana.
41013009	“Ninga 'nye musuguce. Hambi iwanhu nha wolomutegulenyi kuli mahakama, no kumutowenyi mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo. Molotegulwa ha mwande ye walongola ne watemi ku soko yangu, ho muhomelele kuli wene.
41013010	Ninga yinojeye u Luganuzi Luswanu lwamule kuganulwa kuli makungugo gose.
41013011	Nawo kolo wakumwibatenyi, no kumutegulenyi kuli mahakama, mulece kutuga mahwele vyono molongaci, ninga i lipango lilyo kolo lyafika, ale mulonje co cose cono molopegwa, hambi nha si nyenye mono mololonga, langa yo Muhe Mono Yelile.
41013012	No munhu kolomukombola unduguye yawulagwe, nayo usogo yo munhu, kolomukombola umwanagwe, iwana nawo wolowatowanga iwalezi wawo no kuwawulaga.
41013013	Ne wanhu wose wolomusulenyi'nye, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu. Ninga mono kolokangalila sunga ko ku ndumo, yuyo yo kolopona.
41013014	“Molowona liwifyo lyo wuhodanjice limile hono si hanhu halyo. (Mono yakusoma yezuce nhunizo yayo!) Na baho iwanhu wono wali mu Yudiya, wamanyhile mu matunda.
41013015	No munhu mono yali kucanyha ye litembe yalece kutima hasi no kwinjila mu kaya yakwe ho yasole cinji.
41013016	Na mono yali ku mugunda, yalece kuwuya kusola civwalo cakwe.
41013017	Ninga woyi he 'nye kuli wawo wono wena mida na wono wakosa mu vilo vivyo!
41013018	Mulombe i zinghani zizi, ho zilece kwijela mu vilo vye mbeho nghali.
41013019	Hambi mwipango lilyo, nha kolowa no wugazwe wono wukali sinejela ku wulawa vyono u Mulungu yayiwumba yinze sunga nalu, hamba siwulejela kanyhi.
41013020	Na hono u Muwaha yali yalece kuvicepula i vilo vivyo, hasina hamba munhu mono yali yapone. Ninga ku soko ye wahagulwa wakwe, holeka Muwaha yavicepula i vilo vivyo.”
41013021	“Holeka hono munhu yamutyenyi, ‘Lanjenyi ta, Kilisito ayu hano!’ hamba lunji yatye, ‘Mulanje yali ahalya,’ mulece kumwihuwila.
41013022	Hambi nha wolokwijela wanhu wo wulambi lambi wono wokwiyitya weneco yo Kilisito, ne wawizi wo wulambi lambi, nawo wolonoza vitanjilo ne mezino, ho wajilize i wahagulwa wo Mulungu, hono yisumice.
41013023	Ninga anye musuguce. Hambi ane nha nimulonjelenyi zinghani zizi zose lono zikali sizinejela yaye.
41013024	“Ale, mu vilo vivyo, wulaza kuwa wapuluta u wugaye wuwo, ilizuwa lyolotukuwala no mwezi siwolosana ng'o.
41013025	Ne zinyelezi zologwa ku wulawa ku wulanga, ne vilungo vya ku wulanga vyolosinjiswa.
41013026	Ale baho ho wolomuwona u Mwana wo Munhu yakuziza mu mavunde kwe vilungo viwaha ne nhojo.
41013027	Hanyuma yayo kolowatuma wamalayika wakwe, kolowakonghola iwahagulwa wakwe kulawa ku zimbavu zose yine za kono'nze, ku wulawa ku mwamulizo we yinze, sunga ko ku ndumo nyagwe ye yinze.”
41013028	“Alu mwiyijizizaje ta mu mukuyu i cihwanicizo aci, I manhambi gayo lono gakwamula du kutula i mahamha, anye mukumanya vyono lifuku lyasejelela.
41013029	Ale nhavivyo na nyenye, kolo mukuwona zinghani zizo zeza kuwa nhavivyo, ale mumanye nha vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yaza yali behi muno muno.
41013030	Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono ululelo lulu silopuluta ng'o sunga zinghani zizi zose ziwe zakondya kufisilizwa.
41013031	Uwulanga ne'nze zolopuluta, ninga zinghani zangu sizolopuluta ng'o.”
41013032	“Ninga kusina munhu wo wose mono yamanyile lizuwa hamba cipango cico vyono cokuza nili, hambe wamalayika wa ku wulanga, hambo mwana wo munhu, langa Baba yali wene du, yo yamanyile.
41013033	Musuguce, mwikalaje meso, hambi nha simumanyile cipango cico hono cokuza nili.
41013034	Yolowa nha munhu mono yakuwuka mu kaya yakwe yakubita ku muhinzo, yakuwalecela i wetumami wakwe wulajilize, munhu no mulimo wakwe, yakamulonjela no mulindiliza mulango yekale meso.
41013035	Ale, mwikalaje meso, hambi nha simumanyile munya kaya kolokuza nili, na lunji yolowa mu cinyamihe, mu cilo mugati, mu nzogolo hamba hakali mitondo.
41013036	Mwikalaje meso hono yaze nhinicizo ho yalece kumwaganenyi mugonile.
41013037	Na zono nghumulonjelenyi nyenye, nghuwalonjela na wose, nghutya, Mwikalaje meso!”
41014001	Na lono vyali vikali vilo vyejete du, ho yiwe sikukuu ya Pasaka na ye mikate yono siyisasize. Iwakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, walondolaga nzila yo kumwibata Yesu ko wusugu ho wamuwulaje.
41014002	Ninga hamba nhavivyo wakatya, “Cilece kumwibata mwizuwa lye sikukuu, ho yilece kuwa wuma muli wanhu.”
41014003	Nayo Yesu lono yali yali ku Betaniya, mu kaya ya Simoni Mukoma. Na lono yalizaga zindigwa ha meza, yakaza mucekulu yunji mono yali yena supa ye mafuta go wulenzi go wuguzi wukamu, yakayitula supa yiyi, yakamujidila Yesu mafuta gago mu mutwe wakwe.
41014004	Na wanji wa muli wanhu wono wali wali baho, wakasimba wakawa kulongana weneco wose wakutya, “Alu so cici mafuta gaga gajilizwe caka caka nha vivi?
41014005	Hambi nha gali gaguzwe pesa zono zificile dinali magana madatu, ho wapegwe waciwa!” Hodu wakamutacila u mucekulu yuyo.
41014006	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Mulecenyi, alu nhawule mukumugaza? Kanyitumila mulimo muswanu.
41014007	Hambi iwaciwa nha muwezanaga nawo nhondo zose, holeka mosuma kuwataza mwipango lyo lyose lyono mwendile. Ninga ane, si mosuma kuwezana nane nhondo zose.
41014008	U Mwene kanoza nha vyono yadahile, kawubaka umuwili wangu mafuta so wuwikanizwe wo wuzikwe wangu mu citenjelo.
41014009	Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono, ho hose mono yinze yose, hono loganulwa u Luganuzi Luswanu, ilitumo lili lyono yetumile u mucekulu yuyu, lyowa kulongwa so cikumbucizo cakwe.”
41014010	Ale, Yuda Musikaliyota, muyagwe na wawalya we likumi na wejete, yakabita kuli wakohani wawaha ho yamukombole Yesu kuli wene.
41014011	Nawo Wakohani wawaha weza kuhulika inghani yiyo, wakasecelela muno, wakalagana nayo vyono womupela zipesa. Hodu nayo Yuda yakawa kwanza kulondola cilejeho co kumukombola Yesu kuli wene.
41014012	Na mwizuwa lilongozi lye sikukuu ye mikate yono siyisasize, mwipango lyono wawulajilaga nyana ye ngholo we Pasaka, iwejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Wukusaka cikuwikanizize hayi ndigwa ye Pasaka?”
41014013	Ale, Yesu yakawatuma wejete wa muli wejizwa wakwe yakuwatya, “Bitenyi kwi'kaya, na kuko mokwitang'anila na munhu yunji yadinghuye njilo ye malenga. Ale, mumutyatyaje yuyo,
41014014	sunga ko ku kaya yono kokwinjila, mumutye munya kaya, ‘Umwijizi yakutya, cili hayi cumba cangu cono nolila Pasaka hamonga ne wejizwa wangu?’
41014015	Nayo komulajilenyi cumba ciwaha ca ku golofa cono ciwikanizizwe lukulu, kanyhi cihambigwe. Ale mucitenjelaje mu cumba cico.”
