41014016	Iwejizwa wakatuluka, wakabita kwi'kaya, nawo wakagana vyose viwikanizwe nha vyono Yesu yali yawalonjeye. Wakawa kuyitenga i ndigwa ye Pasaka.
41014017	Yaza kuwa cinyamihe. Yesu yakaza hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe we likumi na wejete.
41014018	Na lono walizaga zindigwa ha meza, Yesu yakatya, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, muyenyu yunji mono cikulizana hamonga nane, kongaluka.”
41014019	Baho iwejizwa wakwe wakanza kukalala, hanyuma wakawa kwanza kumuwuza Yesu yumonga yumonga, wakutya, “Ma yo nene?”
41014020	Yesu yakawatya, “Muyenyu yumonga wa muli nyenye yikumi na wejete, mono cikulilizana i nhonje hamonga nane mu bakuli.
41014021	Mbeka u Mwana wo Munhu nha kofwa nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga zo mwene, ninga, woyi he, kuli munhu yuyo mono yakumugaluka Mwana wo Munhu! Yali yiwe yili ciba kuli munhu yuyo, yalece kulelwa!”
41014022	Na lono walizaga, Yesu yakasola mukate, yakalumba, yakawubegula no kuwapela wejizwa wakwe akuno yakutya, “Solenyi awu wo muwili wangu.”
41014023	Hanyuma yayo yakasola ne cikombe naco, yakamulumba Mulungu, yakawapela, nawo wose wakacing'wela i cikombe cico.
41014024	Yesu yakawatya, “Ayi yo sakami yangu yono yikukangaza i cilagane co Mulungu, isakami yono yikwitika so wanhu wenji.
41014025	Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, sinong'wa kanyhi divayi ye zabibu, sunga mwizuwa alilya lono noloying'wa divayi yimhya, mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
41014026	Ale baho wakemba lwimbo, nawo waza kondya, wakatuluka, wakabita kwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni.
41014027	Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, Anye wose motiza no kundeka nili wene, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “Nolomutowa u mudimi, ne zingholo nazo zolokwiyagala ako na ako.”
41014028	Ninga kolo nakondya kuzuka, nomulongolelenyi ku Galilaya.
41014029	Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Hamba wose watize wakulece wuli wene, ninga ane si nokulecela lukulu!”
41014030	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Mbeka nghukulonjela Petelo, vyono i cilo cici lono i nzogolo yowa yikali nalila kali kejete, agwe kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu.”
41014031	Ninga Petelo yakehinda muno kulonga yakutya, “Hamba hono yiwe yinojeye cifwizane hamonga nagwe, ane sinokulecela lukulu hamba hadodo.” Ne wejizwa wose nawo wakalonga nhavivyo.
41014032	Ale, wakaza ku cigundu cono cacemwaga Getisemane. Yesu yakawatya iwejizwa wakwe, “Ikalenyi baha, ane lono nghali kulomba.”
41014033	Ale, yakawa kuwasola wa Petelo, na Yakobo na Yohana, yakawa kwanza kugazika no kuwona wusungu mu nhumbula yakwe.
41014034	Yakawatya, “I nhumbula yangu yina wukalale wuwaha wono wunhuliye muno muno. Ale, mwikalaje bahano akuno mwilanjiliye.”
41014035	Yakatela ha mwande hadodo, yakagwa hasi, yakalomba vyono, hono yiwe yisumice, yalece kucagana cipango cico ce magazo.
41014036	Yakatya, “Gwe Baba, kuli'gwe zose nha zisumice. Ale wumbusizaje icikombe cicino ce magazo. Ninga si vyono nyendile nene, langa yiwe nha vyono wendile gwegwe.”
41014037	Hanyuma yayo, yakaza kuli wejizwa wawalya wadatu, yakawagana wagonile. Ale, yakamuwuza Petelo, yakutya, “Simoni, alu, wagona? Si wusumile kwikala meso hamba saa monga du?
41014038	Yakawa kuwatya, mwikalaje meso, mulombe ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe. Mbeka nhumbula yendile, ninga muwili wusoceye.”
41014039	Yakabita kulomba kanyhi yakuwuyajila kulonga zinghani zizilya du.
41014040	Ale, yakaza kanyhi kuli wejizwa wakwe, yakawagana wagonile. Nhondo hamba si wasuma bwete no kunugula ne meso gawo. Hamba siwamanya na yono wopitula.
41014041	Nayo yali yeza kuwaziza lwe kadatu yakawatya, “Alu mukali mugonile mucehile? Ninga alu hodu zakwila! Icipango nha cakondya kuza! U Mwana wo Munhu yakukombolwa kuli wanhu wabi.
41014042	Ale, yinucenyi, cibite. Lanjenyi ta, ayo u munhu mono yakungaluka yaza!”
41014043	Na lono Yesu yali yakali yakulonga, lanje, Yuda yuyulya u muyagwe na wawalya iwejizwa we likumi na wejete, yakawa kuza, hamonga ne lipuga lye wanhu, wena ne mimaje ne zishale. Iwanhu wawo wali watumigwe ne Wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize hamonga ne Wanyamhala.
41014044	Nayo Yuda u mugaluci, yali yakondya kuwapela citanjilo yakutya, “Yuyo mono nomunonela, ale, yo yuyo mono mukumusaka, nanye mumwibataje mumutegule hasi yo wulindilizi.”
41014045	Nayo Yuda yaza kuza du, yakawa kumubitila Yesu, yakawa kumutya, “Mwijizi!” Hanyuma yakawa kumunonela.
41014046	Ale, iwanhu wawo wakamwibata Yesu.
41014047	Ninga yunji muyagwe na wawalya wono wali wemile hamonga na Yesu, yakawukwega u mumaje wakwe, yakamutowa muwanda wo Mukuhani muwaha, yakamubuha likutu.
41014048	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu muza mwina ne mimaje hamonga ne zishale ho munyibate nha kotya nili muhizi?
41014049	Na kumbe nhondo zose nawezanaga nanye nghwijiza mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ninga simwanyibata ng'o. Ninga alu yinojeye i Mandiko Gono Gelile gafisilizwe.”
41014050	Ale baho iwejizwa wakwe wose wakamuleka, wakatiza.
41014051	Baho hali hoyuli muzelelo yunji mono yamutyatyaga Yesu, akuno yekumbile mwenda we bafuta. Nawo wakajela kumwibata.
41014052	Ninga mwene yakawesukula, yakawuleka u mwenda wuwulya we bafuta, yakatiza yali cipwi.
41014053	Ale, wakamutegula Yesu kuli Mukohani Muwaha, kono Iwakohani wawaha wose, ne wanyamhala ne wejizi wo wulajilize wali wekongholeye.
41014054	Nayo Petelo yakawa yakumutyatya Yesu, yakujendela kutali, Petelo yakenjila mwi'kumbo lyo Mukohani Muwaha, yakekala hamonga ne walindilizi, yakawa yakota moto.
41014055	Iwakohani wawaha ne Libalaza lyose, wakalondola wuhomelezi wo kumusitacila Yesu ho wamuwulaje, ninga hamba si wawutuga yaye.
41014056	Ne wanhu wenji wakahomelela zo wulambi kuli Yesu, no wuhomelezi wawo wali wusutane.
41014057	Ale, na wanji nawo wakema, nawo wakahomelela zo wulambi kuli Yesu, wakutya,
41014058	“Ase camuhulika umunhu yuyu yakutya, Ane noyimwagula i Nyumba yiyino yo Mulungu yono yizenjigwe ne miwoko, na mu vilo vidatu, ane noyizenga yinji yono siyizenjigwe ne miwoko.”
41014059	Ninga, hamba nhavivyo, u wuhomelezi wawo nawo, wali wusutane.
41014060	Ale, Mukohani Muwaha yakema haciligati yawo, yakamuwuza Yesu, yakutya, “Alu, siwukupitula cinji? Nghanici yono wakukuhomelela i wanhu wawa?”
41014061	Ninga u mwene yakanyamala twii, hamba kulonga cinji. Mukohani Muwaha yakamuwuza kanyhi yakutya, “Ma, alu yo gwegwe Kilisito. U mwana wo Mulungu Mulugutizwe?”
41014062	Nayo Yesu yakapitula, yakutya, “Heya yo nene. Na kanyhi, molomuwona u Mwana wo Munhu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lwa Mono yena Vilungo, yakuziza mu mavunde ga ku wulanga.”
41014063	Baho Mukohani Muwaha yakavidemulanga i vivwalo vyakwe vye cikohani, akuno yakutya, “Hambi alu kanyhi cikusaka wuhomelezi wa cici?
41014064	Hambi nha muwuhulika nyo weneco u wotovule wakwe!” Alu 'nye mukuwona wule? Wose wakatemya vyono yimunojeye yawulagwe.
41014065	Ale ho baho baho du, wanji wa muli wene, wakanza kumufunyila mate, wakamugubika wusu, wakamutowanga makofi no kumutya, “Ale wutambule ta, nani mono yakutowile!” Sunga ne wetumami wakamusola, nawo wakamutowanga makofi.
41014066	Na lono Petelo yali yakali he kumbo, yunji wa muli wetumami we cicekulu wo Mukohani Muwaha yakaza.
41014067	Yaza kumuwona Petelo yakota moto, yakamulanga, yakamutya, “Hamba na gwegwe wali hamonga na Yesu wa Nazaleti.”
41014068	Ninga mwene Petelo yakakana, yakutya, “Si manyile hamba singhwizuka yono wukulonga!” Hanyuma yayo Petelo yakatuluka yakalawila kunze. Baho inzogolo nayo yikawa kulila.
41014069	No muhinza yuyulya yaza kumuwona kanyhi Petelo, yakanza kanyhi kuwalonjela i wanhu wono wali wemile baho, yakutya, “U Munhu ayu nayo mama, muyawo.”
41014070	Nayo Petelo yakakana kanyhi. Na hanyuma yayo hadodo, iwanhu wono wali wemile baho wakamutya Petelo, “Mbeka nagwe uli muyawo, hambi nagwe ha wuli Mugalilaya.”
41014071	Ninga Petelo yakanza kwilijita no kwilaha yakutya, “Ane si nimumanyile munhu ayu mono mukumulonga.”
41014072	Baho nayo inzogolo yikawa kulila lwe kejete. Hobaho Petelo yakakumbucila vyono Yesu yali yamulonjeye, vyono “Lono inzogolo yowa yikali siyinalila kali kejete, agwe kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu.” Hodu Petelo yakalila muno muno tobo ne mahozi.
41015001	Wali weza kwela hakali mitondo muno muno, iwakohani wakalaganila kumonga, hamonga ne wanyamhala ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, hamonga ne libalaza lyose, wakamuwopa Yesu ne manyolo, wakamutegula no kumukombola kuli Pilato.
41015002	Nayo Pilato yakamuwuza Yesu, yakutya, “Alu yo gwegwe u Mutemi we Wayahudi?” Nayo Yesu yakatya, “Nha kulonga gwegwe.”
41015003	Nawo Wakohani wawaha wakamusonjeza Yesu nghani nyinji.
41015004	Pilato yakamuwuza kanyhi Yesu, yakutya, “Alu si wukupitula hamba cinji? Langa ta vyono wakukusonjeza nghani nyinji.”
41015005	Ninga Yesu siyapitula hamba cinji, sunga na Pilato yakezina.
41015006	Mu vilo vyose vye Sikukuu ye Pasaka, Pilato yali yazoweye kumuwopolela mufungwa yumonga mono wamusakaga.
41015007	Ale, kwali na munhu yunji mono yacemwaga Balaba, mono yali yafunjigwe hamonga ne wafyuzi wanji ku soko yo wuleta wufyule no wuwulaji.
41015008	Ne wanhu wenji wakamuziza Pilato wakamulomba yawanozeze nha vyono yali yazoweye nhondo zose.
41015009	Nayo Pilato yakawawuza, yakutya, “Alu, mukusaka nimuwopolelenyi u Mutemi we Wayahudi?”
41015010	Nayo yalonga nhavivyo, ku soko yali yamanyile calinze, vyono iwakohani wawaha wamukombola Yesu kuli mwene ku soko yo wivu du.
41015011	Ninga i wakohani wawaha wakawasagahaza wanhu ho wamulombe Pilato yawawopolele Balaba.
41015012	Nayo Pilato yakawawuza kanyhi, yakutya, “Alu mukusaka nimunozeci munhu ayu mono mumucemaga Mutemi we Wayahudi?”
41015013	Nawo wanhu wose wakazoza kanyhi, wakutya, “Wumutumbice mu musalaba!”
41015014	Ninga mwene Pilato yakawawuza, yakutya, “Ku sokoci? Kahodanga cici?” Ninga wene ho wakacila muno kuzoza, wakutya, “Wumutumbice mu musalaba!”
41015015	Nayo Pilato vyono yahila kulyendeza i lipuga lye wanhu, hodu, yakamuwopolela Balaba ku wulawa mu jela. Yakalajiliza vyono Yesu yakunwe ne viboko, na hanyuma yayo, yakamukombola yatumbikwe mu musalaba.
41015016	Ale, iwasilikale wakamutegula Yesu kugati, kwi'kumbo lye likulu, wakekonghola i liwumbi lyose lye wasilikale.
41015017	Wakamuvwika Yesu mwenda we liwala lyo lugandu, wakatawa cipombelo ce mamivya, wakamuvwika mu mutwe.
41015018	Wakawa kwanza kumulamusa wakutya, “Lamucenyi Mutemi we Wayahudi!”
41015019	Wakamutowa mu mutwe ne lidete, wakamufunyila mate, wakamufugamila no kumuhemba.
41015020	Waza kondya kumuzwajiza, wakamuvula mwenda wuwulya we liwala lyo lugandu, wakamuvwika i vivwalo vyakwe, hanyuma yayo wakamutegula kunze, ho wakamutumbice mu musalaba.
41015021	Na lono wali wali mu nzila wakubita, waketang'anila na munhu yunji mono kacemwaga Simoni, munya Kilene. Mwene yali yo sogwe wa wa Alekizanda na Lufo, na mwidaha lilyo mwene yalawaga ku mugunda. Ale wakamudindimiza, yadinghule umusalaba wa Yesu.
41015022	Hodu wakawa kumutegula Yesu sunga hanhu hono hacemwaga Goligota, nhunizo yayo “Hanhu ha cipala.”
41015023	Wakamupela Yesu divayi yono yali yihangahanjile ne manemane, ninga mwene yakayilema.
41015024	Ale wakamutumbika mu musalaba, wakagawana vivwalo vyakwe ko kutowa kula, ho walamule nani kotuga cici.
41015025	Nayo yali saa tatu hakali mitondo ilipango lono wamutumbicila mu musalaba.
41015026	No wusonjezwe wakwe wali wandikwe hacanyha yo musalaba, nhavi, “U mutemi we Wayahudi.”
41015027	Ne wahizi wejete nawo wakatumbikanwa hamonga na Yesu. Yunji ku lubavu lwakwe lo kulume no muyagwe ku lubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu. [
41015028	Baho gakafisilizwa i Mandiko Gono Gelile gono gakutya, “Yakawalilizanwa hamonga ne Wahodanji.”]
41015029	Ne wanhu wono wakolaga hanhu baho, wakamutovula, akuno wakuzugunza i mitwe yawo wakutya, “A, he! Gwe go munya kuyimwagula Nyumba yo Mulungu no kuyizenga mu vilo vidatu!
41015030	Ale ta, wutime mu musalaba, wiponye go mweneco!”
41015031	Nawo wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakamuzwajiza wakutya, “Yawaponyaga wanji, ninga kwiponya mweneco siyakusuma!
41015032	Ati mwene yo Kilisito, u Mutemi wa Isilayeli! Ale, lu ta, yatime mu musalaba ho ciwone no kwihuwila.” Sunga ne wanhu wawalya wono watumbikwa mu musalaba hamonga nayo, nawo wakamutovula.
41015033	Ku wulawa mu saa sita ye misi, sunga ku saa tisa ye misi, kukawa kutitu tuku mu'si yose.
41015034	Na mu saa tisa ya mu misi, Yesu yakalila ne'zi iwaha yakutya, “Eloyi, Eloyi, lama Sabakatani.” Nhunizo yayo, “Gwe go Mulungu wangu, Gwe go Mulungu wangu, alu so cici wukundeka?”
41015035	Na wanji wa muli wanhu wono wali wemile bahalya wali weza kuhulika nhavivyo, wakatya “Hulicizenyi! Yakumucema Eliya.”
41015036	No munhu yunji yakamangha, yakazabika sifongo mu Siki, yakayitajila mwidete yakamupela ho yang'we akuno yakutya, “Leka ta cilanjilile hono Eliya kokuza yamutimye mu musalaba.”
41015037	Yesu yakalonga ne'zi iwaha, hodu yakawa kufwa.
41015038	Ne libupa lyo mwenda lya mu Nyumba yo Mulungu likademuka hejete, likalawilila kucanyha sunga ho hasi.
41015039	No muwaha yunji we wasilikale mono yali yemile ha mwande yakwe, yali yeza kuwona vyono Yesu yakulonga ne'zi yiwaha no kufwa, yakatya, “Mbeka umunhu ayu, yali Mwana wo Mulungu!”
41015040	Na baho kanyhi, hali howali we cicekulu wanji wono wazilanjililaga zizo akuno wemile kutali, muli wawo mwali na Malyamu Magadalena, na Salome, na Malyamu unyina wa Yakobo u mudodo na Yose.
41015041	Wawa wamutyatya Yesu lono yali yali ku Galilaya no kumwitumamila. Kanyhi kwali na we cicekulu wanji wenji wono wakaza ku Yelusalemi hamonga nayo.
41015042	Ne cipango ce cinyamihe cikawa cakondya kufika. Ne lizuwa lilyo lyali lyo lizuwa lyo Wuwikanize, lizuwa lyono likulecela Sabato.
41015043	Baho yakaza Yusufu munya Alimataya, umwitumami we Libalaza liwaha, mono yali yena lilumbo yiwaha muno. No mwene nayo yali yalanjiliye uwuze wo Wutemi wo Mulungu. Ale, yakamubitila Pilato akuno yasina woga, yakalomba yapegwe u muwili wa Yesu.
41015044	Pilato yakezina muno, yaza kuhulika vyono Yesu yali yakondya kufwa. Ale, yakamucema muwaha we wasilikale yigana, yakamuwuza hono Yesu yali yakondya kufwa cidaha.
41015045	Nayo Pilato yaza kulonjelwa no muwaha yuyo we wasilikale yigana, vyono Yesu yali yakondya kufwa, hodu yakamukombolela Yusufu yawusole muwili wakwe.
41015046	Baho Yusufu yakagula sanda ye bafuta, yakawutimya hasi muwili wuwo, yakawudajiliza ne sanda. Yakawuwika mu citenjelo cono cali cituligwe mwi'talawe, hanyuma yayo yakabidusiza libwe yiwaha ku mulango we citenjelo.
41015047	Malyamu Magadalena na Malyamu unyina wa Yose nawo wakahawona baho hono yawicigwe.
41016001	Ne lizuwa lye Sabato lyeza kupuluta, Malyamu Magadalena, na Salome na Malyamu unyina wa Yakobo, wakagula mafuta ge mhunjile swanu, ho wakawubace muwili wa Yesu.
41016002	Mwi'zuwa lye Jumapili wakelawila ku citenjelo hakali mitondo muno muno, lono lizuwa lyasosomokaga.
41016003	Nawo wakawa wakulongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Alu nani 'mbi mono kociwusiza i libwe lilyo mu mulango we citenjelo?”
41016004	Ninga wali weza kulanga nhavi, wakawona i libwe lyakondya kubidusizwa ha mhelo (Nalyo lyali yibwe yiwaha muno.)
41016005	Nawo wali weza kwinjila mu citenjelo, wakamuwona mumo muzelelo yunji mono yali yavwalile civwalo cizelu swee, yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume, nawo wakezina muno muno.
41016006	Ninga u muzelelo yuyo yakawatya, “Mulece kwizina. Mukumulondola Yesu wa Nazaleti mono yatumbikwa mu musalaba. Kazuka, ahano yali hasina. Lanjenyi ta, hono wali wamuwicile.
41016007	Ale bitenyi mukawalonjele i wejizwa wakwe hamonga na Petelo, vyono yakuwalongolela ku Galilaya. Na kuko ko momuwona nha vyono yamulonjelenyi.”
41016008	Ale, wakawuka baho ha citenjelo lumangho, hambi nha wacicima so woga no wizine. Hamba si wasuma kumulonjela munhu wo wose nghani yinji, hambi nha wogopa muno muno. [
41016009	Nayo Yesu yaza kuzuka mwizuwa lye Jumapili hakali mitondo muno, yakamula kwilajila kuli Malyamu Magadalena, mono Yesu yamulavya macisi mupunghati.
41016010	Nayo Malyamu Magadalena yakabita, yakawalonjela wawalya wono wali wali hamonga na Yesu, na mwipango lilyo, wene walilaga no kukalala.
41016011	Ninga waza kuhulika vyono Yesu nha mumi, na vyono Malyamu Magadalena kamuwona, hamba siwehuwila yaye.
41016012	Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakejela kuli wejizwa wejete yena futa yinji. Iwejizwa wawo wabitaga ku mugunda.
41016013	Nawo wakabita wakawalonjela iwayawo. Nawo nhavivyo hamba siwehuwila yaye.
41016014	Na ku ndumilizo, Yesu yakejela kuli wejizwa we likumi na monga, lono walizanaga ha meza. Nayo yakawatacila muno so wuleka kwihuwila kwawo, no wukamu we zinhumbula zawo, hambi nha siwawehuwila wawalya wono wamuwona lono yali yazuka.
41016015	Yesu yakawatya, “Bitenyi ku yinze yose, mukaluganule u Luganuzi Luswanu kuli wanhu wose.
41016016	Na yuyo mono kokwihuwila no kubaputizwa yo koponywa. Na yuyo mono si kokwihuwila yo kololing'anizwa.
41016017	Ne vitanjilo vivi, vyowezana hamonga na wawo wono wehuwiye: mwi'tagwa lyangu mo wolavizya macisi, wolonga milonjele mipya.
41016018	Na hono webate nzoka, hamba kung'wa cinji co cose cono cina sumu, sicowatamisa yaye.” Kanyhi wowawicila miwoko yawo i watamwa, nawo watamwa wopona.
41016019	U Muwaha Yesu yaza kondya kulongana nawo, yakabocelwa ku wulanga, yakekala ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu.
41016020	Nawo iwejizwa wakabita wakawa wakuganula hanhu hose. Nayo u Muwaha yaketuma mulimo hamonga nawo, no kuyifisiliza inghani yiyo, kwe vitanjilo vyono vyawezanaga hamonga nawo.]
42001001	Go we Lilumbo Teyofilo: Vyono wenji wakasaka muno kwandika, zinghani azilya zono zetumwa muli'se!
42001002	Wakandika nha vyono calonjelwa na awalya wono wewonelela weneco kulawa mwamulizo, no kulwanza Luganuzi lulo.
42001003	Nane lono nakondya kuzilangalanga kulawa mwamulizo, mbona viswanu nghwandicile nha vyono zinha go we Lilumbo Teyofilo,
42001004	ho wusume kumanya imbeka ye zinghani zono wejizwa.
42001005	Mu vilo vyono Helode yali mutemi wa Yudiya, kwali na mukohani mono yacemwaga Zekaliya, mono wali wali hamonga mu witumami na Abiya, Mugolece wakwe yacemwaga Elizabeti, muyagwe ne wana wa Haluni.
42001006	Wose vyono wejete, wali wali ling'ani hali Mulungu, wali webate myoto ne malajilizo gose go Mulungu.
42001007	Ninga wali wasina mwana, vyono Elizabeti yali mugumba, nawo wene Zekaliya na Elizabeti, wose wali wakombipa muno.
42001008	Mwizuwa linji, lono Zekaliya yetumaga mulimo wakwe wo Wukohani mu Nyumba yo Mulungu,
42001009	mu wilecele wo witumami, vyono wo moto wo Wukohani, lwali lwakwe kwinjila hanhu hono helile no kufusa wuvumba.
42001010	Lipuga lye wanhu walombaga hadeha mwi'pango lyo kufusiza.
42001011	Malayika wo Muwaha Mulungu yakamulawila, yemile ku lubavu lo kulume lwe cikumbicilo co kufusiza.
42001012	Zekaliya yali yeza kumuwona, yakagazika mu nhumbula, no woga wukamwibata.
42001013	Ninga malayika yakamutya, “Zekaliya, wulece kogopa, hambi wulombe wako nha wuhulikwa, no mugolece wako Elizabeti kokulelela mwana wa cilume, nagwe komucemela litagwa lyakwe Yohana.
42001014	Nagwe kowa na nyemo no wusangalale, na wenji wolowusangalalila wulelwe wakwe.
42001015	Kowa muwaha hali Muwaha Mulungu, si kolowa kung'wa divayi hamba cing'wegwa co wugale,
42001016	nayo komemywa Muhe Mono Yelile ku wulawa mu'nda yo nyina.
42001017	Kolowapitula wenji wa muli wana wa Isilayeli wamupitucile Muwaha Mulungu wawo. Nayo komulongolela Muwaha yakutongwa mu vilungo na mu Muhe kotya Eliya, no kuwalamula wasogo zo munhu ne wana wawo. Kowanoza we cibede, wawe mu mahala ge we ling'ani, kumuwikaniziza u Muwaha wanhu wakwe.”
42001018	Zekaliya yakamutya yuyo Malayika, “Noyimanya nhawule nghani yiyo? Hambi ne nha neza mukombi, no mugolece wangu nayo yawa mukombi.”
42001019	Malayika yakamupitula yakatya, “Ane nili Gabuliyeli, mono nyimaga hali Mulungu, nane nhumwa ho nongane nagwe, nghuletele Luganuzi lulu Luswanu.
42001020	Alu hulicize, vyono si wihuwiye zinghani zangu, alu kowa cibwibwi, nagwe si kosuma kulonga, sunga zizi zono nghulonjeye kolo zakondya kufisilizwa.”
42001021	Na mwi'pango lilyo wanhu wali wamulindiye Zekaliya, akuno wakwizina so wucele wakwe mu Nyumba yo Mulungu.
42001022	Nayo yaza kulawila, si yasuma kulongana nawo, ninga yakawa kuwanozeza vitanjilo ne mawoko gakwe, yakekala cibwibwi.
42001023	Lidaha lyo witumami wakwe lyaza malika, yakawuya ku kaya yakwe.
42001024	Ne vilo vyaza puluta, Elizabeti u mugolece wakwe yakawa yatuga 'nda.
42001025	Yakehundiciza myezi mihano, yakutya, “Alu Muwaha Mulungu kanhendela nhavivi, kambusiza lilema lyangu hali wanhu.”
42001026	Mu mwezi wo mutandatu, malayika Gabuliyeli yatumwa no Mulungu, yabite kwi'tumbi lyono likucemwa Nazaleti ya ku Galilaya.
42001027	Ko muhinza mono yacemwaga Malyamu, mono yali mubanywe na Yusufu we mhuga ya Dawudi.
42001028	Malayika yakenjila mu nyumba yakwe, yakamutya, “Lamucenyi Malyamu mono wuli mulugutwe! U Muwaha nha yali hamonga nagwe.”
42001029	Malyamu yaza kuzihulika zinghani zizo, yakehwelela muno, yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, alu izinghani zizi zina nhunizoci?
42001030	Malayika yakamutya, “Wulece kogopa Malyamu; hambi Mulungu nha kakupela lihewa.
42001031	Lanje, kotuga 'nda, kolela mwana wa cilume, na komupela litagwa Yesu.
42001032	Mwene kowa Muwaha, nayo kocemwa mwana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye, no Muwaha Mulungu, komupela ligoda lyo sogwe Dawudi;
42001033	nayo kotema mhuga ya Yakobo cibitilila, no wutemi wakwe si wulawa na ndumo.”
42001034	Malyamu yakamutya Malayika, “Yosumika wule nghani yiyi, ane nha si manyile mulume?”
42001035	Malayika yakapitula yakamutya, “U Muhe mono yelile kokuziza, ne vilungo vyo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye vyokusiciliza. Holeka mwana mono kolela, kocemwa Yelile, Mwana wo Mulungu.
42001036	Na langa ta, nduguyo Elizabeti nayo mu wukombi wakwe, yena 'nda na mwezi awu wo wo mutandatu, munhu mono wanhu watezaga mugumba.
42001037	Hambi nha hasina yono si yisumikaga hali Mulungu.”
42001038	Malyamu yakatya, “Langa ta, ane nili mwitumami wo Muwaha ziwe muli'ne nha vyono wulonjile.” Nayo Malayika yakawa kutuluka.
42001039	Vyaza kupuluta vilo vicefu, Malyamu yakenuka musunho, yakabita ku kaya yinji yono yili mu matunda ga Yudiya.
42001040	Yakenjila mu kaya ya Zekaliya, yakamulamusa Elizabeti.
42001041	Kukawa Elizabeti yali yeza kuhulika du wulamuse wa Malyamu, mwana yakedawala na nyemo mu'nda yakwe. Nayo Elizabeti yakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile,
42001042	yakenula lizi lyakwe, yakatya, “Wuli Mulugutwe muli wacekulu wose, na yuyo mono kolelwa nagwe, nayo Mulugutwe.
42001043	Alu ne nili nani sunga nyina yo Muwaha wangu yanyizize?
42001044	Nghukulonjela vyono, neza hulika du lizi lyo wulamuse wako, u mwana kawa kwidawala na nyemo mu'nda yangu.
42001045	Wuli mumoti 'gwe mono wihuwiye, vyono zofisilizwa zono Muwaha yakulonjeye.”
42001046	Nayo Malyamu yakatya, “Inhumbula yangu yikumukumya Muwaha,
42001047	No muhe wangu wumusangalaliye Mulungu Muponyi wangu.
42001048	Hambi nha kawulanga wuciwa wo mwitumami wakwe! Hambi langa ta, vyono kulawa zuwali, iwanhu wose nha wonyitya nili mumoti.
42001049	Hambi Mulungu mono yali vilungo nha kanhendela mawaha Ne litagwa lyakwe lyelile.
42001050	No lusungu lwakwe luli kuli wanhu wose wono wamogopaga.
42001051	Kawugolola u muwoko wakwe we vilungo Kaweyagaza wasisi mu mahweso ge zinhumbula zawo.
42001052	Kawagwisa watemi mu magoda gawo Yakawenula waciwa.
42001053	Wono wena nzala, kawegutya ne vinhu viswanu, Ne wagoli, kawawinga wali bwete.
42001054	Kamutaza Isilayeli mwitumami wakwe Ho yakumbucile lusungu lwakwe.
42001055	Vyono yawalonjela walezi wetu, Kuli Abulahamu no lulelo lwakwe sunga ku cibitilila.”
42001056	Malyamu yakekalana na Elizabeti myezi midatu, hanyuma yakawa kuwuya kwawo.
42001057	Vilo vya Elizabeti vyo kusawila vikafika, yakasawa mwana wa cilume.
42001058	I wayagwe ne wanduguze waza kuhulika vyono Muwaha kamupela kwa winji lihewa lyakwe, wakasangalalana nayo.
42001059	Kukawa mwi'zuwa lyo munana, ho wakaza wakamutegula mwana, ku calamo, wahilaga kumupela litagwa lyo sogwe Zekaliya.
42001060	Ninga u nyina yakatya, “Ng'o, langa kocemwa Yohana.”
42001061	Wakamutya, “Mu wanduguzo nha musina yunji mono kacemwaga litagwa lilyo?”
42001062	Wakamusonhelela sogwe, ho yalonje i litagwa lyono yakusaka u mwanagwe yacemelwe.
42001063	Nayo yakasaka cibawo, yakandika, yakutya, “Itagwa lyakwe Yohana.” Wose wakezina.
42001064	Ho baho no mulomo wakwe wukadiguka, no lulimi lwakwe lukahogoha, yakalonga yakumulumba Mulungu.
42001065	Woga wukawebata wose wono wali wekaye behi nawo, na zizo zose zikahulikwa kose mu matunda ga Yudiya.
42001066	Na wose wono wazihulika, wakaziwika mu zi nhumbula zawo wakutya, “Alo kowa yenha wule mwana yuyu.” Hambi i vilungo vyo Muwaha nha vili hamonga nayo.
42001067	No sogwe Zekaliya yakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile, yakalonga nghani yo Mulungu yakutya,
42001068	“Yalumbwe Muwaha Mulungu wa Isilayeli. Hambi nha kawaziza, kawanozeza wukombozwe wanhu wakwe.
42001069	Kacipela Mukombozi we vilungo mu mhuga ya Dawudi u mwitumami wakwe.
42001070	Nha vyono yehuwiza katali, mu milomo ye wawizi wakwe wono welile,
42001071	nha vyono kocikomboza wulawa mu walugu wetu, na mu miwoko ya wose wono wacisulile.
42001072	Yakatya, kowawonela lusungu walezi wetu. No kukumbucila cilagane cakwe cono celile.
42001073	Wilahe wono yamwilahila Abulahamu u kuku yetu nha vyono kocipela sese,
42001074	ho cikombozwe ku wulawa mu miwoko ye walugu wetu, ho cimwitumamile cisina woga.
42001075	Celile na cili ling'ani hali mwene, vilo vyetu vyose vyo wikale wetu.
42001076	Nagwe, mwanangu, kocemwa muwizi wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye muli vyose, hambi nha kolongola ha mwande yo Muwaha wumunozelezeze nzila yakwe.
42001077	Ho wuwamanyize wanhu wakwe vyono woponywa so wunenelwe wo wubi wawo.
42001078	U Mulungu wetu mupolo, kanyhi yali lusungu. Koleta wuzelu wo wukombozwe, wucizize ku wulawa ku wulanga,
42001079	no kuwamulicila wono wekaye mu citi ce lifwa. No kuyitonga migulu yetu mu nzila yo mulamu.”
42001080	U mwana yakawiluka, yakonjelezeka vilungo mu nhumbula, yakekala mu nyika, sunga mwizuwa lyo wilajile wakwe kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli.
42002001	Mu vilo vivyo lono Yohana yali yalelwa, Kayisali Awugusito, yakalajiliza vyono wanhu wose wono wali hasi yo wutemi wakwe wandikwe.
42002002	Lulo lo lwandiko lulongozi lono lwandikwa lono Kuleniyo yali yatemile Suliya.
42002003	Wose wakabita kwandikwa, munhu na kaya yakwe.
42002004	Yusufu nayo yakatuluka kulawa Nazaleti ya Galilaya, yakabita ku Betelehemu mu yisi ya Yudiya kono yalelelwa u mutemi Dawudi. Vyono mwene nayo yali we mhuga ya Dawudi,
42002005	ho yandikwe hamonga na Malyamu, mono yali mubanywe nayo, lono yali yakataye ne'nda.
42002006	Kukawa lono wali wali kuko, likawa kufika lizuwa lyakwe lyo kulelela.
42002007	Yakasawa u mwanagwe we cilume mwana mulongozi, yakamuvwika myenda yo wugalika, yakamuwika mu ciya co wulilo we mitugo, vyono siwatuga cilejeho mu nyumba ye wajenzi.
42002008	Ku lubavu lulo, kwali kowali wadimi wono walindilizaga mitugo yawo ne cilo.
42002009	Hobaho Malayika wo Muwaha yakawalawila, u lukumyo lo Muwaha lukawang'alalila, wakenjilwa na woga.
42002010	Malayika yakawatya, “Mulece kogopa, ane nghumuletelenyi Luganuzi Luswanu lwe nyemo mbaha kuli wanhu wose,
42002011	hambi izuwalili nha mulelelwa Muponyi ku soko yenyu, mu kaya ya Dawudi, yo Kilisito u Muwaha.
42002012	Aci co citanjilo kuli'nye, Momwagana mugalika yavwicigwe myenda yo wugalika, yagonile mu ciya co wulilo we mitugo.”
42002013	Lo lulo baho kukawa na Wamalayika wenji kulawa ku wulanga, wakelunza na yuyo Malayika, wakamukumya Mulungu wakutya,
42002014	“Lukumyo kuli Mulungu kucanyha, na kono'nze mulamu kuli wanhu wono wakumunojeza.”
42002015	Kukawa Wamalayika waza kuwuya ku wulanga, wadimi wawo wakeyitya, cibite le sunga ko ku Betelehemu, cikalanje nghani yiyi yono yiweye, vyono yacimanyize Muwaha.
42002016	Wakabita lumangho, wakawagana wa Malyamu na Yusufu, no mugalika yagonile mu ciya co wulilo we mitugo.
42002017	Nawo waza kumuwona u mwana yuyo, wakayanzalika nghani yono walonjelwa yo mwana yuyo.
42002018	Na wose wono wahulika wakezina zizo zono walonjelwa ne wadimi.
42002019	Ninga Malyamu yakazikamisa zinghani zizi zose, yakazihwesa mu nhumbula yakwe.
42002020	Wadimi wawo wakawuya, wakawa kumukumya no kumulumbo Mulungu, so zose zono wazihulika na zono waziwona, nha vyono walonjelwa.
42002021	Vyaza kupuluta vilo munana vyo kumutegula mwana ku calamo, yakacemwa litagwa lyakwe, YESU, lililya lyono yacemelwa na Malayika lono yali yakali nategulwa 'nda.
42002022	Vyaza kuficila vilo vyo wezwe wawo, ko wulajilize wa Musa, wa Yusufu na Malyamu wakamusola mwana, wakabita nayo ku Yelusalemi, wamuwice hali Muwaha.
42002023	Mu Wulajilize wa Musa yandikwe “Mwana wo wose we cilume u mulongozi kulelwa, kosiwanulwa yawe wo Muwaha.”
42002024	Wakalavya cilavywa, Nziwa nyejete, lunji nyana za nghunda nyejete, nha vyono yasakwaga mwilajilizo lyo Muwaha.
42002025	Baho hali na munhu ku Yelusalemi litagwa lyakwe Simiyoni, no munhu yuyo, yali yali ling'ani na mwihuwilwa kuli Mulungu, yalanjililaga muno wukombozwe we Waisilayeli. No Muhe Mono Yelile yali yali muli mwene.
42002026	Nayo yagubulilwa no Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono si kolofwa, lono yakali namuwona Kilisito wo Muwaha.
42002027	Na ko wutonji wo Muhe Mono Yelile, Simiyoni yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ne walezi wa Yesu waza muleta mwana Yesu, mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ho wamutendele nha vyono Wulajilize wukutya.
42002028	Simiyoni yamubocela mwana Yesu mu miwoko yakwe, akuno yakumulumbo Mulungu, yakutya,
42002029	“Alu Muwaha wafisiliza wihuwizo wako, wumukombole mwitumami wako yabite yapolile.
42002030	Hambi meso gangu nha gayiwona mhonelo yako.
42002031	Yono wayikondeleza hali wanhu wose.
42002032	Wuzelu wo kuwagubulila wono si Wayahudi. No lukumyo lwe wanhu wako Waisilayeli.”
42002033	U sogwe wa Yesu no nyina, wakawa kwizina zizo zo mwana zono Simiyoni yazilonga.
42002034	Simiyoni yakawalugutiza, yakamulonjela nyina Malyamu, “Muli mwana yuyu, wenji wa muli Waisilayeli wokwajilila, na wenji wopona.
42002035	Nayo kowa citanjilo cono wanhu siwocisaka, ho gagubulwe mahweso ga wenji, sunga na gwegwe, wusungu wono winha mumaje mukali, wocinya nhumbula yako.”
42002036	Kwali koyuli muwizi yumonga wa cicekulu, mukombi muno, mwana wa Fanuweli, wo mulango wa Asheli, nayo yali yekalana no mulume wakwe myaka mupunghati du kulawa vyono wetola.
42002037	Nayo yakekala mufwile sunga mu cipango cico, nayo yali yafika myaka makumi munana na mine ku wulawa u wulelwe wakwe. Na mu cipango cico cose, si yawukaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na mu wuleko kulya, no kumuhemba Mulungu cilo na misi.
42002038	Na mu cipango cico Ana yakalawila, nayo yakanza kumulumba Mulungu, nayo yakalonga zo mwana yuyo kuli wose wono walanjililaga wukombozi wa Yelusalemi.
42002039	Nawo walezi waza kondya kufisiliza zose za mu wulajilize wo Muwaha, wakawuya kwawo ku Nazaleti mu yisi ya Galilaya.
42002040	No mwana yakawiluka, no kutuga vilungo, yakamemywa mahala, ne lihewa lyo Mulungu likawa muli mwene.
42002041	Ne walezi wa Yesu wabitaga myaka yose ku Yelusalemi, mu cidaha ce Pasaka.
42002042	U mwana yaza ficila myaka yikumi na myejete, wabitana nayo ku Pasaka nha vyono wali wazoweye.
42002043	Vilo vyali kondya, wakatuluka kuwuya kwawo. Ninga Yesu yasigala ku Yelusalemi, hamba walezi wakwe si wali wamanyile.
42002044	Ninga wehwesa vyono yali mwipuga lye wanhu, wakajenda muhinzo we zuwa limonga, hanyuma wakamula kumulondola mu wandugu zawo na mu wayawo,
42002045	waza kuwa si wamuwene, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakumulondola.
42002046	Kukawa vyaza kupuluta vilo vidatu, wakamwagana yali mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yekaye haciligati ye wejizi, yakuwahuliciza, akuno yakuwawuza:
42002047	na wose wono wamuhulicizaga, wakezina mahala gakwe ne mapitulo gakwe.
42002048	Nawo i walezi wakwe waza kumwagana, wakezina. Malyamu u nyina, yakamutya, “Mwanangu, alo so cici kucitendela nhavi? Langa ta, ane no sogo, cali kukulondola cikalaye.”
42002049	U mwene yakawatya, “So cici lo mwali kunondola? Alo si mwali mumanyile vyono yinojeye niwe mu Nyumba ya Baba?”
42002050	Ninga walezi wakwe hamba si wezuka nghani yiyo yono yawalonjela.
42002051	Hodu, yakawuya nawo sunga ku Nazaleti. Yakawa ne cihuliko kuli wene. U nyina yakazikamisa zinghani zizi zose mu nhumbula yakwe.
42002052	Nayo Yesu yakajendelela mu mahala no wuwiluce, nayo yakacila kwendwa no Mulungu ne wanhu.
42003001	Mu mwaka we likumi na mihano wo wutemi wa Kayisali Tibeliya, Pontiyo Pilato yali mutemi wa Yudiya, na Helode yali mutemi wa Galilaya, no mwanakwawe Filipo yali mutemi wa zi'si za Ituleya na Telakoniti, nayo Lusaniya, yali mutemi wa Abilene,
42003002	na Anasi na Kayafa wali wo wukohani wuwaha. Mu cipango cico, i nghani yo Mulungu yikamuziza Yohana u mwana wa Zekaliya ku nyika.
42003003	Yohana yakabita mu yisi yose yono yipilime Yoludani, yakawa kuganula vyono yiwanojeye wanhu wanene no kubaputizwa, ho Mulungu yawawusize wubi wawo.
42003004	Nha vyono yandikwe mu citabu co muwizi Isaya, “Lizi lya munhu likuhulikwa ku nyika, Nozelezenyi nzila yo Muwaha, Gololenyi wukolo wakwe,
42003005	Malolo gose gafucilizwe, Ne matunda ne vigongo vyose vitenjelemulwe, Ne vipeto vigololwe, Ne zinzila zono zina makombo zitelemezwe.
42003006	Ne wanhu wose wowona u wukombozwe wo Mulungu.”
42003007	Holeka yakawalonjela wanhu wenji wono wamubitilaga ho yawabaputize, “Anye nyo zindelo ze zinzoka, mono yamusugulenyi mutize likuwo lyo Mulungu lyono likuza nani?
42003008	Holeka mulajile mu metumo genyu nha vyono mwakondya kunena.” Hamba mulece kwamula kutya mu wiganicize wenyu, “Ase Abulahamu yo sogo yetu.” Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono Mulungu yadahile kugapitula i mabwe gaga gawe wana wa Abulahamu.
42003009	Sunga nalu nhemo mbikwe ha masina ge mabici, no mubici wo wose wono siwukulela mikalo miswanu, wotemangwa no kutajilwa mu moto.
42003010	Wanhu wenji wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu citende wule?”
42003011	Yakapitula yakawatya, “Mono yena misweko myejete, yamugawile muyagwe mono yasina, na mono yena ndigwa, yatende nhavivyo.”
42003012	Watoweza kodi nawo wakaza ho wabaputizwe, wakamuwuza, “Gwe mwijizi, na'se ma citende wule?”
42003013	Yakawatya, “Mulece kutoweza kodi kuciza nha vyono mwalajilizwa.”
42003014	Ne wasilikale nawo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ase ma, nase citende wule?” Yakawatya, “Mulece kogofya munhu, hamba kuwasolela wanhu vinhu vyawo kwe vilungo, hamba kumusonjeza munhu wo wose ko wulambi, mukwizwe ne misahala yenyu.”
42003015	Vyono wanhu walanjililaga cinji, wakawa kwiwuza mu zinhumbula zawo za Yohana, “Alu yidahice lunji yo mwene Kilisito?”
42003016	Yohana yapitula yakawatya wose, “Ane nghumubaputizenyi mu malenga, ninga yakuza mono yali vilungo kuciza ane, hamba si nghwiliye kukowolola mikowa ye malatu gakwe, mwene komubaputizenyi mu Muhe Mono Yelile na mu Moto.
42003017	U mwene yenha munhu mono yebate luheneko mu mawoko gakwe, ho yezeze lukulu cuga cakwe, no kututicila wuhemba mu nyumba yakwe; ninga mawaje yagaticimize no moto wono si wuzimaga.”
42003018	Hamonga ne zinghani zinji nyinji, Yohana yakawakong'onheza i wanhu akuno yakuwaganulila Luganuzi Luswanu.
42003019	Ninga Yohana yamutacila Helode u muwaha we yisi ku soko vyono yali yamusolile Helodiya u mugolece wo mwanakwawe, no kumutola, na ku so mabi gose gono yatendaga Helode.
42003020	Na Helode yakonjeleza wubi wakwe so kumudindila Yohana mu jela.
42003021	Kukawa waza kubaputizwa wanhu wose, Yesu nayo yakabaputizwa, na lono yalombaga, wulanga wukagubuka,
42003022	no Muhe Mono Yelile yakamutimila, futa yakwe, yehwanile nziwa, lizi likalawa ku wulanga likutya, “Agwe yo gwegwe Mwanangu mwendece, mono nyendezwe nagwe.”
42003023	Yesu mweneco lono yamulila u witumami wakwe calinze, yali yaficile nha myaka makumi madatu, ne wanhu waganicizaga vyono mwene yo mwana wa Yusufu mwana wa Heli.
42003024	Heli yali mwana wa Matati, mono yali mwana wa Lawi, mwana wa Meliki, mwana wa Yanayi, mwana wa Yusufu,
42003025	mono yali mwana wa Matatiya, mwana wa Amosi, mwana wa Nahumu, mwana wa Hesili mwana wa Nagayi,
42003026	mono yali mwana wa Maati, mwana wa Matatiya, mwana wa Semeyini, mwana wa Yoseki, mwana wa Yuda,
42003027	mono yali mwana wa Yowanani, mwana wa Lesa, mwana wa Zelubabeli, mwana wa Salatiyeli, mwana wa Neli,
42003028	mwana wa Meleci, mwana wa Adi, mwana wa Kosamu, mono yali mwana wa Elimodomu, mwana wa Eli,
42003029	mono yali mwana wa Yoshuwa, mwana wa Eliyezeli, mwana wa Yolimu, mwana wa Matati, mwana wa Lawi,
42003030	mono yali mwana wa Simiyoni, mwana wa Yuda, mwana wa Yusufu mwana wa Yonamu, mwana wa Eliyakimu,
42003031	mono yali mwana wa Meleya, mwana wa Mena, mwana wa Matata, mwana wa Natani, mwana wa Dawudi,
42003032	mono yali mwana wa Yese, mwana wa Obedi, mwana wa Bowazi, mwana wa Salimoni, mwana wa Nasoni,
42003033	mono yali mwana wa Aminadabu, mwana wa Adimini, mwana wa Alini, mwana wa Hezeloni, mwana wa Pelezi, mwana wa Yuda,
42003034	mono yali mwana wa Yakobo, mwana wa Isaka, mwana wa Abulahamu, mwana wa Tela, mwana wa Naholi,
42003035	mono yali mwana wa Selugu, mwana wa Leyu, mwana wa Pelegu, mwana wa Ebeli mwana wa Sela,
42003036	mono yali mwana wa Kayinani, mwana wa Alipakishadi, mwana wa Semu, mwana wa Noha, mwana wa Lameci,
42003037	mono yali mwana wa Metusela, mwana wa Enoci, mwana wa Yaledi, mwana wa Mahalaleli, mwana wa Kayinani,
42003038	mono yali mwana wa Enosi, mwana wa Seti, mwana wa Adamu, mono yali wo Mulungu.
42004001	Ale Yesu yawuyaga yakulawa kwi'kolongo lya Yoludani, yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakatongwa no Muhe yabite ku nyika.
42004002	Yekala kuko ku nyika vilo makumi mane yakujelwa na Setani. Nayo si yalizaga cinji mu vilo vivyo vyose, navyo vyaza puluta, yakadabuka.
42004003	Holeka Setani yakamutya, “Hono yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu, wulonje libwe lili liwe mukate.”
42004004	Yesu yakamupitula, yandikwa “Munhu si ko kwikala mumi so ndigwa du.”
42004005	Hanyuma Setani yakamutegula hacanyha, hanhu hono hali henucile, yakamulajila matemi gose ga kononze lwa kamonga. Setani yakamutya,
42004006	“Nokupela gwegwe vilungo vivi vyose, ne zinhojo zayo; hambi nha nakombolelwa nene, na muli wose mono nyendile, nghumupela.
42004007	Ale hono wufugame hali nene, vivi vyose vyowa vyako.”
42004008	Nayo Yesu yakapitula yakamutya, “I Mandiko gakutya, ‘Komuhemba Mulungu wako, no komwitumamila mweneco yali wene du.’ ”
42004009	Setani yakamutegula ku Yelusalemi, yakamuwika mucanyha ye litembe lye Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakamutya, “Hono yo gwegwe mwana wo Mulungu, wilugaje baha sunga ho hasi,
42004010	hambi nha yandikwa: ‘Kokulajiliziza Wamalayika wakwe wakukamise,’
42004011	kanyhi, ‘Wokwambilila mu mawoko gawo. Ho wulece kwikobala mugulu wako mwibwe.’ ”
42004012	Yesu yakapitula yakamutya, “Yandikwa, ‘Wulece kumujelo Muwaha Mulungu wako.’ ”
42004013	Nayo Setani yaza kukondya majelo gose, yakawa kumuleka hadodo.
42004014	Baho Yesu yakawuya ku Galilaya kuno yamemile vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile. Ne zinghani zakwe zikatandala mu yisi yose yono yipilime.
42004015	Nayo yejizaga wanhu mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo akuno yakulumbwa na wose.
42004016	Yesu yakabita ku Nazaleti kono yawilucila, yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo mwizuwa lye sabato nha vyono yali yazoweye, yakema yasome Mandiko Gono Gelile.
42004017	Yakapegwa citabu co muwizi Isaya, yakacigubula hanhu hono hali handicigwe nhavi,
42004018	“U Muhe wo Muwaha yali muli nene Kasiwanula, ho niwaganulile waciwa Luganuzi Luswanu, Kanhuma niwalonjele wono wafunjigwe, nha vyono wowopolelwa, Ne wabofu, vyono wowona kanyhi,
42004019	Kanhuma ho niwakomboze wono wakwiwonelwa, no kuwalonjela i cipango cono u Mulungu kowakomboza wanhu wakwe.”
42004020	Yaza kukondya kusoma, yakacigubika icitabu, yakamupela u mwitumami, yakekala, ne meso ga wose wono wali wali mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo gakawa gamulanjile.
42004021	Nayo yakamula kuwatya, “Izuwa lili nha vyono muhulice lwandiko lulu lukusomwa, lwakondya kufisilizwa.”
42004022	Wose wakendezwa nayo, wakezina so zinghani ziswanu zono yalonga, wakatya, “Yuyu si yo mwana wa Yusufu?”
42004023	Yakawatya, na lunji mononjela nghani yiyi, “Go muganga, wilagule go mweneco, na kanyhi motya, ‘Muli zose zono cahulika wukwituma ku Kapelanawumi, wuzitumaje na baha kanyhi mwitumbi lyako.’ ”
42004024	Yakawatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, hasina muwizi mono kavumilwaga mu yisi yakwe mweneco.
42004025	Ninga mbeka nghumutyenyi, kwali kowali wafwile wenji mu Isilayeli mu vilo vya Eliya, lono wulanga wukadindwa myaka midatu na myezi mutandatu, kukawa na nzala mbaha mu yisi yose.
42004026	Hamba nhavivyo, Eliya si yatumwa kuli yunji wowose, langa yatumwa kuli mucekulu mufwile du wa ku Saleputa mu yisi ya Sidoni.
42004027	Kanyhi mu yisi ya Isilayeli, mu cipango ca Eliya muwizi, kwali kowali watamwa wenji wo wukoma, hamba nhavivyo hasina wowose mono yakwemwa, langa hono si Namani du munhu wa Suliya.”
42004028	Na wose wono wali wali mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakakolwa nelikuwo,
42004029	wakenuka, wakamulavyaniza Yesu kunze ye likaya lyawo, lyono lyali lizenjigwe mucanyha ye cigongo, wakamutegula sunga ku nhenenhuko ye cigongo cico, ho wamugumile hasi.
42004030	Ninga Yesu yakakolela haciligati yawo yakawa kubita.
42004031	Hanyuma Yesu yakabita kwitumbi lya Kapelanawumi, mu yisi ya Galilaya yakawa kuwejiza mwizuwa lye Sabato.
42004032	Wakezina so wulajilize wono yali yena nawo mu wijize wakwe.
42004033	Mumo mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo mwali moyuli munhu mono yali yena muhe we licisi lyavu, yakabalaluka ne lizi iwaha, yakutya.
42004034	“Gwe Yesu wa Nazaleti, cina nghanici nagwe? Alo kuza wucongomeze? Nghumanyile gwegwe yo nani, yo Gwegwe Mono welile wo Mulungu.”
42004035	Ninga Yesu yakalitacila yakutya, “Nyamale, wuwuce muli munhu yuyo.” Ne licisi lyaza kumubamiliza hasi, haciligati yawo, likawa kuwuka muli munhu yuyo, hamba kumutamisa yaye.
42004036	Wose wakezina, wakawa kulongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Ayi yo nghani yo wizine, hambi nha ko wusume no wulajilize, yakugalajiliza i macisi gawuce, nago gakuwuka.”
42004037	Ne zinghani za Yesu zikatandala hanhu hose mu yisi yiyo.
42004038	Yesu yakawuka mu nhang'anilo yiyo yo wuhembelo, yakenjila mu nyumba ya Simoni, u mukwewe we cicekulu wa Simoni, yali yebatwe na mhungo mbaha, wakamulomba yamuponye,
42004039	Yesu yakema behi nayo, yakayitacila mhungo, nayo yikamuleka. Ho baho yakawa kwinuka no kuwetumamila.
42004040	Lono lizuwa lyali lyeza behi no kugwila, wose wono wali wena watamwa we matamwa ge hayo hayo, wakawaleta kuli mwene, nayo yakawawicila miwoko yakwe wose, yakawaponya.
42004041	Ne macisi gakalawa muli wenji, gakubalaluka, gakutya, “Yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu.” Ninga Yesu yakagatacila, hamba si yagaleka galonje, hambi nha gali gamumanyile vyono yo Kilisito.
42004042	Ale waza kwela, Yesu yakabita hanhu hono hasina wanhu, ne wanhu wakawa kumulondola, na waza muwona, wakahila kumugoma yalece kuwuka kwawo.
42004043	Ninga mwene yakawatya, “Yinojeye nganule Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu na mu matumbi ganji, hambi nha co caleka nghatumwa.”
42004044	Yakawa kuganula mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo ga ku Yudiya.
42005001	Izuwa linji Yesu yali yemile ha nhumbi ye lilamba lya Genesaleti, ne wanhu wenji wali wamupilime, wakuyihuliciza Nghani yo Mulungu,
42005002	yakawona ngalawa nyejete zili ha mwejelele we lilamba; ninga wanimula zisomba wali walawaniza wakuzikwema zinyavu zawo,
42005003	Yesu yaza kwinjila mu ngalawa yimonga yono yali ya Simoni, yakamusaka Simoni yayitezeze mu malenga kutali hadodo no mwejelele we lilamba, yakekala mu ngalawa yakagejiza mapuga ge wanhu yekaye mu ngalawa.
42005004	Yaza kondya kulonga, yakamutya Simoni, “Wuyitezaje i ngalawa sunga ha cisolo, mukazitajile zinyavu zenyu ko wunimule we zisomba.”
42005005	Simoni yakapitula yakatya, “Muwaha, cititilika cilo cose sunga wela cikunimula somba, hamba kutuga cinji, ninga ku so wulonje wako, nozitajila zinyavu.”
42005006	Nawo waza noza nhavivyo, wakatuga somba nyinji muno, sunga ne zinyavu zawo zikanza kudemuka,
42005007	wakawacema wayawo wono wali mu ngalawa yinzagwe, waze wawataze, nawo wakaza, wakazimemya zisomba mu zi ngalawa zose vyono nyejete, sunga zikawa behi no kudodomela.
42005008	Simoni Petelo yaza kuziwona zizo, yakafugama hamwande ya Yesu, yakutya “Wuwuce hono hangu, Gwe Muwaha, hambi ane nha nili munhu mubi.”
42005009	Simoni hamonga ne wayagwe wose, wezina ku soko yo wunimule we zisomba nyinji nhavivilya.
42005010	Yakobo na Yohana nawo nhavivyo, wana wa Zebedayo, wono wali wahanjile na Simoni. Yesu yakamutya Simoni, “Wulece kogopa, vyono wukulawa lulu kowa kuwanimula wanhu.”
42005011	Nawo waza kuzileta zingalawa zawo kwi'sangha, wakaleka vyose, wakamutyatya.
42005012	Kukawa Yesu lono yali mu kaya yinji, mwali na munhu mutamwa wa wukoma muwili wose, nayo yaza kumuwona Yesu, yakafugama yakamunena Yesu yakutya, “Gwe go Muwaha, hono wende, kosuma kunghwema.”
42005013	Yesu yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakamupamiza, yakutya, “Nyendile wukwemwe.” Lo lulolulo wukoma wukamuleka.
42005014	Nayo Yesu yakamutya “Wulece kumulonjela yunji: langa wubite, wukelajile kuli mukohani, wukalavye cilavywa so wezwe wako, nha vyono Wulajilize wa Musa wukutya, ho wuwe wuhomelezi kuli wene vyono wapona.”
42005015	Ninga zinghani za Yesu zikacila kumanyika hanhu hose. Ne wanhu wenji wakekonghola ho wamuhulicize, no kuponywa wutamwa wawo.
42005016	Ninga mwene yakabita hanhu hono hasina wanhu no kulomba.
42005017	Kukawa mwizuwa linji lono Yesu yejizaga: Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wono walawa ku vitumbi vyose vya Galilaya na Yudiya na Yelusalemi wali wekaye baho; ne vilungo vyo Mulungu vyo kuponyezya watamwa vikawa muli mwene.
42005018	Hobaho wakaza wanhu wamudinghuye mu citanda munhu mono yali yadejepe muwili wose; wakajela kumwinjiza kugati, wamuwice hali Yesu.
42005019	Ninga so winji we wanhu, si watuga nzila yo kwinjilila, holeka wakapula mwi'tembe, wakamutimizya mutamwa mwi'langa, hamonga ne citanda cakwe sunga ho hali Yesu.
42005020	Yesu yaza kuwona wihuwilo wawo vyono wuwaha, yakamutya yuyo munhu. “Mwendece, kunenelwa wubi wako.”
42005021	Wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo wakanza kwihwesa, wakutya, “Yuyu yo munhu ci, mono yakumutovula Mulungu? Hasina munhu mono kosuma kunenela wubi, langa hono si Mulungu yali wene.”
42005022	Ninga Yesu yakawatanga mahweso gawo, yakapitula yakawatya, “Alo mukwihwesa cici mu zinhumbula zenyu?”
42005023	Ya hayi yono mhelu, kutya Kunenelwa wubi wako, hamba kutya winuce wujende?
42005024	Ninga nyendile mumanye vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yena Wulajilize kono'nze kunenela wubi. Baho yakamutya munhu mono yali yadejepe, “Winuce, wudinghule citanda cako wubite ku kaya.”
42005025	Hobaho munhu yuyo mono yali yadejepe, yakenuka ha mwande ya wose, yakadinghula citanda cakwe, yakabita ku kaya, akuno yakumukumyo u Mulungu.
42005026	Wose wakezina no kwibatwa no woga, wakamukumya Mulungu, wakutya, “Nye, ciwona mezino zuwali!”
42005027	Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakalawila, yakamuwona mutoweza kodi yunji litagwa lyakwe Lawi yekaye mu hofisi, Yesu yakamutya “Wunhyatye.”
42005028	Nayo yakavileka vyose, yakamutyatya.
42005029	Yuyo Lawi, yakamunozeza Yesu zindigwa mu nyumba yakwe. Hakawa yipuga yiwaha lye watoweza kodi, na wanji wono wali vikalane nawo ha zindigwa.
42005030	Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize wakawang'ung'ulicila wejizwa wakwe; wakutya, “Alo so cici mukulizana kanyhi mukung'wezana ne watoweza kodi ne wanyo wubi?”
42005031	Yesu yakapitula yakawatya, “Iwanhu waswanu si wakusaka muganga; langa walya wono watamigwe.
42005032	Hambi nha si naza kuwacema i wanhu waswanu, langa i wanyo wubi, ho wanene.”
42005033	Nawo wakamutya Yesu, “Kenji wejizwa wa Yohana walekaga kulya, kanyhi walombaga; ne wejizwa we Wafalisayo nawo wanozaga nhavivyo; ninga wejizwa wako, walizaga kanyhi wang'wezaga.”
42005034	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Mosuma 'mbi kuwasaka i walalikwa ha halusi, walece kulya lono wakali wena na bwana halusi?
42005035	Ninga vilo vyolokuza; kolo wasolelwa bwana halusi, ho wololecela kulya mu vilo vivyo.”
42005036	Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo; “Hasina munhu mono kademulaga cilaka mu civwalo cipya, yaciwicile mu civwalo cihuma, na hono yanoze nhavivyo, kowa yademula civwalo cipya, ne cilaka cico ce civwalo cipya hamba si vyosuma kwiling'anila ne civwalo cihuma.
42005037	Hamba hasina munhu mono katajilaga divayi mhya, mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zihuma, hambi divayi mhya nha yoyibahula i mifuko, nayo divayi yokwitika, ne mifuko yohodanjika.
42005038	Langa divayi mhya, yinojeye kutajilwa mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zimhya.
42005039	Hamba hasina munhu mono kosulumila kanyhi kung'wa divayi mhya, lono yakondya kung'wa divayi huma, hambi nha yakutya, ‘Divayi huma yo swanu muno.’ ”
42006001	Mwi'zuwa linji lye Sabato, Yesu yakakola mu migunda yo wuhemba; Wejizwa wakwe wakabena maso go wuhemba, wakagafijiha ne miwoko, wakasola zimhece wakalya.
42006002	Ninga Wafalisayo wanji wakawawuza, “Nhawulenyi mukwituma yono yili mwiko mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
42006003	Yesu yakapitula yakawatya, “Alo nghani yiyi si mwasoma, vyono yetuma Dawudi, mwene hamonga na wono yali yena nawo, mwipango linji lono wali wadabuka?
42006004	Vyono yenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakalya i mikate yono yali cilavywa kuli Mulungu, yakawapela ne wayagwe wono yali yena nawo; mikate yono yali miwikwe hali, langa wakohani du wali wene?”
42006005	Yesu yakawatya, “U Mwana wo Munhu yo Muwaha we Sabato.”
42006006	Kukawa mu Sabato yinji, Yesu yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakejiza, na mumo mwali na munhu mono muwoko wakwe wo kulume wali wudejepe.
42006007	Wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wasakaga watuje nghani yo kumusonjezeza Yesu, holeka wakawa walindiye wawone hono komuponya munhu yuyo mwizuwa lye Sabato.
42006008	Ninga Yesu yakawamanya i mahweso gawo, yakamutya u munhu wo muwoko wono wudejepe “Winuce, wime haciligati.”
42006009	Yakenuka yakema haciligati. Yesu yakawatya, Nghumuwuzenyi, “Wulenyi, mwiko lu kwituma viswanu mu Sabato, hamba kwituma vibi? Kuponya wumi, hamba kwajiliza?”
42006010	Yaza kuwalanga wawalya wose wono wali wali baho, yakamutya yuyulya munhu, “Golola muwoko wako.” Nayo yakawugolola; no muwoko wakwe wukawa kunoga.
42006011	Ninga wene wakakolwa muno ne likuwo, wakalongana weneco wose vyono wosuma kumutendela vibi Yesu.
42006012	Lizuwa linji Yesu yakabita kwi'tunda, kulomba; yakekala kuko cilo cose sunga wukela, yakumulomba Mulungu.
42006013	Waza kwela, yakawacema wejizwa wakwe, yakahagula muli wene, wanhu yikumi na wejete, wawo yakawacemela litagwa lye “Watumwa.”
42006014	Simoni mono Yesu yamupela litagwa lya Petelo na Andeleya mwanakwawe, na Yakobo na Yohana, na Filipo na Batolomayo,
42006015	na Matayo na Tomaso, na Yakobo na Alifayo,
42006016	na Simoni mono yacemwaga Zelote, na Yuda na Yakobo, na Yuda Musikaliyota, mono hanyuma yakamugaluka Yesu.
42006017	Yaza kutima kwi'tunda hamonga nawo, Yesu yakema hanhu hono hali hali wuhihi, hatendemaye, na baho hali howali Wejizwa wakwe wenji, no winji we wanhu wono walawa mbavu zose za Yudiya, na Yelusalemi, na ku mhwani yose ya Tulo na Sidoni, wose wakaza wamuhulicize Yesu, no kuponywa zinhamwa zawo.
42006018	Na wono wagazagwa ne macisi, wakaponywa.
42006019	Ne wanhu wose wasakaga wamupamize, hambi vilungo nha vyalawaga muli mwene, vikawaponya wose.
42006020	Yesu yakawapitucila wejizwa wakwe yakatya, “Muli wamoti nyo waciwa: hambi wutemi wo Mulungu nha wenyu.
42006021	Muli wamoti 'nye mono muli nzala alu, hambi nha molokwigutywa. Muli wamoti 'nye mono mukulila alu, hambi nha moloseka.
42006022	“Muli wamoti 'nye, kolo wanhu wakumusulenyi, na kolo wakumusiwanulenyi, no kumulijenyi, no kuliviza litagwa lyenyu nha wetuma vibi, ku soko yo Mwana wo Munhu.
42006023	Mu cidaha cico zilakwijela zizo, nhondo muze musecelele mwizuwa lilyo so nyemo. Hambi wuhumbilizwe wenyu nha wuwaha ku wulanga. Hambi walezi zawo nha vyo wawatendela i wawizi.
42006024	Ninga woyi he 'nye mono muli wagoli! Hambi nha mwapegwa mwakondya wusindamice wenyu.
42006025	Woyi he 'nye mono mwigute aluno, hambi nha molodabuka. Woyi he 'nye mono mukuseka aluno, hambi nha molokalala no kulila.
42006026	Woyi he nye kolo wakumulumbizenyi wanhu wose, hambi walezi wawo nha vyo wawatendela i wawizi wo wulambi.”
42006027	“Ninga ane nghumutyenyi anye mono mukuhuliciza, Muwendaje i walugu wenyu, muwatendelaje viswanu wono wakumusulenyi.
42006028	Muwalugutize wono wakumulijitenyi, muwalombele wono wakumutendelenyi vibi.
42006029	Munhu hono yakutowe mu luzagasa lumonga, wumupitusize no luzagasa luyagwe; munhu hono yakuboce likoti lyako, wumulecelaje ne shati yako.
42006030	Muli wose mono yakukulomba cinji, wumupelaje, na mono yakukusolela sawo yako, wulece kuyisaka yakugomolele.
42006031	Muwatendelaje wanhu wose, nha vyono anye mukusaka wene wamutendelenyi nyenye.
42006032	“Hambi hono muwe kuwenda du wono wakumwendenyi, mowa mwina lilumboci? Hasina. Ku soko hamba ne wanyo wubi nawo, nha wetumaga nhavivyo.
42006033	Na hono muwe kuwatendela viswanu wono wakumutendelenyi viswanu du, mowa mwina lilumboci? Hambi nha sunga ne wanyo wubi nawo nha watendaga nhavivyo.
42006034	Na hono muwe kuwakopesa wono mwitumbiye vyono womugomolelenyi kanyhi, mowa mwina lilumboci? Ku soko sunga ne wanyo wubi nawo nha wawakopesaga i wanyo wubi wayawo, ho wagomolelwe kanyhi vyono viling'aniye.
42006035	Vyo si yinha, ninga muwendaje walugu wenyu, muwatendelaje viswanu, mweze kuwakopesa, kuno si mukulanjilila kugomolelwa. No wuhumbilizwe wenyu wowa wuwaha, nanye mowa wana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli Vyose: hambi mwene nha muswanu kuli wono wasina lilumbo na kuli wabi.
42006036	Mweze no lusungu nha vyono u Sogo yenyu yali lusungu.”
42006037	“Mulece kuwaling'aniza wanji, nanye ho si moling'anizwa no Mulungu, mulece kuwahosa wanji, nanye si molohoswa: muwanenelaje wanji, nanye molonenelwa.
42006038	Wapelenyi wanji vyono wakusaka, nanye molopegwa, Heya molobocela mu miwoko yenyu cipimo ciswanu cisindilwe, cisinjisizwe, cono cimemeleceye, no kumwajika. Hambi nha mu cipimo cicilya du cono mwitumamilaga kuli wanji, co cico du cono Mulungu nayo kolomujelelenyi na nyenye.”
42006039	Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici “Wulenyi, u mubofu kosuma 'mbi kumutonga mubofu muyagwe? Hamba hadodo, wose wogwila mwikombo.
42006040	U mwijizwa kowa nho mwijizi wakwe.
42006041	Kosuma nhawule kuciwona cilagala cono cili mu liso lyo nduguyo, hamba si kukumbucilaga libici lyono lili mu liso lyako go mweneco?
42006042	Hamba kosuma nhawule kumutya nduguyo, ‘Ndugu yangu, leka ta nghuwuse i cilagala cono cili mu liso lyako, na akuno si wukulanga libici lyono lili mu liso lyako go mweneco?’ Go mukoci 'gwe, wamule kuwusa libici lyono lili mu liso lyako, ho kosuma kuwona viswanu no kusuma kuwusa icilagala cono cili mu liso lyo nduguyo.”
42006043	“Hasina libici liswanu lyono lilelaga mikalo mibi, hamba libici libi lyono lilelaga mikalo miswanu.
42006044	Wanhu wawutanjilaga mubici mu mikalo yayo. Kanyhi yili calinze, vyono, wanhu si wahepaga mikuyu mu mamivya, hamba si wahepaga zabibu mu mabijili.
42006045	Munhu muswanu, kalavyaga ziswanu kulawa mu viwutwa vyakwe vya mu nhumbula yakwe. No munhu mubi nayo kalavyaga izimbi kulawa mu viwutwa vyakwe vya mu nhumbula yakwe, hambi munhu nha kalongaga kulawa muli zono zimemile mu nhumbula yakwe.”
42006046	“Nghuwona mukunyitya, ‘Muwaha, Muwaha,’ akuno si mukwituma zono nghulonga?
42006047	Nomulonjelenyi cihwanicizo cono cokwila, kulajila vyono yenha mono yakunyiziza, no kuzihulika zinghani zangu no kuzituma.
42006048	Yuyo yehwanile munhu mono yakuzenga kaya, mono yahimba hasi muno, no kuwika musinji wa mabwe, gakaza malenga menji, gakayikundujiza kaya yiyo, hamba kuyisinjisa ng'o, vyono yali yizenjigwe mu musinji wono wukamile.
42006049	Ninga mono yakuzihulika zinghani zangu, hamba kwituma cinji, yuyo yehwanile munhu mono yazenga kaya yakwe mu muhangha caka du, hamba kuwicila musinji, malenga gakayikundujiza kaya yiyo, nayo yikagwa no kuhodanjicila lukulu.”
42007001	Yaza kukondya kulonga zinghani zakwe zose hali wanhu, Yesu yakabita ku Kapelanawumi.
42007002	Kuko kwali na muwaha we wasilikale yigana, Mulumi, mono yali yena mwitumami wakwe mono yali yamwendile muno. Mwitumami yuyu yali yatamigwe yeza yali behi no kufwa.
42007003	Nayo yaza hulika za Yesu, yakamutumila i walongola wanji we Wayahudi, wabite wakamulombe Yesu ho yaze yamuponye mwitumami wakwe.
42007004	Nawo wazafika kuli Yesu, wakamunena muno, wakutya “Ayu yanojeye wumutendele nghani yiyi,
42007005	hambi nha yawendile wanhu wetu, nayo yo mwene mono yacizenjela ne nhang'anilo yetu yo Wuhembelo.”
42007006	Yesu yakabitana nawo. Na lono yali yasejelela behi ne kaya, yuyo muwaha we Wasilikale yigana, yakamutumila wendece wakwe wamulonjele Yesu. “Muwaha wulece kwigaza, hambi ne nha si nghwiliye agwe winjile mu kaya yangu.
42007007	Kanyhi nane nghwiwona vyono si nghwiliye kuza kuli gwegwe; ninga wulonje du, no mwitumami wangu kopona.
42007008	Hambi nane nha nili hasi yo wulajilize we wawaha, nina wasilikale wangu. Nane nghumutya ayu, ‘Bita’ nayo yakubita, nghumutya yunji, ‘Wuze’ nayo yakuza, na hono nimutye mwitumami wangu, ‘Wunoze nhavi,’ nayo yakunoza.”
42007009	Yesu yaza kuhulika zizi, yakamwizina no kumukumya yuyulya u muwaha we wasilikale. Hanyuma yakawapitucila we lipuga lye wanhu wono wamutyatyaga, yakawatya. “Nghali nawona wihuwilo wuwaha nha wuwu, hamba mu Isilayeli.”
42007010	Nawo wono watumwa waza kuwuya ku kaya, wakamwagana yuyulya mwitumami yanoga.
42007011	Hanyuma hadodo, Yesu yakabita kwitumbi lyono litezagwa Nayini, Wejizwa wakwe hamonga na wanhu wenji, wakabitana nayo.
42007012	Ale, yaza sejelela he 'lango liwaha lyo kwinjilila mwi'kaya, yakawona wanhu wadinghuye muzelelo mono yafwiye, mwana we ciwene wo mucekulu mufwile. Wanhu wenji wa mwi'kaya lilyo, wali wali hamonga no mucekulu yuyo.
42007013	Nayo Muwaha yali yeza kumuwona mucekulu yuyo, yakamuwonela lusungu, yakamutya, “Wulece kulila.”
42007014	Yakasejelela behi, yakacipamiza citanda cono wali wamudinghuliye mono yali yafwiye, nawo wono wali wamudinghuye wakema. Nayo Yesu yakatya, “Muzelelo, nghukulonjela, Winuce.”
42007015	Yuyo mono yali yafwiye, yakenuka, yakekala, no kwamula kulonga. Na Yesu yakamupelo nyina.
42007016	Wanhu wose wakebatwa no woga, wakamulumba u Mulungu, wakutya, “Muwizi muwaha kalawila mwetu; no Mulungu kaza kuwakomboza wanhu wakwe.”
42007017	Ne nghani yakwe yiyi yikamanyika mu Wuyahudi mose, na mu yisi yose yono yipilime.
42007018	I wejizwa wa Yohana, wakamuganulila Yohana zizo zose, Yohana yakawacema wejete, wayagwe ne wejizwa wakwe,
42007019	yakawatuma wabite kuli Muwaha wakamuwuze “Alu agwe! Yo yulya mono yakuza, hamba cimulanjilile yunji?”
42007020	Wejizwa wawo wejete waza kumubitila Yesu, wakatya, “Yohana u Mubaputizi kacituma kwako cikuwuze: ‘Ati! Yo gwegwe mono yakuza, hamba cimulanjilile yunji?’ ”
42007021	Mu cipango cico, Yesu yakawaponya wenji mu zinhamwa, no wugazwe, ne macisi, ne wabofu wenji yakawapela wuwone.
42007022	Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Mubite mukamulonjele Yohana zono muwene na zono muhulice; i wabofu wakuwona, wono wali citewe wakujenda viswanu, wono watamigwe wukoma wakukwemwa, ne waciwa wakuganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu.
42007023	Yo mumoti mono si yakuwona cikobazo muli nene.”
42007024	Waza kutuluka wono watumwa na Yohana, Yesu yakanza kuwalonjela mapuga ge wanhu, za Yohana. “Mwene mwabitaga kunyika kulanga cici?” Mwasakaga kuwona lihanze lyono lyayumvywagwa ne mbeho?
42007025	Ninga mwabitaga kulanga cici? Mwabitaga kumuwona munhu mono yavwalile vivwalo vye cimalidadi? Lanjenyi, wono wena vivwalo vyo lukumyo, no kwikala mu mikalile yo wumote wa za mononze, wekalaga mu zinyumba ze watemi!
42007026	Ta munonjelaje, mwalawa kulanga cici, Mwabitaga kumuwona muwizi lo? Heya, mbeka mono yamucizize no muwizi.
42007027	Yuyu Yohana yo yakulongwa mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Langa ta, nghumutuma mutumwa wangu, yakutyo Muwaha, nghumutuma yakulongolele no kukunozelezeza nzila.”
42007028	Yesu yakatya, “Mu wana wose we wanhu, hasina mono yamucizize Yohana u Mubaputizi. Hamba nhavivyo, u mudodo muno mu wutemi wo Mulungu yo muwaha si nho mwene.”
42007029	Wanhu wose ne watoweza kodi, wali weza hulika, wakawukumya u wuswanu wo Mulungu, wawo wo wawo, wono wali wakondya kubaputizwa mu wubaputizo wa Yohana.
42007030	Ninga Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakawulema wuhile wo Mulungu wono wali wuwanojeye, wakalema sunga no kubaputizwa na Yohana.
42007031	Yesu yakajendelela kutya: “Holeka nowehwananiza wanhu we ndelo yiyi na cinhuci? Wo wanhu wono wenha wule?
42007032	Wenha wana wadodo wono wekaye mu Sokoni, wono welonjelaga awa na walya; wakutya, Cimutowelenyi zifilimbi, nanye hamba kuvina ng'o, calila nanye hamba kulila ng'o.
42007033	Hambi Yohana u Mubaputizi nha yaza si yalizaga ndigwa, hamba si yang'wezaga divayi, nanye mukatya, Yena lukwale.
42007034	U Mwana wo Munhu nha yaza, yakulya no kung'wa, nanye mukatya, Langa ta munhu 'yu mubuguci, na mung'wa divayi, mwendece we watoweza kodi ne wanyo wubi!
42007035	Hamba nhavivyo, I mahala go Mulungu gejela vyono maswanu kuli wose wono wakugavumila.”
42007036	Mufalisayo yunji yakamusaka Yesu yalye ndigwa kwakwe. Nayo yakenjila mu nyumba ya yuyo Mufalisayo yakekala yalye ndigwa.
42007037	Na mwitumbi lilyo, mwali moyuli mucekulu yunji mono yali yena mikalile mibi. Nayo yaza kumanya vyono Yesu yali yekaye yakulya mu kaya yo Mufalisayo, yakaleta supa ya mafuta ge mhunjile swanu,
42007038	yakema behi na Yesu, yakulila, ne mahozi gakwe gakamusululila Yesu mu magulu. U Mucekulu yuyo yakayipata migulu ya. Yesu kwe zimvili zakwe. Yakamunonela muno migulu, yakawabaka ne mafuta gagalya.
42007039	U Mufalisayo yuyo mono yamucema Yesu, yaza kuziwona zizo, yakatya mu nhumbula yakwe, “Munhu ayu yali yawe muwizi, yali yamutanje mucekulu yuyu vyono yenha na vyono mubi.”
42007040	Yesu yakamutya yuyo Mufalisayo “Simoni nina nghani yo kukulonjela.” Nayo Simoni yakatya, “Lonje Mwijizi.”
42007041	Yesu yakatya “Kwali na wanhu wejete wono wali wamukopile munhu yumonga mapesa. Yunji yali yakopile silinje magana mahano, no muyagwe, silinje makumi mahano.
42007042	Waza kuwa wasina co kulipa, yuyo munhu yakawanenela wose vyono wejete. Ale, wa hayi muli wawa wejete, mono kocila kumwenda yuyo munhu mono yawakopesa zipesa?”
42007043	Simoni yakapitula yakatya, na lunji, yuyo mono yaneneywe nayo mugawa muwaha, yo komwenda muno munhu yuyo. Yesu yakamutya “Kulonga mbeka.”
42007044	Hanyuma yakamupitucila mucekulu, no kumutya Simoni, “Kumuwona ta mucekulu yuyu? Ane ninjila mu nyumba yako, malenga go kuzuguza magulu gangu, si wumheye ng'o. Ninga mucekulu ayu, kasuluziza mahozi gakwe mu magulu gangu no kugapata kwe zimvili zakwe.
42007045	Agwe si wunoneye; ninga ayu neza kwinjila, si yalecile kunonela muno magulu gangu.
42007046	Agwe si wumbacile mafuta mu mutwe: ninga ayu kambaka mafuta mu magulu gangu.
42007047	Holeka nghukutya, wendo wakwe wukulajila vyono, hamba yawe yali yena wubi winji, kanenelwa. Ninga wowose mono kanenelwaga nghani ndodo, yo kendaga hadodo.”
42007048	Yesu yakamutya u mucekulu, “Kunenelwa wubi wako.”
42007049	Na walya wono wali wekaye nayo ha ndigwa, wakanza kutya mu zinhumbula zawo “Yuyu yo nani mwene, mono yakusuma kunenela wubi?”
42007050	Nayo Yesu yakamutya u mucekulu, “Wihuwilo wako wukuponya; wubite wupolile.”
42008001	Hanyuma ya zizo, Yesu yakakola mu makaya na mu vitumbi, yakulonga no kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu. Na awalya we likumi na wejete wali wali hamonga nayo.
42008002	Hamonga ne wacekulu wanji wono Yesu yawaponya macisi ne zinhamwa zinji, nawo wali wali hamonga nayo. Wawo wo wa Malyamu mono (yacemwaga Magadalena,) muli yuyo galawa macisi mupunghati.
42008003	Na Yowana u mugolece wa Cuza u mwitumami mulongola wa Helode, na Susana, na wanji wenji. Wacekulu wawo wawetumamilaga Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe mu sawo yawo weneco.
42008004	Lipuga liwaha lye wanhu, wekongholaga, na wanhu wenji wakawa kumuziza Yesu wakulawa mu matumbi gose. Nayo yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici,
42008005	“U mumiza mbeyu yalawila kumiza mbeyu yakwe, na lono yamizaga, zinji zikalagala mu nzila; wakola nzila wakazikanyanjila, zindeje zikazilya.
42008006	Zinji zikalagala hono hogali mabwe, zikota ninga zikanyala, vyono zali zisina malenga.
42008007	Zinji zikalagala mu mabici ge mamivya, zikawilukana hamonga ne mamivya, gakazititiliza.
42008008	Zimbeyu zinji zikalagala mu muhangha muswanu, zikawiluka, zikalela mhece yigana.” Yaza kukondya kulonga zizo, yakalonga ne yizi yiwaha, yakatya “Holeka muhulice, hono mwina makutu.”
42008009	Ne wejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza Yesu nhunizo ye cihwanicizo cico.
42008010	Yakawatya, “Anye mupegwa kumanya zono zihundicigwe zo wutemi wo Mulungu, ninga kuli wanji, vyo si yinha. Langa wene walonjelwaga mu vihwanicizo, hono wakuwona, ho walece kuwona, na hono wakuhulika, ho walece kwizuka.”
42008011	Ale, ne nhunizo ye cihwanicizo cici nha yoyi. I mbeyu yo nghani yo Mulungu.
42008012	Zono zalagala mu nzila, zikulajila iwanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani, hanyuma Setani yakuza yakuyiwusa yiyo nghani mu zinhumbula zawo, ho walece kwihuwila no kupona.
42008013	Azilya zono zalagala hono hogali mabwe, zikulajila iwanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani no kuyibocela na nyemo. Ninga nha vyono zinha zimbeyu zizo, iwanhu wawo wakuwa wasina milela, wono wehuwilaga kwa cidaha du, na kolo wakujelwa, wakuwuya ne nyuma.
42008014	Na zono zalagala mu mabici ge mamivya, co cihwanicizo ce wanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani, ninga mu wujendelele wawo, wakuzinjilizwa ne mahwele ne zisawo, no wiyendeze we mikalile yiyi, nawo siwakulela mikalo yono yikangaye.
42008015	Nazo zono zalagala mu muhangha muswanu wo wanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani, no kuyikamisa kwa nhumbula swanu na ye cihuliko. Nawo wakulela mikalo mu wukangalile.
42008016	“Wanhu si wakolelezaga tala no kuyigubiciza, hamba kuyiwika mwi'vungu lye citanda; langa wayiwikaga ha wuwiko wayo, wanhu wono wakwinjila mugati, wawone wuzelu wayo.
42008017	Nghani yo yose yono hundikwe yolokwanzalikwa, na ze cinyele zolomanyika, no kulawila kuzelu.
42008018	Holeka mwiyihenje vyono mukuhulika. Hambi mono yena, nha kopegwa; na mono yasina, kosolelwa sunga na cono yakutya yena naco.”
42008019	Baho, u nyina ne wanduguze wa Yesu wakamuziza, ninga si wasuma kwiwona nayo so winji we wanhu.
42008020	Yesu yakalonjelwa, vyono u nyina ne wanduguze wali kunze, wakusaka kumuwona.
42008021	Ninga Yesu yakawalonjela wanhu wose, “Yaya ne wandugu zangu, wo walya wono wakuyihulika nghani yo Mulungu no kuyitumama.”
42008022	Kukawa mwizuwa linji, Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa mwene ne Wejizwa wakwe; yakawatya, “Cilowoce ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba.” Wakatuluka.
42008023	Ninga lono wajendelelaga mu ngalawa, mwene Yesu yakebatwa na nhongo, yakagona. Likatima likukunzo yiwaha lye mbeho mwilamba: malenga gakawa kwanza kwinjila mu ngalawa, wakawa wali mu mbali mbaha.
42008024	Wejizwa wawalya wakamubitila Yesu, wakamusinhusa wakutya “Muwaha, Muwaha, ceza kufwa!” Yesu yakasinhuka, yakavitacila imbeho ne mawingo mawaha ge malenga, gakatula, hakanyamala twii.
42008025	Yakawatya i wejizwa wakwe “Wihuwilo wenyu wuli hayi 'mbi? Ninga wene wakezina no kogopa, wakeyitya, Alo munhuci yuyu, sunga i mbeho ne malenga yakuvilonjela, vinyamale, navyo vikumuhulika!”
42008026	Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakajendelela no muhinzo wakafika mu yisi ya Wagelasene, yono vidomile na Galilaya ku nhumbi ye lilamba.
42008027	Nayo Yesu yaza kutima mu'si viketang'anila na munhu monga mono yali yena macisi, yakulawa mwi'kaya, u munhu yuyo mu vilo vinji si yavwalaga myenda, hamba si yekalaga mu kaya, langa yekalaga mu vitenjelo.
42008028	Yaza kumuwona Yesu, yakazoza, yakagwa hali mwene, yakabalaluka na lizi yiwaha yakatya, “Alo wina nghanici nase, Yesu go Mwana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli Vyose? Nghukunena wulece kungaza.”
42008029	Hambi nha yalilajiliza licisi lilawanize muli munhu. Hambi nha lyamwibataga kenji. Hamba yiwe wanhu wamuwikaga mugati no kumuwopa ne vyuma; ninga yavidumulaga viwopelo kali kenji, ne licisi lilyo lyamuwinjilaga ku nyika.
42008030	Yesu yakamuwuza, litagwa lyako gwegwe nani? Yakatya litagwa lyangu nene “Mhuga,” vyono macisi menji gali gamwinjiye munhu yuyo.
42008031	Gago macisi gakamunena Yesu yalece kugalajiliza gawuce no kwajilila mwikombo lyono lisina mudumo.
42008032	Kwali ne 'tewa lya ngubi nyinji, likudima ha mwejelele we litunda. Ale gago macisi gakamunena Yesu yagakombole genjile muli zene. Nayo Yesu yakagakombola.
42008033	Imacisi gakalawa muli munhu, gakenjila mu zingubi, nazo zingubi zikavulumucila mwilamba, zikafwila mumo mu malenga.
42008034	I wadimi waza kuziwona zono ziweye, wakatiza, wakabita kuwalonjela wanhu wa mwi'kaya na mu'si.
42008035	Wanhu wakaza wazilanje zono ziweye; wakafika kuli Yesu, wakamuwona munhu mono yali yalavywa macisi, yavwalile myenda, yena ne mahala gakwe; yekaye ha magulu ga Yesu, wakogopa muno.
42008036	Nawo wono waziwona zizo, wakawaloloseza wanhu wawo vyono munhu yuyo yaponyigwe.
42008037	Ne wanhu wose we yisi ya Wagelasene wakebatwa no woga wuwaha, holeka wakamunena Yesu yawuce, yabite. Nayo Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakawuka.
42008038	Ninga u munhu mono yalavywa macisi, yakamunena viwezane nayo, ninga Yesu si yamulumba, langa yakamutya.
42008039	“Wuwuye kwenyu, wukalolose zimbaha zono Mulungu yakutendeye.” Yakabita, yakaganula hanhu hose mwi'kaya lilyo, zimbaha zono yatendelwa na Yesu.
42008040	Nayo Yesu yaza kuwuya ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba, wanhu wenji wakamubocela na nyemo, hambi nha wamulindilaga wose.
42008041	Baho yakaza munhu, litagwa lyakwe Yayilo, nayo yali muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakagwa ha magulu ga Yesu, yakamunena yaze kwakwe;
42008042	hambi nha yali yena mwana wa cicekulu we ciwene, kotya wa myaka yikumi na myejete, nayo yali yeza behi no kufwa. Ninga Yesu lono yabitaga wanhu wenji wakamumemela.
42008043	Na mumo mwi'puga lye wanhu, mwali na mucekulu yunji mono yali yena wutamwa wo wuzaze we sakami myaka yikumi na myejete, [nayo hamba yawe yali yetumamila sawo yakwe yose mu waganga,] ninga hasina hamba yumonga mono yasuma kumuponya.
42008044	U mucekulu yuyo, yakaziza ku mugongo wa Yesu, yakapamiza limhembo lye civwalo cakwe, na hobaho du, u wuzaze wakwe we sakami wukaduma kamonga.
42008045	Yesu yakawuza, “Alo nani mono yamhamize?” Wakakana wose. Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Muwaha, wanhu wenji wakupilime no kukonyeceza.”
42008046	Ninga Yesu yakatya, “Ho yuli munhu mono yamhamize, hambi nha manyile vilungo vilawa muli nene.”
42008047	No mucekulu yaza wona vyono si kosuma kwihundika, yakelajila akuno yakucicima so woga, yakagwa hali Yesu, yakalolosa hali wanhu wose cono cilecile yakumupamiza Yesu, na vyono yakondya kuponywa kamonga.
42008048	Yesu yakamutya, “Go muhinza, wihuwilo wako wukuponya, wubite wupolile.”
42008049	Na lono Yesu yali yakali kulonga, Yayilo yakaletelwa nghani kulawa ku kaya kwakwe, vyono, “U mwanago yakondya kufwa, wulece kumugaza Mwijizi.”
42008050	Ninga Yesu yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakamulonjela Yayilo yakatya, “Wulece kogopa. Wihuwile du, nayo mwanago kopona.”
42008051	Yaza kufika kukaya ya Yayilo si yamukombola yunji wenjilane nayo, langa Petelo, na Yohana, na Yakobo, ne walezi wo muhinza yuyo du.
42008052	Wanhu wose, walilaga, ku soko yo mwana yuyo. Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Mulece kulila, hambi mwana nha siyafwiye, langa yagonile nhongo du.”
42008053	Nawo wakamuseka, hambi nha wali wamanyile vyono yafwiye.
42008054	Ninga Yesu yakamwibata muwoko, yakacema yakutya “Go muhinza winuce.”
42008055	Muhe wo muhinza wukamuwuyila, yakenuka kamonga, Yesu yakalajiliza wamupele ndigwa.
42008056	Walezi wakwe wakezina, ninga Yesu yakawalajiliza, walece kumulonjela munhu kuli zizo zono zijeye
42009001	Yesu yakawacemela hamonga we likumi na wejete, yakawapela vilungo no wulajilize muli macisi gose, no kuponya zinhamwa.
42009002	Yakawatuma kuganula zo wutemi wo Mulungu, no kuponya watamwa.
42009003	Yakawatya, “Lono mukubita, mulece kusola cocose, hamba nghome, hamba mufuko, hamba ndigwa, hamba mapesa, hamba mulece kuwa na kanzo nyejete nyejete.
42009004	Ne nyumba yo yose yono mokwinjila no kubocelwa, ale mwikalaje mumo du, sunga kolo mukuwuka mu citumbi cico.
42009005	Wanhu hono walece kumubocelenyi, muwuce mwi'kaya lilyo, na lono mukuwuka, mugakung'unhaje manghundi gono gali mu magulu genyu, gawe wuhomelezi kuli wene.”
42009006	Wakatuluka, wakakola mu vitumbi, wakaganula Luganuzi Luswanu, no kuponya watamwa hanhu hose.
42009007	Ale, Mutemi Helode, yazihulika zose zono zinozigwe; yakawa na mahwele, vyono wanji watezaga, Yohana kazuka mu wafu,
42009008	na wanji watezaga, Eliya kalawila, na wanji watezaga, vyono muyagwe ne wawizi we katali kazuka.
42009009	Ninga Helode yakatya, “Yuyu Yohana namudumula mutwe; alu kowa nani yuyo, mono nghuhulika zizi?” Yahilaga yamuwone Yesu.
42009010	Ne watumwa waza kuwuya, wakamuganulila Yesu zono wetuma zose. Nayo Yesu yakawasola wali wene, wakabita kwi'kaya lyono litezagwa Betesayida.
42009011	Ninga i wanhu waza kumanya kono yabitile, wakamutyatya: Yesu yakawabocela, yakawaganulila zo wutemi wo Mulungu, nawo wono wasakaga kuponywa, yakawaponya.
42009012	Ne lizuwa lono lyali lyeza lili behi no kugwila, wakaza we likumi na wejete, wakamutya, “Wuwelagaje wanhu wabite ku vitumbi na mu'si yono yipilime, wakalondole wugono ne zindigwa; hambi kuno nha cili mu nyika.”
42009013	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Muwapele nyenye ndigwa walye.” Wakatya, “Ase cisina cinji, langa mikate mihano du na somba nyejete, lunji cibite co weneco cikawagulile ndigwa wanhu wawa wose!”
42009014	(Hambi nha wali walume kotya elufu yihano). Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, “Muwalonjele wanhu wekale vipuga vipuga vya wanhu makumi mahano mahano.”
42009015	Wejizwa wakanoza nha vyono wakalonjelwa, wakawekaza wose.
42009016	Baho Yesu yakayisole mikate yiyilya mihano, ne zisomba zinyejete, yakagalamila ku wulanga, yakamulumbo Mulungu, yakavibegula, yakawapela wejizwa wakwe wawagawile wanhu.
42009017	Wakalya wose wakeguta; wakatondoleza i vibegulwa vyono vyasigala, wakamevya nhoto yikumi na nyejete.
42009018	Mwizuwa linji Yesu yalombaga yali wene, i Wejizwa wakwe wali wena nayo. Yakawawuza, “Alu wanhu wanhezaga nene nani?”
42009019	Wakapitula “Wakutya, Yohana u Mubaputizi, ninga wanji wakutya, yo gwegwe Eliya, na wanji wakutya, yumonga muyagwe ne wawizi we katali kazuka.”
42009020	Baho yakawawuza, “Ninga anye ma, munhezaga nene nani?” Petelo yapitula yakatya, “Kilisito wo Mulungu.”
42009021	Ninga Yesu yakawalajiliza walece kumulonjela yunji nghani yiyi, yakutya,
42009022	“U Mwana wo Munhu, si koleka kugazwa muno no kulemwa ne wanyamhala ne wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, no kuwulagwa, ne lizuwa lye kadatu kozuka.”
42009023	Hanyuma yakawalonjela wanhu wose, “Yunji wowose hono yahile kuza munyuma yangu, yimunojeye yekapise mweneco, yadinghule musalaba wakwe vilo vyose, yanhyatye.
42009024	Hambi muli wose mono yakuhila kuyiponya nhumbula yakwe, yuyo yo koyajiliza; ninga muli wose mono koyajiliza nhumbula yakwe kusoko yangu, yuyo yo koyiponya.
42009025	Hambi munhu kotuga cambuzici, hono yatuje u wugoli wose wa mono yinze, ko kwiyajiliza hamba kwiyambuza mweneco?
42009026	Hambi muli wose mono kombonela soni nene ne zinghani zangu, nayo u Mwana wo Munhu kolomuwonela soni, yalaza kuziza mu nhojo yakwe, na yo Sogwe, na ye Wamalayika wono welile.
42009027	Ninga mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, howali wamonga wono wemile baha, wono si wofwa lono wakali si nawuwona wutemi wo Mulungu.”
42009028	Kukawa nha vilo munana vyapuluta, lono zali zakondya kulongwa zinghani zizi, Yesu yakawasola Petelo na Yohana na Yakobo, yakabitana nawo kwi'tunda, kulomba.
42009029	Na lono yalombaga, futa yo wusu wakwe yikapitula, ne vivwalo vyakwe vikawa vizelu, vikung'alala.
42009030	Na kumbe, wanhu walume wejete wakejela, wakalongana nayo, nawo wali wa Musa na Eliya,
42009031	wono wejela mu nhojo, wakawa kulongana nayo zo wufwe wakwe wono wofisilizizwa ku Yelusalemi.
42009032	Ale, Petelo, na wono wali hamonga nayo wali watimbile na nhongo, ninga wakenuka, wakayiwona nhojo yakwe, wakawawona na wawalya iwalume wejete wono wali wemile nayo.
42009033	Kukawa lono wawo walume wejete wawukaga, Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Muwaha, viswanu vyono cili baha, cizenje vibanda vidatu; cimonga cako, cimonga ca Musa, cimonga ca Eliya.” I mbeka, Petelo yalongaga zizi, akuno hamba siyakumanya na cono yakulonga.
42009034	Na Petelo lono yalongaga zizi, ho baho baho likaza yivunde, likawagubika no mubeho: na waza kugubikwa ne livunde, i wejizwa wakogopa muno muno.
42009035	Lizi likalawa mwivunde, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu muhagulwa wangu: mweze kumuhulika.”
42009036	Lizi lyaza nyamala, yakejela Yesu yali wene. Nawo i wejizwa wakanyamala, hamba kumulonjela yunji cinji vilo vivyo muli zono wawona.
42009037	Kukawa mitondo yaco, lono Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wadatu, watenenhukaga kulawa ku kulya kwi'tunda, yipuga yiwaha lye wanhu liketang'anila na Yesu.
42009038	Na munhu yunji wa mwipuga lilyo, yakabalaluka yakutya, “Gwe Mwijizi, nghukunena wumulanje mwanangu, mwanangu we ciwene.
42009039	Licisi limwibataga liwa munoza kawa kuzoza muno, kanyhi limupelaga cinzilisa, ne cifulo ciwa kumulawa mu mulomo. Nalyo lijendelelaga kumugaza muno, hamba kumulecela mbela.
42009040	Nane nghawanena wejizwa wako walilavye; hamba siwasuma kulilavya.”
42009041	Yesu yakapitula yakatya, “Anye waco mo lulelo lono lusina wihuwilo mono mwajiliye, alo cowa kwikalana nanye, no kumukangalilenyi sunga nili?” Hanyuma yakamulonjela yuyo munhu, “Mulete kuno mwanago.”
42009042	Ale, lono yuyo mwana yazaga kuli Yesu, licisi likamugwisa hasi. Ninga Yesu yakalitacila licisi lyavu, yakamuponya mwana, yakamupela sogwe.
42009043	Ne wanhu wose wakezina muno so vilungo viwaha vyo Mulungu. Ale, wawalya wanhu lono wezinaga so zose zono yetuma, Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe,
42009044	Muteje makutu genyu, muzikamise zinghani zizi: “U Mwana wo Munhu nha kolavywa mu mawoko ge wanhu.”
42009045	Ninga wene si wezuka nhunizo ye nghani yiyi, hambi nghani yiyi nha yali hundikwe kuli wene, ho walece kuyitanga; nawo wakogopa kumuwuza ze nghani yiyi.
42009046	I wejizwa wakawa kwiwanganila weneco wose, mono kowa muwaha kuciza wayagwe yo wa hayi.
42009047	Ninga Yesu yakagamanya mahweso gono gali mu zinhumbula zawo, holeka yakasola mwana mudodo, yakamuwika behi nayo,
42009048	Yakawatya. “Muli wose, mono komubocela mwana yuyu mudodo mwi'tagwa lyangu, yakumbocela nene: na muli wose mono yakumbocela nene, yakumubocela mono yanhuma, hambi u mudodo muno muli nyenye, nha yo muwaha wa wose.”
42009049	Yohana yakawacilila yakatya, “Muwaha, camuwona yunji yakulavizya macisi mwi'tagwa lyako; cikamulemeza, hambi nha si yakujendana na'se.”
42009050	Ninga Yesu yakamutya, “Mulece kumulemeza: hambi mono si yali cinyume nanye, ayo muyenyu.”
42009051	Kukawa, vilo vyo wunyasulilwe wakwe Yesu wo kubitila ku wulanga vyeza kusejelela, mwene Yesu yakawa yena yo wubita ku Yelusalemi.
42009052	Yakatuma watumwa walongole; wakabita, wakenjila mu citumbi cinji ce Wasamaliya, ho wamuwikanizize lukulu hanhu.
42009053	Ninga wanyawusi wa baho siwavumila kumubocela, vyono yali yadomile ku Yelusalemi.
42009054	Holeka i wejizwa wakwe, Yakobo na Yohana waza kuziwona zizo, wakatya. “Ati Muwaha, alu wendile cilonje moto wutime kulawa ku wulanga, wuwatakamize, [nha vyono yatenda Eliya]?”
42009055	Yesu yakapituka yakawatacila. [Yakatya, “Si mumanyile vyono winha muhe wenyu.”]
42009056	Yesu hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe wakawuka wakabita ku citumbi cinji.
42009057	Nawo lono wajendaga mu nzila, yunji yakamutya Yesu, “Nokutyatya kono wukubita kose.”
42009058	Yesu yakamutya, “Zinyhewe zina mamwina, ne zindeje za mucanyha zina manhuli, ninga Mwana wo Munhu yasina ho kuceha.”
42009059	Hanyuma, yakamutya yunji, “Wunhyatye.” Ninga yuyo yakatya, “Muwaha, wunghombole namule mbite nghamuzice sogo yangu.”
42009060	Yesu yakamutya, “Wuwalekaje wafu wazice wafu wawo; langa agwe wubite wukanze kuganula zo wutemi wo Mulungu.”
42009061	Na yunji nayo yakatya, “Nokutyatya Muwaha; ninga wamule wunghombole nghelaje wa mu nyumba yangu.”
42009062	Yesu yakamutya, hasina munhu mono yebate lisili lyo kulimila, kanyhi yalanje kunyuma, yuyo si yakwiliye mu wutemi wo Mulungu!
42010001	Hanyuma yayo Muwaha yakawahagula wanji makumi mupunghati na wejete, yakawatuma wejete wejete, walongole wabite mu vitumbi vyose na hanhu hose hono kobita mwene.
42010002	Yakawatya, “Ndudula yo mbaha, ninga wetumami wacefu. Holeka, mumulombaje munya mugunda, yawatume waduduzi mu mugunda wakwe.
42010003	Alu mubite, ninga mulanjilile, nghumutumenyi nyenye nhe zingholo zono zikubita haciligati ye maminzi.
42010004	Mulece kusola mufuko wa mapesa, hamba mufuko wo kulombela, hamba malatu: mulece kutaga cilejeho so kumulamusa wowose mu nzila.
42010005	Na mu kaya yo yose yono mokwinjila muwalamusaje nhavi, ‘Nyumba yiyi yeze yipolile.’
42010006	Na hono muwe moyali mwana wo mulamu, mulamu wenyu womwikalila; ninga hono hawe hasina, womuwuyilenyi nyenye kanyhi.
