42010007	Mukekalaje mu nyumba yiyo, muwe kulya no kung'wa vyono womupelenyi; hambi mwitumami nha yanojeye yapegwe musahala wakwe. Mulece kubita kaya ayi na ayi.
42010008	Ne likaya lyo lyose lyono mokwinjila, hono wamubocelenyi, mulye vyono motenjelwa.
42010009	Mukawaponye watamwa wono wali mumo, mukawatye, ‘U wutemi wo Mulungu wumusejelelenyi.’
42010010	Ninga likaya lyo lyose lyono mokwinjila, hono si wakumubocelenyi, lawilenyi, mubite mu zinzila zayo mutye,
42010011	‘Sunga ne manghundi ga mwi'kaya lyenyu gono gacinamatiye mu magulu getu, cikumukung'unhilenyi nyenye, ho yiwe suguzi kuli'nye. Ninga mumanye vyono wutemi wo Mulungu wakondya kumusejelelenyi.’
42010012	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, mwizuwa lilya, likaya lilyo lyolotuga wulipicizwe wuwaha si nha Sodoma.”
42010013	“Woyi he nye kuli'gwe Kolazini! Woyi he nye kuli'gwe Betesayida! Hambi imapoto gono ganozwa mwenyu hono gali ganozwe mu Tulo na Sidoni, mhali wanhu wa kuko wavwale magunila, no kwikala mu mavu, wakulajila vyono wanena.
42010014	Hamba nhavivyo, mwi'zuwa lyo wuling'anizwe, anye molobocela wulipicizwe wuwaha muno, sinha we wanhu wa Tulo na Sidoni.
42010015	Nagwe Kapelanawumi wukuhila kwiyinula sunga ko ku wulanga? Ng'o ye, kovulumuswa sunga kono kowali wafu.”
42010016	Hanyuma yakatya, “Mono yakumuhulicizenyi nyenye, yakuhulika na nene. Na mono yakulema kumubocelenyi nyenye, yakulema kumbocela nene. Munhu wowose mono yakulema kumbocela nene, yakulema kumubocela mono yanhuma.”
42010017	Ale wawalya we makumi mupunghati ne wejete wakawuya wasangalaye, wakutya, “Muwaha, sunga ne macisi gali kucihulika lono cali kulitambula litagwa lyako.”
42010018	Mwene Yesu yakawatya, “Namuwona Setani yakugwa yakulawa ku wulanga kotya limuli.
42010019	Alenyi, nimupelenyi nyenye u wulajilize wo kukanyaga zinzoka ne zinje, no wulajilize wa muli vilungo vyose vya ayulya mulugu, hamba hasina cinji co cose cono comutamisenyi.
42010020	Hamba nhavivyo, mulece kusecelela vyono macisi gakumuhulicenyi; langa musecelele vyono matagwa genyu gandikwa ku wulanga.”
42010021	Mu cipango cico Yesu yakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile yakatya; “Nghukulumba, Gwe Baba, Mukala wulanga ne yinze, vyono kuzihundika zizi kuli we mahala no wizuce, wukawagubulila i wadodo, heya Baba, vyo yakwendeza gwegwe.”
42010022	Hanyuma yakatya, “Baba yaviwika vyose mu miwoko yangu, hamba hasina mono yamumanyile Mwana yo wa hayi, langa Baba, hamba mono yamumanyile Baba yo wa hayi; langa Mwana, na muli wose mono Mwana yakuhila kumugubulila zizo.”
42010023	Yakawapitucila wejizwa wakwe, yakawalonjela cinyele, “Wamoti wono wakuzilanga zono mukuzilanga nyenye.
42010024	‘Mbi mbeka wawizi wenji ne watemi, nha wasulumilaga kuziwona zono mukuziwona, ninga hamba si waziwona, kanyhi wazihulice zono mukuzihulika, ninga hamba si wazihulika.’ ”
42010025	Na yunji mwijizi wo Wulajilize yakema yakamujela Yesu, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, notenda wule ho niwutuje u wumi we cibitilila?”
42010026	Yesu yakamuwuza, “Ma, i Mandiko gakutya nhawule?” Kusomaga wule?
42010027	Nayo yakapitula yakatya, “Komwendo Muwaha Mulungu wako kwe nhumbula yako yose, na ko mutima wako wose, na kwe vilungo vyako vyose, na kwe mahala gako gose. Na kanyhi wumwende muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco.”
42010028	Yesu yakamutya, “Kupitula viswanu. Ale, wuketume nhavivi, nagwe kowumipa.”
42010029	Ninga u mwijizi wo Wulajilize vyono yahilaga kwinoza muswanu, yakamuwuza Yesu, “U muyangu yo nani kanyhi.”
42010030	Yesu yakapitula yakatya, “Kwali na munhu yatenenhukaga yakulawa Yelusalemi yakubita ku Yeliko, yakamanyhilwa ne wahizi, wono wamuboka vinhu vyakwe, wakamutowanga, wakamuleka yagonile baho yali behi no kufwa.
42010031	Kukawa baho Mukohani yunji, nayo yakatenenhucila mu nzila yiyo; yaza kumuwona, yakamupuluta.
42010032	No Mulawi nayo nhavivilya, yaza kufika bahalya, yakamuwona, nayo yakamupuluta.
42010033	Ninga Musamaliya yunji, lono yajendaga, yakafika hono hoyali yuyo munhu. Nayo yaza kumuwona du, yakamuwonela lusungu.
42010034	Yakamusejelela behi, yakazibaka mafuta ne divayi zinghomele zakwe, no kuziwopa ne bandeji, yakamupandiza mu ndogowe yakwe, yakamuleta ku nyumba yo wuficilo we wajenzi, yakawa kumutamya.
42010035	Mitondo yaco yakalavya pesa dinali nyejete, yakamupela munya nyumba, yakatya, ‘Wumutamye yuyu, na muli vyose, cono kociziliza mu witumamile, ale, kolo nghuwuya nokugomolela.’ ”
42010036	Yesu yakamuwuza, “Muli wawa wadatu wa hayi mono yakulajila vyono yali muyagwe na ayulya mono yatowa ne wahizi?”
42010037	Mwijizi wo Wulajilize yakatya, “Yuyulya mono yamuwonela lusungu.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale, nagwe wubite wuketume nhavivyo.”
42010038	Ale, lono wajendaga, wakenjila mu citumbi cinji, na mucekulu yunji litagwa lyakwe Malita, yakawabocela ku nyumba yakwe.
42010039	Malita yali yena mwanakwawe mono yacemwaga Malyamu, yuyu yakekala behi na Yesu, yakuhuliciza zinghani zakwe.
42010040	Ninga Malita yepiganzaga na milimo minji. Malita yakamubitila Yesu, yakamutya, “Ati Muwaha, si wukuwona vyono vibi, hono mwanakwetu yakundeceleza nitumame nili wene? Ale wumutye yanhaze.”
42010041	Ninga Muwaha yamupitula yakatya, “Gwe Malita, Malita, nhawule wukwigaza no kwihwelela ku soko ya vinhu vinji,
42010042	ninga cono cikusakwa cinhu cimonga du; hambi Malyamu nha kehaga ligawo liswanu lyono si kosolelwa na munhu.”
42011001	Mwi'zuwa linji, lono Yesu yalombaga hanji, yaza kondya kulomba, yunji muyagwe ne wejizwa wakwe, yakamutya, “Muwaha cikukunena wucijize na sese kulomba nha vyono Yohana u Mubaputizi yawejiza iwejizwa wakwe.”
42011002	Yesu yakawatya, “Kolo mukulomba mweze kutya, ‘Baba, Itagwa lyako lyezwe, Wutemi wako wuze.
42011003	Wucipele vilo vyose ndigwa zetu, zono zikwiliye izuwa ne zuwa.
42011004	Wucinenele wubi wetu hambi na sese, nha ciwanenelaga wose wono wacisutizyaga. Kanyhi wulece kucitegula mu wujelwe.’ ”
42011005	Yakawatya, “Hambi nani wa muli nyenye mono kowa na mwendece wakwe, mono komubitila mu cilo mugati, yakumutya, ‘Mwendece, nghukulomba wunyazime mikate midatu;
42011006	hambi mwendece wangu nha kanyiziza kalawa muhinzo, nane sina ndigwa yo yose yo kumupela.’
42011007	Alu wihwesaje, hono mwendece wako yakupitule akuno yali kugati yawe kutya, ‘Wulece kungaza: mulango wakondya kudindwa, cigonile ne wanangu, sinosuma kwinuka nghupele!’ Yowa wule?
42011008	I mbeka, si kokwinuka yamupele vyono mwendece wakwe, langa ku soko yo wulombelombe wono si wukuduma wo munhu yuyo, kokwinuka yamupele vyono yakusaka.
42011009	“Nane nghumutyenyi: Lombenyi mopegwa; londolenyi nanye motuga; mukong'onhe nanye modigulilwa.
42011010	Hambi mono yakulomba nha yakupegwa; na mono yakulondola, yakutuga; na mono yakukong'onha, yakudigulilwa.
42011011	Mwana hono yamulombe sogwe somba, wulenyi, sogwe komupela nzoka hanhu ha somba?
42011012	Hamba hono yamulombe ligangha, komupela 'nje?
42011013	Hono anye mono muli wabi, mumanyile kuwapela wana wenyu vinhu viswanu, u sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga yo yacilile, kowapela Muhe Mono Yelile wono wakumulomba.”
42011014	Mwi'zuwa linji Yesu yalavyaga licisi lyono lyali limunozize munhu yumonga kuwa yali cibwibwi. Kukawa licisi lyaza kulawa, munhu yuyo yakawa kulonga; ne mapuga ge wanhu wakezina.
42011015	Ninga wayawo wakatya, “Kalavizyaga macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli u muwaha we macisi.”
42011016	Wanji wakamujela, wakasaka yawalajile citanjilo co wukombolwe kulawa ku wulanga.
42011017	Ninga mwene yaza kugamanya mahweso gawo, yakawatya, “Wutemi wowose wono witemanuye weneco mapuga mapuga gono gatemanuce, si wosuma kujendelela, nhavivilya ne zinyumba nazo, zimalikaga monga monga.
42011018	Nhavivyo na Setani nayo, hono yetemanuye mweneco, wutemi wakwe ho wokwima wule? Nhawule alu mukutya ti, ane ndavizyaga macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli?
42011019	Alu ane hono niwe nghulavizya macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli, i wana wenyu ma, wakuwa kulavizya mu vilungo vya nani? Holeka wawa wo waling'anizi.
42011020	Ninga hono niwe nghulavizya macisi mu vilungo vyo Mulungu, ale mumanye vyono wutemi wo Mulungu, wakondya kumuzizenyi.”
42011021	Munhu we vilungo, mono yewikanizize lukulu ne vitwalo vyakwe, kolo yakuyidima nyumba yakwe, zisawo zakwe zikwikala zili mutulano;
42011022	ninga hono yaze yunji mono yamucizize vilungo, yamutowe no kumusumiza, yakumuboka vitwalo vyakwe vyono yetumbiye, no kuvigawa vyose vyono yena navyo.
42011023	Mono si cili hamonga na nene ayo yali cinyume nane; nayo mono si cikongholanaga na nene, keyagazaga.
42011024	“Licisi lyavu kolo likuwingwa kulawa muli munhu, lijendajendaga mu nyika likulondola hanhu ho kuceha: kolo si likuhawona, likutya, ‘Nowuya ku nyumba yangu kono nalawilila.’
42011025	Na kolo likuwuya, likuyagana nyumba yiyo fwagulwe, kanyhi nozelezwe viswanu muno muno.
42011026	Hobaho likubita likusola macisi ganji mupunghati gono mabi muno kuciza lyeneco, gose gakubita kwinjila muli munhu yuyo, ne mikalile yo munhu yuyo, yikuwa mibi muno si nhe milongozi.”
42011027	Kukawa lono yalongaga zizi, u mucekulu yunji wa mwipuga lye wanhu, yakabalaluka ne lizi iwaha, yakamutya, “Yamotile, mucekulu mono yakulela, no kukosa.”
42011028	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Heya, ninga wamoti muno wanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani yo Mulungu no kuyikamisa.”
42011029	Ne lipuga lye wanhu lyaza kucila kumuziza, Yesu yakawalonjela yakatya, “Lulelo lulu lubi; lulondolaga citanjilo; ninga si lopegwa citanjilo cocose, langa citanjilo ca Yona.
42011030	Nha vyono Yona yali citanjilo kuli wanhu wa Ninawi, ale nhavivyo no Mwana wo Munhu nayo kowa citanjilo kuli lulelo lulu.
42011031	U mutemi we cicekulu wa kutakama, kolokwima ha wuling'anizwe we wanhu wo lulelo lulu, nayo kololuwona vyono lwina masutya. Hambi mwene nha yaza kulawa kutali, yakaza yahulicize mahala ga Solomona; kumbe mono yamucizize Solomona, yali baha.
42011032	I wanhu wa Ninawi wolokwima ha wuling'anizwe wo lulelo lulu, nawo wololuwona vyono lwina masutya. Hambi wene nha wanena so wuganule wa Yona; na langa ta, mono yamucizize Yona yali baha.”
42011033	“Hasina munhu, lono yakoleleza tala, yakuyiwika kanyhi ha wuhundiko, hamba kuyigubiciza ne bakuli, langa wayiwikaga ha wuwiko wayo, wanhu wono wakwinjila mugati wawone wuzelu wayo.
42011034	Iliso lyako yo tala yo muwili wako, liso lyako hono liwe yitelevu, muwili wako wose wumemile wuzelu. Ninga liso lyako hono liwe yibi, no muwili wako wowa wumemile wutitu.
42011035	Ale wulanjilile wuzelu wono wuli muli gwegwe wulece kuwa wutitu.
42011036	Holeka hono u muwili wako wose wuwe wumemile wuzelu, na hawe hasina hanji hohose kanyhi hono hena wutitu, u muwili wuwo wowa wina u wumemelecele wo wung'alale, nha vyono tala yikukumulicila wuzelu wayo.”
42011037	Yesu yaza malila kulonga, Mufalisayo yunji yakamusaka yalye ndigwa kwakwe; nayo yakabita yakekala ha ndigwa.
42011038	Yuyo Mufalisayo yakezina kuwona vyono Yesu yakulya zindigwa si yamuye kwizuguza.
42011039	U Muwaha yakamutya, “Alu nye nyo Wafalisayo, mukwemaga cikombe ne sahani kunze yayo, ninga muli'nye mugati, mumemile wuhizi no wubi.
42011040	Nye nyo walele, u munoza ya kunze yo si munoza ya mugati kanyhi?
42011041	Muwapelaje waciwa vinhu vyono vili mugati; na vinji vyose, vyowa vili ling'ani kuli'nye.”
42011042	“Ninga woyi he nyo Wafalisayo! Hambi nha mulifyaga wanhu zaka, sunga na mu hati yose yo kutajila mu zindigwa, sunga na mu fwene, ne zimboga zinji, kuno mukuleka ling'ani no wendo wo Mulungu. Ninga zizi cinojele mwali muzitume hamba kuleka zinji.
42011043	Woyi he nyo Wafalisayo! Ku soko mwendile kwikala kumwande mu magoda matambule mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, ne milamu ye cogopo mu minadi.
42011044	Woyi he nye! Hambi nha mwinha vitenjelo vyono si vijelaga, ne wanhu wono wakuvikanyaga si wamanyile.”
42011045	Na yunji wa mu wejizi wo Wulajilize yakapitula yakamutya, “Mwijizi, hono wukulonga zizi, wukucitovula na sese.”
42011046	Yesu yakatya, “Woyi he nye, kanyhi na nyenye nyo wejizi wo Wulajilize! Hambi nha mukuwatwika wanhu mitegulo, yono si yikusumika kuwudinghule, na nyenye mo weneco, si mukusuma hamba kuyipamiza ne cidole cenyu, ho muwataze mitegulo yiyo.”
42011047	Woyi he nye, nha muzengaga vitenjelo vye wawizi, ne wasenyu wo wawawulaga.
42011048	Vyo mukuhomelela, kanyhi mukwilumvya ne metumo ge wasenyu, hambi wene nha wo wawawulaga wawo wawizi, nanye mukuzenga vitenjelo vyawo.
42011049	Ku soko yiyo kanyhi, mahala go Mulungu gakutya, “Nolowatumila wawizi ne watumwa; ninga wolowawulaga wayawo wanji, na wanji wolowagaza.”
42011050	Ho zisakwe muli lulelo lulu, zisakami ze wawizi wose zono zetika, vyono kwalawa mwamulizo we yinze;
42011051	ndawililo sakami ya Habeli sunga sakami ya Zekaliya, mono yawulajilwa haciligati ye cikumbicilo ne hanhu hono helile; heya nghumutyenyi 'nye, vyono u lulelo lulu lololipicizwa ku soko ye metumo mabi.
42011052	“Woyi he mo wejizi wo Wulajilize! Hambi nha mwawuhundika wufunguwo wo mulango we mahala, nyenye mo weneco si mwenjila, na wono wenjilaga mwawemila walece kwinjila.”
42011053	Yaza kuwuka kuko, wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wakanza kumutimvya muno, no kumusolasola yalonje nghani nyinji;
42011054	ho wamugwizize mu wulonje.
42012001	Baho lono wanhu maelufu menji wali wetang'anila, sunga wakawa kwikanyanjila, Yesu yakamula kuwalonjela wejizwa wakwe, “Musuje kuli cisase ce wafalisayo wo wukoci.
42012002	Ninga cocose cono cigubicizwe, cologubulwa, na cocose cono cihundikwe, c ololawila kuzelu.
42012003	Holeka muli zose zono mwalonjela kutitu, i wanhu wolozihulicila mu wuzelu, na zono mwepwepwelaga cinyele ne milango midinde, zolokwanzalicilwa mu matembe mucanyha.”
42012004	Nane nghumutyenyi anye mo wendece wangu, “Mulece kuwogopa wono wawulagaga muwili, na hanyuma yayo si wosuma kwituma cinji.
42012005	Ninga nghumulajilenyi mono yinojeye mumogope: Mogopenyi mwene, mono yena wulajilize wo kumutajilila munhu mu moto we gehena, kolo yakondya kuwulaga, heya ye, nghumutyenyi, Mumogopaje yuyo.
42012006	Yimanyice vyono vikobobole vihano, vigulwaga kwa sendi kumi, si nha vivyo? Ninga hamba cimonga Mulungu si kacisemwaga.
42012007	Ninga sunga ne zimwvili za mu mitwe yenyu mbalwe zose. Alenyi mulece kogopa, anye muvicizize vikobobole vinji.”
42012008	Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, muli wose mono yakumvumilila hali wanhu, vyono wangu, Mwana wo Munhu nayo kolomuvumilila hali Wamalayika wo Mulungu, vyono munhu yuyo wakwe.
42012009	Ninga mono yakunghanila hali wanhu, nayo kolokanilwa hali Wamalayika wo Mulungu.
42012010	Na muli wose mono kolonga nghani yono kuli Mwana wo Munhu, konenelwa; ninga mono yakumutovula u Muhe Mono Yelile si konenelwa.
42012011	Na kolo wakumutegulenyi mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, na kuli wawaha, ne watemi, muze mulece kwihwelela molopitula nhawule, hamba mololonga ci.
42012012	Hambi u Muhe Mono Yelile nha kolomwijizenyi mu cipango cico zono mololonga.
42012013	Munhu yunji wa mwipuga lye wanhu, yakamutya, “Mwijizi, wumulonjele muwaha wangu cigawane zisawo zono yacilecela sogo yetu.”
42012014	Yesu yakamutya, “Gwe mwendece wangu, mwene mono yanheye niwe mulamuzi lunji mugawi muli nyenye, nani?”
42012015	Yakawatya wose, “Lanjenyi ta, mwiyikamisaje mu wusulumizi wose, hambi u wumi wo munhu nha si wutugaga mulamu ku soko yo winji we vinhu vyono yena navyo.”
42012016	Yakawalonjela cihwanicizo yakutya, “Kwali na mugoli yunji, mugunda wakwe wukafisa muno.
42012017	Yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe yakatya, ‘Alu 'mba notenda wule, hambi nha sina ho kuwika ndigwa zangu?’
42012018	Yakatya, Notenda nhavi, nogamwagula i madongha gangu, nzenje ganji mawaha, mo nowika wuhemba wangu wose, ne zisawo zangu.
42012019	Ho nowutya wumi wangu, ‘Go wumi, alu wina sawo nyinji yono yokukwila kwa myaka minji, alu wucehe, wulye, wung'we, wusangalale.’
42012020	Ningo Mulungu yakamutya, ‘Go mulele gwe, mu cilo cici du wumi wako nha wosolwa na zono wiwikanizize zowa za nani?’ ”
42012021	Yesu yakamalila ko wutya, “Ale, vyo yinha kuli munhu mono yakwiwicila sawo ku soko yakwe mweneco, nayo si mugoli kuli Mulungu.”
42012022	Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, “Ku soko yiyo holeka nghumutyenyi anye. Mulece kwihwelela so ndigwa yono molya ho mwikale womi, hamba so myenda yono mosaka so miwili yenyu.
42012023	Hambi wumi nha wucizize zindigwa, no muwili wucizize vivwalo.
42012024	Nha vyono mahowe, si gahadikaga, hamba kududula, gasina madongha hamba nyumba, nayo u Mulungu kagalisaga: ko muno anye muzicizize zindeje!
42012025	Nani 'mbi muyenyu, hono yawe kwihwelela, mono kosuma konjeleza vilo vyo wumi wakwe?
42012026	Ale hono anye si mukusuma kuyinoza nghani ndodo nha yiyo, so cici mukwihwelela zinji?
42012027	Mulanje maluwa vyono gotaga, si getumaga cinji, hamba kubota; ninga nghumutyenyi, sunga na Solomona mu nhojo yakwe yose, si yali yavwalile vyono linha liluwa limonga liyagwe na gaga.
42012028	Ninga u Mulungu hono yagavwice nhavivyo mahanze ga mu mugunda, gono gali baha izuwali, ne mitondo gowa kutagwa mu moto; si kocila 'mbi kumuvwicenyi nyenye? Anye wo wihuwilo wucefu!
42012029	Holeka mulece kugazika mu mahala genyu, akuno mukuhangawicila cono molya, hamba cono mong'wa.
42012030	Hambi zizi zose nha zo wakuzigazicila i wanhu wono si wamumanyile Mulungu, ninga Sogo yenyu nha yamanyile vyono mukuvisaka i vinhu vivi.
42012031	Langa, mwamule muwulondole wutemi wo Mulungu, na zizo zose mokonjelezwa.
42012032	“Mulece kogopa anye mo cipuga cidodo, hambi Sogo yenyu nha yendile kumupelenyi wutemi.
42012033	Muguze zisawo zenyu zose zono mwina nazo, muwapele i zipesa waciwa, mwinozeze mifuko yono si yisakalaga, mwiwicile sawo ya ku wulanga kono si yilacepuka. Kono si kasejelelaga muhizi, hamba makuni si gahodangaga.
42012034	Hambi hono hoyili sawo yako, nhavivyo no mutima wako nawo wowa wuli baho.
42012035	“Mweze mwiwikanize muli yoyose yono yokwijela, ne misipi yenyu yeze miwope mu viwino, ne zitala zenyu ziwe kwaka;
42012036	nanye muwe nhe wanhu wono wakumulindila mutwa wawo, kolo yakuwuya kulawa mu zindigwa ze halusi; kolo yakuza yakukong'onha, ho wamudigulile lwa kamonga.
42012037	Wowa wamoti wetumami wawo wono mutwa wawo kolo yakuza, yakuwagana wekaye meso, mbeka nghumutyenyi, yuyo mutwa wawo, kokwiwopa musipi mu ciwino, kowekaza wene ha zindigwa, no kuwetumamila.
42012038	Hambe nha mu cilo mugati, hamba yiwe hakali mitondo muno behi no wusiku kwela, hono yawagane wali nhavivilya, wo wamoti wetumami wawo.
42012039	Ninga yiyi mumanye vyono, hono munya kaya yali yamanye mazizo go muhizi, yali yekale meso, hamba si yali yayilece kaya yakwe yibenwe.
42012040	Holeka na nyenye mwiwikanizaje, hambi Mwana wo Munhu nha kokuziza mwipango lyono si muganicize.”
42012041	Petelo yakamutya, “Muwaha, cihwanicizo cici wukucilonjela sese du, hamba wanhu wose?”
42012042	U Muwaha yakatya, “Nani 'mbi u mwitumami mwihuwilwa kanyhi we mahala? Yo yulya mono mutwawe komuwika yawe mwitumami mu nyumba yakwe, ho yawagawile ndigwa mu cidaha cono cikwiliye?”
42012043	Mumoti mwitumami yuyo, u mutwawe kolo yakuza hono yamwagane yakunoza nhavivi.
42012044	Mbeka komulecela yayilanjilile i sawo yakwe yose.
42012045	Ninga mwitumami yuyo hono yatye mu nhumbula yakwe, “U mutwa wangu yakutinya kuwuya.” Nayo yakwamula kuwatowa wetumami we cilume na we cicekulu, no kulya no kung'wa no kugala wujimbi,
42012046	u mutwawe kokuza mwi'zuwa lyono si yakulanjilila, na mwi'pango lyono si yamanyile, nayo mutwawe kumukunanga muno, no kumuwika mwi'gawo limonga na wono si wehuwiye.
42012047	Ninga mwitumami yuyo mono yali yamanyile wuhile wo mutwawe, nayo si yewikanize kwituma zo wuhile wo mutwawe, yuyo kotowa muno muno,
42012048	ninga mono si yali yamanyile yono yimonojeye yetume, nayo ketuma zono zinojeye wulipicizwe, yuyo kotowa hadodo. Mono yapejigwe vinji, vyosakwa vinji, nayo mono wamukoza vinji muno, wolosaka vinji kuciza kuli mwene.
42012049	“Naza kwasa moto kono'nze, nane nghusaka wuwe wakondya kukolela.
42012050	Nina wubaputizo wono yinojeye niwubocele; alu mwene vyono nghugazika sunga niwufisilize!”
42012051	Mulece kwihwesa 'mba naza kuleta mulamu kononze? Hamba hadodo, si mulamu, langa witemanuce.
42012052	Ku wulawa lulu, wowa mu nyumba monga wanhu wahano, wokwitemanuka, wadatu kuli wejete, wejete kuli wadatu.
42012053	Wolokwitemanuka, sogo yo munhu no mwanagwe we cilume, no mwana we cilume no sogwe; nyina yo munhu no mwanagwe we cicekulu, no mwana we cicekulu no nyina; mukwewe we cicekulu no mugolece wo mwanagwe, no mugolece wo mwana no mukwewe we cicekulu.
42012054	Yesu yakagatya mapuga ge wanhu, “Kolo mukuwona livunde likulawa kumwezi, lwa kamonga mukutya, mvula yikuza.” Na mbeka yikutonya.
42012055	Na lono mukuwona mbeho ya kutakama yikuputa, mukutya, “Lizuwa lyo walika muno.” Na vyo yikuwa.
42012056	Nye mo wakoci, mumanyile kutanga ivitanjilo vye yisi no wulanga, ninga so cici lo si mukusuma kumanya nhunizo ye vidaha vivi?
42012057	“So cici si mukusuma kumanya nyenye mo weneco, ya hayi yono yinojeye?
42012058	Ku soko mono yakukusitaka, lono yakukutegula kuli mahakama, yowa yili ciba kuli'gwe, hono mwilumbanize nayo lono mukali mu nzila; ho yalece kukutegula ha mwande ya hakimu, nayo hakimu yakutegule kuli musilikale, no musilikale yakutajile mu jela.
42012059	Nghukulonjela, sikolawaniziza lukulu kuko, sunga kolo kukondya kulipa sendi ye ndumilizo ye fayini yako.”
42013001	Madaha gago, kwali kowali wanhu wanji wono wamulonjela Yesu ze wanhu wa ku Galilaya, wono Pilato yawawulaga mu cipango cono wawulagaga mitugo yawo ye makumbiko.
42013002	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu mukuwona Wagalilaya wawo wali wabi muno kuciza Wagalilaya wose, vyono watamiswa nhavivyo?
42013003	Nghumutyenyi, ng'o, ye; ninga na nyenye hono mulece kunena, molofwa wose nhavivyo.
42013004	Hamba wanhu walya we likumi na munana wono wagwilwa no munala ku Silowami, wakawulagwa, mukuwona wawo wali wabi, wacizize wose wono wekaye ku Yelusalemi?
42013005	Nghumutyenyi, ng'o, ye, ninga nanye hono mulece kunena, molofwa wose nhavivyo.”
42013006	Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici. “Munhu yunji yali yena mukuyu muhadikwe mu mugunda wakwe; u munhu yuyo yakabita yakusaka kuhepa mikalo mu mukuyu wuwo, ninga yakawagana wukali si nalela hamba hadodo.
42013007	Yakamutya u mulindiliza mugunda, langa ta, myaka yiyi midatu, nizaga ho hepe mikalo mu mukuyu wuwu, hamba kuyiwona ng'o, ale wutemangaje; so cici lo wukwidawalila muhangha bwete?”
42013008	Nayo yakapitula yakamutya, “Muwaha, wuwulekaje kanyhi mwaka 'wu, niwuzuwile, niwukupile ne suji;
42013009	nawo hono wulele mikalo hanyuma, viswanu; ninga hono wulece kulela, langa ho kowutemanga.”
42013010	Yesu yakawa yakwijiza mu nhang'anilo yinji yo wuhembelo, mwizuwa lye Sabato.
42013011	Baho hali na mucekulu mono yali mutamwa myaka yikumi na munana, yali yena licisi lyavu lyono lyali limwinjiye, na ku soko yiyo, u muwili wakwe yali yekunyile, hamba siyasumaga kugoloka hamba nhavi.
42013012	Yesu yaza kumuwona yakamucema, yakamutya, “Yaya, waponywa wutamwa wako.”
42013013	Yakamuwicila miwoko yakwe; lo lulo lulo muwili wakwe wukagoloka, yakamulumbo Mulungu.
42013014	Ninga u muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo yakasimba, vyono Yesu yamuponya u mucekulu yuyo mwi'zuwa lye Sabato, na ho baho yakawa kuwalonjela wanhu wono wali wekonghoye baho, yakutya, “Ko vili vilo mutandatu vyo kwitumila mulimo, holeka mu vilo vivyo, mweze kuza kulagulwa, langa mwizuwa lye sabato ng'o.”
42013015	Ninga Muwaha yakamupitula, yakatya, “Nye mo wakoci, ma, muli nyenye, moyuli yunji mono si katulusaga ng'ombe yakwe hamba ndogowe yakwe, no kuzing'wesa mwizuwa lye sabato?
42013016	Alu yuyu, nayo mwana wa Abulahamu, mono Setani yali yamulemaze mu myaka yiyi yikumi na munana, wulenyi, si vyali viswanu kumuponya mu wutamwa wakwe wuwo mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
42013017	Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, walugu wakwe wakapuwa wose; ne wanhu wose wakasecelela, ku so zinghani ze lilumbo zose, zono zetumwa no mwene.
42013018	Yesu yakawuza; Uwutemi wo Mulungu winha wule? Nowihwananiza na cici?
42013019	Wihwanile ne mhece ya Haladali, yono munhu yunji yakayisola, yakayihadika mu mugunda wakwe, yikacindika, yikawiluka, wukawa mubici, ne zindeje za mucanyha zikazenga i manhuli gazo mu manhambi gayo.
42013020	Kanyhi yakawawuza, “Nowuling'aniza na cici U wutemi wo Mulungu?
42013021	Wihwanile ne cisase cono yasola mucekulu yunji, yakacihanza hanza mu wusaje we 'debe limonga, sunga wose wukatumba.”
42013022	Yesu yakajendelela no muhinzo wakwe yakubita ku Yelusalemi kuno yakukolela mu makaya na mu vitumbi, yakuganula.
42013023	Munhu yunji yakamuwuza; “Ati Mwijizi, alu wono wakupona wacefu?”
42013024	Yesu yakawatya, Muhidimbale kwinjila mu mulango mufinyu, hambi nha nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono wenji wojela kwinjila, ninga si wosuma.
42013025	Cipango cokuza, cono munya kaya kokwinuka, no kudinda mulango, nanye molokwanza kwima kunze, no kukong'onha ha mulango, mukutya, “Muwaha, wucidigulile mulango.” Nayo kolopitula yawe kumutyenyi, “Si nghumumanyenyi kono mulawile!”
42013026	Nanye mokwanza kumulonjela, mukutya, “Ase yo sese mono calizaga no kung'wa hamonga nagwe, nagwe wejizaga mu vitumbi vyetu.”
42013027	Nayo kolotya, “Nghumutyenyi, simanyile kono mulawile; muwuce hono mwande yangu, anye wose mono mwitumaga zo wubi.”
42013028	Kuko kolowa cililo no kugwezula meno, baho mulaza wawona Abulahamu, Isaka na Yakobo ne wawizi wose, wali mu wutemi wo Mulungu, ninga anye mukutagwa kunze!
42013029	Wanhu wolokuza wakulawa kucilima na kumwezi, kusumuka na kutakama, wokuza no kwikala ha zindigwa mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
42013030	Na lanjenyi ta, kowali wa munyuma wono wolowa walongozi, na kowali walongozi wono wolowa wa munyuma.
42013031	Mu cipango cico Wafalisayo na wanhu wanji wakamuziza Yesu, wakumutya, “Wuwuce baha wubite hanhu hanji: hambi Helode nha yakuhila kukuwulaga.”
42013032	Yesu yakawatya “Bitenyi nye mukalilonjele licewe lilyo. Langa ta, izuwali ne mitondo, nghulavya macisi no kuponya watamwa, ne lizuwa lye kadatu nowa nayikondeleza i milimo yangu.”
42013033	Hamba nhavivyo izuwali, ne mitondo ne cilawu, yinojeye njendelele no muhinzo; hambi nha si yinojeye muwizi yawulajilwe kunze ya Yelusalemi.
42013034	“Yelusalemi! Gwe Yelusalemi! Kuwawulagaga wawizi, no kuwatowa na mabwe wono wakutumwa kuli'gwe! Kalinga nali kuhila kuwakongholela wanago hamonga, nha vyono nghuku yikunyanjilaga viziyoziyo vyayo mu mabawa gayo, ninga walemaga?
42013035	Lanje ta i Nyumba yo Mulungu wako yolekwa. Heya, mbeka, nghumutyenyi, Si molombona ng'o sunga kolo mukutya, ‘Yo mumoti mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha.’ ”
42014001	Mwizuwa linji lye Sabato, Yesu yakenjila kulya ndigwa, mu nyumba ya yumonga muyagwe ne wawaha we Wafalisayo, wanhu wono wali wali baho wakawa wakumulanjilila.
42014002	Ale, hali Yesu, hali hoyuli yunji mono yali yena wutamwa wo kuvimba muwili.
42014003	Nayo Yesu, yakawawuza wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo yakutya, “Wulenyi, yili mwiko kumuponya munhu mwizuwa lye Sabato hamba ng'o?”
42014004	Ninga wene hamba siwapitula cinji. Yesu yakamwibata mutamwa, yakamuponya, yakamukombola yabite.
42014005	Hanyuma yakawatya, “Nani lu wa muli nyenye mono yena mwanagwe lunji ng'ombe, hono yigwile mwi'sima, mono si koyinimula kamonga mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
42014006	Nawo hamba siwasuma kumupitula kanyhi kuli zizi.
42014007	Yesu yakawawona wawalya wono walalikwa, vyono wakwihaga magoda matambule, yakawalonjela cihwanicizo, yakuwatya.
42014008	“Hono wucemwe na munhu ku ndigwa ze halusi, wulece kwikala mwigoda litambule; lunji kowa mono yena lilumbo yakucizize agwe, mucemwe nayo,
42014009	na kolo munya kaya yakuza yakutye, ‘Wumutelele ayu.’ Ale ho kokwanza kuwona soni kwikala mwigoda lya kunyuma.
42014010	Ninga hono wucemwe, wubite wukekale mwigoda lya kunyuma, kolo yakuza munya kaya, yakutye, ‘Wayiko, sejelele kono mwande,’ baho ho kowa ne lilumbo ha meso ga wose wono mwikalane.
42014011	Hambi muli wose mono yakwikumya mweneco, nha konyetywa, nayo mono yakwinyetya, yo kokumywa.”
42014012	Hanyuma Yesu yakamulonjela na yuyo mono yali yamucemile, “Kolo wukwitumama ndigwa ze misi lunji ze mihe, wulece kuwacemela wendece wako, hamba wanduguzo, hamba we cimanyi, hamba wagoli wayago; ku soko nawo wokucemela kanyhi, nagwe kowa wahalizwa.
42014013	Ninga hono witumame ndigwa nyinji, wuwacemelaje waciwa, na we vilema, na wono wakusenzegula, ne wabofu;
42014014	nagwe kolugutizwa, hambi nha wasina vyo kukuhaliza; nagwe kolohalizwa no Mulungu ha wuzuce wa we ling'ani.”
42014015	Na yunji muyagwe na wono wali wekalane na Yesu ha ndigwa, yaza kuhulika zizi, yakatya, “Yo mumoti mono kololya ndigwa mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
42014016	Yesu yakamupitula, “Munhu yunji yanoza ndigwa nyinji za cinyamihe; yakawalalika wanhu wenji.
42014017	I cipango co kulila zindigwa caza kufika, yakatuma mwitumami wakwe yawalonjele wono walalikwe waze, hambi nha vyakondya vyose.”
42014018	Wakanza wose yumonga yumonga kulavya vikojelo. Umulongozi yakamulonjela u mwitumami yakatya, “Ngula mugunda, na yinojeye mbite nghawulanje; nghukunena wundece.”
42014019	Yunji yakatya, “Ngula ng'ombe yikumi za kulima, alu nghubita kuzijela, nghukunena wundece.”
42014020	Na yunji yakatya, “Nhola mucekulu, holeka sinokuza.”
42014021	U mwitumami yulya yakawuya yakamulonjela zizi munya kaya. Baho munya kaya yakebatwa ne likuwo, yakamutya mwitumami wakwe, “Wulawanize mbela wubite mu zinzila zimbaha ne zindodo za mwi'tumbi, wukawalete kuno waciwa, na we vilema, ne wabofu, na wono wakusenzegula.”
42014022	Hanyuma u mwitumami yakatya, “Muwaha zose zono wulonjile, zanozwa zakondya, ninga hakali hocili cilejeho.”
42014023	U muwaha yuyo yakamutya mwitumami, “Wulawanize wubite mu mapalilo na mu mawimbi wukawadindimize wenjile, nyumba yangu ho yimeme.
42014024	Hambi nha nghumutyenyi, hasina hamba yumonga wa muli wawo wono walalikwe, mono kolojeza ndigwa yangu.”
42014025	Ale, baho mapuga mawaha ge wanhu, wakabitana na Yesu. Nayo yakawapitucila yakawatya.
42014026	Munhu wo wose mono yakuza kuli nene, si kowa mwijizwa wangu, langa sunga yawe yanyendile nene si nha vyono yawendile u sogwe, no nyina, ne walumbuze, heya, sunga no wumi wakwe mweneco.
42014027	Munhu mono siyakudinghula musalaba wakwe mweneco, no kunhyatya nene, si kosuma kuwa mwijizwa wangu.
42014028	Hambi nani muli nyenye, mono yakuhila kuzenga Munala, mono si kokwamula kwikala yawale cifo cayo, ho yamanye hono yena nazo zo kuwukondelezeza?
42014029	Ho yilece kuwa lunji kolo yawusimya musinji, hamba kuwukondeleza. Wanhu womuseka,
42014030	wakutya; “Munhu ayu yanza kuzenga, ninga si yasuma kukondeleza.
42014031	“Hambi mutemici, mono kosaka kubita kwihoma no Mutemi muyagwe, mono si kokwamula kwikala yehwese. Mwene yena wasilikale elufu yikumi, hono kosuma kwihoma na yulya mono yena wasilikale elufu makumi mejete?
42014032	Hono yawone si kosuma, kotuma wetumami wakwe yakalondole mulamu, lono mutemi yuyo yunji yakali kutali.”
42014033	Yesu ho yakawa malila yakutya, “Ale nhavivyo na muli nyenye, mono si yakuleka vyose vyono yena navyo, sikosuma kuwa mwijizwa wangu.”
42014034	“Mwino muswanu; ninga mwino weneco hono wuwe wususulice, wogomolezezwa nhawule ndaso yayo?
42014035	Si wukwiliye kanyhi hamba mu mugunda, hamba kuwa mboleya bwete langa wawutagaga du kunze caka. Holeka muhulice, hono mwina makutu!”
42015001	Izuwa linji watoweza kodi ne wahodanji wenji, wakabita kumuhuliciza Yesu.
42015002	Wafalisayo na wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakanza kung'ung'ulika wakutya, “Lanjenyi ta munhu ayu! Yakuwabocela wanyo wubi no kuhanga nawo mu zindigwa.”
42015003	Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici yakutya:
42015004	“Mwene, munhu hono yawe yena ngholo yigana, na hono yajilize monga, kanozaga wule? Kozileka azilya makumi cenda ne cenda kwidimo, yabite yakayilondole yono yajiliye, sunga yayiwone.
42015005	“Na kolo yayiwona, yakuyiwegala mu mawega gakwe yasangalaye.
42015006	Nayo kolo yakuwuya kwakwe, yakuwacema wendece wakwe ne wayagwe, yakuwatya, ‘Cisangalalane nane, hambi nha niyiwona ngholo yangu yono yali yajiliye.’
42015007	Ale, nghumutyenyi, kowa nyemo nhavivyo ku wulanga so munhu mubi monga mono yakunena, si nha awalya wanhu makumi cenda ne cenda wono wakiwona wali ling'ani wono si wakusaka kunena.
42015008	“Hamba mukuwona wule! Lunji mucekulu mono yena silinje yikumi, na hono yajilize monga, konoza wule? Kokoleleza tala, no kufwagula nyumba, no kusakula sakula sunga yayiwone.
42015009	Nayo kolo yakuyiwona, yakuwacema wendece wakwe ne wayagwe, yakutya, ‘Cisangalalane nane, hambi nha nayiwona silinje yangu yono nali nyajilize.’
42015010	Ale, nghumutyenyi, vyo wosangalala wamalayika wo Mulungu, ku soko yo munhu monga munyo wubi mono yakunena.”
42015011	Yesu yakajendelela kulonga yakutya, “Kwali na munhu yunji, yali na wana walume wejete.
42015012	U mudodo yakamutya sogwe, ‘Baba wungawile ligawo lye sawo lyono nohalila.’ Nayo sogo yawo yakawagawila sawo yakwe.
42015013	Hanyuma ya vilo vicefu, u mwana mudodo yakawa kuguza u wuhazi wakwe, yakatuluka ne zipesa zakwe zono yazituga, yakabita yisi yinji ya kutali, kono yeyagaziza sawo yakwe mu mikalile mibi.
42015014	Nayo yaza malila lukulu vyose, kukawa nzala mbaha ku yisi yiyo, yakanza kugaya.
42015015	Yakalomba mulimo kuli munhu yunji wa mu yisi yiyo, nayo yakamutegula ku migunda yakwe yakadime magubi.
42015016	Nayo yasulumilaga yegutye yinda yakwe ne salagunga yono galizaga magubi; hamba yunji si yamupela cinji co kulya.
42015017	Ninga yaza kukumbucila, yakatya, ‘Mwene, wetumami wa baba nha wenji, wono wakwiguta zindigwa wakusigaza, nane nghufwa kuno ne nzala!
42015018	Nobita kuli baba, nimulonjele, nitye, Baba, nimusutizyo Mulungu, nghusutizya na gwegwe nhavivyo.
42015019	Si nojeye kanyhi kucemwa mwanago. Wunozaje niwe nha yunji muyagwe ne wetumami wako.’
42015020	Ale, yakawa kwanza u muhinzo wo kuwuya kuli sogwe. Nayo lono yali yakali kutali, u sogwe yakamuwona, yakamuwonela lusungu, yakamumanyhilila, yakamulamusa ko kumukumbatila, no kumunonela muno.
42015021	Nayo mwana yakamutya sogwe, ‘Baba, nimusutizyo Mulungu, nghusutizya na gwegwe nhavivyo. Sinojeye kanyhi kucemwa mwanago.’
42015022	Ninga usogwe yakawatya wetumami wakwe. ‘Letenyi mbela mwenda muswanu mumuvwice; muvwicenyi nyamwidole ne malatu.
42015023	Muwulaje ne ng'ombe yono yijinile cinoze sikukuu, cilye, cisangalale.
42015024	Hambi yuyu mwanangu nha yali nha yafwiye, kumbe mumi, yali yajiliye, ninga alu kejela.’ Hobaho wakawa kwanza kuyinoza sikukuu.
42015025	“Mwipango lilyo, u muwahawe yali yakali ku mugunda. Lono yawuyaga, yaza kusejelela behi ne kaya, yakahulika ng'oma no wuvina.
42015026	Yakamucema yunji muyagwe ne wetumami, yakamuwuza yakutya, ‘Alo ko cilici?’
42015027	Mwitumami yuyo yakamutya, ‘Mwanakwenyu kawuya, no sogo kamuwulajila ng'ombe yono yijinile, vyono yamuboceye yapolile, kanyhi mutelevu.’
42015028	“Yuyo muwahawe yakakolwa ne likuwo, hamba si yenda kwinjila na mu kaya. Nayo sogwe yakalawila kunze, yakamuneneleza yenjile.
42015029	Ninga mwene yapitula yakamutya sogwe, ‘Kumbucile baba, vyono myaka yiyi yose nghwitumamilaga, hamba nghali si nabeza malajilizo gako, ninga wumhelile cici? Wukali namhela hamba cipene cidodo vivi, ho noze nane sikukuu ne wendece wangu.
42015030	Ninga yeza kuza du mwanago ayu, mono yalya sawo yako hamonga ne wasenyha, kuwa kumuwulajila ng'ombe yono yijinile.’
42015031	U sogwe yakamutya, ‘Mwanangu, agwe nha cikalanaga nane nhondo zose, na vyose vyono nina navyo nha vyako.
42015032	Ninga yali yicinojeye cinoze sikukuu no kusangalala; hambi ayu mwanakwenyu, nha yali kotya yafwiye, kumbe mumi; yali yajiliye ninga alu yejela.’ ”
42016001	Yesu yakawalonjela wejizwa wakwe, “Kwali na munhu yunji mugoli, mono yali yena mwitumami wakwe; yuyo mwitumami yakasonjezwa vyono yakwitumamila caka sawo yo mugoli.
42016002	Nayo mugoli yakamucema, yakamutya, nghanici yiyi yono hulice muli gwegwe?” Ale wulavye liwalo lya vyono kubocelaga, na vyono kwitumamilaga mu sawo yangu, hambi nha si kosuma kuwa kalani kanyhi.
42016003	Mwitumami yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, alu muwaha wangu yeza kumbusa mu mulimo wo wukalani, alu nonoza cici? Vilungo vyo kulimila sina; ku wilombelezi nako kotya nili muciwa, yo nghani ya cevu.
42016004	Aa! Alu namanya vyono notenda, kolo nawuswa mu mulimo, wanhu ho wanyhemele mu zinyumba zawo.
42016005	Ale, yakawacema we migawa yo mutwawe wose, yakamutya mulongozi, “Wukuzijilwaci no mutwa wangu?”
42016006	Nayo yakatya, “Mapipa yigana limonga ga mafuta ga alizeti.” Kalani yakamutya, “Sola ceti cako co mugawa, wikale mbela wandice makumi mahano.”
42016007	Yaza kondya, yakamutya yunji, “Agwe ma nagwe, wukuzijilwaci?” Nayo yakatya, “Magunila yigana limonga ga wuhemba.” Kalani yakamutya, “Sola ceti cako co mugawa, wandice makumi munana.”
42016008	Yuyo muwaha, yakamukumya yuyo mwitumami mono si mwihuwilwa, vyono yanoza ko wusugu. Hambi wanhu wa kononze yiyi, nha wasugu muno kuli zawo si nhe wanhu wo wuzelu.
42016009	Nayo Yesu yakajendelela kutya. “Nane nghumutyenyi, Mwinozeze wayendi wayenyu mu wulawa mu zisawo zimbi za mononze, kolo yikumalika, ho wamubocelenyi ku wikalo we cibitilila.”
42016010	Wo wose mono kowa mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo muno, yo kowa mwihuwilwa na mu nghani mbaha, na wo wose mono si mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo, si kowa mwihuwilwa mu nghani mbaha.
42016011	Ale, hono si muli wehuwilwa mu zisawo zimbi za mononze, nani 'mbi mono komukozenyi zisawo ze mbeka?
42016012	Na hono mukali nawa wehuwilwa mu sawo yono si yenyu, yo nani mono komukozenyi i zisawo ze mbeka?
42016013	“Hasina mwitumami mono kosuma kuwetumamila watwa wejete, ku soko, lunji komusula yumonga na kumwenda muyagwe, hamba komuhulika yuyo yumonga no kumubedegala u muyagwe. Holeka si mosuma kumwitumila u Mulungu ne sawo.”
42016014	Ninga Wafalisayo wali weza kuzihulika zizo zose, vyono wene wali wendile muno sawo, wakamubedegala Yesu.
42016015	Nayo yakawatya, “Anye mwinozaga muli waswanu ha meso ge wanhu, ninga Mulungu yo yazimanyile zinhumbula zenyu, hambi cono cijelaga cina lukumyo hali wanhu, Mulungu yakuciwona nha takataka du.”
42016016	U Wulajilize ne mandiko ge wawizi, vyali vili baho, sunga mwidaha lya Yohana u Mubaputizi, vyono wulawa lululya u Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu lukuganulwa, no munhu wo wose yakuwinjila kwe vilungo.
42016017	Ninga kupelu wulanga ne yinze kuwumalice, si nha lwandiko lumonga lwa mu Wulajilize kupatwa.
42016018	Muli wose mono yakumuleka mugolece wakwe, no kutola yunji, yakusenyha, nayo mono yakumutola mono yapejigwe talaka no mulume wakwe, nayo yakusenyha.
42016019	Ale, kwali na munhu yunji mugoli, yavwalaga myenda yo wuguzi wukamu muno, myenda ye liwala lyo lugandu na bafuta swanu. Yekalaga yakumota vilo vyose.
42016020	Hali ho yuli muciwa yunji, litagwa lyakwe Lazalo, mono yali yena vilonda mu muwili wose, nayo yali yawicigwe ha mulango wa yuyo mugoli.
42016021	Yasulumilaga yapegwe vifukufuku vyono vyagwizaga ha wulilo wo mugoli, sunga ne mabwa, gazaga gakumunamha malonda gakwe.
42016022	“Baho u muciwa yakafwa, wamalayika wakamusola, yakekala behi na Abulahamu, u mugoli nayo yakafwa, yakawikwa mu citenjelo.
42016023	Yuyo mugoli, lono yali yali mu wusungu wukali kuko ku hanhu ha myuhe ye wabi, yakenula meso gakwe, yakamuwona Abulahamu, na Lazalo yali behi nayo,
42016024	Yakacema yakatya, ‘Baba Abulahamu, wumbonele lusungu ye, wumutume Lazalo, yazabice hambe cisonje ce cidole cakwe mu malenga, yamhoze lulimi lwangu; hambi nha nghuwona wusungu mu moto wuwu.’
42016025	Ninga Abulahamu yakatya, ‘Mwanangu, wukumbucile vyono, lono agwe wali wukali mumi, wamotaga vyako viswanu, na Lazalo yakabocela i vibi, ninga lu baha mwene mutuzwe, nagwe wuli mu wusungu.
42016026	Na muli zizi zose, hagati yetu na nyenye, lyawikwa likombo yitali muno, ho walece kusuma kulowoka, wakulawa akuno no kuza kuko kwenyu, hamba wa kuko kulowoka kuza kono kwetu.’
42016027	Yuyo mono yali mugoli, yakatya, ‘Heya baba, ale nghukulomba, wumutume Lazalo yabite ku kaya ya Baba,
42016028	hambi nha nina wanakwetu wahano; yakawasugule, walece kuza nawo hanhu hano ha wusungu.’
42016029	Ninga Abulahamu yakatya, ‘Wanduguzo, wena nawo wa Musa ne Wawizi, wawahulice wawo.’
42016030	Ninga mwene yakatya, ‘Ng'o ye baba Abulahamu; langa hono yabite yunji kuli wene mono yazucile mu wafu, wonena.’
42016031	Nayo Abulahamu yakatya, ‘Hono walece kuwahulika Musa ne Wawizi, hamba yunji yenuce mu wafu, si wokwihuwila yaye.’ ”
42017001	Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe; “I mewajizo gono gakuwakwega wanhu ho wetume wubi; si goleka kuza, ninga woyi he kuli munhu yuyo mono yakugaleta!
42017002	Ciba yali yawopelezwe lizala yiwaha mu singo, yatagwe mwi'lenga, si nha kumwiwajiza mudodo monga muyagwe na wawa.
42017003	Mulanjilile! Hono nduguyo yakusutizye, wumukaje; na hono yanene wumunenelaje.
42017004	Hamba yakusutizye kali mupunghati, mwizuwa limonga, na hono yakusutya yakukuziza no kukutya ‘Nghunena,’ wumunenelaje.”
42017005	Iwatumwa wakamutya, “Muwaha, Wuconjeleze wihuwilo.”
42017006	Nayo Muwaha yakawatya, Hono mwali muwe no wihuwilo wudodo kotya nhe mhece ya haladali, mwali muwulonjele mubici wuwu wo mukuyu mukutya, kulice wukehadice mwi'lenga, nawo wali wumuhulicenyi.
42017007	“Lunji, citye muli nyenye, yunji yena mwitumami mono yali kwi'lima, hamba yali ku wudimi we zingholo; wulenyi kolo yawuya, kulawa ku mugunda, komulonjela yuyo mwitumami, ‘Wuze lulu baha wulye zindigwa?’
42017008	Ng'o, langa komutya, ‘Wunhenjele nilye; witunje, wunyitumamile, sunga nghondye kulya no kung'wa, hanyuma nagwe ho kolya no kung'wa?’
42017009	Si komulumba mwitumami vyono ketuma zono yalajilizwe?
42017010	Ale na nyenye nhavivyo, kolo mukukondya kwituma zose zono mulajilizwe, mutye, ‘Ase cili wetumami mono cisina cambuzi, cifisiliza du zono zali zicinojeye kwituma.’ ”
42017011	Kukawa Yesu lono yabitaga ku Yelusalemi, yakakolela mu mipaka ya Samaliya na Galilaya.
42017012	Nayo lono yenjilaga mu citumbi cinji, waketang'anila nayo wanhu yikumi wo wukoma, wali wemile kutali.
42017013	Wakenula mazi gawo, wakutya, “Yesu Muwaha, Wuciwonele lusungu.”
42017014	Yaza kuwawona, yakawatya, “Bitenyi mukelajile kuli wakohani.” Kukawa lono wabitaga, wakawa kwezwa.
42017015	No muyawo monga, yaza wona vyono yapona, yakawuya yakumulumbo Mulungu ne lizi yiwaha;
42017016	yakegwisa hasi ha mwande ye magulu ga Yesu, akuno yakumulumba. Nayo yali Musamaliya.
42017017	Baho Yesu yakatya, “Alu, si wali wanhu yikumi wono wezigwe? Awalya we licenda wali hayi lu?
42017018	Si yejeye yunji mono yazize kumupela Mulungu lilumbo, langa mujenzi ayu du?”
42017019	Hanyuma yakamutya yuyo munhu, “Winuce wubite, wihuwilo wako wukuponya.”
42017020	Mwipango linji, Wafalisayo wamuwuza Yesu wakutya, “U wutemi wo Mulungu wolokuza nili?” Nayo yakawapitula, yakatya, “U wutemi wo Mulungu si wuzizaga mu nzila yono yikwijela ne meso.
42017021	Hamba hasina mono kolosuma kutya, ‘Awu aha.’ Hamba lunji, ‘Awulya ahalya.’ Hambi wutemi wo Mulungu nha wuli muli nyenye.”
42017022	Hanyuma yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, vyolokuza vilo, lono molohila kuwona lizuwa limonga, lya mu vilo vyo Mwana wo Munhu, hamba si mololiwona.
42017023	Ne wanhu wolomulonjelenyi wakutya, “Lanjenyi ta yali ahalya.” Mulece kubita, hamba kuwatyatya.
42017024	Hambi nha vyono linha limuli, lono likumulika likulawa ku lubavu lumonga lo wulanga, sunga ku lubavu luyagwe lo wulanga; vyo kolowa no Mwana wo Munhu mwizuwa lyakwe.
42017025	Ninga lono zikali si nawa zizo, sikoleka kwamula kutamiswa vibi, no kulemwa no lulelo alu.
42017026	Nha vyono zali mu vilo vya Noha, vyo zolowa vilo vyo Mwana wo Munhu.
42017027	Wanhu wajendelelaga kulya no kung'wa, kutola no kutolwa, sunga mwi'zuwa lililya lyono Noha yenjilila mu safina. Lihwazi likaza, likawawulaga wose.
42017028	Ale, yolowa nha vyono zali mu vilo vya Loti; wanhu wajendelelaga kulya no kung'wa, kugula no kuguza, kuhadika zimbeyu no kuzenga.
42017029	Ninga mwizuwa lililya lyono yawucila Loti mu Sodoma, moto we cibiliti wukatonya nha mvula kulawa ku wulanga, no kuwawulaga wose.
42017030	Nhavivyo vyo yolowa yinha mwizuwa lilyo lyono kologubulilwa u Mwana wo Munhu.
42017031	“Mwizuwa lilyo, munhu wo wose mono kolowa mwi'tembe lye nyumba yakwe, yalece kutima ho yasole vinhu vyakwe vyono vili mu nyumba. Na mono kolowa ku mugunda nhavivyo yalece kuwuya.
42017032	Kumbucilenyi zono zamwagana u mugolece wa Loti.
42017033	Muli wose mono kolondola kuponya nhumbula yakwe, koyajiliza, ninga muli wose mono koyajiliza, yo koyiponya.
42017034	Nghumutyenyi, mwizuwa lilyo ne cilo, wolowa wagonile wanhu wejete hamonga, yumonga kolosolwa, no muyagwe kololekwa.
42017035	Wacekulu wejete wolowa wakusajila hamonga; yumonga kolosolwa, no muyagwe kololekwa. [
42017036	“Wanhu wejete wolowa mu mugunda; yumonga kolosolwa, no muyagwe kololekwa.]”
42017037	Baho wakamuwuza, “Hayi lo Muwaha?” Nayo yakawatya, “Kono ko wuli muvimba, kuko ne zindi ko zolokwikongholela.”
42018001	Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo Wejizwa wakwe, yakuwalajila vyono yiwanojeye kulomba nhondo zose, walece kukatala.
42018002	Yakatya, “Kwali na hakimu mwitumbi linji, mono si yamogopago Mulungu hamba kumucelelela munhu wo wose.
42018003	Mwitumbi lilyo, mwali na mucekulu mufwile; mono yazaga kali kenji kuli hakimu yuyo, yakumulomba yawalamule no mulugu wakwe.
42018004	Hakimu yuyo yakamula kulemalema kali kenji, ninga hanyuma yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, yakatya, ‘Hamba niwe sinimogopaga Mulungu, hamba kumucelelela munhu wo wose,
42018005	ninga vyono mucekulu ayu mufwile yakungaza, nomulamulila, ho yalece kujendelela kunghataza so wuze wakwe wa kenji na kenji.’ ”
42018006	U Muwaha yakajendelela kutya, “Hulicenyi ta, zono yalonga yuyo hakimu mubi.
42018007	Alu ma, Mulungu nayo, si kowalamulila wahagulwa wakwe wono wamulililaga misi ne cilo? Hambi kocela kuwataza?
42018008	Nghumutyenyi, mbeka kowalamulila mbela mbela. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wulenyi, kolo yakuza kono'nze Mwana wo Munhu, kolowagana 'mbi wihuwilo mono'nze?”
42018009	Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici, awalya wono wewonaga nha waswanu, no kuwabedegala wayawo wose.
42018010	“Wanhu wejete wabita ku Nyumba yo Mulungu kulomba, yumonga yali Mufalisayo, no muyagwe yali mutoweza kodi.”
42018011	Yuyo Mufalisayo yakema, yakawa kulomba cinyele mu nhumbula yakwe yakutya, “Gwe Mulungu, nghukulumba vyono ane si ninha wanhu wanji, wabugu, wakonyi, wasenyha, nghukulumba vyono ane si ninha ayu mutoweza kodi.
42018012	Mu vilo mupunghati ndekaga kulya kejete, ndavyaga zaka, muli vyono sawaga vyose.”
42018013	Ninga ayulya mutoweza kodi yakema kutali, hamba si yenda no kwinula meso gakwe ku wulanga, ninga yaketowa mu mhambaga ko wukalale, yakatya, “Gwe Mulungu wumbonele lusungu ane no mubi.”
42018014	Nghumutyenyi, yuyo mutoweza kodi, yawuya kwakwe kuno yakondizye kwilamula no Mulungu. Ninga ayulya u Mufalisayo, si nhavivyo. Hambi muli wose mono yakwikumya mweneco, nha konyetywa na mono yakwinyetya yo kokumywa.
42018015	Wanhu wakamuletela Yesu i wana wadodo, ho yawawicile miwoko yakwe. Ninga iwejizwa waza kuwawona, wakawatacila no kuwemila.
42018016	Ninga Yesu yakawacemela kuli mwene, yakutya, “Walecenyi wana wadodo wanyizize, mulece kuwalemeza; hambi wutemi wo Mulungu, nha we wanhu wono wenha wawa.
42018017	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, muli wose mono si kowubocela wutemi wo Mulungu nho mwana mudodo, si kokwinjila mumo ng'o.”
42018018	Na mulongola yunji, Muyahudi, yakamuwuza Yesu, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi muswanu, nhende wule, ho niwutuje wumi we cibitilila?”
42018019	Yesu yakamutya, “Alo so cici wukunyhema muswanu? Hasina yunji muswanu, langa yumonga, yo Mulungu du.
42018020	Wugamanyile malajilizo, ‘Wulece kusenyha; Wulece kuwulaga; Wulece kuhiza; Wulece kulavya wuhomelezi wa wulambi. Wuwogopaje usogo no nyina yako.’ ”
42018021	Mwene yakatya, “Gaga gose nigakamisaga, vyono nalawa wudodo wangu.”
42018022	Nayo Yesu yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakamutya, “Wukali wanjiye nghani monga du; wuguze vyose vyono wina navyo, wukawagawile waciwa, nagwe kowa na sawo ku wulanga; hanyuma ho wuze wunhyatye.”
42018023	Ninga yuyo munhu yaza kuzihulika zizi, yakakalala muno; hambi nha yali mugoli muno.
42018024	Nayo Yesu yaza kumuwona vyono yakalaye, yakatya, “Kukamu kuli wono wena sawo ku winjile mu wutemi wo Mulungu!
42018025	Kupelu kuli ngamiya yikole mu cilanga co lusing'ani, si nho mugoli kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
42018026	Wanhu nawo waza kuhulika, wakatya, “Nani 'mbi mono kosuma kupona?”
42018027	Ninga Yesu yakatya, “Zono si zisumice kuli wanhu, nha zisumice kuli Mulungu.”
42018028	Nayo Petelo yakamuwuza, “Ase nase ma? Caleka zikaya zetu cikakutyatya.”
42018029	Yesu yakawatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, Munhu wo wose mono yalecile kaya, hamba mugolece, hamba wawahaze, lunji wanakwawe, hamba walezi, hamba wana, so wutemi wo Mulungu,
42018030	kopegwa zono zicizize kenji mu myaka yiyi ya lulu, no kubocela wumi we cibitilila mu yinze yono yikuza.”
42018031	Yesu yakawasola wali wene, wawalya we likumi na wejete, yakawatya, “Lanjenyi, alu cikubita ku Yelusalemi, na kuko zose zono yandicilwa Mwana wo Munhu ne wawizi, si zoleka kufisilizwa.
42018032	Hambi nha kolavywa kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nawo womutendela vibi, no kumufunyila mate.
42018033	Nawo womutowanga ne mijeledi; womuwulaga, ninga mwizuwa lye kadatu kozuka kanyhi.”
42018034	Ninga wene si wezuka nghani hamba monga, nghani yiyi yikawa hundikwe kuli wene, hamba si watanga yono yalongwaga.
42018035	Kukawa Yesu yaza sejelela ku Yeliko, hali na mubofu yunji yekaye ha nzila, yakwilombeleza,
42018036	nayo yaza kuhulika lipuga lye wanhu likupuluta, yakawuza, “Alo ko cilici?”
42018037	Wakamutya, “Yesu wa Nazaleti yakupuluta.”
42018038	Nayo yakabalaluka yakutya, “Yesu go mwana wa Dawudi wumbonele lusungu.”
42018039	Wanhu wono wali walongoleye, wakamutacila wakutya yanyamale, ninga mwene ho yakacila kucemeleza muno, “Go mwana wa Dawudi wumbonele lusungu.”
42018040	Yesu yakema, yakawatya wamulete kuli mwene. Nayo mubofu yaza kusejelela, Yesu yakamuwuza,
42018041	“Wukusaka nghutendele wule?” Nayo yakapitula, “Muwaha, nghulomba wumhele kuwona kanyhi.”
42018042	Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wuwone, Wihuwilo wako wukuponya.”
42018043	Lo lulolulo mono yali yali cibofu yakawa kuwona, yakamutyatya Yesu, akuno yakumukumya Mulungu. Ne wanhu wose, waza wona zizo, wakamukumya Mulungu.
42019001	Yesu yakenjila mwi'kaya lya Yeliko, na lono yakolaga mu zinzila za mwi'kaya lilyo,
42019002	hali na munhu, litagwa lyakwe Zakayo. Munhu yuyo yali muwaha we Wakalani watoweza kodi, kanyhi yali munhu mugoli.
42019003	Yahilaga kumuwona Yesu yamumanye; ninga ku soko yo winji we wanhu, kanyhi vyono mwene yali mufupi; hamba siyasuma.
42019004	Hobaho yakalongolela lumangho, yakananuka mu mukuyu, ho yasume kumuwona Yesu, hambi nha yakolaga nzila yiyo.
42019005	Nayo Yesu yaza fika bahalya, yakagalamila, yakamutya, “Zakayo wutime mbela, hambi zuwali nha yinojeye niswe mu kaya yako.”
42019006	Zakayo yakatima mbela mbela, yakamubocela na nyemo.
42019007	Wanhu wose waza kuwona zizo, wakawa kwanza kung'ung'ulika wose, wakutya, “Kenjila kuduwa kuli munhu mubi.”
42019008	Ninga Zakayo yakema, yakamulonjela Yesu, yakamutya, “Lanje ta, Muwaha, Nusu ye sawo yangu nowagawila waciwa; na hono niwe namusolela yunji cinji ko wusugu, nomugomolela mwi'walo lilyo kali kane.”
42019009	Yesu yakamutya, “Zuwali mhonelo yinjila mono kaya yiyi, vyono mwene nayo, mwana wa Abulahamu.
42019010	Hambi Mwana wo Munhu nha yaza kulondola no kuponya i wanhu wono wajiliye.”
42019011	Mu cipango lono wanhu wali wakali wahulicize zizo, Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo. (Baho yali yasejelela ku Yelusalemi, ne wanhu wawo wehwesaga vyono mwipango yidodo du, u wutemi wo Mulungu wowa wafika.)
42019012	Holeka yakawatya, “Kwali na munhu yunji mutambule, mono yatuluka, yakabita ku yisi ya kutali, yakabocele wutemi ho yawuye.
42019013	Na lono yali yakali si natuluka, yakawacema wetumami wakwe yikumi, yakawagawila pesa munhu ne liwalo lyakwe, yakawatya. ‘Muzinozezaje wusuluza zipesa zizi, sunga nize mbuye.’
42019014	Ninga wanya wusi wayagwe wakamusula, holeka wakatuma watumwa, wabite wakatye. ‘Si cikusaka yuyu yateme muli sese.’
42019015	“Yuyo munhu yakawuya ku kaya akuno yakondya kupegwa wutemi. Ho baho yakatuma wacemelwe kwakwe wetumami wawalya wono yawapela zipesa zizilya, ho yamanye cambuzi cono watujile mu wusuluza.
42019016	U mwitumami mulongozi yakaza, yakatya, ‘Muwaha, zipesa zako zono wamhela, zonjelezeka kali kumi.’
42019017	Nayo yakamutya, ‘Ale, kunoza viswanu, wuli mwitumami muswanu. Vyono wali mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo muno, ale weze muwaha mu makaya kumi.’
42019018	U mwitumami we kejete yakaza, yakatya, ‘Muwaha, cijela cambuzi kali kahano muli zizilya zipesa zono wukamhela.’
42019019	Yakamutya nayo, ‘Nagwe weze muwaha mu makaya mahano.’ ”
42019020	U mwitumami yunji nayo yakaza yakatya, “Muwaha sole pesa zako, nazikamisa mbope mu citambala,
42019021	hambi nha nakogopa vyono agwe wuli munhu mukali. Agwe wuli munhu mono kusolaga cono si wawika, no kududula cono si wahadika.”
42019022	Nayo yakamutya, “Nokusumila mu wulonje wako, wuli mwitumami mubi 'gwe. Wali wumanyile vyono ane nili munhu mukali, mono solaga cono sinawika, no kududula cono si hadice,
42019023	alo so cici si wayiwika sawo yangu mu benki, nane nali niyisole yina ne cambuzi ha wuwuye wangu?”
42019024	Yakawatya wono wali wemile baho, “Mumubokaje zizo zipesa, mumupele ayulya mono yatujile cambuzi kali kumi.”
42019025	Nawo wakamutya, “Muwaha, ayu yena cambuzi cico kali 'kumi.”
42019026	Nayo yakawatya, “Muli wose mono yena nha kopegwa; no konjelezwa. Ninga mono yasina, kosolelwa sunga na cono yena naco.
42019027	Ninga wawo walugu wangu, wono si wali wendile niwe mutemi wawo, waletenyi kuno, muwawulajile hamwande yangu.”
42019028	Yesu yaza kondya kulonga zizi, yakalongola kubita ku Yelusalemi.
42019029	Kukawa yaza sejelela ku Betifage na Betaniya, he 'tunda lye Mizeyituni, yakawatuma wejizwa wakwe wejete,
42019030	yakawatya, “Bitenyi ku citumbi cono cili ha mwande yenyu, na kolo mukwinjila mu citumbi, mowona nyana ye ndogowe yiwopigwe, yono yikali hamba si netumamilwa na munhu. Muyiwopole, muyilete baha.”
42019031	Hono munhu yamuwuzenyi, so cici lo mukuyiwopola, mumulonjelaje mutye, “U Muwaha yakuyisaka.”
42019032	Nawo wono watumwa wakabita, wakawona nha vyono yawalonjela.
42019033	Nawo lono wayiwopolelaga nyana ye ndogowe, wanye ndogowe wakawawuza, “Nhawule mukuyiwopolela i ndogowe yiyi?”
42019034	Nawo wakawapitula, wakatya, “U Muwaha yakuyisaka.”
42019035	Wakayileta kuli Yesu, wakatandika myenda yawo mu nyana ye ndogowe, wakamupandiza Yesu.
42019036	Nayo Yesu yakajendelela no muhinzo, akuno yapandile mu ndogowe, ne wanhu wakatandika myenda yawo mu nzila.
42019037	Nayo yaza sejelela behi na Yelusalemi, ha nhenenhuko ye litunda lye Mizeyituni, i wejizwa wakwe mu winji wawo, wakanza kusangalala no kumulumbo Mulungu kwe 'zi yiwaha, so metumo mawaha gono wagawona,
42019038	wakutya, “Mumoti u Mutemi mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha, Mulamu ku wulanga, no lukumyo lweze kuli Mulungu.”
42019039	Wafalisayo wanji wono wali wali mwi'puga lye wanhu, wakamutya Yesu, “Mwijizi wanyamazaje wejizwa wako wanyamale.”
42019040	U mwene yakawapitula, yakatya, “Nghumulonjelenyi anye vyono, hono wawa wanyamale, mabwe gago gozoza.”
42019041	Nayo yaza sejelela, yakaliwona likaya yakalililila,
42019042	yakutya, “Yali yiwe yili ciba hono nagwe wali wumanye mwizuwa lili, inghani yo mulamu! Ninga alu yihundicizwe ha meso gako.
42019043	Hambi vilo nha vyolokuziza, lono Walugu wako wolokupilima no kukutejela kose kose.
42019044	Wolokongomeza gwegwe, hamonga ne wanago wono wali mumo. Nawo si wolokusigaziza hamba libwe limonga mucanyha mwibwe liyagwe, vyono si watanga ilipango lyono Mulungu yaziza kukuponya.”
42019045	Hanyuma Yesu yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakanza kuwawinjila kunze wono wambazaga,
42019046	yakuwatya, “Yandikwa, Nyumba yangu yowa nyumba yo kulombela; ninga anye mwayinoza kuwa mhango ya Wahizi.”
42019047	Yesu yakawa kwijiza vilo vyose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu. Ninga Wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize ne walongola we wanhu, wasakaga kumuwulaga,
42019048	ninga si wayiwona nzila yo kunozeza zizo. Hambi wanhu wose nha wali wamumemeleye, wakumuhuliciza muno.
42020001	Kukawa mwi'zuwa linji, lono yawejizaga wanhu mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu, Wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize ne wanyamhala wakamuziza,
42020002	wakatya, “Wucilonjele ta! Wukuzinoza zizi ko wulajilizeci?”
42020003	Yesu yakawatya, “Nane nomuwuzenyi nghani monga,
42020004	u wulajilize wa Yohana wo kubaputiza, walawa kuli Mulungu hamba kuli wanhu?”
42020005	Wakanza kulongana weneco wose wakatya: “Hono citye walawa ku wulanga, mwene kotya, ‘Alo so cici si mwamwihuwila?’
42020006	Na hono citye, walawa kuli wanhu, wanhu wose wocitowanga ne mabwe, hambi wose nha wehuwiye vyono Yohana yali muwizi.”
42020007	Hodu, wakamutya, “Sicimanyile wulajilize wuwo kono walawa.”

42020009	Yesu yakajendelela kuwalonjela wanhu cihwanicizo cici. “Munhu yunji yalima mugunda wa mizabibu, yakawika walimi, mwene yakabita ku yisi yinji ya kutali, yakekala kuko vilo vinji.
42020010	Mwipango lyo wupilo we mizabibu, yuyo munhu yakatuma mwitumami wakwe kuli wawalya walimi, wamupele mikalo ya mu mugunda we mizabibu, ninga walimi wakamutowa, wakamuwinga yali bwete.
42020011	Yuyo munhu yakatuma mwitumami yunji kanyhi; nayo wakamutowa nhavivilya no kumutendela vibi, wakamuwinga yali bwete.
42020012	Yakatuma sunga na we kadatu; nayo wakamutamisa no kumutaga kunze.”
42020013	Ayulya munya mugunda yakehwesa; “Alu notenda wule? Nomutuma mwanangu mwendece, lunji yuyo womogopa.”
42020014	Ninga walimi waza muwona, wakalongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Ayu yo muhazi, alenyi 'nye cimuwulaje, wuhazi wuwe wetu.”
42020015	Wakamulavyaniza mu mugunda we mizabibu, wakamuwulaga. Yesu yakawawuza, “Alu u munya mugunda konoza nhawule kuli wawo walimi?
42020016	Kolokuza yawawulaje walimi wawo, no mugunda we mizabibu, kopela walimi wanji.” I wanhu waza kuzihulika i zinghani zizo, wakabeza wakatya, “Siyosumika hamba hadodo.”
42020017	Ninga Yesu yakawalanga, yakawatya, “Mandiko gaga gono Gelile, alu gena nhunizo ci? ‘Ilibwe lyono walilema Wazenji, Alu lyonozwa kuwa yiwaha lyo musinji!’
42020018	Munhu wo wose mono kogwila mucanyha ye libwe lilyo, kobenanjika-benanjika, na hono limugwile munhu wo wose, lyomutijinha tici-tici.”
42020019	I wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wakohani wawaha, wakatanga vyono cihwanicizo cici, cali ciwadomile weneco, na ku soko yiyo, wahilaga wamwibate baho baho, ninga wakogopa wanhu.
42020020	Holeka wakawa wakulondola-londola cilejeho cono cikwiliye. Wakawafupa wanhu wanji, wenoze nha wanhu waswanu, wakawa kuwatuma wabite wamugwizize Yesu mu wulonje wakwe, ho wasume kumwibata no kumutegula ku wawaha we Selekali.
42020021	Wawo watandizi, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, cimanyile vyono wukulonga kanyhi wukwijiza nghani ze mbeka; cimanyile vyono si kulangaga lilumbo lya munhu, langa kwijizaga mu mbeka nzila yo Mulungu.
42020022	Ale cilonjelaje ta, hono viswanu kuli ase kumulipa kodi Kayisali, hamba ng'o?”
42020023	Ninga Yesu yakatanga wusugu wawo, yakawatya,
42020024	“Ndajilenyi pesa, wulenyi, yina hwani ya nani no lwandiko lwa nani?”
42020025	Nawo wakatya, “Vya Kayisali.” Yesu yakawatya, “Ale mumulavizye Kayisali vyakwe Kayisali, no Mulungu vyakwe Mulungu.”
42020026	Hamba si wasuma kumugwiziza nghani yiyi baho hali wanhu, holeka wakanyamala twii, wakwizina lipitulo lyakwe.

42020028	“Ati Mwijizi, Musa yacandicila, vyono munhu hono yafwilwe no muwahawe mono yali yatolile mugolece, no kumuleka mugolece yuyo yasina wana, u mwanakwawe yamutole yuyo mugolece ho yamutujile muwahawe wana.
42020029	Ale, kwali na wanhu mupunghati walume, wana wa munhu yumonga, u mulongozi yakatola mucekulu, hanyuma yakafwa si yaleka mwana.
42020030	Nayo wekejete [yakamutola mucekulu yuyo, nayo yakafwa,]
42020031	na we kadatu nhavivilya. Zikawa nha vivyo sunga kuli wose vyono wali mupunghati, na wose wakafwa hamba kuleka wana.
42020032	Hanyuma u mucekulu yuyo nayo yakafwa.
42020033	Alu mwizuwa lyono wafu wolozuka, mucekulu yuyu kolowa mugolece wa wahayi muli wawa? Hambi wose mupunghati nha wali wamutolile.”
42020034	Yesu yakawatya, “I wanhu wa kononze yiyi, watolaga, watolwaga,
42020035	ninga awalya wono Mulungu kowapela kulificila lizuwa lyo wuzuce we wafu, si wolotola hamba kutolwa.
42020036	Na mbeka hamba si wolofwa kanyhi yaye, hambi nha wokwihwana ne wamalayika; nawo wo wana wo Mulungu, vyono wazukulwa kulawa mu wafu.
42020037	Ninga wafu vyono wazukaga, sunga na Musa yayilajila nghani yiyo mu Mandiko gono Gelile, za ha cititika cono cakaga moto, lono yakumucema Muwaha, yakumutya, u Mulungu wa Abulahamu, Isaka na Yakobo.
42020038	Holeka mwene si Mulungu we wafu, langa Mulungu wa awalya iwomi. Hambi wose nha wakuwumipila muli mweneco.”

42020043	Sunga kolo nghuwanoza iwalugu wako wawe nha yigoda lyo kuwicila migulu yako.’

42020046	“Musuguce kuli wejizi wo Wulajilize wono wendile kujenda ako na ako wavwalile kanzo. Na kanyhi wendile kulamuswa kwa cogopo ne wanhu mu zisokoni, kanyhi wendile kwikala hanhu hatambule, mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, no kwikala hanhu hatambule ha zindigwa ze zisikukuu.

42021001	Yesu yakalanga, yakawona wagoli wono watajilaga vilavywa vyawo mu wuwiko we zisawo ze Nyumba yo Mulungu.

42021005	Wayagwe ne wejizwa wakwe, waduwilaga ze Nyumba yo Mulungu, vyono yihambigwe ne mabwe go wuguzi wukamu, hamonga ne vilavywa vyono vyalavywa kuli Mulungu. Yesu yakatya,

42021009	Na kolo mukuhulika zinghani zo wulugu ne mawuma, muze mulece kogopa; hambi zizi nha si zoleka kwamula kwijela; ninga ndumilizo yikali.”
42021010	Hanyuma yakawalonjela, yakutya, likungugo vyokwitowa ne likungugo liyagwe, no wutemi vyokwitowa no wutemi wuyagwe,
42021011	golowa matulo mawaha hanhu hose, kanyhi kolowa na nzala mbaha, ne matamwa go kwileceza. Kolowa ne vinhu vijenzi vya kogofya, ne vitanjilo viwaha vya ku wulanga.
42021012	Ninga lono zikali si nawa zizi zose, womwibatenyi, no kumutegulenyi mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, no kumudindilenyi mu zijela, motegulwa hali watemi ne walongola, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.
42021013	Na yiyi yomupelenyi cilejeho co kulonga zo Luganuzi Luswanu.
42021014	Holeka mwikamise mu zinhumbula zenyu, mulece kwiyandila kwihwelela vyono mokwitetela,
42021015	hambi nha nomupelenyi mahala no wizuce wo kulonga, vyono walugu wenyu wose si wosuma kuvimila hamba kupinga.
42021016	Iwalezi wenyu, ne wandugu zenyu, na we cimanyi, ne wendece wenyu, womugalucenyi, na wanji wa muli nyenye mowulagwa.
42021017	Ne wanhu wose womusulenyi ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.

42021019	Mu wukangalizi wenyu, moponya wumi wenyu.
42021020	“Ninga kolo mukuwona Yelusalemi yipilimwe ne walugu, ale, mumanye vyono wongomezwe wayo wasejelela.
42021021	Hobaho wono wali mu Yudiya, watizize mu matunda; na wono wali mugati yayo wawuce, nawo wono wali mu migunda, walece kwinjila mwikaya lilyo.
42021022	Hambi ivilo vivyo nha vyo vilo vyo wulipicizwe, ho zose zono zandikwa zifisilizwe.

42022001	Ale vikasejelela vilo vyo kulila mikate yono siyisasize, vyono vitezagwa vye Pasaka.

42022003	Setani yakamwinjila Yuda mono yacemwaga Musikaliyota, mono yali muyagwe na walya i watumwa we likumi na wejete.
42022004	Yuda yakabita, vikalongana ne wakohani wawaha ne walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu, inzila yono wokwitumamila yo kumugaluka Yesu no kumulavya kuli wene.
42022005	Nawo wakasecelela, no kulagana nayo vyono womupela mapesa.

42022009	Nawo wakamuwuza, “Wukusaka cikakuwikanizize hayi?”

42022011	Nanye mumulonjele munya nyumba mutye, ‘U Mwijizi yakuwuza, yakutya, Ati nyumba ya hayi, mono nolila Pasaka ne Wejizwa wangu?’
42022012	Nayo komulajilenyi cumba ciwaha ca ku golofa ciwikanizize lukulu, kuko ko mukatenje.”

42022025	Yesu yakawatya, “Iwatemi we Makungugo wawatemile wanhu wawo kwe vilungo. Ne watemi wawa, watezwaga watazi wa wanhu.
42022026	Ninga yilece kuwa nhavivyo muli nyenye, langa u muwaha muli nyenye yaweze nha mudodo, nayo mono kowa mulongozi, yaweze nha mono yakwituma.
42022027	Hambi wa hayi muwaha, mono yekaye ha ndigwa, hamba mono yakwitumama? Ane nghuwona, yuyu mono yekaye ha ndigwa yo muwaha. Ninga hamba yiwe nhavivyo, ane hali nyenye ninha mono yakwitumama.
42022028	“Ninga anye yo nyenye mono mwali muli hamonga nane mu mapango gose mu majelo gangu,
42022029	nane nomupelenyi wutemi, nha vyono Baba yamhela.
42022030	Musume kulya no kung'wa ha wulilo wangu mu wutemi wangu. Nanye molokwikala mu magoda go wutemi mukuwaling'aniza i milango yikumi na myejete ya Isilayeli.”
42022031	“Simoni, Simoni wuhulicize, Setani yakomboywe ho yamupetenyi anye nha vyono munhu kapetaga wuhemba,
42022032	ninga ane nghukulombela agwe Simoni, wihuwilo wako ho wulece kucepuka; nagwe kolo wukumbuyila kanyhi, ho wuwasikamye wanduguzo.”
42022033	Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Muwaha, ane niwikanize cibitane nagwe sunga ko ku jela, hamba no kufwa du hamonga nagwe.”
42022034	Yesu yakamupitula yakatya, “Nghukulonjela Petelo, zuwali lono nzogolo yowa yikali sinalila, kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu wukutya, si wumanyile ane.”
42022035	Yesu yakawawuza wejizwa wakwe yakutya “Lululya lono nghamutumenyi mwali musina mufuko wa mapesa, hamba mukoba, hamba malatu, wulenyi, mwanjila cinji?” Wakatya, “Ng'o.”
42022036	Nayo yakawatya, “Ninga alu, mono yena mufuko wa pesa, yawusolaje, na mono yena mukoba nhavivyo. Nayo mono yasina mumaje yaguze musweko wakwe, yagule mumaje.
42022037	Hambi nha nghumutyenyi, vyono yiyi yono yandikwa mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, ‘Yawalilizanwa hamonga ne wahodanji.’ Siyoleka kufisilizwa. Hambi yono yatemezezwa, nha yeza kuficila ku mudumo wayo.”
42022038	Nawo wakatya, “Muwaha, wulanje, ayi mimaje myejete,” nayo yakawatya, “Hodu yakwila.”
42022039	Yesu yakalawila, yakabita kwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni nha vyono yali yazoweye, ne wejizwa wakwe wakamutyatya.
42022040	Nayo yaza fika hanhu baho, yakawatya, “Lombenyi ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe.”
42022041	Yakatemanuka kuli wene yakabita wutali wa nghanzo ye'bwe lyono ligumiywe, yakafugama yakalomba, yakutya,
42022042	“Baba, hono wende, wumbusize cikombe cici co Wusungu, ninga si wuhile wangu, langa wuhile wako witumwe.” [
42022043	Malayika kulawa ku wulanga, yakamulawila, yakamupela vilungo.
42022044	Nayo vyono yali mu wusungu wuwaha, yakehinda kulomba, ne lituguti lyakwe, likawa nha mabanhi ga Sakami gakasulula ho hasi.]
42022045	Nayo yaza kondya kulomba, yakawaziza wejizwa wakwe, yakawagana wagonile so wuzinguce,
42022046	yakawatya, “Alo nye, nhawule mugonile? Inucenyi ta mulombe, ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe.”
42022047	Lono yali yakali kulonga, walanje nhavi, lipuga lye wanhu likaza, lina na mono yacemwaga Yuda, muyagwe na walya, iwatumwa we likumi na wejete, yawalongoleye. Nayo Yuda yakamusejelela Yesu ho yamunonele.
42022048	Ninga Yesu yakamutya, “Yuda, alo wukumugaluka Mwana wo Munhu ko wunonele hongo?”
42022049	Nawo wejizwa wakwe waza kuwona zono zikwitumwa baho, wakatya, “Muwaha citumamile mimaje yetu?”
42022050	Muyawo yunji yakamutowa no mumaje u mwitumami wo Mukohani muwaha, yakamubuha likutu lyo kulume.
42022051	Baho Yesu yakatya, “Lecenyi ta hadodo.” Yakamupamiza likutu munhu yuyo, yakamuponya.
42022052	Yesu yakawatya wakohani wawaha, ne wawaha we walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu ne wanyamhala wono waza kumwibata. “Alu muza kunyibata mwina ne mimaje ne zinhumbi, kotya nha nili muhizi?
42022053	Lono caswezanaga nanye nhondo zose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, nha si mwasuma kunyibata, ninga aci co cipango cenyu, co cipango co wutemi we citi.”
42022054	Wakamwibata Yesu, wakamulongoza, wakamutegula ku kaya yo Mukohani muwaha. Na Petelo yakamutyatya yakujendela kutali.
42022055	No moto wali mupembwe haciligati ye likumbo lya kunze, nawo wakekala hamonga, na Petelo yakekala mu ciligati yawo.
42022056	Mwitumami yumonga we cihinza, yaza kumuwona Petelo yekaye behi no moto, yakamulanga muno, yakatya, “Munhu ayu nayo yali hamonga na Yesu.”
42022057	Ninga Petelo yakakana yakutya, “Gwe go muhinza! Ane sinimumanyile.”
42022058	Na hanyuma hadodo munhu yunji yakamuwona Petelo, yakatya, “Na gwegwe wuli muyawo.” Ninga Petelo yakatya, “Go munhu 'gwe, ane yo si nene.”
42022059	Hanyuma kanyhi yaza kupuluta kotya saa monga, yunji nayo yakajendelela kulonga yakutya, “Mbeka yuyu nayo yali hamonga nayo, hambi nayo nha kalawa ku Galilaya.”
42022060	Ninga Petelo yakatya, “Go munhu 'gwe, si manyile zono wukulonga.” Na lulo baho du lono yali yakali kulonga zizo, nzogolo yikalila.
42022061	U Muwaha Yesu yakapituka yakamulanga Petelo. Nayo Petelo yakayikumbucila nghani yono yalonjelwa no Muwaha yono yamutya, “Zuwali lono nzogolo yowa yikali si nalila, kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu.”
42022062	Baho Petelo yakalawila kunze, yakalila muno muno.
42022063	I wanhu wawalya wono wamwibata Yesu, wakamutowa no kumuzwajiza.
42022064	Wakamuwopa na citambala ku meso, wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Ta wucitambulilaje, mono yakutowile nani?
42022065	Wakamutovulanga no kumulonganga makani menji ga maligo.”
42022066	Waza kwela, mukung'ano we walongola we wanhu, wakekongholela hamonga ne Wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakamutegula Yesu hamwande ye libalaza lyawo.
42022067	Nawo wakamutya, “Cilonjelaje ta, hono yo gwegwe Kilisito.” Ninga mwene yakawatya, “Hamba nimulonjelenyi, si mokwihuwila ng'o,
42022068	na hamba hono nimuwuzenyi, si momhitula.
42022069	Ninga ku wulawa lulu, momuwona u Mwana wo Munhu yekaye ku muwoko wo kulume wo Mulungu.”
42022070	Baho wose wakatya, “Alu wo wutya agwe wuli Mwana wo Mulungu hongo?” Nayo yakawatya, “Nyenye mukulonga vyono, he yo nene.”
42022071	Nawo wakatya, “Alu kanyhi cosaka wuhomelezi wa cici? Hambi sese weneco nha cimuhulika yakulonga ko mulomo wakwe mweneco.”
42023001	Yikenuka mhuga yose, wakamuleta kuli Pilato.
42023002	Wakanza kumusonjeza, wakutya, “Cimuwona yuyu yakuwafunda vibi i wanhu wetu, yakulemeza walece kulipa kodi kwa Kayisali, yakwiyitya ati mwene yo Kilisito Mutemi.”
42023003	Pilato yakamuwuza Yesu yakutya, “Ati, yo gwegwe Mutemi we Wayahudi?” Yesu yakamupitula, yakatya, “Kulonga he gwegwe.”
42023004	Pilato yakawalonjela Wakohani wawaha ne lipuga lye wanhu yakutya, “Ane singhuwona lisutya lyo lyose muli munhu yuyu.”
42023005	Ninga wene wakacila kutya, “Yakusagahaza wanhu so mafundo gakwe, mu yisi yose ya Yudiya, yamuliziza ku Galilaya sunga naluno alu, yali baha.”
42023006	Pilato yaza hulika zizo yakawuza yakutya, “Alu munhu yuyu munya Galilaya?”
42023007	Nayo yaza manya vyono Yesu yali mu wutemi wa Helode, yakamutegula kuli Helode, hambi mwene Helode nha yali yali mu Yelusalemi vilo vivyo.
42023008	Nayo Helode yakasecelela muno yali yeza kumuwona Yesu, hambi nha yali yahulika za Yesu, holeka yalanjililaga vilo vinji, yasume kumuwona kwe meso gakwe mweneco. Hamonga na zizo, yali yetumbiye kumuwona Yesu yakunoza citanjilo.
42023009	Helode yakamuwuzawuza Yesu nghani nyinji, ninga Yesu siyamupitula cinji.
42023010	Wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakema, wakehinda muno muno kumusonjeza.
42023011	Helode hamonga ne Wasilikale wakwe, wakamukoza cevu Yesu, no kumuzwajiza; hanyuma wakamuvwika mwenda we citemitemi, wakamugomola kuli Pilato.
42023012	Lizuwa lilyo ho welamulila wa Helode na Pilato, hambi nha wali wesulile.
42023013	Pilato yakawacemela hamonga Wakohani wawaha ne walongola ne wanhu,
42023014	yakawatya, “Mundetela munhu ayu, mukutya, yakufunda wanhu vibi, ale hulicizenyi, lono nimuwuzize hali nyenye, si mbwene hamba wusutye wo wose muli mwene, muli zizo zono mukumusonjeza,
42023015	hamba si nene du, langa sunga na Helode siyawene yisutya lyo lyose, na yo yilecile kamugomola kanyhi kono kwangu. Holeka yikwijela vyono munhu yuyu, si yanozize nghani yo yose yimbi, yono yoleka yawulagwe.
42023016	Holeka notya yakunwe viboko, hanyuma nomukombola.” [
42023017	Na mu zi sikukuu za Pasaka, Pilato yali yimunojeye yawawopolele mufungwa monga.]
42023018	Ninga wose wakazozeza hamonga, wakutya “Wumuwusaje ayu, langa wuciwopolele Balaba.”
42023019	(Balaba yo munhu mono yatajilwa mu jela, so wuma wono yawuleta mweneco mwi'kaya, kanyhi na ku soko yo wuwulaji.)
42023020	Pilato yahilaga kumuwopolela Yesu, holeka yakawalonjela kanyhi,
42023021	ninga wene wakazoza, wakutya, “Wumutumbice mu musalaba, Wumutumbice mu musalaba!”
42023022	Pilato yakawatya lwe kadatu, “Alu kahodanga nghanici munhu ayu? Ane si mbwene lisutya lyo lyose muli mwene lyono lyoleka yafwe, holeka nomukuna viboko, hanyuma nimuwopolele.”
42023023	Ninga wene wakacila kuzoza muno muno, wakutya, yimunojeye Yesu yatumbikwe mu musalaba. Ne ndumilizo, nhondo mazi gawo gakasuma.
42023024	Holeka Pilato yakadumula nghani vyono wuhile wawo wufisilizwe.
42023025	Yakamuwopolela Balaba mono wamusakaga, mono yali mudindile mu jela, ku so wuma no wuwulaji, ninga yakamukombola Yesu kuli wene, wamutendele vyono wasakaga.
42023026	Na lono wamutegulaga, waketang'anila na munhu monga mono yacemwaga Simoni, munya Kilene, yalawaga mu matumbi. Wakamwibata, wakamupiciza musalaba, wetembase na Yesu.
42023027	Wakamutyatya wanhu wenji muno; na mumo mwali mowali wacekulu wono wamulililaga muno.
42023028	Ninga Yesu yakawapitucila, yakatya, “Nye wacekulu wa Yelusalemi! Mulece kundilila ane, langa mwiyililile nyenye nyo weneco ne wana wenyu.
42023029	Hambi lanjenyi, vilo nha vyolokuza vyono wanhu wolotya. ‘Wamoti iwagumba, na we zinda zono si zilelaga, ne matombo gono si gosaga.’
42023030	Mwipango lilyo i wanhu ho wolokwanza kugalonjela matunda, ‘Mucigwilaje.’ ne vigongo, ‘Mucigubice.’
42023031	Hono wanhu wakutenda zizi mwibici lidece, ma mwibici likavu ho zowa wule?”
42023032	Wakawasola kanyhi na wanhu wanji wejete, wahodanji, wawulagwe hamonga na Yesu.
42023033	Nawo waza fika hanhu hono hatezagwa, “Cipala,” ho wamutumbika Yesu mu musalaba hamonga na wawalya wahodanji wejete, yunji ku muwoko wo kulume u muyagwe ku muwoko wo kucekulu.
42023034	Yesu yakatya, “Baba, wuwanenele, hambi nha si wamanyile yono wakwituma. Hanyuma wakagawana vivwalo vyakwe mu nzila yo kutowa kula.”
42023035	Wanhu wakawa wemile baho wakulanga. Ne walongola wakamuzwaga, wakutya, “Yaponyaga wanji, alu yeponye mweneco hono yo mweneco Kilisito wo Mulungu, u muhagulwa wakwe.”
42023036	Ne wasilikale nawo wakamuzwaga, wakaza, wakamupela siki,
42023037	wakutya, hono yo gwegwe Mutemi we Wayahudi, ale wiponye go mweneco.

42023040	Ninga muhodanji muyagwe yakamutacila, yakatya, “Alu 'gwe, si wukumogopa Mulungu hamba hadodo? Nagwe wuli mu wulipicizwe wuwo.
42023041	Nase mbeka yo ling'ani yetu, hambi nha cikulipicizwa nha vyono yicinojeye ku so metumo getu. Ninga Munhu ayu, siyetuma cinji cibi.”
42023042	Hanyuma yakatya, “Yesu wunghumbucile kolo wukuza mu wutemi wako.”

42023044	Yikawa nha saa sita ye misi, lizuwa likatukuwala, citi cikadinda mu yisi yose, sunga saa tisa,
42023045	ne libupa lyo mwenda lyono lyali litumbikwe mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, likademuka haciligati.
42023046	Yesu yakalila ne lizi yiwaha yakatya, “Baba, nghuwika muhe wangu mu Miwoko yako.” Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, hodu yakawa kufwa.
42023047	U muwaha we wasilikale yigana, yaza kuwona zono ziweye, yakamukumya Mulungu, yakutya, “Mbeka munhu ayu, yali yali ling'ani.”
42023048	Ne wanhu wose wono wali wekongholeye baho kuzilanga zizo, waza wona zono ziweye, wakawuya kwawo wakwibinha mu zimhambaga so wukalale.
42023049	We cimanyi wakwe wose, ne wacekulu wono wamutyatyaga Yesu wakulawa Galilaya, wakema kutali wakuzilanjilila zizi.
42023050	Kukawa na munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Yusufu, mono yali munya citumbi cinji, ce Wayahudi, cono cicemwaga Alimataya. Yali munhu muswanu na wa cogopo.
42023051	Mono yalanjililaga u wuze wo wutemi wo Mulungu. Yali muyagwe na walya we libalaza liwaha lye Wayahudi. Ninga hamba nhavivyo siyelumbaniza mwi'tumo lyawo lilyo.
42023052	Mwene yakabita kuli Pilato yakawulomba u muwili wa Yesu.
42023053	Yakawutungula mu musalaba, yakawuwopa na mwenda wa bafuta, yakawuzika mu citenjelo cono catulwa mwibwe, cono cali cikali sinawikwa munhu.
42023054	Ilizuwa lilyo, lyali lizuwa lye Ijumaa, no wuwikanize we lizuwa lye Sabato wali weza kwanza.
42023055	Ne wacekulu wawalya wono wamutyatyaga Yesu ku wulawa ku Galilaya, wakamutyatya Yusufu, wakacilanga citenjelo, na vyono u muwili wa Yesu wazikwa.
42023056	Wakawuya kwawo, wakanozeleza mafuta ge mhunjile swanu. Na mu Sabato wakaceha nha vyono yalajilizwa.
42024001	Mwizuwa lye Jumapili, hakali mitondo muno muno, wacekulu wawalya wakabita ku citenjelo, wategulize ne manukato gono wali wawikaniza.
42024002	Wakawona vyono libwe lyabidusizwa hamhelo ye citenjelo.
42024003	Wali weza kwinjila mugati ye citenjelo, hamba siwawuwona u muwili wo Muwaha Yesu.
42024004	Na lono wali wakali kwizina so nghani yiyi, hobaho wakawona wanhu wejete, wono wali wavwalile myenda yono yikung'alala, wemile behi nawo.
42024005	Wacekulu wawo wakenjilwa no woga, wakenamya wusu wawo hasi. Hobaho i wanhu wawalya wejete wakawatya, “Alo so cici mukumulondola u mumi muli wono wafwiye?
42024006	Si yali baha ye, kazuka, kumbucilenyi vyono yakamulonjelenyi lono yali yakali ku Galilaya;
42024007	lono yatya, u Mwana wo Munhu si koleka kukombolwa kuli wanhu wabi, nawo womutumbika mu musalaba ne lizuwa lye kadatu kozuka kanyhi.”
42024008	Baho wacekulu wawalya wakazikumbucila zinghani zakwe.
42024009	Wakawuya kulawa ku citenjelo, wakawaganulila walya i watumwa we likumi na monga, ne wayawo wose, zinghani zizi zose.
42024010	Na wono wawaganulila iwatumwa zinghani zizi, wali wa Malyamu Magadalena, na Yowana, na Malyamu u nyina wa Yakobo: hamonga ne wacekulu wanji, wono wali wali hamonga nawo.
42024011	Nawo i watumwa wakaziwona nghani zizi kotya nha nzwaji du, holeka si wehuwila.
42024012	Ninga Petelo yakenuka, yakabita lumangho sunga ku citenjelo. Nayo yaza kusunjilila mugati mu citenjelo, yakawona myenda ye bafuta du yili wene. Yakawuya kwakwe, akuno yakwizina muli zizo zono ziweye.
42024013	Na mwizuwa lililya, wanhu wejete wayagwe ne wejizwa wa Yesu, wabitaga ku citumbi cono catezagwa Emawu, cihinzo ca kilometa yikumi na monga kulawa ku Yelusalemi.
42024014	Nawo wasimulilaga zizo zose zono zali zijeye.
42024015	Kukawa lono wasimulilaga no kwiwuza, Yesu mweneco yakejela yakajendana nawo.
42024016	Wakamuwona kwe meso, ninga si wasuma kumumanya.
42024017	Yakawatya, “Nghanici zono mukujenda mukwiganulila?” Wakema akuno wasininghaye.
42024018	Yumonga litagwa lyakwe Kileyopa, Yakapitula yakamutya, “Alo 'gwe wuli mujenzi wuli wene mu Yelusalemi, ho wulece kuzimanya zizi zono ziweye mumu mu vilo vivi vicefu?”
42024019	Nayo yakawatya, “Nghanici lo?” Nawo wakamutya, “Zinghani zono zamutuga Yesu wa Nazaleti. Mono yali muwizi we vilungo mu mulimo, na mu zinghani hali Mulungu, na hali wanhu wose.
42024020	Wakohani wawaha ne watemi wetu, wamulavya, yaling'anizwe yafwe, wakawa kumutumbika mu musalaba.
42024021	Nase cetumbilaga cikutya, yo mwene mono kokomboza Isilayeli. Na muli zizi zose, izuwali lye zuwa lye kadatu kulawa vyono zanozwa zizi.
42024022	Na kanyhi wacekulu wanji wa mu mhuga yetu wacitinusa, wono welawiye ku citenjelo.
42024023	Nawo hamba si wawuwene muwili wakwe, weza kuwuya, wawa kutya, wamalayika wawalawila, wono wateye vyono mumi.
42024024	Na wanji wayetu wabita ku citenjelo, nawo wawona vyono yo nha vivyo du, vyono walonjile wacekulu, ninga mwene Yesu si wamuwene.”
42024025	Nayo Yesu yakawatya “Nhawule muli walele nhavivi, kanyhi muli wakamu mu zinhumbula zenyu, kuzihuwila zose zono walonga wawizi?
42024026	Wulenyi, si yali yimunojeye Kilisito kugazwa nhavivyo, ho yenjile mu nhojo yakwe?”
42024027	Yesu yakawaloloseza zose za mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, zono zali zimunojeye mwene, ku wulawilila kuli Musa, sunga na mu wawizi wose.
42024028	Waza kusejelela ha citumbi cono wabitaga; nayo yakawa nha yakupulutiza,
42024029	ninga wene wakamunena wakutya, “Wikalaje nase, hambi lizuwa nha lyaswa, ne citi ceza kwinjila.” Yakenjila nawo mu citumbi, yakekala nawo.
42024030	Kukawa, lono yali vikalane nawo ha ndigwa, yakawusola mukate, yakawulugutiza, yakawubegula, yakawapela.
42024031	I meso gawo gakenzelulwa, wakamumanya. Ninga mwene yakawuka si wamuwene.
42024032	Wakeyitya, “Wule 'ti, zinhumbula zetu si zali nha zikwaka muli'se lono yali kulongana nase mu nzila, na lono yali kuciloloseza ze mandiko?”
42024033	Wakenuka lulo baho, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakawagana wawalya i watumwa we likumi na monga wekonghoye, hamonga na walya wanji wono wali nawo;
42024034	wakutya “U Muwaha kazuka mbeka, kelajila kuli Simoni.
42024035	Nawo wa walya i wanhu wejete, wakawalonjela zizilya zono waziwene mu nzila, na vyono wamutanga Yesu mu wubegule wo mukate.”
42024036	Na wawalya i wejete lono walongaga zizi, Yesu yakema haciligati yawo, yakawatya, “U mulamu weze muli'nye.”
42024037	wakatinuka, no woga wukawebata, wakutya lunji wawona mwenzenze.
42024038	Ninga mwene yakawatya, “So cici mwina woga, na so cici mwina mahwele mu zinhumbula zenyu?
