42024039	Lanjenyi mawoko gangu ne magulu gangu, vyo yo nene mweneco, munyalabataje munanje; hambi mwenzeze nha wusina muwili ne mafupa, nha vyono mukumbona ane nina navyo.”
42024040	Yaza longa zizi, yakawalajila mawoko gakwe, ne magulu gakwe.
42024041	Na lono wali wakali si wakwihuwila so nyemo no wizine, Yakawatya “Mwina cinji co kulya baha?”
42024042	Wakamupela cibimha ca somba cinyanywe.
42024043	Yakasola yakalya ha meso gawo.
42024044	Yakawatya, “Azi zo nghani zono namulonjelenyi, lono nali nghali hamonga nanye, nha vyono yali yinojeye kuzifisiliza zose, zono nandicilwa mu wulajilize wa Musa, na mu wawizi, na mu Zabuli.”
42024045	Hanyuma yakawagubulila mahala gawo, ho wasume kugatanga Mandiko Gono Gelile.
42024046	Yakawatya, “Vyo yandikwa, vyono yimunojeye Kilisito yatamiswe, na mwizuwa lye kadatu yimunojeye yazuce muli wafu.
42024047	Na kanyhi yinojeye mwi'tagwa lyakwe, kuganula wunene, no wuwopolelwe wo wubi, kuli makungugo gose, kwamuliziza ku Yelusalemi.
42024048	Nanye yo nyenye mono muli wahomelezi wa zizi.
42024049	Nane nomuletelenyi yuyo mono Baba yehuwiza vyono komutuma, ninga mulindilize mumo mwi'kaya, sunga muvwikwe i vilungo avilya vya kucanyha.”
42024050	Yakawategula sunga ku Betaniya, yakenula miwoko yakwe, yakawalugutiza.
42024051	Kukawa lono yawalugutizaga, yakawaleka, yakasolwa, yakabita ku wulanga.
42024052	Nawo wakamuhemba, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi wena ne nyemo mbaha,
42024053	wakekala vilo vyose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu akuno wakumulumba Mulungu.
43001001	Ha mwamulizo i yinze lono yali yikali nawumbwa, I Nghani yali yali baho. Nayo I Nghani yali yali hamonga no Mulungu, i Nghani nayo yali Mulungu.
43001002	Yuyo yali yali hamonga no Mulungu ku wulawa mwamulizo.
43001003	Ivinhu vyose vyawumbilwa muli mwene, na hasina ciwumbwa cinji co cose cono cawumbwa, hono hasina mwene.
43001004	U Mwene yali yo mwamulizo wo wumi; no wumi wuwo wali wuzelu we wanhu wose.
43001005	No wuzelu wuwo wumulikaga mu wutitu, hamba wutitu si wuwusumaga yaye.
43001006	U Mulungu yakamutuma munhu litagwa lyakwe Yohana.
43001007	Yuyo yaza kuwalonjela wanhu zo wuzelu wuwo. Na so wuhomelezi wakwe, iwanhu wose ho wehuwile.
43001008	U mwene Yohana, yo si yali wuwo wuzelu weneco, langa yaza du, ho yawalonjele wanhu zo wuzelu wuwo.
43001009	Awu wo wuzelu we mbeka, u wuzelu wono wukuza mono yinze, no kuwamulicila wanhu wose.
43001010	Ale, i Nghani yali mono yinze, ne yinze yawumbilwa muli mwene, ninga i yinze si yamutanga yaye.
43001011	Yakaza mu yisi yakwe mweneco, ninga i wanhu wakwe si wamubocela yaye.
43001012	Ninga wose wono wamubocela no kumwihuwila, yawapela i vilungo vyo kunozwa kuwa wana wo Mulungu.
43001013	Wono si waleleywe mu vilungo vye cimunhu munhu, hamba mu vilungo vyo munhu, hamba mu wuhile wo munhu, langa u Mulungu mweneco yo Sogo yawo.
43001014	I Nghani nayo yakawa munhu, yakekala mwetu. Nase cikayiwona i nhojo yakwe, i nhojo yakwe mwene mono mwana we ciwene wa Baba; yamemile lihewa ne mbeka.
43001015	Yohana yakawalonjela wanhu zinghani zakwe, yakawalonjela kwe 'zi yiwaha yakutya, “Ayu yo mwene mono namulonga, lono natya, Yakuza munhu munyuma yangu, mono yo muwaha yanyhizize nene, ku soko mwene yali yali baho na lono ane nali nghali nalelwa.”
43001016	Hambi mu wukwilanicile wakwe, nase mo cikubocelela lihewa lyakwe cibitilila.
43001017	Hambi u Mulungu, nha yawulavya Wulajilize mu nzila ya Musa, ninga i lihewa ne mbeka, vyaziza mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito.
43001018	Hasina munhu mono yamuwona Mulungu hanji ho hose, u Mwana we ciwene mono wali sawa no Mulungu, mono vilunzize no Sogwe, yuyu yo yacimanyiza zo Mulungu.
43001019	Awu wo wuhomelezi wa Yohana wono yawulonga, lono wawaha we Wayahudi wa ku Yelusalemi, wamutumila wakohani ne Walawi wamuwuze vyono mwene yo nani.
43001020	Nayo Yohana si yalema kupitula i liwuzo lilyo, ninga yakalonga calinze, yakatya, “Ane yo si nene Kilisito.”
43001021	Nawo wakamuwuza wakatya, “Alu gwegwe nani? Yo gwegwe Eliya lo?” Yohana yakatya, “Ng'o yo si nene.” Wakamuwuza, “Yo gwegwe muwizi yulya?” Yohana yakawapitula yakatya, “Ng'o yo si nene.”
43001022	Nawo wakamuwuza “Alu gwegwe nani? Ukiyitya gwegwe nani? Ucilonjele ho ciwategulile lipitulo wono wacitumile.”
43001023	Yohana yakatya, “Ane yo nene, mono muwizi Isaya yalonga. ‘Ane nili yizi lyono likuhulikwa ku nyika, Gololenyi nzila yo Muwaha.’ ”
43001024	Ne wanhu wawo wali watumigwe ne Wafalisayo.
43001025	Nawo wakamuwuza Yohana wakamutya, “Alu agwe hono si wuli Kilisito, hamba Eliya, hamba muwizi yulya, nhawule wukubaputiza?”
43001026	Yohana yakawapitula yakawatya, “Ane nghubaputiza kwe malenga, ninga ho yuli yunji yemile muli nyenye mono mukali namumanya.
43001027	Yo yuyo mono yakuza munyuma yangu, mono ane sinojeye hamba kuyiwopola imikowa ye malatu gakwe.”
43001028	Zizi zetumwa kuko ku Betaniya, ku nhumbi nzagwe ye likolongo lya Yoludani, kono Yohana yabaputizaga.
43001029	I mitondo yaco, Yohana yakamuwona Yesu yakumuziza, yakatya, “Mulanje, ayu Mwana Ngholo wo Mulungu, mono yakuwusa, wubi we yinze!
43001030	Yo mwene mono namulonga, mono natya, ‘Munyuma yangu yakuza munhu yunji muwaha mono yanyhizize nene, hambi nha yali yali baho lono na ane nali nghali nalelwa!’
43001031	Na nene si namumanya, ninga niza mbaputize kwe malenga, wanhu wa Isilayeli ho wasume kumumanya.”
43001032	Awu wo wuhomelezi wono Yohana yawulavya, “Nawona Muhe yakutima nha nziwa, yakulawa ku wulanga, yakamwikalila mwene.
43001033	Nane sinamumanya: langa u Mulungu mono yanhuma nghawabaputize wanhu kwe malenga, yali yanonjela yakutya, ‘U munhu yuyo mono komuwona u Muhe yakumutimila, yakumwikalila, yuyo yo yakubaputiza mu Muhe Mono Yelile.’
43001034	Nane nghondya kuwona, nane nghumulonjelenyi vyono yuyu yo Mwana wo Mulungu.”
43001035	I mitondo yaco kanyhi, Yohana yali yemile baho, hamonga na wejete wayagwe ne wejizwa wakwe.
43001036	Yaza kumuwona Yesu yakukola, yakatya, “Mulanje ayu Mwana Ngholo wo Mulungu!”
43001037	I wejizwa walya vyono wejete, wakamuhulika Yohana yakulonga zizo, wakamutyatya Yesu.
43001038	Yesu yakapituka, yakawawona wawo wejizwa wakumutyatya, yakawatya, “Alo mukulondola cici?” Nawo wakamutya, “Labi (nhunizo yayo Mwijizi) kwikalaga hayi?”
43001039	Yesu yakawatya, “Muze nanye mowona.” Iwejizwa wawo wakamutyatya, wakahawona i hanhu hono yekalaga. Wakaswezana nayo lizuwa lilyo, nayo yali nha saa kumi cinyamihe.
43001040	Andeleya, u mwanakwawe wa Simoni Petelo, yo yali muyagwe na wawalya iwejizwa wejete, wono wamuhulika Yohana vyono yakulonga, wakamutyatya Yesu.
43001041	Andeleya yakamula kumulondola u muwahawe Simoni, yakamutya, “Cimuwona Mesiya” (nhunizo yayo Kilisito.)
43001042	Hanyuma yakamutegula Simoni kuli Yesu. Nayo Yesu yakamulanga Simoni, yakatya, “Yo gwegwe Simoni u mwana wa Yona, alu kocemwa Kefa.” (Cigiliki wo wutya Petelo, hamba, “Yibwe”.)
43001043	I mitondo yaco, Yesu yakasaka kubita ku Galilaya, na kuko yakamwagana Filipo, Yesu yakamutya, “Wunhyatye.”
43001044	Nayo Filipo yali munya Betesayida ku kaya ya wa Andeleya na Petelo.
43001045	Nayo Filipo yakamwagana Nataneli, yakamutya, “Cimuwona ayulya mono Musa yandika i zakwe, mu citabu co Wulajilize, na kanyhi mono wawizi nawo wandika i zakwe, Yesu u mwana wa Yusufu, mulawa ku Nazaleti.”
43001046	Nataneli yakamutya Filipo, “Hambi ku Nazaleti nako kosuma kulawa cinhu ciswanu?” Filipo yakamutya, “Wuze wulanje.”
43001047	Yesu yakamuwona Nataneli yakuza kuli mwene, yakalonga zo mwene, “Mulanje! Ayo yo Mwiisilayeli we mbeka, mono yawusina wukonji wo wose muli mwene.”
43001048	Nayo Nataneli yakamuwuza, yakatya, “Alo kumanya wule?” Yesu yakapitula yakamutya, “Lono wali wikaye he 'sina lyo mukuyu, na lono wali wukali nacemwa na Filipo, ane nali nakondya kukuwona.”
43001049	Hobaho Nataneli yakamutya, “Mwijizi, yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu, yo gwegwe Mutemi wa Isilayeli.”
43001050	Yesu yapitula yakamutya, “Alo wukwihuwila vyono nghulonjeye, nakuwona he 'sina lyo mukuyu? Kowona mawaha gono gacizize gaga.”
43001051	Yesu yakajendelela kulonga, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, molowona u wulanga wukudiguka, ne wamalayika wo Mulungu wakubita kucanyha no kutima, muli Mwana wo Munhu.”
43002001	Lizuwa lye kadatu, kwali na wutozi ku Kana ya ku Galilaya; u nyina wa Yesu nayo yali yali kuko,
43002002	nayo Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakalalikwa ku halusi.
43002003	Ne divayi yaza malika, u nyina yakamutya Yesu, “Wasina divayi.”
43002004	Nayo Yesu yakamupitula nyina yakamutya, “Yaya wulece kunonjeleza cono nitume. Cipango cangu cikali nafika.”
43002005	Hobaho u nyina, yakawalonjela wetumami yakawatya, “Vyono komulonjelenyi, vyo mutende.”
43002006	Ale, baho hali na manyungu mutandatu ga mabwe, gono gali gakwiliye kwinjila madebe mejete, hamba madatu mwi'nyungu limonga. Gali gawicigwe baho, so wityatye we myoto ye Wayahudi yo kwizuguza.
43002007	Yesu yakawatya wetumami, “Mugamemyaje malenga manyungu gago.” Nawo wakagamemya twaa.
43002008	Hanyuma Yesu yakawatya, “Alu muneje mumo mumutegulile u muwaha wa ha wulilo.”
43002009	Nayo u muwaha wa ha wulilo, yaza kugajeza i malenga gago, kumbe gali gagaluka kuwa divayi. Nayo hamba si yamanya kono yilawile, langa wetumami wono wanega malenga, wo wali wamanyile. Holeka u muwaha wa ha wulilo, yakamucema munya Halusi,
43002010	yakamutya, “Munhu wo wose kamulaga kulavya divayi swanu, hanyuma hono wanhu weguta, ho yakulavya yono si swanu. Ninga agwe kuyiwika i swanu sunga alu.”
43002011	Aci co citanjilo cilongozi, Yesu yacinozeza ku Kana ya ku Galilaya, yakalulajila u lukumyo lwakwe, nawo wejizwa wakwe wakamwihuwila.
43002012	Hanyuma ya zizi, Yesu hamonga no nyina, ne wanduguze, ne wejizwa wakwe, wakabita ku Kapelanawumi, wakekala kuko vilo vicefu.
43002013	Sikukuu ye Wayahudi yono yicemwaga Pasaka, yikawa yasejelela, holeka Yesu yakabita ku Yelusalemi.
43002014	Yakawagana mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, iwanhu wono waguzaga zi ng'ombe, ne zingholo, ne zi nziwa, hamonga na wono wakawaga zipesa, wekaye ha zimeza zawo.
43002015	Yakanoza mukotya wa mulejehe, yakawawinga wose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, hamonga ne zingholo, ne zing'ombe zawo, yakazimwaga hasi zipesa ze wakawa zipesa, yakazibidusa zimeza zawo.
43002016	Yakawalonjela wono wagulaga zinziwa, “Viwusenyi vinhu avi bahano, mulece kuyinoza Nyumba ya Baba kuwa nha sokoni.”
43002017	Iwejizwa wakwe wakakumbucila vyono yandikwa, “Uwendo wangu so Nyumba yako, wukumbulaga.”
43002018	Baho iwawaha we Wayahudi wakamuwuza Yesu wakutya, “Alo konoza citanjiloci, cono colajila vyono agwe wina ling'ani yo kunoza zizi?”
43002019	Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Muyimwagulaje Nyumba yiyi yo Mulungu, nane noyizenga mu vilo vidatu.”
43002020	Nawo Wayahudi wakamutya, “Nyumba yiyi yazengwa mu myaka makumi mane na mutandatu, nagwe ho wuyizenje mu vilo vidatu?”
43002021	Ninga Yesu yalongaga ze Nyumba yo Mulungu u muwili wakwe mweneco.
43002022	Nayo Yesu yaza kuzuka muli wafu, ho wejizwa wakwe wakakumbucila vyono yalonga zizi, wakagehuwila Mandiko Gono Gelile, ne nghani yono Yesu yali yayilonga.
43002023	Nayo Yesu, lono yali ku Yelusalemi ku sikukuu ya Pasaka, wanhu wenji wamwihuwila, waza kuviwona ivitanjilo vyono yavinoza kuko.
43002024	Ninga Yesu si yawehuwila, hambi nha yali yawamanyile wose.
43002025	Holeka kwali kusina soko ya yunji yamulonjele zono zili muli wene, hambi nha yali yazimanyile mweneco zose zono zili mu zinhumbula zawo.
43003001	Kwali na munhu monga Muyahudi, mulongola we cipuga ce Wafalisayo, litagwa lyakwe Nikodemo.
43003002	Yuyo yamubitila Yesu mwizuwa linji ne cilo, yakamutya, “Labi, cimanyile vyono wuli mwijizi mono watumwa no Mulungu. Hambi nha hasina munhu, mono kosuma kunoza vitanjilo vinha vivi vyono wukunoza agwe, hono Mulungu yalece kuwa hamonga nayo.”
43003003	Yesu yapitula yakamutya, “Ane nghukulonjela mbeka, vyono hono munhu yalece kulelwa wupya, si kosuma kuwuwona wutemi wo Mulungu.”
43003004	Nikodemo yakamuwuza yakatya, “Alu munhu hono yaza munhu mututu, kosuma kulelwa kanyhi? Si kosuma kwinjila mu'nda yo nyina ho yalelwe lwe kejete kanyhi.”
43003005	Yesu yakamutya, “Mbeka nghukulonjela, munhu hono yalece kulelwa kwe malenga no Muhe, sikokwinjilila lukulu mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
43003006	U munhu mu muwili, kalelwaga no sogwe no nyina, ninga mu cimuhe kalelwaga no muhe.
43003007	Wulece kwizina, vyono nghulonjeye, yinojeye kulelwa wupya.
43003008	I mbeho yiputilaga no kubita kono yendile, ne lizi lyayo wukulihulika, ninga si wumanyile kwihi kono yikulawa, hamba kwihi kono yikubita. Ale, nhavivyo vyo yenha munhu mono yaleligwe ko Muhe.”
43003009	Nikodemo yakamuwuza, yakatya, “Alu zosuma kuwa wule zizo?”
43003010	Nayo Yesu yamupitula yakamutya, “Alu, nha yo gwegwe mwijizi wa Isilayeli, hamba si wuzimanyile zizo?”
43003011	Mbeka nghukulonjela, ase cilongaga zono cizimanyile, no kuhomelela zono caziwona, nanye si mukuwuvumila u wuhomelezi wetu.
43003012	Ane nimulonjelenyi za kononze, nanye si munyihuwiye, alu ho mokwihuwila nhawule, hono nimulonjelenyi za ku wulanga?
43003013	“Hasina munhu mono yabita ku wulanga, langa hono si u Mwana wo Munhu, yo yatima kulawa ku wulanga.”
43003014	“Nha vyono Musa yatumbika lizoka lye shaba ku nyika, ale nhavivyo no Mwana wo Munhu, si koleka kutumbikwa,
43003015	muli wose mono yakumwihuwila, ho yawe no wumi we cibitilila.
43003016	Ku soko u Mulungu yayenda yinze nha vivi, sunga yakamulavya Mwanagwe we ciwene, na muli wose mono yakumwihuwila, yalece kwajilila, langa yawe no wumi we cibitilila.
43003017	Hambi u Mulungu, nha si yamutuma Mwanagwe kononze, ho yayiling'anize iyinze, langa ho yayikomboze.
43003018	“Mono yamwihuwiye mwana si yakuling'anizwa, mono si yamwihuwiye, yakondya kuling'anizwa, vyono si yamwihuwiye u Mwana we ciwene wo Mulungu.
43003019	Ne ning'aniza yeneco nha yoyi, uwuzelu waza kononze, ninga wanhu wakenda wutitu si nho wuzelu, vyono metumo gawo mabi.
43003020	U munhu wo wose mono ketumaga i metumo mabi, yuyo kawusulaga wuzelu, hamba si kazaga kono wuzelu, hambi nha si yendile i metumo gakwe mabi gamanyice.
43003021	Ninga mono ketumaga ze mbeka, yo kazaga kono wuzelu, ho metumo gakwe gejele vyono getumilwa mu cihuliko co kumuhulika u Mulungu.”
43003022	Hanyuma ya zizi, Yesu hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, wakabita ku yisi ya Yudiya, yakekala nawo kuko, yakawa kubaputiza i wanhu.
43003023	Yohana nayo yabaputizaga mu Ayinoni behi na Salimu, vyono kwali na malenga menji kuko, wanhu wakamubitila, nayo yakawabaputiza. (
43003024	Hambi Yohana nha yali yakali si natajilwa mu jela.)
43003025	Wukejela wiwanganile hagati ya wejizwa wanji wa Yohana, no Muyahudi yunji, kuli ze myoto yo kwizuguza.
43003026	I wejizwa wawo wakamubitila Yohana, wakamutya, “Mwijizi, yuyulya mono mwali nayo ku nhumbi nzagwe ya Yoludani, mono wamuhomelela zakwe, alu mwene nayo yakubaputiza, ne wanhu wose wakumuziza.”
43003027	Yohana yakapitula yakatya, “Munhu si kosuma kuwa na cinji, hono yalece kupegwa no Mulungu.
43003028	Nyenye nyo weneco muli wahomelezi wa vyono nalonga, ‘Ane yo si nene Kilisito, langa natumwa ho nimulongolele u mwene.’
43003029	Bibi halusi yo wa bwana halusi, ninga mwendece wa bwana halusi, mono yemile yakuhuliciza, yakuwa na nyemo mbaha muno muno, lono yakumuhulika bwana halusi yakulonga. Ne nyemo yangu vyo yifisilizwe.
43003030	Yinojeye Mwene yalawilicile, nane ndodomhe.”
43003031	Mono yakulawa ku wulanga, yalawiliciye muli wose, nayo mono yakulawa mono'nze, yo we yinze, nayo kalongaga zinghani ze ciyinze-yinze. Ninga mono yakuza kulawa ku wulanga, yo yalawiliciye muli wose.
43003032	Zono yaziwona na zono yazihulika zo yakuzihomelela, ninga hasina mono yakuwubocela wuhomelezi wakwe.
43003033	Ninga munhu wo wose mono yakuwubocela wuhomelezi wakwe, yakukangaza vyono, Mulungu yo we mbeka.
43003034	Hambi mono yatumwa no Mulungu, nha yo kalongaga zinghani zo Mulungu, hambi u Mulungu nha yakumupela munhu yuyo Muhe wakwe wusina cipimo.
43003035	U Sogo yo munhu yamwendile Mwana, Nayo yamupelile vinhu vyose.
43003036	Mono yamwihuwiye u Mwana wo Mulungu, yena wumi we cibitilila; ninga mono si yakumuhulika u Mwana wo Mulungu, si kowa no wumi, langa wulipicizwe wo Mulungu wo kwikala muli mwene.
43004001	Wafalisayo wahulika vyono Yesu yabaputizaga no kuwatuga wejizwa wenji si nha Yohana. (
43004002	Ninga i mbeka, Yesu mweneco si yabaputizaga, langa wejizwa wakwe wo wabaputizaga du.)
43004003	Hobaho Yesu yaza kuhulika zizi, yakawuka ku Yudiya, yakawuya ku Galilaya.
43004004	Na mu wuwuye wakwe, yakakolela mu Samaliya.
43004005	Yakafika mwitumbi linji lya Samaliya lyono litezagwa Sukali, behi no mugunda wono Yakobo yali yamupela mwanagwe Yusufu.
43004006	Hanhu baho, hali ne lisima lya Yakobo. Nayo Yesu vyono yali yakataye muno so muhinzo, yakekala he 'sima. Nayo yali saa sita ne misi.
43004007	Yakaza mucekulu Musamaliya kunega malenga, Yesu yakamutya, “Wumhele ta malenga ning'we.”
43004008	(Na mwipango lilyo i wejizwa wakwe wali wabita ku mujini kugula ndigwa.)
43004009	Ninga u mucekulu yuyo Musamaliya, yakamutya, “Alu kosuma nhawule kunomba malenga, nane nili Musamaliya, nagwe wuli Muyahudi?” (Ku soko Wayahudi wali wasina wumonga ne Wasamaliya, mu vitumamilwa.)
43004010	Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Mhali wuwe wumanyile i cipegwa ca kuli Mulungu, nayo yo nani mono yakukutya, wumhele malenga ning'we, nagwe wali wumulombe, nayo yali yakupele malenga go wumi.”
43004011	U mucekulu yuyo, yakamutya, “Muwaha, agwe wusina ciya co kunejela, ne lisima nalyo yitali, alu kogasola hayi gago malenga go wumi?
43004012	Hamba alu agwe, wukwinoza wuli muwaha si nho Sogo yetu Yakobo? Mwene Yakobo yacipela ase lisima lili, nayo yakang'wa mweneco i malenga ge lisima lili, ne wanagwe, sunga ne zimitugo zakwe?”
43004013	Yesu yapitula yakamutya, “Muli wose mono yakung'wa malenga gaga, kokaluka kanyhi.
43004014	Ninga muli wose mono kong'wa malenga gono nomupela, si kokalucila lukulu. Malenga gono nomupela gowa muli mwene nha muvwilo wa malenga, gakuvwila sunga ku wumi we cibitilila.”
43004015	U mucekulu yuyo yakamutya, “Muwaha, ale wumhele malenga gago ho ndece kukaluka kanyhi, ho ndece kuza baha kanyhi kunega malenga.”
43004016	Yesu yakamutya, “Wubite wukamuceme u mulume wako wuze nayo bahano.”
43004017	U mucekulu yapitula yakamutya, “Ane sina mulume.” Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Kulonga mbeka, vyono wuteye sina mulume.
43004018	Hambi nha wali na walume wahano, sunga na mono wikaye nayo lulu, si mulume wako, baho langa kulonga mbeka.”
43004019	Nayo mucekulu yakamutya, “Muwaha, nghuwona vyono agwe wuli muwizi.
43004020	I wasetu wahembelaga mwitunda lili, ninga anye mutezaga, ku Yelusalemi ho hanojeye kumuhembela Mulungu.”
43004021	Yesu yakamutya, “Gwe yaya wunyihuwile, icipango cikuza, cono si molomuhemba u Sogo yo munhu, hamba mwi'tunda lili, kuko ku Yelusalemi.
43004022	Anye Wasamaliya, mumuhembaga ayulya mono imbeka, si mumumanyile yaye. Ninga ase langa co Wayahudi, cimumanyile yuyo mono cimuhembaga. Hambi i mhonelo nha yikulawa kuli Wayahudi.
43004023	Ninga i cipango cikuza, na lulu caza, lono wahembi we mbeka, womuhemba u Sogo yo munhu mu mbeka, mu vilungo vyo Muhe wo Mulungu. Hambi Sogo yo Munhu nha wo kasakaga i wanhu wono wakumuhemba mu nzila yiyo.
43004024	U Mulungu wo Muhe, ne wanhu wosuma kumuhemba mu mbeka, kwe vilungo vyo Muhe wakwe.”
43004025	Nayo u mucekulu yakamutya, “Manyile vyono Kilisito yakuza, na kolo yakuza mwene, kocilonjela zose.”
43004026	Yesu yakamutya, “Ane mono cikulongana nagwe, yo Nene.”
43004027	Lulo baho i wejizwa wakwe wakaza, wakezina muno kuwona yakuduwana no mucekulu. Ninga hasina hamba munhu mono yamutya, “Wukusaka cici?” Hamba, “So cici mukuduwana no mucekulu.”
43004028	Yuyo mucekulu yakayileka njilo yakwe baho, yakabita ku mujini, yakawalonjela wanhu yakutya,
43004029	“Muze mukamuwone u munhu mono yanonjeye zinghani zose zono nitumaga, alo kowa yo mwene Kilisito?”
43004030	I wanhu wakalawila mu mujini, wakamubitila Yesu.
43004031	Na mu cipango cico, i wejizwa wakwe wamunenelezaga Yesu, wakutya, “Mwijizi wulye zindigwa.”
43004032	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Ane nina ndigwa yono si muyimanyile anye.”
43004033	I wejizwa wakwe wakawa kwiwuza weneco wose wakutya, “Alo munhu kamuletela ndigwa?”
43004034	Yesu yakawatya, “I ndigwa yangu yoyi, nitume wuhile wa mono yanhuma, no kuwukondeleza u mulimo wakwe.
43004035	Anye mutezaga, Yikali myezi du, i cipango cen hwanga cowa cafika. Ninga ane nghumulonjelenyi, muyilangaje migunda, vyono yapisa, yakondya ku wududule.
43004036	Mono yakutwanga, yakubocela u musahala wakwe, nayo yakukonghola i nhwanga, ku soko yo wumi we cibitilila, mono yakuhadika na mono yakutwanga, ho wasangalalane hamonga.
43004037	Holeka nghani yiyi ya mbeka, ‘Yunji yakuhadika, yunji nayo yakutwanga.’
43004038	Ane namutumenyi, mutwanje nhwanga yono si mwayilavizya nhuguti, wanji wetuma, ninga anye mukumota vya munhuguti yawo.”
43004039	Wasamaliya wenji wa mu citumbi cico, wakamwihuwila Yesu soko ye zinghani zono yalonga yuyo mucekulu, zono yatya, “Kanonjela zinghani zose zono nitumaga.”
43004040	Wasamaliya wakamubitila Yesu, wakamulomba yekale nawo. Nayo yakekala baho vilo vyejete.
43004041	Ne wanhu wenji muno wakamwihuwila ku soko ye zinghani zakwe.
43004042	Wakamutya, yuyulya mucekulu, “Ase si cikwihuwila du ku soko yo wulonje wako, sese co weneco cihulika, na camanya mbeka vyono ayu yo Mukombozi we yinze.”
43004043	Hanyuma ya vilo vyejete, Yesu yakawuka baho, yakabita ku Galilaya.
43004044	Hambi Yesu mweneco nha yalonga calinze, vyono, “Muwizi si katugaga lilumbo mu yisi yakwe.”
43004045	Ale, yaza kufika ku Galilaya, Wagalilaya wenji wakamubocela. Ku soko nawo nhavivilya, wali wali kuko ku sikukuu yiyo ye Pasaka, wakaziwona zinghani zose zono Yesu yetuma kuko ku Yelusalemi, mu cipango ce sikukuu yiyo.
43004046	Yesu yakabita kanyhi kuko ku Kana ya ku Galilaya, i hanhu hono yagagalusiza malenga gakawa divayi. Kwali ko yuli yunji muwaha we likulu, u mwanagwe we cilume yali yatamigwe ku Kapelanawumi.
43004047	Hodu, yuyo muwaha we likulu, yaza kuhulika vyono Yesu kalawa ku Yudiya, kafika ku Galilaya, yakamubitila, yakamulomba yamuponye mwanagwe mono yali mutamwa muno muno, yali behi no kufwa.
43004048	Yesu yakamutya, “Hono mulece kuwona vitanjilo ne mapoto, si mokwihuwila ng'o.”
43004049	Yuyo u muwaha we likulu yakamutya, “Muwaha, nghukunena cibite lono mwanangu yakali si nafwa.”
43004050	Yesu yakamutya, “Wubite du, mwanago mumi.” U munhu yuyo yakehuwila zinghani za Yesu, yakawa kubita.
43004051	Na lono yali yakali mu nzila, wetumami wakwe waketang'anila nayo, wakamulonjela vyono u mwanagwe mumi.
43004052	Nayo yakawawuza ilipango lyono mwana yamulila kutuga ciba. Wakamutya, “Yigolo saa saba mu misi, mhungo ho yamulecela.”
43004053	Nayo sogwe yakamanya vyono lyali lye 'pango lilyo lyono Yesu yamulonjela, “U mwanago mumi.” Yakehuwila mwene, na wa mu nyumba yakwe wose.
43004054	Aci co citanjilo ce kejete, cono yanoza Yesu lono yalawila ku Yudiya yakubita ku Galilaya.
43005001	Hanyuma ya zizi kukawa na sikukuu ya Wayahudi, nayo Yesu yakabita ku Yelusalemi.
43005002	Kuko ku Yelusalemi, behi no mulango wono wucemwaga, “Mulango we Zingholo.” Hali ho lili yilamba, lyono ku nonga ye Cihebelaniya lyacemwaga “Betisaza.” Lyono lyali lina deha yihano.
43005003	Mumo mo waswezaga mhuga ye watamwa, wabofu, we citewe, wono wadejepe. [Wakulindila wutilibulwe we malenga,
43005004	hambi Malayika wo Muwaha, nha yatimaga hanji na hanji mwilamba, yakugatilibula malenga, no munhu wo wose mono yalongolaga kwinjila mu malenga lono gali gatilibuka, yuyo yakapona mu wutamwa wakwe.]
43005005	Ale, hali na munhu yunji baho, mono yali mutamwa myaka makumi madatu na munana.
43005006	Yesu yaza kumuwona u munhu yuyo yagonile baho, yakamanya vyono kekalaga mutamwa myaka minji, yakamuwuza, “Wukuhila Wupone?”
43005007	U mutamwa yakamupitula yakatya, “Muwaha, ane sina munhu wo kunhajila mu malenga, mu cipango cono gakutilibuka. Hambi ane hono nghusaka kwinjila, yunji yakuwa yalongola kwinjila.”
43005008	Yesu yakamutya, “Winuce, wudinghule muceka wako, wujende.”
43005009	Lo lulo munhu yakawa yapona, yakadinghula u muceka wakwe yakawa kujenda. I nghani yiyi, yetumwa mwizuwa lye Sabato.
43005010	Holeka wanji wa muli Wayahudi wakamutya mono yaponywa, “Izuwali nha Sabato, yili mwiko kudinghula u muceka wako.”
43005011	Ninga mwene yakawatya, “U munhu yuyo mono yamhonizye, yo yanonjeye, wudinghule muceka wako wujende.”
43005012	Nawo wakamuwuza, “Alo yo nani mwene mono yakulonjeye, wudinghule u muceka wako wujende?”
43005013	Ninga mwene mono yaponywa, si yali yamumanyile munhu mono yamuponyizye, hambi Yesu nha yali yawuka ihanhu baho, hambi nha hali na yipuga yiwaha lye wanhu.
43005014	Hanyuma Yesu yakamwagana mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yuyo mono yaponywa, yakamutya, “Wulanje, alu wapona, ale wulece kwituma wubi kanyhi, ho yize yilece kukwagana i yimbi yono yicizize.”
43005015	U munhu yakabita, yakawalonjela iwalongola we Wayahudi vyono yo Yesu mono yamuponyizye.
43005016	Ku soko vyono Yesu yetuma nghani yiyi mwizuwa lye Sabato, Iwayahudi wakawa kwamula kumugaza.
43005017	Ninga Yesu yakawalonjela, “Baba yakwituma milimo cibitilila, holeka nane nghwituma milimo nhavivilya.”
43005018	Ku soko ye zinghani zizo, iwalongola we Wayahudi wakacila muno kulondola nzila yo kumuwulaga Yesu, si so wuhodanje wo wulajilize we Sabato du, langa na so wulonje wono yateye Mulungu yo Sogwe, na ku soko yiyo yakwinoza sawa no Mulungu.
43005019	Yesu yakawalonjela, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, u Mwana si kosuma kwituma cinji yali wene, yadahile kwituma cicilya du cono yakuwona u Sogwe yakwituma, ku soko cicilya cono sogwe ketumaga, no mwana nayo vyo ketumaga nhavivyo.
43005020	U Sogo yo munhu yamwendile Mwanagwe, kanyhi kamulajilaga zose zono yakwituma mweneco, kanyhi komulajila ne metumo mawaha gono gacizize gaga, nanye mokwizina.
43005021	Nha vyono u Sogo yo munhu kawazukulaga i wafu no kuwapela wumi, nhavivyo nayo Mwana kawapelaga wumi awalya wono yendile.
43005022	Sogo yo munhu si yakumuling'aniza munhu wo wose, ninga u mulimo wose wo kuling'aniza, yamupela u Mwanagwe,
43005023	ho wanhu wose wamogope u Mwana, nha vyono wamogopaga u Sogo yo munhu. Mono siyakumogopa Mwana, si yakumogopa no Sogo yo munhu mono yamutuma.
43005024	“Mbeka nghumutyenyi, Mono yakuyihulika i nghani yangu, no kumwihuwila mono yanhuma, yena wumi we cibitilila. Hamba si koling'anizwa ng'o, langa yakondya kuwuka mwifwa, yenjila mu wumi.
43005025	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, i cipango cikuza, na lulu caza, i cipango cono i wafu wolihulika ilizi lyo Mwana wo Mulungu, nawo wono wolihulika wowa womi.
43005026	Nha vyono u Sogo yo munhu yo mwamulizo wo wumi, ale nhavivyo nayo yamupela Mwanagwe yawe mwamulizo wo wumi.
43005027	Kanyhi yamupeye no wulajilize wo kuling'aniza, ku soko u mwene, yo Mwana wo Munhu.
43005028	Mulece kwizina nghani ayi, hambi i cipango nha cikuza, cono wose wono wali mu vitenjelo, wolihulika ilizi lyakwe,
43005029	nawo wolawila, mu vitenjelo, nawo wono wetumaga viswanu, wozuka no kuwumipa, na awalya wono wetumaga wubi, wozuka no kuling'anizwa.
43005030	“Ane si nosuma kwitumila cinji mu wulajilize wangu no mweneco, ane nghuling'aniza nha vyono hulikaga kwa Baba, ne ning'aniza yangu ya mbeka, hamba si nyendile kwituma zo wuhile wangu no mweneco, langa vyono yendile mono yanhuma.
43005031	Hono niyihomelele no mweneco, wuhomelezi wangu si wosuma kuvumilwa vyono wa mbeka.
43005032	Ninga ho yali yunji mono kahomelelaga, ane manyile vyono, zose zono yakuhomelela muli'ne zo ze mbeka.
43005033	Anye mwawatuma wanhu kuli Yohana, nayo yakayihomelela yi mbeka.
43005034	Ane si vyono nghuwitumbila wuhomelezi wa wanhu, langa nghulonga zizi, anye ho mupone.
43005035	Yohana yali yenha tala yono yikwaka no kumulika, nanye mukawa mwiwikanize kuwusangalalila u wuzelu wuwo kwa cidaha.
43005036	Ninga ane nina wuhomelezi wangu wuwaha kuciza wa Yohana, hambi i milimo yono nghwituma, yo milimo yono yamhela Baba niyitume, nayo yo yikuhomelela vyono Baba yo yanhuma.
43005037	Nayo Baba mono yanhuma, yo yakuhomelela. Nanye mukali si nalihulika lizi lyakwe hamba nhavi, hamba kuwuwona wusu wakwe.
43005038	Hamba ne Nghani yakwe, si yikalaga mugati yenyu, vyono si mumwihuwiye yuyo mono yamutuma.
43005039	Anye musomaga Mandiko Gono Gelile mukwihwesa vyono, mugati yayo muli gago, motuga wumi we cibitilila, na kumbe gago Mandiko go gakuhomelela nene!
43005040	Hamba nhavivyo, anye si mwendile kuza kwangu ho mutuje wumi.
43005041	“U wuhile wangu, si vyono ho nhuje u lukumyo kulawa kuli wanhu.
43005042	Ninga nimumanyilenyi anye, manyile vyono u wendo wa kuli Mulungu wuli musina mu zinhumbula zenyu.
43005043	Ane niziza mu wulajilize wa Baba, ninga anye hamba si mukumbocela yaye, munhu yunji hono yazize mu wulajilize wakwe mweneco, nanye momubocela.
43005044	Mosuma wule kwihuwila, kumbe nanye ho mwendile kubocela lukumyo lono lukulawa muli nyenye nyo weneco, hamba si mukulondola lukumyo lono lukulawa kuli Mulungu mono yali wene?
43005045	Mulece kwihwesa vyono ane nomusonjezenyi kuli Baba. Yuyo Musa mono mumwitumbiye, yo komusonjezenyi kuli Baba.
43005046	Mbeka hono mwali mumwihuwile Musa, mwali munyihuwile na nene nhavivilya, hambi Musa nha yandika mu zangu.
43005047	Ninga hono si mukwihuwila azilya zono Musa yandika, alu mosuma wule kwihuwila i zinghani zangu?”
43006001	Hanyuma ya zizi, Yesu yakabita ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba lya Galilaya, (lyo lye Tibeliya).
43006002	Ne mhuga mbaha ye wanhu wakamutyatya kuko, hambi iwanhu wawo nha wali waviwona ivitanjilo vyono yanozaga vyo kuwaponya i watamwa.
43006003	Yesu yakabita mwi'tunda mucanyha, yakekala ne wejizwa wakwe.
43006004	I Pasaka, sikukuu ye Wayahudi yali yasejelela.
43006005	Nayo Yesu yaza kulanga, yakawona mhuga ye wanhu wakumuziza, yakamutya Filipo, “Alo cogula hayi ndigwa wanhu wawa walye?” (
43006006	Yalongaga zizo yakumujela Filipo, hambi nha yali yamanyile mwene yono kokwituma.)
43006007	Filipo yakamupitula yakatya, “Mikate ya dinali magana mejete, si yowakwila wanhu wawa, hamba munhu yasole cidodo munhu cidodo.”
43006008	Yumonga muyagwe ne wejizwa wakwe, mono yacemwaga Andeleya, u mwanakwawe wa Simoni Petelo, yakamutya.
43006009	“Yali bahano mudodo yumonga, mono yena mikate mihano ya shayili ne zisomba nyejete; ninga vivi vyokwila cici kuli wanhu wenji nha wawa?”
43006010	Yesu yakatya, “Muwekazaje wanhu.” Kuko kwali na mahanze menji. Ale, wanhu wakekala hasi, nawo wali waficile liwalo lyawo, wanhu walume Elufu yihano.
43006011	Baho Yesu yakayisola i mikate yiyilya, yakamulumbo Mulungu, yakawagawila wanhu wono wali wekaye, ne zisomba nhavivyo, na wose wakatuga munhu ha nghango yakwe.
43006012	I wanhu waza kwiguta, yakawalonjela i Wejizwa wakwe, “Alu mutondoleze ivibegulwa vyono visigaye, cinji cilece kwajilila.”
43006013	Wakatondoleza ivibegulwa vye mikate mihano ye shayili vyono wasigaza wanhu wono walya, wakamemya nhoto ikumi na nyejete.
43006014	Iwanhu wawo waza kuciwona citanjilo cono Yesu yanozize, wakatya, “Ayu he yo muwizi mbeka, mono yakuza kononze.”
43006015	Yesu yaza manya vyono wanhu wasakaga kumusola wamunoze yawe mutemi, yakawuka kanyhi, yakawa kubita kwi'tunda, yali wene.
43006016	Yaza kuwa cinyamihe, wejizwa wakwe wakatenenhuka sunga kwi'lamba,
43006017	wakenjila mu ngalawa, wakawa kulowoka lilamba wakubita ku Kapelanawumi. Kukawa kwatukuwala, nayo Yesu yali yakali nawaziza.
43006018	Imalenga nago gakawa kwamula kutunhuma, so mbeho mbaha yono yaputaga.
43006019	Iwejizwa lono wali wajenda kotya nha kilometa yihano lunji mutandatu, nhavi, wakamuwona Yesu yakujendela mucanyha ye malenga, yakusejelela ha ngalawa, nawo wakawa kogopa muno.
43006020	Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Yo nene, mulece kogopa.”
43006021	Wakasaka kumudinghula Yesu mu ngalawa, ninga lo lulo lulo, ingalawa yikawa yafika ku yisi nghavu; hanhu hono wabitaga.
43006022	I mitondo yaco, i mhuga ye wanhu wawalya wono wasigala ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba, wakamanya vyono hali hoyili ngalawa monga du baho, na vyono Yesu si yenjila mu ngalawa hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, langa i wejizwa wawuka wali wene,
43006023	zingalawa zinji zikalawa ku Tibeliya, zikafika behi na baho hono wanhu walila mikate mu cipango cono Muwaha yamulumbila Mulungu.
43006024	Holeka i wanhu wawo waza kumanya vyono Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wali hasina baho, wakenjila mu ngalawa, wakaza ku Kapelanawumi wakumulondola.
43006025	Iwanhu wawalya waza kumwagana Yesu ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Mwijizi, alu waza nili baha?”
43006026	Yesu yakawapitula, yakatya, “Mbeka, nghumulonjelenyi, mukunondola, si vyono mwawona vitanjilo, langa vyono mwalya imikate mukeguta.
43006027	Mulece kuyipiligalila indigwa yono yihodanjikaga, langa muyipiligalilaje indigwa yono yikalaga sunga ku wumi we cibitilila. U Mwana wo Munhu mono u Sogwe yamuwicila i citanjilo, yo komupelenyi indigwa yiyo.”
43006028	Nawo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu citende wule, ho citume u wuhile wo Mulungu?”
43006029	Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Awu wo wuhile wono u Mulungu yakuhila muwitume, mumwihuwile mono yatumwa no Mwene.”
43006030	Baho wakamutya, “Alo konoza citanjilo ci, ciciwone, nase ho cikwihuwile?”
43006031	I walezi walya i mana ku nyika, nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Yawalisa ndigwa kulawa ku wulanga.”
43006032	Yesu yakawatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono Musa yo si yamupelenyi nyenye ndigwa yiyilya yono yalawaga ku wulanga, langa Baba yo yakumupelenyi nyenye, indigwa ye mbeka yono yikulawa ku wulanga.
43006033	Hambi indigwa yo Mulungu, nha yo yulya mono yakutima kulawa ku wulanga, no kuyipela iyinze wumi.”
43006034	Nawo wakamutya, “Muwaha, wucipelaje ndigwa yiyo nhondo zose.”
43006035	Yesu yakawatya, “Ane yo nene ndigwa yo wumi. Mono yakuza kwangu, si kodabucila lukulu. Na mono yakwihuwila kuli nene, si kokalucila lukulu.”
43006036	Ninga namulonjelenyi vyono hamba yiwe mukumbona, si mukunyihuwila.
43006037	Wose wono yakumhela Baba, wokuza kwangu, nane si nomutaga kunze wo wose mono yakuza kwangu.
43006038	Hambi nha natima kulawa ku wulanga, si vyono nitume wuhile wangu, langa ho fisilize u wuhile wa mono yanhuma.
43006039	No wuhile wa mono yanhuma nha wowu, “Ndece kumwajiliza hamba yumonga muli wose wono napegwa nayo, langa niwazukule wose mwizuwa lya ku ndumo.”
43006040	Hambi cono yakusaka Baba nha coci, muli wose mono yakumuwona Mwana, no kumwihuwila, yawe no wumi we cibitilila, nane nolowazukula Mwi'zuwa lya ku ndumo.
43006041	Nawo Wayahudi wakawa kwanza kung'ung'ulika ku soko vyono yatya, “Ane yo nene i ndigwa yono yatima kulawa ku wulanga.”
43006042	Wakatya, “Mwene yuyu si yo Yesu u mwana wa Yusufu? Sunga u sogwe no nyina ciwamanyile! Alu kosuma wule kutya yatima kulawa ku wulanga?”
43006043	Yesu yapitula yakawatya, “Mulece kwing'ung'ulicila nyenye kwa nyenye.
43006044	Hasina munhu mono kosuma kuza kwangu hono Baba mono yanhuma yalece kumukwejela kuli'ne, nane nolomuzukula u munhu yuyo mwizuwa lya ku ndumo.
43006045	Yandikwa ne wawizi, ‘Iwanhu wose wokwijizwa no Mulungu.’ Muli wose mono yakumuhulika Baba, no kwiyijiza muli Mwene, yuyo yo yakuza kwangu.
43006046	Si vyono lunji hoyuli munhu mono yamuwona Baba, langa yuyo du mono yalawa kuli Mulungu, yo yamuwona Baba.
43006047	Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono, mono yakwihuwila, yena u wumi we cibitilila.
43006048	Ane yo nene indigwa yo wumi.
43006049	I walezi wenyu walizaga imana ku nyika, ninga wakafwa.
43006050	Ayi yo ndigwa yono yikutima kulawa ku wulanga, indigwa yono mono yakuyilya si kofwa.
43006051	Ane yo nene indigwa yo wumi, yono yatima kulawa ku wulanga, munhu wo wose hono yalye indigwa yiyi, kokwikala mumi cibitilila, ne ndigwa yono nomupela, wo muwili wangu wono nghuwulavya so wumi we yinze.”
43006052	Holeka Wayahudi wakawa kwanza kwiwanganila weneco wose, wakutya, “Kosuma wule yuyu kucipela u muwili wakwe cilye?”
43006053	Baho Yesu yakawatya, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, Hono mulece kulya u muwili wo Mwana wo Munhu, no kuying'wa isakami yakwe, mowa musina wumi muli nyenye.
43006054	Mono yakulya u muwili wangu no kuying'wa isakami yangu, yena wumi we cibitilila, nane nolomuzukula Mwizuwa lya ku ndumo.
43006055	Hambi u muwili wangu nha yo ndigwa ye mbeka, ne sakami yangu co cing'wegwa ce mbeka.
43006056	Mono yakuwulya u muwili wangu no kuying'wa isakami yangu, yo kekalaga mugati mwangu, nane nghwikala mugati mwakwe.
43006057	Baba u mumi yo yanhuma, nane nili mumi ku soko yo Mwene, yo nhavivyo nayo mono yakunyilya nene kowa mumi ku soko yangu.
43006058	Ayi yo ndigwa yono yatima kulawa ku wulanga, si yinhe mana yono walizaga i walezi wenyu, wakafwa. Mono yakulya ndigwa yiyo, kokwikala mumi cibitilila.”
43006059	Yesu yazilonjela zizo mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, lono yejizaga ku Kapelanawumi.
43006060	Holeka wenji wa muli wejizwa wakwe, waza kuzihulika zizo wakatya, “He, azi nghani nghamu! Nani'mbi mono kosuma kuzihulika?”
43006061	Ninga Yesu yakawamanya mweneco, hamba yunji si yamulonjela vyono wejizwa wakwe wakuying'ung'ulicila inghani yiyo, yakawawuza yakutya, “Alo inghani yiyi yikumupelenyi mahwele hongo?
43006062	Yowa wule alu, hono mumuwone u Mwana wo Munhu yakubita kuko ku wulanga kono yali ha lulongozi?
43006063	U Muhe yo kaletaga wumi, ninga munhu yali wene, sikosuma cinji. Izinghani zono nimulonjelenyi, wo Muhe wo Mulungu, kanyhi wo wumi.
43006064	Ninga hamba nhavivyo ho wali wanji wa muli nyenye wono si wehuwiye.” (Yesu yalonga nhavivyo, hambi nha yali yamanyile kulawa mwamulizo, vyono wa nani wono si wehuwiye, na kanyhi nani mono komugaluka.)
43006065	Hanyuma yakatya, “Yo yilecile nghumulonjelenyi, vyono hasina mono kosuma kuza kwangu hono yalece kupegwa wusume na Baba.
43006066	Kusoko ya zizo, wenji wa muli wejizwa wakwe Yesu, wakawuya ne nyuma, hamba si wajendanaga nayo kanyhi.”
43006067	Yesu yakawawuza wawalya we likumi na wejete, “Wulenyi nanye, mukuhila kubita?”
43006068	Simoni Petelo yakamupitula yakatya, “Muwaha, cobita kuli nani? Nha yo gwegwe mono wina zinghani zo wumi we cibitilila.
43006069	Nase cihuwiye, kanyhi cimanyile, vyono yo gwegwe Mono Welile wo Mulungu.”
43006070	Yesu yakawatya, “Alo si namuhagulenyi nyenye mo we likumi na wejete, hamba nha vivyo muyenyu monga muli nyenye yo Setani!”
43006071	Yesu yamulongaga zizo Yuda u mwana wa Simoni Musikaliyota, ku soko yali yo yuyo mono komugaluka, hamba yawe yali yumonga wa wawalya we likumi na wejete.
43007001	Hanyuma ya zizi, Yesu yajendaga mu Galilaya, hamba si yendaga kujenda mu Yudiya, vyono i walongola we Wayahudi wahilaga kumuwulaga.
43007002	Sikukuu ye Wayahudi ye vibanda, yali yasejelela.
43007003	Baho i wanduguze wakamutya, “Wuwuce bahano wubite ku Yudiya, iwejizwa wako ho wayiwone i milimo yono kwitumaga.
43007004	Hasina munhu mono ketumaga cinji cinyele, hono yakuhila yamanyice ne wanhu. Holeka vyono wukwituma zizi, ale wilajilaje ho wumanyice mu yinze yose.” (
43007005	Sunga ne wanduguze, si wamwihuwila ng'o.)
43007006	Yesu yakawalonjela yakutya, “Cidaha cangu cono cikwiliye cikali nafika. Ninga kuli 'nye cidaha co cose cikwiliye.
43007007	Sunga ne wanhu wa mononze, si wosuma kumusulenyi anye, langa ane wasulile, ku soko nghuwalonjela, vyono i metumo gawo mabi.
43007008	Anye mubite ku sikukuu yiyo, ninga ane si nghubita, kusoko i cipango cangu cono cikwiliye, nha cikali nafika.”
43007009	Yaza kuzilonga zizo, u mwene yakasigala kuko ku Galilaya.
43007010	Lono wanduguze wali wabita ku sikukuu, Yesu nayo ho yakawa kubita, ninga siyabita ciwonelela, langa yabita cinyele.
43007011	I Walongola we Wayahudi wamulondolaga mu sikukuu yiyo, wakawuza wakutya, “Alu yali hayi mwene?”
43007012	Kukawa na lupwepwe muli wanhu ku soko yakwe, wanji watezaga, “Munhu muswanu.” Wanji wakatya, “Aa, ng'o, yakuwakonga wanhu.”
43007013	Hamba nhavivyo, hasina munhu mono yejelela kumulonga ciwonelela so kuwogopa i walongola we Wayahudi.
43007014	Lono sikukuu yali yikali yijendeleye, Yesu nayo yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawa kwanza kwijiza.
43007015	I Wayahudi wakezina muno, wakatya, “Munhu yuyu yamanyile nhawule ze mandiko, nayo si yejizwa?”
43007016	Nayo Yesu yakawapitula, yakawatya, “Imejizo gono nghwijiza, si gangu yaye, langa ga yuyo mono yanhuma.
43007017	Munhu mono yendile kwituma zono u Mulungu yendile, yo komanya hono mejizo gangu galawa kuli Mulungu, hamba nene nghwilonjela mu wulajilize wangu no mweneco du.
43007018	Ninga u munhu mono yakwilonjela mu wulajilize wakwe mweneco du, yakulondola u lukumyo lwakwe mweneco, ninga mono yakulondola u lukumyo lwa mono yamutuma, yuyo yaweza mwihuwilwa, na muli mwene musina wavu wo wose.
43007019	Alu Musa si yamupelenyi Wulajilize? Hamba nhavivyo, hasina yunji muyenyu mono kawibataga u Wulajilize. Alu ku sokoci mukusaka kumbulaga?”
43007020	Iwanhu wakamupitula wakatya, “Alu mwene wina lukwale! Nani mono yakusaka kukuwulaga?”
43007021	Yesu yawapitula, yakawatya, “Hoyili nghani monga yono netuma, sunga nanye mukayizina.
43007022	Musa yakamupelenyi u moto we calamo, ninga si vyono u moto wuwo we calamo walawa kuli Musa, langa walawa kuli walezi wenyu. Nanye, hamba mwizuwa lye Sabato, muwategulaga wanhu ku calamo.
43007023	Alu hono munhu yadahile kutegulwa ku calamo na mwizuwa lye Sabato, Wulajilize wa Musa si wukusuma kuhodanjika, ku soko yiyo, alu sokoci, anye mukumbonela likuwo, vyono nimuponezye lukulu u munhu mwizuwa lye Sabato?
43007024	Mulece kuling'aniza so wulanga za munze du, langa mweze kulavya ning'aniza ye mbeka.”
43007025	Wanji wanya Yelusalemi wakatya, “Wulenyi, u munhu mono wakumulondola wamuwulaje, si yo yuyu?
43007026	Na kumbe lanje, yakuwalonga ciwonelela, hamba hasina munhu mono yakumutya cinji. Alo yisumice walongola mbeka, wowa wamumanya vyono yo mweneco Kilisito
43007027	Ninga Kilisito kolo yakuza, hasina munhu mono komanya kono yalawile, ninga munhu ayu ase cimumanyile kono yalawile!”
43007028	Holeka Yesu lono yejizaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakenula lizi lyakwe, yakatya, “Ati, mumanyile hongo, sunga na kono ndawile mukumanyile! Hamba yiwe nhavivyo, ane si neyiziza ko wulajilize wangu no mweneco, ninga u mwene mono yanhuma yo we mbeka, nanye si mumumanyile.
43007029	Ninga ane nimumanyile, hambi nha nalawa kwakwe, nayo yo yanhuma.”
43007030	Baho wanhu wakasaka kumwibata, ninga hasina hamba munhu mono yejelela kumwibata, vyono cidaha cakwe cali cikali nafika.
43007031	Wanhu wenji wa mwipuga lililya lye wanhu wakamwihuwila, wakatya, “Wulenyi ti, Kilisito kolo yakuza, konoza vitanjilo vicizize vyono yanozize yuyu?”
43007032	Iwafalisayo wakahulika iwanhu wakupwepwa zizo za Yesu. Holeka Wafalisayo, hamonga ne wakohani wawaha, wakatuma wasilikale wamwibate Yesu.
43007033	Yesu yakatya, “Nghali nili hamonga nanye cipango cidodo, hanyuma nobita kuli mwene mono yanhuma.
43007034	Monondola hamba si mombona, ku soko hono nowa, anye simosuma kuza.”
43007035	Walongola we Wayahudi wakeyitya weneco wose, “Alo kobita hayi munhu yuyu, ase ho cilece kumuwona?” Alo kobita kuli Wayahudi wono weyagalila ku Wagiliki, no kuwejiza Wagiliki?
43007036	Alo yena nhunizo ci, hono yakutya, “Monondola ninga si mombona, na hono nowa, anye si mosuma kuza?”
43007037	Mwi'zuwa lyo mumalilizo we sikukuu yiyo, lyali yizuwa yiwaha. Yesu yakema, yakalonga yenuye lizi, yakutya, “Munhu wo wose, mono yakaluce, yaze kwangu yang'we.”
43007038	Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Mono yakunyihuwila nene, i makolongo ge malenga momi, gohuluma kulawa mu nhumbula yakwe.”
43007039	(Yalonga zizo, yakulonga zo Muhe Mono wolomubocela wono wamwihuwiye mwene. Mu cipango cico u Muhe yali yakali si naza, vyono Yesu yali yakali si nakumywa.)
43007040	Wanji wa mwipuga lililya lye wanhu, wamuhulika yakulonga zinghani zizi, wakatya, “Mbeka munhu ayu yo muwizi.”
43007041	Iwanji wakatya, “Nha yo mwene Kilisito.” Ninga wanji wakatya, “Alu yosumika Kilisito yalawe ku Galilaya?”
43007042	I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya wule? Gakutya, “Kilisito kolawa mu lulelo lwa Dawudi, na kolelelwa ku Betelehemu, mu kaya ya Dawudi.”
43007043	Baho gakejela matemanuko mu mhuga ye wanhu ku soko ya Yesu.
43007044	Iwanhu wanji wasakaga kumwibata, ninga hasina mono yakajela kumwibata.
43007045	Baho iwasilikale, wakawuya kuli wakohani wawaha ne Wafalisayo, nawo wakawawuza wakutya, “Alu nhawule si mumuletile?”
43007046	Nawo Wasilikale wakawapitula wakatya, “Yakali nejela hamba nhavi, munhu mono yalonga, nha vyono yakulonga yuyu.”
43007047	Wafalisayo wakawapitula wakutya, “Alu sunga na nyenye wose mwakongwa?
43007048	Wulenyi, mumuwene hamba yunji wa muli walongola we wanhu, hamba yunji wa mu Wafalisayo mono yamwihuwiye?
43007049	Ninga ilipuga lili, si liwumanyile u Wulajilize wa Musa, yilijitwe.”
43007050	Yunji muyawo yali yo Nikodemo yuyulya mono baho halulongozi yamuziza Yesu. U mwene yakawatya,
43007051	“Wulenyi ta, u Wulajilize wetu wukuwa kumuling'aniza munhu lono yakali nahulicizwa, hamba kumanya cono yetumile?”
43007052	Nawo wakamupitula wakumutya, “Alu nagwe nhavivilya kulawa ku Galilaya? Ale wulondole, wulanje mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, nagwe kowona vyono, muwizi si kolawa ku Galilaya hamba nhavi.”
43008001	Wose wakeyagala munhu kwakwe munhu kwakwe, ninga Yesu yakabita ku kwitunda lye Mizeyituni.
43008002	Waza kwela hakali mitondo, yakaza kanyhi mu Nyumba yo Mulungu. Wanhu wose wakamuziza, nayo Yesu yakekala yakawa kuwejiza.
43008003	Iwejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wakamuleta mucekulu yunji mono yaganizwa mu wusenyha. Wakamuwika haciligati yawo.
43008004	Wakamuwuza Yesu wakutya, “Mwijizi! U mucekulu yuyu kaganizwa yakusenyha.
43008005	Na mu Wulajilize wetu, Musa yacilajiliza vyono ciwatowaje ne mabwe i wacekulu wono wenha yuyu. Alu agwe ma, wukutya wule?”
43008006	Wazilonga zinghani zizi wakumujela, ho watuje nzila yo kumusonjezeza. Ninga Yesu yakenama hasi, yakandika mu muhangha ne cidole.
43008007	Waza kucila kumuwuza, Yesu yakenuka yakawatya, “U munhu mono yasina wubi muli nyenye yo yaweze mulongozi kumugumilila libwe.”
43008008	Kanyhi yakenama yakajendelela kwandika mu muhangha ne cidole.
43008009	Waza hulika nhavivyo, wakawa kwamula kuwuka yumonga yumonga, wakamula i wakombi. Yesu yakasigala yali wene, nayo mucekulu yuyulya yakekala yemile bahalya du.
43008010	Yesu yaza kwinuka, yakamuwuza mucekulu yuyo yakutya, “Alu 'gwe yaya, iwanhu walya wali hayi? Alu hasina hamba yumonga mono kakuling'aniza?”
43008011	Nayo u mucekulu yuyo yakapitula yakatya, “Hasina hamba yumonga Muwaha!” Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Hamba na nene si nghukuling'aniza. Wubite, ninga vyono kulawa lulu, wulece kwituma kanyhi wubi.”]
43008012	Yesu lono yaduwaga ne Wafalisayo kanyhi, yakawalonjela, yakutya, “Ane yo nene wuzelu we yinze. Mono yakunhyatya nene, si kojendela lukulu mu wutitu, langa kowa no wuzelu wo wumi.”
43008013	Holeka Wafalisayo wakamutya, “Agwe wukwihomelela go mweneco, holeka wuhomelezi wako si wa mbeka.”
43008014	Yesu yapitula yakawatya, “Ninga ane hamba niyihomelele no mweneco, wuhomelezi wangu wa mbeka, hambi nha manyile kono nalawa, na kono nghubita. Ninga anye si mumanyile kono nalawa, hamba kono nghubita.
43008015	Anye mukuwa kutyatya mahweso ge cimunhu-munhu mu ning'aniza zenyu, ninga ane si nghuwa kumuling'aniza munhu.
43008016	Hamba niwe nghuling'aniza, ning'aniza yangu nha ya mbeka, hambi ane nha si nili wene, langa cina na Baba mono yanhuma.
43008017	Na mu Wulajilize wenyu yandikwa vyono, wuhomelezi wa wanhu wejete wo we mbeka.
43008018	Ane nghwiyihomelela no mweneco, na Baba mono yanhuma nayo yakuhomelela zangu.”
43008019	Baho nawo wakamutya, “U Sogo yali hayi?” Yesu yakawatya, “Anye vyono si mumanyile ane, yo yikuleka si mumumanyile na Baba. Ninga hono mwali mumanye ane, mwali mumumanye na Baba nhavivyo.”
43008020	Yesu yazilonga zinghani zizi lono yejizaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, lono yali mu cinyumba cono cali wuwiko we cisanduku ce vilavya. Hamba munhu si yamwibata, hambi i cidaha cakwe nha cali cikali si nafika.
43008021	Yesu yakawalonjela kanyhi yakatya, “Ane nghubita, anye monondola, ninga molofwa no wubi wenyu. Kono ane nghubita, anye si mosuma kuza.”
43008022	Nawo walongola we Wayahudi wakatya, “Alo kokwiwulaga?” Hambi nha yakutya, “Kono ane nghubita, anye si mosuma kuza?”
43008023	Yesu yakawatya, “Anye muli wa baha hono hasi, mono yinze yiyi, ninga ane nili wa ku wulanga, anye muli wenze yiyi, ane langa si nili wenze yiyi.”
43008024	Holeka nimulonjelenyi vyono, molofwa no wubi wenyu. Ku soko hono mulece kwihuwila du vyono “Ane yo nene.” Molofwa no wubi wenyu.
43008025	Nawo wakamuwuza wakatya, “Alo agwe yo gwegwe nani?” Yesu yakawatya, “Nha nimulonjelenyi kulawa mwamulizo!
43008026	Nina nghani nyinji zo kulonga, no kulavya ning'aniza muli'nye. Ninga mono yanhuma yo we mbeka, nane nghuwalonjela iwanhu we yinze, zinghani zizo du, zono nazihulika kuli mwene.”
43008027	Nawo hamba si wasuma kumanya, vyono Yesu yalongaga nawo muli zo Sogwe.
43008028	Holeka Yesu yakawalonjela, “Kolo mwakondya kumutumbika Mwana wo Munhu, baho ho molomanyila vyono, ‘Ane yo Nene.’ na kanyhi vyono si nghwitumila cinji co cose mu wulajilize wangu, langa nghulonga zizilya du zono nejizwa na Baba.
43008029	Nayo mono yanhuma, yali hamonga nane. Nayo si yakuwa kundeka nili wene. Hambi ane nha nitumaga nhondo zose zono zikumwendeza.”
43008030	Nayo yaza kukondya kulonga zinghani zizi, iwanhu wenji wakamwihuwila.
43008031	Yesu yakawalonjela Wayahudi wawalya wono wamwihuwila, yakatya, “Hono mwibate i mejizo gangu, mbeka mowa wejizwa wangu.
43008032	Nanye moyimanya i mbeka, nayo i mbeka yomuwicenyi welecele.”
43008033	Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Ase cili we ndelo ya Abulahamu, nase cikali si nawa wawanda wa munhu wo wose.” Alu wina sokoci yo kutya, “Mowa welecele?”
43008034	Yesu yakawapitula yakuwatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, munhu wo wose mono ketumaga wubi, yo muwanda wo wubi.
43008035	No muwanda si kekalaga mu nyumba nhondo zose, u mwana langa yo kekalaga mu nyumba nhondo zose.
43008036	Holeka u Mwana hono yamuwicenyi welecele, ho mowa welecele mbeka.
43008037	Manyile vyono muli we ndelo ya Abulahamu. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, mukusaka kumbulaga, vyono si mukuyivumila i nghani yangu.
43008038	Ane nghulonga zono nawona kwa Baba, nanye mukwituma zono mwahulika ko sogo yenyu.”
43008039	Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Abulahamu, yo sogo yetu.” Yesu yakawatya, “Mhali anye mwali muwe muli wana wa Abulahamu, mwali mwitume vyono yetumaga Abulahamu.
43008040	Ane nghumulonjelenyi imbeka yono nayihulika kuli Mulungu, hamba nhavivyo anye mukusaka kumbulaga. Abulahamu siyetuma nhavivyo.
43008041	Anye mukwituma i metumo ga galya gono wetumaga wasogo zenyu.” Nawo wakamutya, “Ase si cili wana watumulwa yaye, langa cina sogo yetu yumonga du, Mulungu.”
43008042	Yesu yakawatya, “Mhali Mulungu yo Sogo yenyu, mwali munyende ane, hambi ane nha nalawa kuli Mulungu nghaza baha. Hamba si neyiziza ko wulajilize wangu no mweneco, langa umwene yo yanhuma.
43008043	Alu ku sokoci si mukwizuka zono nghulonga? Ku soko vyono si mwendile kuyihuliciza inghani yangu.
43008044	Anye muli wana wo sogo yenyu Setani, no wusulumizi wa yuyo sogo yenyu, wo mwendile kuwituma. Mwene yali muwulaji kulawa mwamulizo, hamba si kemaga mu mbeka, vyono muli mwene, imbeka yili musina. Hono yakulonga wulambi, kalongaga i zakwe mweneco, nha vyono yenha, hambi nha mulambi, kanyhi yo sogwe yo wulambi.
43008045	Ninga ane nghulonga imbeka, holeka nanye si mukunyihuwila ng'o.
43008046	Hambi lu, nani wa muli nyenye mono kosuma kundajila zo wubi wangu? Alu hono nghulonga mbeka, nhawule si mukunyihuwila?
43008047	Wo Mulungu nha kahulikaga zinghani zo Mulungu. Ninga anye si mukuhulika, vyono anye, si muli wanhu wo Mulungu.”
43008048	Iwayahudi wakapitula wakamutya, “Alo si cikulonga mbeka vyono wuli Musamaliya, na kanyhi wina macisi?”
43008049	Yesu yakawatya, “Ane sina macisi, ninga ane, nimogopaga Baba. Ninga anye si mukunyogopa ane ng'o.
43008050	Ninga ane si niyilondolelaga lukumyo lwangu no mweneco, ko yuli yunji mono kalondolaga lukumyo lulo, nayo yo Muling'anizi.
43008051	Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, munhu hono yebate inghani yangu, si kolofwila lukulu.”
43008052	Iwayahudi wakamutya, “Alu nhondo ho camanya mbeka, vyono wina macisi.” Abulahamu yafwa, ne wawizi wafwa, nagwe wukutya vyono, “Munhu hono yebate nghani yangu si kolofwila lukulu!”
43008053	Alo agwe, wukwinoza wuli muwaha wumucizize u sogo yetu Abulahamu mono yafwa? Sunga ne wawizi nha wafwa. Alo wukwinoza nha wuli nani gwegwe?
43008054	Yesu yakawapitula, “Hono niyikumye no mweneco, ulukumyo lwangu lowa si cinji. Baba yo yakunghumya, mono nanye mumutezaga Mulungu wenyu.
43008055	Nanye hamba si mumumanyile ng'o, ane langa nimumanyile. Na hono nitye si nimumanyile, nowa mulambi nha nyenye. Ninga alu nimumanyile, ne nghani yakwe niyibataga.
43008056	U sogo yenyu Abulahamu yasecelela, vyono koliwona lizuwa lyangu, nayo yakaliwona, yakasangalala.”
43008057	Nawo Wayahudi wakamutya, “Waco 'gwe, nha wukali naficila hamba myaka makumi mahano bwete, nagwe hongo wamuwona Abulahamu?”
43008058	Yesu yakawatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono, lono Abulahamu yali yakali nalelwa, ane nali nili baho.”
43008059	Holeka wakatondola mabwe wamugumilile, ninga Yesu yakehundika, yakalawila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yakabita.
43009001	Nayo Yesu lono yapulutaga, yakamuwona munhu yunji, mono yali yali cibofu kuwulawa vyono yalelwa.
43009002	Iwejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, alu nani mono yetuma wubi, yuyu mweneco, hamba i walezi wakwe, holeka mwene yakawa kulelwa yali cibofu?”
43009003	Yesu yapitula yakatya, “Ayu si vyono yetuma wubi, hambe walezi wakwe, holeka yalelwe yali cibofu. Ninga yalelwa yali cibofu, ho vilungo vyo Mulungu vijele vikwituma muli mwene.
43009004	Yicinojeye ciwitume u mulimo wa mono yanhuma lono hakali misi, hambi i cilo nha cikuza, lono munhu si kosuma kwituma.
43009005	Lono nghali nili mono yinze, ane nili wuzelu we yinze.”
43009006	Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakafunya i mate hasi, yakavuwa lilongo ne mate, yakamubaka lilyo lilongo mu meso yuyo mubofu,
43009007	no kumutya, “Wubite wukezuguze mu cilamba ca Silowami.” (nhunizo ye litagwa lili, wo wutya “Mutumwe.”) Nayo u mubofu yakabita, yakezuguza, yakawuya yakuwona.
43009008	Holeka iwayagwe, na wono wamuwonaga katali, vyono yali muciwa na mwilombelezi, wakatya, “Si yo yuyu mono yekalaga yakwilombeleza?”
43009009	Wanji wakatya, “Yo mwene.” Ninga wanji wakatya, “Nye, ng'o. Langa vihwanile nayo.” Ninga u mwene mono yali yali cibofu, yakatya, “Nye, yo nene.”
43009010	Holeka wakamutya, “Alu meso gako gasuma wule kuwona?”
43009011	Nayo yakawatya, “U Munhu mono yakucemwa Yesu, yo yavuwile lilongo, kawa kumbaka mu meso, hanyuma kawa kunyitya, ‘Wubite ku Silowami, ukezuguze,’ Nane niwa kubita kwizuguza, niwa kuwona.”
43009012	Wakamutya, “Alu mwene yali hayi?” Nayo yakawatya, “Magu ta, ane si manyile.”
43009013	Hanyuma, wakamutegula kuli Wafalisayo yuyo munhu mono yali yali cibofu.
43009014	Ne lizuwa lilyo lyono Yesu yavuwile lilongo no kumunuguza meso yuyo munhu we cibofu, lyali lizuwa lye Sabato.
43009015	Nawo Wafalisayo wakamuwuza yuyo munhu wakutya, “Alo kusuma wule kuwona?” Nayo yakawatya, “Kambaka lilongo mu meso, gangu, niwa kwizuguza, nalu nghuwona.”
43009016	Wanji wa muli Wafalisayo, wakatya, “U munhu mono yanozize zizi, si munhu wo Mulungu yaye, ku soko si yakwibata u wulajilize we Sabato.” Ninga wanji wakatya, “Hambi u munhu mubi kosuma wule kunoza vitanjilo vyono vinha vivi?” Kukawa no witemanuce muli wene.
43009017	Wakamuwuza kanyhi munhu yuyulya mono yali yali cibofu, wakatya, “Alu agwe wukumutya wule munhu yuyo vyono yakunuguze i meso gako?” Nayo yakawatya, “U Mwene yo Muwizi.”
43009018	I walongola we Wayahudi si wehuwila vyono munhu yuyu yali yali cibofu kuwulawa wulelwe wakwe, nalu yakuwona, sunga wakawacema i walezi wakwe.
43009019	Wakawawuza wawo walezi wakwe, wakutya, “Ati, ayu yo mwana wenyu mono anye mukumutya yalelwa yali cibofu?” Alu kasuma wule kuwona?
43009020	Nawo walezi wakwe wakatya, “Heya, cimumanyile yuyu vyono yo mwana wetu, na kanyhi vyono yalelwa yali cibofu.
43009021	Ninga vyono yatujile kuwona, magu, ase si cimanyile, hamba na mono yamunuguza meso gakwe, ase si cimumanyile. Holeka mumuwuzaje mweneco nha munhu mututu, mweneco kokwilonjela.”
43009022	Ninga i walezi wakwe walonga zizi, vyono wawogopaga iwalongola we Wayahudi, hambi iwalongola wawo nha wali walagane vyono, munhu wo wose mono komuvumila vyono Yesu yo Kilisito, yawinjilwe kunze ye nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo.
43009023	Holeka ku soko yiyo, iwalezi wakwe wakatya, “Mwene nha munhu mututu, mumuwuzaje mweneco.”
43009024	Hobaho wakawa kumucema lwe kejete, yuyulya mono yali yali cibofu, wakamutya, “Lonje mbeka hali Mulungu! Ase cimanyile vyono munhu yuyu yena wubi.”
43009025	Nayo yakawapitula yakatya, “Hono yena wubi, ane si manyile. Langa ane manyile nghani monga du, vyono, nali nili cibofu, ninga alu nghuwona.”
43009026	Kanyhi wakamutya, “Alo kakutendela wule? Kakunuguza wule meso gako?
43009027	Nayo munhu yuyo, yakawatya, nha nimulonjelenyi lulu baha, nanye hamba si muhulicize, alu nhawule mukusaka muhulice kanyhi? Alo nanye mukusaka kuwa wejizwa wakwe?”
43009028	Ninga wene wakamutovula wakatya, “Agwe yo gwegwe mwijizwa wakwe, ase langa cili wejizwa wa Musa.
43009029	Ase cimanyile vyono u Mulungu yalonga na Musa, ninga ase si cimumanyile munhu yuyo kono yalawile.”
43009030	Munhu yuyo yakapitula yakawatya, “Ayi yo mbuko he, hono anye si mumumanyile kono yalawile, ninga kanuguza imeso gangu!
43009031	Cimanyile vyono Mulungu si yakuwa kuwahulika wanyo wubi, ninga munhu hono yawe kamogopaga Mulungu no kwituma zo wuhile wakwe, yuyo langa u Mulungu kamuhulikaga.
43009032	Ku wulawa ku mwamulizo we yinze, yikali si nahulikwa za munhu mono yanuguza meso, ga munhu mono yalelwa yali cibofu.
43009033	U munhu yuyu mhali si yalawile kuli Mulungu, si yali yasume kwituma cinji.”
43009034	Nawo wakamupitula wakumutya, “Waco 'gwe, nha walelelwa mu wubi wose, alu ho kosuma nhawule kucijiza ase?” Hodu wakawa kumuwinjila kunze ye nhang'anilo yo Wuhembelo.
43009035	Yesu yaza kuhulika zizo zono zijeye, yakamwagana u munhu yuyo, yakamutya, “Alu agwe, wumwihuwiye u Mwana wo Munhu?”
43009036	Nayo u munhu yuyo yakapitula yakatya, “Yo nani Muwaha, ho nimwihuwile?”
43009037	Yesu yakamutya, “Nha wukumuwona, nayo yo mwene mono yakulongana nagwe lulu baha.”
43009038	Nayo u munhu yuyo, yakatya, “Nihuwiye Muwaha.” Yakamuhemba.
43009039	Yesu yakatya, “Ane naza akuno kononze ho ndavye wuling'anize, wono si wakuwona, watuje kuwona, na wono wakuwona, wabofule.”
43009040	Iwafalisayo wanji wono wali hamonga nayo, wazihulika zinghani zizi, nawo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Hambi nase cili wabofu?”
43009041	Yesu yakawatya, “Mhali muwe wabofu, si mwali muwe no wusutye, ninga alu anye mukutya, ase cikuwona, na yiyo yo yikulajila vyono mukali mwina wusutye.”
43010001	Yesu yakatya, “Munhu wo wose mono si yakwinjilila mu mulango we libululu lye zingholo, ninga yakukolela ha wukolo wunji, yuyo muhizi, kanyhi muboci.
43010002	Langa mono yakwinjilila mu mulango, yuyo yo mudimi we zingholo.
43010003	U mulindiliza mulango we libululu, kamudigulilaga yuyo, ne zingholo zikuwa kumuhulika lizi lyakwe, nayo yakuwa kuzicema kwe matagwa zingholo zakwe, yimonga yimonga, kazitulusaga zilawile kunze.
43010004	Nayo kolo yazilavya kunze, kazilongolelaga ku mwande, nazo zingholo zimutyatyaga, hambi nha zimumanyile lizi lyakwe.
43010005	Ne zingholo zizo, si zidahile kumutyatya mujenzi, langa zomutiza, hambi nha si zimumanyile u mujenzi lizi lyakwe.”
43010006	Yesu yawalonjela i cihwanicizo cici, ninga wene hamba si watanga cono yawalonjelaga.
43010007	Holeka Yesu yakawatya kanyhi, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, Ane yo nene mulango we zingholo.
43010008	Na wose wono walongola kuza, lono ane nali nghali si naza, wawo wo wahizi, kanyhi waboci, nawo hamba ne zingholo si zawahulika.
43010009	Ane yo nene mulango, munhu hono yenjilile muli nene, kopona, kokwinjila kolawaniza, nayo kowona wudimo.
43010010	U muhizi si kazaga bwete, langa kazaga ho yahize, ho yawulaje no kongomeza. Ane naza, anye ho muwe no wumi. U wumi wono wukwilaniciye.”
43010011	Ane yo nene mudimi muswanu. U mudimi muswanu, kawusuzaga u wumi wakwe ku soko ye zingholo zakwe.
43010012	U munhu mono yakudima ku soko yo kulipwa musahala, yuyo si mudimi, hamba ne zingholo si sawo yakwe, kolo yakuwona liminzi likuza, yakuzileka zingholo, yakutiza. Nalyo liminzi likuzibata no kuziyagaza.
43010013	U mudimi mono kadimaga so musahala, katizaga no kuzileka i zingholo, vyono u mwene yakuzidima ku soko yo kulipwa musahala.
43010014	Ane yo nene u mudimi muswanu. Iwangu niwamanyile, nawo iwangu, wamanyile'ne,
43010015	nha vyono Baba yamanyile, nane vyono nimumanyile Baba. Nane nghuwulavya u wumi wangu, ku soko ye zingholo.
43010016	Hozili zingholo zangu zinji zono si zili mwi'bululu lili, yinojeye zizo nazo nizilete; Nazo zolihulika ilizi lyangu. Nazo zowa yitewa limonga no mudimi yumonga.
43010017	“Ku soko yiyo holeka Baba yanyendile, vyono nghuwulavya u wumi wangu, ho niwusole kanyhi.
43010018	Hasina munhu mono yakumboka u wumi wangu, langa nghuwulavya nene no mweneco. I vilungo vyo kuwulavizya, nina navyo, ne vilungo vyo kuwusolela kanyhi, nina navyo. Na Baba vyo yandajiliza nitume.”
43010019	Hakawa na witemanuce kanyhi muli Wayahudi so zinghani zizi.
43010020	Wenji wayawo wakatya, “Yena macisi, kanyhi yena lukwale, alo so cici mukumuhuliciza?”
43010021	Wanji wakatya, “I milonjele ayi, si ya munhu mono yena lukwale, hambi i licisi lyosuma kunuguza meso ge wabofu?”
43010022	Kuko ku Yelusalemi, kwali koyili Sikukuu yo Wusiwanule we Nyumba yo Mulungu, mu vilo vye cinyuli.
43010023	Nayo Yesu lono yajendajendaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, mwi'kumbo lya Solomona.
43010024	Iwayahudi wakamupilima, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alo kojendelela kucenyhemeka mu zinhumbula zetu sunga nili? Hono yo gwegwe Kilisito, ale wucilonjelaje cimanye.”
43010025	Yesu yakawapitula, yakawatya, “Nha nimulonjelenyi, ninga si mukwihuwila. I milimo yono nghwitumila mwitagwa lya Baba, yiyo yo yikuhomelela.
43010026	Ninga anye si mukwihuwila, vyono si muli wayagwe ne zingholo zangu.
43010027	Izingholo zangu zikuwa kulihulika ilizi lyangu, nane nizimanyile, nazo zinhyatyaga.
43010028	Nane nghuzipela wumi we cibitilila, nazo si zolokwajilila yaye, hamba hasina yunji mono kosuma kuziboka mu muwoko wangu.
43010029	Baba mono yamhela, yo Muwaha yacizize wose, na hasina munhu mono kosuma kuziwusa mu miwoko ya Baba.
43010030	Ane na Baba yo monga.”
43010031	Iwayahudi wakatondola mabwe ho wamutowanje.
43010032	Yesu yakawatya, “Nha nimulajilenyi milimo minji yono yikulawa kuli Baba, alu mulimo wa hayi muli yiyo, wono woleka munhowe ne mabwe?”
43010033	Wayahudi wakamutya, “Ase si cikukutowa ne mabwe ku soko ye milimo miswanu, langa ku soko vyono wukumutovula u Mulungu! Ku soko agwe wukwinoza nha wuli Mulungu, na kumbe agwe ho wuli munhu du.”
43010034	Yesu yakawatya, “Wule, si yandicigwe mu Wulajilize wenyu vyono u Mulungu yatya, ‘Yo nyenye milungu?’
43010035	Hono Mulungu yawatezaga milungu, wawalya wono wapegwa i nghani yakwe, holeka nase cimanyile vyono, Imandiko Gono Gelile, galongaga imbeka nhondo zose.
43010036	Alu ma, u mwene mono Baba yamuhagula, yakamutuma kononze, mukumutya yakutovula, ati vyono nheye, ‘Ane nili Mwana wo Mulungu?’
43010037	Holeka hono niwe si nghwituma i milimo ya Baba, ale mulece kunyihuwila,
43010038	ninga hono niwe nghwituma na hono si munyihuwiye nene, ale mwali muyihuwile i milimo, ho mumanye no kwizuka vyono Baba yali muli nene, nane nili muli Baba.”
43010039	Wakajela kanyhi kumwibata Yesu, ninga mwene yakawuka hali wene.
43010040	Yesu yakabita kanyhi ku nhumbi nzagwe ya Yoludani, hono Yohana yabaputizizaga, yakekala kuko.
43010041	Ne wanhu wenji wakamubitila, wakatya, “Yohana si yanoza citanjilo co cose. Ninga zose zono Yohana yalonga za muli munhu ayu, za mbeka.”
43010042	Ne wanhu wenji wa kuko wakamwihuwila.
43011001	Munhu yunji, litagwa lyakwe Lazalo munya Betaniya, yali yatamigwe. (Icitumbi ca Betaniya, ho hanhu hono wekalaga wa Malita no mwanakwawe Malyamu.
43011002	Nayo Malyamu yo yulya mono yamubaka Muwaha mafuta maswanu, kanyhi yakawa kumupata mu magulu ne zimvili zakwe. U lumbulye Lazalo yo yali yatamigwe.)
43011003	Ale wawo walumbuze wakatuma munhu kuli Yesu, wakutya, “Muwaha, mwendece wako yatamigwe!”
43011004	Ninga Yesu yaza hulika, yakatya, “Uwutamwa wuwu si womuwulaga yaye, langa wuli so lukumyo lo Mulungu, katamwa ho u Mwana wo Mulungu nayo yakumizywe muli wuwo.”
43011005	Yesu yali yawendile wa Malita, no mwanakwawe Malyamu, na Lazalo.
43011006	Yesu yaza kuhulika vyono Lazalo yatamigwe, yakajendelela kwikala baho hono yali, sunga vikapuluta vilo vyejete.
43011007	Hanyuma yakawatya iwejizwa wakwe, “Ciwuye kanyhi ku Yudiya.”
43011008	Iwejizwa wakamutya, “Mwijizi, vilo vivi du baha, lono Iwayahudi wasaka kukuwulaga na mabwe, nagwe wukusaka kuwuya kuko kanyhi?”
43011009	Yesu yakapitula yakawatya, “I vipango yikumi na vyejete vye misi, alo vili kusina? Munhu hono yajende misi, si kosuma kwikobala, hambi nha yakuwuwona u wuzelu we yinze yiyi.
43011010	Ninga munhu hono yawe kujenda ne cilo, kokwikobala, vyono wuzelu wuli musina muli mwene.”
43011011	Yesu yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakawatya, “Mwendece wetu Lazalo yagonile, ninga ane nobita nghamusinhuse.”
43011012	Iwejizwa wakwe wakamutya, “Muwaha, hono yawe yagonile kopona.”
43011013	Wene wehwesaga vyono lunji yakulonga wugone we zinhongo, kumbe Yesu yalongaga zo wufwe wa Lazalo.
43011014	Baho Yesu yakawalonjela, yakatya, “Lazalo yafwiza.
43011015	Ninga nane nghusangalala ku soko yenyu, vyono ane si nali nili kuko, nanye ho mwihuwile. Alenyi le cibite kuli mwene.”
43011016	Baho Tomaso mono yacemwaga we Matundu, yakawatya iwejizwa wayagwe, “Ale cibitenyi nase hamonga no Mwijizi, cikafwizane hamonga nayo.”
43011017	Nayo Yesu yaza kufika kuko, yakagana Lazalo yali yakondya kugona vilo vine mu citenjelo.
43011018	Icitumbi ca Betaniya cali cili behi na Yelusalemi, cihinzo ca kilometa yidatu du.
43011019	Ne Wayahudi wenji wali wafika kwa wa Malita na Malyamu, ho wawapele pole, so lifwa lyo lumbu lyawo.
43011020	Nayo Malita yaza kuhulika vyono Yesu yakuza, yakabita kumuhinjiliza, ninga Malyamu yakasigala mu nyumba.
43011021	Malita yakamutya Yesu, “Muwaha, mhali wali wuwe wuli baha, u lumbu lyangu si yali yafwe ng'o.
43011022	Ninga sunga na lulu manyile vyono yono kosaka kuli Mulungu, u Mulungu kokupela.”
43011023	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Ulumbulyo kozuka.”
43011024	Malita yakamutya, “Manyile vyono kolozuka ku wuzuce we lizuwa lya ku ndumo.”
43011025	Yesu yakamutya, “Ane nha yo nene wuzuce, no wumi. Nayo mono yanyihuwiye nene, hamba yafwe kowa mumi,
43011026	nayo mono yakali mumi, hono yawe kwikala yanyihuwiye nene, si kolofwila lukulu. Wule, wihuwiye muli zizi?”
43011027	Malita yakamutya, “Heya Muwaha! Ane nihuwiye vyono yo gwegwe Kilisito, u Mwana wo Mulungu u muza kononze.”
43011028	Malita yaza kukondya kulonga zizo, yakabita, yakamucema u mwanakwawe Malyamu, yakamulonjela cinyele, yakutya, “U mwijizi yali baha yakukucema.”
43011029	Nayo yaza kuhulika, yakenuka mbela mbela, yakamubitila Yesu. (
43011030	Yesu yali yakali si nafika mu citumbi, ninga yali yakali yali hanhu bahalya hono Malita yamwagana.)
43011031	Iwayahudi wono wali wali hamonga nayo mu nyumba, wono wamutuzaga, waza kuwona vyono Malyamu yakwinuka musunho, no kulawila kunze, wakamutyatya, watezaga 'mba lunji, yakubita ku citenjelo yakalilile kuko.
43011032	Nayo Malyamu yaza kufika hono hali ho yuli Yesu, yaza muwona, yakafugama, yakamutya, “Muwaha mhali wali wuwe wuli baha, ulumbu lyangu si yali yafwe ng'o.”
43011033	Yesu yaza kumuwona Malyamu yakulila, ne Wayahudi wono wazana nayo, nawo wakulila, lusungu lukamukola mu nhumbula, nayo yakatamika muno, yakatya,
43011034	“Alo mwamuzika hayi.” Wakamutya, “Muwaha wuze wulanje.”
43011035	Yesu yakalila mahozi gakalawa.
43011036	Iwayahudi wakatya, “Lanjenyi ta vyono yali yamwendile.”
43011037	Ninga wanji wakatya, “Munhu ayu yasuma kumunuguza meso u munhu we cibofu, alu si yali yasume kumwimila Lazalo yalece kufwa.”
43011038	Yesu yakakalala kanyhi mu nhumbula, yakafika ha citenjelo, naco citenjelo cali ca mhango, naco cali cigubicizwe ne libwe.
43011039	Yesu yakatya, “Wusenyi libwe.” Ninga Malita munghalo lumbulye mono yafwiye, yakamutya, “Muwaha, alu nha yeza kunungha, ku soko yakondya kuwa mu citenjelo vilo vine.”
43011040	Yesu yakamutya, “Alo si nghulonjela vyono hono wihuwile, kowona lukumyo lo Mulungu?”
43011041	Hodu, wakawa kuliwusa libwe. Nayo Yesu yakagalamila ku wulanga, yakatya, “Baba nghukulumba vyono agwe wukuhuliciza ane.
43011042	Nane manyile vyono wukuwa kuhuliciza ane nhondo zose. Ninga ku soko ye wanhu wono wali baha, holeka nonjile, ho nawo wehuwile, vyono yo gwegwe mono wanhuma.”
43011043	Nayo yaza kukondya kulonga zizo, yakacema kwa yizi iwaha, yakutya, “Lazalo, wulawile kononze!”
43011044	Nayo mono yali yafwiye, yakalawila kunze, akuno vyo muwopwe ne sanda mu magulu ne mawoko, no wusu wakwe wugubicizwe. Yesu yakawatya, “Mumuwopole, mumulece yabite.”
43011045	Holeka Wayahudi wenji wono wali wazize kuli Malyamu, waza kuziwona zizo zono Yesu yetumile, wakamwihuwila.
43011046	Ninga wanji wayawo wakabita kuli Wafalisayo, wakawalonjela zono Yesu yetumile.
43011047	Holeka i Wakohani wawaha, ne Wafalisayo wakekonghola hamonga, wakatya, “Alu conoza nhawule? Hambi munhu ayu nha yakunoza vitanjilo vinji muno.
43011048	Na hono cimuleceleze nhavivi, wanhu wose womwihuwila, nawo Walumi wokuza wayihodanje Nyumba yetu yo Mulungu, hamonga ne nghungugo yetu yose!”
43011049	Ninga yunji muyawo mono yakucemwa Kayafa, mono yali yo Mukohani muwaha mu mwaka wuwo, yakawatya, “Anye si mumanyile cinji hamba hadodo!”
43011050	Wulenyi, si mukuwona vyono yimunojeye munhu yumonga yafwe, ku soko ye wanhu, si nho kwajiliza likungugo lyose.
43011051	Mwene si yazilonga zizi mu mahala gakwe mweneco, langa vyono mwene yo yali Mukohani muwaha mu mwaka wuwo, yakawila vyono Yesu kolifwila likungugo lyawo.
43011052	Kanyhi hamba si likungugo lyawo du, langa ho yasume kuwakongholela hamonga iwana wo Mulungu wono wali weyagaye.
43011053	Nawo vyono walawa lizuwa lililya, i walongola we Wayahudi wakawa kulondola nzila ho wamuwulaje Yesu.
43011054	Holeka nayo Yesu si yasuma kujenda ciwonelela hamwande ye Wayahudi. Ninga yakawuka kuko, yakabita sunga ku yisi yono yili behi na ku nyika, kwitumbi lyono lyacemwaga Efalemi. Yakekala kuko hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe.
43011055	Ale, Isikukuu ye Wayahudi yo ye Pasaka, yali yeza yili behi, na wanhu wenji wakabita ku Yelusalemi, ho weyeze lono sikukuu yiyo yikali.
43011056	Nawo wakawa wakumulondola Yesu, nawo lono wali wekongholela mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, wakewuza, weneco wose, wakutya, “Alu wulenyi, sikokuza ku sikukuu ye Pasaka?”
43011057	Iwakohani wawaha hamonga ne Wafalisayo, wali walajilize vyono, hono munhu yawe yamanyile Yesu hono hoyuli, ale yawalonjelaje, ho wamwibate.
43012001	Lono vyali vikali vilo mutandatu, ho yiwe sikukuu ye Pasaka, Yesu yakaza ku Betaniya, kono yekalaga Lazalo, mono Yesu yamuzukula mu wafu.
43012002	Wakamwitumamila kuko ndigwa za cinyamihe, nayo Malita yakawa kuwetumamila. Ninga Lazalo yali muyagwe na awalya wono wali wekaye ha zindigwa hamonga na Yesu.
43012003	Nayo Malyamu yakasola supa ye mafuta maswanu, go wuguzi wukamu, yakamubaka Yesu mu magulu gakwe, yakamupata kwe zimvili zakwe. Ne nyumba yose yikamema imhunjile swanu ye mafuta.
43012004	Ninga Yuda Musikaliyota, muyagwe ne wejizwa wakwe, mono kolomugaluka, yakatya,
43012005	“Alo so cici mafuta gaga si gaguzigwe pesa dinali magana madatu, ne zipesa zizo wapegwe waciwa?”
43012006	Yalonga zizi si vyono yawakumbucilaga waciwa, langa ku soko vyono u mwene yo yali mutunza mufuko we zipesa, kanyhi yali muhizi, na kenji na kenji, yahizaga zipesa zono zatajilagwa mumo.
43012007	Ninga Yesu yakatya, “Mulece kumugaza yuyu Malyamu. Mumulekaje yambikanizize cono yena, so lizuwa lyangu lyo kuzikwa mu citenjelo.
43012008	Hambi i waciwa nha mowa mwina nawo nhondo zose. Ninga ane si mowa nane nhondo zose.”
43012009	Iwayahudi wenji, wakamanya vyono Yesu yali kuko ku Betaniya, holeka wakaza kuko, si vyono wasakaga kumuwona Yesu du, langa wasakaga wamuwone na Lazalo nhavivilya, mono Yesu yamuzukula mu wafu.
43012010	Ninga Wakohani wawaha wali walamuye vyono, wamuwulaje na Lazalo nhavivilya.
43012011	Ku soko vyono, Iwayahudi wenji, wali wawagaluka walongola wawo, no kumwihuwila Yesu, ku soko ya Lazalo.
43012012	Imitondo yaco, mhuga mbaha ye wanhu wono wali wazize ku sikukuu ye Pasaka, waza kuhulika vyono Yesu yakuza ku Yelusalemi,
43012013	ale, wakasola i manhambi ge mitende, wakalawila, wakabita kumuhinjiliza, wakazoza wakutya, “U Mulungu yalumbwe! Mumoti mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha. Mumoti mutemi wa Isilayeli.”
43012014	Nayo Yesu yaza kuyiwona inyana ye ndogowe, yakapanda mucanyha yayo, nha vyono gakutye Mandiko,
43012015	“Wulece kogopa go likaya lya Sayuni. Langa ta, u Mutemi wako yakuza. Yapandile mu nyana ye ndogowe.”
43012016	Na mwipango lilyo iwejizwa wakwe hamba si wasuma kuzitanga zizo. Ninga Yesu yaza kondya kukumywa, baho ho wakumbucilila vyono zizi zali zandikwe zo mwene, na vyo iwanhu wamutendela nhavivyo.
43012017	Ne mhuga ye wanhu, wono wali wali hamonga nayo mwi'pango lyono yamucemela Lazalo mu citenjelo, yakamuzukula mu wafu, nawo wakazilonga zizo zono zejela.
43012018	Holeka imhuga yose ye wanhu, yikamuhinjiliza, hambi nha wali wahulika vyono Yesu yali yacinoza i citanjilo cico.
43012019	Holeka Wafalisayo wakalongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Alu mwawona! Si cosuma kwituma nghani yo yose! Lanje, vyono we yinze wose wakumutyatya.”
43012020	Kwali na Wagiliki wanji muli wawo wanhu, wano wali wazize ku Yelusalemi ku wuhembi, mwipango lye Sikukuu yiyo.
43012021	Wawo wakamuziza Filipo, (munya ku Betesayida ya ku Galilaya,) wakamutya, “Muwaha, cikusaka kumuwona Yesu.”
43012022	Filipo yakabita, yakamulonjela Andeleya. Nayo Andeleya wakabitana hamonga na Filipo, wakamulonjela Yesu.
43012023	Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Icidaha co kukumizywa u Mwana wo Munhu, cakondya kufika!
43012024	Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, imhece yo wuhemba, hono yilece kugwa mu muhangha yifwe, yosigala yili wene du. Langa hono yifwe, yilelaga mana menji.
43012025	Mono yawendile wumi wakwe yo yakuwajiliza, nayo mono yawusulile wumi wakwe mono yinze yiyi, yo kolowukamisa sunga ku wumi we cibitilila.
43012026	Munhu mono yakusaka kunyitumamila, yimunojeye yanhyatye, kanyhi ho hose hono nili honili ane, baho ho kowa no mwitumami wangu. No munhu wo wose mono yakunyitumamila ane, nayo Baba komupela lilumbo.
43012027	“Alu nhumbula yangu yikugazika, wule, alu noze cici? Hamba nitye, ‘Baba wulece kucikombola icidaha cici cificile?’ Ninga yo soko yono yaleka ane nghaza, ho nicikolele i cipango cici ce magazo.
43012028	Baba wulikumyaje litagwa lyako.” Baho likaza lizi likulawa ku wulanga, likutya, “Nalikumya, kanyhi nolikumya.”
43012029	Ne lipuga lye wanhu wono wali wemile behi, nawo wakalihulika 'lizi lilyo, na wanji wayawo wakatya, “Lyali yididimo lya Mvula.” Ninga wenji wa muli wawo, wakatya, “Malayika yalonjile nayo.”
43012030	Ninga Yesu yakawalonjela yakatya, “Lizi lili, si lizize so nene, langa liza so nyenye.
43012031	Alu co cipango co kuling'anizwa iyinze yiyi, alu muwaha we yinze yiyi kotagwa kunze.
43012032	Nane kolo nghwinulwa hacanyha ye yisi, nowakwejela wanhu wose kono kwangu.”
43012033	(Yazilonga zizi yakulajila wufwe wakwe vyono kofwa.)
43012034	Holeka lipuga lye wanhu likamupitula, likatya, “Ase cahulika mu Wulajilize, vyono Kilisito kekalaga cibitilila. Alu agwe kosuma nhawule kutya, ati, ‘U Mwana wo Munhu si koleka kwinulwa?’ Alu yuyo u Mwana wo Munhu yo nani.”
43012035	Yesu yakawatya, “Cikali cidaha cidodo, u wuzelu mwina nawo. Holeka mujende lono mukali mwina wuzelu wuwo, ho citi cilece kumwaganenyi. Ku soko mono yakujenda mu citi, si yamanyile na kono yakubita.
43012036	Holeka lono mukali mwina wuzelu, muwihuwilaje wuwo wuzelu, ho muwe wana wo wuzelu.” Yesu yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakawuka, yakehundika.
43012037	Ninga hamba yawe yanoza vitanjilo vinji hali wene, si wamwihuwila ng'o.
43012038	Holeka inghani yono yalongwa no muwizi Isaya, yikafisilizwa, yono yatya: “Gwe, Muwaha, nani'mbi, mono yehuwila zono calonga? Hamba nani 'mbi mono yagubulilwa i vilungo vyo Muwaha?”
43012039	Ku soko yiyo, si wasuma kwihuwila, hambi Isaya nha yatya kanyhi:
43012040	“U Mulungu kawabofuza meso gawo, Kawapuvya i mahala gawo Ho walece kuwona ne meso Hamba walece kwizuka mu mahala gawo Hamba kumhitucila ho niwaponye.”
43012041	Isaya yazilonga zizi, vyono yaluwona ulukumyo lwa Yesu, yakalonga zo mwene.
43012042	Hamba nhavivyo, iwalongola wenji we Wayahudi, wamwihuwila Yesu. Ninga si wasuma kumuvumila ciwonelela, vyono wawogopaga Iwafalisayo, ho walece kuwawinga mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo.
43012043	Hambi wene nha wali wendile kukumywa ne wanhu si nho kukumywa no Mulungu.
43012044	Hanyuma, Yesu yakalonga na lizi iwaha, yakatya, “Munhu mono yanyihuwiye nene, si yanyihuwiye nene du, langa yamwihuwiye mono yanhuma.”
43012045	Nayo mono yakumbona nene, yakumuwona na yuyo mono yanhuma.
43012046	Ane naza, ho niwe wuzelu kononze, muli wose wono wonyihuwila, walece kwikala mu wutitu.
43012047	Na munhu hono yazihulice zono nghulonga, nayo ho yalece kuzibata, ane singhumuling'aniza, hambi ane nha si naza ho niwaling'anize wa mononze, langa niwaponye wa mononze.
43012048	Nayo mono si yakwibata zinghani zangu, yali baho mono yakumuling'aniza, Inghani yiyilya yono nalonga, yo yolomuling'aniza Mwizuwa lya ku Ndumo.
43012049	Ku soko ane si nonjile ko wulajilize wangu no mweneco, langa Baba mono yanhuma, yo yandajilize zono nolonga na zono notya.
43012050	Nane manyile vyono ililajilizo lyakwe, liletaga wumi we cibitilila, holeka ane nghulonga zizilya du, zono Baba yanonjela, zo nghulonga.
43013001	Isikukuu ye Pasaka, lono yali yikali nafika, Yesu yakamanya vyono cidaha cakwe cafika, co kuwuka mono yinze yiyi, yabite kuli Sogwe. Nayo yakawendela lukulu iwanhu wakwe, wono wali mononze sunga ko ku ndumo.
43013002	Na ha ndigwa ze cinyamihe, lono Yesu yali yekaye hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, Setani yali yakondya kumufunda Yuda Musikaliyota u mwana wa Simoni, ho yamugaluce Yesu.
43013003	Nayo Yesu yali yamanyile vyono Sogwe yamupeye vyose mu mawoko gakwe, na vyono yalawa kuli Mulungu, na kanyhi yakuwuya kuli Mulungu.
43013004	Hobaho yakalecelela kulya, yakenuka, yakawuwika hamhelo u mwenda wakwe wa mucanyha, yakasola citema yaketunga mu ciwino.
43013005	Yakawa kutajila i malenga mu ciya, yakawa kwanza kuwazuguza iwejizwa wakwe imigulu, no kuyipata ne citema cono yali yetunjile.
43013006	Yakafika hali Simoni Petelo: Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Muwaha, alo gwegwe wunzuguze magulu gangu?”
43013007	Yesu yakamulonjela, yakamutya, “Yono nghunoza alu, agwe si wuyimanyile, ninga koloyimanya hanyuma.”
43013008	Petelo yakamutya, “Agwe si ko nzuguziza lukulu imigulu yangu.” Yesu nayo yakamutya, “Hono ndece kukuzuguza, hodu, si kosuma kuwa mwijizwa wangu kanyhi.”
43013009	Simoni Petelo yakamutya, “Muwaha, nzuguzaje, ninga si migulu yangu du, langa sunga ne miwoko yangu no mutwe nhavivilya.”
43013010	Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Mono yakondya kwihovuga, si kosaka kanyhi kwihovuga, langa magulu, hambi nha yakondya kwela u muwili wose. Ale, nanye mwelile, ninga si wose.” (
43013011	Hambi nha yali yamanyile mono komugaluka, ku soko yiyo, holeka yatya, “Si mwelile wose.”)
43013012	Nayo yaza kukondya kuwazuguza imigulu, no kuvwala civwalo cakwe, yakekala kanyhi, yakawatya, “Wulenyi mwamanya vyono nimutendelenyi?
43013013	Anye mukuwa kunyitya, Mwijizi, kanyhi Muwaha, mulongaga mbeka, hambi nha yo nene.
43013014	Holeka hono ane no Muwaha, kanyhi no Mwijizi, nimuzuguzenyi imigulu yenyu, nanye cinojele muwe kwiyizuguza imigulu munhu na muyagwe.
43013015	Hambi nha nimupelenyi luzu, nanye ho muwe kunoza nha vyono nimutendelenyi nyenye.
43013016	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, u mwitumami si yamucizize u muwaha wakwe, hamba mono yatumwa, si yamucizize mono yamutumile.
43013017	Holeka hono muwe mwayimanya i mbeka yiyi, mowa wamoti hono muyitume.
43013018	“Zizi si nghumulonjelenyi wose. Niwamanyile wono nawahagula. Ninga yinojeye i Mandiko Gono Gelile gafisilizwe gono gakutya, ‘Yuyulya mono cikuhanga nayo zindigwa zangu, kapituka no kungaluka.’
43013019	Ane nghumulonjelenyi zizi, lono zikali si nawa kwijela, na kolo zikuwa, ho mwihuwile vyono Yo Nene.
43013020	Mbeka nghumutyenyi, Mono yakumubocela mono yanhuma, yakumbocela nene, nayo mono yakumbocela nene, yakumubocela mono yanhuma.”
43013021	Yesu yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakagazika muno mu nhumbula, yakawa kulonga yakatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, muyenyu yumonga, kongaluka.”
43013022	Iwejizwa wakelangalanga, hamba si wasuma kumanya mono Yesu yakumulonga.
43013023	Yumonga muyagwe ne wejizwa, mono Yesu yali yamwendile muno, yali yekaye behi na Yesu.
43013024	Simoni Petelo yakamukonyeza yuyo no muwoko, yakamutya, “Muwuzaje ta, yakulonga nani?”
