43013025	U mwijizwa yuyo, yakasejelela behi muno na Yesu, yakamuwuza yakutya, “Ati Muwaha, alo nani mwene?”
43013026	Nayo Yesu yakamupitula yakatya, “Mono nomuliliziza nhonje nimupele, yo mwene.” Nayo yaza kulilize nhonje, yakamupela Yuda, mwana wa Simoni Musikaliyota.
43013027	Nayo Yuda yaza kuyibocela inhonje yiyo, yakenjilwa na Setani. Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Yono wukwituma, ale, witume mbela.”
43013028	Hamba hasina yunji mono yali yekaye ha wulilo, mono yamanya ku sokoci, holeka Yesu yamulonjeye zizo.
43013029	Ninga ku soko vyono Yuda yo yatunzaga u mufuko we zipesa, holeka wanji wakehwesa vyono, kowa Yesu yamulonjelaga yakagule vyono vikusakwa so sikukuu, hamba lunji yamulonjelaga yalavye cinji kuli waciwa.
43013030	Nayo Yuda yaza kuyibocela nhonje yiyo, hobaho yakalawila kunze, naco cali cilo.
43013031	Yaza kuwa Yuda yalawila kunze, Yesu yakatya, “Alu u Mwana wo Munhu kakumywa, no Mulungu kakumizywa muli mweneco.
43013032	Na hono lukumyo lo Mulungu lwanzalicilwa muli mwana. Nayo Mulungu kolwanzalicila u lukumyo lo Mwana muli mweneco, nayo konoza nhavivyo kamonga.
43013033	“Wanangu, cowezana nanye hadodo vivi du. Monondola, Ninga nalu nghumulonjelenyi nha vyono nawalonjela iwalongola we Wayahudi, ‘Ane kono nghubita, anye si mosuma kuza.’
43013034	Nghumupelenyi lilajilizo yipya, mwiyendaje, nha vyono nimwendilenyi anye, nanye vyo mwiyendaje.
43013035	Hono mwiyende, iwanhu wose womanya vyono yo nyenye wejizwa wangu.”
43013036	Simoni Petelo yakamutya, “Alu Muwaha, wukubita hayi?” Yesu yakatya, “Kono nghubita alu baha, si kosuma kunhyatya, ninga kolonhyatya hanyuma langa.”
43013037	Petelo yakamutya, “Muwaha ku sokoci si nosuma kukutyatya lulu baha? Ane niwikanize hamba kufwa ku soko yako.”
43013038	Yesu yakatya, “Wule, wiwikanize mbeka kufwa ku soko yangu? Mbeka nghukulonjela Petelo, Nzogolo yowa yikali sinalila, nagwe kowa wanghana kali kadatu, wukutya vyono si wumanyile'ne.”
43014001	Yesu yakawalonjela, yakatya, “Mulece kugazika mu zinhumbula zenyu, Mumwihuwiye Mulungu, ale munyihuwile na nene.
43014002	Ku kaya ya Baba kowuli wikalo winji, mhali si nhavivyo, nali nimulonjelenyi. Alu nghubita kumuwikanizizenyi wikalo.
43014003	Na hono mbite, nghamuwikanizizenyi wikalo, nolowuya, ho nimucemelenyi kwangu, nanye ho mwikale hono ho nili ane.
43014004	Nanye muyimanyile nzila yo kubitila kuko kono nghubita.”
43014005	Tomaso yakamutya, “Muwaha, ase si cimanyile kono wukubita, alu cosuma nhawule kuyimanya yiyo nzila?”
43014006	Yesu yakamutya, “Ane nha yo nene nzila, ne mbeka, no wumi. Hasina mono kosuma kubita kuli Baba, langa sunga yakolele muli nene.
43014007	Mhali mumanye ane, ho mwali mumumanye na Baba. Alu na lulu mumumanyile, kanyhi mwakondya kumuwona.”
43014008	Filipo yakamutya, “Muwaha, wucilajile u Sogo yo munhu, nase cokwiguta.”
43014009	Yesu yakamutya, “Alo Filipo, i vilo vyose vivi vyono nikalane nanye, hongo wukali sinamanya? Mono yakondya kumbona ane, yamuwona na Baba. Alu kosuma nhawule kutya, ‘Wucilajile u Sogo yo Munhu.’
43014010	Alo si wihuwiye vyono ane nili muli Baba, nayo Baba yali muli nene? Zinghani zono nimulonjelenyi, nha singhulonga no mweneco du, langa Baba mono yekaye muli nene, yo ketumaga imetumo gakwe.
43014011	Yinojeye anye, munyihuwile vyono nghutya ane nili muli Baba, nayo Baba yali muli nene. Hamba lunji, munyihuwile so metumo geneco gono nghugetuma.
43014012	Mbeka nghumutyenyi: Mono yanyihuwiye, imetumo gono nitumaga, nayo kogetuma, kanyhi kosuma kwituma sunga ne mawaha gono gacizize gaga. Vyono ane nghubita kwa Baba.
43014013	Na yo yose yono molomba mwitagwa lyangu, nokwituma, ho Sogo yo Munhu yakumizywe muli mwanagwe.
43014014	Hono mulombe cinji mwitagwa lyangu, vyo nonoza.
43014015	“Hono munyende, mokwibata i malajilizo gangu.
43014016	Nane nomulomba Baba, nayo komupelenyi mutazi yunji, yawezane nanye myaka ne cibitilila.
43014017	U mwene yo Muhe we mbeka, mono we yinze si wosuma kumubocela, hambi nha si wosuma kumuwona, hamba kumumanya kose. Ninga anye mumumanyile, hambi nha mwikalaga nayo, nayo yali muli nyenye.
43014018	“Si nomulecenyi anye nha muli wana walekwa, ninga nomuzizenyi kanyhi.
43014019	Hakali hadodo we yinze, si wowa kumbona kanyhi, anye langa mombona, na vyono ane nili mumi, na nyenye nanye mowa womi.
43014020	Mwizuwa lilyo, anye ho molomanya vyono ane nili muli Baba, nanye muli muli nene, nane nili muli nyenye.
43014021	Mono yena malajilizo gangu no kugebata, yuyo yo yanyendile, nayo mono yanyendile kokwendwa na Baba, nane nomwenda, kanyhi nokwilajila kuli mwene.”
43014022	Yuda (yo siyulya mwana wa Musikaliyota ninga yunji) yakamutya, “Muwaha, yowa wule agwe wilajile vyono winha kuli ase, hamba si kuli we yinze?”
43014023	Yesu yakamupitula, yakamutya, “Munhu hono yanyende, yuyo kokwibata inghani yangu, na Baba komwenda, nase cokuza kuli mwene, no kwikalana nayo.
43014024	Nayo mono siyanyendile, si yakwibata zinghani zangu. Ne nghani yono mwayihulika, si yangu langa ya Baba mono yanhuma.
43014025	“Nimulonjelenyi nghani zizi, lono nghali nili hamonga nanye.
43014026	Ninga u mutazi, Muhe Mono Yelile, mono Baba komutuma mwitagwa lyangu, ko mwijizenyi zose no kumukumbucizenyi zose zono nomulonjelenyi.
43014027	“Mulamu nghumulecelenyi, mulamu wangu nghumupelenyi, si nghumupelenyi anye kotya nha vyono yinze yilavyaga. Mulece kugazika mu nhumbula, hamba mulece kwihwelela.
43014028	Mwakondya kuhulika nghumulonjelenyi, vyono, ‘Nghubita, ninga nomuwuyilenyi kanyhi.’ Mhali munyendile, mwali musangalale, vyono nghubita kwa Baba; hambi mwene nha yo Muwaha yanyhizize ane.
43014029	Na lulu nimulonjelenyi zizi, lono zikali si nawa, ho mwihuwile kolo zikwijela.
43014030	Si nomulonjelenyi muno kanyhi, hambi u muwaha we yinze yiyi nha yakuza, nayo hamba si kosuma cinji kuli'ne.
43014031	Ninga we yinze yiwanojeye wamanye vyono ane nimwendile Baba, holeka nghuzituma zose nha vyono Baba yandajiliza nitume. Inucenyi ciwuce baha.
43015001	“Ane yo nene muzabibu we mbeka, na Baba yo mulimi.
43015002	Mwene kaliwusaga muli'ne ilinhambi lyo lyose lyono si lilelaga mikalo, ne linhambi lyono lilelaga, kalidumulilaga ho licile kulela muno.
43015003	Alu anye mwakondya kwela, ku so nghani yono nimulonjelenyi.
43015004	Mwikalaje muli nene, nane nikale muli nyenye. Nhe linhambi vyono si lyosuma kulela mikalo lili wene, hono lilece kwikala mu muzabibu, na nyenye si mosuma kulela mikalo, hono mulece kwikala muli nene.
43015005	“Ane yo nene muzabibu, anye muli manhambi. Mono kekalaga muli nene, nane niwe muli mwene, yuyo yo kalelaga muno mikalo, hambi hono hasina nene, anye nha si mosuma kwituma cinji.
43015006	Munhu wo wose hono yalece kwikala muli nene, yakutagwa kunze kotya linhambi vyono walitagaga, nalyo liwa kunyala. Nawo wanhu wakuwa kulikongholeza, wakulitajila mu moto, nalyo liwa kutakamila.
43015007	Hono mwikale muli nene ne zinghani zangu hono zikale muli nyenye, ale, mulombe co cose cono mukusaka, nanye mopegwa.
43015008	Nayo Baba kakumywaga, hono mulele muno mikalo minji, nanye mowa wejizwa wangu.
43015009	Ane nimwendilenyi anye, nha vyono Baba yanyenda ane. Mwikalaje mu wendo wangu.
43015010	Hono mwibate malajilizo gangu, mokwikala mu wendo wangu, nha vyono nane nibate malajilizo ga Baba, nikaye mu wendo wakwe.
43015011	Nimulonjelenyi zizi, ho nyemo yangu yiwe muli nyenye, ne nyemo yenyu ho yikwilanicile.
43015012	Ali lye lajilizo lyangu, mwiyendaje, nha vyono ane nimwendilenyi anye.
43015013	Hasina wendo wuwaha wono wucizize u wendo wo munhu, mono yakulavya u wumi wakwe, ku soko ye wendece wakwe.
43015014	Anye muli wendece wangu, hono muzitume zono nghumulajilizenyi.
43015015	Alu anye, ane si nghumucemenyi wetumami kanyhi, ku soko u mwitumami, si yamanyile zono ketumaga u muwaha wakwe. Ninga ane nimucemenyi anye wendece wangu, ku soko vyono nimulonjelenyi zose zono nazihulika kulawa kuli Baba.
43015016	Anye si mwanyihaga ane, langa ane yo namwihajenyi nyenye, kanyhi nghawa kumuwagulenyi ho mubite mukalele mikalo, i mikalo yono yikalaga, nayo Baba ho yasume kumupelenyi co cose cono mukumulomba mwitagwa lyangu.
43015017	Ne lilajilizo lyangu, lyoli, mwiyendaje.
43015018	“Hono we yinze wamusulenyi, mweze kukumbucila vyono we yinze wamula kusula ane, lono wakali si namusulenyi anye.”
43015019	Mhali muwe muli wanhu we yinze, mhali we yinze wali wamwendenyi anye mo wanhu wawo. Ninga alu vyono si muli we yinze, nane nimwihajenyi kulawa mu yinze, holeka we yinze wakumusulenyi.
43015020	Mukumbucile inghani yono namulonjelenyi, yono natya, “U mwitumami si yamucizize u muwaha wakwe.” Hono ane wangaza, womugazenyi na nyenye nhavivyo. Na hono wawe wayibata inghani yangu, woyibata ne nghani yenyu nhavivilya.
43015021	Womutendelenyi zizi zose ku soko ye litagwa lyangu, vyono si wamumanyile mono yanhuma.
43015022	Mhali niwe si naza cilongane nawo, mhali wawe si wetumile wubi, ninga alu si wosuma kwikojela ku soko yo wubi wawo.
43015023	Mono yasulile ane, yamusulile na Baba nhavivyo.
43015024	Mhali si netuma kwawo imetumo gono yunji wo wose yakali nagetuma, mhali wawe wasina wubi. Ninga alu, waziwona zono nakondya kwituma, na vyono yinha, wakasula nene, kanyhi wakamusula na Baba nhavivilya.
43015025	Na vyo yinojeye, zizilya zono zandikwa mu Wulajilize wawo zifisilizwe, zono zikutya, “Wasula bwete.
43015026	“Kolo yakuza yuyo u Mutazi, mono nomutumilenyi kuwulawa kwa Baba, yo Muhe we mbeka, mono yakulawa kuli Baba, yuyo yo kolohomelela izangu.
43015027	Nanye mukuhomelela izangu, vyono kuwulawa mwamulizo, mwikalaga nane.
43016001	“Zizi nimulonjelenyi, ho mulece kuwuleka wihuwilo wenyu.
43016002	Wanhu wolowa kumuwinjenyi mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo. Kanyhi icidaha cikuza cono, muli wose mono kolomuwulajenyi anye, kowona nha yakumwitumamila u Mulungu.
43016003	Wolomunozezenyi nhavivyo, ku soko vyono si wamumanyile Baba, hamba na nene si wamanyile yaye.
43016004	Ninga nimulonjelenyi zizi, kolo cikuza cidaha cazo, ho mukumbucile zizo, vyono namulonjelenyi. “Si namulonjelenyi zizi ha mwamulizo, vyono nali nikaye nanye.
43016005	Ninga alu nghumubitila mono yanhuma, hamba hasina muyenyu yunji muli nyenye mono yakumbuza, ‘Alo kono wukubita kwihi?’
43016006	Ninga vyono nimulonjelenyi zizi, zinhumbula zenyu zimemile wukalale.
43016007	Ninga nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono, ho vyowa viswanu kuli nyenye hono mbite, ku soko ane hono ndece kubita, u Mutazi si komuzizenyi yaye. Ninga hono mbite, ale, nomutuma kuli nyenye.
43016008	Nayo kolo yakuza, kowakangaziza we yinze, vyono wasutizye, kuli zo wubi, na zo wiling'ano, na ze ning'aniza yo Mulungu.
43016009	Wasutizye kuli zo wubi, ku soko vyono si wanyihuwiye nene,
43016010	wasutizye kuli zo wiling'ano, ku soko vyono ane nghubita kwa baba, nanye si mowa kumbona kanyhi,
43016011	wasutizye kuli ze ning'aniza yo Mulungu, ku soko vyono muwaha we yinze yiyi yaling'anizwa yakondya.
43016012	“Nina nyinji zo kumulonjelenyi kanyhi, ninga si mosuma kuzibocela lulu.
43016013	Langa kolo yakuza, u Muhe we Mbeka, yo komutonjenyi mu mbeka yose, hambi nha si kolonga zo wulajilize wakwe, langa kolomulonjelenyi zose zono kolohulika, nayo kolonga zono zikuza.
43016014	U mwene kolonghumya nene, hambi nha kolomulonjelenyi zono kozituga kulawa kwangu.
43016015	Vyose vyono yena navyo Baba, nha vyangu, na ku soko yiyo holeka nheye, yuyo u Muhe Mono Yelile, kolomulonjelenyi zono kozituga kulawa kwangu.
43016016	“Mu cipango cidodo, si mombona hamba nhavi, na hanyuma hadodo, ho mombona kanyhi!”
43016017	Holeka, wanji wa muli wejizwa wakwe, wakanza kwiwuza weneco wose, “Alo co cici, hono yakucilonjela yakutya.” Mu cipango cidodo si mombona hamba nhavi, na hanyuma hadodo ho mombona kanyhi, na kanyhi yono yakutya, “Vyono nghubita kuli Baba.”
43016018	Wakawa wakwiwuza du, “Alo co cici, lono yakutya, Mu cipango cidodo?” Ase sicimanyile yono yakulonga.
43016019	Nayo Yesu yakamanya vyono wasakaga kumuwuza, holeka yakawatya, “Alo mukwiwuza ze nghani yiyi vyono nheye, Mu cipango cidodo si mombona hamba nhavi?” Na hanyuma hadodo ho mombona kanyhi?
43016020	Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono anye mowa kulila no kukalala, ninga we yinze, wowa kusecelela. Anye mokalala, ninga wukalale wenyu hanyuma wolowa nyemo.
43016021	U mucekulu, mwipango lyo kusawa, yakuwona wusungu, hambi cidaha cakwe co wusungu nha cafika. Ninga kolo mwana yalelwa, si yakukumbucila kanyhi u wusungu, so nyemo yo kulelwa munhu kononze.
43016022	Anye nanye mu cidaha cici, mwina wukalale, ninga nolomuwonenyi kanyhi, ne zinhumbula zenyu zolosecelela, ne nyemo yenyu, hasina mono yakumuwusizenyi.
43016023	Mwi'zuwa lilyo si molosaka cinji kuli'ne. Mbeka nghumutyenyi, hono mumulombe Baba cinji mwi'tagwa lyangu, komupelenyi.
43016024	Sunga na lulu, mukali si nalombela cinji mwi'tagwa lyangu. Lombenyi, nanye mopegwa, nyemo yenyu ho yikwilanicile.
43016025	“Zizi nimulonjelenyi mu vihwanicizo. Ninga cidaha cikuza, lono si nomulonjelenyi kanyhi mu vihwanicizo, ninga nomulonjelenyi za Baba ciwonelela.
43016026	Mwi'zuwa lilyo molombela mwi'tagwa lyangu, nane si nghumutyenyi vyono, nolomulombelenyi kuli Baba,
43016027	hambi Baba nha yamwendilenyi mweneco, vyono nanye munyendile ane, mukehuwila vyono nalawa kuli Mulungu.
43016028	Nalawilila kuli Mulungu, nghaza kononze, alu nghuyileka kanyhi yinze, nghubita kuli Baba.”
43016029	Nawo wejizwa wakwe wakatya, “Alu wukulonga ciwonelela nhondo, hamba si mu vihwanicizo.
43016030	Alu nhondo camanya he, vyono wuzimanyile zose, hamba si wukusaka munhu yakuwuze cinji, holeka cihuwiye vyono walawa kuli Mulungu.”
43016031	Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Wulenyi, alu mwehuwila nhondo?
43016032	Lanjenyi ta, cidaha cikuza, sunga na lulu caza, hono mokwiyagalila munhu kwakwe, munhu kwakwe, na mondeka nene nili wene. Ninga kumbe hamba si nili wene ng'o, hambi nha cina na Baba.
43016033	Nimulonjelenyi zizi, ho muwe no mulamu, mu wilunze wenyu na nene. Mononze heya, motuga wugaye, ninga mwisindamice! Ane niwasumile we yinze.”
43017001	Yesu yaza kukondya kulonga zizo, yakagalamila kucanyha ku wulanga yakatya, “Baba icidaha cafika! Ale wumukumyaje mwanago, nayo mwanago ho yakukumye.”
43017002	Hambi nha wamupela wulajilize muli wanhu wose, ho yawapele u wumi we cibitilila wawo wose wono wamupela.
43017003	Na awuno, nha wo wumi we cibitilila, “Wakumanye gwegwe, u Mulungu we ciwene, we mbeka, no kumumanya Yesu Kilisito mono wamutuma.”
43017004	Ane nakukumya kono'nze, nakondya kuwumaliliza u mulimo wono wamhela nitume.
43017005	Alu nhondo Baba, wunghumizyaje hali gwegwe ko lukumyo lululya lono nali nina nalo, lono yinze yali yikali hamba nawumbwa.
43017006	“Nane nghunoza agwe, wumanyice kuli wanhu wono wamhela kononze. Wali wanhu wako, nagwe wukamhela wawe wangu, nawo wayikamise inghani yako.
43017007	Alu wamanya vyono, vyose vyono wamhela, vikulawa kwako.
43017008	Ane nakondya kuwapela inghani yako yono wamhela, nawo wayibocela, nawo wamanya vyono mbeka nalawa kwako, nawo wehuwiye vyono gwegwe wanhuma.
43017009	“Ane nghuwalombela wawa, si nghuwalombela we yinze, langa wono wamhela, hambi nha wako.
43017010	Na vyose vyono nina navyo nha vyako, ne vyako nha vyangu. No lukumyo lwangu, lukwijelela muli wawo wono wamhela.
43017011	Nane nghuza kwako luno, si nili mono yinze kanyhi. Ninga iwene wali mononze. Baba Mono Welile, wuwakamisizaje mwitagwa lyako lyono wamhela, nghukunena wuwakamisaje, ho wawe nha yumonga, nha vyono ase nase cili yumonga.
43017012	Lono nali nina nawo, nawakamisiza mwitagwa lyako lyono wamhela. Ane nawacitila, hamba yunji muyawo si yajilila, langa u mwana wo wajilile, imandiko ho gafisilizwe.
43017013	Alu ninga nghuza kwako, na zizi nghulonjela mononze, ho wasume kuhanga mu nyemo yangu, mu wukwilanicile.
43017014	Ane niwapela inghani yako, nawo we yinze wakawasula, hambi wene nha si we yinze, nha vyono ane nane si nili we yinze.
43017015	Si nghulomba wuwawuse mononze, langa wuwacitile kuli ayulya u Mubi.
43017016	Wene si wa mononze, nha vyono nane si nili we yinze.
43017017	Wuwasiwanulile mu mbeka, inghani yako yo mbeka.
43017018	Nha vyono agwe wanhuma ane kononze, nhavivyo na nene nane, niwatuma kononze.
43017019	Na ku soko yawo, nane holeka nghwisiwanula no mweneco, nawo ho wasiwanulilwe mu mbeka.
43017020	“Hamba si nghuwalombela wawa du, langa nghuwalombela wose wono wonyihuwila ku soko ye zinghani zawo.
43017021	Nghuwalombela wose ho wawe cinhu cimonga. Baba, nghulomba wawe muli sese, nha vyono cinha nagwe, Baba, agwe wuli muli nene, nane nili muli gwegwe. Nghulomba wawe cinhu cimonga, we yinze ho wehuwile vyono yo gwegwe mono wanhuma.
43017022	Nane niwapela u lukumyo lono wamhela, ho wawe cinhu cimonga, nha vyono ase cili yumonga,
43017023	ane niwe muli wene, nagwe wuwe muli nene, nghulomba ho wakwilanicizwe no kuwa cinhu cimonga, we yinze ho wamanye vyono yo gwegwe wanhuma, na vyono wukawenda wene nha vyono wunyendile ane.
43017024	“Baba, wono wamhela, nghuhila, wawe hono ho nili nene, ho waluwone ulukumyo lwangu lono wamhela, hambi nha wanyenda ane hamba lono yinze yali yikali nawumbwa.
43017025	Gwe, Baba we ling'ani, we yize si wakumanya, ane langa nakumanya, na wawa, wamanya vyono yo gwegwe mono wanhuma.
43017026	Nghunoza ho wumanyice kuli wene, nane nojendelela kunoza nhavivyo, ho wendo wono wanyendela ane, wuweze muli wene, na nene niwe muli wene.”
43018001	Yesu yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakalawila hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, wakabita ku nhumbi nzagwe ye cikolongo ca Kediloni. Ne hanhu baho hali ho yili busitani, nayo Yesu yakenjila mumo hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe.
43018002	Nayo Yuda mono yamugaluka Yesu, yali yahamanyile ihanhu baho, hambi Yesu nha yabitaga kuko kali kenji, yena ne wejizwa wakwe.
43018003	Baho Yuda yakasola mhuga ye Wasilikale, ne wawaha we Nyumba yo Mulungu, wono walawa kuli Wakohani wawaha ne Wafalisayo, yakabitana nawo kuko ku busitani, wena ne zitala hamonga ne vitwalo.
43018004	Ninga Yesu vyono yali yamanyile na katali, zose zono sizoleka kumwagana, yakalawila, yakawatya, “Alo mukumulondola nani?”
43018005	Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Cikumulondola Yesu wa Nazaleti.” Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Ane yo Nene.” Nayo Yuda mono yamugaluka, yali yemile baho hamonga nawo.
43018006	Baho Yesu yaza kuwatya, “Ane yo Nene.” Wakawuya ne nyuma wakagwa hasi.
43018007	Yesu yakawawuza kanyhi, yakatya, “Alo mukumulondola nani?” Nawo wakamutya, “Yesu wa Nazaleti.”
43018008	Yesu yakawatya, “Nha nimulonjelenyi nitya, ‘Ane yo nene.’ Holeka hono mukunondola nene, ale muwalece awa wabite.” (
43018009	Yazilonga zinghani zizo, ho yifisilizwe inghani yono yayilonga, yono yatya, “Muli wawa wono wamhela, si najiliza hamba yumonga.”)
43018010	Simoni Petelo vyono yali yena mumaje, yakawukwega, yakamubuha umwitumami wo Mukohani muwaha, ilikutu lyo kulume likawuka. Ne litagwa lyo mwitumami yuyo, lyali Maliko.
43018011	Yesu yakamutya Petelo, “Gomole umumaje hanhu hayo. Alo ndece kung'wa i cikombe co wusungu, cono yamheye Baba?”
43018012	Icipuga cicilya ce Wasilikale, hamonga no muwaha wawo, hamonga ne walongola we Wayahudi, wakamwibata Yesu, wakamuwopa, wakamula kumutegula kuli Anasi.
43018013	Anasi yali mukwewe wa Kayafa mono yali mukohani muwaha mu mwaka wuwo.
43018014	Yo Kayafa yuyo mono yawapela ilihweso Iwayahudi, vyono, yinojeye munhu yumonga yafwe ku soko ye wanhu.
43018015	Simoni Petelo, hamonga no mwijizwa yunji, wakamutyatya Yesu. Na yuyo u mwijizwa yunji, yali yamanyice kuli Mukohani muwaha. Holeka yakasuma kwinjila hamonga na Yesu mwikumbo lyo Mukohani muwaha.
43018016	Ninga Petelo yali yemile ha mulango hanze. Nayo u mwijizwa yuyo mono yali yamanyice kuli Mukohani muwaha, yakalawila kunze, vikalongana no mwana we cicekulu u mulindiliza mulango, yakamwinjiza Petelo kugati.
43018017	Nayo u muhinza mulindiliza mulango, yakamuwuza Petelo yakatya, “Wule, nagwe si wuli muyagwe ne wejizwa wo munhu yuyu?” Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Yo si nene.”
43018018	Iwetumami hamonga ne walongola, ku soko vyono yali mbeho lulo, wakawa wapembile moto wakota. Nayo Petelo yali yemile behi nawo, nayo yakota moto.
43018019	Nayo Mukohani muwaha yakawa kumuwuza Yesu ze wejizwa wakwe, na ze mejizo gakwe.
43018020	Nayo Yesu yakamupitula yakutya, “Ane nali walonjelaga wanhu wose nhondo zose cagalanze. Nane nali kwijiza hanji na hanji mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo, sunga na mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ihanhu hono wekongholelaga Wayahudi wose, hamba nghali si nalonga cinji co cose cinyele.
43018021	Alu nhawule wukumbuza ane? Wuwawuzaje wawo wono wahulikaga, zono nawalonjelaga. Wene wamanyile zono nalonga.”
43018022	Nayo yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, hobaho umwitumami yunji mono yali yemile baho, yakamutowa Yesu na kofi, akuno yakutya, “Alu nhavivi vyo wukumupitula u Mukohani muwaha hongo?”
43018023	Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Alu hono niwe nonga vibi, wulonje i vibi vivyo vyo vya hayi, na hono niwe nonga viswanu, socici wukunhowa?”
43018024	Baho, Anasi yakamutegula Yesu muwope kuli Kayafa Mukohani muwaha.
43018025	Simoni Petelo yali yali baho yakota moto. Wakamuwuza wakatya, “Nagwe si wuli muyagwe ne wejizwa wakwe?” Mwene Petelo yakakana yakatya, “Yo si nene.”
43018026	Muyawo yumonga, u mwitumami wo Mukohani muwaha, u nduguye wa mono yabuhwa ilikutu na Petelo, yakatya, “Ane ma, si nakuwona gwegwe mu busitani wuli hamonga na Yesu?”
43018027	Petelo yakakana kanyhi, na lulo baho du, nayo nzogolo yikawa kulila.
43018028	Ale, waza kwela hakali mitondo muno muno, wakamusola Yesu kulawa kwa Kayafa, wakamutegula kwi'kulu. Ninga wene i walongola we Wayahudi, vyono wahilaga kuyilya Pasaka, si wenjila mwi'kulu mugati, ho walece kwavufywa.
43018029	Holeka Pilato yakawalawila kunze, yakawatya, “Alo mwina nghanici yono mukumusonjezeza u munhu yuyu?”
43018030	Nawo wakamupitula wakamutya, “Mhali yuyu si mutenda vibi, si cali cimulete kwako.”
43018031	Pilato yakawatya, “Ale mumusolaje nyenye, mukamuling'anizize mu Wulajilize wenyu.” Nawo Wayahudi wakamutya, “Ase cisina u Wulajilize wo kumuwulaga munhu wo wose.” (
43018032	Yikawa nha vivyo, ho yifisilizwe inghani ya Yesu yono yalonga, lono yalajilaga vyono zowa zo wufwe wakwe wono kofwa.)
43018033	Holeka Pilato yakenjila kanyhi mwi'kulu mugati, yakamucema Yesu yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Ati, yo gwegwe mutemi we Wayahudi?”
43018034	Yesu yakapitula yakutya, “Mwene nghani zizi zako du gwegwe, hamba wanji wakulonjela zinghani zangu?”
43018035	Pilato yakapitula yakatya, “Hambi ane nili Muyahudi?” Iwayahudi wayago hamonga ne Wakohani wawaha, wo wakuletile kono kwangu. Alu agwe wanoza cici?
43018036	Yesu yakamupitula yakatya, “Wutemi wangu si we yinze yiyi. Wutemi wangu mhali wuwe we yinze yiyi, mhali vilewane ne wetumami wangu, ho ndece kulavywa kuli Wayahudi, alu ninga wutemi wangu si wa kononze ng'o.”
43018037	Baho Pilato yakamutya, “Alu agwe wuli mutemi hongo?” Yesu yakapitula, “Kulonga heya, vyono ane nili mutemi. Ane nha nalelwa ku soko yiyo, na kanyhi ku soko yiyo nghaza kononze, ho niwalonjele wanhu muli ze mbeka. No munhu wo wose mono yali mu mbeka, yuyo kahulikaga.”
43018038	Pilato yakamutya Yesu, “Alo yiyo imbeka co cici?”
43018039	Ninga nha vyono muzoweye ane nimuwopolelenyi mufungwa yumonga mu cipango ce Pasaka. Alu mukusaka nimuwopolelenyi u Mutemi we Wayahudi?
43018040	Baho wakazoza kanyhi wakutya, “Ng'o si yuyo, langa Balaba.” Nayo Balaba yali muhizi na muwulaji.
43019001	Hodu, Pilato yakawatya Wasilikale wamusole Yesu, wamukune ne viboko.
43019002	Nawo Wasilikale wakanoza cipombelo ce mamivya, wakamuvwika Yesu mu mutwe, wakamuvwika ne kanzo ye liwala lyo lugandu.
43019003	Wakawa kumuziza hamwande yakwe, wakutya, “Lamucenyi, Mutemi we Wayahudi! Wakamutowa makofi.”
43019004	Pilato yakalawila kanyhi kunze, yakawatya, “Lanjenyi ta, ane nimuleta kunze kono kwenyu, ho mumanye vyono ane singhuwona lisutya muli mwene.”
43019005	Baho Yesu yakalawila kunze akuno yavwalile cipombelo ce mamivya, hamonga ne kanzo ye liwala lyo lugandu. Pilato yakawatya, “Lanjenyi ta! U munhu mweneco yo ayu.”
43019006	Nawo Wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wanyamhala waza kumuwona Yesu, wakawa kuzoza, wakutya “Mumutumbice mu Musalaba, Mumutumbice mu Musalaba si.” Pilato yakawatya, “Ale, mumusolaje nyenye le, mukamutumbice mu Musalaba, ninga ane singhuwona lisutya muli mwene.”
43019007	Wayahudi wakamupitula wakatya, “Ase cina u Wulajilize, na lono cikuwutyatya wulajilize wuwo, ayu yimunojeye yafwe. Ku soko vyono yenoza Mwana wo Mulungu.”
43019008	Nayo Pilato yaza kuyihulika inghani yiyi, yakacila kogopa.
43019009	Yakenjila kanyhi mwikulu mugati, yakamutya Yesu “Alo kulawa hayi? Ninga Yesu si yamupitula cinji.”
43019010	Baho Pilato yakamutya, “Hongo si wukumhitula? Siwumanyile vyono ane nina wulajilize wo kukuwopolela, no wulajilize wo kukutumbicila?”
43019011	Yesu yakamupitula yakatya, “Si wali wuwe no wulajilize wo wose kuli nene hamba hadodo, hono wali wulece kupegwa no Mulungu. Ku soko yiyo, yuyo mono yandavizye kuli gwegwe, kacila kuwa no wubi.”
43019012	Na so nghani yiyo, Pilato yakawa kulondola londola nzila ho yamuwopolele Yesu, ninga Iwayahudi wakazoza wakutya, “Hono wumuwopolele munhu yuyu, agwe si wumwendile Kayisali, muli wose mono kenozaga Mutemi, yo kamubezaga Kayisali!”
43019013	Pilato yaza hulika nghani zizi, yakamuleta Yesu kunze, yakekala mwigoda lyo wuling'anizi, ihanhu hono hatezagwa “Deha ye mabwe,” (na ku Cihebelaniya, “Gabata.”)
43019014	Nayo yali nha misi mugati, mwizuwa lyo wuwikanize we Pasaka. Pilato yakawatya Wayahudi, “Lanjenyi, Mutemi wenyu!”
43019015	Ninga wene wakazoza wakutya, “Muwulagaje, Muwulagaje, wumutumbice mu Musalaba si.” Pilato yakawatya, “Alo nimutumbice Mutemi wenyu?” Nawo Wakohani wawaha wakapitula, “Ase cisina mutemi yunji, langa Kayisali du.”
43019016	Hodu, hobaho Pilato yakawa kuwakombolela Yesu mu miwoko yawo yatumbikwe. Hobaho wakawa kumusola Yesu.
43019017	Nayo Yesu yakalawila akuno yedinghuliye u Musalaba wakwe, sunga hanhu hono hatezagwa, “Ha cipala,” (ku Cihebelaniya, hatezagwa, “Goligota.”)
43019018	Baho ho wamutumbicila yena na wanji wejete, yunji ku muwoko wo kulume, na yunji ku muwoko wo kucekulu, mwene Yesu haciligati.
43019019	Pilato yakandika mandiko, yakagawicila mu musalaba. Nago gali gandicigwe nhavi, “Yesu wa Nazaleti u Mutemi we Wayahudi.”
43019020	Ne Wayahudi wenji, wakagasoma Mandiko gago, hambi ihanhu baho hono yatumbicilwa Yesu, nha hali behi ne likaya. Ne mandiko gago gali gandicigwe mu nonga ye Cihebelaniya, na ye Kilatini na ye Cigiliki.
43019021	Baho iWakohani wawaha wakamutya Pilato, “Wulece kwandika u Mutemi we Wayahudi.” langa mweneco vyono yateye, “Yo nene Mutemi we Wayahudi.”
43019022	Pilato yakapitula yakatya, “Vyono nakondya kwandika, hodu nandika du.”
43019023	Iwasilikale, waza kukondya kumutumbika Yesu, wakayisola myenda yakwe, wakayipanga mafungu mane, musilikale ne 'fungu lyakwe. Wakayisola ne kanzo yakwe. Nayo kanzo yiyo, yali nunzizwe lukulu yisina luhono.
43019024	Holeka wakeyitya, “Cilece kuyidemula, langa ciyitowelaje kula, ho yejele mono koyisola.” Ne nghani yiyo yikanozwa nhavivyo, ho gafisilizwe mandiko gono gakutya, “Wakegawila myenda yangu Ne kanzo yangu wakayitowela kula.” Ale, nhavivyo, vyo wanoza wasilikale wawo.
43019025	Behi no musalaba wa Yesu, wali wemile u nyina wa Yesu, no mwanakwawe wo nyina, Malyamu u mugolece wa Kileyopa, na Malyamu Magadalena.
43019026	Holeka Yesu yaza kumuwona u nyina, hamonga no mwijizwa mono yali yamwendile, yemile behi no nyina, baho yakamutya nyina, “Yaya, wulanje ta, yuyo yo Mwanago!”
43019027	Hanyuma yakamulonjela nayo yuyulya mwijizwa, “Wulanje ta, yuyo yo nyina yako!” Na vyono yalawa lululya, u mwijizwa yakamusola, vikawa kwikalana nayo mu kaya yakwe.
43019028	Hanyuma Yesu, vyono yali yamanyile vyono zose zamalika, imandiko ho gafisilizwe, yakatya, “Nakaluka.”
43019029	Baho hali hoyili bakuli yono yali yimemile siki. Wakazabika sifongo mugati ya yiyo siki, wakayidobeceza mu lusito lwa ezobu, wakamung'wesa.
43019030	Nayo Yesu yaza kukondya kuyibocela yiyo siki, yakatya, “Yimalika” hodu yakenamya mutwe wakwe, yakawa kufwa.
43019031	Nawo Wayahudi, vyono lyali izuwa lye Ijumaa, lizuwa lyo wuwikanize. Ho miwili yilece kwikala mu musalaba mwi'zuwa lye Sabato, vyono lizuwa lilyo lye Sabato lyali izuwa yiwaha, Iwayahudi wakamulomba Pilato, imigulu ya wawo wono watumbikwa, yibenwe, ne miwili yawo yiwuswe.
43019032	Iwasilikale wakaza, wakamubena magulu, u mulongozi, na we kejete, wono watumbikanwa na Yesu.
43019033	Ninga waza kuza hali Yesu, wakawona vyono yakondya kufwa, holeka si wamubena migulu.
43019034	Ninga musilikale yunji muyawo, yakamucinya Yesu no mugoha ha lubavu, hobaho isakami ne malenga vikalawila. (
43019035	Nayo mono yaziwona zizi, yazilonga, nanye ho mwihuwile. Na zizo zono yalonga, za mbeka, nayo yamanyile vyono yakulonga za mbeka.)
43019036	Ne nghani yiyo yetumwa ho gafisilizwe i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “Hasina yifupa lyakwe hamba limonga lyono lyolobenwa.”
43019037	Kanyhi na hanji mandiko gakutya, “Wolomulanga mono wamucinya.”
43019038	Zaza kukondya zizi, Yusufu wa Alimataya, yuyo yakamulomba Pilato, yawusole u muwili wa Yesu. (Nayo Yusufu yali mwijizwa wa Yesu, ninga kwa cinyele, hambi nha yawogopaga i walongola we Wayahudi.) Nayo Pilato yakalumba. Holeka Yusufu yakaza, yakawusola u muwili wa Yesu.
43019039	Nikodemo nayo yakaza, yo yuyulya mono ha mwamulizo yamuziza Yesu ne cilo. Nayo yakaleta vihanza hanzwe vye manemane na wudi, kotya nha kilo makumi madatu.
43019040	Wakawusola u muwili wa Yesu, wakawuvunjiliza mu myenda ya bafuta, hamonga na vye mhunjile, nha vyono Wayahudi wazoweye kunoza mu maziko gawo.
43019041	Baho hanhu hono Yesu yatumbicilwa, hali ho yili busitani, na mu busitani yiyo, mwali na citenjelo cipya, cono hamba munhu yali yakali si nazikwa mumo.
43019042	Alu, ku soko yo wipiganze we Wayahudi wo wiwikanize so Sabato, na vyono kanyhi icitenjelo cico cali cili behi, wakamuzika Yesu mumo.
43020001	Mwizuwa lye jumapili, hakali mitondo muno muno, lono kwali kukali kutitu titu, Malyamu Magadalena yakabita ku citenjelo, nayo yakawona libwe yiwuse mu mulango we citenjelo.
43020002	Nayo yakawa kubita lumangho sunga kwa Simoni Petelo, no mwijizwa muyagwe mono yali yendigwe na Yesu, yakawatya, “Wamuwusa Muwaha mu citenjelo, hamba si cimanyile hono wamuwicile.”
43020003	Petelo hamonga na yuyulya mwijizwa muyagwe, wakalawila, wakabita ku citenjelo.
43020004	Wabita lumangho wose vyono wejete, ninga u mwijizwa we kejete, yakamutiga Petelo, yakalongola kufika ku citenjelo.
43020005	Nayo yaza kwinama no kusunjilila mugati ye citenjelo, yakawona sanda du, ninga si yenjila mu citenjelo mugati.
43020006	Nayo Simoni Petelo yakaza, yakumutyatya mu nyuma, yakenjila mu citenjelo mugati, nayo yakayiwona sanda hamonga,
43020007	ne citambala cono cali ciwopwe mu mutwe wa Yesu. Ne citambala cico si cali ciwikwe hamonga ne sanda, langa cali cipetye, ciwicigwe hanji cili wene.
43020008	Nayo u mwijizwa muyagwe mono yalongola kufika, nayo ho yakawa kwinjila, yakawona, yakehuwila. (
43020009	Wali wakali si nagezuka i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gono galonga gakutya, “Yali yimunojeye yazuce muli wafu.”)
43020010	Iwejizwa wawo wakawa kuwuya kwawo kanyhi.
43020011	Ninga Malyamu yali yemile ha citenjelo hanze yakulila, na lono yalilaga, yakenama, yakasunjilila mu citenjelo,
43020012	yakawawona wamalayika wejete wavwalile vivwalo vizelu, wekaye bahalya hono muwili wa Yesu wali wuwicigwe, yumonga ku mitwe, no muyagwe ku magulu.
43020013	Wamalayika wawo, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu yaya wukulilila cici?” Mwene yakatya, “Wamuwusa Muwaha wangu, hamba simanyile hono wamuwicile!”
43020014	Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakelenga ku nyuma, yakamuwona Yesu yemile, hamba si yamanya vyono yo mwene Yesu.
43020015	Yesu yakamuwuza “Alu yaya wukulilila cici? Wukumulondola nani?” Nayo Malyamu, yatezaga lunji kowa yo mulindiliza busitani, yakamutya, “Muwaha, hono yo gwegwe wumusolile, wunonjele hono wumuwicile, nane nomusola.”
43020016	Yesu yakamutya, “Malyamu!” Nayo Malyamu yakapituka, yakamutya, “Laboni!” ku nonga ye Cihebelaniya, (nhunizo yayo “Mwijizi.”)
43020017	Yesu yakamutya, “Wulece kung'ang'anila, hambi nha nghali nabita kucanyha kwa Baba. Langa wubite wukawalonjele wandugu zangu, vyono ane nghubita kuli Baba, mono nanye yo Sogo yenyu, na kuli Mulungu wangu, mono nanye yo Mulungu wenyu.”
43020018	Nayo Malyamu Magadalena yakabita, yakawalonjela wa walya iwejizwa nha vyono kamuwona Muwaha, na vyono yamulonjeye zizo.
43020019	Mwizuwa lilyo lye jumapili cinyamihe, iwejizwa wali wehangulize hamonga mu nyumba mugati, ne milango yikawa midinde, ku soko vyono wawogopaga iwalongola we Wayahudi. Nayo Yesu yakaza, yakema haciligati yawo, yakawatya, “Mulamu wuweze muli nyenye.”
43020020	Nayo yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakawalajila imiwoko yakwe, no lubavu lwakwe. Nawo iwejizwa wakasangalala waza kumuwona u Muwaha.
43020021	Nayo Yesu yakawatya kanyhi, “Mulamu wuweze muli nyenye. Nha vyono ane Baba yanhuma, nane vyo nghumutumenyi nanye nhavivyo.”
43020022	Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakawahulila, yakawatya, “Mubocele u Muhe Mono Yelile.
43020023	Hono muwanenele wanhu wubi wawo, wowa wanenelwa, na hono mulece kuwanenela, si wonenelwa.”
43020024	Ninga Tomaso, muyagwe na walya, yo we likumi na wejete, (mono yacemwaga we Matundu,) si yali yali baho hamonga ne wayagwe lono yaziza Yesu.
43020025	Holeka iwejizwa wayagwe wakamulonjela wakatya, “Cimuwona Muwaha.” Ninga Tomaso yakawatya, “Hono ndece kuziwona zinghomele ze misumali mu maganza ge miwoko yakwe, no kucitajila icidole cangu mu zinghomele zizo, no kuwutajila umuwoko wangu ha lubavu lwakwe, si nosuma kwihuwila.”
43020026	Vyaza kupuluta vilo munana, iwejizwa wawo wakawa kanyhi mumulya mugati, hamonga na Tomaso. Ne milango yali midindwe, ninga Yesu yakaza, yakema ha ciligati yawo, yakawatya, “Mulamu wuweze muli nyenye.”
43020027	Hanyuma yakamutya Tomaso “Lete kuno cidole cako, wulanje maganza ge miwoko yangu, wulete no muwoko wako, winjize mu lubavu lwangu. Ho wulece kuwa na mahwele, langa wihuwile!”
43020028	Tomaso yakapitula yakamutya, “Muwaha wangu no Mulungu wangu!”
43020029	Yesu yakamutya, “Alu ho wehuwila vyono wambona? Ninga wamoti wono wehuwiye, lono wakali si nawona.”
43020030	Yesu yavinoza vitanjilo vinji hali wejizwa wakwe, vyono si vyandikwa mu citabu cicino.
43020031	Ninga azino zandikwa, ho mwihuwile vyono Yesu yo Kilisito, u Mwana wo Mulungu, na mu wihuwilo wenyu wuwo, ho mutuje wumi muli mwene.
43021001	Hanyuma ya zizo, yakelajila kanyhi kuli wejizwa wakwe ha mwejelele we lilamba lya Tibeliya. Nayo yelajila nhavi kuli wene.
43021002	Wa Simoni Petelo na Tomaso mono yacemwaga we Matundu, na Nataneli wa ku Kana ya ku Galilaya, hamonga ne wana wejete wa Zebedayo, kanyhi na wanji wejete wa muli wejizwa wakwe, wose wawo wali wali hamonga.
43021003	Simoni Petelo yakawa kuwatya i wayagwe, “Nye wayangu, ane nahelela ta, ku wunimula zisomba.” Nawo wakamutya, “Nase cobitana nagwe.” Hodu, wakawa kubita, wakenjila mu ngalawa, ninga hamba siwasuma kwibata cinji mu cilo cico.
43021004	Na lono kwali kweza kuli behi no kwelelecela, Yesu yali yemile kwi'sangha, ninga i wejizwa hamba siwasuma kumumanya vyono yo mweneco Yesu.
43021005	Baho Yesu yakawawuza, yakutya, “Alu wazelelo, mukali nebata hamba cinji hongo?” Nawo wakatya, “Heya, cikali nebata hamba cinji.”
43021006	Yesu yakawatya, “Ale, mulutajilaje lwavu ku lubavu lo kulume lwe ngalawa, nanye mozituga zisomba.” Nawo wakalutajila lwavu, hamba si wasuma kanyhi kulukwega, so winji we zisomba.
43021007	U mwijizwa yuyo mono yali yendigwe na Yesu, yakamutya Petelo, “Yo mwene Muwaha.” Nayo Petelo yaza kuhulika vyono yo mwene Muwaha, yakawa kwitunga mwenda wakwe (hambi nha si yali yetunjile) yakelujila mu malenga.
43021008	Ninga awalya iwejizwa wanji wakaziza mu cigalawa sunga ko ku nhumbi, akuno wakulukwega lwavu lono lwali lumemile masomba, hambi nha si wali wali kutali ne yisi nghavu, langa yali nha meta yigana limonga du, ku wulawa ku nhumbi.
43021009	Waza kutima ku nhumbi, wakawona moto wa makala wukolelezwe, na mucanyha yayo, mwali na somba na mukate vikasikwe.
43021010	Yesu yakawatya, “Letenyi ta, imasomba ganji gono munimuye lulu.”
43021011	Nayo Simoni Petelo, yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakalukwega lwavu sunga ko kwi'sangha, nalo lwali lumemile somba zi mbaha yigana limonga na makumi mahano na yidatu, hamba ziwe zali nyinji nhavivyo, ninga u lwavu si lwademuka.
43021012	Yesu yakawatya, “Muze mulye.” Na hasina hamba yumonga mono yejelela kumuwuza yatye, “Gwegwe nani?” Hambi wose nha wakamanya vyono yo mwene Muwaha.
43021013	Yesu yakaza, yakasola mukate yakawapela, ne zisomba yakanoza nhavivyo.
43021014	Alu lwali lo lwe kadatu, lwa Yesu kwilajila kuli wejizwa wakwe, lono yali yakondya kuzuka muli wafu.
43021015	Waza kukondya kulya, Yesu yakamutya Simoni Petelo, “Ati Simoni go mwana wa Yohana, alu wunyendile ane muno muno wuwacizize wawa?” Nayo yakamutya, “Heya Muwaha, agwe wumanyile vyono ane nghwendile.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wudime vikolo vyangu.”
43021016	Lwe kejete kanyhi yakamutya, “Simoni go mwana wa Yohana, wule, wunyendile ane muno muno?” Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Heya Muwaha, wumanyile vyono ane nghwendile.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wudime zingholo zangu.”
43021017	Lwe kadatu kanyhi yakamutya, “Ati Simoni go mwana wa Yohana, wunyendile ane 'mbi?” Nayo Petelo yakakalala vyono Yesu yamuwuzize kadatu yakutya, “Wunyendile?” Yakamutya, “Muwaha, agwe wumanyile zose, wumanyile vyono ane nghwendile.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wudime zingholo zangu.”
43021018	Nghukulonjela mbeka, vyono “Lono wali wukali mudodo, wali wuzoweye kwiwopa musipi no kubita ko kose kono wasakaga. Ninga kolo weza kukombipa, kologolola mawoko gako, na yunji kolokuwopa, yakutegule kono si wendile.”
43021019	(Yesu yalongaga zizi, yakulajila vyono Petelo kofwa no kumukumya Mulungu). Hanyuma yakamutya, “Wunhyatye.”
43021020	Baho Petelo yakapituka, nayo yakamuwona yuyulya u mwijizwa mono Yesu yali yamwendile, yakuwatyatya. U mwijizwa yuyu, yo ayulya u mwijizwa mono yali yekaye behi muno na Yesu ha zindigwa ze cinyamihe, mono yamuwuza Yesu yakutya, “Muwaha nani mono kokugaluka.”
43021021	Holeka Petelo yaza kumuwona yuyo, yakamutya Yesu “Ati Muwaha, ayu nayo ma?”
43021022	Yesu yakamutya, “Hono nyende yuyu yekale sunga kolo nghuza, agwe wina nghani 'ci? Agwe wunhyatyaje nene.”
43021023	Ne nghani yiyo yikamanyika muli we zindugu, vyono u mwijizwa yuyo si kolofwa. Ninga Yesu si yamulonjela vyono u mwijizwa yuyo si kolofwa, langa yatya, “Hono nyende yuyu yekale sunga kolo nghuza, agwe wina nghani 'ci?”
43021024	Ayu yo mwijizwa mono yazihomelela zinghani zizi, no kuzandika. Nase cimanyile vyono wuhomelezi wakwe wa mbeka.
43021025	Kanyhi kozili zinji nyinji zono yanozaga Yesu, zono mhali zandikwe zose, monga monga, na lunji, sunga ne yinze yeneco si yali yikwile so winji we vitabu vyono vyali vyandikwe.
44001001	Ndugu yangu Teyofilo, Mu citabu cilongozi nandika zose zono Yesu yetuma no kwijiza, ku wulawo mwamulizo wo mulimo wakwe,
44001002	sunga mwi'zuwa alilya lyono yanyasulilwa no kuwuya ku wulanga. Na lono yali yakali nanyaswulwa no kuwuya ku wulanga, yawalajiliza mu Muhe Mono Yelile, wawalya iwatumwa wono yawahagula.
44001003	Na lono, yali yatamiswa yakondya, yakelajila kuli wene vyono mumi, mu vitanjilo vinji vye vilungo, lono yejelaga kuli wene yidaha lya vilo makumi ma'ne. Wamuwona, nayo yakaduwana nawo muli zo wutemi wo Mulungu.
44001004	Na lono wali wetang'anila hamonga, yakawalonjela yakutya “Mulece kuwuka ku Yelusalemi, langa mucilindilaje icipegwa cono yehuwiza Baba, icipegwa cono mwakondya kucihulika nghucilonga.
44001005	Hambi Yohana nha yabaputizaga mu malenga; ninga anye mu vilo vicefu, mobaputizizwa mu Muhe Mono Yelile.”

44001009	Nayo yaza kondya kulonga zizi; nawo lono wamulangaga, yakanyasulilwa ku wulanga, livunde likamugubiciza ha meso gawo, hamba kumuwona kanyhi.

44001012	Baho Iwatumwa wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakulawa ku cigongo cono citezagwa ca Mizeyituni, cono cali cihinzo ca kotya kilometa monga du ku wulawa ku Yelusalemi.

44001014	Wawa wose, waswezanaga hamonga mu wulombe ko wuhile wumonga, hamonga ne wacekulu wanji, hamonga na Malyamu u nyina wa Yesu, ne wanduguze wa Yesu.
44001015	Hanyuma ya vilo vicefu, hakawa na mukung'ano wa wono wali wakondya kwihuwila, wali waficile nha wanhu yigana limonga na makumi mejete. Petelo yakema hamwande yawo,

44001017	Hambi Yuda nha yali yawalilizwe hamonga nase, hambi nha yahagulwa yahanje nase mu witumami wuwu.” (
44001018	Mumanyile vyono mwene yawugula mugunda, ne zipesa zizilya zono yazitujila mwi'tumo lyakwe ilibi. Yakagwa hasi, yakabahuka, no wutumbu wakwe wukalawila kudeha.
44001019	Ne wanhu wose wa mu Yelusalemi, wakazihulika zizi, holeka wakawucema mugunda wuwo mu nonga yawo, wakawutya, “Hakeli Dama nhunizo yayo Cigundu ce Sakami.”)

44001021	“Holeka yinojeye munhu yunji, yawe muhomelezi hamonga nase zo wuzuce wakwe u Muwaha Yesu.
44001022	Yimunojeye yawe yumonga wa muli awalya wono cijendanaga nase mu vilo vyose, vyono u Muwaha Yesu yajendanaga nase, wulawa mwipango lyono Yohana yabaputizaga, sunga lizuwa lilya lyono Yesu yanyasulilwa kuwulawa kuli'se no kubita ku wulanga.”
44001023	Wakatambula matagwa ga wanhu wejete; u mulongozi Yusufu mono yacemwaga Balasaba (hamba liyagwe Yusito,) na we kejete Matiya.

44002001	Lizuwa lye Pentekote lyaza fika, wono wali wehuwiye, wali wekongholeye wose hamonga.

44002003	Hobaho zikawalawila zinimi, zikegawa nha malambi go moto ako na ako, zikawatimila yumonga yumonga.
44002004	Wose wakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile, wakanza kulonga milonjele hayo hayo, nha vyono Muhe yawapela vilungo mu wulonje.

44002007	Wakatinuka wose, wakezina, wakutya, “Ati, wawa wose wono wakulonga si Wagalilaya?
44002008	Alu yiwa wule, ase cikuwahulika wose wakulonga, munhu ne milonjele ya cinyo kwetu kono calelelwa?
44002009	Muli'se, wanji Wapaliti na Wamedi na Welamiti, na wanji wanya ku Mesopotamiya, ku Wuyahudi, na Kapadokiya, Ponto, na Asiya,

44002012	Wose wakezina no kugazika akuno wakwiwuza, “Alu nye, cici co cici?”

44002014	Ninga Petelo, yakema hamonga ne wayagwe we likumi na monga, yakenula lizi lyakwe muno muno, yakawa kwanza kuwaganulila wanhu yakutya, “Nye wandugu zangu Wayahudi, nanye wose mono mwikaye mu Yelusalemi, muhulicize zono nghulonga.
44002015	Wanhu awa nha si wagalile vyono mukuganiciza nyenye, hambi alu nha yikali saa tatu du ya hakali mitondo?
44002016	I mbeka, wo wutya nghani ayi, yo nghani ayilya yono yalongwa no muwizi Yoweli yono yatya,
44002017	‘Ku vilo vye ndumilizo vyo yolowa, yakutya Mulungu, nolowetila iwanhu wose Muhe wangu. Ne wana wenyu, we cilume na we cicekulu woloziganula izinghani zangu, ne wazelelo wenyu, wolowona wugubulilwe, Ne wakombi wenyu, wololota zindoto.
44002018	Heya, sunga ne wetumami wangu we cilume na we cicekulu, nolowetila zo Muhe wangu mu vilo vivyo, nawo woloyiganula inghani yangu.
44002019	Kanyhi nololajila imezino ku wulanga kucanyha, ne vitanjilo kono'nze hono hasi, kolowa na sakami, no moto ne nghungulyosi yizito.
44002020	Lizuwa lyolopituswa liwe citi, no mwezi wolopituswa wuwe sakami, lono lyowa likali si naza ilizuwa lyo Muwaha, lizuwa liwaha litambule,
44002021	Baho, muli wose mono kololomba mwitagwa lyo Muwaha yo kolopona.’
44002022	“Nye mo wa Isilayeli, muhulicize zinghani zizi! Yesu wa Nazaleti, munhu mono yahomelelwa no Mulungu kwenyu, mu metumo mawaha ne mezino, ne vitanjilo, vyono Mulungu yavinozeza muli mwene hali nyenye, vyono mumanyile mo weneco,
44002023	na mu wutemezwe no wumanye we katali wo Mulungu, yali yakondya kudumula nghani, vyono Yesu kowikwa mu miwoko yenyu, nanye mukamuwulaga mu nzila yo kuwalecela iwanhu wabi, wamutumbice mu musalaba
44002024	Ninga u Mulungu yamuzukula, yakamuponya mu wusungu we lifwa, ku soko si yali yisumice hamba hadodo lifwa limwibate.
44002025	Hambi Dawudi nha yakulonga zo mwene nhavi, ‘Namuwonaga Muwaha ha mwande yangu nhondo zose, hambi nha yali hamonga nane ku lubavu lwangu lo kulume, holeka sinosinjisika.
44002026	Ku soko yiyo nhumbula yangu yikasecelela, nane nghatowa lucenze lo wusangalale. No muwili wangu wokwikala mu witumbilo,
44002027	Hambi nha si koyileka inhumbula yangu mu yisi ye wafu, hamba si komukombola Mono Yelile wako yawolele mu citenjelo.
44002028	Wangubulila zinzila zo wumi, wuwe wako, wo kuwa wuli baho, wukumhela nyemo!’
44002029	“Nye wandugu zangu, nyendile kumulonjelenyi cagalanze, zo kuku yetu Dawudi. U mwene yafwa, yakazikwa, ne citenjelo cakwe cili baha hono hetu sunga nalu.
44002030	Ninga Dawudi vyono yali muwizi, yali yamanyile vyono u Mulungu yamwilahila ko wilahe, vyono mu lulelo lwakwe, kolomwikaza yunji mwigoda lyakwe;
44002031	mwene Dawudi vyono yamula kumanya zizo, holeka yawulonga wuzuce wakwe Kilisito, lono yatya, ‘Inhumbula yakwe si yalekwa mu yisi ye wafu, hamba u muwili wakwe si wawolela mu citenjelo.’
44002032	Yuyo Yesu, Mulungu yamuzukula, nase wose cili wahomelezi we nghani yiyo.
44002033	Yesu yawuya kucanyha, sunga ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu, yakabocela kuli Sogwe cicilya cipegwa cono yehuwiza, co Muhe Mono Yelile; holeka azi zono mukuwona alu, no kuhulika, wo wumwajilwe wa yuyo Muhe.
44002034	Hambi Dawudi mweneco, nha si yabita sunga ku wulanga, ninga umwene yakutya: ‘U Muwaha yamutya Muwaha wangu, Wikale ku lubavu lwangu lo kulume,
44002035	Sunga niwawice walugu wako wawe nha cibawo co wukanyago we magulu gako.’
44002036	“Ne mhuga yose ya Isilayeli yiwanojeye wamanye manyi manyi, nha vyono, u Mulungu yamunoza yuyo, kuwa yo Muwaha kanyhi yo Kilisito, yuyo Yesu mono mwamutumbika nyenye.”
44002037	Iwanhu waza hulika zizi, wakahomeka mu nhumbula zawo, wakamutya Petelo ne watumwa wayagwe, wakatya, “Alo citende wule wandugu zetu.”
44002038	Petelo yakawatya, “Nenenyi no kubaputizwa wose, mwitagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, ho mutuje wunenelwe wo wubi wenyu; no kubocela acilya icipegwa co Muhe Mono Yelile.
44002039	Hambi wihuwizo wuwo nha wehuwizwa ku soko yenyu, na ku soko ye wana wenyu, na ku soko ya wose wono wali kutali, na kusoko ya wo wose walya wono Muwaha Mulungu kowacemela kwakwe.”
44002040	Petelo yakawahomelela kwa nghani zinji nyinji; yakawakangaziza no kuwakong'onheza iwanhu yakutya, “Mwiponye mu lulelo lulu ulubi.”
44002041	Wenji mwizuwa lilyo, wakayibocela nghani yakwe, no kubaputizwa. Wakonjelezeka wanhu nha elufu yidatu wono wehuwila.
44002042	Na wawa wose wakajendelela kwiyijiza kulawa kuli watumwa imikalile ye cindugu, mu wubegule wo mukate ne malombo.
44002043	Mapoto menji ne vitanjilo vinji vikanozwa ne watumwa, sunga wanhu wose wakenjilwa no woga.
44002044	Na wose wono wali wehuwila wakajendelela kuwa cinhu cimonga, wakawa wahanjiye vyose;
44002045	wakaguza sawo zawo, ne vitumbilwa vyawo, wakawa kugawana zipesa wose, munhu nha vyono yasakaga.
44002046	Nawo wakajendelela kwitang'anila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu no wuhile wumonga vilo vyose. Langa mwi'daha lyo wubegule wo mukate, wetang'anililaga mu zinyumba zawo, no kuhanga wose ndigwa yiyo ne nyemo na nhumbula nzelu,
44002047	wakumulumba Mulungu, wakendwa ne wanhu wose. U Muwaha yakawa kuwonjelezeza nhondo zose iwanhu wono yawaponyaga.
44003001	Izuwa linji Petelo na Yohana lono wenjilaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu saa tisa ye misi, mu cidaha co kulombela.
44003002	Na baho behi no mulango we Nyumba yo Mulungu, wono wucemwaga “Mulango muswanu,” hali hoyuli munhu yumonga, mono yali yali citewe kulawa vyono yalelwa. Wanhu wamudinghulaga nhondo zose, no kumuwika baho, ho yelombeleze vye lihewa kuli wanhu wono wenjilaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu.
44003003	Yaza kuwawona wa Petelo na Yohana wakwinjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawalomba ho wamupele co cose.
44003004	Petelo na Yohana wakamulanga muno, hanyuma Petelo yakamutya, “Ta wucilangaje!”
44003005	Nayo yakawapitucila, yaganicizaga nha kotuga cinji kuli wene.
44003006	Ninga Petelo yakamutya, “Ane sina mapesa, hamba zahabu, langa yono nina nayo, yo nghukupela. Mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito wa Nazaleti, wujende!”
44003007	Hanyuma yakamwibata u muwoko wo kulume, yakamwinula. Lo lulo lulo migulu ne mafugamilo gakwe gakakama.
44003008	Yakazumha, yakema, yakanza kujenda; vikenjilana hamonga nawo mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakujenda, yakuzumhazumha, akuno yakumulumbo Mulungu.
44003009	Iwanhu wose wono wali wali baho, wakamuwona yakujenda no kumulumbo Mulungu.
44003010	Waza mumanya vyono yo mwene mono kekalaga yakilombeleza ha Mulango muswanu we Nyumba yo Mulungu, wakezina muno, hamba kumanya zono zimwijeleye.
44003011	Iwanhu wose lono wali wakali no wizine wuwaha, hobaho wakanza kwikongholela lumangho i hanhu hono hatezagwa “Likumbo lya Solomona,” ihanhu hono yuyulya munhu, vyali vikali vityatyizye na Petelo na Yohana.
44003012	Na Petelo yaza wawona wanhu wawo, yakawapitucila yakawatya, “Nye mo wanhu wa Isilayeli, so cici mukucilanga sese, mukutya mba, mu vilungo vyetu, lunji mu wuswanu wetu, holeka cimunozize yuyu yajende?
44003013	U Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na wa Isaka, na wa Yakobo, u Mulungu we wakuku zetu, yo yamukumizye Mwitumami wakwe Yesu; mono mwamulavya anye, mwene yo yuyo mono mwamutajila mu miwoko ye wawaha, no kumulema hamwande ya Pilato, hambe Pilato yasakaga kumulecela.
44003014	Yali munhu muswanu na yali yelile. Ninga anye mwamulema, mukasaka munhu yunji mono yali muwulaji yo yawopolelwe.
44003015	Mukawa muwulaga ayulya mono yo mwamulizo wo wumi. Ninga Mulungu yamuzukula, nase yo sese mono cili wahomelezi we nghani yiyi.
44003016	Litagwa lya Yesu, no wihuwilo wa mwi'tagwa lilyo, vyo vimupelile vilungo munhu ayu mono mukumuwona, no kumumanya, wihuwilo wa muli Yesu, wo wumuponezye lukulu munhu yuyu nha vyono mukuwona wose.
44003017	“Alu wandugu zangu, mumanyile vyono anye, hamonga ne wawaha wenyu, mwetumila citu.
44003018	Ninga u Mulungu vyo yazifisiliza nha vivyo, azilya zono yazilajila katali mu milomo ye wawizi wose, vyono Kilisito wakwe kolotamiswa.
44003019	Alenyi muyikawanizaje mikalile yenyu imibi, mumuwuyile u Mulungu, nayo ho yawupate wubi wenyu,
44003020	Mwitumaje nhavivyo ho vize ividaha vyo wupozwe mu nhumbula, vikulawa kuli Muwaha; nayo ho yamutume Kilisito mono yamutemezya, nayo yo Yesu.
44003021	U Mwene si koleka kwikala ku wulanga sunga kolo lyafika lipango lyo kunozwa wupya vinhu vyose, nha vyono Mulungu yalonjile muli wawizi wakwe wono welile wo wulawa katali.
44003022	Hambi mbeka Musa nha yalonga yakatya, ‘U Muwaha Mulungu, komwinulilenyi muwizi nha nene, mono kolawa muli nyenye mo weneco.’
44003023	“Na yowa muli wose mono si komuhulika muwizi yuyo, kotengwa no kutagwa kutali ne wanhu wo Mulungu.
44003024	Iwawizi wose, ku wulawilila Samwili, na wose wono wamutyatya mu nyuma, wose walonga ze zinghani zizi zono zikwitumwa mu vilo vivi.
44003025	Wihuwizo wo Mulungu wono yehuwiziza mu wawizi, wali wihuwizo wenyu, kanyhi anye muli we cilagane cono Mulungu yalaganila ne wakuku zenyu, nha vyono yamulonjela Abulahamu, ‘Mu lulelo lwako izinghungugo zose za kono'nze mo zolomotela.’
44003026	Holeka Mulungu yamuzukula Mwitumami wakwe so cambuzi cenyu, yamutuma ho yamuletelenyi wumoteswe wo kumunozenyi mupituce no kugaleka imabi genyu munhu na lwakwe.”
44004001	Petelo na Yohana lono wali wakali wakuwaganulila wanhu, Wakohani no muwaha we walindiliza Nyumba yo Mulungu hamonga ne Wasadukayo, wakawaziza;
44004002	wakugazika muno mu zinhumbula, vyono wawo watumwa, wawaganulilaga wanhu vyono Yesu yazuka, inghani yono yikulajila cagalanze vyono iwafu wolozuka.
44004003	Wakawebata, na vyono cilo cali casejelela, wakawatajila mu jela, sunga imitondo yaco.
44004004	Ninga wenji wono wayihulika i nghani, wehuwila, na ku wuwale, wali waficile nha wanhu elufu yihano.
44004005	Kukawa waza kwela, iwawaha wawo ne Wanyamhala ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakekongholela ku Yelusalemi,
44004006	na Anasi u Mukohani Muwaha yali yali baho, na Kayafa, na Yohana, na Alekizanda, na wose wono wali we mhuga yo Mukohani Muwaha.
44004007	Waza kuwawika iwatumwa hamwande yawo, wakawawuza wakutya, “Alu 'nye, mukwitumila zizi mu vilungo vya hayi, na mwitagwa lya nani?”
44004008	Hobaho Petelo, yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakawatya, “Nye mo walongola we wanhu, na mo wanyamhala!
44004009	Hono yiwe mukuciwuza izuwali, zo witume wuswanu wono yatendeywe ayulya munhu mono yali yali citewe, na vyono yatujile yuyu wupone.
44004010	Ale, yimanyice kwenyu wose, na kuli wanhu wose wa Isilayeli, vyono, mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito wa Nazaleti, mono mwamutumbika nyenye, mono Mulungu yamuzukula muli wafu, mwi'tagwa lilyo, yuyu holeka yemile baha hali nyenye mutelevu.
44004011	Yo mwene mono Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, ‘Ilibwe lyono mwalilema anye nyo wazenji Lyanozwa kuwa yibwe yiwaha lyo musinji.’
44004012	“Hamba hasina mhonelo muli yunji wo wose, hamba yitagwa linji nha hasina hono hasi yo wulanga, lyono wapegwa wanhu, lyono linojeye ciliponele.”
44004013	Wawo wanyamhala wo mukung'ano, wali wawamanyile wa Petelo na Yohana vyono wali wanhu du wono si wasomile, ninga wakawezina kuwawona wakulonga kwe vilungo wasina hamba woga. Wakawezuka, vyono wawezanaga na Yesu.
44004014	Nawo waza kumuwona munhu mono yaponywa vimane nawo, wakawa wasina ya kulonga.
44004015	Holeka wakawatya walawile kunze yo mukung'ano, wene ho watuje cilejeho co kwiheha.
44004016	Wakawa kwiwuza, “Alo ciwatende wule wanhu wawa? Hambi i nghani ye lipoto lili nha yimanyice kuli wanhu wose wa mono Yelusalemi, nha vyono linozwa na wene, hamba ase sicosuma kulikana.
44004017	Ninga hono cisace nghani yiyi yilece kutandala muli wanhu, ale ciwogofyaje, ho walece kujendelela kulonga kanyhi na munhu wo wose mwi'tagwa lya Yesu.”
44004018	Holeka wakawacema wenjile, wakawalonjela vyono walecele lukulu kuganula calinze, hamba kwijiza mwi'tagwa lya Yesu.
44004019	Ninga Petelo na Yohana wapitula wakawatya, “Ale mulonje, hono yo ling'ani hali Mulungu cimuhulicenyi nyenye si nho kumuhulika Mwene.
44004020	Hambi nha si cosuma kuleka kuzilonga zono cawona no kuhulika.”
44004021	Nawo wawo iwanyamhala wo Mukung'ano waza cila kuwogofya, hanyuma wakawaleka. Hambi nha si wayiwona yo kuwatamisiza, hambi wanhu wose nha wamukumyaga Mulungu, so nghani yiyo yono yanozeka.
44004022	Nayo u munhu yuyo mono yaponywa nha yali yaficile myaka makumi mane no musapu.
44004023	Nawo wa Petelo na Yohana waza kukombolwa, wakabita kuli wayawo, wakawaganulila zose zono walonjelwa ne wakohani wawaha ne wanyamhala.
44004024	Na wawo, waza hulika, wakenulila hamonga i mazi gawo kuli Mulungu, wakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, mono wanoza wulanga ne yinze ne lilenga, na vyose vyono vili mugati!
44004025	Mono wamunoza sogo yetu Dawudi, mwitumami wako, yalonje kwe vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, yakutya: ‘So cici i wanhu wono si Wayahudi wakalipe? Ne wanhu wehwesa gono gali musina?
44004026	Iwatemi we yinze wakewikaniza, Ne wawaha wakekonghola hamonga, Ho wamuleme Muwaha na Kilisito wakwe.’
44004027	“Kwaco mbeka, Helode na Pontiyo Pilato, wena ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ne zimhuga za Isilayeli, nha wekongholela baha mu kaya yiyi ku soko yo mwitumami wako mono yelile, Yesu mono wamunoza yawe Kilisito.
44004028	Heya, wetang'anila ho wanoze zizilya, zono wetemezezya no kuziwikaniza kwe vilungo vyako, na ko wendo wako, ku wulawa mwamulizo.
44004029	Alu Muwaha wulanje wogofye wawo. Wucipelaje vilungo co wetumami wako ho ciyiganule nghani yako cisina woga.
44004030	Wugolole muwoko wako no kuwaponya wanhu. Mapoto ne mezino, ganozezwe mwi'tagwa lyo Mwitumami wako mono yelile, Yesu.”
44004031	Nawo waza kukondya kulomba, i hanhu baho hono wali wehangulizize, hakasinjisika, nawo wose wakamemywa u Muhe Mono Yelile. Nawo wose wakawa kwanza kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu wasina woga.
44004032	Ne mhuga yawo wose wono wehuwila, wali na nhumbula monga no mutima monga. Hasina hamba yunji mono yali yena cinji co cose, mono yatya, yo sawo yakwe mweneco, langa wali wahanjile vyose.
44004033	Na mu vilungo vinji, watumwa wakahomelela zo wuzuce wo Muwaha Yesu, nayo u Mulungu yakawapela ko winji lihewa lyakwe.
44004034	Hambi nha kwali kusina muyawo mono yali yanjiye cinji, hambi wose wono wali wena migunda, lunji nyumba, waviguzaga,
44004035	no kuziwika zipesa zayo mu miwoko ye watumwa, wakagawilwa wose, viling'aniye munhu ne visakwa vyakwe.
44004036	Hakawa na mulawi yumonga mulelelwa ku Kupulo, litagwa lyakwe Yusufu, mono watumwa wamucemaga Balanaba, (nhunizo yayo, “Mwana wo wutuzwe.”)
44004037	Nayo yali yena mugunda wakwe, yakawuguza, yakazileta zipesa, no kuziwika mu miwoko ye watumwa.
44005001	Ninga kukawa na munhu litagwa lyakwe Ananiya, no mugolece wakwe Safila, nawo wakawuguza u mugunda wawo nha vivyo.
44005002	Ninga yakacepula nusu ye zipesa, no kuleta kuli watumwa nusu yayo du, no mugolece wakwe nayo yali yayimanyile nghani yiyi.
44005003	Ninga Petelo yakamuwuza yakutya, “Ati, Ananiya, alo so cici Setani yakumemizye nhumbula yako, ho wumukoce u Muhe Mono Yelile, ho wukacepule nusu ye zipesa zono wawuguza mugunda?
44005004	Lono wali wukali sinawuguza, wali wako, na lono wali wakondya kuwuguza, izipesa zizo zali zako, ho wuzitumamile nha vyono wendile. Alu so cici kulamula nghani yiyi mu nhumbula yako no kwituma nghani yiyi? Ninga wumanye vyono si wumukonjile munhu, langa kumukonga Mulungu!”
44005005	Nayo Ananiya yaza hulika zinghani zizi, yakagwa hasi no kufwa baho baho. No woga wuwaha muno muno wukawebata wose wono wazihulika zizi.
44005006	Iwazelelo wakenuka, wakawuwopa umuwili wakwe ne sanda, wakamutegula kunze, wakamuzika mu citenjelo.
44005007	Caza kupuluta cidaha kotya ca saa yidatu nhavi, u mugolece wakwe yakenjila mu nyumba, akuno si yamanyile zono ziweye.
44005008	Petelo yakamutya, “Ati Safila wunonjele ta, ati, lili lyo liwalo lye zipesa zono mwawuguza mugunda?” Nayo Safila yakatya, “Heya, lyo liwalo lilyo.”
44005009	Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Alo so cici mulagane no mulume wako kumujela u Muhe wo Muwaha?” Wulanje ta! Awalya iwanhu wono wamuzicile u mulume wako, wali ha mulango, nawo wokutegula na gwegwe kunze.
44005010	Lo lulo lulo Safila yakagwa ha magulu ga Petelo, nayo yakafwa baho baho. Iwazelelo wakenjila wakamwagana yafwiye, nawo wakamutegula kunze, wakamuzika behi no mulume wakwe.
44005011	Ne likanisa lyose hamonga na wose wono wazihulika zizo, wakebatwa na woga wuwaha muno muno.
44005012	I Watumwa wakanoza mapoto ne mezino menji muli wanhu. Wono wehuwila, wakawa wakwitang'anila kuko wose hamonga, kwi'kumbo lya Solomona.
44005013	Ninga, hasina muli wanhu wono si wali wehuwiye mono yejelela kwilunza nawo. Langa sunga ne wanhu wono si wali wehuwiye, wakawakumya.
44005014	Iliwalo lye wanhu wono wamwihuwila Muwaha lye walume ne wacekulu, likacila konjelezeka muno muno.
44005015	Na ku soko yiyo, wanhu wawawikaga watamwa mu nzila, wawawikaga mu vitanda na mu zinyhingo, Petelo kolo yakupuluta, hamba muzizi wakwe du wuwaficile wanji wayawo.
44005016	Wanhu wenji wakafika kulawa makaya ga mu mhelo mhelo ya Yelusalemi, wakuwaleta iwatamwa wawo, na wono wagazikaga ne macisi mavu, nawo wakaponywa wose.
44005017	Ninga u mukohani muwaha ne wayagwe wono wali we mhuga ye Wasadukayo we hanhu baho, wakawawonela wivu.
44005018	Wakawebata watumwa no kuwatajila mu jela ye wenji wose.
44005019	Ninga ne cilo, Malayika wo Muwaha yakadigula milango ye jela, yakawalavya kunze, yakatya,
44005020	“Bitenyi mukeme mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, mukawaganulile wanhu zinghani zose zo wumi wuwu.”
44005021	Nawo watumwa wakahulika, wakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu hakali mitondo muno, wakawa kwanza kwijiza. Ninga u Mukohani Muwaha, hamonga na wono wali nayo, wali weza kuza, wakacema mukung'ano we libalaza lyose, hamonga ne wanyamhala wose we wanhu wa Isilayeli, hanyuma wakawatuma wanhu ku jela wakawalete watumwa.
44005022	Ninga wawo wetumami waza kufika ku jela, si wawagana yaye. Wakawuya, wakalonga,
44005023	wakutya, “Ciyagana jela ndindwe yikamile, ne walindilizi wemile ha milango, ninga ceza kudigula, si cagane munhu wo wose mugati.”
44005024	U Muwaha we walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu ne wakohani wawaha, waza hulika zizi, wakawa na mahwele, hamba kumanya zono ziwatujile.
44005025	Yakaza yunji yakawalonjela yakawatya, “Lanjenyi ta! Wanhu wono mwawatajila mu jela, wali mu Nyumba yo Mulungu wemile wakuwejiza wanhu.”
44005026	Hobaho yakabita muwaha we walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu, hamonga ne wanhu wakwe, yakabita ku Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawaleta. Ninga si wawebata kwe vilungo hambi nha wawogopa wanhu, lunji wali wawatowanje ne mabwe.
44005027	Waza kuwaleta, wakawawika ha mwande ye libalaza. U Mukohani muwaha yakawawuza, yakutya,
44005028	“Ase camulemezenyi cagalanze, vyono mulecele lukulu kwijiziza mwi'tagwa lyo munhu yuyu, alu kumbe anye mwagatandaza imafundo genyu hanhu hose mu Yelusalemi, sunga nalu mukuhila kuciletela lilema lyo wufwe wo munhu yuyo.”
44005029	Ninga Petelo lono yali hamonga ne watumwa wayagwe, yakapitula, yakatya, “Cinojele cimuhulice Mulungu, si nhe wanhu.
44005030	U Mulungu we wakuku zetu yamuzukula Yesu, mono anye mwamuwulaga ko kumutumbika mu musalaba.
44005031	Yuyo yo Mulungu yamwinula sunga ko ku muwoko wakwe wo kulume, yakawa Mulongola no Muponyi, yawapele wanhu Isilayeli u wunene, ho wanenelwe uwubi wawo.
44005032	Nase cili wahomelezi we zinghani zizi, nayo nhavivyo Muhe Mono Yelile, mono u Mulungu yawapela wono wakumuhulika, nayo yakuyihomelela nghani yiyo.”
44005033	Ninga wose wono wali wali baho mwi'balaza lilyo wali weza kuzihulika zizi, wakakolwa ne likuwo, sunga wahilaga kuwawulaga.
44005034	Ninga Mufalisayo yunji mono yacemwaga Gamaliyeli, mono yali mwijizi wo Wulajilize, na mono yali yena lilumbo yiwaha hali wanhu wose, yakema ha mwande ye libalaza, yakasaka wawalya watumwa walawile hadodo kunze.
44005035	Hanyuma yakawatya, “Nye wandugu zangu wa Isilayeli, mwitetelaje kuli wanhu wawa, muli yiyo yono mukusaka kuwatendela.
44005036	Hambi mu vilo vyono vipulute nha yenuka munhu yunji, litagwa lyakwe yacemwaga Teyuda, yakeyitya vyono mwene yo munhu mutambule, na wanhu kotya nha magana ma'ne wakelunza nayo. Ninga u mwene yawulagwa, ne watyatyi wakwe wose wakeyagala, ne cipuga cakwe cikawa kufwa.
44005037	Kanyhi hanyuma yayo, mu cipango cicilya co kuwala wanhu, yakenuka Yuda wa ku Galilaya. Yuyu nayo yakawakwega wanhu wanji, wakamutyatya, ninga nayo nha vivyo, yakawulagwa, ne watyatyi wakwe wose wakeyagala.
44005038	Alu, holeka nane nghumutyenyi nhavi, mwilegaje kuli wanhu wawa, muwalekaje ye! Hambi inghani yiyi hamba mulimo wuwu, hono wuwe wa wanhu, nha wohodanjika du weneco.
44005039	Ninga hono wuwe wo Mulungu, si mosuma kuwemila ye, yilece kuwa na lunji muwe nha mukwihoma no Mulungu.” Wakawa kwilumbaniza nayo.
44005040	Nawo waza kuwacema watumwa, wakawakuna viboko, no kuwalonjela vyono, walecele lukulu kwijiza mwi'tagwa lya Yesu, hanyuma wakawa kuwaleka wabite.
44005041	Watumwa wakalawila hanze ye libalaza wasangalaye, vyono wejela wanojeye kukozwa cevu ku soko ye litagwa lya Yesu.
44005042	Nawo wakajendelela nhondo zose kwijiza no kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Yesu, mu Nyumba yo Mulungu na mu zikaya ze wanhu, vyono mwene yo Kilisito.
44006001	Mu vilo vivyo, lono liwalo lya wono wehuwiye lyonjelezekaga, gakejela mang'ung'uliko hagati ya Wayahudi wono wali wehuwila, wono walongaga nonga ye cigiliki, na wono walongaga Cihebelaniya, awalya wono walongaga Cigiliki, wang'ung'ulikaga wakutya, iwafwile wawo siwakukumbucilwa mu wupegwa visakwa vyawo vye nhondo zose.
44006002	Nawo iwatumwa we likumi na wejete, wakayicema mhuga yose ya wono wehuwiye, wakawatya, “Si yinojeye ase cilece kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, no kwinjila mu mulimo wo wugawi we visakwa.
44006003	Holeka wandugu zetu, mwiyihagulaje muli nyenye, wanhu mupunghati, we lilumbo, wono wamemile Muhe ne mahala, ciwawice mu mulimo wuwu.
44006004	Ninga ase, cowa kuswa mu wulombe, na mu mulimo wo kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu.”
44006005	Inghani yiyi yikawendeza imhuga yose ya wono wali wehuwila, wakawa kuwahagula, Sitefano, munhu mono yamemile wihuwilo no Muhe Mono Yelile, na Filipo, na Polokolo, na Nikanoli, na Timona, na Palimena, na Nikolasi munya ku Antiyokiya, mono si Muyahudi, mono yali yayipitucila dini ye Ciyahudi.
44006006	Wakawawika ha mwande ye watumwa, nawo wakawalombela no kuwawicila miwoko.
44006007	Inghani yo Mulungu yikacila kutandala, ne liwalo lya wono wehuwila kuko ku Yelusalemi, likacila konjelezeka, ne mhuga mbaha ye Wakohani, wakawubocela u wihuwilo.
44006008	Mulungu yakamupela Sitefano lihewa ne vilungo vinji, sunga yakawa kwituma mapoto ne mezino muli wanhu.
44006009	Ninga wakenuka wanji, ho wawangane na Sitefano, wanji wa muli wanhu wawo, wali we nhang'anilo yono yitezagwa “Nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo ye Wanhu Welecele,” nawo walawilila ku Kilene, na ku Alekizandeliya, wanji wakalawa ku Kilikiya na Asiya.
44006010	Hamba si wamusuma ng'o, ku soko ye mahala gakwe, na ku soko ya yuyo Muhe mono yamutongaga mwipango lono yalongaga.
44006011	Hobaho wakawafupa wanhu wanji cinyele, ho watye, “Cimuhulika Sitefano yakulonga nghani za nhovu kuli Musa, na kuli Mulungu.”
44006012	Na so yiyo wakawasagahaza wanhu, iwanyamhala, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize. Wakamuziza Sitefano, wakamwibata, wakamuleta ha mwande ye libalaza liwaha.
44006013	Wakawika wahomelezi wo wulambi wono watya, “Munhu ayu si kalekaga kulonga nghani za nhovu muli hanhu aha hono helile, na muli u Wulajilize wa Musa.
44006014	Hambi nha camuhulika yakutya ati, ayu Yesu wa Nazaleti, kohahodanjila lukulu ihanhu baha, no kuyiwusiza lukulu imyoto yono yacilajiliza Musa.”
44006015	Na wose wono wali wali baho he balaza, wakamulanga Sitefano, wakawuwona wusu wakwe weza winha wusu wa Malayika.
44007001	Nayo Mukohani muwaha yakamuwuza Sitefano yakatya, “Ati wule, izinghani zizi za mbeka?”
44007002	Nayo Sitefano yakapitula yakatya, “Hulicizenyi, 'nye wandugu zangu, nanye mo wasogo zangu, u Mulungu wo lukumyo yamulawila u kuku yetu Abulahamu, lono yali ku Mesopotamiya, lono yali yakali si yanekala ku Halani.
44007003	Mulungu yakamutya, ‘Wuwuce mu yisi yako, wuwalekaje wanduguzo, wubite ku yisi yono nokulajila.’
44007004	Baho Abulahamu yakawa kuhama ku yisi ye Wakalidayo, yakawa kubita kwikala ku Halani. No sogwe yaza kuwa yatajika, u Mulungu yakamuhamya kanyhi kuko ku Halani, yakamuleta sunga mu yisi yiyi yono mwikaye nyenye alu.
44007005	Hamba u Mulungu si yamupela hanhu hanji ho hose mu yisi yiyi, hawe sawo yakwe ng'o. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, yamwihuwiza vyono komupela yisi yiyi yiwe yakwe, na yo lulelo lwakwe hanyuma yo mwene, hamba yiwe mu cipango cico, yali yakali yasina mwana.
44007006	Mulungu yamulonjela yakatya nhavi, ‘I wanago wolotegulwa ku yisi yono yitemigwe ne wanhu wanji, na kuko wonozwa wawanda no kutendelwa vibi myaka magana mane.
44007007	Ninga nane nololilipiciza likungugo lilyo lyono lyolowafuga. Hanyuma ninga, nolowahamya mu yisi yiyo, ho waze wanyitumamile hanhu bahano.’
44007008	Hanyuma u Mulungu yakawunoza u walame, ciwe co citanjilo ce cilagane. Holeka Abulahamu yamutegula ku calamo mwanagwe Isaka lono yali yafika vilo munana vyo wulelwe wakwe. Nayo Isaka nhavivyo, yamutegula ku calamo Yakobo, nayo Yakobo vyo yawatendela nhavivyo wawalya iwakuku zetu wawaha yikumi na wejete.
44007009	“Ne wa kuku zetu wawo, wakamuwonela Yusufu wivu, wakamuguza, yakategulwa ku Misili ku wuwanda. Ninga Mulungu yali yali hamonga nayo.
44007010	Yamuponya mu magayo gakwe gose. U Mulungu yakamupela lihewa ne mahala hali Falawo u mutemi wa Misili, sunga Falawo yakamuwika yawe muwaha mu yisi yiyilya, sunga na mu nyumba yakwe yo wutemi.
44007011	Yikagwa nzala mu yisi yose ya Misili na Kanani, nayo yikaleta wugaye wuwaha muno muno, ne wakuku zetu hamba si wasuma kutuga ndigwa yo yose.
44007012	Ninga Yakobo yaza kuhulika vyono ku Misili koyili ndigwa, yakawatuma wakuku zetu wabite kuko ku Misili lulongozi.
44007013	Mu muhinzo we kejete, wanduguze za Yusufu, wakamutanga, nayo Yusufu yakemanyiza kuli wanduguze, sunga na Falawo yakawamanya wanduguze za Yusufu.
44007014	Yusufu yakawalajiliza wamuceme sogwe Yakobo ne mhuga yakwe yose, wanhu makumi mupunghati na wahano.
44007015	Na Yakobo yakawa kubita ku Misili na kuko ko yafwila, hamonga ne wakuku zetu wanji.
44007016	Ne miwili yawo, yikategulwa sunga ku Shekemu, yikazikwa mu citenjelo cono Abulahamu yacigula kwa mapesa, kuli wana wa Hamoli ku Shekemu.
44007017	“Ninga lidaha lyaza fika, ho Mulungu yacifisilize icilagane cono yamupela Abulahamu, iliwalo lye wanhu lyali lyonjezeka muno ku Misili.
44007018	Hanyuma, yakatema mutemi yunji mu Misili mono si yali yamumanyile Yusufu.
44007019	Yuyo yakawagaza muno wakuku zetu, no kuwatendela vibi, ko kuwatya, wawataje kunze wana wawo wagalika walece kuwumipa.
44007020	Na mu mapango gago, ho yalelelwa Musa, nayo yakawa mwana muswanu hali Mulungu, yakadimwa myezi midatu mu nyumba yo sogwe.
44007021	Nayo yaza kuwikwa kunze, u mwana we cicekulu wa Falawo yakamusola, yakamudima nha mwanagwe yamulelile.
44007022	Musa yakafundwa zinghani zose ze mahala ge Wamisili, yakawa yali vilungo mu zinghani na mu milimo yakwe.
44007023	Ninga Musa yaza kuwa yaficila myaka makumi mane, cisukwa cikamwinjila mu nhumbula, yabite yakawalanje wanduguze Waisilayeli.
44007024	Na kuko, yakamuwona yunji muyawo yakugazwa vibi no Mumisili, yakabita yakamutaza, Musa yakamulipiciza yuyulya Mumisili, yakamuwulaga.
44007025	(Yehwesaga vyono wanduguze Waisilayeli, wotanga mba vyono u Mulungu komwitumamila mwene, kuwaponya, ninga hamba si wayitanga i nghani yiyi ng'o.)
44007026	Imitondo yaco yakawagana Waisilayeli wejete wakwitowa, yakasaka yawalamule, yakutya, ‘Nye walume anye, nha muli ndugu, alo so cici mukwinozeza vibi nyenye wose?’
44007027	Ayulya mono yamutowaga muyagwe, yakamukumhila Musa kutali, yakutya, ‘Alo nani mono yakuwicile gwegwe wuwe muwaha, na mulamuzi wetu?
44007028	Alo wukusaka wumbulaje nane nha vyono wamuwulaga ayulya Mumisili yigolo?’
44007029	Musa yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakatiza, yakabita kwikala mu yisi ya Midiyani, na kuko yakalela wana we cilume wejete.
44007030	“Yaza malika myaka makumi mane, Malayika wo Muwaha yakamulawila Musa mu cititika cono cakaga moto ku nyika, behi ne litunda lya Sinayi.
44007031	Musa yakezina muno, yaza kuyiwona nghani yiyo, yakasejelela behi ho yawone, ninga yakahulika lizi lyo Muwaha, likutya,
44007032	‘Ane yo nene u Mulungu we wasogo, u Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na wa Isaka, na wa Yakobo!’ Musa yakacicima so woga, hamba si yejelela kujendelela kulanga.
44007033	U Muwaha yakamutya, ‘Wugavulaje imalatu gako, hambi aha hono wimile nha hanhu helile.
44007034	Ane, nawuwona mbeka u wugaye we wanhu wangu wono wali ku Misili. Nicihulika ne cililo cawo, nane niza ho niwaponye. Holeka wuze hano, nghutume ku Misili.’
44007035	“Yuyu Musa, yo yuyo mono wanhu wa Isilayeli wamulema, wakutya, ‘Alo nani mono yakuwicile wuwe muwaha na mulamuzi wetu?’ Yo mwene Musa mono Mulungu yamutuma yawe muwaha, kanyhi na mukombozi, mu nzila ya Malayika mono yamulawila mu cititika cono cakaga moto.
44007036	Yo yuyo yo yawawusa ku yisi ya Misili, mu nzila yo kunoza mapoto, na mezino mu yisi ya Misili, na mwi'lenga lya Shamu na mu nyika, myaka makumi mane.
44007037	Yo mwene yuyo Musa mono yawatya wanhu wa Isilayeli, ‘U Mulungu kolomwinulilenyi Muwizi kulawa mu wandugu zenyu yenha nene.’
44007038	Mwi'pango lyono Waisilayeli wetang'anila ku nyika, yo Musa mono yali yali kuko, hamonga nawo. Yali yali kuko hamonga ne wakuku zetu, hamonga na ayulya malayika mono vyalongana nayo mwi'tunda lya Sinayi, yo yuyo mono yazibocela zinghani zo wumi, ho yacipele ase.
44007039	“Ninga, yo mwene mono wakuku zetu walema kumuhulika, wakamukumhila kutali, wakasulumila kuwuya ku Misili.
44007040	Wakamulonjela Haluni, ‘Wucinozeze milungu yono yocilongolela kumwande, hambi nha si cimanyile yono yimutujile Musa, mono yacitonjile ku wulawa ku Misili!’
44007041	Baho ho wenozeza cihwani ca ndama, wakacikumbika, wakacisecelela cinhu cono wacinoza kwe miwoko yawo weneco.
44007042	Ninga Mulungu yakawuka muli wene, yakawaleka wahembe zi nyelezi zo wulanga, nha vyono yandikwa mu citabu ce wawizi, ‘Anye mo wanhu wa Isilayeli! Yo si nene mono mwambulajila zimitugo no kunghumbika mu myaka makumi mane ku nyika!
44007043	Nanye mukalidinghula lihema lyo mulungu Moleki, ne cihwani ce nyelezi yo mulungu wenyu Lafani. Ivihwani vyono wavinoza, vyo vivyo vyono wavihemba. Ku soko yiyo nane, nokutegula kutali, ku wuwanda, kupuluta Babiloni.’
44007044	“Kuko ku nyika, i wakuku zetu wali wena lihema lyono lyahomelelaga vyono Mulungu yali baho. Nalyo lyanozwa nha vyono Mulungu yamulajiliza Musa yalinoze, liwe mu hwani yiyilya yono yawona.
44007045	Nawo wakuku zetu webocezaga, sunga mu cipango ca Yoshuwa, lono wenjilila kutema mu yisi yono wayiboka kuli makungugo gono yagawinga Mulungu hali wene. Baho likekala sunga mu vilo vya Dawudi.
44007046	Dawudi yakatuga lihewa hali Mulungu, yakamulomba Mulungu yamukombole, ho yamuzenjele wikalo, mwene mono yo Mulungu wa Yakobo.
44007047	Ninga Solomona yo yamuzenjela Mulungu Nyumba.
44007048	Ninga hamba nhavivyo u Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli vyose, nha si kekalaga mu zinyumba zono zizenjigwe ne wanhu, nha vyono yakutya muwizi,
44007049	‘U Muwaha yakutya, Wulanga lye 'goda lyangu, lyo lukumyo Ne yinze wo wukanyago we magulu gangu,
44007050	Alo nyumbaci yono mosuma kunzenjela? Vinhu vivi vyose, yo nene mono navinoza, hamba ng'o?’
44007051	“Anye mo wakamu ku wuhulice! Izinhumbula ne makutu genyu vinha vye wanhu we makungugo. Anye mwinha i wakuku zenyu. Nhondo zose mumwimilaga u Muhe Mono Yelile.
44007052	Wahayi muyagwe ne wawizi, mono si wamugaza iwakuku zenyu? Wakawawulaga awalya wono Mulungu yawatuma wawalonjele wanhu zo wuze wa Mono yali ling'ani, alu nanye mukamugaluka, no kumuwulaga.
44007053	Yo nyenye mono mwawubocela Wulajilize wono waletwa kuli'nye na Wamalayika, nanye hamba si mwawukamisa ng'o.”
44007054	Wawo wanyamhala we libalaza, waza kuzihulika zizi, wakahomeka muno muzi nhumbula, wakamwikang'anhilila kwe 'kuwo.
44007055	Ninga Sitefano vyono yali yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakagalamila ku wulanga, yakawona lukumyo lo Mulungu na Yesu yemile u kulume ko Mulungu.
44007056	Yakatya, “Lanjenyi ta! Nghuwona wulanga wugubuce, no Mwana wo Munhu yemile u kulume ko Mulungu.”
44007057	Ninga iwanhu wose wono wali wali baho he balaza wakazoza muno, no kudinda imakutu gawo ne miwoko yawo. Hanyuma wakawa kumuzumhilila wose hamonga,
44007058	wakamulavyaniza kunze ye kaya, wakamutowanga ne mabwe. Na awalya i wahomelezi, wakagawika makoti gawo hasi yo wulanjilizi wa muzelelo litagwa lyakwe Sawulo.
44007059	Wakajendelela kumutowanga Sitefano ne mabwe, akuno u mwene yakulomba yakutya, “Go Muwaha Yesu, wubocele Muhe wangu!”
44007060	Yakafugama yakabalaluka kwe yizi yiwaha, yakutya, “Gwe Muwaha wulece kuwahosa so wubi wuwu.” Yaza kondya kulonga zizi, hodu ho baho yakawa kufwa. Na Sawulo nayo yawona viswanu vyono wamuwulaje.
44008001	Izuwa lilyo wejela wugazwe wuwaha mwi'kanisa lyono lyali ku Yelusalemi. Wono wali wehuwila wose, wakeyagalila ku zisi za Yudiya na Samaliya, langa hono si watumwa du.
44008002	Wanhu wehuwilwa kuli Mulungu, wakamuzika Sitefano, wakamulilila cililo ciwaha.
44008003	Mu mapango gago, Sawulo yakaligaza likanisa, yenjilaga mu zinyumba monga monga, yakuwakwega walume ne wacekulu, yakuwategula ku jela.
44008004	Ale, wawo wono weyagazwa, wakakola ako na ako wakuyiganula nghani.
44008005	Nayo Filipo yakatima sunga ko kwi 'kaya lya Samaliya, yakawaganulila Iwasamaliya za Kilisito.
44008006	Wanhu wenji wakelunza hamonga, no kuhuliciza zono zalongwa na Filipo, wakagawona ne mapoto gono yanozaga.
44008007	Hambi nha wenji wono wali wena macisi mavu, gawukaga akuno wakuzoza ne mazi mawaha. Na wenji wono wali wadejepe imiwili yawo na we vilema, wakaponywa.
44008008	Kwali na nyemo mbaha mwi'kaya lilyo.
44008009	Ninga hali na munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Simoni, mono yanozaga u wuhawi wakwe mwi'kaya lilyo, mu vilo vyono vyapuluta, yakawapela wizine wanya Samaliya, yetezaga yo mweneco muwaha.
44008010	Iwanhu wose iwadodo ne wawaha, wamuhulicizaga muno, watezaga, “Simoni vyo vilungo vyo Mulungu, vyono vikucemwa Ivilungo viwaha.”
44008011	Wamuhulicila, vyono vilo vinji yawapelaga mezino no wuganga wakwe.
44008012	Ninga waza kumwihuwila Filipo yakuganula Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu, ne litagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, wakabaputizwa iwalume ne wacekulu.
44008013	Na Simoni mweneco nayo yakehuwila, nayo yali yeza kubaputizwa, vyaswezanaga na Filipo, na lono yalangaga vitanjilo ne mapoto mawaha gono ganozwaga, yakezina muno.
44008014	Iwatumwa wono wali ku Yelusalemi, wali weza kuhulika vyono Samaliya nayo yayibocela inghani yo Mulungu, wakawatumila Petelo na Yohana.
44008015	Nawo waza fika, wakawalombela ho wabocele Muhe Mono Yelile.
44008016	Hambi nha yali yakali namutimila yunji muyawo, wali wabaputizwa du, Mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu.
44008017	Wakawawicila miwoko yawo, nawo wakabocela u Muhe Mono Yelile.
44008018	Baho Simoni yaza wona, vyono mu wuwicile we miwoko ye Watumwa kuli walya wono wehuwila, u Muhe Mono Yelile kalavywaga, yakawapela mapesa wa Petelo na Yohana, yakutya,
44008019	“Mumhele nane ivilungo vivi, ho yiwe muli wose mono nomuwicila miwoko yangu, yabocele u Muhe Mono Yelile.”
44008020	Ninga Petelo yakamutya, “Mwajililane kuko hamonga ne mapesa gako, vyono wukwihwesa kosuma kugula i cipegwa co Mulungu na sawo.
44008021	Nha wusina yigawo hamba lifungu mu nghani yiyi, hambi inhumbula yako nha si yiling'aniye hali Mulungu.
44008022	Ale wunene wubi wako wuwu, wumulombe Muwaha, na lunji konenelwa lihweso lya mu nhumbula yako.
44008023	Hambi nha nghukuwona vyono wuli mu wusungu wukali, na mu wuwopwe wo wubi.”
44008024	Simoni yapitula yakatya, “Nghumunenenyi, munombele kuli Muwaha, zono mulonjile zilece kunyagana hamba monga.”
44008025	Wene wa Petelo na Yohana waza kukondya kuhomelela no kuganula inghani yo Muwaha, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakaganula Luganuzi Luswanu ku vitumbi vinji vye Wasamaliya.
44008026	Ninga Malayika wo Muwaha yakalonga na Filipo yakutya, “Winuce wubite kutakama sunga ko ku nzila yono yilawile ku Yelusalemi yitimiye ku Gaza.” (Ne nzila yiyo yikoleye mu nyika.)
44008027	Yakenuka, yakabita, na kumbe mwi'pango lilyo, kukawa na munhu Mwetopiya, mupaswe, mono nayo yali yali mu muhinzo yawuyaga ku kaya. Munhu yuyu yali munyamhala muwaha mu sawo ya Kandake, u Mutemi we cicekulu wa Wetopiya. Nayo yali yazize ku Yelusalemi ku wuhembi.
44008028	Na mwi'pango lilyo, yawuyaga yapandile mwi'gali lyakwe lyo kukwegwa, akuno yakusoma za mu citabu ca Isaya u Muwizi.
44008029	Muhe Mono Yelile yakamutya Filipo, “Sejelele, muhanje ne ligali lili.”
44008030	Filipo yakamumanyhilila, na baho, yakamuhulika yuyo munhu yakusoma mu citabu co muwizi Isaya, baho Filipo yakamuwuza, “Wule wukwizuka zizo zono wukuzisoma?”
44008031	Nayo yuyo munhu yakatya, “Nosuma kwizuka nhawule hono munhu si yananjize?” Yakamunena Filipo yananuce wekalane.
44008032	Ale, ihanhu hono yasomaga mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, hali aha, “Yategulwa nha ngholo ku wuwulagwe. Na kotya nyana ye ngholo hali wono wakuyicenyenha wukunzeje wayo, yene yinyamaye. Nha vivyo nayo siyenula mulomo wakwe.
44008033	Yakozwa cevu no kwimwa ze ling'ani. Hasina mono kosuma kulonga zo lulelo lwakwe, ku soko u wumi wakwe, nha wawuswa kono'nze.”
44008034	Yuyo Mwetopiya yakamutya Filipo, “Nghukunena, wunonjele, umuwizi yuyu yalongaga za nani?” Zo mweneco, hamba za yunji?
44008035	Nayo Filipo yakamulila ha Mandiko gago Gono Gelile, yakamuganulila za Yesu.
44008036	Na lono wali wakali wajendeleye no muhinzo, wakafika hanhu hono hogali malenga, na yuyo munhu yakatya, “Langa ta, aga malenga, wule ho cili cono cikunyimila ho ndece kubaputizwa?” [
44008037	Filipo yakatya, “Hono wuwe wihuwiye kwe nhumbula yako yose, kosuma kubaputizwa.” Nayo yakapitula yakatya, “Heya nihuwiye vyono Yesu Kilisito yo Mwana wo Mulungu.”]
44008038	Ale yuyo munhu yakatya ligali lime. Na wose vyono wejete, Filipo na yuyo munhu, wakatima mu malenga. Nayo Filipo yakamubaputiza.
44008039	Waza kuwuka mu malenga, u Muhe wo Muwaha yakamuwusa cinyele Filipo, na yuyo Mwetopiya si yamuwona kanyhi, ninga mwene yakajendelela no muhinzo wakwe du, akuno yamemile nyemo mbaha.
44008040	Ninga Filipo yakewona yali ku Azoto. Nayo yakajendelela kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu mu makaya gose, sunga yakafika na Kayisaliya.
44009001	Mu mapango gaga, Sawulo yali yaciziliza kuleta woga wuwaha so kuwawulaga wejizwa wo Muwaha. Yakabita kuli Mukohani muwaha,
44009002	yakalomba yapegwe baluwa, zono zosuma kumumanyiza kuli matang'anilo go wuhembelo ge Wayahudi ga ku Damesiki, kolo yakuwawona wanhu wono wakuyityatya i Nzila yo Muwaha i walume ne wacekulu, yawebate no kuwaleta ku Yelusalemi.
44009003	Ninga lono yali yali mu nzila, lono yali yaza behi no kufika ku Damesiki, lo lulo wuzelu kulawa ku wulanga, wukamumulika nhinicizo mbavu zose.
44009004	Yakagwa hasi, yakahulika lizi likumutya, “Sawulo, Sawulo, alo nhawule wukungaza?”
44009005	Nayo Sawulo yakawuza, yakatya “Gwegwe nani Muwaha?” Nalyo lizi lililya likapitula, “Yo nene Yesu mono wukungaza.
