44009006	Ninga winukaje wukenjile mwi'kaya, na kuko kolonjelwa yono yikunojeye witume.”
44009007	Iwanhu wono wajendana na Sawulo, wakawa wemile wasina yo kulonga, walihulika ilizi lililya, ninga siwawona munhu.
44009008	Sawulo yakenuka hasi, nayo yaza kunugula meso gakwe, hamba si yasuma kuwona co cose. Iwanhu wawalya, wakamwibata muwoko, wakamutegula sunga ku Damesiki.
44009009	Sawulo yakekala vilo vidatu si yakuwona, na mu vilo vivyo si yalizaga hamba kung'wa co cose.
44009010	Ale, kuko ku Damesiki, kwali na mwijizwa yunji, litagwa lyakwe Ananiya. U Muwaha yakamulonjela mu ndoto, “Ananiya!” Nayo Ananiya yakedika, “Ane baha Muwaha.”
44009011	Nayo u Muwaha yakamutya, “Winuce wubite ku nzila yono yicemwaga nzila yono yigoloce, wukawuze mu kaya ya Yuda, munhu yunji mono kacemwaga Sawulo, munya Taliso, nayo yakulomba,
44009012	nayo kawona munhu litagwa lyakwe Ananiya yakwinjila, yakumuwicila imiwoko yakwe, ho yatuje kuwona.”
44009013	Ninga Ananiya yakapitula yakatya, “Muwaha, hulikaga kuli wenji zo munhu yuyo, mabi malinga mawaha gono yawatendeye i wanhu wako wono welile kuko ku Yelusalemi.
44009014	Sunga na bahano, kaza yena no wukombolwe wulawa kuli Wakohani wawaha, yawawope wose wono walicemelezaga litagwa lyako.”
44009015	Ninga u Muwaha yakamutya, “Wubite du, hambi ayo, nha nimuhagula yawe ciya cangu, ho yalitegule litagwa lyangu kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ne watemi wawo, sunga na kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli.
44009016	Nane no mweneco, nomulajila zi nyinji zono zimunojeye yagazwe ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.”
44009017	Ananiya yakabita, yakenjila mu nyumba yiyo. Nayo yakamuwicila Sawulo miwoko yakwe, yakatya “Ndugu yangu Sawulo, u Muwaha Yesu, mono yakulawiye mu nzila yono waziza, yo yanhumile wutuje kuwona kanyhi, wumemywe u Muhe Mono Yelile.”
44009018	Lo lulo lulo, vikalagala vinji kulawa mu meso gakwe vyono vihwanile kotya makaka ge zisomba, yakatuga kuwona kanyhi. Yakenuka yakabaputizwa.
44009019	Nayo yaza kukondya kulya zindigwa, yakatuga vilungo. Sawulo yakekala vilo vicefu hamonga ne wejizwa wono wali wali kuko ku Damesiki.
44009020	Lo lulo lulo Sawulo yakamula kulonga mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo, vyono Yesu yo Mwana wo Mulungu.
44009021	Na wose wono wamuhulika, wakezina muno, wakatya, “Siyo yuyu mono yawawulagaga wono walicemelezaga litagwa lili ku Yelusalemi? Na bahano kaza so nghani yiyi, ho yawawope iwanhu wawo no kuwategula kuli Wakohani wawaha!”
44009022	Ninga Sawulo yakacila kuwa ne vilungo, no kukangaza cagalanze, vyono Yesu yo Kilisito, ne Wayahudi wa kuko ku Damesiki, wakawa wacelewaye du.
44009023	Na vyaza kupuluta vilo vinji, Wayahudi wakeheha ho wamuwulaje Sawulo.
44009024	Ninga Sawulo, yakawamanya ze maheho gawo. Wekalaga misi ne cilo, watejeye mu milango yo kwinjilila mwi'kaya ho wamuwulaje.
44009025	Ninga i wejizwa wakwe wakamusola ne cilo, wakamutajila mu nhoto, wakamukoza mwidilisha wakamusunja, wakamutimya hasi.
44009026	Sawulo yaza kufika ku Yelusalemi, yakajela kwilunza na walya wejizwa. Ninga wose wakamogopa, hamba siwehuwila vyono nayo yawa mwijizwa.
44009027	Ninga Balanaba yakaza yakamusola Sawulo, yakamutegula kuli watumwa, yakawasimuliziza vyono Sawulo yamuwona Muwaha mu nzila, na vyono Muwaha yalongana nayo, yakawalonjela kanyhi nha vyono, Sawulo yali kuganula ku Damesiki yasina woga.
44009028	Holeka Sawulo yakekala hamonga nawo. Yakapilima mu Yelusalemi yose yakuganula nghani yo Muwaha, akuno yasina woga.
44009029	Yakawa kulonga, no kwisumaniza ne Wayahudi wono wakulonga ci giliki, ninga wene wasakaga kumuwulaga.
44009030	Ninga we zindugu waza kuyimanya nghani yiyo, wakamusola Sawulo, wakamutegula sunga ko ku Kayisaliya, wakawa kumuleka yabite ku Taliso.
44009031	Nhondo ilikanisa lya mu Yudiya, na mu Galilaya, na mu Samaliya mose, likatuga mulamu mwidaha lilyo. Likasinyhimikwa no kuwilucila mu cogopo co Muwaha, likonjelezeka no kusindamikwa no Muhe Mono Yelile.
44009032	Kukawa lono Petelo yagajendelaga i makaya gose, yakabita sunga kuli wanhu wo Mulungu wono wekalaga ku Lida.
44009033	Na kuko yakagana munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Ayineya, mono yali yagona mu citanda myaka munana, hambi nha yali yadejepe.
44009034	Petelo yakamutya “Ayineya, Yesu Kilisito yakukuponya. Winuce witandicile citanda cako.” Ayineya yakenuka lo lulo baho.
44009035	Na wose wono wali wekaye baho ha Lida na Shaloni, wakamuwona Ayineya, nawo wose wakamupitucila Muwaha.
44009036	Kwali na mwijizwa yunji we cicekulu kuko ku Yopa, litagwa lyakwe yacemwaga Tabita, mu Cigiliki Dolika, nhunizo yayo “Nzimba.” Mucekulu yuyo yali yamemile metumo maswanu, nayo yawatazaga iwaciwa vilo vyose.
44009037	Kukawa mu vilo vivyo, yakatamwa, yakafwa. Nawo wakawuhovuga muwili wakwe, wakawuwika ku nyumba ya ku golofa kucanyha.
44009038	Na vyono Lida yali behi na Yopa, iwejizwa waza kuhulika vyono Petelo yali kuko ku Lida, wakatuma wanhu wejete kuli Petelo wamulonjele, “Wuze kono kwetu mbela.”
44009039	Hobaho baho Petelo yakenuka, vikabitana nawo. Nayo yaza kufika, wakamutegula ku nyumba ya ku golofa kucanyha. Ne wacekulu wafwile, wose wakamumemelela Petelo, wakulila, wakamulajila makoti ne myenda, vyono Dolika yanozaga lono yali yakali mumi.
44009040	Baho Petelo yakawalavyaniza kunze wose, yakafugama, yakalomba. Hanyuma yakawa kuwupitucila u muwili wa malehemu Dolika, yakatya, “Tabita winuce.” Nayo yakanugula imeso gakwe, na yaza muwona Petelo, yakenuka yakekala.
44009041	Nayo Petelo yakamwibata muwoko yakamwimya wima, hanyuma yakawa kuwacema wawalya iwanhu wo Mulungu, hamonga na walya iwacekulu wafwile, yakamuwika hali wene yeza mumi.
44009042	Ne nghani yiyi yikamanyika mu Yopa yose, ne wanhu wenji wakamwihuwila Muwaha.
44009043	Nayo Petelo yakekala vilo vinji kuko ku Yopa, mu nyumba ya munhu yunji Simoni, munoza zinyhingo.
44010001	Kwali na munhu ku Kayisaliya, litagwa lyakwe Kolineliyo, muwaha we mhuga ye wasilikale yigana, yono yacemwaga “Mhuga ye ci Italiya.”
44010002	yali munhu mwihuwilwa, u mwene hamonga na wa mu nyumba yakwe wose, wali wehuwilwa na kanyhi wali wogopo Mulungu, nayo yetuma zi nyinji, ko kuwataza iwaciwa we Ciyahudi, kanyhi yali yendile kumulomba u Mulungu nhondo zose.
44010003	Yali nha saa tisa ne misi, yakawona ciwonelela mu wugubulilwe, Malayika wo Mulungu yakwinjila mugati no kumutya, “Kolineliyo.”
44010004	Nayo Kolineliyo yakamunugulila meso yuyo Malayika kuno yakogopa, yakatya, “Alo ko cilici Muwaha?” Nayo Malayika yakamutya, “Mulungu kawubocela wulombe wako, hamonga no wulavye wako kuli waciwa.
44010005	Alu, wutume wanhu wabite ku Yopa, wakamusole yunji Simoni, litagwa linji kacemwaga Petelo.
44010006	Yekaye kwa yunji Simoni munoza zinyhingo, kaya yakwe yili ha mwejelele we lilenga.”
44010007	Yuyo Malayika mono vyalonganaga nayo, yaza wuka, Kolineliyo yakawacema iwetumami wakwe wejete, no musilikale mwihuwilwa, muyagwe na wono wamwitumamilaga nhondo zose,
44010008	yakawasimuliziza zizo zose, yakawatuma wabite ku Yopa.
44010009	Imitondo yaco, lono wanhu wawalya i wadatu wali wakali mu muhinzo, ninga wali wali behi no kufika ku Yopa, Petelo yakabita kucanyha ku golofa mu saa sita ye misi, kulomba.
44010010	Yakadabuka, yakasaka kulya zindigwa, na lono zali zikali kunozelezwa, yakebatwa na nhongo nzito, yakalota ndoto.
44010011	Yakawona wulanga wudiguce, na cinhu kotya yimwenda yiwaha, cikutimywa mu mamhembo gayo mane ho hasi.
44010012	Na mugati ye limwenda lilyo, mwali mogali mawala gose ge vilimu, ivilimu vye migulu mine, ne vilimu vyono vitambalaga hasi, ne zindeje za mucanyha.
44010013	Yakahulika lizi likumutya, “Petelo, winuce wuwulaje vilimu vivyo, wulye.”
44010014	Petelo yakatya, “Ng'o, Muwaha, hambi ane nha nghali sinalya co cose icisemunwa, hamba cavu.”
44010015	Ilizi lililya likahulikwa kanyhi likamutya “Wulece kutya visemunwa, ivinhu vyono Mulungu yakondizye kuvyeza.”
44010016	Inghani yiyi, yiketumwa nghanghulo yidatu, hanyuma limwenda lilya, likagomolwa ku wulanga.
44010017	Petelo lono yali yakali kwizina muli zono yagubuliywe, nhunizo yayo cici, wawalya wanhu wono wali watumwa na Kolineliyo waza kuyiwona nyumba ya Simoni, wakema ha mulango,
44010018	wakacema kwe lizi wakutya, “Ati ho yuli mujenzi baha mono yakucemwa Simoni Petelo?”
44010019	Na Petelo lono yali yakali kwihwesa zo wugubulilwe, ho baho u Muhe yakamutya, “Hulicize! Howali wanhu wadatu baha wono wakukulondola.
44010020	Ale winuce mbela mubitane nawo, hamba wulece kwihwelela, hambi nha nene niwatumile.”
44010021	Hobaho Petelo yakatima hasi, yakawatya wawo wanhu, “Ane baha mono mukunondola, nhawulenyi muza?”
44010022	Wanhu wawo wakamutya, “Kolineliyo u muwaha we wasilikale yigana, munhu mono yali ling'ani, kanyhi mwihuwilwa, mono kamogopago Mulungu, kanyhi mono yena lilumbo mu nghungugo yose ye Wayahudi, kacituma. Yalonjelwa na Malayika mono yelile, yakuceme wubite ku kaya yakwe, ho yahulice nghani yo yose yono kowa wina nayo yo kumulonjela.”
44010023	Petelo yakawacemela kugati, yakawapela hanhu ho kugona mu cilo cico. Imitondo yaco, Petelo yakenuka yakabitana nawo, na wenji we zindugu wa ku Yopa wakajendana nayo.
44010024	Na mwizuwa lye kejete, wakenjila ku Kayisaliya. Nayo Kolineliyo yawalindilizaga, yali yawakonghola ne wendece wakwe.
44010025	Baho Petelo lono yenjilaga, Kolineliyo yakamuhinjiliza, yakafugama ha mwande yakwe, yakenama ho hasi.
44010026	Ninga Petelo yakamwinula, yakamutya, “Winukaje, hambi nane nha nili munhu du.”
44010027	Na Petelo walonganaga na Kolineliyo, akuno wakwinjila mu nyumba, na mumo mu nyumba, wakawagana wanhu wenji wekonghoye.
44010028	Petelo yakawatya, “Nyenye nyo weneco mumanyile vyono Muyahudi wo wose, wulajilize wakwe we dini wukumulemeza yalece kwilunza ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Ninga u Mulungu kandajilila 'ne vyono ndece kumutya yunji musemunwa, lunji mwavu.”
44010029	Ku soko yiyo holeka mweza kunyhema si nemile kuza. Holeka alu nghusaka kumanya cono munyhemeye?
44010030	Kolineliyo yakatya, “Alu vyapuluta vilo vidatu vyono mwipango kotya lili, lye saa tisa ne misi, nalombaga mu nyumba yangu, kumbe kwa nhinicizo du, munhu mono yali yavwalile vivwalo vyono vikung'alala, yakema hali nene,
44010031	yakatya, Kolineliyo, Mulungu kawubocela wulombe wako, hamonga ne vilavywa vyako kuli waciwa.”
44010032	Alu, wutume munhu yabite ku Yopa, yakamuceme munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Simoni, ne litagwa linji kacemwaga Petelo, yekaye mu nyumba ya Simoni munoza zinyhingo, ha mwejelele we lilenga.
44010033	Holeka nane nghawa kukutumila wanhu lwa kamonga, nagwe kunoza viswanu kuza. Alu ase wose cili baha hali Mulungu, cizihulicize zose zono Muwaha yakulajilize wulonje.
44010034	Hobaho Petelo yakatya, “Alu mbeka ho natanga vyono u Mulungu yasina wuwaguzi.
44010035	Ninga munhu we nghungugo yo yose, mono kamogopago Mulungu, no kwituma ze ling'ani yo yakubocelwa nayo.
44010036	Ayi yo nghani yo Mulungu yono yawategulila iwanhu wa Isilayeli, yakuganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lono lukuleta mulamu muli Yesu Kilisito, mono yo Muwaha wa wose.
44010037	Anye muyimanyile inghani yilya yono yejela mu yisi yose ye Wayahudi, ku wulawilila ku Galilaya, hanyuma yo wubaputizo wono waganulwa na Yohana.
44010038	Yo Yesu wa Nazaleti, mono mumumanyile vyono u Mulungu yamwitila Muhe Mono Yelile ne vilungo. U Mulungu yali yali hamonga nayo, umwene yakola ako na ako yakwituma viswanu, no kuwaponya wose wono wagazagwa na Setani.
44010039	Nase cili wahomelezi wa zose, zono yatendaga mu yisi ye Wayahudi, na mu Yelusalemi. Wamuwulaga, wakamutumbika mu musalaba,
44010040	ninga u Mulungu, yakamuzukula mwizuwa lye kadatu, yakamunoza yejele,
44010041	ninga si kuli wanhu wose, langa kuli wawo wono u Mulungu yali yakondya kuwahagula wawe wahomelezi wakwe, wo wutya, yo sese mono calizana no kung'wezana hamonga nayo, lono yali yazuka muli wafu.
44010042	Yakacilajiliza ciwaganulile wanhu wose u Luganuzi Luswanu, no kuhomelela vyono u mwene yo yahagulwa no Mulungu, yawe Muling'anizi we womi ne wafu.
44010043	Sunga ne wawizi wose walonga zo Mwene, vyono munhu wo wose mono komwihuwila, kopegwa wunenelwe wo wubi wakwe mwi'tagwa lyakwe.”
44010044	Na lono Petelo yali yakali yakulonga zinghani zizi, u Muhe Mono Yelile yakawatimila wose wono wayihulicizaga nghani yiyo.
44010045	Wawalya Iwayahudi wono wali wehuwila, wono wazana na Petelo kuwulawa ku Yopa, wakezina muno, waza wona vyono Mulungu yawetiye icipegwa co Muhe Mono Yelile iwanhu wono si Wayahudi nhavivilya,
44010046	hambi nha wawahulika wakulonga mu nonga hayo hayo, wakumukumya Mulungu. Hobaho Petelo yakatya,
44010047	“Wanhu wawa wamubocela u Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono sese co weneco vyono camubocela. Wulenyi hoyuli yunji mono kosuma kuwemila wawa ho walece kubaputizwa?”
44010048	Hobaho yakawatya, wabaputizwe mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito. Wakamunena yekale nawo baho vilo vitela tele.
44011001	Iwatumwa na we zindugu wono wali ku Yudiya, wahulika vyono i wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo wayibocela nghani yo Mulungu.
44011002	Baho Petelo yali yeza kuwuya ku Yelusalemi, wawalya Iwayahudi wono wali wehuwila, wono wasakaga i wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo walame, wakamuhosa, wakutya,
44011003	“Agwe wabita kwikala ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, mukalizana nawo!”
44011004	Ninga Petelo, yakawasimuliziza monga monga, muli zono zanozwa kulawa mwamulizo, yakatya,
44011005	“Mwi'zuwa linji lono nali nili mu wulombe kuko ku Yopa, nghawona wugubulilwe, nghawona cinhu kotya yimwenda yiwaha lyono lyatimywaga hasi likulawa ku wulanga, likawa libatwe mamhembo gayo mane, nalyo likawikwa behi na nene.
44011006	Naza kusunjilila mugati, nghawona vilimu vye migulu mine, vilimu vya mu mbago, vilimu vyono vitambalaga ne zindeje za mucanyha.
44011007	Hanyuma nghahulika lizi likunonjela likutya, ‘Petelo, wuwulaje, wulye.’
44011008	Ninga ane nghatya, ‘Ng'o Muwaha, ku soko co cose cisemunwa, hamba cavu, cikali sinenjila mu mulomo wangu.’
44011009	Lizi lililya likahulikwa kanyhi kulawa ku wulanga, ‘Wulece kuvicema visemunwa ivinhu vyono Mulungu yavyezize.’
44011010	Ne nghani yiyi yikanozeka nghanghulo yidatu, na ndumilizo, vyose vikagomolwa kanyhi ku wulanga.
44011011	Ne wanhu wadatu, wono wali watumigwe kuli'ne, wono walawa ku Kayisaliya, wakaficila nhinicizo ku nyumba yono nekalaga.
44011012	Muhe yakanyitya cibitane nawo, ndece kwihwelela. Na awa wandugu mutandatu, wakabitana nane Kayisaliya, na kuko cikenjila mu nyumba ya Kolineliyo.
44011013	Nayo yakacisimuliziza vyono yawona Malayika yemile mu nyumba yakwe yakutya, ‘Wutume munhu yabite ku Yopa, yakamuceme Simoni, mono kacemwaga litagwa linji Petelo.
44011014	Mwene kokulonjela izinghani zono moponela, agwe na wa mu nyumba yako wose.’
44011015	Nali neza kwanza du kulonga, u Muhe Mono Yelile yakawatimila, nha vyono yacitimila ase bahalya ha lulongozi.
44011016	Baho nghayikumbucila nghani yo Muwaha vyono yatya, ‘Yohana yabaputizaga na malenga, ninga anye molobaputizwa mu Muhe Mono Yelile.’
44011017	Alu hono Mulungu yawapela nhavivyo i wanhu wono si Wayahudi icipegwa ci cilya cono yacipela nase, lono camwihuwilila u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, alu ane waco nili nani 'mbi, ho sume kumwimila Mulungu?”
44011018	Waza kuzihulika zizi, wakanyamala, wakamukumya Mulungu wakutya, “U Mulungu kawapela i wanhu wono si Wayahudi cilejeho co kunena ho wawutuje wumi!”
44011019	Ku soko yo wugazwe, wono wejela mu cipango cono yawulajilwa Sitefano, wono wali wehuwila wakeyagala. Wanji wakabita sunga ko ku Foyinike, na Kupulo, na Antiyokiya, wakayiganula nghani kuli Wayahudi du.
44011020	Ninga hali ho wali na wanji wayawo, wono walawa ku Kupulo na Kilene, nawo wakabita ku Antiyokiya, wakayiganula nghani yiyo kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wakuwaganulila Luganuzi Luswanu lo Muwaha Yesu.
44011021	U Muwaha yakawataza, ne wanhu wenji wakehuwila, no kumupitucila u Muwaha.
44011022	Inghani yiyo yikamanyika ne likanisa lyono lyali ku Yelusalemi. Nawo wakamutuma Balanaba yabite sunga ko ku Antiyokiya.
44011023	Nayo yaza fika kuko, no kuwona vyono Mulungu yawamotizye wanhu, yakasecelela, yakawanena wose wajendelele kuwa wehuwilwa muli Muwaha.
44011024	Balanaba vyono yali munhu muswanu, yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, no wihuwilo. Wanhu wenji wakonjelezeka kuli Muwaha.
44011025	Hanyuma Balanaba yakabita ku Taliso kumulondola Sawulo.
44011026	Nayo yaza muwona, yakamuleta ku Antiyokiya. Nawo wose vyono wejete, wakekalana ne likanisa lilyo, mu mwaka wose mututu, wakawa wakwijiza yipuga yiwaha lye wanhu. Na kuko ku Antiyokiya, wejizwa ko wamulila kucemwa Wakilisito.
44011027	Mu vilo vivyo du, wawizi wanji wakaza ku Antiyokiya wakulawa ku Yelusalemi.
44011028	Yakema muyawo yumonga litagwa lyakwe Agabo, na kwe vilungo vyo Muhe, yakalajila vyono yolowa nzala mbaha kono'nze kose. (Ne nzala yiyo yikawa mu vilo vyo mutemi Kilawudiyo.)
44011029	Iwejizwa wose wakelumbila munhu na ha nghango yakwe, kuwategulila wutazi, we zindugu wono wekalaga mu Wuyahudi.
44011030	Na nhavivyo vyo wanoza, wakawategulila wanyamhala we likanisa u wutazi wuwo kwe miwoko ya Balanaba na Sawulo.
44012001	Behi ya mu vilo vivyo baho, u mutemi Helode yakamula kuwagaza wakilisito wanji.
44012002	Yakamuwulaga Yakobo u muwahawe wa Yohana, no mumaje.
44012003	Yaza wona vyono i litumo lilyo liwendeze Wayahudi, yakacila, sunga yakamwibata Petelo. Yiyo yiketumwa mu vilo vye mikate yono siyisasize.
44012004	Petelo yaza kwibatwa, yakawikwa mu jela, yakamuwika hasi ya vipuga vine vye wasilikale wane wane wamwikalize. Helode yahilaga yamulavye cagalanze kuli wanhu, i Pasaka kolo yeza kupuluta.
44012005	Na lono Petelo yali yali mu jela, ilikanisa si lyadilaga kumulombela hali Mulungu.
44012006	Mu cilo cono cali cileceye lizuwa lyono Helode yali yamulavye Petelo cagalanze kuli wanhu, Petelo yali yagonile hagati ye wasilikale wejete, yali muwopwe ne minyolo myejete, ne walindilizi wali walindilize ha mulango we jela.
44012007	Kumbe, Malayika wo Muwaha yakema nhinicizo hali mwene, no wuzelu wukabulila mu nyumba yiyilya ye jela. Malayika yakamusinhusa Petelo, yakamutya “Winuce mbela.” Ho baho imanyolo gakadumuka mu mawoko gakwe.
44012008	Malayika yakamutya, “Witunje, wuvwale malatu gako.” Nayo yakanoza nhavivyo. Hanyuma yuyo Malayika yakamutya, “Vwale likoti lyako, wunhyatye.”
44012009	Petelo yakamutyatya kunze, ninga si yamanya vyono zizo zono zinozigwe na Malayika zali za mbeka, langa yaganicizaga nha vyono yakulota ndoto.
44012010	Nawo waza kupuluta ha wugozezo wulongozi na we kejete, wakafika ku mulango wa cuma wo kwinjilila mwi'kaya, u mulango wuwo wukawadigucila wuli wene, nawo wakalawaniza kunze. Wakajendana mu nzila monga, hanyuma Malayika yakamuleka lwa kamonga Petelo yali wene.
44012011	Nayo Petelo ho yezucila baho zono zijeye, yakatya, “Alu he mbeka, ho namanya vyono u Muwaha katuma Malayika wakwe kamhonya kulawa mu muwoko wa Helode, na muli zose zono wanhu wa Isilayeli wali walanjiliye.”
44012012	Nayo yaza kukondya kumanya nhavivyo, yakabita sunga ko ku kaya ya Malyamu nyina ya Yohana, mono kacemwaga Maluko. Na mu kaya yiyo, wali wekonghoye wanhu wenji wakulomba.
44012013	Nayo Petelo yakakong'onha mulango, no mwitumami yumonga we cihinza litagwa lyakwe Loda, yakabita ku mulango kwidika.
44012014	Nayo yuyo muhinza yakalitanga lizi lya Petelo, yakasangalala muno, sunga yakaleka na zo wudigula mulango, umwene kanyhi yakawamanyhila kugati, yakawalonjela vyono Petelo yemile ha mulango hanze.
44012015	Wakamutya yuyo muhinza, “Alo wina lukwale!” Ninga mwene yakacila kulonga du, vyono yili mbeka. Nawo wakamutya, “Ayo yo Malayika wakwe.”
44012016	Na mu cipango cico, Petelo nayo yakasimbilila kukong'onha. Hanyuma nhondo wakawudigula mulango, wakamuwona, vyono yo mweneco, wakezina.
44012017	Nayo Petelo, yakawayunziza u muwoko, wanyamale, nayo yakawasimuliziza vyono Muwaha yamulavizye mu jela. Yakawatya wamulonjele zinghani zizi Yakobo, na we zindugu wanji, hodu u mwene yakawa kulawila, yakawa kubita hanhu hanji.
44012018	Wali weza kwela, hakawa na mahwele mawaha, muli wawalya iwasilikale muli yono yimuweye Petelo.
44012019	Helode yakalajiliza yalondolwe muno, ninga hamba nhavivyo si wasuma kumuwona. Holeka yakawa kulajiliza wawalya wasilikale wawuzwe, yakalajiliza wawulagwe. Hanyuma Petelo yakawuka kuko ku Yudiya yakabita ku Kayisaliya, yakekala kuko.
44012020	Nayo Helode yakakozwa likuwo muno na wanya Tulo na Sidoni. Ninga wene wakamutumila wanhu. Nawo wakasuma kumutuga Balasito yawe ku lubavu lwawo. Balasito yali mulanjilizi muwaha we likulu lyo mutemi. Wakamubitila Helode, wakamulomba hawe mulamu, vyono yisi yawo, yali yitumbiye kutuga zindigwa kulawa ku yisi yo mutemi.
44012021	Na mwizuwa linji lyono lyali yihagulwe, Helode lono yali yavwala myenda mitambule, yekala mwigoda lyo wutemi, yakawalonjela wanhu nghani.
44012022	Iwanhu wakazoza kwa nyemo wakutya, “Lizi ali lya Mulungu, hamba si lya munhu.”
44012023	Ho baho baho Malayika wo Muwaha yakamugwisa Helode hasi, vyono si yamupela Mulungu lilumbo lilyo. Yakaligwa ne mang'onyo, yakafwa.
44012024	Ninga inghani yo Mulungu yikacila kukangala no konjelezeka.
44012025	Balanaba na Sawulo waza kukondya kukwiza u witumami wawo, wakawuka kanyhi ku Yelusalemi, wakamusola na Yohana mono hanji kacemwaga Maluko.
44013001	Kwi Kanisa lya ku Antiyokiya, kwali kowali wanhu wanji wono wali wawizi ne wejizi, na muli wawo, yali Balanaba na Simoni mono kacemwaga Mutitu, na Lukiyo wa ku Kilene, na Manayeni mono yawiluswa hamonga no mutemi Helode, na Sawulo.
44013002	Nawo lono wamwitumamilaga Muwaha, no kuleka kulya, Muhe Mono Yelile yakatya, “Siwanulilenyi Balanaba na Sawulo so mulimo wono niwacemeye.”
44013003	Nawo waza kondya kulomba no kuleka kulya, wakawawicila miwoko wakawaleka wabite.
44013004	Nawo wa Balanaba na Sawulo, wali weza kutumwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, wakatenenhuka sunga ko ku Selukiya, no kulawa kuko wakajendelela mu ngalawa sunga ko ku cizingwa ca Kupulo.
44013005	Waza kufika ku Salami, wakaganula nghani yo Mulungu mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo ge Wayahudi. Na Yohana (Maluko) yali mutazi wawo.
44013006	Waza kondya kupuluta ilizingwa lyose, sunga ko ku Pafo, na kuko wakagana muhawi yunji, Muyahudi, litagwa lyakwe Baliyesu, mono yenozaga nha muwizi.
44013007	Yuyu yali yali hamonga na Seligiyo Pawulo, u muwaha we cizingwa cico, munhu we mahala. Seligiyo Pawulo, yakawacema wa Balanaba na Sawulo ho yayihulice nghani yo Mulungu.
44013008	Ninga yuyo u muhawi Elima, (nha vyono wamucemaga ku nonga ye Cigiliki) yakajela kuwabeza, ho yamwimile yuyo u muwaha we cizingwa, yalece kupitucila wihuwilo we Cikilisito.
44013009	Ninga Sawulo mono yacemwaga kanyhi Pawulo, yali yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakamunugulila yuyo u muhawi,
44013010	yakatya, “Gwe go mwana wa Setani, go mulugu wo wiling'ano wose, mono wumemile wubala wose, no wubi wose, alo koleka nili kuzibidyanga zinzila zo Muwaha zono zigoloce?
44013011	Alu wulanje ta, u muwoko wo Muwaha wo kulipiciza, kowa mubofu, hamba si kosuma kuliwona lizuwa cidaha.” Lu lulo lulo siyasuma kuwona cinji, yakapilima pilima akuno na akuno yakulondola munhu wo kumwibata muwoko, yamutonje.
44013012	U Muwaha we cizingwa yaza kuziwona zizo, yakehuwila, yakezina mejizo gono yahulika ga kuli Muwaha.
44013013	Pawulo ne wayagwe wakatulucila mu ngalawa wakulawa ku Pafo, wakubita ku Peliga ya ku Pamufuliya, ninga Yohana (Maluko) yakawaleka yakawuya ku Yelusalemi.
44013014	Ninga wene wakajendelela no muhinzo wakulawa ku Peliga, sunga kwi kaya lya Antiyokiya ya ku Pisidiya. Na mwizuwa lye Sabato wakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo wakekala.
44013015	Imasomo gali geza kukondya kusomwa, mu wulawa mu citabu co Wulajilize wa Musa, mu mandiko ge wawizi, iwanhu we nhang'anilo yiyo yo wuhembelo, wakawatumila munhu, wakutya, “Nye wandugu, cikumulombenyi hono mwina nghani yo kuwejiza wanhu, ale lonjenyi.”
44013016	Hobaho Pawulo yakenuka yakema, yakawayunziza u muwoko wakwe, yakatya, “Nye mo wayangu mo wa Isilayeli, nanye wose mono muli baha mono mumogopile u Mulungu, ta muhulicizaje!
44013017	U Mulungu we wanhu wawa Waisilayeli, yawahagula wakuku zetu, yakawanoza kuwa nghungugo mbaha, lono wali mu yisi yo wujenzi kuko ku Misili. No Mulungu yakawawusa kuko, kwe vilungo vyakwe viwaha.
44013018	Yakawakangalila mwidaha lya myaka makumi mane mu nyika.
44013019	Yaza kukondya kugahodanga makungugo mupunghati, ga mu yisi ya Kanani, yakawapela wawo iwanhu wakwe yiwe yisi yawo.
44013020	Myaka magana mane na makumi mahano yaza kupuluta, hanyuma yayo, yakawapela walamuzi wawatonje, sunga mu vilo vyo muwizi Samwili.
44013021	Hanyuma wakasaka wawe na mutemi, u Mulungu yakawapela Sawuli mwana wa Kisi, wo mulango wa Benyamini, yawe mutemi wawo mu myaka makumi mane.
44013022	No Mulungu yaza kumuwusa Sawuli, yakamuwika Dawudi yawe mutemi wawo. Mulungu yahomelela, yakatya, ‘Nimuwona Dawudi u mwana wa Yese, munhu mono nimwendile muno, yo munhu mono kosuma kwituma zose zono nghusaka nizitume.’
44013023	Mu wulawa mu mhuga yo munhu yuyu, u Mulungu nha vyono yehuwiza, kawaletela wanhu wa Isilayeli Muponyi, yo Yesu.
44013024	Na lono Yesu yali yakali sinaza, Yohana yamulongolela, yakawa kuwaganulila wanhu wose wa Isilayeli, vyono yiwanojeye wanene no kubaputizwa.
44013025	Na Yohana lono yamalilizaga witumami wakwe, yawalonjela wanhu, ‘Alo mukwihwesa ane yo nene nani? Ane yo si yulya mono mumulanjiliye. Yuyo yakuza munyuma yangu, mono ane si nojeye hamba kuhogosa mikowa ye malatu gakwe.’
44013026	“Nye wandugu zangu mo wana we mhuga ya Abulahamu, na nyenye wose mono mumogopile u Mulungu! Yo sese mono cileteywe inghani ye mhonelo yiyi.
44013027	Hambi wono wekaye ku Yelusalemi, hamonga ne wawaha wawo, si wamumanya mwene vyono yo Muponyi. Hamba si wasuma kuzimanya zinghani ze wawizi zono zasomwaga vilo vyose mu Sabato. Hamba nhavivyo wakagafisiliza i mandiko so kumuwulaga Yesu.
44013028	Na hamba wawe si wawona muli mwene soko yo yose yo kumuwulajila, ninga wakasaka kuli Pilato, yawulagwe.
44013029	Sunga waza kukondeleza zose zono zandikwa muli mwene, wakamutungula mu musalaba, wakamuwika mu citenjelo.
44013030	Ninga Mulungu yakamuzukula muli wafu.
44013031	Nayo mu vilo vinji, yakejela kuli walya wono wakazana nayo kulawa ku Galilaya sunga ko ku Yelusalemi. Na wawo, aluno wo wahomelezi wakwe kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli.
44013032	Nase alu, ciza bahano, ho cimuletelenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu, inghani yiyilya yono u Mulungu yawehuwiza wa kuku zetu,
44013033	kayifisiliziza luno muli ase co wezukulu wawo, mu nzila yo kumuzukula Yesu, kulawa muli wafu. Nha vyono yandikwe mu Zabuli ye kejete, ‘Yo gwegwe mwanangu Izuwali nawa nili sogo.’
44013034	“Na zo kumuzukula muli wafu, na vyono sikowuya kanyhi kuko no kuwolela mu citenjelo, u Mulungu yakatya nhavi! ‘Nomupelenyi nyenye wumoti wono namwihuwiza Dawudi, wono welile na we mbeka.’
44013035	Nha vyono yalonjela kanyhi mu Zabuli yinji yakutya, ‘Sikomuleka mono welile wako yawolele mu citenjelo.’
44013036	Alu Dawudi mweneco, yawufisiliza wuhile wo Mulungu mu cipango cakwe, hanyuma yakafwa, yakazikwa mu citenjelo behi ne wasogwe, no muwili wakwe wukawolela mu citenjelo.
44013037	Ninga yulya mono u Mulungu yamuzukula kulawa muli wafu, siyawolela mu citenjelo.
44013038	Holeka zimanyice cagalanze kuli'nye wandugu zangu, vyono muli yuyu Yesu Kilisito, mo mukuganulilwa u Luganuzi lo wunenelwe wo wubi,
44013039	na vyono munhu wo wose mono yakumwihuwila Yesu, yakunenelwa zose zono si mosuma kunenelwa mu nzila yo Wulajilize wa Musa.
44013040	Holeka musuguce, zilece kumuzizenyi zono zalongwa ne wawizi,
44013041	‘Lanjenyi ta, anye mo wabedegazi, mwizine mwajilile! Hambi nha nghwituma mulimo mu vilo vyenyu, Mulimo wono si mokwihuwilila lukulu, hamba munhu yamulonjelenyi muno.’ ”
44013042	Wa Pawulo na Balanaba lono walawilaga mumo mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wawalya wanhu wakawalalika waze kanyhi, mwi'zuwa lye Sabato yono yikutyatya, ho wawalonjele kanyhi ze nghani yiyo.
44013043	Wihangulize wuwo waza malika, Iwayahudi wenji, hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wono wali wayipitucila i dini ye Ciyahudi, wakawatyatya wa Pawulo na Balanaba. Nawo watumwa, wakaduwana nawo, wakawasikamya, wajendelele kwikala akuno wakulitumbila lihewa lyo Muwaha.
44013044	Na mwizuwa lye Sabato yono yikatyatya, behi ne wanhu wose wa mwi'kaya lilyo, wakaza kuhuliciza nghani yo Muwaha.
44013045	Ninga Wayahudi waza kuwuwona winji we wanhu, wakawona wivu, wakazibedula zinghani zono Pawulo yalongaga, kanyhi wakamutovula.
44013046	Ninga hamba nha vivyo, Pawulo na Balanaba, wakalonga muno akuno wasina woga, wakatya, “Vyo yali yinojeye Inghani yo Mulungu yamule yimuficilenyi nyenye. Ninga vyono muyikumhiye kutali, no kwiwona vyono wumi we cibitilila si wukumunojelenyi nyenye, ale, ceza kumulecenyi, no kuwabitila i wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
44013047	Hambi Muwaha nha yacilajiliza yakatya, ‘Nghukuwika gwegwe wuwe wuzelu we makungugo, Wuwe nzila ye mhonelo mu yinze yose.’ ”
44013048	Iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, waza kuyihulika nghani yiyo, wakasecelela, wakayikumya nghani yo Mulungu, na wose wono wali watemezezwe wumi we cibitilila, wakehuwila.
44013049	Inghani yo Muwaha yikatandala mu yisi yiyilya yose.
44013050	Ninga Wayahudi wakawasagahaza iwacekulu we lilumbo wono wali si Wayahudi, wono wali wehuwilwa muli Mulungu, hamonga ne walume watambule wa mwi'kaya lilyo. Wakawa kwamula kuwagaza wa Pawulo na Balanaba, wakawawinga wawuce mu yisi yawo.
44013051	Nawo watumwa, wakawakung'unhila manghundi ga mu magulu gawo, so wuhomelezi kuli wene, hanyuma wakawa kubita ku Ikoniyo.
44013052	Ninga iwejizwa wawo, wali wamemile nyemo, no Muhe Mono Yelile.
44014001	Kuko ku Ikoniyo, zinghani zikawa nha vyono zali ku Antiyokiya. Wa Pawulo na Balanaba wakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo ye Wayahudi, wakalonga wapetuce, sunga Wayahudi wenji hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wakehuwila.
44014002	Ninga Wayahudi wanji wono si wasaka kwihuwila, wakawasagahaza wanhu wono si Wayahudi no kuwatajila nhumbula yo lusulo ho wawabeze we zindugu.
44014003	Holeka wa Pawulo na Balanaba wakajendelela kwikala kuko vilo vilo. Wakulonga wasina woga muli Muwaha, nayo Muwaha yakayikamya i mbeka ye lihewa lyakwe yono wayiganulaga, ko kuwapela vilungo vyo kunozeza mapoto ne mezino.
44014004	Ninga wanhu wa mwi'kaya lilyo, wakegawa hejete, wanji wakawa ku lubavu lwe Wayahudi, na wanji wakawa ku lubavu lwe watumwa.
44014005	Hanyuma yayo, iwanhu wanji wono wi Wayahudi, hamonga ne Wayahudi, wakelunza hamonga ne wawaha wawo, ho wawatendele vibi wawo iwatumwa, no kuwatowanga ne mabwe.
44014006	Ninga iwatumwa waza kuyimanya nghani yiyi, wakatiziza ku Lusitela na Delibe, i matumbi ga Lukawoniya, na mu mhelo mhelo ya baho.
44014007	Na kuko wakajendelela kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu.
44014008	Kwali na munhu yunji kuko ku Lusitela, mono yali yali citewe kulawa vyono yalelwa, nayo yali yakali si yanajenda hamba hadodo.
44014009	U munhu yuyo, yamuhulicizaga Pawulo lono yaganulaga. Nayo Pawulo yakamulanga muno, na yaza kumuwona vyono yena wihuwilo wo kusuma kuponywa,
44014010	yakalonga ne'zi iwaha, yakutya, “Winuce wime wima.” Nayo yuyo mono yali yali citewe, yakenuka musunho, yakanza kujenda.
44014011	Imapuga ge wanhu gaza kuwona yono Pawulo yayinozize, wakanza kuzoza, wakulonga mu nonga ye Cilukawoniya, wakutya, “Imilungu yicitimila yihwanile wanhu.”
44014012	Balanaba wakamucema Zewusi, na Pawulo, vyono mwene yali yo mulonji muno, wakamucema Heleme.
44014013	Nayo mukohani mono yamwitumamilaga yuyo mulungu Zewusi, mono nyumba yakwe yo wuhembelo vyali vidomile ne likaya, yakaleta ng'ombe no wihambo wa maluwa, sunga ho ha mulango muwaha we likaya, nayo yasakaga vihanje ne wanhu wawalya, wawalavizye yikumbiko iwatumwa.
44014014	Ninga Pawulo na Balanaba wali weza kuzihulika zizo, wakademulanga myenda yawo, wakenjila hagati ye lipuga lye wanhu, wakazoza wakutya,
44014015	“Nhawulenyi mukwituma zizi? Nase nha cili wanhu du kotya nyenye. Nase cili baha ho cimuganulilenyi Luganuzi Luswanu, ho muzilece zizi zo wulele, mumupitucile Mulungu mumi mono yawumba wulanga ne yinze, lilenga na vyose vyono vili mugati.
44014016	I katali u Mulungu yagakombola i makungugo gose getume nha vyono gendile.
44014017	Hamba nhavivyo, u Mulungu si yaleka kwilajila, so metumo maswanu gono yakumunozezenyi, yakumupelenyi mvula ya ku wulanga, kanyhi ya kumupelenyi ne vipango vye matika, yakumupelenyi zi ndigwa, no kuzigutya zinhumbula zenyu na nyemo.”
44014018	Hamba wawe walonga zizo, ninga wakawona kukamu kuwemila mapuga, ho galece kuwalavizya likumbiko.
44014019	Ninga Wayahudi wanji, wakaza wakulawa ku Antiyokiya na Ikoniyo wakawakwega wanhu ho welunze nawo, wakamutowanga Pawulo ne mabwe, wakamukulunhya sunga ko kunze ye likaya, wakawa kwihwesa vyono yakondya kufwa.
44014020	Ninga wejizwa wakekonghola, wakamupilima, nayo yakenuka yakenjila mwikaya. Imitondo yaco yakatuluka, mwene na Balanaba, wakabita ku Delibe.
44014021	Waza kuwaganulila Luganuzi Luswanu wa mwi'kaya lilyo lya Delibe, no kutuga wejizwa wenji, wakawuya ku Antiyokiya, ninga wakakolela ku Lusitela na Ikoniyo.
44014022	Wakawasinyhimika zinhumbula i wejizwa, no kuwasikamya wekalaje mu wihuwilo. Wakawalonjela wakutya, “Yicinojeye ase wose kukolela mu magayo menji, mu winjile mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
44014023	Wakawahagula wanyamhala kulawa mu makanisa gose, ho walidime i Likanisa. Nawo waza kuwa walomba no kuleka kulya, wakawawika kuli Muwaha mono wamwihuwila.
44014024	Wakakola mu yisi ya Pisidiya, wakafika ku Pamufuliya.
44014025	Waza kukondya kuganula nghani mu Peliga, wakabita ku Ataliya,
44014026	na ku wulawa kuko, wakajendela mu ngalawa, wakawuya ku Antiyokiya, ihanhu bahalya hono walombelwa ha mwamulizo, no kuwikwa mu wukamiswe wa mwi'hewa lyo Mulungu, so mulimo wono wali wakondya kuwufisiliza.
44014027	Waza kufika kuko ku Antiyokiya, wakacema mukung'ano we Kanisa ya baho. Wakawasimuliziza zose zono Mulungu yetumile hamonga nawo, kanyhi vyono Mulungu yawadiguliye mulango, iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, ho wenjile mu wihuwilo.
44014028	Wakekalana hamonga na wawalya iwejizwa vilo vikatela.
44015001	Ale, wanhu wanji wakaza ku Antiyokiya wakulawa ku Yudiya, wakawa kwanza kuwafunda we zindugu, wakutya, “Hono mulece kwalama nha vyono winha wityatye wo Wulajilize wa Musa, si mosuma kupona ng'o.”
44015002	Ne nghani yiyi, yikaleta wiwanganile wuwaha, nawo wa Pawulo na Balanaba waza kukondya kulongana nawo, wakelumbaniza vyono, wa Pawulo na Balanaba, hamonga na wanji wandugu we likanisa lilyo lya Antiyokiya, wabite ku Yelusalemi wakawawuze nghani yiyi watumwa ne wanyamhala.
44015003	Ilikanisa likawelaga, nawo lono wakolaga mu Foyinike na mu Samaliya, wawasimulizizaga wanhu nha vyono i wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo wamupituciye Mulungu. Ne nghani yiyi yikawasangalaza muno we zindugu wose.
44015004	Nawo waza kufika ku Yelusalemi, wakabocelwa ne likanisa ne watumwa ne wanyamhala, nawo wakawasimuliziza zose zono Mulungu yaketuma hamonga nawo.
44015005	Ninga iwejizwa wanji wono wali cipuga ce Wafalisayo, wakema, wakutya, “Yiwanojeye i wanhu wono si Wayahudi walame, no kwijizwa watyatye Wulajilize wa Musa.”
44015006	Baho watumwa ne wanyamhala wakanoza mukung'ano wa ciwene, ho wasume kuyilanga langa nghani yiyo.
44015007	Na gaza kuwa mawuzo menji, Petelo yakenuka yakawatya, “Nye wandugu zangu nha mumanyile vyono ha mwamulizo, u Mulungu yakenda kuhagula nene muli nyenye, ho niluganule Luganuzi Luswanu, ho wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wahulice no kwihuwila.
44015008	Nayo Mulungu mono yazimanyile zinhumbula ze wanhu, yakahomelelela nha vyono, kawavumila i wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ko kuwapela Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono yacipela sese.
44015009	Hamba si yanoza wisimajile wa ase na wene, ninga yaweza zinhumbula zawo ko wihuwilo.
44015010	Alu so cici mukumujela Mulungu, ko kuwatwika wawo iwejizwa u mutegulo wono hamba wa kuku zetu hamba sese du, si casuma kuwudinghula?
44015011	Hamba yilece kuwa nhavivyo, ninga cihuwiye vyono, sese na weneco nhavivyo, cikupona mu nzila ye lihewa lyo Muwaha Yesu.”
44015012	Imhuga yose wakanyamala, wakawahuliciza wa Balanaba na Pawulo, wakusimulila ze vitanjilo ne mezino, vyono u Mulungu, yanoza kwe miwoko yawo muli wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
44015013	Waza kukondya kulonga, Yakobo nayo yakanza kutya, “Nye wandugu zangu, ta hulicizenyi!
44015014	Simiyoni kalolosa nha vyono u Mulungu, ha mwamulizo, yamula kuwalanga i wanhu wono si Wayahudi, yakawahagula wanji muli wene wawe wanhu wakwe.
44015015	Ne nghani yiyi vili sawa ne zinghani ze wawizi, nha vyono Imandiko Gono Gelile gakutya,
44015016	‘Kolo zapuluta zizi, nolowuya, nololizenga kanyhi lihema lya Dawudi lyono ligwiye. Nane nololisimya kanyhi,
44015017	Wanhu wono wasigaye, wolonyiziza, Ne wanhu wose wono si Wayahudi wono nawacemela litagwa lyangu, womulondola Muwaha.
44015018	Vyo yakutyo Muwaha, mono yayinoza nghani yiyi yikumuce kulawa katali.’
44015019	“Ku soko yiyi, wulamuzi wangu wowu; cilece kuwagaza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi wono wakumupitucila Mulungu.
44015020	Langa ciwandicile baluwa, ciwalonjele vyono, walece kulya zindigwa zisemunwa, zono zilavigwe so vihwanicizo vye milungu, weleje no wusenyha, walece kulya nyama yo yose yono yinyonjigwe, kanyhi walece kung'wa sakami.
44015021	Ku soko mu vipango vinji, zinghani za Musa zikuganulwa mu makaya gose, no kusomwa mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, mu Sabato zose.”
44015022	Baho iwatumwa ne wanyamhala no mukung'ano wose, wakelumbaniza wawahagule wanji wa muli wene, wawatume ku Antiyokiya, wabitane na Pawulo na Balanaba. Baho wakamuhagula Yuda mono yacemwaga Balanaba, na Sila, vyono wawa wose wali wamanyice muno mu we zindugu.
44015023	Wakawapela baluwa ayi, “Sese iwatumwa ne wanyamhala, wandugu zenyu, cikumulamusenyi anye mo wandugu, mono si muli Wayahudi, mono muli kuko ku Antiyokiya, Siliya, na Kilikiya.
44015024	Cihulika vyono wanji wayetu wono walawa kukuno kono kwetu, wakumutimvyenyi no kumukalazenyi ne zinghani zawo, na vyono wakumutajilenyi mahwele mu zinhumbula zenyu. Ninga mumanye vyono, wetuma zizo, na akuno si wakomboywe na sese.
44015025	Holeka ase cilamulila kumonga, ciwahagule wanji no kuwatuma kuli'nye, hamonga ne wendece wetu wa Balanaba na Pawulo.
44015026	Iwanhu wono wesuza wumi wawo ku soko ye litagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
44015027	Holeka cikuwatuma wa Yuda na Sila kuli'nye, wene womulonjelenyi weneco zizi zono candice.
44015028	Hambi u Muhe Mono Yelile na sese, nha cilumbaniza vyono cilece kumutwicenyi mutegulo wono wucizize, langa azi zono zimunojelenyi.
44015029	Mulece kulya zindigwa zono zilavigwe so vihwani, mulece kung'wa sakami, mulece kulya nyama ye nimu yono yinyonjigwe, kanyhi mwilegaje no wusenyha. Mowa mwetuma viswanu, hono mulece kwituma zizo. Ale mwikalaje!”
44015030	Waza kondya kwilagwa, wawo wono watumwa, wakatenenhucila sunga ko ku Antiyokiya, kono wawucemela u mukung'ano wa Wejizwa wose hamonga, wakawapela yiyo baluwa.
44015031	Nawo waza kuyisoma yiyo baluwa, izinghani zayo, zikawasindamika nawo wakasangalala muno.
44015032	Yuda na Sila, vyono nawo wali wawizi, wakawasindamika we zindugu na nghani nyinji.
44015033	Waza kuwa wekala kuko yidaha-daha, we zindugu wa Antiyokiya wakawelaga, no kuwaleka wabite wapolile, nawo wakawa kuwuya sunga kuli walya wono wawatuma. [
44015034	Ninga Sila yakasaka kwikala kuko hadodo.]
44015035	Pawulo na Balanaba wakekala-kala kuko ku Antiyokiya hadodo wakwijiza, no kuganula inghani yo Muwaha wena na wanji wenji.
44015036	Vyaza malika vilo, Pawulo yakamutya Balanaba, “Ale ciwuye cikawalanje we zindugu mu makaya gose, kono cayiganula nghani yo Muwaha, ciwone vyono wakujendelela.”
44015037	Balanaba yakenda wamusole na Yohana mono yakucemwa Maluko wabitane nayo.
44015038	Ninga Pawulo si yendezwa yamusole kanyhi yuyo Yohana (Maluko) mono halulongozi yakawaleka ku Pamufuliya, yakalema kuwa hamonga nawo mu mulimo wawo.
44015039	Kukawa na wiwanganile wuwaha muli wene, sunga waketemanucila lukulu, na Balanaba yakamusola yuyo Maluko, wakajendela mu ngalawa sunga ku Kupulo.
44015040	Nayo Pawulo, yakamwihaga Sila, ne wandugu wa baho waza kumuwika mu wukamiswe we lihewa lyo Muwaha, yakawa kubita.
44015041	Mu muhinzo wuwo, yakakolela ku Siliya na Kilikiya yakuzisinyhimika zikanisa.
44016001	Pawulo yakafika ku Delibe, na ku Lusitela, kono yekalaga mwijizwa yunji litagwa lyakwe Timoteyo, u nyina yali Muyahudi, nayo nhavivyo yakawa mwijizwa. Ninga u sogwe yali Mugiliki.
44016002	Nayo Timoteyo yakawa ne lilumbo yiwaha muli we zindugu wa kuko ku Lusitela na Ikoniyo.
44016003	Pawulo yakamusaka Timoteyo wajendane nayo, holeka yakamutegula ku calamo. Yanoza nhavivyo, vyono Wayahudi wose wono wekalaga mbavu zizo, wali wamanyile vyono sogwe wa Timoteyo yali Mugiliki.
44016004	Na lono wakolaga mu makaya gago, wakawapela malajilizo gono galajilizwa ne watumwa, ne wanyamhala wa ku Yelusalemi, wagakamise.
44016005	Ne Makanisa gago gakacila kuwa ne vilungo mu wihuwilo, ne liwalo lya wono wehuwilaga, likacila konjelezeka nhondo zose.
44016006	Wakakolela mu zisi za Felugiya na Galatiya, ninga wakalemezwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, walece kuyiganula nghani mu zisi za Asiya.
44016007	Nawo waza kufika mu mipaka ya Musiya, wakajela kubita ku Bituniya, ninga Muhe wa Yesu si yawakombola ho wabite.
44016008	Holeka wakakolela Musiya wakabita sunga ko ku Tulowa.
44016009	Mu cilo cico, Pawulo yawona wugubulilwe, nha kotya yakamuwona munhu wa Makedoniya yemile, yakumunena, yakutya, “Wulowoce wuze Makedoniya wucitaze.”
44016010	Pawulo yaza kuwuwona wugubulilwe wuwo, cikewikaniza ho cibite mbela ku Makedoniya, cikehuwila vyono u Mulungu yacicemile ciwaganulile u Luganuzi Luswanu.
44016011	Caza kuwuka ku Tulowa, cikajendela mu ngalawa sunga Samotelake, ne mitondo yaco, ku Neyapoli.
44016012	Caza lawa kuko, cikabita sunga ku Filipi, likaya liwaha lya mu yisi ya Makedoniya, nalyo lyali mu wutemi we Cilumi. Cikekala kuko mwi'kaya lilyo vilo vikatelatela.
44016013	Mwi'zuwa lye Sabato, cikalawila mwi'lango lya kudeha, sunga ku nyenje ye likolongo, kono caganicizaga mba, ho hanhu ho kuhembela, hono i Iwayahudi wehangulizaga. Cikekala cikaduwana ne wacekulu wono wekonghola baho.
44016014	Mucekulu yunji wa muli wawo wono wacihulicizaga, litagwa lyakwe Ludiya, mono yamogopago Mulungu, wa mwi'kaya lya Tuwatila, mono yaguzaga myenda ye bafuta, ye liwala lyo lugandu. U Muwaha yayidigula inhumbula yakwe, yakazibocela zinghani zono Pawulo yazilongaga.
44016015	Nayo yaza kubaputizwa, u mwene na wa mu nyumba yakwe wose, yakacinena yakutya, “Hono yiwe mbeka mwawona vyono nane nimwihuwiye Muwaha, ale mwinjile mu kaya yangu.” Yakacinena cibite.
44016016	Mwizuwa linji, lono cabitaga bahalya ha wuhembelo, ciketang'anila na muhinza yunji, mono yali yena licisi lyavu, lyono lyamupelaga wusume wo kuwila. U muhinza yuyo, yawatujilaga watwawe mapesa menji so wuwile wakwe.
44016017	Hodu, muhinza yuyo, yakawa kumutyatya Pawulo na sese, akuno yakuzoza, yakutya, “Wanhu awa wo wetumami wo Mulungu Mono yalawiliciye Muli vyose, wono wakumuganulilenyi nzila ye mhonelo.”
44016018	Yakawa yakunoza nhavivi mu vilo vinji. Sunga mwizuwa linji, Pawulo yakakalala muno, yakamupitucila no kulitya licisi, “Nghukulonjela, mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, wuwuce muli yuyo.” Nalyo licisi likawa kuwuka lwa kamonga.
44016019	Nawo watwawe waza wona vyono witumbilo wawo wo kutujila zisawo wamalika, wakawebata wa Pawulo na Sila, wakawakwega ciwonelela sunga hamwande ye wawaha.
44016020	Wakawasitaka kuli wahakimu, wakutya, “Wanhu awa vyono Wayahudi, wakuleta wutilibule mwi'kaya lyetu.
44016021	Wakwijiza myoto yono ase co Walumi, si cosuma kuyibocela, hamba kwituma.”
44016022	Ne lipuga lye wanhu wakelunza nawo, no kuwatowanga. Nawo wawalya iwahakimu, wakayidemulanga i myenda ya Pawulo na Sila, wakalajiliza wawakune viboko.
44016023	Waza kondya kuwakunanga muno ne viboko, wakawatajila mu jela, wakamulajiliza u musilikale mukamise jela, yawalanjilile muno.
44016024	Nayo musilikale yaza kupegwa wulajilize wuwo, yakawatajila mu jela ya kugati muno muno, no kuyiwopa imigulu yawo mwi'sumbili.
44016025	Ninga mu cilo mugati, Pawulo na Sila walombaga no kumwimbila u Mulungu nyimbo, zo kumukumya Mulungu, kuno wafungwa wayawo wawahulicize.
44016026	Ho baho likaza yitulo yiwaha, sunga ne majinji ge jela, gakasinjisika, na lulo baho, i milango yose yikadiguka, ne viwopelo vya wose vikawopoka.
44016027	No musilikale mukamise jela yaza kusinhuka mu nhongo, nayo yaza kuyiwona imilango ye jela yidiguce, yakehwesa vyono wafungwa wose watiza. Hobaho yakawukwega mumaje wakwe, yakasaka kwiwulaga.
44016028	Ninga Pawulo yakacema kwe lizi yiwaha yakutya, “Wulece kwitamisa go mweneco, hambi ase nha cili baha wose.”
44016029	Yaza kumucema yunji ho yalete tala, u mwene u musilikale mulindilize jela yakamanyhila kugati, yakagwa ha magulu ga Pawulo na Sila akuno yakucicima so woga.
44016030	Yakawaleta kunze, yakatya “Nye wawaha, alo nhende wule ho mhone?”
44016031	Nawo wakamutya, “Wumwihuwile u Muwaha Yesu, nagwe kowa wapona, na wa mu nyumba yako.”
44016032	Wakamulonjela inghani yo Muwaha, na wose wono wali mu nyumba yakwe.
44016033	Nayo musilikale, yakawasola mwidaha lilyo ne cilo, yakawahovuga madali, hanyuma u mwene na wa mu nyumba yakwe lulo baho wose wakabaputizwa.
44016034	Hanyuma yakawasola wa Pawulo na Sila, yakawategula ku nyumba yakwe, yakawatenjela zindigwa. Nayo mwene na wa mu nyumba yakwe wose, wakasangalala muno, vyono alu, wali wamwihuwila Mulungu.
44016035	Waza kwela, iwahakimu wakawatuma wawalya iwawaha we wasilikale, wakutya, “Muwawopolele wanhu walya.”
44016036	U musilikale mulindilize jela, yakamusimuliziza Pawulo zinghani zizi, yakutya, “Iwahakimu watumwa, wakutya muwopolelwe. Holeka mulawile mubite mupolile.”
44016037	Ninga Pawulo yakatya, “Ati wukutya cici? Ase cali cisina yisutya, ninga wacikuna viboko hamwande ye wanhu cikali naling'anizwa na kumbe ase cili wanhu we Cilumi. Kanyhi wacitajila mu jela, alu kanyhi wakusaka kucilavyaniza mu jela cinyele hongo? Si yosumika hamba hadodo. Yiwanojeye waze weneco bahano, wo wacilavye kunze.”
44016038	Iwawaha we wasilikale nawo wakawasimuliziza iwahakimu izinghani zizi. Nawo waza kuhulika vyono Pawulo na Sila, walumi, wakogopa.
44016039	Wakaza wakawalomba wawanenele, nawo waza kuwalavyaniza kunze, wakawanena wawuce mwi'kaya lilyo.
44016040	Pawulo na Sila, wakawa kulawila mu jela wakabita ku kaya kwa Ludiya. Nawo waza wawona we zindugu, wakawasindamika, wakawa kutuluka.
44017001	Ale, wa Pawulo na Sila, waza kola ku Amufipoli na Apoloniya, wakafika ku Tesalonike, kono kwali na nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo ye Wayahudi.
44017002	Nayo Pawulo nha vyono yali yazoweye, yakenjila mu nghang'anilo yo wuhembelo yakuwasimuliziza za mu Mandiko Gono Gelile mu Sabato yidatu.
44017003	Yakalolosa no kulajila vyono yali yimunojeye Kilisito yatamiswe, no kuzuka kanyhi muli wafu. Yakawatya “Yesu yuyo mono nghumuganulilenyi, yo mwene Kilisito.”
44017004	Wanji wayawo wakehuwila wakelumbaniza na Pawulo na Sila. Sunga ne mhuga mbaha ye Wagiliki wono wamogopago Mulungu, na we cicekulu we lilumbo, si wacefu.
44017005	Ninga Wayahudi waza wona vyono wanhu wenji wakumwihuwila Pawulo, wakawona wivu, wakakonghola cipuga ce wanhu we cakacaka kulawa mu sokoni, no kuleta mazozo mawaha mwi'kaya. Wakekongholela ha kaya ya Yasoni, wehwesaga wowagana wa Pawulo na Sila mumo, ho wawalete hamwande ye wanhu.
44017006	Ninga si wawatuga, holeka wakamukwejenha Yasoni, hamonga na we zindugu wanji, sunga hali wawaha we likaya, akuno wakuzoza wakutya, “Awa wanhu wono wayipituye yinze, naluno waza sunga na bahano.”
44017007	Nayo Yasoni kawenjiza mu kaya yakwe. Nawo wose, wakwituma vyono si vinojeye mu malajilizo ga Kayisali, wakutya ti, “Ko yuli mutemi yunji mono yakucemwa Yesu.”
44017008	Na muli zinghani zizi, iwawaha wa mwi'kaya, ne mhuga ye wanhu, wakenjilwa ne mahwele.
44017009	Nawo waza kuwalifya wa Yasoni ne wayagwe, ho wakawa kuwaleka wabite.
44017010	Na mu cilo cico, we zindugu wakawaswaswaniza wa Pawulo na Sila wabite ku Beloya. Nawo waza fika kuko, wakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo ye Wayahudi.
44017011	Wanhu wa kuko wali waswanu muno, wacizize awalya wa ku Tesalonike. Wayibocela nghani na nhumbula yono yina nyhilu mbaha, wakalondolalondola nhondo zose mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, ho wawone zono wazilongaga wa Pawulo na Sila hono zali za mbeka.
44017012	Wenji wa muli wene wakehuwila, sunga na muli we cicekulu we Cigiliki we lilumbo, ne walume nhavivyo.
44017013	Ninga Wayahudi wa ku Tesalonike, waza hulika nha vyono inghani yo Mulungu yikuganulwa na Pawulo na kuko Beloya, wakaza na kuko, wakawasagahaza wanhu no kuleta mazozo.
44017014	Nawo we zindugu wakamusindiciza Pawulo mbela mbela, yabite sunga ko kwilenga, ninga Sila na Timoteyo, wakekala ku Beloya.
44017015	Nawo we zindugu wono wamusindicizaga Pawulo, wakamufisa sunga ku Atene. Hanyuma wakawa kuwuya, hamonga ne malajilizo gono galawa kuli Pawulo, vyono wa Sila na Timoteyo wamutyatyaje mbela mbela.
44017016	Nayo Pawulo lono yawalindilizaga wa Sila na Timoteyo kuko ku Atene, yakakalala muno mu nhumbula yakwe, yaza wona vyono likaya lilyo limemile vihwanicizo vye milungu.
44017017	Holeka yakawaloloseza mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo Iwayahudi, ne wanhu wanji wono wali wamogopilo Mulungu, na nhondo zose kanyhi, yekalaga yakuwaloloseza wanhu mu sokoni, hamonga ne wanhu wo wose wono vyetang'anilaga nayo.
44017018	Na wanji wono wali webate mejizo ge Waepikuliyo ne Wasitoyiko, wakewanganila nayo. Wanji wakatya “Alu yakusaka kulonga cici yuyu Cilomo?” Na vyono Pawulo yaganulaga za Yesu na zo wuzuce, wanji wakatya, “Yikwijela kotya mono yakuganula ze milungu mijenzi.”
44017019	Holeka wakamusola Pawulo, wakamutegula sunga ku Aleyopago, wakutya, “Cikusaka nase ta, ciyimanye inghani yiyi yimhya, yono wali kuyilonga.
44017020	Vinhu vinji vyono cihulice co weneco ne makutu getu, vikijela nha vinhu vijenzi kuli'se. Holeka cendile kumanya inhunizo ya zizi.”
44017021	Iwa Atene wose wajenzi wono wali wali kuko, si waduwilaga nghani yinji, langa kulonga lunji kuhulika nghani mhya mhya.
44017022	Pawulo yakema ha mwande ye libalaza lya Aleyopago, yakatya “Anye wanya Atene! Muli zose, nghumuwonenyi nha muli wanhu mono mwendile muno wuhembi.
44017023	Ku soko, lono nali kukola ako na ako, nghulanga vihwani vyo wuhembelo wenyu, niwa kuwona wuhembelo wunji wono wina mandiko aga, ‘Kuli mulungu yulya mono si yamanyice.’ Ale, yuyo mono mumuhembaga si mumumanyile, yo yuyo yo nghumulonjelenyi anye.
44017024	U Mulungu mono yawumba yinze, na vyose vyono vili mumo, yo Muwaha wo wulanga ne yinze, si kekalaga mu nyumba zo Mulungu zono zinozwaga ne miwoko ye wanhu.
44017025	Hamba si ketumamilwaga ne miwoko ye wanhu, yawe nha yanjiye cinji, hambi mwene nha kawapelaga wose wumi, no wehele, na vyose.
44017026	Mu wulawilila mo munhu yumonga, mo yanozeza imakungugo gose ge wanhu, gekale kono'nze kose. Lono yali yakondya kuwawicila mapango gono yali yalamuye na katali muno, vyono hayi na nili, hono makungugo gago gokwikala.
44017027	Nayo yanoza nhavivyo, imakungugo gago ho wamulondole Mulungu, na lunji walabate walabate sunga wasume kumuficila. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, u Mulungu nha si yali kutali nase wose.
44017028	Nha vyono yalonga yunji yakatya, ‘Hambi muli mwene nha mo cikaliye womi, mo cikujendela, na mo ciweleye.’ Nha vyono wanji wayenyu wemba Mashayili wakutya, ‘Hambi na sese nha cili wanagwe.’
44017029	“Ale, holeka hono ase cili wana wo Mulungu, si yicinojeye kumuganiciza u Mulungu nha cihwanicizo ca Zahabu, lunji Pesa, lunji yibwe lyono lisesigwe no kutajilwa wihambo ne wanhu.
44017030	Imyaka lono iwanhu wali wakali walele u Mulungu yakenoza kotya nha siyakuwona. Ninga alu yakuwalajiliza wanhu wose kono walila, wanene, wayilece imikalile yawo mibi.
44017031	Hambi nha yakondya kuwika lizuwa lyono koloyiling'aniza yinze mu ling'ani, mu nzila ya muli munhu yumonga mono yamuhagula. No Mulungu yawapela wanhu wose wuhomelezi we nghani yiyi, ko kumuzukula munhu yuyo mu wafu!”
44017032	Waza muhulika Pawulo yakulonga ze nghani yo wuzuce we wafu, wanji wakamuseka, ninga wanji wakatya, “Cikwenda kukuhuliciza kanyhi mu nghani yiyi.”
44017033	Hodu nayo Pawulo yakawaleka, yakawuka muli wene.
44017034	Ninga wanhu wanji wakelunza nayo, wakehuwila. Muli wawo, mukawa na Diyonesiyo wa Aleyopago no mucekulu litagwa lyakwe Damalisi, wali wena na wanji wayawo.
44018001	Zaza kukondya zizi, Pawulo yakawuka ku Atene, yakabita ku Kolinto.
44018002	Na kuko ku Kolinto yakagana Muyahudi monga litagwa lyakwe Akila, mulelelwa ku Ponto. Akila, hamonga no mugolece wakwe Pelisicila, wali ho wakuwuya ku wulawa ku Italiya, ku soko Kayisali Kilawudiyo yali yalajiliza vyono, i Wayahudi wose wawuce ku Lumi. Pawulo yakabita kuwawona.
44018003	Na vyono wene nawo wali mafundi wa kuhona mahema, nha vyono mweneco, holeka Pawulo yakekalana nawo, wakawa kwitumana hamonga.
44018004	Yakawa kulolosa mu nghang'anilo yo wuhembelo mu vilo vye Sabato vyose, yakujela kuwakwega Wayahudi ne Wagiliki.
44018005	Ninga Sila na Timoteyo waza kuza wakulawa Makedoniya, Pawulo yakanza kwitumamila vipango vyakwe vyose, so kuluganula Luganuzi, yakuwahomelela Wayahudi nha vyono Yesu yo mwene Kilisito.
44018006	Nawo lono wawanganaga nayo no kumutovula, yakasola likoti lyakwe yakalikung'unha ha mwande yawo, yakawatya, “Hono mwajilile, yo nghani yenyu nyenye nyo weneco, ane sina wuhoswe wo wose mu nghani yiyo. No wulawa lulu, nowabitila wono si Wayahudi.”
44018007	Yakawuka kuko, yakabita kwikala mu kaya yo munhu yunji u mogopo Mulungu, litagwa lyakwe, Tito Yusito. Kaya yakwe Tito yali yili behi ne nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo.
44018008	Na Kelisipo u muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakamwihuwila Muwaha, na wa mu nyumba yakwe wose. Ne Wakolinto wenji waza hulika zo Luganuzi lulo, wakehuwila, wakabaputizwa.
44018009	Mwi'zuwa linji ne cilo, u Muwaha yakamulonjela Pawulo mu wugubulilwe, yakutya, “Wulece kogopa, langa wujendelele kuganula du, wulece kunyamala,
44018010	hambi ne nha nili hamonga nagwe. Hamba hasina munhu mono kosuma kukutamisa, hambi nha nina wanhu wenji wono wali ku lubavu lwangu, mumu mwikaya lili.”
44018011	Pawulo yakekala kuko mwaka monga na myezi mutandatu, yakuwejiza inghani yo Mulungu.
44018012	Ninga lono Galiyo yali mutemi wa Akaya, Wayahudi wakamuhungucila Pawulo walaganiye kumonga, wakamutegula kuli mahakama.
44018013	Wakatya, “Cikumusitaka munhu ayu, ku soko yakuwakwega wanhu wamuhembe Mulungu mu nzila yono yikusutana no wulajilize.”
44018014	Ninga Pawulo lono yasakaga yalonje, Galiyo yakawatya Wayahudi, “Hulicenyi ta anye mo Wayahudi! Inghani yiyi hono yali yiwe mbeka yili mu wubi, hamba lunji nghani ye sutya, mbeka nali nyende kumuhulicizenyi.
44018015	Ninga hono gawe mawuzo ge zinghani ne matagwa no wulajilize wenyu, ko kwenyu, mulamule nyenye. Ane sinosuma kuwa muling'anizi we zinghani zizi.”
44018016	Hodu yakawa kuwawinga ha mwande ye mahakama.
44018017	Nawo wose wakamwibata Sositene, u muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wakamutowela ha mwande ye mahakama. Ninga Galiyo si yazitununhicila zizo hamba hadodo.
44018018	Nayo Pawulo, vikekalana na walya we zindugu wa ku Kolinto, kwa vilo vinji. Hanyuma yakawelaga, yakatulucila mu ngalawa yakubita ku Siliya, wena hamonga na Pelisicila na Akula. Nayo lono yali yakali si natuluka kuko ku Kenkileya, yenyonyola izimvwili zakwe, kusoko ye cipingo cono yali yawicile.
44018019	Wakafika ku Efeso, kono Pawulo yakawaleka wa Pelisicila na Akula, ninga mwene yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo vikawa kulongana ne Wayahudi.
44018020	Wakamunena yekale nawo cidaha citeletele, ninga mwene siyavumila yaye.
44018021	Langa lono yawukaga, yakatya, “Hono Mulungu yende nolokuza kanyhi kono kwenyu.” Nayo yakatulucila mu ngalawa ku wulawa ku Efeso.
44018022	Yaza fika ku Kayisaliya, umwene Pawulo yakabita ku Yelusalemi kuwalamusa wanye likanisa lya kuko, hanyuma yakabita ku Antiyokiya.
44018023	Yakekala kuko yidaha yidodo, hanyuma yakajendelela no muhinzo wakwe yakakolela ku zisi za Galatiya na Felugiya yakuwasindamika wejizwa wose.
44018024	No Muyahudi yunji litagwa lyakwe Apolo mulelelwa ku Alekizandeliya, yakaza ku Efeso. Munhu mono yali yena nonga swanu kanyhi yali yena wizuce wuwaha wa mu Mandiko Gono Gelile.
44018025	Nayo yali yakondizye kwijizwa ze mbeka yiyo yo Muwaha, na vyono yali yena vilungo mu nhumbula, yakalonga no kwijiza mu mbeka, za Yesu. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, yali yawumanyile u wubaputizo wa Yohana du.
44018026	Wa Pelisicila na Akila waza muhulika Apolo yakulonga yapetuce mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wakamusola, wakabitana nayo kwawo no kumwijiza muno ze nzila yiyo yo Mulungu.
44018027	Na lono Apolo yasakaga kubita ku Akaya, iwe zindugu wakamusinyhimika, wakawandicila iwejizwa wa ku Akaya wamubocele. Nayo yaza fika kuko na ku so lihewa lyo Mulungu, yakasuma kuwataza muno wono wali wehuwiye.
44018028	Hambi nha yajendelela kwe vilungo kuwasuma Wayahudi ciwonelela, yakuhomelela mu Mandiko Gono Gelile nha vyono Yesu yo Kilisito.
44019001	Kukawa lono Apolo yali ku Kolinto, Pawulo yaza kukola ku zisi za kusumuka, yakafika ku Efeso, na kuko yakawagana wejizwa wanji.
44019002	Yakawawuza, yakatya, “Wulenyi, mwamubocela u Muhe Mono Yelile lono mwehuwilila?” Nawo wakamupitula, wakatya, “Ng'o, cikali nahulika hamba nhavi vyono yali baho Muhe Mono Yelile.”
44019003	Nayo yakawatya, “Alu mwabaputizizwa mu wubaputizo wa hayi?” Wakatya, “Ku wubaputizo wa Yohana.”
44019004	Nayo Pawulo yakatya, “U wubaputizo wa Yohana, walajilaga du vyono wanhu wanena. Yohana yawalonjelaga wanhu vyono wamwihuwile mono yakuza mu nyuma yakwe, yo mwene Yesu.”
44019005	Waza hulika zizo, wakabaputizizwa mwitagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu.
44019006	Hobaho Pawulo yakawawicila miwoko, no Muhe Mono Yelile yakawatimila, wakanza kulonga milonjele yinji yinji, no kuyiganula inghani yo Mulungu.
44019007	Nawo hamonga wali wanhu yikumi na wejete.
44019008	Pawulo yenjilaga mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo mwidaha lya myezi midatu, yakawa kuwalonjela no kuwakwejela ku nghani yo wutemi wo Mulungu.
44019009	Ninga wanji wali wakamu, kanyhi wali wali cibede, wakalema kwihuwila, wakawa kwanza kuyilonga vibi cagalanze i nzila yo Muwaha. Baho Pawulo yakawawucila, yakawatemanula iwejizwa wakwe, nayo yakawa kuduwana nawo nhondo zose, mu nyumba yo wusomelo wa Tulano.
44019010	Yakajendelela kunoza nhavivyo, sunga yidaha lya myaka myejete, sunga wose wekala Asiya, Wayahudi ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wakayihulika nghani yo Muwaha.
44019011	U Mulungu yanoza mapoto ga wizine kwe miwoko ya Pawulo.
44019012	Iwanhu wasolaga vitambala, ne myenda yinji ye milimo yono Pawulo yetumamilaga, wakawategulila watamwa, nawo watamwa wakaponywa zinhamwa zawo, na wono wali wena macisi mavu, gakalawa.
44019013	Ninga Wayahudi wanji walavya macisi, wajendajendaga ako na ako, wakujela kulitumamila i litagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu kuli walya wono wali wena macisi mavu. Wakawa kutya, “Nghumulajilizenyi mwi'tagwa lya Yesu mono Pawulo yakumuganula.”
44019014	Ale, iwana mupunghati wa Sikewa, u Mukohani Muwaha we Ciyahudi, wali wo wamonga na wawo wono wanozaga nhavivyo.
44019015	Ninga ilicisi lyavu likawapitula likatya, “Yesu nimumanyile, na Pawulo nayo nimumanyile nhavivyo, ninga lu nyenye wa nani?”
44019016	U munhu mono yali ne licisi lyavu, yakawazumhila, yakawasumiza vilungo, nawo wawo wana wa Sikewa wakatiza mu nyumba yiyo, akuno wali cipwi, wena ne mazeya.
44019017	Inghani yiyo yikamanyika kuli wose wono wali wekaye ku Efeso, i Wayahudi na kuli wono si Wayahudi. Wose wakenjilwa no woga, wakalikumya litagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu.
44019018	Na wenji wono wehuwila wakaza, wakavumila cagalanze ze metumo gawo gono wetumaga.
44019019	Na wanji wono wetumaga i makani ge cihawihawi ha mwamulizo, wakavikonghola vitabu vyawo, wakavinyanya mu moto hamwande ya wose. Wakaganiciza wuguzi we vitabu vivyo, wakawona vyowa nha silinje elufu makumi mahano.
44019020	Na nhavivi, inghani yo Muwaha yikacila kutandala, no kuwiluka kwa vilungo muno.
44019021	Zizi zaza kuwa zamalika, Pawulo yakatemya mu nhumbula, yabite ku Yelusalemi yalaza kuwa yakolela ku Makedoniya na Akaya, yakutya, “Nilaza kukondya kuko, cinojele mbite nghayiwone ne Lumi nhavivyo.”
44019022	Yakawa kuwatuma wa Timoteyo na Elasito, iwetumami wakwe, wamulongolele ku Makedoniya, ninga u mwene yakekala ku Asiya cidaha.
44019023	Mu cidaha cico, ho gejelela imawuma mawaha kuko ku Efeso, ku soko ye Nzila yiyi yo Muwaha.
44019024	Kwali na mutyana Pesa yunji ilitagwa lyakwe yacemwaga Demeteliyo, mono yali yena mulimo wo kunoza sanamu za mu nyumba yo mulungu we cicekulu, mono kacemwaga Alitemi. No mulimo wuwo, wamutujilaga Demeteliyo hamonga ne wetumami wakwe, cambuzi ciwaha.
44019025	Demeteliyo yakawakonghola wawo iwetumami, hamonga na wanji wono wetumaga mulimo nha wuwo, yakawatya, “Nye wayangu, mumanyile nha vyono mu mulimo wuwu mo mozili sawo zetu.
44019026	Alu mosuma kuhulika no kwiwonelela moweneco zono Pawulo yakwituma, si baha du hono Efeso, langa sunga na mu Asiya yose nhavivyo. Mwene yawakwega wanhu no kuwapitula, sunga walumba vyono, milungu yiyo yono minozwe ne wanhu, si milungu hamba hadodo.
44019027	Holeka hoyili mbali, hambi uwukwawi wetu wuwu, nha si woleka kuwa ne 'tagwa yibi. Hamba si nhavivyo du, ninga nghani yiyi yosuma kuyinoza sunga ne nyumba yo wuhembelo ya Alitemi kuwa nha cinhu cono cisina nhunizo yo yose. Hanyuma ne lilumbo lyakwe yuyo mono Asiya, sunga ne yinze yose wakumuhemba, lyoduma.”
44019028	Waza kuhulika zizo, wakakolwa ne 'kuwo, wakawa kwanza kuzoza. Wakutya, “Yo muwaha Alitemi wa Efeso.”
44019029	Likaya lyose likamema sasamo yiyo. Wakawebata wa Gayo na Alisitaliko, wanya Makedoniya, wono wajendanaga na Pawulo, wakamangha nawo sunga ko ku nyumba yo mwidawalo.
44019030	Nayo Pawulo yasakaga kwiyinjiza mu winji we wanhu, ninga iwejizwa wakamwimila.
44019031	Iwawaha wanji wa mu yisi yiyo ya Asiya, wono wali wendece wakwe, wamutumila nghani wakumulomba, yalece kwiyinjiza mu mbali, so wubita ku nyumba yo mwidawalo.
44019032	Na mu cipango cico wanhu walongaga munhu na zakwe, wanji nhavi na wanji nhavi, sunga ne wanhu wakasagahala. Sunga na wanji wenji, si wamanya soko yo wikonghole wawo.
44019033	Vyono Wayahudi wamunoza Alekizanda yeme hamwande, wanji wa mwipuga lye wanhu wakatya mba yo mweneco mono yena u wulajilize. Alekizanda, yakawenulila muwoko, yahilaga kwitetela kuli wanhu.
44019034	Ninga waza manya vyono mwene Muyahudi, wose wakazozeza hamonga, wakutya, “Yo muwaha Alitemi wa Efeso!” Wakajendelela-kuzoza zoza nhavivyo, kwa cipango ca saa nyejete.
44019035	Hanyuma kalani we likaya yakasuma kuwanyamaza wanhu, yakawatya, “Nye wayangu wanya Efeso, munhu wo wose yamanyile vyono likaya lili lya Efeso yo mukamise nyumba yo mulungu Alitemi, kanyhi ne cihwani cono cagwa kulawa ku wulanga.
44019036	Hasina mono kosuma kuzibeza zizi. Holeka mutulane mulece kunoza cinji co cose musunho.
44019037	Muwaleta iwanhu wawa bahano, na kuno si wayitovuye nyumba yo mulungu, hamba si wamulijile mulungu wetu we cicekulu.
44019038	Holeka, hono Demeteliyo ne wetumami wakwe wena nghani muli wanhu wawa, mahakama gali baho, ne wawaha we yisi, holeka wosuma kwisitaka kuko.
44019039	Na hono hawe ho zili zinji, ale muzitegule ha wulamuzi wono wunojeye.
44019040	Ku soko cali cisume kusonjezwa ku so wuma we zuwali, kusoko vyono cisina soko hamba ndodo muli wene, hamba si cosuma kupitula nghani yono yokwila mu wuma wuwu.”
44019041	Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, hodu yakawiyagaza mukung'ano.
44020001	Wuma wuwulya wa ku Efeso waza kukondya kutula, Pawulo yakawacema hamonga wawalya wejizwa, yakawasinyhimika. Hanyuma yakawelaga, yakatuluka, yakabita ku Makedoniya.
44020002	Yakakolela mu zisi zizilya, no kuwasindamika na nghani nyinji. Hanyuma yakafika ku Wugiliki.
44020003	Yaza mala myezi midatu kuko, na lono yasakaga kubita ku Suliya, yakamanya vyono Wayahudi wali wena wuhile wubi kuli mwene, holeka yakalamula ha wuwuye, yakolele Makedoniya.
44020004	Sopateli mwana wa Pulo munya Beloya wakabitana nayo, na wanya Tesalonike, wa Alisitaliko na Sekundo, hamonga na Gayo munya Delibe na Timoteyo, na wanya Asiya, Tukiko na Telofimo.
44020005	Ninga wawa walongola, wakawa kucilindila ku Tulowa.
44020006	Ase cikatulucila mu ngalawa ku Filipi, lono vyali vyapuluta vilo vye mikate yono si yisasize, cikawagana ku Tulowa mwizuwa lye hano, na kuko cikekala vilo mupunghati.
44020007	Mwi'zuwa lye jumamosi cinyamihe, cikekonghola ho ciwubegule umukate. Alu vyono Pawulo yahilaga kwilawa kuwuka hakali mitondo, holeka yakajendelela kuwaganulila nghani, sunga mu cilo mugati.
44020008	Na mu cinyumba mono cali cikongholeye ca ku golofa, kwali na tala nyinji zikwaka.
44020009	Hali na muzelelo litagwa lyakwe Ewutuko, yali yekaye mucanyha ye lidilisha, mwipango lyono Pawulo yajendelelaga kuganula. Ewutuko yakanza kusinzila hadodo hadodo, na hanyuma zinhongo zikamwibata, yakagwa ho hasi ku wulawa ku golofa ye kadatu. Wakamutondola yakondya kufwa.
44020010	Pawulo yakatima, yakenama, yakamukumbatila yuyo muzelelo mono yali yafwa, yakatya, “Mulece kugazika, hambi wumi wakwe nha wukali muli mwene.”
44020011	Yakabita kucanyha kanyhi kugolofa, yakawubegula mukate, yakalya, yakajendelela kuganula muno, sunga wukela, ho yakatuluka.
44020012	Wawalya wanhu wakamutegula ku kaya yakondya kuwa mumi yuyulya u muzelelo, nawo wakasinyhimikwa muno.
44020013	Ase cikatulucila mu ngalawa, cikalongolela kubita ku Aso, kono casakaga ko cimusole Pawulo. Hambi nha vyo yali yawikanize, yasaka kufika kuko kwa magulu ko kukolela mu yisi nghavu.
44020014	Holeka yakacagana kuko ku Aso, cikamwinjiza mu ngalawa, cikazana nayo ku Mitilene.
44020015	Na ku wulawa kuko, cikajenda sunga imitondo yaco cikafika ku Kiyo. Ne lizuwa lye kejete cikafika Samo, ne mitondo yaco kanyhi cikafika Mileto.
44020016	Hambi Pawulo nha yali yatemizye kujendelela no muhinzo mu ngalawa, no kupulutiza Efeso, ho yalece kucela ku Asiya. Hambi nha yasunhaga ho yawe ku Yelusalemi mwizuwa lye Pentekote hono yisumice.
44020017	Na Pawulo lono yali yali ha Mileto, yakatuma wanhu ku Efeso, yakawacema wanyamhala we Likanisa, ho wetang'anile nayo.
44020018	Nawo waza kuza kwakwe, yakawatya, “Anye mo weneco mumanyile, vyono kulawa lizuwa lilongozi lono nakanyajila baha Asiya, nha vyono nali ninha kono kwenyu nhondo zose,
44020019	nghumwitumamila Muwaha ko winenenyhezi wose, ne mahozi, ne magazo gono ganyagana so wungwele we Wayahudi,
44020020	mumanyile vyono sinaleka hamba hadodo kumuganulilenyi cagalanze na mu zinyumba zenyu, no kumwijizenyi yo yose yono yomukwilenyi.
44020021	Nawahomelela wose, Wayahudi hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ho wamupitucile Mulungu no kumwihuwila Muwaha wetu Yesu.
44020022	Alu hulicizenyi! Ane vyono nghumuhulika u Muhe, holeka alu nghubita ku Yelusalemi, nhunyice mu nhumbula, nane si manyile zono zonyagana kuko.
44020023	Ninga yono manyile du yoyi, vyono u Muhe Mono Yelile yakundajila mu makaya gose, yakutya, wuwopwe no wutamiswe vikunindila.
44020024	Ninga ane si nghuganiciza wumi wangu nha cinji cikamu kuli'ne, si nho wukondeleze wo muhinzo wangu, no witumami wono nabocela kuli Muwaha Yesu, kuluhomelela u Luganuzi Luswanu lwe lihewa lyo Mulungu.
44020025	“Sunga na lulu, ane manyile vyono nyenye wose, mono nakola ako na ako mono mwenyu, nghuganula zo wutemi wo Mulungu. Si molombona wusu wangu kanyhi.
44020026	Holeka nghumuhomelelenyi nyenye wose zuwali, vyono hono yunji yaze yajilile muli nyenye, ane sina wuhoswe wo wose.
44020027	Hambi nha sinaleka kumuganulilenyi nghani zose zo Mulungu.
44020028	Mwikamisaje mo weneco, mulikamisaje na lilyo i litewa lyose, lyono u Muhe Mono Yelile yamuwicenyi anye ho mulidime. Mulidimaje ilikanisa lyo Mulungu, lyono yaligula ne sakami yo Mwanagwe.
44020029	Manyile vyono ane kolo neza kuwuka, imaminzi makali golomwinjililenyi, si gololileka litewa.
44020030	Na muli nyenye mo weneco, wolokwinuka wanhu wono wolonga zinghani zo wulambi ho wawajilize wanhu, ho wawatyatye weneco du.
44020031	Holeka mwikalaje meso, mweze kumbucila vyono, mu myaka midatu cilo na misi, si nadilaga kumulanjizenyi wose ne mahozi.
44020032	“Alu nghumuwicenyi mu wukamiswe wo Mulungu, na kuli nghani ye lihewa lyakwe, yono yidahile kumusikamyenyi, no kumupelenyi wuhazi wono yawawiciye wanhu wakwe.
44020033	Ane hamba kamonga, si nasulumila mapesa, hamba zahabu, hamba vivwalo vya munhu.
44020034	Mo weneco mumanyile, vyono netuma milimo kwe miwoko yangu no mweneco, ho nitujile visakwa vyangu, na vya awalya wono cali cina nawo.
44020035	Muli zose, namupelenyi nzila yo kwiga, kotya, mu wituma nhavivi ko wuhidimbazi, yicinojele ciwataze wono wasina vilungo, no kukumbucila, zinghani zo Muwaha Yesu zono yatya mweneco, ‘Ciba kulavya, ko yili nyemo, si nho kupegwa.’ ”
44020036	Yaza kokondya kulonga zizi, Pawulo yakafugama, yakalomba hamonga na wose.
44020037	Wose wakalila muno, wakamukumbatila Pawulo mu singo, wakamunonela.
44020038	I nghani yono yawakalaza muno, yali yo nghani yono Pawulo yatya, vyono, siwolomuwona kanyhi. Wakamusindiciza sunga wakamufisa ko ku ngalawa.
44021001	Caza kwitemanuka nawo, cikatuluka mu ngalawa, cikajenda cigolocile sunga ko ku Koso, ne mitondo yaco cikafika ku Lodo, caza kulawa kuko cikabita ku Patala.
44021002	Na kuko cikayagana ngalawa yikulowoka yikubita ku Foyinike, cikenjila, cikatuluka.
44021003	Ale caza kufika i hanhu hono casumaga kuliwona lizingwa lya Kupulo, cikalikola ku lubavu lwayo lwa kutakama, cikajendelela mu ngalawa sunga ko ku Siliya, cikatimila Tulo, hambi kuko ingalawa nha ko yatimizyaga mitegulo yayo.
44021004	Cawagana wejizwa kuko, nase cikawa kuko vilo mupunghati. Iwejizwa wawo wakawa kulonga mu vilungo vyo Muhe, wakamulonjela Pawulo, yalece kubita ku Yelusalemi.
44021005	Ninga cali ceza kukwiza vilo vyetu vyo wikala baho, cikatuluka, cikajendelela no muhinzo wetu. Nawo wose, hamonga ne wagolece zawo, hamonga ne wana wawo, wakacisindiciza sunga kunze ye likaya. Caza kufika ha mwejelele we lilenga, cikafugama, cikalomba.
44021006	Cikeyilaga nawo, ase cikenjila mu ngalawa, nawo wakawuya kwawo.
44021007	Nase cikajendelela no muhinzo wetu ku wulawa Tulo, cikafika Pitolemayi, cikawalamusa we zindugu, cikaswezana nawo izuwa limonga.
44021008	Imitondo yaco cikatuluka, cikafika Kayisaliya. Na kuko ku Kayisaliya, cikenjila mu kaya ya Filipo u muganuzi. Umwene yali yo muyagwe na walya wo mupunghati, wono wahagulwa ku Yelusalemi.
44021009	Na yuyo Filipo, yali yena wanagwe wadatu wahinza, wono wali wena cipegwa co kuwila.
44021010	Caza kuwa cekalakala vilo vinji, yakaza muwizi yunji yakulawa ku Yudiya, litagwa lyakwe Agabo.
44021011	Nayo yakaza kuli'se, yakasola musipi wa Pawulo, yakewopa mweneco mu magulu na mu mawoko, yakatya, “U Muhe Mono Yelile yakutya nhavi, Iwayahudi ku Yelusalemi wolomuwopa nhavivi u munhu munya musipi wuwu, nawo womutajila mu miwoko ye wanhu wono si Wayahudi!”
44021012	Caza hulika zizi, ase hamonga na wono wali bahalya, cikamunena Pawulo yalece kubita ku Yelusalemi.
44021013	Ninga mwene Pawulo yakapitula yakatya, “Alo mukusaka kunoza cici? Mukulila no kunyenyanga mutima wangu? Hambi ne nha nilumbiye si kuwopwa du, langa no kufwila kuko ku Yelusalemi, ku soko ye litagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu.”
44021014	Ale yaza kuwa si yakusumika, cikanyamala, cikatya, “Wuhile wo Muwaha witumwe.”
44021015	Vyaza malika vilo vyo wikale wetu baho, cikayiwopa mitegulo yetu, cikajendelela no muhinzo wetu, cikabita ku Yelusalemi.
44021016	Wejizwa wanji wayagwe na walya wa ku Kayisaliya, wakajendana nase wakacitegula ku kaya ya Munasoni, munya Kupulo, kono cabitaga kwikala kwa cipango.
44021017	Caza fika ku Yelusalemi iwe zindugu wakacibocela na nyemo mbaha.
44021018	Imitondo yaco Pawulo yakabita hamonga nase, kumulamusa Yakobo, ne Wanyamhala wose we likanisa wali wali baho.
44021019	Yaza kondya kuwalamusa, Pawulo yakawa kuwaloloseza zose zono Mulungu yali yetuma mu wanhu wono si Wayahudi so witumami wakwe.
44021020	Nawo waza hulika wakamukumya Mulungu, wakamutya Pawulo, “Wukuwona agwe ndugu yetu, vyono kowali Wayahudi maelufu, wono wehuwila, nawo wose wapiligazi ku wibata u Wulajilize wa Musa.
44021021	Nawo walonjelwa i zako, nha vyono wali kuwejiza i Wayahudi wono wekaye mu wanhu wono si Wayahudi, walece kuwucelelela Wulajilize wa Musa, wukutya, walece kuwategula ku calamo wana, hamba kutyatya myoto ye Wayahudi.
44021022	Alu ho zowa nhawule? Hambi nha si woleka kuhulika vyono wuzize bahano.
44021023	Ale wunoze nhavi vyono cikukulonjela, cina wanhu wane baha, wono wali mu wilahize,
44021024	wuwasole wawo mubitane ku wuhembi wo wezwe, no kuwalipila, wacete mu mitwe yawo, holeka wanhu wose womanya vyono, zono walonjelwa za muli gwegwe zisina imbeka, langa vyono agwe go mweneco wukali wibate Wulajilize wa Musa.
44021025	Ninga kuli walya wono si Wayahudi wono wehuwila, cawandicila, cikawalajiliza, Walece kulya cinhu co cose cono cikumbiciywe milungu yo wulambi, walece kung'wa sakami, walece kulya nyama yono yinyonjigwe, kanyhi weleje mu wusenyha.”
44021026	Hobaho Pawulo, imitondo yaco yakawasola i wanhu wa walya iwejete, yakeyeza hamonga nawo, hanyuma yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakalajila wufisilizwe we vilo vyo wezwe, sunga likumbiko lyono lyolavywa ku soko ya wose vyono wenha.
44021027	Vilo mupunghati vyaza kuwa behi no kumalika, Iwayahudi wanya Asiya waza muwona Pawulo mu Nyumba yo Mulungu. Wakayisagahaza mhuga yose ye wanhu, wakamwibata Pawulo.
44021028	Wakazoza, wakutya, “Nye nyo wanyawusi wa Isilayeli, Ayu yo yuyo munhu, mono yakuwejiza wanhu hanhu hose, zinghani zono zisimajiye kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli, hamonga no Wulajilize wa Musa, sunga ne hanhu aha hono Helile, sunga nalu kawenjiza wanhu wono si Wayahudi mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuhavufya ihanhu hono Helile.”
44021029	Walonga nha vivyo ku soko wali wamuwona Telofimo Mwefeso wena na Pawulo mwi'kaya, wakaganiciza vyono Pawulo 'mba, yali yamwinjiza mu Nyumba yo Mulungu.
44021030	Likaya lyose likasagahala, iwanhu waketang'anila lumangho, wakamwibata Pawulo, wakamukwejenhela kunze ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, na ho baho imilango ye Nyumba yo Mulungu yikawa kudindwa.
44021031	Wakawa wewikaniza ho wamuwulaje, ninga izinghani zikamuficila u muwaha mulongola we lipuga lye wasilikale we Cilumi, vyono Yelusalemi yose yisagahaye.
44021032	Hobaho yuyo muwaha we lipuga lye wasilikale, yakasola wasilikale, hamonga ne wawaha wawo, yakalibitila lipuga lye wanhu lumangho, nawo waza kumuwona u muwaha yuyo ne wasilikale, wakawa kuleka kumutowa Pawulo.
44021033	U muwaha we wasilikale u mulongola, yakasejelela, yakamwibata Pawulo, yakalajiliza wamuwope ne manyolo mejete. Hanyuma ho yakawa kuwawuza, yakutya, “Alu yuyu nani, na kanyhi cono yanozize ci cici?”
44021034	Na wanji wa mwi'puga lye wanhu, wakanza kulonga nhavi wanji nhavi. Na ku soko yo wusagahale we wanhu, umuwaha we wasilikale si yasuma kuyimanya i soko yeneco. Holeka yakawa kuwalajiliza wanhu wakwe wamutegule Pawulo mwigomawakali.
44021035	Pawulo yaza kufika ha zingazi, wasilikale wakawona viswanu wamudinghule Pawulo ku soko ye mazozo ge wanhu.
44021036	Ku soko wanhu wenji wali wamulondeleye mu nyuma, wakuzoza, wakutya, “Mumuwulagaje si.”
44021037	Nawo wasilikale lono wamwinjizaga Pawulo mwigomawakali, Pawulo yakamulomba u muwaha we wasilikale, yakutya, “Wule, ndahile kukulonjela nghani?” Nayo u muwaha we wasilikale yakamutya, “Wule, wumanyile kulonga Cigiliki?
44021038	Si yo gwegwe yaye Mumisili yulya we mazuzi galya, mono yasagahaza wuma, yakawategula ku nyika wanhu elufu yine i wawulaji?”
44021039	Pawulo yakatya, “Ane nili Muyahudi, munya Taliso ya ku Kilikiya, ane nili munya kwi'kaya lyono lina lilumbo. Nghukunena wunghombole nonje ne wanhu.”
44021040	Nayo muwaha we wasilikale, yakamukombola. Hobaho Pawulo yakema mucanyha ye zingazi yakawapunjila wanhu muwoko, nawo waza kunyamala twii, yakawa kwanza kuwalonjela nghani mu milonjele ye Cihebelaniya, yakutya.
44022001	“Nye wandugu zangu ne wasogo zangu, hulicizenyi zono nghwibombola alu hali nyenye!”
44022002	Waza hulika vyono yakuwalonjela mu milonjele ye Cihebelaniya, wakacila muno kunyamala twii. Nayo Pawulo yakajendelela kutya,
44022003	“Ane nili Muyahudi, nalelelwa ku Taliso ya ku Kilikiya, ninga mbilucila mone kaya lili lya Yelusalemi, ha magulu go mwijizi wangu Gamaliyeli, nghejizwa, nghamanya no kuyityatya muno muno imyoto ye wakuku zetu, nane nghelavya muno kuli zo Mulungu nha vyono mwinha nyenye wose zuwali.
44022004	Nghawagaza wose wono wayityatyaga Nzila yiyi. Nghawawopa iwalume ne wacekulu no kuwatajila mu zijela.
44022005	U Mukohani Muwaha, hamonga ne mhuga yose ye Wanyamhala, wosuma kuyihomelela inghani yiyi. Hambi nha wo weneco wono wamhela zibaluwa, zono wandicilwa we zindugu i Wayahudi wono wali, wali kuko ku Damesiki. Nane nghabita kuko ku Damesiki, ho niwawope wanhu wawo, niwalete wawopwe sunga ku Yelusalemi, ho walipicizwe.
44022006	“Ale, lono najendaga, na lono nali nasejelela ku Damesiki, nayo yali nha saa sita ne misi, nghawona lwa kamonga wuzelu wuwaha wukalawilila ku wulanga, wukamulicila kose kose.
44022007	Baho nghagwa hasi, nghahulika lizi likunonjela likutya, ‘Sawulo, Sawulo, alo so cici wukungaza?’
44022008	Nane nghapitula nghatya, ‘Gwegwe nani Muwaha?’ Nayo yakanonjela yakatya, ‘Yo nene Yesu wa Nazaleti mono agwe wukungaza.’
44022009	Wawalya wayangu wakawuwona uwuzelu du, ninga ilizi lya mono calonganaga nayo, si walihulika ng'o.
44022010	Ale nane nghawa kuwuza, ‘Alu nhende wule Muwaha?’ Nayo Muwaha yakamhitula yakatya, ‘Winuce wubite ku Damesiki, na kuko, kolonjelwa zose zono zikunojeye witume.’
44022011	Alu, ku soko yo wung'alale wo wuzelu wuwulya, si nasuma kuwona, holeka iwayangu wono cali cina nawo, wakanyibata muwoko, wakanhonga sunga nghenjila Damesiki.
44022012	“Kuko ku Damesiki kwali na munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Ananiya, munhu muswanu, mukamisa wulajilize, mono yali yena lilumbo kuli Wayahudi wose, wono wekalaga kuko ku Damesiki.
44022013	Umwene yakanyiziza, yakema behi nane, yakatya, ‘Ndugu yangu Sawulo, wutuje kuwona.’ Nane ho baho baho du, nghawa kuwona, nghenula meso, nghawa kumulanga.
44022014	Nayo Ananiya yakatya, ‘U Mulungu we wakuku zetu, kakuhagula agwe, ho wumanye u wuhile wakwe, no kumuwona u mwitumami wakwe Mono Yali Ling'ani, no kulihulika ilizi lya mu mulomo wakwe mweneco.
44022015	Hambi nha kowa muhomelezi wakwe kuli wanhu wose, muli zizi zono wuziwene, na zono wuzihulice.
44022016	Nhawule lu wukucela? Winukaje, wubaputizwe wuwusizwe lukulu uwubi wako, kuno wukulicemeleza ilitagwa lyo Muwaha.’
44022017	“Hanyuma nghawa kuwuya ku Yelusalemi, na lono nalombaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, baho nghawona nghani yo wizine.
44022018	Nghamuwona Muwaha, nayo yakanyitya, ‘Wusunhe, wuwuce mbela mu Yelusalemi, hambi iwanhu wa baha, nha si wowuvumila wuhomelezi wako wa kuli'ne.’
44022019	Nane nghatya, ‘Muwaha, na weneco nha wamanyile vyono ane nawatajilaga mu jela no kuwatowanga mu matang'anilo gose go wuhembelo, wose wono wali wakwihuwiye gwegwe.
44022020	Na lono muhomelezi wako Sitefano yawulagwaga, nane no mweneco nali nili baho, nane nghelumbaniza ne litumo lilyo, sunga nghawa nigalindilize imakoti ga walya wono wamuwulagaga.’
44022021	Nayo Muwaha yakawa kunyitya, ‘Wubite, vyono alu, nokutuma kutali kuli i wanhu wono si Wayahudi.’ ”
44022022	Iwanhu wakamuhuliciza Pawulo sunga yakayidumya nghani yiyi, hanyuma wakawa kwanza kuzoza wakutya, “Munhu mono yenha yuyu, mumuwuse mononze, mumuwulagaje, hambi u munhu we liwala lili, nha si yanojeye kuwumipa.”
44022023	Wakajendelela kuzoza nhavivyo, akuno wakugayunza makoti gawo mucanyha, no kutimula manghundi mucanyha.
44022024	Umuwaha we wasilikale mulongola, yakalajiliza Pawulo yenjizwe mwigomawakali, yakawalonjela, wamukune viboko, ho wamanye yisoko yono yikuleka Wayahudi wakumuzozeza nhavivi.
44022025	Ninga waza kukondya ku muwopa, ho wamukune, ne viboko, Pawulo yakamuwuza u muwaha we wasilikale yigana, mono yali yemile behi yakatya, “Ati, wulenyi, yili ling'ani kuli'nye, kumukuna viboko munhu Mulumi, lono yakali sinaling'anizwa?”
44022026	Nayo u muwaha we wasilikale yigana yaza hulika zizi, yakamubitila u muwaha u mulongola yakamutya, “Alu wukusaka kutenda wule? Hambi munhu ayu nha Mulumi!”
44022027	Umuwaha u mulongola yakaza, yakamutya Pawulo, “Ale ta, wulonje, ati wuli Mulumi hongo?” Nayo Pawulo yakamupitula, yakatya “Heya.”
44022028	U muwaha u mulongola yakapitula yakatya “Ane nawutuga wunyawusi wuwu wo kuwa Mulumi kwa sawo nyinji.” Nayo Pawulo yakatya, “Ninga ane nili Mulumi ku ndelwa.”
44022029	Awalya iwanhu wono wali wewikanize kumuwuza wuza Pawulo, ho wamumanye izakwe, hodu wakawa kumuleka. Sunga na yuyo u muwaha we wasilikale nayo, yakogopa, yaza manya vyono Pawulo Mulumi, na kanyhi vyono yali yamuwopa.
44022030	Imitondo yaco, u muwaha we wasilikale, vyono yasaka kumanya i mbeka yono Wayahudi wakumusonjezeza Pawulo, yakamuwopolela Pawulo manyolo gakwe, yakalajiliza wakohani wawaha ne wanyamhala wose wekonghole. Nayo yakamuleta Pawulo, yakamuwika ha mwande yawo.
