44023001	Nayo Pawulo, yakawalanga muno wanhu wono wali wali baho he balaza, hanyuma yakawa kutya, “Nye wandugu zangu, ane nikalaga na nhumbula nzelu hali Mulungu sunga nalu.”
44023002	U mukohani muwaha Ananiya, yakawalajiliza wono wali wemile behi, wamutowe kofi Pawulo mu mulomo.
44023003	Nayo Pawulo yakamutya, “U Mulungu kokutowa kofi gwegwe, agwe mono wihwanile lijinji lyono libacigwe swakala! Kosuma nhawule kwikala no kuning'aniza ane nha vyono winho Wulajilize, na kunji gwegwe go mweneco wukuwubena Wulajilize so kunyitya ane nhowe kofi?”
44023004	Iwanhu wono wali wemile baho, wakamutya Pawulo, “Alo wukumutovula Mukohani Muwaha wo Mulungu?”
44023005	Pawulo yakatya, “Wandugu zangu, si nali manyile, vyono yo Mukohani Muwaha, hambi nha yandikwe, Wulece kumulonga vibi muwaha we wanhu wako.”
44023006	Ninga Pawulo yaza kwizuka, vyono mhuga monga ye wanhu wawo, wali Wasadukayo na wanji wali Wafalisayo. Hobaho yakalonga yazozize hamwande ye libalaza yakutya, “Mo wandugu zangu, ane nili Mufalisayo mwana we Wafalisayo, ane wandeta hono mahakama, ku soko yo witumbilo wo wuzuce we wafu.”
44023007	Yaza longa zizi, kukawa wiwanganile muli Wafalisayo ne Wasadukayo, imhuga yose yiketemanuka wejete.
44023008	Ne soko yayo yali nhavi, Iwasadukayo watezaga, kusina wuzuce we wafu, hasina malayika, hamba muhe hasina. Ninga Iwafalisayo wavumilaga vyono hozili zizo zose vyono yidatu.
44023009	Holeka kukawa na mazozo mawaha, ne wejizi wenji wo wulajilize we mhuga ye Wafalisayo, wakema, wakabeza kwe vilungo, wakutya, “Ase si cikuwona nghani yo yose 'mbi muli munhu yuyu, lunji ma hono yawe muhe, hamba malayika kalonga nayo?”
44023010	No wiwanganile waza jendelela kucila, u muwaha we wasilikale mulongola, yakogopa, yakutya mba Pawulo kodemulwanga nawo. Holeka yakawalajiliza wasilikale, wenjile mwipuga lye wanhu, wamuwuse Pawulo wamugomoleze mwigomawakali.
44023011	Mu cilo cico, u Muwaha yakema behi na Pawulo, yakamutya, “Wisindamice, hambi nha vyono wuhomeleye zangu kukuno kono Yelusalemi, nha vivyo vyo yikunojeye kuhomelela na ku Lumi.”
44023012	Waza kwela, Iwayahudi wakekonghola cinyele, wakelahiza wakutya, “Ase sicolya hamba kung'wa, sunga kolo cakondya kumuwulaga Pawulo.”
44023013	Nawo wono wepinga nhavivi, wali wacizize wanhu makumi mane.
44023014	Wakaza kuli wakohani wawaha ne wanyamhala, wakatya, “Ase wose cilahiza vyono, cilece kujeza cinji mu milomo yetu, sunga kolo cakondya kumuwulaga Pawulo.
44023015	Alu anye, hamonga ne libalaza, mumulonjele u muwaha we wasilikale u mulongola, yamulete Pawulo kuli nyenye nha kotya mukusaka kumanya viswanu nha vyono zinha zakwe. Nase ciwikanize kumuwulaga na lono yakali si yanafika baha.”
44023016	Ninga u mwana we cilume wo lumbulye lya Pawulo, yakawumanya u wuhile wawo, holeka yakenjila mwigomawakali, yakawa kumulonjela Pawulo.
44023017	Nayo Pawulo yakamucema yunji wa muli wawaha we wasilikale yigana, yakatya, “Wumusole muzelelo ayu, wumutegule kuli muwaha we wasilikale u mulongola, yena nghani yo kumulonjela.”
44023018	Umusilikale yakamusola, yakamutegula kuli muwaha yuyo, yakatya, “Ayulya Pawulo muwopwe, kanyhema, kanyitya nimulete muzelelo ayu kwako, yena nghani yo kukulonjela.”
44023019	Umuwaha we wasilikale u mulongola, yakamwibata muwoko yuyo muzelelo, wakabitana hanhu ha cilejeho, yakamuwuza yakutya, “Wina nghani ci yono wukusaka kunonjela?”
44023020	Nayo u muzelelo yakatya, “Iwayahudi walagane wakulombe, wumutegule Pawulo kwi balaza imitondo, nha kotya libalaza likusaka kumanya viswanu nha vyono zinha izakwe.
44023021	Ninga agwe wulece kuvumila, hambi nha kowali wanhu wono wacizize makumi mane wono wewikanize ho wamwibate. Nawo welahiza vyono walece kulya hamba kung'wa sunga wamuwulaje. Nalu wewikanize, walindiye uwulamuzi wako du.”
44023022	Umuwaha we wasilikale mulongola, yakamukombola muzelelo, yakamulonjela vyono yalece kumulonjela yunji vyono kamufisiza zizi.
44023023	Umuwaha we wasilikale u mulongola, yakacema wawaha wejete we wasilikale yigana, yakawatya, “Muwikanizize lukulu wasilikale magana mejete, iwapanda fwalasi makumi mupunghati, na we migoha, magana mejete, wabite ku Kayisaliya izuwalili mwipango lya saa tatu ye cilo.
44023024	Muwikanizize lukulu ne zifwalasi zono momupandiza Pawulo, mumutegule yapolile kuli Feliki u muwaha we yisi.”
44023025	Nayo u muwaha we wasilikale u mulongola yakandika baluwa nhavi:
44023026	“Ane Kilawudiyo Lusiya, nghukwandicila gwegwe we lilumbo Feliki umuwaha we yisi, Lamucenyi!
44023027	Munhu ayu, yebatwa ne Wayahudi, na yali yali behi no kuwulagwa nawo, hono nali ndece kumanyizwa vyono mwene munya Lumi, holeka nimubitila hamonga ne wasilikale niwa kumuponya.
44023028	Na vyono nasakaga kumanya yisoko yono wakumusonjezeza, namutegula hamwande ye libalaza lyawo.
44023029	Nane nghawona vyono wakumusonjeza ku soko yo wiwanganile du wa zinji za mu wulajilize wawo, holeka nghawona vyono yasina soko yo yose yo kufwila, hamba yo kudindililwa mu jela.
44023030	Nane niza manyizwa vyono Wayahudi wakumugoza wamuwulaje, mbona viswanu nimulete kwako. Nghawalajiliza wasonjezi wakwe wamusonjeze ha mwande yako.”
44023031	Nawo iwasilikale, nha vyono walajilizwa, wakamusola Pawulo, wakamutegula ne cilo cico sunga ko ku Antipatili.
44023032	Ninga imitondo yaco wawalya iwasilikale wono wajendaga hasi, wakawuya kwigomawakali, wakawaleka awalya iwasilikale wapanda Fwalasi, wajendane hamonga na Pawulo.
44023033	Nawo waza kufika ku Kayisaliya, wakamupela u muwaha we yisi ibaluwa, no kumuwika na Pawulo mu miwoko yakwe.
44023034	Nayo Feliki yaza yisoma baluwa, yakawawuza iyisi yono Pawulo yakulawa. Nayo yaza kumanya vyono yali munya Kilikiya,
44023035	yakatya, “Nohuliciza zo wusonjezwe wako, kolo weza kuwa baha wono wakukusitaka.” Hanyuma yakalajiliza vyono Pawulo yakamisizwe mwikulu lya Helode.
44024001	Vyaza malika vilo vihano, Umukohani Muwaha Ananiya, yakaza ku Kayisaliya, wena ne wanyamhala wanji, hamonga na wakili yunji litagwa lyakwe Telitulo. Wakamubitila ayulya u muwaha we yisi, wakamuloloseza ze masitaka gawo muli Pawulo.
44024002	Nayo Pawulo yakacemwa, nayo Telutiyo yakawa kumusonjeza yakutya, “Go mulumbwe Feliki, vyono cikutuga mulamu muno ku soko yako, na ku so wuling'anizi wako, imasutya gakuwa kunozelezwa viswanu so cambuzi ce nghungugo yetu.
44024003	Cikuyivumila inghani yiyi kwa nyemo, hamonga no wulumbwe wose kuli'gwe nhondo zose ne hanhu hose.
44024004	Ninga ho ndece kucila kukukalaza, nghukunena wucihulicize mu wupolo wako, nghani za ndumula.
44024005	Hambi nha camuwona ayu vyono yo munhu wa mbali muno, mwene yo muwusa wuma muli Wayahudi wose kononze kose, na kanyhi mwene yo mulongola mu mhuga ye Wanazalayo.
44024006	Kanyhi sunga yakajela kuyihodanga ne Nyumba yo Mulungu, nase cikawa kumwibata. [Cikasaka kumuling'aniza nha vyono winho wulajilize wetu,
44024007	ninga Lusiya u muwaha we wasilikale u mulongola, yakaza, yakamusola na vilungo viwaha muno mu mawoko getu.
44024008	Yakawalajiliza wono wakumusitaka, waze hali gwegwe.] Muli mwene, nagwe kohulika, hono wumuwuze go mweneco, kokwizuka zizo zose zono cikumusitaka.”
44024009	Iwayahudi nawo wakazilumbiliza zizo wakutya, “Heya vyo zinha.”
44024010	Nayo u muwaha we yisi, yakamusonhelela Pawulo yalonje, nayo Pawulo yakapitula yakatya, “Nghusangalala kwitetela hamwande yako, akuno manyile vyono waweza muling'anizi we likungugo lili kwa myaka minji.
44024011	Kosuma kuwona go mweneco, vyono vyapuluta kotya vilo si vicizize yikumi na vyejete nhavi, kulawa lono nabitila kuhemba ku Yelusalemi.
44024012	Wayahudi si wanyagana cikwiwanganila na munhu, hamba kusagahaza wuma mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, hamba mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo, hamba hanji ho hose mwi'kaya lilyo.
44024013	Hamba si wosuma kuzigololela zono zikuleka wakusitaka ane alu.
44024014	Langa nghani monga yono nghuyivumilila hali gwegwe yoyi; Ane nghumuhemba u Mulungu we wakuku zetu, nikaye mu Nzila yiyo yono wene wakuyitya, wilunze wo wisiwanuzi. Ane nghuzihuwila zose nha vyono zandicigwe mu Wulajilize, na zono zandikwe ne wawizi.
44024015	Ane nimwitumbiye Mulungu, nawo nhavivilya, wawina witumbilo wuwo, vyono iwanhu iwaswanu ne wabi, wolozuka.
44024016	Ku soko yiyo, nene no mweneco, nghwihidimbaza, ho niwe na nhumbula swanu kuli Mulungu, na kuli wanhu, nhondo zose.
44024017	“Sunga na lono nali nekala kutali kwa myaka minji, nawuya ku Yelusalemi, ho niwategulile wanyawusi wayangu wutazi no kulavya vilavywa.
44024018	Na mwipango lyono netumaga zizo, lo wanyaganila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, lono nali nakondya kunoza wuhembi wo wezwe wangu. Hali hasina mhuga ya wanhu, hamba mazozo.
44024019	Ninga hali ho wali Wayahudi wanji, wono walawa ku Asiya, nawo wo wali wanojeye wawe baha hono mwande yako, wasitace, hono wawe wena nghani muli nene.
44024020	Hamba, lunji awa weneco wono wali baha, walonje lisutya lyono waliwona muli'ne, lono nali nyimile hamwande ye libalaza lyawo liwaha.
44024021	Langa hono si nghani monga du yono nayilonga, lono nali nyimile ha mwande yawo, yono natya, ‘Mukuning'aniza izuwali ku soko ane nihuwiye vyono iwafu wolozuka.’ ”
44024022	Ninga Feliki, vyono yali yamanyile viswanu ze Nzila yiyi, yakacidiza calo, yakawatya “Noloyiling'aniza yinghani yenyu kolo yakondya kuza baha Lusiya umuwaha we wasilikale umulongola.”
44024023	Yakamulajiliza umuwaha we wasilikale igana, yamukamise Pawulo, ninga yamupelaje ne cilejeho, hamba iwendece wakwe, walece kwimilwa kumupela ivisakwa vyakwe.
44024024	Vyaza puluta vilo vicefu, Feliki yakaza no mugolece wakwe we Ciyahudi ilitagwa lyakwe Delusila. Yakamucema Pawulo, yakamuhuliciza zono yakulonga zo wihuwilo wa muli Yesu Kilisito.
44024025	Ninga Pawulo yaza kwamula kulolosa zo wiling'ano na zo wiyimile na ze ning'aniza yono yikuza, Feliki yakogopa muno yakatya, “Alu wubite, ninga nokucema kanyhi kolo natuga cilejeho.”
44024026	Na mwi'pango lilyo baho, yali yetumbiye vyono Pawulo komupela mapesa. Na ku soko yiyo, holeka yakacila kumucema-cema Pawulo ho wasimulilane nayo.
44024027	Ninga myaka myejete yaza kupuluta, Feliki yakakawanizwa na Polikiyo Fesito yo yakawa u muwaha we yisi. Nayo Feliki vyono yahilaga kwiyendeza kuli Wayahudi, yakamuleka Pawulo muwopwe.
44025001	Vyaza kupuluta vilo vidatu kulawa mu wuze wakwe Fesito mu yisi, Fesito yakawuka ku Kayisaliya, yakabita ku Yelusalemi.
44025002	Iwakohani wawaha hamonga ne wawaha we Wayahudi, wakamufisiza zinghani zo wusitakwe wa Pawulo. Wakamuneneleza Fesito,
44025003	wasakaga yamulete Pawulo ku Yelusalemi, ninga akuno wene wali wakondya kulagana vyono wamuwulaje lono yakali mu nzila.
44025004	Ninga Fesito yakawapitula yakatya, “Pawulo kokwikala kuko ku Kayisaliya du, hambi nane nha nobita kuko mu vilo vivi.
44025005	Holeka muwalekaje walongola wenyu du, wo cibitane nawo kuko, wo wakamusitace munhu yuyu, hono ho yili nghani 'mbi muli mwene.”
44025006	Nayo yaza kuswezana nawo kotya vilo munana hamba yikumi nhavi, yakabita ku Kayisaliya. Ne mitondo yaco yakekala mwi'goda lyo wuling'anizi, nayo yakalajiliza Pawulo yaletwe.
44025007	Nayo Pawulo yaza kufika du, Iwayahudi wono wali walawa ku Yelusalemi, wakawa kwamula kumusitaka nghani nyinji kanyhi mbaha, zono hamba na weneco si wasuma kuzihomelela.
44025008	Nayo Pawulo yaketetela yakatya, “Ane nghali si nahodanga cinji mu Wulajilize we Wayahudi, hamba mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, hamba kwa Kayisali.”
44025009	Fesito vyono yasakaga kwiyendeza kuli Wayahudi, yakamuwuza Pawulo, yakutya, “Alo kokwenda kubita ku Yelusalemi, no kuling'anizizwa kuko zinghani zizi hali nene?”
44025010	Pawulo yakatya, “Ane nili baha, nyimile hone'goda lyo wuling'anizi lya Kayisali, hono nojeye ho ning'anizwe. Ane si nawaviza cinji Iwayahudi, nha vyono na gwegwe wumanyile muno.
44025011	Ale hono niwe muhodanji, lunji netuma nghani yono yonyambuza nifwe, ane si nghulema kufwa yaye, ninga hono si zili mbeka zizo zono wene wakusitacila, hasina munhu mono kosuma kundavya kuli wene. Langa nosaka ning'anizwe na Kayisali.”
44025012	Hobaho Fesito yaza kukondya kulongana ne wanyamhala wakwe, yakamulonjela Pawulo yakatya, “Vyono kusaka nghani yako yikahulicizwe na Kayisali, ale kobita kwa Kayisali.”
44025013	Ivilo vyaza puluta, Agilipa mutemi, hamonga na Belinike, wakafika ku Kayisaliya, kumulamusa Fesito.
44025014	Nawo waza kuwa wekala kuko vilo vinji, Fesito yakamufisiza mutemi zinghani za Pawulo, yakatya, “Hoyali munhu baha mono Feliki yamuleka muwopwe.
44025015	Lono nabitila ku Yelusalemi, iwakohani wawaha hamonga ne wanyamhala we Wayahudi, wamusitaka, wakasaka nimuling'anize.
44025016	Nane nghawalonjela nghawatya, vyono si moto wetu co Walumi munhu yalipicizwe, lono musitakwa yakali sinema na wono wakumusitaka, ho yatuje cilejeho co kwitetela muli zono yakusitacilwa.
44025017	Holeka wali weza kufika baha, nane si natinya, langa mitondo yaco nghekala mwigoda lyo wuling'anizi, nghalajiliza munhu yuyo yaletwe.
44025018	Wono wamusitakaga, wakawa kwima, ninga si wamusitakaga nghani yono 'mbi, nha vyono nehwesaga.
44025019	Langa wali wena mawuzo ganji ganji du kuli mwene, muli zo wuhembi wawo, na za yunji Yesu mono yafwa, mono mwene Pawulo yebatiliye du yakumutya mumi.
44025020	Nane sinasuma kumanya yono nokwituma mu nghani yiyi. Holeka nghamuwuza mweneco Pawulo, hono kokwenda kubita ku Yelusalemi ko yakaling'anizizwe nghani zizi.
44025021	Ninga mwene Pawulo yakasaka yalekwe muwopwe, sunga nghani zizi, wulamuzi wazo wunozwe na Kayisali. Holeka nghawa kumuleka muwopwe sunga kolo nghumutegula kwa Kayisali.”
44025022	Agilipa yakamutya Fesito, “Nali nyende no mweneco kumuhulika munhu yuyo Fesito yakatya, ‘Komuhulika imitondo.’ ”
44025023	Ale imitondo yaco, Agilipa na Belinike wakaza na nyemo mbaha, wakenjila hanhu ho kuhuliciziza zinghani wena ne wawaha we wasilikale iwalongola, hamonga ne wanyamhala wa mwi'kaya. Fesito yakalajiliza Pawulo yaletwe mugati.
44025024	Fesito yakawa yakutya, “Go mutemi Agilipa, nanye wose mono muli baha hamonga nase, mukumuwona munhu yuyu, mono mhuga yose ye Wayahudi bahano sunga kuko ku Yelusalemi, wali kuzoza, wakutya. Siyanojeye kwikala mumi kanyhi.
44025025	Ninga ane si nghawona vyono yanozize nghani yo yose yimbi yono yimunojeye yafwe. Ninga vyono Pawulo mweneco yakasaka zinghani zakwe zikalamulwe na Kayisali, holeka nghalajiliza yategulwe.
44025026	Ane ku lubavu lwangu, sina nghani zono ziluwucile zono nomwandicila Kayisali. Yo yilecile nghumuleta hali'nye, na ko muno hali'gwe go mutemi Agilipa, kolo mwamuwuza wuza, ho niwe na nghani yo kwandika.
44025027	Hambi nha nghuwona vyono yowa si viswanu hono nimutegule mufungwa, na kuno si nhambuye cagalanze ze masitaka gakwe.”
44026001	Agilipa yakamutya Pawulo, “Ale, kukombolwa witetele.” Baho Pawulo yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakawa kwitetela, yakutya,
44026002	“Go mutemi Agilipa, nghwiwona nili ciba zuwali, kwitetela hamwande yako muli ze masitaka gose gono Wayahudi wakugalonga muli'ne.
44026003	Ko muno vyono agwe wuyimanyile myoto yose ye Wayahudi, hamonga ne zinghani zawo, holeka nghukulomba wuhulicizaje ko wukangalizi.
44026004	Imikalile yangu vyono nalawa wudodo wangu, na vyono nekalaga ne we likungugo lyangu kuko ku Yelusalemi.
44026005	Wamanyile Wayahudi wose kwa vilo vinji, na wadahile kulonga hono wende, nha vyono ku wulawa mwamulizo nekalaga nili mu cipuga co wisiwanuzi mu wuhembi wetu, cipuga ce Wafalisayo.
44026006	Na lulu nyimile baha ning'anizwe ku soko yo witumbilo wo wihuwizo wono u Mulungu yawehuwiziza i wakuku zetu.
44026007	No wihuwizo wuwo, wo wuwo wono sunga ne milango yetu yikumi na myejete, wo wetumbiye, wakwihinda kumwitumamila Mulungu cilo na misi. Na ku soko yo witumbilo wuwu, 'gwe go mutemi, holeka Wayahudi wakusitaka!
44026008	Alu nhawulenyi nanye si mukusuma kwihuwila vyono u Mulungu yakuwa kuwazukula iwafu?
44026009	Ane no mweneco mbeka nali nihuwiye vyono, yinojeye nitume nghani nyinji zo kulilema ilitagwa lya Yesu wa Nazaleti.
44026010	Navyo natendaga ku Yelusalemi. Nene no mweneco lono nali napegwa uwulajilize kulawa kuli wakohani wawaha, nghawadindila mu jela wanhu wo Mulungu wenji. Nawo lono wapegwaga wulipicizwe wo kuwulagwa, nane nelumbilizaga ne litumo lilyo.
44026011	Kali kenji nawatowaga mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo gose, nghawa kuwadindimiza watovule wihuwilo wawo. Ne likuwo lyangu kuli wene likacila muno, holeka nghawa kuwalondelela sunga mu matumbi go kutali.
44026012	“Lono nabitaga ku Damesiki, mwizuwa linji nina vilungo no wulajilize we wakohani wawaha.
44026013	Gwe go mutemi Agilipa, lono nali nili mu nzila mwipango lye saa sita ne misi, nghawona wuzelu wulawile ku wulanga, wucizize wumulice we lizuwa, wukamulicila kose kose nene na wono cajendana nawo.
44026014	Ase wose cikagwa hasi, ane nghahulika lizi likulongana nane mu nonga ye Cihebelaniya likutya, ‘Sawulo, Sawulo, nhawule wukungaza? Wukwitamisa bwete nhe ndogowe yono yikubana inghome yo mutwawe.’
44026015	Nane nghawuza, ‘Yo gwegwe nani Muwaha.’ Nayo Muwaha yakatya, ‘Ane yo nene Yesu mono wukungaza.
44026016	Ninga si nghani yaye, alu winuce, wime wima. Nilajila kuli'gwe ho nghuhagule wuwe mwitumami no muhomelezi kuli wanhu wanji, wa zizi zose zono wuziwene izuwali, sunga na azilya zono nokulajila.
44026017	Nane nokuponya muli wanhu wa Isilayeli, na muli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, kuli wono nghukutuma.
44026018	Kowabunzulula i meso gawo, ho wasume kuwuka ku wutitu, ho wapitucile kuzelu, wawuce mu vilungo vya Setani, wamupitucile Mulungu, na so wihuwilo, ho watuje wunenelwe wo wubi, ho watuje wuhazi, hamonga na walya wono wakondya kuwa wanhu wo Mulungu.’
44026019	“Holeka, Go mutemi Agilipa, si nasuma kuwa mubezi kuli nghani yiyo yono nalajilwa kulawa ku wulanga.
44026020	Ninga nghamula kamonga kuwaganulila wanya Damesiki na wanya Yelusalemi na wa mu yisi yose ya Yudiya, kanyhi na kuli wanhu we Makungugo ganji. Nghawaswaswaniza wamupitucile Mulungu, kanyhi walajile mu metumo gawo, vyono wakondya kupituka mu zinhumbula zawo.
44026021	Ku soko yiyo, Wayahudi wakanyibata lono nali nili mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, nawo wakajela kumbulaga.
44026022	Ninga u Mulungu yakanhaza, holeka sunga ne zuwalili, nimile cilume-lume, nghuwahomelela wose iwawaha ne wadodo. Sinongaga zinji, langa zizilya du zono wazilonga iwawizi na Musa, vyono zolokwijela,
44026023	nha vyono Kilisito si koleka kutamiswa na kanyhi ho yawe mulongozi mu wuzuce mu wafu, ho yawalonjele zo wuzelu wo wukombozwe, vyono wukuwamulicila alu iwanhu wose, Iwayahudi sunga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi.”
44026024	Pawulo yaza kanga baho mu witetele wakwe, Fesito yakalonga yazozize yakutya, “Mwene Pawulo! Wina lukwale! Uwusoma muno wako, wo wukupeye lukwale.”
44026025	Ninga Pawulo yakatya, “Ane sina lukwale, 'gwe Fesito umulumbwe; langa nghulonga ze mbeka na ze mahala.
44026026	Gwegwe mutemi wuzimanyile zizi, holeka nosuma kulonga sina woga ha mwande yako. Nane manyile vyono, zizi zose zili calinze hali 'gwe, hambi nha hasina yinji yono yanozezwa kumhelo.
44026027	Gwe mutemi Agilipa, wukuwehuwila wawizi hongo? Manyile vyono wukuwehuwila.”
44026028	Agilipa yakamutya Pawulo, “Mwi'daha lili yifupi, wukwihwesa mo komhitulila niwe Mukilisito?”
44026029	Pawulo yakamupitula, yakatya, “Vyo nghumulomba u Mulungu hono yiwe mwi'daha yifupi, hamba yitali, kanyhi si gwegwe du, langa na wose wono wakuhuliciza ane yizuwali, wawe vyono ninha nene, ninga si ne manyolo gaga.”
44026030	Umutemi Agilipa, no muwaha we yisi Belinike, hamonga na wono wali wekalane nawo, wakenuka.
44026031	Nawo waza kuwuka, wakawa kulongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Munhu ayu si yanozize nghani yo yose yono yomutegula ku wufwe, hamba ku wufungwe.”
44026032	Agilipa yakamutya Fesito, “Munhu ayu mhali yawopolelwe, hono yali yalece kutambula kubita kwa Kayisali.”
44027001	Ale waza kulamula vyono cijendele mu ngalawa ku wubita ku Italiya, wakamuwika Pawulo ne wafungwa wanji, mu miwoko yo muwaha we wasilikale yigana, litagwa lyakwe Yuliyo, wa mu mhuga yono yacemwaga, “Mhuga ya Kayisaliya.”
44027002	Caza kupanda mu ngalawa ya Andelamutino, yono yabitaga no kukolela mu zikaya za ku mhwani za Asiya, cikatuluka, cali cina na Alisitaliko, Mumakedoniya wa Tesalonike.
44027003	Imitondo yaco cikakola ha Sidoni. Yuliyo yakamutendela viswanu Pawulo, yakamukombola yabite ku wendece wakwe ho yasindamikwe.
44027004	Caza tuluka kuko mu ngalawa, ninga vyono mbeho yaputaga muno, yikulawilila ku mwande yetu, cikakolela ku lubavu lwe cizingwa ca Kupulo kono mbeho si yali na vilungo.
44027005	Hanyuma caza lowoka lilenga lyono lili ha Kilikiya na Pamufuliya, cikafika Mula, litumbi lya Lukiya.
44027006	Na kuko yuyulya u muwaha we wasilikale yigana, yakawona ngalawa ya Alekizandeliya yono yikubita ku Italiya, yakacinjiza mumo.
44027007	Cikajendelela no muhinzo wetu mholamhola kwa vilo vinji, hamonga no wugaye, sunga cikafika behi na Nido. Na vyono mbeho yali yikali yikucimila, cikajendelela kumwande du, cikakolela kulubavu lwa Kilete, vyono yidomile Salimone ku lubavu lono mbeho yali si mbaha.
44027008	Cikakolela mu mhelo mhelo yayo mholamhola, sunga cikafika hanhu hanji hono hatezagwa, “Bandali Swanu,” behi ne likaya lya Laseya.
44027009	Lyaza puluta yidaha mututu, ne lizuwa lyo kuleka kulya lyali lyapuluta. No muhinzo wa mwi'lenga wukawa mubi, Pawulo yakawasugula wayagwe, yakatya,
44027010	“Nye wayangu, ane nghuwona vyono umuhinzo wuwu wowa na malema, no wambuce wowa wuwaha, si wa vya mugati ne ngalawa du, langa na wo wumi wetu.”
44027011	Ninga u muwaha we wasilikale yigana, yahulicila wulonje wa mono yayijendyaga ngalawa, no munya ngalawa si nha azilya zono yazilonga Pawulo.
44027012	Na vyono ha bandali yiyo hali si hanhu haswanu, ku wikale mwi'pango lye cinyuli, wenji wakenda wajendelele no muhinzo, na hono yisumice wafice sunga ku Foyinike kono wali wasume kwikala mu cipango ce cinyuli. Foyinike yo bandali ya Kilete yono yidomile kutakama ye mwezi na kusumuka ye mwezi.
44027013	Yaza puta imbeho ndodo ya kutakama, wakaganiciza nha vyono watujile zono wahilaga, holeka wakasuka i cimizizo ce ngalawa, wakawa kwelela, wayikozize ngalawa ha mhelo ya Kilete, wasejeleye kwi'sangha.
44027014	Caza kupuluta cidaha cidodo, imbeho yo mukukunzo yikatowa cihumbi, yikulawa ku cizingwa, imbeho yono yitezagwa, “Mbeho ya kusumuka.”
44027015	Ngalawa yaza kwibatwa ne mbeho, na vyono si casuma kwisumaniza nayo, hodu cikawa kwisuza, cikawa kusolwa ne mbeho yiyo.
44027016	Cizingwa cinji cono cikucemwa Kawuda, co cacicitila hadodo ne mbeho yiyo, nase cali ceza puluta ku lubavu lwayo lwe takama, ho cikasuma kuciwopa cipugu ce ngalawa, hamba yiwe yali hamonga no wugazice.
44027017	Waza kucinjiza mugati ye ngalawa, wakayizinga ngalawa na milejehe no kuyiwopa kwa vilungo. Wogopaga, wakutya lunji wosuma kudodomela ha nhumbi ye lilenga lya Libiya. Holeka wakacitimya cimizizo no kuyileka ngalawa yitegulwe ne mbeho.
44027018	Na lono cesumanizaga muno ne mbeho, imitondo yaco wakanza kuvitaga mwi'lenga vya mugati mu ngalawa.
44027019	Ne lizuwa lye kadatu, wakawa kwanza nhavivilya kuvitaga ne miwoko yawo weneco ivinhu vye ngalawa.
44027020	Hamba izuwa, hamba zinyelezi zose, si zejelaga kwa vilo vinji, ne makukunzo mawaha ge mbeho gakaciziliza, sunga no witumbilo wose wo kupona, cikawa cisina.
44027021	Na lono wali wekala kwa vilo vinji si waliye ndigwa, baho Pawulo yakema haciligati yakatya, “Nye wayangu, cinojele hono mwali muhulice izangu, mulece kutuluka ku Kilete, u wubi wuwu no wiyambuze wuwu si mhali ciwutuje.
44027022	Na lulu nghumunenenyi mwisindamice, hambi nha hasina hamba yumonga mono kokwajiliza uwumi wakwe, langa ngalawa du yo yokwajilila.
44027023	Ku soko Malayika wo Mulungu wangu, mono nimuhembaga, kema hali nene mu cilo ce zuwali,
44027024	kawa kunyitya, ‘Pawulo, Wulece kogopa, nha si koleka kwima hali Kayisali, na langa ta, u Mulungu so wuswanu wakwe, kakuwonela lusungu ko kuwaponya wose wono mukujendana nawo ho walece kwajilila.’
44027025	Ku soko yiyo, holeka mwisindamice 'nye wayangu, hambi nha nimwihuwiye u Mulungu vyono zowa nha vivi vyono nonjeywe.
44027026	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, si coleka kutagwa mwi'zingwa linji.”
44027027	Mu cilo ce lizuwa lye likumi na yine, cikawa cikutegulwa ako na ako mwi'lenga lya Meditelaneya. Mu cilo mugati, iwetumami we ngalawa waganicizaga nha wayisejeleye yisi nghavu.
44027028	Wakasaka kumanya uwutali we malenga ku wubita hasi, holeka wakawugwiliza mulejehe wono wali muwopeleze cinhu cizito, wakawona vyono wutali wali mita makumi mane. Hanyuma hadodo wakapima kanyhi, wakawona mita makumi mejete.
44027029	Alu vyono cogopaga cikutya lunji cogumilwa mu mabwe, holeka wakatajila vimizo vine kunyuma ye ngalawa. Wakalomba wele mbela.
44027030	Iwetumami we ngalawa wasakaga kutiza mu ngalawa, nawo wali wakondya kucitimya cipugu mwi'lenga, akuno wakwikojela nha kotya wasakaga kutajila vimizo kumwande ye ngalawa.
44027031	Ninga Pawulo yakamulonjela u muwaha we wasilikale yigana, hamonga ne wasilikale wakwe, yakatya, “Hono wawa wetumami walece kwikala mu ngalawa, anye wose si mopona ng'o.”
44027032	Lo lulo lulo iwasilikale wakayidumula milejehe yono yali yibate cipugu, wakacileka cisolwe ne malenga.
44027033	Na lono wali weza kwela, Pawulo yakawanena wose walye ndigwa, yakutya, “Vyeza vilo yikumi na vine alu, vyono mwali mu mahwele, mukawa kuswa ne nzala hamba kulya cinji.
44027034	Holeka nghumunenenyi, mulye ndigwa, hambi nha yo mhonelo yenyu. Hambi nha hasina hamba luvwili lumonga lwa mu mitwe yenyu lono lokwajilila.”
44027035	Yaza longa zizi, yakasola mukate, yakamulumbila Mulungu hali wene wose, yakawubegula, yakanza kulya.
44027036	Wakasindamikwa wose, wakasola na weneco ndigwa, wakawa kulya.
44027037	Cikawa mu ngalawa wose nha wanhu magana mejete na makumi mupunghati na mutandatu.
44027038	Waza kwiguta ndigwa, wakawugumila uwuhemba mwi'lenga, ho wacepuze uwuzito mu ngalawa.
44027039	Waza kwela, iwetumami siwasuma kuyitanga yisi yiyo, langa wakawona yiwokowoko lina ne sangha, wakalongana hono wosuma lunji kuyikundujiza mumo ngalawa.
44027040	Holeka wakavidumula vimizo, wakavileka mwi'lenga, wakadohola milejehe ye vitonjelo, na waza nanusa litote ho lyambe mbeho, wakabita ku kulya ku mwejelele.
44027041	Ninga wakagana hanhu ha wutang'anilo we malenga mejete, ingalawa yikehimbiza mu muhangha. Kumwande yayo yikehimbiza yikebatwa zii, ninga kunyuma yayo, yikanza kubenanjika so vilungo vye mawingo.
44027042	Iwasilikale wahilaga iwafungwa wose wawulagwe, vyono wogopa lunji wokojelela sunga kunhumbi watize.
44027043	Ninga u muwaha we Wasilikale yigana, vyono yendaga kumuponya Pawulo, yakawemila walece kwituma nghani yiyo. Yakalajiliza wono wamanyile kojelela, wetajile mwi'lenga wojele sunga ku yisi nghavu,
44027044	na wono wasigala webate mu zimbawo, hamba mu vinhu vinji vya mu ngalawa. Kukawa nha vivi wose, vyo casuma kufika ku yisi nghavu cili watelevu.
44028001	Caza kuwa cafika ku yisi nghavu, ho cikatanga nhondo, vyono lizingwa lyacemwaga Melita.
44028002	Wanyawusi wa baho, wacitendela viswanu muno. So mvula yono yatonyaga na so mbeho, wakapemba moto, wakacicemela wose.
44028003	Pawulo yakatondola yihagato lya ngwagu, yakazitajila mu moto, na so livuce lyo moto, nzoka yikalawa mumo mu zingwagu, yikamuzinga no kumunamatila Pawulo mu muwoko.
44028004	Nawo wanyawusi wa mwi'zingwa, waza yiwona i nzoka yikuninyina mu muwoko wa Pawulo, wakalongana weneco wose, “Na katuti munhu ayu muwulaji, hamba yawe yaponile mwi'lenga, ninga ling'ani si yikumuleka yekale mumi.”
44028005	Ninga Pawulo yakayikung'unhila nzoka mu moto, hamba si yawa cinji.
44028006	Awalya wakawa kulanjilila wakutya lunji kovimba, lunji kofwa lwa kamonga. Ninga waza kulanjilila cidaha, hamba kuwona Pawulo yawe cinji, wakagapitula mahweso gawo, wakatya, yo mulungu.
44028007	Ale, behi na hanhu baho, hali na migunda yo muwaha we lizingwa lilyo, ilitagwa lyakwe Pubuliyo. Yuyo Pubuliyo yakacicemela kwakwe, cikawa wajenzi wakwe kwa vilo vidatu.
44028008	Kukawa u Sogwe wa Pubuliyo yali yatamigwe mhungo, no kuhala sakami. Pawulo yakabita kumuwona, yakalomba nayo, yakamuwicila miwoko, yakamuponya.
44028009	Zaza kondya zizi, wanji we zinhamwa wa mumo mwi'zingwa, nawo wakaza wakaponywa.
44028010	Wanhu wakacipela vipegwa hayo hayo, sunga na lono cali ceza kutulucila mu ngalawa wakaciletela mu ngalawa vinhu vyono casakaga.
44028011	Yaza kupuluta myezi midatu, cikatulucila mu ngalawa ya Alekizandeliya, yono yekalaga mwi'zingwa mwidaha lyose lye cinyuli, yono yikucemwa “Milungu ye Matundu.”
44028012	Cikafika ku Silakusa, cikaswa baho vilo vidatu.
44028013	Caza kulawa baho, cikapilima, cikafika ha Legiyo. Lyaza malika lizuwa limonga, mbeho ya kutakama yikaputa, ne mitondo yaco cikaza Potiyolo.
44028014	Na kuko cikawagana we zindugu, wono wacilomba cikalane nawo kwa vilo mupunghati. Nhavivyo cikawa kufika ku Lumi.
44028015	We zindugu wa kuko ku Lumi, waza kuzihulika izetu, wakawa kuza sunga ku Sokoni ya Apiyo, na Migahawa midatu kucihinjiliza. Pawulo yaza wawona yakamulumbo Mulungu, yakatuza nhumbula yakwe.
44028016	Caza kufika ku Lumi, Pawulo yakakombolwa yekale yali wene, hamonga no musilikale yumonga wo kumwikaliza.
44028017	Kukawa vyaza malika vilo vidatu, Pawulo yakawacemela hamonga Wayahudi walongola wa baho. Nawo waza kwikonghola, Pawulo yakawatya “Nye wandugu zangu, ane hamba niwe si nanoza cinji cibi muli wanhu, hamba kubeza myoto ye wakuku zetu, nebatwa kuko ku Yelusalemi nghenjizwa mu miwoko ye Walumi.
44028018	Nawo waza kumbuza izangu, waza wona vyono nali sina yisutya lyo lyose, wakasaka wambopolele.
44028019	“Ninga Wayahudi wanji wayilema nghani yiyi, holeka nane nghadindimizwa ho sace nghani yiyi yize yidumulilwe kwa Kayisali. Ninga si vyono nali nina nghani yo kulisitaka likungugo lyangu, aa, ng'o.
44028020	Ku soko yiyo holeka nimucemenyi ciwone, cilongane nanye, hambi ane nha mbopigwe ne manyolo gaga ku soko yo witumbilo wa Isilayeli.”
44028021	Wene wakamutya, “Ase si cinabocela baluwa yo yose yono yikulawa ku Yudiya, hamba hasina yunji wa muli we zindugu mono yaza, yakuleta nghani lunji yalonje nghani 'mbi muli gwegwe.
44028022	Ninga ase cikusaka kuhulika kwako zono wina nazo, hambi zo wisiwanule wuwu, nha zakondya kumanyika kwetu vyono wulemwaga hose.”
44028023	Hodu, wakawa kupanga nayo lizuwa lyo kwitang'anila, na wenji muno wakamubitila ku nyumba yakwe yono yekalaga. Nayo Pawulo ku wulawa hakali mitondo sunga lyoswa, yakawa yakuwasimuliziza no kuwaloloseza zo Wutemi wo Mulungu, yakajela muno kuwakwega ho walumbe izinghani za Yesu, yakwitumamila Wulajilize wa Musa ne mandiko ge wawizi.
44028024	Wanji wakehuwila izinghani zakwe, ninga iwanji si wehuwila.
44028025	Kukawa na matemanuko muli wene mu mahweso gawo. Na lono watulukaga, Pawulo yakalonga nghani ayi, yakatya “Mbeka vyo yinha kuli azilya zono u Muhe Mono Yelile yawalonjela i wa kuku zenyu mu nzila yo muwizi Isaya,
44028026	yakutya; ‘Wubite kuli wanhu wawa, wuwatye, ku wuhulice mohulika, ninga si motanga yaye, na ku wulanje molanga, ninga si mowona.
44028027	Ku soko imahala ge wanhu wawa nha galelepe, ne makutu gawo, makamu ku wuhulice, ne meso gawo wagafufunize. Mhali si nhavivyo, wali wawone kwe meso gawo, wali wahulice kwe makutu gawo, wali wezuce kwe mahala gawo, wawo wali wamhitucile, yakutyo Muwaha, nane nali niwaponye.’ ”
44028028	Hanyuma Pawulo yakamalila wulonje wakwe yakatya, “Ale, mumanye vyono mhonelo yiyi yo Mulungu yo wukombozi, yitegulwa kuli wono si Wayahudi, iwene langa woyihulika!” [
44028029	Pawulo yaza kukondya kulonga zinghani zizi, Iwayahudi wakawuka wena no wiwanganile winji weneco kwa weneco.]
44028030	Mwidaha lya myaka myejete yose, Pawulo yekalaga mu nyumba yakwe mweneco yono yali yapanjile, vikawa kuduwana na wose wono wazaga kumulamusa.
44028031	Yakawa yakuganula zo wutemi wo Mulungu, no kuwejiza zo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito yasina woga, hamba kulemezwa na yunji.
45001001	Baluwa yiyi, yikulawa kuli nene Pawulo, u mwitumami wa Yesu Kilisito, no mutumwa mono nasiwanulwa, no kucemwa, ku soko yo kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu.
45001002	Baho katali Mulungu, yawehuwiziza iwanhu u Luganuzi luluno Luswanu, mu nzila ye wawizi wakwe, mu Mandiko Gono Gelile.
45001003	No Luganuzi luluno Luswanu, lukulonga za muli Mwanagwe u Muwaha wetu Yesu, mono ku muwili, yalelelwa mu lulelo lwa Dawudi,
45001004	na ku soko yo wele wakwe wo Wulungu, yahomelelwa kwe vilungo viwaha vyono, u mwene yo Mwana wo Mulungu, ku so wuzuce wa muli wafu.
45001005	Muli yuyo, ane mo natujila ilihewa lyo kuwa mwitumami. Na ku soko yakwe, ho niwalongoze iwanhu we makungugo gose, ho wasume kwihuwila, no kuwa na cihuliko.
45001006	Nanye yo nyenye mono muli wamonga wawo, mwacemwa ho muwe wanhu wakwe Yesu Kilisito.
45001007	Holeka, nghumwandicilenyi anye wose mono muli kuko ku Lumi, iwendece wo Mulungu, mono mwasiwanulwa Nayo ho muwe wanhu wakwe. Nghumulombelenyi ilihewa no mulamu, vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu, no Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
45001008	Nghwamula kumulumba u Mulungu wangu, muli Yesu Kilisito so nyenye wose, vyono u wihuwilo wenyu wumanyice kononze kose.
45001009	U Mulungu mono nghumwitumamila kwe nhumbula yangu yose, mu wuganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mwanagwe, yamanyile vyono nghumukumbucilenyi,
45001010	nhondo zose mu wulombe wangu. Nane nghumulomba u Mulungu hono yende, yamhele lulu icilejeho ciswanu co kuziza kuko kwenyu.
45001011	Hambi nha nghusaka kumuwonenyi, ho nimugawilenyi icipegwa ce cimuhe no kumusikamyenyi.
45001012	Nha cinji ho ciyisikamye anye na nene, wo wutya, uwihuwilo wenyu wosikamya ane, uwihuwilo wangu nawo womusikamyenyi nanye.
45001013	Nyendile mumanye wandugu zangu vyono, kali kenji nali kulanjilila kuza kumulamusenyi, ninga sunga na lulu nghali nyimiywe. Nali nyende nhuje cambuzi muli nyenye, nha vyono nacituga mu wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
45001014	Wo mulimo wangu kuli wanhu wose, kuli walya wono wajendeleye na wono si wajendeleye, kuli wono wasomile, na kuli wono si wasomile.
45001015	Yo yikuleka nghusulumila kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu sunga na kuli nyenye nhavivilya, mono mwikaye kuko ku Lumi.
45001016	Hambi nha si nghuluwonela cevu u Luganuzi Luswanu; hambi nhavyo vilungo vyo Mulungu, vyono vikuwakomboza wose wono wakwihuwila, lulongozi kuli Wayahudi, nha vivyo na kuli wono si Wayahudi.
45001017	Hambi u Luganuzi Luswanu, nha lukulajila calinze, vyono u Mulungu yakuwanoza iwanhu, ho wavumilwe no mwene, ne nghani yiyi, yikuwa kunozezwa mu wihuwilo, ku wulawa ku mwamulizo, sunga ko ku ndumo. Nha vyono yandikwe, “Mono yakuvumilwa no Mulungu so wihuwilo, kowumipa.”
45001018	Ilikuwo lyo Mulungu, ligubuywe kulawa ku wulanga ku soko yo wubi ne masutya ge wanhu, wono ku soko ye zinzila zawo izimbi, wakuyimila imbeka, ho yilece kumanyika.
45001019	Vyono zo Mulungu zose zono zimanyice, zili calinze muli wene, hambi u Mulungu mweneco nha yazanzalika.
45001020	Ku wulawa lululya lono u Mulungu yayiwumbila yinze, ivilungo vyakwe vye cibitilila, no wulungu-lungu wakwe, hamba viwe si vikwijela kwa meso, ninga vimanyice calinze. Ne wanhu wosuma kuzimanya izinghani zizo, ku soko ye vinhu vivyo vyono u Mulungu yaviwumba. Holeka wasina cinji cono wokwikojela!
45001021	Ku soko hamba wawe wakondya kumanya vyono u Mulungu yali baho, ninga si wakumupela ililumbo lyono limunojeye, hamba si wamulumbaga. Langa wene waco, wehwesaga zo wulele du, ne mahala gawo vyono gasina cinji, gamemile wutitu.
45001022	Wakwiwona nha wono wena mahala, kumbe ho walele.
45001023	Wakuleka kumuhemba u Mulungu mono kekalaga cibitilila, wene wakuhemba ivihwani vyono vina futa yo munhu mono kafwizaga, na ye zindeje, na ye vilimu, hamba nzoka.
45001024	Holeka u Mulungu nayo, yawaleka watyatye u wusulumizi wubi, wa mu zinhumbula zawo, no kwiyituma izinghani ze cevu weneco wose mu miwili yawo.
45001025	Wakuyikawaniziza imbeka yo Mulungu ku wulambi, wakucipela lilumbo no kucihemba iciwumbwa, si nho u Muwumbi mweneco, mono yo yanojeye lilumbo cibitilila! Heya.
45001026	Ku soko yiyo, holeka u Mulungu yakawaleka, ho wawutyatye u wusulumizi wubi. Sunga ne wacekulu nawo wakukawaniza inyituma yono vihwanile ne mumbwa ye miwili yawo, kuli zono si zihwanile ne mumbwa.
45001027	Nha vivyo ne walume nawo, wakuleka kutyatya inyituma ye mumbwa yo mulume no mucekulu, wene walume wakwiyisulumila weneco wose. Walume kwa walume, wakwinozeza nghani za cevu, na ku soko yiyo, wakwiyiletela weneco u wulipicizwe wono wuwanojeye so metumo gawo mabi.
45001028	Kanyhi vyono iwanhu wakalema kuwa hamonga no Mulungu, nayo Mulungu yawalecile mu mahala gawo go wajilile, ho wetume zono si wali wanojeye wazitume.
45001029	Wamemile u wubalya we mawala gose, wubalabala, wusulumizi, simbili. Wamemile mvivi, wuwulaji, wugombe, wukonji, wuhile wubi, wungwele, wubi, wahesi,
45001030	no kuwabalalila wayawo i makani mabi go wulambi, wo wanhu wono si wakwendeza hali Mulungu, wafyuzi, wasisi, kanyhi wevuni, wali vilungo muno muno mu wituma zimbi, kanyhi wasina cihuliko kuli walezi wawo,
45001031	wasina mahala, si wafisilizaga ivilagane vyawo, wasina wuswanu, hamba lusungu du bwete kuli wayawo.
45001032	Ninga wene kuno ho wamanyile i lilajilizo lyo Mulungu nha vyono, iwanhu wono wakwituma i makani gono genha gago, yiwanojeye kufwa. Hamba nhavivyo, si vyono wakwituma makani gago weneco du, ninga wakwendezwa kanyhi sunga na wono wetumaga imakani gago.
45002001	Holeka go munhu, wusina cikojelo, mono wukuwaling'aniza iwayago, hamba wuwe vyono winha. Hambi hono wukuwaling'aniza i wanji, nha wukwilijita go mweneco, ku soko vyono na gwegwe go mweneco, nha wukwituma zizo zono wukuwaling'aniza iwayago.
45002002	Nase cimanyile vyono, i ning'aniza yo Mulungu yo ye mbeka mbeka kuli wono wakwituma makani ge nhavivyo.
45002003	Holeka agwe go muyangu mono wukuwalin'aniza wono wakwituma imakani gaga, akuno kanyhi na gwegwe go mweneco go wukwituma, wukwihwesa lu kolokwilega ku ning'aniza yo Mulungu?
45002004	Hamba lunji wukuwubedegala u wuswanu wakwe, ne ngola yakwe, no wukangalile wakwe, hamba si wukumanya vyono u wuswanu wuwo wo Mulungu, wukukutonga ho wusume kunena?
45002005	Ninga so wukamu ne cibede ca mu nhumbula yako, wukwiwicila go mweneco ilikuwo, kwi'zuwa alilya lyono ilikuwo lyo Mulungu lyono lina i ning'aniza ye ling'ani lyologubulwa.
45002006	Mwi'zuwa lilyo, u Mulungu, kolomulipa munhu wo wose nha vyono genha imetumo gakwe.
45002007	Awalya wono wakulondola u lukumyo ne lilumbo vyo Mulungu no wusangalale, no kuwulondola uwumi, wawo wotuga u wumi we cibitilila.
45002008	Ninga awalya wanji wono wakulema izinghani ze mbeka, langa wakutyatya izimbi, u Mulungu kolowamwajila ilikuwo no wukali wakwe.
45002009	U munhu wo wose mono yakwituma izimbi, kotuga magazo no wusungu. Lulongozi gowatuga Wayahudi, hanyuma sunga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi nhavivilya.
45002010	Ninga u Mulungu kowapela u lukumyo ne lilumbo no mulamu, awalya wono wakwituma iziswanu, lulongozi Wayahudi, hanyuma sunga ne wanhu wono wi Wayahudi nhavivilya.
45002011	Hambi u Mulungu nha yasina wusiwanule kuli munhu wo wose.
45002012	Hambi wose wono wakwituma wubi akuno si wawumanyile u Wulajilize wa Musa, nha wolokwajilila du, hamba wawe si wawumanyile u Wulajilize. Nawo wono wakwituma wubi kuno ho wawumanyile no Wulajilize, nawo wololing'anizwa mu Wulajilize.
45002013	U munhu, si kosuma kuvumilwa hali Mulungu, so kuwuhulika bwete du Wulajilize, langa mono yakuwituma Wulajilize.
45002014	Nha cinji, iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, wasina u Wulajilize wa Musa, ninga lono wakwituma zono zili mu Wulajilize, nha vyono wakutongwa ne viselinji vyawo, ale weneco waweza cipimo co Wulajilize, hamba wawe si wawumanyile u Wulajilize.
45002015	Imijendele yawo weneco, yikulajila vyono u mulimo wo Wulajilize, wandicigwe mu zinhumbula zawo. Ne viselinji vyawo, vikuyihomelela inghani yiyi nhavivyo, vyono hanji imahweso gawo gakuwahosa, na hanji gakuwatetela.
45002016	Holeka nha vyono lwinha u Luganuzi lulu Luswanu lono nghumuganulilenyi, nhavivyo vyo lyolowa ilizuwa lyono u Mulungu koloziling'aniza zose ze cinyele ze wanhu, muli Yesu Kilisito.
45002017	Alu nagwe ma, Agwe go mweneco wukwiyitya wuli Muyahudi, kanyhi wuwitumbiye u Wulajilize, no kwiwona nha vyono agwe wuli wo Mulungu,
45002018	na mu Wulajilize mo wukumanyila u wuhile wo Mulungu, nagwe kosuma kuhagula iziswanu,
45002019	kanyhi wukwiwona nha wuli mutonji we wabofu, no wuzelu kuli wono wali mu citi,
45002020	wukwiwona nha wuli mulanjilizi we walele, na mwijizi wa walya wono wakali si nakangala. Na mu Wulajilize, wina wumanye wose we mejizo ne mbeka.
45002021	Alu agwe wukuwejiza wanji, nha wule alu si wukwiyijiza nagwe go mweneco? Wukuwaganulila wanji walece kuhiza, ninga kumbe gwegwe go mweneco wukuhiza.
45002022	Wukulonga wukutya, “Mulece kusenyha.” Na akuno gwegwe go mweneco wukusenyha, si wuvyendile vihwani vye milungu, ninga go mweneco wukwiwikaniza kuhiza mu zinyumba ze milungu.
45002023	Akuno wukwiyitya ati wina u Wulajilize wo Mulungu. Alu si wukuwona vyono, so wubena lilajilizo, wukumubedegala u Mulungu?
45002024	Nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga, “I wanhu wono si Wayahudi wakulitovula ilitagwa lyo Mulungu ku soko yenyu nyenye mo Wayahudi!”
45002025	Ninga u walame wako wowa wina cambuzi, hono uwitume u Wulajilize. Ninga hono wukuwubena u Wulajilize, yali yiwe yili ciba, hono wali wikale si walame.
45002026	Hono munhu mono si Muyahudi mono si yalame, hono yetume u wuhile wo Wulajilize, imbeka kowa nha mono yalame.
45002027	Iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, wokuling'aniza agwe go Muyahudi kotya nha wuli mubena Wulajilize, hamba wuwe wina imandiko go Wulajize, na kanyhi walame, na kumbe wene ho wakwituma zo Wulajilize, hamba wawe si walame yaye.
45002028	Nha cinji wo wutya, si vyono Muyahudi wo wose, yaweza Muyahudi wa mbeka, hambi munhu nha si kawezaga Muyahudi wa mbeka, ati ku soko vyono yalame mu muwili.
45002029	U Muyahudi wa mbeka, yo yulya u Muyahudi wa mugati, yuyulya mono yalame mu nhumbula. Ne nghani yiyi, yo nghani ya Muhe, hamba si nghani ya mandiko go Wulajilize. No munhu we liwala lilyo, yakutuga lilumbo, si muli wanhu, langa muli Mulungu.
45003001	Hambi Muyahudi yawacizize cici iwanhu wanji wono si Wayahudi? Hamba kwalama kwina cambuzici?
45003002	Heya, kocili cambuzi mbavu zose, inongozi, u Mulungu yawakoza i Wayahudi inghani yakwe.
45003003	Ninga ho yowa wule hono wanji wayawo si wali wehuwilwa? Hambi inghani yiyo yowuwusa u wihuwilwa wo Mulungu?
45003004	Aa, ng'o! Hambi u Mulungu nha kekalaga mwihuwilwa cibitilila, hamba yiwe iwanhu wose walambi. Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Gwe go Mulungu, ho hose hono wukulonga, Zinghani zako zo ze ling'ani, Na mu ning'aniza, agwe wukuwa kusuma.”
45003005	Ninga hono u wubi wetu wuwe wukuhomelela, vyono u Mulungu ketumaga kwe ling'ani, alu colonga cici kanyhi? Hambi cosuma kutya yasina ling'ani lono yakucifunda? (Aha nghulonga cimunhu-munhu.)
45003006	Hamba hadodo! Yali yiwe yili nhavivyo, u Mulungu yali yasume nhawule kuyiling'aniza yinze?
45003007	Na lunji kotya, “Hono u wula wihuwilwa ku lubavu lwangu, wo wukumulajila u Mulungu vyono yo mwihuwilwa muno, no kumupela lukumyo, holeka si nali nojeye ning'anizwe nha nili muhodanji.”
45003008	Yili sawa na vyono watezaga, “Citume vibi ho cituje i ziswanu!” Nhavivyo vyo wanji wakucivila, no kucisonjeza, wakutya ati vyo cikwijiza. Ninga walekaje! Woling'anizwa vyono yiwanojeye!
45003009	Alu colonga cici kanyhi? Hambi ase co Wayahudi cili waswanu si nha wono si Wayahudi? Hamba hadodo! Hambi nha nakondya kulonga ku wulawa ha mwamulizo vyono, i Wayahudi ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wose wali mu wubi.
45003010	Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “Hasina we ling'ani hamba monga.
45003011	Hasina munhu mono yakwizuka, hamba mono yakumulondola u Mulungu.
45003012	Wose wapatuka, wose wena vilema, hasina mono yakwituma ziswanu, hasina hamba monga.
45003013	Imimelo yawo yinha icitenjelo cono cili mwazi, ne zinimi zawo zimemile wukonji, na mu milomo yawo, mukulawa zinghani zono zina sumu kotya ya nzoka.
45003014	Mu milomo yawo mumemile malijito makali.
45003015	Imigulu yawo yili mu lumangho kuwita sakami,
45003016	na ho hose hono wobita, waletaga wuhodanji no wugaye.
45003017	Ne nzila yo mulamu, si wayimanyile,
45003018	hamba ne nghani yo kumogopa u Mulungu, yili musina muli wene.”
45003019	Cimanyile vyono, u Wulajilize wuli baho ku soko ya wono wali hasi yo Wulajilize wuwo, ho walece kuwa na cikojelo co cose. Ne yinze yose yili hasi yo wuling'anizwe wo Mulungu.
45003020	Hambi nha hasina munhu wo wose, mono kosuma kuvumilwa hali Mulungu so wibato 'lajilize, ku soko u mulimo wo Wulajilize, wene wukuwa kumulajila du munhu vyono yetumile wubi.
45003021	Ninga alu, inzila yo Mulungu yo kuwanoza iwanhu ho wavumilwe hali mwene, yakondya kwanzalikwa calinze, yo nzila yono si yikwitumbila u Wulajilize. Uwulajilize ne wawizi, vyose vikuyihomelela inghani yiyi.
45003022	U Mulungu yakuwanoza iwanhu, ho wavumilwe hali mwene mu nzila yo wihuwilo wawo, muli Yesu Kilisito: Nayo u Mulungu, ketumaga nhavivyo kuli wose wono wakwihuwila, hamba hasina wusiwanule wo wose.
45003023	Iwanhu wose wetumile wubi no kucepucilwa no lukumyo lo Mulungu.
45003024	Ninga so lihewa lyo Mulungu du, iwanhu wose wakunozwa wali ling'ani, no kuvumilwa hali mwene mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito mono yawakomboza.
45003025	U Mulungu yamulavya mwene, ku so sakami yakwe, yawe nzila yo kuwawusiza iwanhu u wubi wawo, so wihuwilo wawo wa kuli mwene. Yanoza nhavivyo, ho yelajile vyono u Mwene yo we ling'ani. Baho ikatali u Mulungu yakangalilaga hamba si yehwesaga zo wubi we wanhu,
45003026	ninga alu, mwidaha lili yakwihoma no wubi we wanhu, ho yasume kulajila ze ling'ani yakwe. Na ku soko yiyo u Mulungu mweneco yakuwa kulajila vyono u mwene yo we ling'ani, na vyono yakumunoza munhu wo wose mono yamwihuwiye Yesu, ho yasume kuvumilwa nayo.
45003027	Hambi cosuma kwilumbila ya hayi? Hasina! Ku soko ya hayi? Hamba vyono cikuwufisiliza u wulajilize? Aa, ng'o, langa ku soko vyono cihuwiye.
45003028	Hambi u munhu nha kanozwaga yavumilwe hali Mulungu so wihuwilo, du, hamba si so kufisiliza u wuhile wo wulajilize.
45003029	Alu ma, u Mulungu yo Mulungu we Wayahudi du, hamba wa wanhu wose, sunga na wono si Wayahudi nhavivyo? Na katuti yo we wanhu wose, sunga na wono si Wayahudi nhavivyo.
45003030	Mulungu yo yumonga, nayo kowanoza i Wayahudi wavumilwe hali mwene so wihuwilo wawo, ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo, so wihuwilo wawo.
45003031	Alu cikuwitumamila u Wihuwilo ho ciwuwembule u Wulajilize? Aa, ng'o, langa cikuwukamya u Wulajilize.
45004001	Alu colonga cici kuli za Abulahamu u sogo yetu?
45004002	Hono yiwe Abulahamu yanozwa ling'ani so metumo gakwe, yena zo kwilumbila. Ninga si kosuma kwilumba kuli Mulungu.
45004003	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya wule? “Abulahamu yamwihuwila Mulungu, Nayo Mulungu yakamuvumila kuwa we ling'ani.”
45004004	Mono yakwituma, kalipwaga musahala, no musahala wuwo si cipegwa, langa yo ling'ani yakwe.
45004005	Ninga kuli munhu mono si yakwitumbila imetumo gakwe mweneco, langa yamwihuwiye u Mulungu mono kawanenelaga iwabi, u Mulungu nayo kawulumbilizaga u wihuwilo wo munhu yuyo, no kumunoza yavumilwe hali mwene.
45004006	Na kuli ze nyemo yo munhu yuyo, mono u Mulungu yakumunoza ho yavumilwe nayo, hamba kulanga ze metumo gakwe, Dawudi yakutya,
45004007	“Wamoti wono waneneywe masutya gawo no wubi wawo wufunicizwe.
45004008	Yo mumoti munhu mono u Muwaha si yakuwukumbucila u wubi wakwe.”
45004009	Alu wumoti wuwu wuli muli wono walame du, hamba sunga na muli wono si walame? Ninga wuli sunga na kuli wono si walame nhavivilya. Hambi nha cikutya, “Abulahamu yehuwila, nayo u Mulungu yakamuvumila no kumutya yali ling'ani.”
45004010	Alu Abulahamu yavumilwa lono yali yakali si nalama, hamba lono yali yakondya kwalama? Yavumilwa lono yali yakali si nalama, hamba si lono yali yakondya kwalama ng'o.
45004011	Abulahamu yalama hanyuma yayo, na mu walame wuwo, cali citanjilo cono cakangazaga vyono, u Mulungu yali yamuvumila vyono yali ling'ani, ku soko yo wihuwilo wakwe wono yali yena nawo, sunga na lono yali yakali si nalama. Holeka Abulahamu yaweza sogo wa wose wono, hamba wawe si walame, ninga wamwihuwiye u Mulungu no kunozwa ling'ani.
45004012	Nhavivyo kanyhi u mwene, yo sogo wa wose wono walame, ninga si vyono walame du, langa vyono wakuyityatya inzila yiyilya yo wihuwilo, yono no Sogo yetu Abulahamu yayityatya lono yali yakali si nalama.
45004013	U Mulungu yamwihuwiza Abulahamu ne zindelo zakwe, vyono yo kolowa muhala yinze. No wihuwizo wuwo, si wanozwa vyono Abulahamu yawitumaga u Wulajilize, ng'o, langa vyono yehuwila, yakavumilwa kuwa ling'ani.
45004014	Hambi hono yiwe wono wopegwa u wihuwizo wo Mulungu wo wawo du wono wakuwituma u Wulajilize, alu haco u wihuwilo waweza wusina cambuzi co cose, hamba no wihuwizo wo Mulungu, waweza si cinji kanyhi.
45004015	Hambi u Wulajilize nha wukozaga yikuwo, ninga hono hawe hasina u Wulajilize, hasina kanyhi hamba wusutye.
45004016	Ku soko yiyo holeka, inghani yiyi yili mu wihuwilo, na holeka no wihuwizo wuwo wuli so wanhu wose, si kuli walya du wono wakuwituma Wulajilize, langa wuli na kuli walya wono wakuwumipa so wihuwilo nha vyono Abulahamu. U mwene yo sogo yetu sese wose.
45004017	Nha vyono Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga, “Nghuwika ho wuwe sogwe we zinghungugo nyinji.” No wihuwizo wuwo wo we mbeka hali Mulungu mono Abulahamu yamwihuwila. U Mulungu mono yakuwawumifya i wafu, na kanyhi kavitambulaga i vinhu vyono vili hasina, navyo vikuwa.
45004018	Ninga Abulahamu yehuwila kanyhi yaketumbila, kuli zono zali nghamu ku witumbile, nayo holeka yakawa sogwe we makungugo menji, nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “U lulelo lwako, wowa wenji kotya zinyelezi.”
45004019	Yali mukombi mono yali yaficile kotya nha myaka yigana limonga, ninga u wihuwilo wakwe hamba si wacepuka, hamba yawe yali yamanyile vyono, u muwili wakwe wali kotya nha wufwiye, no mugolece wakwe Sala nayo yali mugumba.
45004020	Ninga Abulahamu yali yasina wukangamyanje ku so wihuwizo wo Mulungu, yakatuga vilungo ku soko yo wihuwilo, nayo yakamukumya u Mulungu.
45004021	Yali yamanyiye lukulu vyono, u Mulungu kosuma kuzifisiliza zono yehuwiza.
45004022	Holeka nayo Mulungu yakamuvumila vyono yali ling'ani.
45004023	Na lono yikulongwa vyono “Yamuvumila,” si yikulongwa kuli mweneco du.
45004024	Ne nghani yiyi yili na kuli sese nhavivyo mono camwihuwila u Mulungu mono yamuzukula Yesu, u Mutwa wetu, muli wafu.
45004025	U mwene yalavywa ho yawulagwe ku soko yo wubi wetu, kanyhi yakazukulwa, ase ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu.
45005001	Ale, vyono cakondya kunozwa, ho civumilwe hali Mulungu ko wihuwilo, holeka cilamuye nayo mu nzila yo mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
45005002	So wihuwilo wetu, mwene yakacileta no kucinjiza mwi'hewa lyo Mulungu, mono alu mo cikuwumipila. Holeka cikwilumbila u witumbilo wono cina nawo, wo kuhanga mu lukumyo lo Mulungu.
45005003	Kanyhi si nhavivyo du, ninga cikusangalala nhavivyo sunga na mu magayo, akuno cimanyile vyono imagayo galetaga wukangalile,
45005004	u wukangalile nawo wuletaga wusikamywe, na wuwo nawo wuletaga witumbilo.
45005005	U witumbilo wuwo nawo si wosuma kucikoza cevu, hambi u Mulungu, nha yakondya kucijidila u wendo wakwe mu zinhumbula zetu, mu nzila yo Muhe Mono Yelile mono capegwa.
45005006	Hambi ase lono cali cikali cisoceye, ivilo vyali kufika, Kilisito yakacifwila ase co wabi.
45005007	Hambi nha kukamu yunji yafwe so munhu we ling'ani, na lunji munhu kosuma kwijelela kufwa ku soko yo munhu muswanu.
45005008	Ninga u Mulungu yakangazize vyono mwene yacendile, hambi lono ase cali cikali wahodanji, Kilisito yakafwa ku soko yetu.
45005009	Alu vyono cakondya kunozwa, ho civumilwe hali Mulungu mu nzila ye sakami ya Kilisito, yili calinze, nha vyono kociponya mwi'kuwo lyo Mulungu.
45005010	Hambi ase lono cali cikali cili sili nayo, u Mulungu yakacilamulila mu wufwe wo mwanagwe. Naluno vyono cakondya kwilamula no mwene, yili calinze vyono coponywa so wumi wa Kilisito.
45005011	Kanyhi hamba si nhavivyo du, langa cikusangalalila muli Mulungu mu nzila yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito mono yacilamula no Mulungu.
45005012	Ale, vyono u wubi wenjilila kono'nze ko munhu yumonga, nawo wukaleta lifwa. Ne lifwa litandaye muli wanhu wose vyono wenha, hambi wose nha wetuma wubi.
45005013	Na lono u Wulajilize wali wukali si nawa, u wubi wali wuli mono'nze, ninga hamba nhavivyo, u wubi si wukumbucilwaga yaye lono hasina u Wulajilize.
45005014	Ninga ku wulawilila ha Adamu, sunga mwipango lya Musa, ilifwa lyali liwatemile, sunga na awalya wono si wetuma wubi nha vyono yetuma Adamu, u wubi wo kumubeza u Mulungu. Nayo Adamu, yali hwani ya ayulya mono kolokuza hanyuma.
45005015	Ninga ho wuli wisimajile; vyono i lihewa lyo Mulungu si linha u wubi wa Adamu. Ku soko hamba yiwe so wubi wa munhu yumonga wukaleta lifwa kuli wanhu wose, ninga so lihewa lya munhu yumonga yo Yesu Kilisito, u Mulungu yawenjifizya iwanhu wose ilihewa ne vipegwa vyakwe.
45005016	Ninga kowuli wisimajile mu cipegwa co Mulungu, no wubi wo munhu yuyulya yumonga. Hambi lono u munhu yumonga yali yakondya kusutya, u Mulungu yakalavya wuling'anizi, ninga so masutya ga wanhu wenji, u Mulungu yakawapela icipegwa cakwe co kuwanenela.
45005017	Na mbeka, ku soko yo wubi wa munhu yumonga, ilifwa likawa kutema, ku soko ya yuyo umunhu yumonga. Ninga yili calinze vyono yono yetuma yuyo munhu yumonga, Yesu Kilisito, co ciswanu cicizize. Na wose wono wakulibocela ilihewa lyo Mulungu ko winji, no kwilamula nayo, wolotema mu wumi mu nzila ya yuyo yumonga, Yesu Kilisito.
45005018	Ale, nha vyono lisutya lyo munhu monga lyaleta wuling'anizwe kuli wanhu wose, na nhavivyo, ilitumo limonga lye ling'ani, likuwapela wulelele no wumi.
45005019	Nha vyono iwanhu wenji waweza wanya wubi, ku soko yo wula cihuliko ca munhu monga, ale nhavivyo, ne wenji wonozwa wavumilwe hali Mulungu, ku soko ye cihuliko co munhu monga.
45005020	U Wulajilize waza, wusutye ho wucile, ninga u wubi waza konjezeka, ilihewa likonjezeka muno muno.
45005021	Nha vyono ivilungo vyo wubi, viletaga lifwa, navyo ivilungo vye lihewa viletaga wiling'ano, na kundumilizo, wumi we cibitilila mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito u Mutwa wetu.
45006001	Alu citye nhawule? Cijendelele ne mikalile yo wubi, ho lihewa lyo Mulungu lyonjezece?
45006002	Aa, ng'o! Ase cakondya kufwa kuli zo wubi, alu ho cojendelela kanyhi nhawule kwikala mu mikalile yo wubi?
45006003	Hambi nha mumanyile, vyono ase wose mono cabaputizwa, no kulunzwa na Kilisito Yesu, cabaputizwa no kwilunza ne lifwa lyakwe.
45006004	Holeka calunzwa ne lifwa lyakwe, lono cabaputizizwa, cikazikanwa nayo, nha vyono Kilisito yazukulwa muli wafu ko lukumyo lo Sogo yo munhu, ale nhavivyo nase, ceze kujendela mu mikalile mipya.
45006005	Hambi nase hono ciwe cilunzize nayo mwifwa nho mweneco, cokwilunza nayo nhavivyo mu wuzukulwe mu wafu nho mweneco.
45006006	Cimanyile vyono, u munhu wetu muhuma, vyatumbikanwa hamonga na Kilisito, u muwili wo wubi ho wuhodangwe, ho cilece kuwa kanyhi wawanda wo wubi.
45006007	Hambi u munhu mono yafwiye, nha yakondya kuwuswa mu vilungo vyo wubi.
45006008	Holeka hono ciwe cakondya kufwa hamonga na Kilisito, cihuwiye vyono cowumipana nayo kanyhi.
45006009	Hambi nha cimanyile vyono Kilisito yakondya kuzukulwa muli wafu, hamba si kolofwa kanyhi, ilifwa lisina vilungo kanyhi kuli mwene.
45006010	Hambi vyono yafwa, kamonga du, u wubi wusina vilungo kanyhi kuli mwene, nalu yakuwumipa hamonga no Mulungu.
45006011	Holeka nanye nhavivyo, mwiwonaje nha vyono mufwiye kuli zo wubi, langa nha wono mukuwumipa hamonga no Mulungu, muli Yesu Kilisito.
45006012	Ale u wubi wulece kutema kanyhi mu miwili yenyu yono yifwizaga, muwe kuhulika imasulumizi gayo kanyhi.
45006013	Hamba mulece kuvilavya ivilunzwa vyenyu hamba cimonga, ho ciwe ciya co kwitumamilwa no wubi. Langa nyenye weneco mwiyilavyaje kuli Mulungu, muwe nha wanhu wono muzukuywe mu wafu, mumulavizyaje u Mulungu imitima yenyu yose, ku so wiling'ano.
45006014	Hambi uwubi nha si womutemenyi kanyhi, ku soko vyono si muli mu Wulajilize, langa muli mwi'hewa.
45006015	Alu cilonje citye wule? Citumaje wubi hongo, vyono si cili mu Wulajilize, langa mwi'hewa? Aa, ng'o.
45006016	Mumanyile vyono, hono mwiyilavye nyo weneco kuli yunji, no kuwa wawanda wakwe, na mbeka mukuwa wawanda wa yuyo, hono muwe wawanda wo wubi, ndumilizo yayo wufwe, na hono wuwe wawanda we cihuliko, ndumilizo yayo, mukunozwa ho muvumilwe hali Mulungu.
45006017	Ninga, hamba yiwe mwali muli wawanda wo wubi baho katali, ninga alu, nghumulumba u Mulungu vyono, mwahulika no kwibata zose zono mwejizwa no kuzibocela.
45006018	Mwawopolelwa kulawa mu vilungo vyo wubi, mukawa wawanda wo wiling'ano.
45006019	Ahano nghulonga imilonjele ye wanhu, so wusocele wenyu nyenye weneco. Ninga nha vyono lululya, mweyilavya nyenye weneco ho muwitumamile wavu no wuhodanji wo wavu, ale, alu kanyhi vyo mwiyilavyaje nhavivyo nyo weneco, muwitumamile uwiling'ano, ku so wele.
45006020	Hambi lono mwali mukali muli wawanda wo wubi, mwewonaga nha vyono si munojeye kuwa muli we ling'ani.
45006021	Alu mwatuga cambuzi mu cici, kuli zizo zono mukuziwonela cevu alu? Ku soko mudumilizo wa zizo, nha yifwa.
45006022	Ninga alu mwakondya kuwopolelwa ku wulawa mu vilungo vyo wubi, alu mwaweza wetumami wo Mulungu, ne cambuzi cono mwina naco alu, wo wele, no mudumo wayo, wo wumi we cibitilila.
45006023	Hambi u musahala wo wubi nha yifwa, langa icipegwa cono yakulavyo Mulungu, wo wumi we cibitilila mu wilunza na Yesu Kilisito u Mutwa wetu.
45007001	Wandugu zangu, nitumbiye vyono muzimanyile zizi, hambi nha nghulonga na wanhu wono wawumanyile wulajilize. Vyono u Wulajilize, wumutemile u munhu, mu vilo vyakwe vyose vyono yakali mumi.
45007002	Nha cinji, u mucekulu mutolwa, nha yawopigwe mu wulajilize no mulume wakwe, mu vilo vyose vyono u mulume wakwe yakali mumi, ninga u mulume wakwe hono yafwe, hodu u wulajilize wa kuli mulume wakwe si womutema kanyhi u mucekulu yuyo.
45007003	Langa umucekulu yuyo hono wekalane no mulume yunji lono umulume wakwe yakali mumi, kocemwa musenyha, ninga hono umulume wakwe yawe yakondya kufwa, umucekulu yuyo si kowa yatemigwe kanyhi no wulajilize, na hono yatolwe no mulume yunji, hamba si kocemwa musenyha yaye.
45007004	Ale nanye wandugu zangu, ku lubavu lo Wulajilize, nanye nhavivyo mwakondya kufwa, vyono anye muli vilunzwa vyo muwili wa Kilisito, alu mwaweza muli wakwe, u mwene mono yazukulwa muli wafu, ho cisume kwikala imikalile yono yina cambuzi mu wu mwitumamila u Mulungu.
45007005	Hambi lono cekalaga mu mikalile ye cimunhu-munhu, uwusulumizi wubi wono wazizaga mu Wulajilize, nha wetuma mulimo mu miwili yetu sunga ko ku wulelela lifwa mikalo.
45007006	Ninga aluno cili welecele, si ciwopigwe kanyhi no Wulajilize, vyono cakondya kufwa kuli lubavu lwe nghani yiyilya yono yikacinoza ase ho ciwe wawanda. Alu cikwitumila imikalile mipya yo Muhe, hamba si mu wuhuma wo Wulajilize wono wali wandicigwe.
45007007	Wulenyi, cosuma kutya Wulajilize, wubi? Ng'o si wubi yaye! Ninga hali hawe hasina Wulajilize, ane si nali niwumanye wubi vyono co cici. Hamba si nali manye u wusulumizi wubi co cici, hono Wulajilize wali wuwe si wuteye, “Wulece kusulumila.”
45007008	Ninga naza kulihulika ililajilizo lilyo, baho uwubi ho wukatujila icilejeho co kwitumila imawala gose go wusulumizi muli'ne. Hambi hono hasina Wulajilize, u wubi wukuwa co cinhu cono cifwiye,
45007009	nane ha mwamulizo, nekalaga mumi hono hasina Wulajilize, ninga ililajilizo lyali lyeza kuza, uwubi wukawumipa,
45007010	ane no mweneco nghafwa. U mulimo we lilajilizo wali kuleta wumi, ninga kuli ane likaleta wufwe.
45007011	Hambi wubi nha wukacituga icilejeho cono caziza mwilajilizo lilyo, wukanghonga no kumbulaga.
45007012	Holeka Wulajilize weneco welile, sunga ne lilajilizo lyeneco nalyo lyelile, kanyhi lili ling'ani, kanyhi, yiswanu.
45007013	Alu wo wutya, cico iciswanu, hongo lyawa yifwa kuli'ne? Aa, ng'o, langa yili nhavi, uwubi ho wijele calinze vyono wubi, wuketumamila acilya iciswanu ho liwe lyo yifwa lyangu. Ninga uwubi wukelajila vyono wubi muno, mu nzila ya lilyo ililajilizo.
45007014	Cimanyile vyono, Wulajilize wo we cinya muhe, ninga ane nili wa mu muwili, muguzwa mu wuwanda wo wubi.
45007015	Hamba si niyimanyaga yono nghwituma, ku soko yono nghuyisaka niyitume, yo si nghwituma, langa cicilya cono nicisulile, co nitumaga.
45007016	Alu, hono niwe nghwituma zono si nghuzisaka, wo wutya, nghulumba vyono u Wulajilize kumbe wuswanu.
45007017	Alu kumbe si nene mono nghwituma nhavivyo, langa wo wubi wono wikalaga muli nene.
45007018	Manyile vyono mugati yangu, musina yinji yo yose swanu, hambi ane nha nili munhu du. Ku soko vyono, hamba niwe nghusaka kunoza nghani swanu, si nosuma kwituma.
45007019	Ku soko vyono hono, nghusaka kwituma yiswanu yono nghuyisaka, hobaho nghuyituma yimbi yono si nghuyisaka.
45007020	Holeka kumbe vyono nghwituma zono zisimajiye na vyono nghusaka, wo wutya yo si nene mono nghwituma zizo, langa wo wuwo wubi wono wuli muli nene.
45007021	Holeka nakondya kumanya vyono zinha, vyono ane nghusaka kwituma swanu, ninga kumbe yiyilya yimbi yono si nghuyisaka, yo nghwituma.
45007022	Holeka ane mu nhumbula yangu, nghulisangalila ililajilizo lyo Mulungu.
45007023	Ninga nghuwona, vyono ko wuli wulajilize wunji mu vilunzwa vyangu, wono vikulewana no wulajilize wa mu mahala gangu, wuwo wukunoza niwe muwanda wo wulajilize wo wubi, wono wukwituma mulimo mu vilunzwa vyangu.
45007024	Waco no muciwa nene! Alu mono komhonya mu muwili wuwu wono wukunhegula kwifwa, nani mbi?
45007025	Ninga, u Mulungu yalumbwe, mono yakusumila, muli Yesu Kilisito Mutwa wetu. Ale nhavivyo vyo ninha, vyono nene no mweneco mu mahala gangu, nghuwitumamila u Wulajilize wo Mulungu, ninga mu muwili, nghuwitumamila u wulajilize wo wubi.
45008001	Alu nhondo hasina wuhoswe kuli walya wono mu mikalile yawo, wakondya kwilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
45008002	Hambi uwulajilize wo Muhe, wono wuletaga wumi so wilunza na Kilisito Yesu, nha wanghomboza ku wulawa mu wulajilize wo wubi na we lifwa.
45008003	U Mulungu yaketuma, yono u Wulajilize si wasuma kwituma so wusocele wo munhu. U Mulungu yakamutuma u mwanagwe, mu hwani yono yiling'aniye no muwili wetu ase co wanyo wubi, ho vidome no wubi, na so muwili wuwo, yakawusuma u wubi.
45008004	Nayo Mulungu yakanoza nhavivyo, wiling'ano wo Wulajilize, wufisilizizwe lukulu muli sese mono cili womi, si mu vilungo vye cimunhu-munhu, langa mu vilungo vyo Muhe.
45008005	Hambi wono wekalaga imikalile ye cimunhu-munhu nha watemigwe ne mahweso ge cimunhu-munhu. Ninga wono wekalaga mu mikalile yo kutongwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, watemigwe ne mahweso go Muhe.
45008006	Imahweso ge cimunhu-munhu, galetaga wufwe, langa imahweso go Muhe, galetaga wumi no mulamu.
45008007	Hambi mono yatemigwe ne mahweso ge cimunhu-munhu, nha vili sili no Mulungu, si kawuhulikaga u wulajilize wo Mulungu, hamba si kosuma kuwuhulika yaye.
45008008	Ne wanhu wono wakutyatya i mikalile ye cimunhu-munhu, si wosuma kumwendeza u Mulungu.
45008009	Ninga anye, si muli mu mikalile ye cimunhu-munhu, langa mu mikalile yo Muhe, hono u Muhe wo Mulungu yakwikala muli nyenye. Ninga yunji wo wose mono yasina Muhe wa Kilisito, yuyo si wakwe Kilisito.
45008010	Ninga hono Kilisito yawe yali muli nyenye, hamba miwili yenyu yifwe ku soko yo wubi, ninga kuli 'nye u Muhe, wo wumi, vyono mwanozwa muwe muvumiywe hali Mulungu.
45008011	U Muhe wo Mulungu, mono yamuzukula Kilisito mu wafu, hono yekale muli nyenye, yuyo mono yamuzukula Kilisito mu wafu, koloyiwumifya miwili yenyu yono yifwizaga, so Muhe wakwe mono yekaye muli nyenye.
45008012	Ale wandugu zangu, cina mugawa, ninga si cikudaywa ho cikale mu mikalile yo wuwe wetu we cimunhu-munhu.
45008013	Hambi hono mwikalilaje zo muwili, mbeka mofwa. Ninga ku Muhe, hono muwulaje imetumo genyu imabi, ale mowumipa.
45008014	Hambi wose wono watongwaga no Muhe wo Mulungu, wawo nha wo wana wo Mulungu.
45008015	Hambi u Muhe mono mwamubocela, nha si Muhe mono komunozenyi muwe wawanda kanyhi, no kumuwicenyi mu woga, ninga mwamubocela u Muhe mono yakumunozenyi anye, ho muwe wana wo Mulungu, na mu vilungo vyo Muhe yuyo, nase cosuma kumucema u Mulungu, “Aba” wo wutya, “Baba.”
45008016	U Muhe mweneco vikuhomelelana no muhe wetu, vyono ase cili wana wo Mulungu.
45008017	Holeka vyono ase cili wana wo Mulungu, cawubocela uwumoti wose wo Mulungu wono yawawiciye iwanhu wakwe, kanyhi cohanga uwuhazi wuwo hamonga na Kilisito, hambi hono cihanje uwugaye wakwe Kilisito, cohanga kanyhi no lukumyo lwakwe.
45008018	Hambi nha nghuwona vyono magayo ga lulu si nghani yaye, hono cigaling'anize no lukumyo lono lologubulilwa kuli'se.
45008019	Hambi iviwumbwa vyose, nha vikulanjilila muno, u Mulungu yawalajile calinze iwanagwe.
45008020	Hambi iviwumbwa nha vyawikwa mu wuwe wo wula vilungo, si vyono vyendile vyeneco, ninga vikawa nhavivyo, ku so wuhile wo Mulungu. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ho wuli witumbilo.
45008021	Hambi iviwumbwa vivyo navyo, nha vyoloponywa mu wuwanda wo wuhodanjice, vikuhanga u welecele wo lukumyo, lwe wana wo Mulungu.
45008022	Hambi nha cimanyile vyono, sunga lulu iviwumbwa vyose vikulila mu wusungu, kotya wo kulela mwana.
45008023	Hamba si viwumbwa vivyo vili wene du, langa sunga na sese mono cina u Muhe, mono yo cipegwa cilongozi muli vipegwa vyo Mulungu, sunga na sese co weneco cikulilanzika mu zinhumbula zetu, akuno cikulanjilila kunozwa wana wo Mulungu, no wukombozwe wo muwili wetu.
45008024	Hambi nha caponyezwa witumbilo, ninga uwitumbilo wono wuwonaga, si witumbilo. Hambi wa hayi mono ketumbilaga icinhu cono yawene?
45008025	Ninga hono cikucitumbila i cinhu cono cikali si naciwona, baho cikucilindila wukangalile.
45008026	Nhavivyo no Muhe nayo yakucitaza mu wusocele wetu. Hambi nha si cimanyile vyono yicinojeye kulomba, ninga u Muhe mweneco, yakuwa kucilombela kuli Mulungu, ko wulilanzice no wukalale si wakulonga.
45008027	Nayo u Mulungu mono kawonaga sunga mo mugati mu zinhumbula ze wanhu, yalimanyile ilihweso lyo Muhe yuyo, hambi u Muhe yuyo, nha kawalombelaga iwanhu wo Mulungu mu wuhile wo Mulungu.
45008028	Kanyhi cimanyile vyono, muli zose, u Mulungu ketumanaga no kumalila hamonga na wose wono wamwendile, nha cinji, wawalya wono yawacema nha vyono yali yehwesize.
45008029	Hambi wawo wono yawahagula ku wulawa mwamulizo, wawa kanyhi yawasiwanula, ho wehwane no Mwanagwe, u mwana nayo, ho yawe mulongozi muli wanduguze wenji.
45008030	Holeka u Mulungu yakawacema wawalya wono yali yawasiwanula, na wawo wono yawacema, yakawanoza wavumilwe hali mwene, na wawo wono yawanoza ho wavumilwe hali mwene, kanyhi yakawakumya.
45008031	Hambi lu muli zizi, ho colonga citye wule kanyhi? Hono u Mulungu yali ku lubavu lwetu, alu nani kanyhi mono kocipingapinga?
45008032	U Mulungu mono si yamutetela u Mwanagwe we ciwene, langa yakamulavya ku so sese wose. Alu hono yetuma nhavivyo, wule, si kocipela ne ziswanu zose?
45008033	Alo nani mono komusonjezenyi mo wahagulwa wo Mulungu? U Mulungu mweneco yo yakuwa kumuwusizenyi masutya!
45008034	Alo nani mono komuhosenyi? Hasina! Hambi Kilisito nha yo yafwa, kanyhi yakazuka muli wafu, na kanyhi yekaye ku muwoko wo kulume wo Mulungu. Nayo yakucilombela.
45008035	Hambi nani lo, mono kosuma kucitemanula no wendo wa Kilisito? Alo wugazice, hamba wugaye, hamba wugazwe, hamba nzala, hamba wusawuce, hamba zimbali, hamba wuwulagwe?
45008036	Nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga gakutya, “Ku soko yako, cidomile ne lifwa cilo ne misi. Cikutendelwa nhe zingholo zo kuwulagwa.”
45008037	Ninga muli zizi zose, cikutuga wusume wuwaha muno, ko wutazi wakwe mwene mono yacenda.
45008038	Hambi nha manyiye lukulu vyono, hasina cinhu cono cosuma kucitemanula mu wendo wakwe, hamba lifwa, hamba wumi, hamba wamalayika, hamba wawaha, hamba vilungo vinji vya ku wulanga, hamba zono zikwijela lulu, hamba zono zolowa hanyuma,
45008039	hamba iyinze ya kucanyha, hamba ya hasi muno. Hasina ciwumbwa cinji cose, cono cosuma kucitemanula mu wendo wo Mulungu, wono wuli muli Kilisito Yesu u Mutwa wetu.
45009001	Nghulonga mbeka, nakondya kwilunza na Kilisito, nane si nghulonga wulambi. Iciselinji lono cikutongwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, cikunghangaziza inghani yiyi nhavivyo.
45009002	Nghusaka kutya nhavi. Ninga wukalale wuwaha, no wusungu si wakulonga, mu nhumbula yangu, ku soko ye wanhu wangu, wono cili sakami monga na nene!
45009003	Hono yali yiwe so cambuzi cawo, nali nyende niwe mulijitwe, no kusiwanulwa na Kilisito.
45009004	Wawo wo wanhu wa Isilayeli, wono u Mulungu yawasiwanula wawe wanagwe, nayo yakawapela no lukumyo lwakwe, vikalagana nawo, yakawapela lilajilizo lyakwe, wihuwilo we mbeka no wihuwizo wakwe.
45009005	Wene wo wezukulu we wakoko, nayo Kilisito ku lubavu lo wunhu wakwe, yalawilila mu mbeyu yawo. U Mulungu mono yatemile muli vyose, yalumbwe cibitilila, Heya.
45009006	Ninga si vyono nghutya, uwihuwizo wo Mulungu wuwelile, hambi nha si wanhu wose wa mu Waisilayeli, wono wo wahagulwa wo Mulungu.
45009007	Hamba si wose we mbeyu ya Abulahamu, wanagwe we mbeka. Langa nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “Muli Isaka mo yolocemelwa imbeyu yako.”
45009008	Wo wutya, si wana wo muwili wo wana wo Mulungu aa, langa wawalya du, wono waleleywe mu cilagane co Mulungu, wo wocemwa wanagwe.
45009009	Hambi icilagane ceneco nha coci. “Nolokuziza kwinha nhavivi, nayo Sala kolosawa mwana wa cilume.”
45009010	Ninga si yiyo du, langa na Labeka nayo, yatuga wana we metundu kuli sogo yawo yumonga, yo Isaka u Sogo yetu.
45009011	Ninga ho Mulungu yejele vyono yena welecele wo kuhagula, na lono wawalya iwana we metundu wakali si nalelwa, na lono wakali si namanya kuhagula iziswanu ne zimbi.
45009012	Labeka yalonjelwa vyono, u mwana mulongozi komwitumamila ayulya mono kotyatya mu nyuma. Holeka u wuhaguzi wo Mulungu, wuwezaga nha vyono yakuhila mweneco, hamba si metumo ga munhu.
45009013	Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Namwenda Yakobo, ninga Esawu namusula.”
45009014	Hambi cilonje ya hayi? Alu u Mulungu yasina iling'ani? Aa ng'o!
45009015	Hambi nha yamulonjela Musa, “Nomuwonela lusungu munhu wo wose mono nghusaka kumuwonela lusungu, kanyhi nomunenela munhu wo wose mono nghusaka kumunenela.”
45009016	Holeka zose zili mu lusungu lo Mulungu du, hamba si zili mu wuhidimbale wo munhu, hamba si zili mu wuhile wo munhu.
45009017	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakulonga nhavi kuli Falawo, “Nakunoza wuwe mutemi, ho vilungo vyangu vimanyicile muli gwegwe, ne litagwa lyangu limanyice kononze kose.”
45009018	Holeka yili calinze, vyono u Mulungu kamuwonelaga lusungu munhu wo wose mono mweneco du yakusaka kumuwonela lusungu, na hono mweneco yasace kumunoza munhu yawe yali cibede, kanozaga nhavivyo.
45009019	Lunji kombuza wutye, “Alu hono zili nhavivyo, u Mulungu kosuma nhawule kumuhosa munhu? Alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kuwimila u wuhile wakwe?”
45009020	Alu agwe go munhu, wuli nani gwegwe ho wijelele kumupitula u Mulungu? Wule, nyungu nayo ma, yosuma kumuwuza cinji mono yayiwumba yikutya, “Nhawule wukamumba nhavivi?”
45009021	U muwumbi kalitumamilaga ililongo nha vyono yakusaka mweneco, yadahile kuwumba nyungu nyejete mwi'bilingwa limonga, yimonga so witumilwe we lilumbo, ne nyagwe nayo so witumilwe wono si we lilumbo.
45009022	Nhavivyo vyo yinha kuli Mulungu. Yakasaka yalilajile ilikuwo lyakwe, no kuvimanyiza ivilungo vyakwe. Ninga yakawa mukangalizi muno, yakuwakangalila walya wono wali yo soko ye likuwo lyakwe, wono wali wanojeye wongomezwe.
45009023	Yakasaka kanyhi kuwulajila u winji wo lukumyo lwakwe, lono yacijidila ase mono cali yo soko yo lusungu lwakwe, ase mono yali yakondya kuciwikaniza ho cilubocele u lukumyo lwakwe.
45009024	Vyono ase yo sese mono cacemwa nayo, si vyono kulawa muli Wayahudi du, langa sunga ku wulawa mu wono si Wayahudi yaye.
45009025	Hambi nha vyo yakulonga mu citabu ca Hoseya: “Nolowacema, ‘wanhu wangu,’ Wono si wali wanhu wangu. Nayo ‘Mwendece,’ mono si yali mwendece!
45009026	Na hono hatezagwa ‘Si muli wanhu wangu!’ Baho wocemwa I Wana wo Mulungu mumi!”
45009027	Nayo u muwizi Isaya, yakumulonjela Isilayeli yazozize, yakutya, “Iliwalo lye wanhu wa Isilayeli, hamba liwe kotya musawawa wa mwi'lenga, ninga wacefu du wono woloponywa,
45009028	hambi u Muwaha nha si koleka kuyileta mbela i ning'aniza yakwe yono yikwilaniciye kuli yinze yose.”
45009029	Nha vyono Isaya yalonga ha mwamulizo, “Hono u Muwaha mono yali vilungo, yali yalece kucisigaziza wanji wa muli wanhu wa Isilayeli, mhali cakondya kuwa nha Sodoma, mhali cawa kotya Gomola.”
45009030	Hambi colongaci kanyhi? Yili nhavi: iwanhu wono si Wayahudi wono si wepiganza kuwulondola u wuvumilwe hali Mulungu, wanozwa wavumilwe hali Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
45009031	Ninga i wanhu wa Isilayeli wono walondolaga u wulajilize, wono wuletaga u wuvumilwe hali Mulungu, si wawutuga.
45009032	Ku soko ya hayi? Ku soko i wene wali wetumbiye metumo gawo, siwetumbila u wihuwilo. Wakekobala mu libwe lyo wikobale,
45009033	nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile: “Langa ta, nghuwika mu Sayuni, libwe lyo wikobale, Ne litalawe lyono lyowagwisa! No munhu mono komwihuwila yuyo mono lyo libwe lilyo, yuyo si kolokozwa soni.”
45010001	Nye wandugu zangu, nghulanjilila kanyhi nghuhila mu nhumbula yangu, wawo wanyawusi wayangu waponywe. Kanyhi si nghudila kuwalombela kuli Mulungu.
45010002	Hambi nha nghuwahomelela vyono, wena uwuhidimbazi wo kumulondola u Mulungu, ninga uwuhidimbazi wawo, si wuli mu wumanye we mbeka.
45010003	Hambi nha si wamanya vyono u Mulungu kawanozaga wanhu, ho wavumilwe hali mwene, wene wakajela kwinozeza nzila yawo weneco, holeka si wasuma kuyivumila inzila yiyo yo Mulungu, yono yowanoza ho wavumilwe hali mwene.
45010004	Hambi u wuze wa Kilisito, nha wo mudumo wo Wulajilize, ho wose wono wehuwiye wavumilwe hali Mulungu.
45010005	Musa yandika zizi zo munhu mono kovumilwa hali Mulungu so kuwituma u Wulajilize, yakatya; “U munhu wo wose mono kokwituma nha vyono u Wulajilize wukutya, yuyo kowumipa.”
45010006	Ninga mu wuvumilwa hali Mulungu so wihuwilo, i Mandiko gakutya nhavi, “Wulece kutya mu nhumbula yako. Nani mono konanuka sunga ko ku wulanga?” (wo wutya, wukumutimya Kilisito hasi),
45010007	“Hamba wulece kutya, Nani mono kotima sunga ku ku wuninyina?” (wo wutya, wukumwinula Kilisito muli wafu.)
45010008	I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya nhavi: “Inghani yo Mulungu yili behi nagwe, yili mu mulomo wako na mu nhumbula yako,” yo nghani yo wihuwilo yono ciganulaga.
45010009	Hono wuvumile ko mulomo wako, vyono Yesu yo Muwaha, na hono wihuwile mu nhumbula yako, vyono u Mulungu yamuzukula muli wafu, kupona.
45010010	Hambi nha cikwihuwila mu nhumbula, no kunozwa ling'ani no Mulungu, na kanyhi cikuvumila kwe milomo yetu no kuyituga mhonelo.
45010011	I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Muli wose mono kumwihuwila, si kolokozwa soni.”
45010012	Inghani yiyi yili so wose, na hasina wisime kuli Wayahudi na kuli wono si Wayahudi, hambi u Muwaha yuyo yumonga, nha yo Muwaha wa wose, nayo mucemezi muno kuli wose wono wakumulomba.
45010013	Hambi I Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “Muli wose mono kolicemeleza ilitagwa lyo Muwaha kopona.”
45010014	Hambi, ho womucemeleza nhawule mono wakali si namwihuwila? Kanyhi, ho womwihuwila nhawule mono wakali si namuhulika? Kanyhi, ho wozihulika nhawule izinghani zakwe hono hasina u muganuzi?
45010015	Kanyhi, iwanhu ho woganula nhawule hono walece kutumwa? Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Yo nghani yono yikwendeza muno, yo wuze wa wono wakuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu.”
45010016	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, si wose wono walubocela u Luganuzi lulo Luswanu.
45010017	Hambi na Isaya nha yalonga yakatya, “Go Muwaha, nani mono yehuwila izinghani zetu?” Hambi u wihuwilo nha wulawaga mu wuhulice we nghani, wuhulice we nghani nawo wulawaga mu nghani ya Kilisito.
45010018	Ninga nghutya, alo si wayihulika inghani yiyo? Mbeka wayihulika, nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “Ilizi lyawo lificile mono yinze yose, Ne zinghani zawo zificile sunga ko ku ndumo ye yinze.”
45010019	Kanyhi nghuwuza nghutya nhavi, Hongo yisumice iwanhu wa Isilayeli si wali wamanyile? Nayo Musa u mulongozi kupitula, yakutya nhavi, “Nomunozenyi muwawonele wivu iwanhu wono si nghungugo, Nomunozenyi muwawonele likuwo ilikungugo lye wanhu walele.”
45010020	Kanyhi Isaya yakulonga yasina woga, yakutya, “Wono si wanondolaga, wakondya kumbona, Nane nghelajila kuli wono si wakuwa kumbuza.”
45010021	Ninga kuli Isilayeli, yakutya, “Misi yose nghawagololela imiwoko yangu nghuwacemela u kwangu, I wanhu we cibede kanyhi wono wasina cihuliko.”
45011001	Alu nghuwuza nghutya, u Mulungu yawakumhila kutali iwanhu wakwe? Aa, ng'o. Hambi na nene nha nili Muisilayeli, we mbeyu ya Abulahamu, wo mulango wa Benyamini.
45011002	U Mulungu si yawakumhila kutali iwanhu wakwe wono yali yawasiwanuye kulawa na katali. Muzikumbuciye mwene za Eliya, vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, mwipango lyono yamung'ung'ulicilaga u Mulungu, ku soko ye Waisilayeli.
45011003	“Gwe Muwaha, wawawulaga iwawizi wako, wawumwagula no wukumbicilo wako. Nane nasigala nili wene du, nawo wakusaka kumbulaga?”
45011004	U Mulungu yamupitula Eliya yakamutya nhawule? Yamutya nhavi, “Nisigazize wanhu elufu mupunghati, wono wakali si namuhemba Baali.”
45011005	Nhavivyo vyo yinha, sunga mwi'daha lili, wali baho wono u Mulungu yawasiwanula ku so lihewa lyakwe.
45011006	U wuhagule wakwe wukulawilila mwi'hewa lyakwe, hamba si ku soko ye metumo gawo. Hambi hono u wuhagulwe wakwe wali wuwe wuli mu wulanga imetumo ge wanhu, kwaco ilihewa lyakwe si lyali liwe yihewa lya mbeka.
45011007	Alu ma? Iwanhu wa Isilayeli, si wacituga cono walondolaga, langa iwahagulwa wo wacituga. Wanji wakanozwa kuwa wakamu.
45011008	Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “U Mulungu yazinoza izinhumbula zawo ziwe nghamu, Sunga nalu, si wakusuma kuwona kwe meso gawo. Hamba kuhulika kwe makutu gawo.”
45011009	Nayo Dawudi yakutya, “U wulilo wawo wuweze mutego wo kuwagwiza weneco, wagwe no kulipicizwa.
45011010	Ne meso gawo gatukuwazwe, walece kuwona. No kuwaleka weyinamizye mu wugaye nhondo zose!”
45011011	Nane nghuwuza nghutya, alu i Wayahudi wekobala ho, sunga wakajililila lukulu wose? Aa, ng'o, vyo si vinha! Langa ku soko yo wugwe wawo, imhonelo yiwaziza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi, i Wayahudi ho wawawonele wivu.
45011012	Holeka hono u wugwe wawo, wuwaletela we yinze wugoli wo wumoteswe wuwaha, ale nhavivyo wuwe wawo wo kuwa wasina i mikalile miswanu ye cimuhe, wuwaletela wumoteswe wuwaha iwanhu wono si Wayahudi. Holeka yili calinze muno, vyono wukwilanicile wawo, woleta uwumoteswe winji muno.
45011013	Ninga nghumulonjelenyi anye mono si muli Wayahudi, Vyono ane naweza nili mutumwa kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nghwiyilumbila u witumami wangu,
45011014	ho sume kuwanoza i Wayahudi wayangu, wamuwonelenyi nyenye wivu, nane ho sume kuwaponya wayawo wanji.
45011015	Hambi hono yiwe u wulemwe wawo wukayiletela iyinze u wilamule no Mulungu, alu ho yowa wule mu cipango cono wovumililwa no Mulungu? Iwafu wolozuka!
45011016	Hono i cibegulwa cilongozi co mukate ciwe casiwanulwa, hodu, no mukate wose wasiwanulwa wakondya; nayo imilela yo mubici hono yiwe miswanu, ne manhambi gayo gawezaga maswanu nhavivilya.
45011017	Heya, ninga imanhambi ganji go muzeyituni wa mu mugunda gadumulwa, ne hanhu hayo, ilinhambi lyo muzeyituni wa mu mbago likalumbicizwa. Nanye mo wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi, yo nyenye mono lyo linhambi lilyo lyo muzeyituni wa mu mbago, aluno mukuhanga ivilungo ne mele, vyo muzeyituni wa mu mugunda.
45011018	Holeka mulece kuwabedegala awalya wono wadumuligwe nhe manhambi! Hamba muwe mwina inghani yo kwilumbila, ninga mweze kukumbucila vyono, yo si nyenye mo weneco, mono mukuyisikamya yiyo imilela, langa imilela yo yikumusikamyenyi anye.
45011019	Lunji kowa kutya, “I manhambi gapanyulwa, ane ho numbicizwe i hanhu hayo.”
45011020	Sawa, gapanyulwa ku soko yo wula wihuwilo, ninga agwe wimile ku soko yo wihuwilo wako. Ninga wulece kwilumba, langa wogope.
45011021	Hambi hono u Mulungu yawe si yawawonela lusungu i Wayahudi, wono wenha lye nhambi linghalaco, alu wukwihwesa vyono kokuwonela lusungu agwe?
45011022	Ale, weze kukumbucila vyono, u Mulungu muswanu kanyhi mukali. U mwene mukali kuli wono wagwa, ninga mwene muswanu kuli gwegwe, hono wujendelele mu wuswanu wakwe, hono si nhavivyo, nagwe kodumulwa.
45011023	Ne Wayahudi nhavivyo, hono wawulece u wuwe wawo wo kuwa wasina wihuwilo, wolumbicizwa kanyhi. Hambi u Mulungu nha yena wusume wo kuwalumbiciza kanyhi.
45011024	Nanye mo wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi ku cihuma, mwinha linhambi lyo muzeyituni wa mu mbago, ninga mwawuswa kuko, no kulumbicizwa mu muzeyituni wa mu mugunda, i hanhu hono si henyu ku cihuma. Ninga i Wayahudi ku cihuma, wo wenha u muzeyituni wa mu mugunda, na yowa nghani mhelu kuli wene, ku wulumbicizwe kanyhi mu mubici wuwo u wawo.
