45011025	Wandugu zangu, nghuhila muyimanye imbeka yiyi yono hundikwe, ho mulece kwiwona nha muli we mahala. I cibede ce Wayahudi, cali ca cipango cidodo du, sunga kolo iwanhu wono si Wayahudi wamuziza u Mulungu.
45011026	Baho nhondo ho lyopona ilikungugo lyose lya Isilayeli, nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga. “U Muponyi kololawa mu Sayuni Kolowuwusa u wubi wa Yakobo.
45011027	Aci co cilagane cono nocinoza kuli wene Mu cipango cono nowuwusiza u wubi wawo.”
45011028	Ninga i Wayahudi, vyono wakululema u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, waweza vili sili no Mulungu, ninga so cambuzi cenyu anye mo wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi. Ninga vyono wahagulwa no Mulungu, holeka wakali vyo wendece wo Mulungu ku soko ye walezi wawo.
45011029	Hambi u Mulungu, nha si kawonaga vyono vibi, lono yakondya kuwapela iwanhu ivipegwa vyakwe no kuwasiwanula.
45011030	Baho katali, nanye mono si muli Wayahudi mwali mwamubeza u Mulungu, ninga aluno mwakondya kulutuga u lusungu lwakwe, ku soko ye cibede cawo.
45011031	Na nhavivyo kanyhi, ku soko yo lusungu lono mwapegwa anye, i Wayahudi aluno weza kumubeza u Mulungu, ho nawo walubocele u lusungu lo Mulungu nhavivilya.
45011032	Hambi u Mulungu nha yawadindila wose ku cibede cawo, ho yasume kuwawonela u lusungu wose.
45011033	O, lecenyi u wugoli ne mahala no wumanye wo Mulungu, si wakulonga! Ne zining'aniza zakwe si za kulonga! Sunga ne zinzila zakwe si zimanyikaga yaye. Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile.
45011034	“Hambi nani mono yasuma kulimanya i lihala lyo Muwaha? Hamba nani mono kosuma kuwa mulanjilizi wakwe?
45011035	Hamba lunji nani mono yamula kumupela cinji, nayo ho yagomolelwe kanyhi cinhu cico?”
45011036	Hambi i vinhu vyose nha vilawaga kwakwe, na vyose vikawa so vilungo vyakwe, na ku soko yakwe. U lukumyo lweze kuli mwene sunga cibitilila! Heya.
45012001	Holeka wandugu zangu, vyono u Mulungu yo wo lusungu lwinji, holeka nghumunenenyi ko mutima wangu wose, mwiyilavye nyenye mo weneco muwe likumbiko lyumi, lyelile, lyono likumunojeza u Mulungu. Na yiyi yo nzila yenyu yo kumuhembela mu wulunji.
45012002	Kanyhi mulece kwiga imikalile ya lulu ya mononze yiyi, langa u Mulungu yamupitulenyi mu zinhumbula zenyu ko kugapitula imahala genyu. Baho langa ho mosuma kuwumanya u wuhile wo Mulungu, no kuyizuka inghani yono swanu, yono yikumunojeza, kanyhi yono yikwilaniciye.
45012003	Ku soko ye lihewa lyo Mulungu lyono napegwa, holeka nghumulonjelenyi nyenye wose, vyono, mulece kwiwona nha muli cinji si nha vyono mwinha. Langa imahweso genyu, geze galing'aniciye cijelo co wihuwilo, nha vyono u Mulungu yamugawila munhu na cakwe.
45012004	U muwili wina vilunzwa vinji, ninga cimonga na mulimo waco.
45012005	Nhavivyo na sese, hamba ciwe cili wenji, ninga cili muwili monga muli Kilisito, na wose cili vilunzwa munhu na muyagwe.
45012006	Kanyhi, cina vipegwa vyono visimajiye, vyono linha ilihewa lyono capegwa. Na mono yena icipegwa co wuwile, yimunojeye yacitumamilaje mu nghango yo wihuwilo wakwe.
45012007	Nayo mono yena icipegwa co witumami, yimunojeye yetumame. We cipegwa co kwijiza, yeze mu wijizi wakwe.
45012008	Nayo mono yena icipegwa co kuwalanjiza iwanji, yanoze nhavivyo. Nayo mono yakumugawila u muyagwe muli cono yena naco, yanoze nhavivyo ko mutima muzelu. Nayo mono yapejigwe wulongola, yetumaje yahidimbaye. Nayo mono yakwituma nghani yo lusungu, yetumaje no luseko.
45012009	U wendo wenyu, wulece kuwa na wukonji wo wose. Muzisulaje izimbi, muzinamatilaje iziswanu.
45012010	Mweze mwiyendile nha Wakilisito, wana wa munhu yumonga, namo mu lukumyo, mweze kwamula kuwehweseza iwayenyu.
45012011	Mulece kuwuleka u wuhidimbazi wenyu, mumwitumamilaje u Muwaha no wusangalale mu zinhumbula zenyu.
45012012	No witumbilo wenyu wumuwicenyi na nyemo nhondo zose, mweze na ngola mu wugaye, kanyhi mweze kuswelelela mu wulombe nhondo zose.
45012013	Mweze kuwataza iwanhu wo Mulungu mu visakwa vyawo, mweze kuwabocela iwajenzi ko mutima muzelu.
45012014	Mumulombaje u Mulungu, yawalugutize wose wono wakumugazenyi, heya, mumulombaje yawalugutize, hamba mulece kuwalijita.
45012015	Musangalalane na wono wakusangalala, mulilane na wono wakulila.
45012016	Muweze no wuswanu wu wulya du, muli nyenye wose. Mulece kuwa wedunhumuzi, langa mukwejelwe kuli zo witume wo winenenyhezi. Mulece kwiwona nha mono mwina mahala kuciza.
45012017	Mulece kwiyilipiciza wubi na wubi, munhu na muyagwe. Mweze kwituma i ziswanu zono zinojeye hali wanhu wose.
45012018	Mu nghango vyono yisumice ku lubavu lwenyu, mwikalaje mwilamuye ne wanhu wose.
45012019	Mo wendece wangu, mulece kwilipiciza, langa mumulecelaje u Mulungu inghani yiyi, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “U mulimo wo kulipiciza wo mulimo wangu, yo nene du mono nolipiciza, vyo yakutya u Muwaha.”
45012020	Hamonga na zizo, i Mandiko kanyhi gakutya, “Ninga u mulugu wako hono yawe yadabuce, wumupelaje ndigwa, na hono yawe yakaluce, umupelaje yang'we. Hambi hono wunoze nhavivyo, nha komunoza yawone cevu muno, nha kotya mulundilwe makala go moto mu mutwe wakwe.”
45012021	Wulece kuvumila kusumwa no wubi, langa wuwusumilaje u wubi mu wuswanu.
45013001	Yimunojeye munhu wo wose, yaweze ne cihuliko kuli walongola wono wena u wulajilize mu Selekali, hambi u wulajilize wose nha wulawaga kuli Mulungu, nawo iwalongola wono wena uwulajilize, wawicigwe no Mulungu.
45013002	Na mono yakwisumaniza no wulajilize we walongola, yuyo yakupinga ililajilizo lyo Mulungu, nawo wono wakunoza nhavivyo, wakwiletela weneco wuling'anizwe.
45013003	Hambi wono watemile, nha si wakuwa kuwogofya iwanhu waswanu, langa iwanhu wabi. Holeka hono wuwe wukusaka wulece kumogopa munhu mono yena u wulajilize? Ale witumaje iziswanu, nayo kokulumba,
45013004	hambi u mwene nha mwitumami wo Mulungu, mono yakwituma u mulimo so cambuzi cako go mweneco. Ninga hono witume vibi, ale wogope, hambi nha mbeka, yena uwulajilize wo kulavya wulipicize. U mwene yo mwitumami wo Mulungu, umwene kalifisilizaga i likuwo lyo Mulungu, kuli wose wono wakwituma izimbi.
45013005	Holeka yinojeye kuwahulika iwalongola, wono wena u wulajilize, ninga si so wogopa ilikuwo lyo Mulungu ng'o, langa ku soko vyono ne ciselinji naco, cikusaka nhavivyo.
45013006	Holeka ku soko yiyo anye mulipaga kodi, ku soko vyono i walongola wawo, wamwitumamilaga u Mulungu, lono wawe wakufisiliza vyono yiwanojeye kwituma.
45013007	Mumupelaje munhu wo wose vye ling'ani yakwe, munhu we kodi, mu mupelaje kodi yakwe, nayo munhu we lilumbo mumupelaje lilumbo, lyakwe.
45013008	Mulece kuzijilwa na yunji wo wose cinhu co cose, langa mweze kuzijilwa u mugawa wo kwiyenda nyenye wose. Hambi mono yamwendile u muyagwe, nha kafisiliza u wulajilize.
45013009	Hambi imalajilizo gaga, “Wulece kusenyha, wulece kuwulaga, Wulece kusulumila,” sunga na ganji gose, gali mwilajilizo limonga, “Wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile gwegwe go mweneco.”
45013010	Mono yamwendile u muyagwe, si kosuma kumunozeza vibi. Holeka mu wendo, mo wukufisilizizwa u wulajilize wose.
45013011	Hamonga na zizo, anye mo weneco, mumanyile vyono cili mwidaha lya hayi, alu co cipango co kusinhuka mu zinhongo, heya, imhonelo yetu luno, yili behi muno si nha lono cehuwilila.
45013012	Icilo ceza malika, no wusiku weza behi kwela, Holeka alu, cilecele lukulu kwituma imetumo ge citi, langa civwale ivitwalo vyo kwihomela mu wuzelu.
45013013	I mijendele yetu, yeze yina cogopo nha vyono yinojeye mu misi, cilece kuwa no wubugu no wugala wujimbi, si mwi'hede na mu wusenyha, si mu wugombane no wivu.
45013014	Langa u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito yaweze co civwalo cenyu, kanyhi mulece kwipiganziza u wusulumizi wenyu wo muwili, no kuwufisiliza.
45014001	Mosuma kumubocela kuli nyenye, u munhu mono yasoceye mu wihuwilo, ninga mulece kuwangana nayo kuli ze mahweso gakwe.
45014002	Hambi i wanhu nha wasutaniye, vyono yunji u wihuwilo wakwe, wakumukombola kulya cinhu co cose, ninga yunji mono yena u wihuwilo wono wusoceye, u mwene kalizaga mboga ze mahamha du.
45014003	No munhu mono kalizaga vyose, yalece kumubedegala ayulya mono si kalizaga vyose, nayo mono kalizaga mboga ye mahamha du, yalece kumuling'aniza ayulya mono kalizaga vyose, hambi u Mulungu nha yakondizye kumuvumila.
45014004	Hambi alu agwe wuli nani, mono kumuling'aniza u mwitumami wa yunji? Na hono yeme hamba hono yagwe, yo nghani yo Mutwawe, heya, kokwimywa no kusikamywa, hambi u Muwaha nha yadahile kumwimya.
45014005	U munhu yadahile kwihwesa vyono lizuwa linji lina nhunizo si nha lizuwa linji, munhu yunji kosuma kwihwesa vyono ivilo vyose viling'aniye. Ninga u munhu wo wose yatyatye nha vyono yakuwona mweneco mu mahala gakwe.
45014006	Mono yakulikumbucila lizuwa, yakulikumbucila ku soko yo kumukumya u Muwaha, nayo mono yakulya ndigwa yo wutunga, yakunoza nhavivyo so kumukumya u Muwaha, hambi nha yakumulumba u Mulungu. Nhavivyo mono si yakulya indigwa yo wutunga, yakunoza nhavivyo ku soko yo kumukumya Muwaha, nayo nhavivyo yakumulumba u Mulungu.
45014007	Hambi muli sese, nha hasina mono keyiwumipilaga mweneco, hamba hasina mono keyifwilaga mweneco,
45014008	Hambi hono ciwumipe, nha cikumuwumipilo Muwaha, hamba hono cifwe, cikumufwilo Muwaha, holeka hamba ciwumipe, hamba cifwe, cili wo Muwaha du.
45014009	Hambi Kilisito nha yafwa, kanyhi yakazuka, ho yawe Muwaha wa wose, iwomi ne wafu.
45014010	Alu so cici agwe wukumuling'aniza u muyago? Nagwe so cici lo wukumubedegala u muyago? Ase wose colokwima he 'goda lyo wuling'anizi lyo Mulungu.
45014011	Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Nha vyono ane nili mumi yakutya u Muwaha, munhu wo wose kofugamila, no munhu wo wose kovumila vyono yo nene u Mulungu.”
45014012	Holeka wose cololonga hali Mulungu munhu na zakwe.
45014013	Holeka cilece kwiling'aniza, langa ciyohaje ho cilece kuwa cikobazo hamba hadodo kuli muyetu, hamba kumupela soko yo kwituma wubi.
45014014	Mu wilunza hamonga no Muwaha Yesu, manyiye lukulu vyono, hasina cinhu cocose cono cisemunwa mu cihuma cayo, ninga hono munhu yehwese vyono cinhu co wutunga cisemunwa, hodu kuli mwene caweza cisemunwa.
45014015	Hono wumukalaze u muyago ku soko ye ndigwa yono wukulya, wo wutya imikalile yako si yikutongwa no wendo. Wulece kulumbila lukulu i ndigwa yako yiwe sokosoko yo kumwajiliza yunji, mono Kilisito yamufwila.
45014016	Holeka mulece kulumba i cinhu cono anye mukuwona ciswanu ho cibedegalwe.
45014017	Hambi wutemi wo Mulungu nha si wuli mu wulye no wung'we, langa wuli mu wiling'ano, no mulamu, ne nyemo mu Muhe Mono Yelile.
45014018	Na mono yakumwitumamila Kilisito nhavivyo, yakuwa kumwendeza u Mulungu, no kulumbwa ne wanhu.
45014019	Holeka yicinojeye cizibate nhondo zose izinghani zono ziletaga mulamu, na zono zikucitaza kwiyizenga sese wose.
45014020	Cilece kuwuhodanga u mulimo wo Mulungu, ku soko yo wiwanganile wa muli ze zindigwa. Ndigwa zose zelile, ninga si viswanu kulya indigwa yono yomunoza munhu yunji yagwile mu wubi.
45014021	Yili ciba kuleka kulya nyama, hamba kung'wa divayi, hamba kwituma nghani yo yose yono yosuma kumukobaza u nduguyo ho yagwe.
45014022	Holeka wukamise cono wihuwiye hagati yako no Mulungu wako. Yali ciba u munhu mono kolo yayidumula inghani yo kwituma, si yakucipingapinga iciselinji cakwe.
45014023	Ninga u munhu mono yakuwa no wukangamyanje kuli ndigwa yono yakulya, yuyo yakuhoswa hono yalye, ku soko ilitumo lyakwe lilyo, si lili mu wihuwilo ng'o. Na co cose cono si cili mu musinji wo wihuwilo, wo wubi.
45015001	Ale, holeka ase mono cili vilungo mu wihuwilo wetu, yicinojeye ciwataze wono wasoceye mu wihuwilo, ho wasume kulewana no wusocele wawo. Cilece kwiyendeza sese weneco du.
45015002	Yicinojeye ase wose, cimwendeze munhu na muyagwe mu wuswanu, ho nayo yasume kwima mu wihuwilo.
45015003	Hambi na Kilisito nha si yeyendeza mweneco, nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko, “I zimbi zose zono wakulongaga gwegwe, zikangwila nene.”
45015004	Hambi zose zono zandikwa, nha zandikwa ho zicijize ase, nase ho cituje witumbilo mu wukangalile, na mu wusindamice wono cikupegwa ne Mandiko gago Gono Gelile, ho ciwe no witumbilo.
45015005	Ale u Mulungu mono wo musinji wo wukangalile no wusindamice wose, yamupelenyi wimo wumonga mu hwani ya Kilisito Yesu.
45015006	Ho nanye wose mumukumye u Mulungu u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito na nhumbula monga ne lizi limonga.
45015007	Holeka mwiyibocelaje nha vyono Kilisito yamubocelenyi nanye, ko lukumyo lo Mulungu.
45015008	Hambi nha nghumulonjelenyi vyono Kilisito yawetumamila Wayahudi, ho yawalajile u Wihuwilwa wo Mulungu, no wihuwizo wono u Mulungu yawapela walezi wetu ho wufisilizwe,
45015009	nawo iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, ho wamukumye u Mulungu, ku soko yo lusungu lwakwe. Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile: “Ku soko yiyo nokulumbila muli wono si Wayahudi kanyhi nolwimba u lukumyo lwe litagwa lyako.”
45015010	Kanyhi i Mandiko gakutya: “Musecelele anye mo wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi. Musecelele hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu.”
45015011	Na kanyhi: “Anye wose mono si muli Wayahudi, mumulumbe u Muwaha, nanye mo wanhu wose mulumbenyi.”
45015012	Kanyhi Isaya yakutya: “Kolokwijela munhu mu lulelo lwa Yese nayo kolotema muli wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo wolomwitumamila.”
45015013	Ale u Mulungu mono wo musinji wo witumbilo, yamumemyenyi inyemo yose, no mulamu wono wukulawa mu wihuwilo wenyu, u witumbilo wenyu ho wonjezece mu vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile.
45015014	Wandugu zangu, ane no mweneco, manyiye lukulu vyono anye mo weneco mumemile u wuswanu, no wumanye wose, na kanyhi vyono mosuma kwiyilanjiza nyenye wose.
45015015	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, nimwandicilenyi na zinji zinji akuno sina woga mu baluwa yiyi, ho nimukumbucizenyi muli zinghani zinji. Nane noza nhavivyo ku so lihewa lyono napegwa no Mulungu,
45015016	ho niwe mwitumami wa Kilisito kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Wo mulimo wangu we cikohani kuwaganulila u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, ho wanhu we wono si Wayahudi wawe yikumbiko lyono likuvumilwa no Mulungu, likumbiko lyono lyezigwe no Muhe Mono Yelile.
45015017	Holeka vyono nelunza na Kilisito Yesu, nosuma kwilumbila u mulimo wangu ku soko yo Mulungu.
45015018	Si nosuma kwijelela kulonga nghani yinji yo yose, langa hono si inghani yiyo du, yono Yesu yetuma ko kunyitumamila nene, ho wanhu wono si Wayahudi wasume kuwa ne cihuliko. Nayo yaketuma zizino, mu nghani na mu metumo.
45015019	Mu vilungo vye vitanjilo na mu mezino, na mu vilungo vyo Muhe wo Mulungu. Holeka mu wupilima hanhu hose, ku wulawilila ku Yelusalemi sunga ku Iluliko, nghaluganula no kulukwiza u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.
45015020	No wuhile wangu, wali kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu ho hose, ihanhu hono ilitagwa lya Yesu likali nahulikwa, ho nize ndece kuzenga mucanyha yo musinji wa munhu yunji.
45015021	Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “I wanhu wose wono wakali si naganulilwa izinghani zakwe, wolowona, Na wono wakali si nahulika, Wolokwizuka.”
45015022	Ku soko yiyo, nghemilwa kali kenji ku wuza kwenyu.
45015023	Ninga alu vyono nayikondya imilimo yangu kono zimbavu azino, na vyono kanyhi mu myaka minji, nali kuhila kuza kuko kwenyu,
45015024	nitumbiye kunoza nhavivyo lulu. Nali nyende nimuwonenyi, lono nili mu muhinzo wo kubita ku Hisipaniya, ho mumhele u wutazi wenyu so muhinzo wuwo, mwipango lyono nowa nakondya kusangalalana nanye.
45015025	Ninga kwaluno, nghali kubita ku Yelusalemi kuwetumamila iwanhu wo Mulungu kuko.
45015026	Hambi we makanisa ga Makedoniya na Akaya, nha wendezwa kuhanguliza sawo yawo, no kuwataza iwanhu wo Mulungu wono waciwa kuko ku Yelusalemi.
45015027	Weneco du wendezwa kunoza nhavivyo; ninga imbeka, awo wali mulimo wawo kuli wene. Hambi hono iwanhu wono si Wayahudi wakondya kuhanga u wumoti we cimuhe we Wayahudi, holeka yiwanojeye nawo luno, wawetumamile Wayahudi mu visakwa vyawo vyo muwili.
45015028	Nilaza kuwa nawukondya u mulimo wuwo, no kuwafisiza no kuwapela ivilavywa vivyo vyono vilavigwe ku soko yawo, ale baho ho nolokolela kuko u kwenyu, lono nghubita ku Hisipaniya.
45015029	Nane manyile vyono kolo nghuza kuko u kwenyu, nolomuletelenyi u wumoti wuwaha wa Kilisito.
45015030	Holeka wandugu zangu nghumunenenyi ku soko yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, na ku soko yo wendo wono wukuletwa no Muhe, mulece kuleka kunombela kuli Mulungu.
45015031	Mulombe ho mhone muli awalya wono wali ku Wuyahudi, no witumami wangu kuko ku Yelusalemi, ho wusume kulumbwa ne wanhu wo Mulungu wono wali kuko.
45015032	Holeka hono u Mulungu yende, nosuma kuza kwenyu na mutima muzelu, ho nyhehe hamonga nanye.
45015033	Ale u Mulungu wo mulamu yawezane na nyenye wose. Heya.
45016001	Nyendile kumumanyizenyi zo lumbu lyetu Foyibe, u mwitumami we likanisa lye Kenkileya.
45016002	Mumubocelele muli Muwaha nha vyono yiwanojeye iwanhu wo Mulungu. Mumupelaje no wutazi wo wose wono kowusaka kuli'nye, hambi mweneco nha kawezaga mutazi wa wenji, kanyhi sunga na kuli nene no mweneco.
45016003	Muwalamusaje wa Pilisika na Akula iwetumami wayangu muli Kilisito Yesu.
45016004	Wene waketajila mu mbali ku soko yangu. Yiwanojeye kulumbizwa, ninga si na nene du, langa sunga ne makanisa gose ge wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
45016005	Kanyhi muwalamusaje we likanisa lyono litang'anililaga mu kaya yawo. U mulamu wangu wumuficile mwendece wangu Epeneto, mono yo mulongozi mu Asiya kumwihuwila Kilisito.
45016006	Munamusizaje na Malyamu mono yetuma u mulimo ko wuhidimbazi ku soko yenyu.
45016007	Kanyhi mulamu kuli Andeloniko na Yuniya, iwayangu wono cadindilanwa hamonga nawo mu jela, wene wamanyice muno muli iwatumwa, kanyhi wene wanongolela kuwa Wakilisito.
45016008	Mulamu wangu kuli Amupiliyato, mwendece wangu muli Kilisito.
45016009	Mulamu kuli Ulubano, u mwitumami muyangu mu witumami wa Kilisito, mulamu wangu kanyhi kuli wendece wangu Sitakusi.
45016010	Munamusizaje Apele, mono u wihuwilo wakwe muli Kilisito wakondya kusikamywa. Nghuwalamusa wose wono wali mu nyumba mwa Alisitabulo.
45016011	Mulamu kuli ndugu yangu Helodiyasi. Muwalamuse wose wa mu nyumba ya Meliciso wono wali muli Muwaha.
45016012	Munamusizaje wa Telufena na Telufosa, wono wakwituma muli Muwaha, no mwendece wangu Pelisi, mono yetuma u mulimo ku soko yo Muwaha.
45016013	Mumulamusaje Lufo, u mupiligazi muno mu mulimo wo Muwaha, hamonga no nyina, mono nane, yaya.
45016014	Mumulamuse na Asunikeleto, Felegoni. Heleme, Patelobasi, Helemasi ne wandugu zetu wono wali kuko.
45016015	Munamusize Filologo na Yuliya, Neleyusi, no lumbulye, na Olumipasi, hamonga ne wanhu wose wo Mulungu wono wena nawo.
45016016	Mwilamusizaje nyenye wose mu citanjilo co wendo. Mulamu kuli'nye wono wukulawa kuli makanisa gose ga Kilisito.
45016017	Ale nghumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muwalangaje wono wakuleta matemanuko ne vikobazo vyo kuwagwisa wanji, cinyume ce mejizo gono mwejizwa, muwelegaje iwanhu wawo.
45016018	Hambi iwanhu wono wenha wawo, nha si wakumwitumamila Mutwa wetu Kilisito, langa wakuzitumamila izinda zawo weneco du. Kanyhi so zinghani zawo, no wuganule wawo wo wupepeleze, wakuwa kuwakonga iwanhu we zinhumbula zimhelu mhelu.
45016019	Hambi wose nha wakondya kuhulika ze cihuliko cenyu, na yo soko ye nyemo yangu. Ninga nghumulombenyi mweze muli wasugu kuli zinghani ziswanu, kanyhi mulece kuwa na yilema lyo lyose kuli izimbi.
45016020	Nayo u Mulungu mono yo mwamulizo wo mulamu, sikocela kumuponda Setani hasi ye migulu yenyu. Ilihewa lyo Mutwa, wetu Yesu Kilisito, liwezane nanye.
45016021	Timoteyo u mwitumami muyangu, yakumulamusenyi, nha vivyo na Lukiya na Yasoni, na Sosipateli, wandugu zangu, wakumulamusenyi.
45016022	Ane Telitiyo mono nyandice i baluwa yiyi, nghumulamusizenyi muli Muwaha.
45016023	Gayo mucemezi wangu, hamonga ne likanisa lyose lyono litang'anililaga kwakwe, yakumulamusenyi. Elasito u mutunza zisawo wa mwi'tumbi lili, hamonga na Kwalito u ndugu, wakumulamusenyi. [
45016024	Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane nanye wose. Heya.]
45016025	Alenyi luno cimukumye u Mulungu! U Mwene kosuma kumusikamizizyenyi mu Luganuzi Luswanu lululya, lono naluganula muli zinghani za Yesu Kilisito, na mu nghani ayilya ye cinyele ye mbeka, yono yali hundikwe mu ndelo nyinji zono zapuluta.
45016026	Ninga aluno, imbeka yiyo yakondya kugubulwa mu nzila ye Mandiko ge wawizi, na so lilajilizo lyo Mulungu we cibitilila, yakondya kulajilwa kuli makungugo gose, ho wose wasume kwihuwila no kuwa na cihuliko.
45016027	Kuli Mulungu mono yo munya mahala yali wene, lweze lukumyo muli Yesu Kilisito, cibitilila ne cibitilila! Heya.
46001001	Ane yo nene Pawulo, mono nacemwa ko wuhile wo Mulungu, ho niwe mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu, hamonga na Sositene u ndugu yetu,
46001002	nase, cikumwandicilenyi anye mono muli likanisa lyo Mulungu lyono lili kuko ku Kolinto. Anye mono mwakondya kwezezwa mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu, kanyhi mukacemwa ho muwe wanhu wo Mulungu, hamonga ne wanhu wose, hanhu ho hose, wono wakumulomba u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, u Muwaha wawo, sunga na sese nhavivyo.
46001003	Ilihewa no mulamu, wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu, na kuli u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, viwezane nanye.
46001004	Nane nghumulumba u Mulungu wangu nhondo zose, ku soko yenyu, ku soko vyono yakondya kumupelenyi, anye, i lihewa lyakwe mu nzila ya Kilisito Yesu.
46001005	Hambi nha ku soko yo wilunze wenyu na Kilisito, nha mwakondya kuwa muli wagoli we vinhu vyose. Kanyhi, mwakondya kupegwa u wumanye wose hamonga ne vilungo vyose vyo kuganulila,
46001006	hambi inghani ya Kilisito nha yakondya kukangazwa muli'nye,
46001007	hamba si mucepuciywe cinji muli icipegwa co cose ca mu nhumbula, hono muwe mukuwulindila u wugubulwe wakwe u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
46001008	U mwene Yesu, komusikamyenyi nyenye wose sunga ko ku ndumo, ho muze mwijele musina yilema lyo lyose, kwizuwa alilya lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
46001009	Nayo u Mulungu mono yamucemenyi anye, ho muwe no wumonga no Mwanagwe Yesu Kilisito u Muwaha wetu, mwene yo mwihuwilwa.
46001010	Nye wandugu zangu, cikumunenenyi muno, mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, vyono mweze mulaganiye kumonga, muli yo yose yono mukulonga, halece kuwa na matemanuko ganji go gose muli nyenye, muweze ne 'hweso limonga kanyhi no wuhile wumonga.
46001011	Nye, wandugu zangu, izinghani azilya zono nazituga kulawa kuli wanhu wanji we mhuga ya Kuloye, zikulajila calinze vyono hagati yenyu, ho wuli wula kwiyitanga.
46001012	Ane nha cinji nghusaka nitye nhavi, vyono, muli nyenye u munhu yakulonga na lwakwe, vyono yunji yakutya, “Ane nili wa Pawulo,” na yunji nayo yakutya, “Ane nili wa Apolo,” yunji nayo yakutya, “Ane nili wa Kefa,” na yunji nayo yakutya, “Ane nili wa Kilisito.”
46001013	Alu wo wutya, Kilisito Mwene yatemanuce? Hamba lunji Pawulo yo yatumbikwa mu musalaba ku soko yenyu? Hamba kowa lunji mwabaputizizwa mwi'tagwa lya Pawulo lo?
46001014	Ninga ane nghumulumba u Mulungu, vyono si namubaputiza munhu wo wose muli nyenye, langa wanhu wejete du, wo wa Kilisipo na Gayo hodu du.
46001015	Holeka hasina munhu wo wose mono kosuma kutya yeze yabaputizizwa mwi'tagwa lyangu nene Pawulo.
46001016	(Oo! Munenelaje, kumbe nawabaputiza na we mhuga ya Sitefano nhavivilya, ninga si nitumbiye vyono nowa namubaputiza munhu yunji wo wose kanyhi kuciza wawano.)
46001017	Ane Kilisito si yanhuma ho niwe kubaputiza wanhu, langa yanhuma ho niluganule u Luganuzi Luswanu, kanyhi na vyono mu wuganule wangu, ndece kwitumbila i mahala no wulonji we wanhu wanji, i vilungo vyo wufwe wa Kilisito wa mu musalaba, ho vilece kuwa nha nghani ya bwete du.
46001018	Hambi inghani yono yikulolosa zo wufwe wa Kilisito mu musalaba, yikuwa nha nghani ya wulele kuli walya wose wono wali mu mukumbo wo wajilile, ninga kuli ase mono cili mu nzila ye mhonelo, inghani yiyo, vyo vilungo vyo Mulungu.
46001019	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakulonga gakutya, “Nogahodanga i mahala ga we mahala, Kanyhi nowuwembula no wizuce wa wono wasomile.”
46001020	Alu wa hayi wa muli nyenye, we mahala? Hamba wahayi lu, u mwijizi wo wulajilize? Hamba u munghula wo wuwanji wa mu vilo vivi, yali hayi lo? Ninga u Mulungu, yaganoza i mahala ga mononze yiyi, kuwa wulele du, hali Mwene.
46001021	Ninga nha vyono yinha inghani ye Mahala go Mulungu, iwanhu si wosuma kumumanya u Mulungu, ko kwitumamila i zinzila ze mahala gawo weneco. Ninga hanhu hayo, u Mulungu yenda kuwakomboza wawalya wono wakwihuwila mu nzila ye cinhu cono i we mahala, wakuziwona nha kotya wulele du, nha cinji inghani yono cikuyiganula.
46001022	Alu ati i Wayahudi wakusaka citanjilo, nawo i Wagiliki wakulondola mahala,
46001023	ninga 'se, cikumuganula Kilisito du mono yatumbikwa mu musalaba. Ninga kuli Wayahudi inghani yiyi, yili cikobazo kuli wene, na kuli iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, inghani yiyi, wulele du kuli wene,
46001024	ninga kuli awalya wono wakondya kucemwa, i Wayahudi na wono si Wayahudi Kilisito vyo vilungo vyo Mulungu ne mahala go Mulungu.
46001025	Hambi cono cikwijela nha wo wulele wo Mulungu, nha co cina i mahala gono gacizize i mahala ge wanhu, na cono cikwijela kotya nha wo wusocele wo Mulungu, co cina vilungo muno muno si nha ivilungo vye wanhu.
46001026	Nye wandugu zangu, muvikumbucilaje ivilo lono mwacemelwa no Mulungu, vyono wanji wa muli nyenye, mu wulanje we cimunhumunhu si mwali we mahala, ne vilungo, hamba we lilumbo lya hacanyha.
46001027	Nha cinji wo wutya, u Mulungu yagahagula agalya, gono yinze yigawonaga nha wulele du, ho yasume kuwakoza cevu i we mahala, na kanyhi yagahagula agalya gono yinze yigawonaga nha wusocele du, ho yawakoze cevu wawo wono wali vilungo.
46001028	Kanyhi u Mulungu yakazihagula zizilya zono hamba mu mahweso ge ciyinze-yinze, zikwijela vyono zisina cambuzi hamba hadodo kanyhi zibedegaywe muno muno, zo nghani zono si zali zili baho kulawa na katali, na mu nzila ya zizo, ho yasume kuziwusiza lukulu mu mahweso ge wanhu, izinghani zono wanhu wehwesaga vyono zina cambuzi.
46001029	Holeka hasina munhu wo wose mono kowa yena cinhu co cose co kwilumbila hali Mulungu.
46001030	U Mulungu mweneco du yo yamulunzenyi anye na Kilisito Yesu. U Mulungu yamunoza Kilisito, yo yawe go mahala getu, na mu nzila yakwe du, ase mo cikulamulilwa no Mulungu, cikuwa cili wanhu wo Mulungu mono celile, kanyhi mono cakondya kukombozwa nayo.
46001031	Ale, nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Holeka mono yakusaka kwilumba yelumbilaje du u mulimo wo Muwaha.”
46002001	Ane nane, mo wandugu zangu, lono naziza kwenyu, si namuganulilenyi inghani yo Mulungu ko wusugu wa nonga, hamba kwe mahala ge cimunhumunhu.
46002002	Na kanyhi, hamba si nasaka ho manye nghani yo yose ya muli nyenye, langa nghani monga du, heya, nimumanye Yesu Kilisito du, u mwene Kilisito mono yatumbikwa mu musalaba.
46002003	Lono nali nili kuko kwenyu, nali nili musocele, na kuno kanyhi nghucicima so woga winji.
46002004	Sunga na muwulonje hamba na mu wuganule wangu, sinetumamila i zinghani zo kuwendeza wanhu, hamba za mu mahala gangu, langa zali za mu wulajile wo Muhe, na we vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile.
46002005	Nane nanoza nhavivyo, u wihuwilo wenyu ho wulece kwitumbila imahala ge cimunhumunhu, langa ivilungo vyo Mulungu.
46002006	Hamba nhavivyo, ase citumamilaga u wulonje we mahala kuli walya wono wakangaye mu mikalile yawo ye cimuhe, kanyhi ne mahala gago go si mahala ga mononze yiyi, hamba si ge watemi wa mono yinze yiyi, wono wali mu mukumbo wo wajilile.
46002007	Imahala gono cikwitumamila ase, go mahala ge zinghani zo Mulungu zono hundikwe, imahala gono mahundikwe, go mahala gono u Mulungu yali yagatemizye ku wulawa ku mwamulizo, ku soko yo lukumyo lwetu.
46002008	Go mahala gono i watemi we yinze yiyi, si wasuma kugatanga, ku soko hono wali wagatanje, hamba si wali wamutumbice u Muwaha wo lukumyo mu musalaba,
46002009	ninga nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Izinghani zono hamba liso likali si naziwona, hamba i likutu kuzihulika izinghani zono, hamba munhu yakali si nazihwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, zizo zo Mulungu yawawikaniziza wa walya wono wamwendile.”
46002010	Alu zizo zo nghani zo Mulungu zono yacigubulilila mu nzila yo Muhe wakwe. Hambi u Muhe mweneco nha yo kavisunjililaga i vinhu vyose, sunga zinghani zo wuhile wo Mulungu mugati muno muno zono sizijelaga.
46002011	Hambi nani mono kosuma kuzimanya zono zili mu nhumbula yo munhu yunji, langa hono si nhumbula yakwe u munhu mweneco? Yo nhavivyo kanyhi vyono, hasina mono kosuma kuzimanya i zo Mulungu, langa hono si u Muhe wo Mulungu du.
46002012	Ninga ase alu, si cabocela u muhe we yinze, langa camubocela u Muhe mono yakulawa kuli Mulungu, ho yacipele u wumanye wo kuzimanya azilya zono capegwa no Mulungu.
46002013	Holeka ase cikwijiza, ninga si kwe zinghani zono cejizizwa mu mahala ge cimunhumunhu, langa kwe zinghani zono cejizwa no Muhe, cikuzilolosa i zinghani zo Muhe kuli wono wena u Muhe yuyo.
46002014	U munhu we ciyinze-yinze si kazibocelaga izinghani zo Muhe wo Mulungu. Hambi u munhu we liwala lilyo, izinghani zo Mulungu, nha wulele du kuli mwene, ku soko vyono zimupulute imahala gakwe, hambi zene, nha zitanjikaga ko wutazi wo Muhe du.
46002015	Ninga u munhu mono yena u Muhe yuyo, yuyo langa yo kosuma kuwumanya u wuswanu wa vyose, nayo hamba sikosuma kuhoswa na munhu wo wose.
46002016	Nago i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Yo nani mbi mono kosuma kugamanya i mahala go Muwaha? Yo nani 'mbi mono kosuma kumulanjiza?” Ninga ase, cina i lihala lya Kilisito.
46003001	Mo wandugu zangu, ane nane, si nasuma kulongana nanye nha wanhu wono mwina u Muhe yuyo. Langa yali yinojeye ane nongane nanye, nhe wanhu we ciyinze-yinze, kotya nha muli wana wadodo mu mikalile ye Cikilisito.
46003002	Kanyhi yikawa yinojeye ane, nimulisenyi mele, hamba si ndigwa inghavu, hambi nha mwali mukali si munewikaniza kuyibocela yaye. Sunga na lulu mukwijela vyono mukali si munewikaniza,
46003003	hambi nha mukali muli wanhu we ciyinze-yinze. Alu wulenyi, nha yili mbeka, vyono muli nyenye mukali mowuli wivu no wugombane? Alu i zinghani zizo zo zikulajilila vyono anye, mukali muli wanhu we ciyinze yinze, kanyhi mwikaliye mu mikalile ye ciyinze yinze.
46003004	Alu yunji muli nyenye hono yakutya, “Ane nili wa Pawulo,” na yunji nayo yakutya, “Ane nane nili wa Apolo,” wulenyi, alu zizo si zo zikulajila vyono anye mukali mwikaliye du mu mikalile ye wanhu we yinze yiyi?
46003005	Alu, Apolo yo nani? Hamba Pawulo yo nani? Hambi ase wose nha cili wetumami du, mono camuletelenyi anye u wihuwilo. Nase wose cikwituma u mulimo wono yacipela u Muwaha.
46003006	Ane no Pawulo, nahadika mbeyu, nayo Apolo, yakayimwajilila malenga, ninga u Mulungu yo yazicindya i zimbeyu.
46003007	Holeka alu mono yakuhadika, ayo si cinji yaye, hamba ayulya mono yakumwajilila i malenga, langa u Mulungu du yo yakwiliye, mono yakuyiwilusa i mbeyu.
46003008	Ayulya mono yayihadika, na ayulya mono yayimwajilile malenga, wose wawo wali sawa du, hamba wawe wolobocela i cihumbilizwa munhu na lwakwe mu nghango yo wuhidimbale wo witume wawo weneco.
46003009	Hambi ase wose nha cili ndugu monga, kanyhi cili wetumami hamonga no Mulungu, na anye nanye, yo nyenye mono muli mugunda wakwe, kanyhi muli zengo lyo Mulungu.
46003010	Na mu witumamile i lihewa lyono u Mulungu yamhela, nho muzenji munghula, we mahala, nasuma kuwika musinji wono u munhu yunji, yakusuma kuzenga mucanyha yawo. Holeka yinojeye u munhu wo wose mono yakuzenga mucanyha yayo, yeze mulanjisi muno.
46003011	Na hasina munhu yunji mono kosuma kuwika musinji wunji kanyhi, si nha wuwo wono wakondya kuwikwa, nha cinji yo Yesu Kilisito.
46003012	Na mucanyha yo musinji wuwo, munhu wo wose yadahile kuzenjela zahabu, hamba fweza, hamba mabwe go wuguzi wukamu, lunji kosuma kwitumamila mabici hamba mahanze.
46003013	Na yiwe vyo vyose du, vyono yowa yinha, ninga u wuswanu wo mulimo wa yumonga yumonga, wolokwijelela Mwizuwa lilyo lya Kilisito, lilawa kuyanzalika i milimo yose. Hambi Lizuwa lilyo nha lyolokuza lina no moto, no moto wuwo nawo, wolowujela u mulimo wo wose, no kusuma kuwulajila u wuswanu wayo.
46003014	Ne cinhu co cose cono u munhu yacitumamila, mu wuzenga mu musinji wuwo, hono cisume kuwukangalila u moto wuwo, u munhu yuyo nayo kolobocela i cihumbilizwa cakwe,
46003015	ninga cinhu cono yacizenjela, hono cize citakamile mu moto, u munhu yuyo nayo si kocituga i cihumbilizwa cakwe yaye, langa u munhu yuyo mweneco, koloponywa nha kotya munhu mono yatijile ku wulawa mu moto.
46003016	Alu, si mumanyile vyono anye, yo nyenye mono muli Nyumba yo Mulungu, na vyono u Muhe wo Mulungu yekaye muli nyenye.
46003017	Holeka u munhu hono yayihodanje Nyumba yo Mulungu, u Mulungu nayo komuhodanga u munhu yuyo, hambi Nyumba yo Mulungu nha yelile, nayo Nyumba yiyo yo Mulungu, yo nyenye mo weneco.
46003018	Mbeka mulece kwikonga! U munhu wo wose wa muli nyenye hono yehwese nha vyono yena mahala, kumbe ho mahala ge ciyinze-yinze du, yili ciba u munhu yuyo hono yewone nha mulele, ho yasume kuwa ne mahala ge mbeka.
46003019	Hambi i mahala ge ciyinze-yinze, nha wulele du ha mwande yo Mulungu. Nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga gakutya, “U Muwaha kawebataga we mahala, mu wusugu wawo.”
46003020	Na kanyhi, “U Muwaha yamanyile nha vyono i mahweso ga we mahala, si gakwiliye cinji.”
46003021	Holeka u munhu yalece kwilumbila wanhu. Hambi vyose nha vyenyu.
46003022	Hono Pawulo, hamba Apolo, hamba Kefa, hamba yinze, hamba u wumipe, hamba lifwa, zinghani za lulu, hamba zono zikuza, zizi zose nha zenyu.
46003023	Langa anye nanye muli wa Kilisito, nayo Kilisito yo wo Mulungu.
46004001	Ale, u munhu yaciwonaje ase nha cili wetumami wa Kilisito mono cakozwa i zinghani ze cinyele zo Mulungu.
46004002	Na hoyili nghani monga du yono yimunojeye u munhu wo wose mono yapegwa u mulimo wuwu, nayo yoyi, yawe mwihuwilwa.
46004003	Kuli'ne, nene no mweneco, si nghani yaye hono ning'anizwe nanye, hamba ne ning'aniza ye cimunhumunhu, ninga ane no mweneco, si nghwiling'aniza cinji co cose yaye.
46004004	I ciselinji cangu, si cikundajila lisutya lyo lyose lyono lili muli nene, ninga hamba nhavivyo, si notya ane sina wusutye ku soko yiyo, aa ng'o. Ninga u Muwaha yo yakuning'aniza.
46004005	Holeka mulece kuling'aniza lono vilo vikali si nafika, muzilekaje ziwe nhavivyo sunga u Muwaha kono kolo kuziza. U Mwene kolozigubula zose ze citi zono hundice, nayo kolowanzalika u wuhile wa mu zinhumbula ze wanhu. No munhu wo wose, baho ho kolotujila ililumbo lyono limunojeye, ku wulawa kuli Mulungu.
46004006	Nye, wandugu zangu, zizo zose zono nizilonjile za kuli Apolo, na za kuli nene no mweneco, nha colecezo kuli nyenye. Na mu colecezo cetu ane na Apolo, anye ho musume kuyimanya nhunizo ye nghani ayi yono yikutya nhavi, “Muzikamisaje zono zandikwe.” Halece kuwa na munhu yunji wa muli nyenye, mono kosuma kwilumbila kuli u munhu yumonga, no kumubedegala umuyagwe.
46004007	Hambi nani 'mbi mono yakukuwona agwe nha wuli cinji ha mwande ye wanji? Hamba alu wina ci cici kanyhi cono siwapegwa, alu nhawule kanyhi wukwilumbilila mu cinhu cico, kotya nha munhu mono wukali si napegwa?
46004008	Heya, aluno nhondo mwakondya kwiguta! Alu nhondo mwagolipa! Kanyhi mwaweza watemi lono ase si cinawa! Heya mbeka, yali yiwe viswanu muwe mutemile, nase nhavivyo ho cisume kutemana hamonga nanye.
46004009	Hambi nha yikwijela kuli'ne vyono u Mulungu yacipela ase co watumwa cilejeho ce ndumilizo, ho ciwe nhe wanhu wono watemezwe wawulagwe, hambi nha canozwa kotya nha cili cinhu co kwilolelwa ne yinze yose, hali wamalayika, sunga na hali wanhu.
46004010	Ase cili walele ku soko ya Kilisito, ninga anye muli we mahala ku soko yo wilunze na Kilisito! Ase cisoceye, ninga anye muli vilungo. Anye mukupegwa lilumbo, ninga ase cikubedegalwa.
46004011	Sunga mu cipango cici du, ase cili ne nzala, kanyhi cikaluce, cisina vivwalo, cikubagwa makofi, cisina ihanhu ho kugona.
46004012	Kanyhi cikugazika, no kwituma imilimo kwe miwoko yetu co weneco. Na lono cikuligwa, ase cikuwalombela wumoteswe du, na lono cikuwingwa wingwa, ase cikukangalila du,
46004013	na hono wakucivila ko wulambi, ase cikuwapitula kwe cogopo du. Sunga na lulu baha du, ase cikutendelwa nha cili makwe ge yinze du, sunga na kuli wanhu wose, ase cikwijela kotya nha cili cugulu ca takataka du!
46004014	Ane si nghuzandika zizi, ho nimukozenyi cevu, aa ng'o, langa nizandika zizi, ho nimwijizenyi du, anye mo wanangu wendece.
46004015	Ku soko, hamba muwe mwina walezi maelufu mu mikalile yenyu ye Cikilisito, ninga mwina u sogo yenyu yumonga du, hambi mu mikalile ye Cikilisito, nha yo nene mono namulelenyi, mu nzila yo kumuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu.
46004016	Ku soko yiyi, holeka nghumunenenyi, munyigaje nene.
46004017	Si holeka nimutuma Timoteyo kuli nyenye. U mwene, yo mwanangu u mwendece wangu, kanyhi yo munhu mwihuwilwa muli Muwaha. U mwene, komukumbucizenyi nyenye, nzila yono ane no Pawulo nghuyityatya mu mikalile yangu ye Cikilisito, i nzila yono nghuyijiza ihanhu hose mu makanisa gose.
46004018	Ale, alu wanji wa muli nyenye, wanza kwidunhumula, wakwihwesa mba vyono ane sinokuza kanyhi kuko kwenyu.
46004019	Ninga mumanye vyono, hono u Muwaha yende, nokuza kwenyu lulu, na kolo nghuza, baho langa, ho nolokwiwonelela no mweneco, kanyhi hamba si nokwiwonelela cico du ca vyono, wakulonga wawo wono wakwidunhumula, langa nosuma kuviwona sunga ne vilungo vyono wena.
46004020	Hambi u wutemi wo Mulungu, nha si wuli mu nghani du za bwete, langa mu vilungo.
46004021	Alu mokwenda ya hayi? Nimuzizenyi nina ne nghome, hamba nimuzizenyi ne nhumbula yo wendo no wupolo?
46005001	Ko zili nghani za mbeka, vyono, mowuli wusenyha muli nyenye, kanyhi no wusenyha wuwo wono mwina nawo, wo wusenyha wubi muno muno, wono wukali hamba si nawa muli wanhu wono wakali si namumanya Mulungu. Nonjelwa vyono u muyenyu yunji, ati yekaye no mugolece wo sogwe!
46005002	Alu mosuma nhawule kwilumba? Mbeka, yali yinojeye kuli'nye kulila, na yuyo mono yetumile zizo, yinojeye yawuswe muli'nye.
46005003	Nane ku lubavu lwangu, hamba niwe nili kutali nanye mu muwili, ninga mu muhe nili baho hamonga nanye, na vyono kotya nha nili baho, holeka nakondya kumuling'aniza u munhu yuyo, mono yetumile zinghani zizo ze cevu.
46005004	Holeka lono mweza kwihanguliziza hamonga mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu, nane lono kotya nili hamonga nanye mu Muhe, kwe vilungo vyo Muwaha wetu Yesu,
46005005	ale, mumupelaje Setani u munhu yuyo, u muwili wakwe ho wuhodangwe, ninga nhumbula yakwe, ho yisume kuponywa, mwi'zuwa alilya lyo Muwaha.
46005006	Nye wayangu, u wilumbe wenyu wuwo, si wuswanu hamba hadodo! Alu si mumanyile vyono cisase cidodo du, cikuwa kutajila cisase mwibumundwa lyose lyo wusaje?
46005007	Holeka mwiyezaje no kutajila lukulu cisase ce katali, ho muwe yibumundwa yipya lyono lisina cisase, nha vyono yinojeye kuli'nye muwe. Hambi Kilisito, i Pasaka yetu, nha yakondya kulavywa yikumbiko.
46005008	Holeka cinoze sikukuu mbaha, ninga yilece kuwa mu cisase acilya ce katali, i cisase co wubi no wavu, langa ku ndigwa yono si yisasize, i ndigwa yo wuswanu ne mbeka.
46005009	Namwandicilenyi mu baluwa yangu, vyono mulece kuhanga ne wanhu wasenyha.
46005010	Ninga mbeka, si vyono nalongaga i wanhu wose wasenyha wono wali mononze, i wabuguci, ne walambilambi na wono wahembaga vihwani. Ku soko vyono, hono musace kuwelega wawo wose, yowa yimunojelenyi anye, muyihamile lukulu yinze yiyi!
46005011	Ninga ane cono natunilizaga mu wandice wangu nha coci, mulecele lukulu kuhanga na we ndugu Mukilisito, u musenyha, mubuguci, mono yakuhemba vihwani, musonjeza wayagwe, mugalo'jimbi, kanyhi mulambilambi. U munhu we liwala lilyo, hamba kulya du, mulece kulya hamonga nayo.
46005012	Wulenyi, hambi yo nghani yangu nene niwaling'anize wanhu wono wali kunze? Aa, ng'o, awo u Mulungu yo kowaling'aniza. Hamba alu ma, anye nyo weneco si munojeye muwaling'anize i Wakilisito wayenyu?
46005013	Ale mumuwinjilaje kutali muli'nye yuyo u munhu mubi!
46006001	Alu nhawule muyenyu wa muli nyenye, yadahile kwijelela kumusitaka u mukilisito muyagwe, kuli mahakama ge wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, hamba si yakusuma kumusitaka kuli wanhu wo Mulungu?
46006002	Hamba si mumanyile lo, vyono i wanhu wo Mulungu wo woloyiling'aniza i yinze? Alu hono kumbe yinze yololing'anizwa na nyenye, alu ku soko ci muwe si munojeye kwiyiling'aniza hamba muli izinghani zi ndodo ndodo?
46006003	Alo si mumanyile vyono colowaling'aniza wamalayika? Wulenyi, ho sicosuma kuziling'aniza zinghani ze mikalile ye nhondo zose!
46006004	Alu anye lono mwatuga mazozo nyenye wose, muli ze mikalile ye nhondo zose, hanyuma kanyhi mukuwacema i wahakimu, i wanhu wono si wakulikumya hamba likanisa wo wawe wahakimu wenyu?
46006005	Mbeka yo nghani ya cevu kuli'nye! Alu hongo wo wutya, hasina munhu hamba monga muli nyenye, mono kowa ne mahala go kusuma kuling'aniza muli wawo Wakilisito?
46006006	Alu du mbeka weza nha wuzowele wenyu kuli we ndugu, yakumutegula u nduguye kuli mahakama, kanyhi hamba nhavivyo, kuli wanhu wono si wehuwiye.
46006007	I mbeka du, wuwo u wisitace wenyu wono mukwisitaka nyenye wose, wukulajila vyono anye mwasumilwa lukulu! Alu wulenyi, si yali yiwe yili ciba kuli'nye hono mutendelwe yono si yili ling'ani? Kanyhi si yali yiwe viswanu muno kuli'nye, hono wamubocenyi i zisawo zenyu.
46006008	Alu kanyhi yo nyenye mono mukuwatendela vibi wandugu zenyu nyenye wose, kanyhi no kwihiziza nyenye wose munhu na munhu muyagwe!
46006009	Hamba si mumanyile lo, vyono i wanhu wabi, si wosuma kuwuhala u wutemi wo Mulungu? Ale, mulece kwikonga! Iwanhu wono wekalilaga mu mikalile yo wusenyha, na wono wahembaga vihwani, na wono wakusulumila i walume wayawo no kugona nawo, hamba wono wakwitendya,
46006010	hambe wahizi, hambe i wabuguci, hamba i wagalo'jimbi, na wono wendile kuwaheha i wayawo, ne walambilambi wose, wawo wose si wosuma kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
46006011	Nanye wanji muli nyenye vyo mwali, ninga aluno mwahovugwa mu wubi, mukanozwa muwe mwelile, no kusiwanulwa so Mulungu, mukalamulwa no Mulungu, mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito na ko Muhe wo Mulungu wetu.
46006012	Lunji munhu kosuma kutya, “Kuli'ne vyose viswanu.” Heya, ninga si vyono vyose vyowa vikwiliye, aa ng'o. Ninga nghuvumila vyono kuli'ne hasina cinhu cinji co mwiko, ninga hamba yiwe yili nhavivyo, ane si nendile kutemwa na cinhu co cose.
46006013	Kosuma kutya, “Indigwa yili so yinda, nayo yinda yili so ndigwa.” Heya, ninga u Mulungu, kolovihodanga vyose vyono vyejete. Ninga u muwili wo munhu si wawumbwa ho witumamilwe mu wusenyha, aa ng'o, langa wawumbwa ho wumwitumamile u Muwaha, nayo u Muwaha so muwili.
46006014	Ale u Mulungu mono yamuzukula u Muwaha muli wafu, kocizukula na sese nhavivyo kwe vilungo vyakwe.
46006015	Hamba si mumanyile lu, vyono i miwili yenyu vyo vilunzwa vyo muwili wa Kilisito? Hamba mukwihwesa vyono nosuma kucisola i cilunzwa cimonga co muwili wa Kilisito, no kucinoza cilunze no muwili wo musenyha? Hamba hadodo bwete!
46006016	Hambi nha mumanyile vyono, mono vikwilunza no musenyha, yakuwa muwili monga nayo, nha vyono yandicigwe, “Nawo wawo wejete, wowa muwili monga.”
46006017	Ninga kuli mono vikwilunza no Muwaha yuyo vikuwa muhe monga nayo.
46006018	Holeka muwulecelaje lukulu u wusenyha. U wubi wunji wose wunozezwaga kunze yo muwili, ninga u musenyha, kawunozezaga u wubi wuwo mu muwili wakwe mweneco.
46006019	Wulenyi, si mumanyile vyono i miwili yenyu yo Nyumba yo Muhe Mono Yelile mono yali mugati mwenyu, mono mwamubocela kulawa kuli Mulungu? Holeka alu nanye, si muli wenyu mo weneco.
46006020	Mwagulwa ko wuguzi wukamu. Holeka ku soko yiyo, muyitumamilaje i miwili yenyu ko lukumyo lo Mulungu.
46007001	Ale, alu kuli azilya zono mwandika, Heya yili viswanu hono munhu yekale si yatolile,
46007002	ninga alu ku soko ye zimbali zo wusenyha, holeka yinojeye u mulume wo wose, yaweze no mugolece wakwe mweneco, no mucekulu wo wose yaweze no mulume wakwe mweneco.
46007003	Nayo u mulume yafisilize yono yimunojeye kuli mugolece wakwe, u mugolece nayo nhavivyo, yafisilize yono yimunojeye kuli mulume wakwe.
46007004	U mugolece si kowusuma u muwili wakwe yali wene du, langa u mulume wakwe yo kowusuma, nhavivyo nayo u mulume, si kowusuma u muwili wakwe yali wene, langa mugolece wakwe yo kowusuma.
46007005	Mulece kwiyima kuli yono munojeye, langa hono muwe mulagane kunoza nhavivyo kwa cidaha du, ho mwiwuyile kanyhi lwa kamonga, ho Setani yalece kumuletelenyi majelo ku soko yo wusocele wenyu.
46007006	Zono nghusaka kumulonjelenyi alu, zikuwa nha suguzi du, hamba si nghutemya yilajilizo yaye.
46007007	Ane nali nyende wanhu wose wawe nha vyono ninha nene, ninga alu munhu wo wose yena cipegwa cono cisimajiye no muyagwe kulawa kuli Mulungu, yunji yena cipegwa aci, na yunji acilya.
46007008	Alu, awalya wono wakali si natola, sunga na awalya wono wafwiliywe, ane nghuwalonjela vyono yali yiwe viswanu muno muno kuli wene, hono wali wasume kujendelela kwikala nha vyono ane ninha.
46007009	Ninga hamba nha vivyo, u munhu hono yawone si yakusuma kwiyimila, hodu yatole, hambi nha yili ciba muno kutola, si nho kwaka no wusulumizi.
46007010	Langa kuli awalya wono wetolile, nina yilajilizo kuli wene, kanyhi hamba si yilajilizo lyangu nene, langa lyo Muwaha. U mugolece yalece kwileka no mulume wakwe,
46007011	na hono vilece nayo, hodu yekalaje yalece kutolwa kanyhi, hamba hono si nha vivyo, ciba vilamule no mulume wakwe. No mulume nayo yalecele lukulu kumupela talaka u mugolece wakwe.
46007012	Kuli awalya i wanji, (nene no mweneco hamba si Muwaha) nghutya nhavi, u mulume Mukilisito, hono yawe yena mugolece mono siyanehuwila, ninga yuyo mugolece yawe kuvumila kujendelela du kwikalana nayo, ale hodu yalece kumupela talaka.
46007013	Na hono u mugolece wa cikilisito, nayo yawe yena u mulume mono si yehuwiye, no mulume yuyo yakuvumila kujendelela kwikalana nayo, hodu, yalece kumupela talaka u mulume wakwe.
46007014	Ku soko u mulume yuyo mono si yehuwiye, kosuma kubocelwa kuli Mulungu ku soko yo wilunze no mugolece, no mugolece yuyo nayo mono si yehuwiye kabocelwaga no Mulungu ku soko yo wilunze no mulume wakwe. Yali yiwe si nhavivyo, i wana wawo wali wawe si wo Mulungu, ninga aluno nawo wakuwa wana wo Mulungu.
46007015	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ayulya mono si yehuwiye, hono yasace kumuleka ayulya u Mukilisito, hodu yadahile kumuleka du. Alu baho langa, yuyo u Mukilisito we cilume hamba yuyo we cicekulu yakuwa si muwopwe kanyhi. Hambi u Mulungu nha yamucemenyi anye, ho mwikale mu mikalile yo mulamu.
46007016	Alu nagwe go we ciyaya we Cikilisito, kosuma nhawule kumanya nha vyono si kosuma kumuponya u mulume wako? Hamba agwe nagwe go mulume Mukilisito, kosuma nhawule kumanya nha vyono si kosuma kumuponya u mugolece wako?
46007017	Munhu wo wose yimunojeye yekale mu mikalile nha vyono vinha vipegwa vyono u Muwaha yamugawila, na kanyhi nha vyono yacemwa no Mulungu. Na lili lye'lajilizo lyangu kuli makanisa gose.
46007018	Na hone munhu yacemwa lono yali yakondya kwalama ale, yalece kwinoza nha kotya munhu mono si yalame, na hono lono yacemelwa yali yakali si nalama, hodu yalece kwalama.
46007019	Hambi kwalama hamba wula kwalama nha si cinji yaye, cinhu ciwaha, kwibata i malajilizo go Mulungu du.
46007020	Holeka munhu wo wose, yekalaje nha vyono yali yenha mu cipango cono yacemelwa.
46007021	Wule, agwe wali wuli muwanda lono wacemelwa? Sawa! Wulece kwihwelela, ninga hono wutuje cilejeho co kuwopolwa, ale wucitumamilaje cilejeho cico.
46007022	Ku soko vyono yuyo mono yacemwa no Muwaha akuno ho muwanda, ayo yuyo kawezaga munhu mwelecele, wo Muwaha. Sunga yuyo nayo nha vivyo, mono yacemwa akuno ho mwelecele ayo kawezaga mwitumami wa Kilisito.
46007023	Anye wose mwagulwa ko wuguzi, holeka mulecele lukulu kuwa muli wawanda we wanhu kanyhi.
46007024	Nye nyo wandugu zangu, ale wose muli nyenye, munhu na lwakwe yekalaje no Mulungu nha vyono yali yenha mwi'pango lono yacemelwa.
46007025	Ale, kuli ze wahinza na kuli wono si wakusaka kutola hamba kutolwa, ane sina lilajilizo lyono likulawa kuli Muwaha, ninga nghulavya lihala lyangu du, ane mono so lusungu lo Muwaha, nghwiliye kuwa mwihuwilwa.
46007026	Ale, ku soko yo wugaye wono wuli baho lulu, ane nali kuwona vyono, yowa viswanu hono munhu yekale nha vyono ninha nene.
46007027	Alu agwe hono wutolile, wulece kusaka kwileka no mugolece wako kanyhi. Nagwe hono wuwe si wutolile, ale hodu wulece kusaka kutola kanyhi.
46007028	Ninga na hono wutole, si kowa wetuma wubi yaye, no muhinza nayo nhavivyo hono yatolwe, si kowa yetuma wubi yaye. Wawo langa wono wetolile, wotuga magaziko ga mono yinze yiyi, ninga ane ku lwangu, si nali nyende zizo zimwaganenyi anye.
46007029	Nye wandugu zangu, ane nghusaka kutya nhavi, i cipango cono cisigaye cidodo du. Holeka awalya wono watolile, wekalaje nha kotya wono si watolile,
46007030	nawo wono wakulila, waweze nha kotya wono wasina wukalale, nawo wono wakusangalala, wawe nha kotya wono si wasangalaye, nawo wono wakugula, wawe nha wono wasina cinji,
46007031	nawo wono wakipiganziza za mono'nze yiyi, ale wawe nha wono si wakwipiganziza muno zizo. Hambi nha vyono cimanyile, yinze yiyino nha yikupuluta.
46007032	Ninga ane nali nyende anye mulece kuwa na mahwele. U munhu mono yasina mugolece, yuyo kepiganzaga ne milimo yo Muwaha, mu nghango vyono kosuma kumwendeza u Muwaha.
46007033	Ninga u munhu mono yatolile, yuyo kepiganzaga ne zinghani za mononze, mu nghango nha vyono kosuma kumwendeza u mugolece wakwe,
46007034	nayo yakuwa yegawile hanhu hejete. Nayo u mucekulu mono siyatoligwe hamba muhinza, keyipiganzaga ne zinghani zo Muwaha du, ho yasume kwiyilavya nhumbula yakwe no muwili wakwe kuli Muwaha. Ninga u mucekulu mutolwa mwene yakuwa kwipiganza ku so za mononze yiyi munghango nha vyono kosuma kumwendeza u mulume wakwe.
46007035	Nane nghumulonjelenyi zizi ku so cambuzi cenyu mo weneco, na si vyono lunji ane nghumuwicilenyi vimizi, aa ng'o. Ane nghuhila ho muwe no wityatye wono wukwiliye, kanyhi ho musume kumwitumamila u Muwaha ko mutima wumonga no wuhile wumonga.
46007036	Na lono munhu yawone nha vyono si kosuma kumutendela viswanu u mucumba wakwe, hono yalece kumutola, na hono u wusulumizi wakwe wakumukwega, ciba yanoze nha vyono yakusaka, wetole du si vyono kowa yetuma wubi yaye.
46007037	Ninga hono yuyo we cilume yawe yalamula mu nhumbula yakwe yalece kutola, na hono yawe yasumile kwiyimila masulumizi gakwe, kanyhi hono yawe yamanya vyono kokwituma, hodu, yakunoza viswanu muno muno, hono yalece kumutola muhinza yuyo.
46007038	Ku lubavu lunji, yuyo mono yakulamula watozwe na yuyo u muhinza, ale, yakunoza viswanu, nayo mono yakulamula, yalece kumutola, yuyo yakunoza viswanu muno muno.
46007039	U mugolece yakuwa muwopwe no mulume wakwe i vilo vyose lono u mulume wakwe yakali mumi. Ninga u mulume lono yafwe, ale u mugolece yuyo yawopolwa, na hono yende mweneco, kosuma kutolwa no munhu wo wose, soko du yiwe mu nzila ye Cikilisito.
46007040	Ninga nane vyono nghuwona ti, yali yiwe yili ciba muno muno hono yali yasume kwikala nha vivyo du nha vyono yenha. Ane vyo nghuwona, nane nghwihwesa nha vyono nina u Muhe wo Mulungu nhavivilya.
46008001	Aluno kuli i zindigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani, cimanyile nha vyono ase wose cina uwutanje mu mahala, ninga kanyhi u wutanje wuwo, wuwapelaga wanhu wawo no widunhumuzi, ninga u wendo, wuzengaga.
46008002	Ale, holeka mono yakwihwesa nha yamanyile cinji, i mbeka, yuyo si yamanyile cinji co cose nha vyono yimunojeye kumanya.
46008003	Ninga u munhu mono yamwendile u Mulungu, yuyo langa yo yamanyice kuli mwene.
46008004	Holeka kuli i zindigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani, ase cimanyile, vyono vihwani si cinji mono yinze, ase cimanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yumonga du.
46008005	Hamba viwe ho vili vinhu vyono vicemwaga milungu, mu muno mono'nze, hamba ku wulanga, na hamba hawe hoyili milungu mu muno, ne wawaha wenji,
46008006	hamba nhavivyo, kuli'se koyuli Mulungu yumonga du, Baba, u Muwumbi we vinhu vyose, mono sunga na sese nase, cili baha ku soko yakwe. Na kanyhi, koyuli u Muwaha yumonga du, yo Yesu Kilisito, mono nayo mu nzila yakwe, vinhu vyose vikawumbwa, na mu nzila yakwe na sese nase mo cikuwumipila.
46008007	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, si wose wono wena u wumanye wuwuno. Hambi nha howali wanhu wanji wono wavizowela i vihwani, wanhu wono sunga nalu, lono wakulya zindigwa, wakuziwona kotya nha ndigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani. Na vyono viselinji vyawo visoceye, wakutipizwa mu viselinji vyawo.
46008008	Ninga ndigwa siyosuma kucitegula behi no Mulungu. Na hamba hono cilece kuyilya, si cocepucilwa na cinji, na hamba hono cilye, si cokonjelezezwa na cinji.
46008009	Ninga mwilanjililaje, u welecele wenyu wuwu, wulece kuwanoza wono wena u wihuwilo wono wusoceye, wagwile mu wubi.
46008010	Hambi u munhu mono i ciselinji cakwe cisoceye, hono yakuwone agwe mono wina wizuce wukulya zindigwa zizo mugati ye cikumbicilo ce vihwani, wule, si kowa wamupela vilungo vyo kulya zindigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani?
46008011	Na hobaho yuyo u nduguyo u musocele, mono Kilisito yafwa ku soko yakwe, kokwajilila ku soko yo wumanye wako.
46008012	Na hono muwasutizye wandugu zenyu nhavivyo, no kuvitajila makomele viselinji vyawo, vyono visoceye, mowa mwamusutizya Kilisito.
46008013	Holeka hono ndigwa yiwe yikuwa kumuletela ndugu yangu wugwe, hodu sinolila lukulu nyama, ho ndece kumugwisiza ndugu yangu mu wubi.
46009001	Alu ane si nili mwelecele? Hamba lunji si nili mutumwa? Hamba lunji si namuwona Yesu u Muwaha wetu? Alu anye nanye ma, si yo nyenye mono muli mana go mulimo wangu ku soko yo Muwaha?
46009002	Hamba niwe si nili mutumwa kuli wanhu wanji, ninga ane nili mutumwa kuli'nye. Anye nyenye, wo wuhomelezi wo wutumwa wangu, ku soko yo wilunze wenyu no Muwaha.
46009003	Ninga i nghani yangu kuli awalya wono wakumbeza nha yoyi,
46009004	Wulenyi, alu ase cisina i ling'ani yo kupegwa ndigwa ne malenga ku soko yo mulimo wetu wono cikwituma?
46009005	Hamba ase cisina ling'ani yo kujendana mu muhinzo, hamonga no munhu wo wose we cicekulu, nha vyono wanozaga i watumwa wanji ne wanduguze wo Muwaha sunga na Petelo?
46009006	Hamba yo nene du hamonga na Balanaba, mono yicinojeye camule citume milimo, ho cisume kwiyitujila visakwa vyetu lo?
46009007	Hamba alo musilikaleci mono kelipilaga mweneco so witume wakwe? Hamba nani mwene mono kalimaga u mugunda wakwe we mizabibu, kanyhi ho yalece kulya i mikalo yayo? Hamba yo nani mono kadimaga mitugo, kanyhi ho yalece kung'wa i mele gazo?
46009008	Wulenyi, anye mukwihwesa ane nghuzilonjela zizi mu nzila ye cimunhumunhu du? Hamba wulenyi, no Wulajilize nawo, si wukulonga nhavivyo?
46009009	Hambi mu Wulajilize wa Musa nha yikutya nhavi, “Wulece kuyiwopa ng'ombe ku mulomo wayo, mwipango lono yikukutaza kutwanga wuhemba mu cuga.” Alu baho wo wutya u Mulungu yakulonga 'mbi i zing'ombe?
46009010	Hamba yalongaga ku soko yetu, lono yalonjela nhavivyo? Na mbeka azi zandikwa ku soko yetu sese, ku soko vyono ayulya mono yakulima, na ayulya mono yakududula, wose vyono wejete, nha wanojeye ling'ani yo kuwa no witumbilo, vyono wotuga.
46009011	Alu hono ase cahadika mbeyu ye cimuhe muli nyenye, hambi yowa nghani ya wizine, hono cidudule muli nyenye cambuzi ca ze ciyinze-yinze?
46009012	Alu hono wawe wanji wena ling'ani yo kuzilanjilila zizo ku wulawa muli nyenye, wulenyi, ase ma, cisina ling'ani kuciza wene wawo? Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ase si cayitumamila ling'ani yiyo. Langa ase cakangalila du muli vyose, ho cilece kuluwicila cikobazo co cose cilya, u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.
46009013	Alo si mumanyile vyono, wono wetumamaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, watugaga ndigwa yawo mu wulawa mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na vyono kanyhi, nawo wono walavizyaga vilavywa vyawo mu cikumbicilo watugaga nawo lifungu lye vilavywa vivyo?
46009014	Nayo u Muwaha yalajiliza nhavivyo du, vyono nawo i waganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, yiwanojeye watuje indigwa yawo ku wulawa mu Luganuzi Luswanu.
46009015	Ninga alu ane si netumamila hamba monga ya muli zizo. Hamba si nghwandika ho niyituje ling'ani hamba monga ya muli zizo, ninga kuli'ne, yali yiwe yili ciba hono nali nifwe, si nho kumunoza munhu wo wose yawone nha vyono nghwilumba bwete.
46009016	Na hono yiwe ane nghuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, ayo yo si nghani yo kwilumbila, langa wo mulimo wangu du, wono napegwa. Holeka, woyi he kuli ne, hono ndece kuluganula Luganuzi Luswanu!
46009017	Na hono nali niwe neyihagulila nene no mweneco u mulimo wuwu, haco nali niwe nanjiliye ho ndipwe musahala, ninga alu vyono nghuwituma u mulimo wuwu nha munhu mono nojeye niwitume, alu baho wo wutya, wo mulimo wangu du wono napegwa niwitume.
46009018	Alu u musahala wangu ma, co cici? U musahala wangu'ne, co cicino cilejeho cono napegwa co kuluganula bwete u Luganuzi Luswanu, hamba kudaya ling'ani yo yose yono yinojeye so kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu.
46009019	Holeka hamba ane niwe si nili muwanda wa munhu wo wose, ninga nenoza ho niwe muwanda wa wanhu wose, ho sume kumutujila Kilisito wanhu wenji nha vyono yosumika.
46009020	Ku Wayahudi, nghawa nha Muyahudi ho niwatuje i Wayahudi, hamba yiwe ane no mweneco si nili hasi yo Wulajilize, ninga nghawa nha munhu mono yali hasi yo Wulajilize kuli wene, ho niwatuje wene wono wali hasi yo Wulajilize.
46009021	Na kuli awalya nawo wono wali kunze yo Wulajilize, nako nane nghuwa nhe weneco, kunze yo Wulajilize, ho sume kuwatuga wawo nawo wono wali kunze yo Wulajilize. Ninga si vyono ane no mweneco si niwutyatyaga u Wulajilize wo Mulungu, hambi nha mbopigwe ne lilajilizo lya Kilisito.
46009022	Kuli awalya wono wasoceye, ane nane nghawa nha mono yasoceye, ho niwatuje wawo wene wono wasoceye. Nghuwega wanhu wose vyono wenha, ho sume kuwaponezya mu nzila yoyose wanji wa muli wene.
46009023	Nane nghuzinoza zizi zose ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, ho sume kuhanga u wulugutwe wayo.
46009024	Alu si mumanyile vyono mu ciwanza ce midawalo, hamba wawe wawalya wono wakwisumaniza u lumangho, wose wakumangha, ninga hakuwezaga ho yuli yumonga du mono yakupegwa zawadi?
46009025	I wedawazi wose, wewikanizizaga mu nzila yo wizoweleze, hamonga ne cogopo cose, ninga hamba nhavivyo, wene wanozaga nhavivyo, ho watuje u mukumbo wono wuhodanjikaga! Ninga ase cikunoza nhavivyo, ho cituje u mukumbo wono wikalaga cibitilila.
46009026	Ale, nane nhavivyo vyo manghaga, akuno nina no wuhile wo wusume, holeka nane nihwanile nho mutowa zingumi, mono si katowaga zingumi mu mbeho caka du.
46009027	Nane nghuwuzowelezeza u muwili wangu mu nzila ye magayo, no kuwunoza ho wuwe wuceye, nene no mweneco ho nize ndece kulemwa, lono kumbe nakondya kuwaganulila wanji.
46010001	Nye mo wandugu zangu, ane nghusaka anye mumanye vyono walezi wose wali wali hasi ye livunde, na vyono kanyhi wose walowoka i lilenga lililya, wapolile.
46010002	Na wose wakabaputizizwa mu wumonga na Musa, mwi'vunde lililya ne lilenga lililya.
46010003	Na wose kanyhi, wakayilya ndigwa yiyilya ye cimuhe.
46010004	Na kanyhi wakang'wa ne cing'wegwa cicilya ce cimuhe, hambi nha wang'wa mu wulawa mwi'bwe lililya lye cimuhe lyono lyawatyatyaga, ne libwe lyeneco lilyo, lyali yo Kilisito mweneco.
46010005	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wenji wa muli wene si wamwendeza u Mulungu, ne mivimba yawo yikeyagazwa caka mu nyika.
46010006	Alu i zinghani zizo zose, zali nha cihwanicizo du kuli'se, zikucisugula ase ho cilece kuwusulumila u wubi, nha vyono wakawusulumila wene.
46010007	Kanyhi mulece kuwa wahemba vihwani, nha vyono wali wenha wayawo wanji, nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “I wanhu wakekala ho walye no kung'wa, wakenuka wedawale.”
46010008	Hamba cilece kwiyinjiza mu wusenyha, nha vyono wayawo wanji wakasenyha, nawo wakagwa wanhu makumi mejete elufu mwizuwa limonga.
46010009	Kanyhi, cilece kumujela u Muwaha, nha vyono wanji wakamujela, nawo wakawulagwa ne zinzoka.
46010010	Hamba mulece kumung'ung'ulicila nha vyono wanji wamung'ung'ulicila, nawo wakawulagwa wose no Muwulaji!
46010011	Ale, zinghani zizo zono zawejelela wene, zaweza yifundo kuli wanji, nazo zandikwa ho zicisugule sese, mono cili behi ne vilo vya ku ndumo.
46010012	Holeka mono yakwiwona yemile yakamile, yalanjilile yalece kugwa.
46010013	I majelo gono gakondya kumuzizenyi, go majelo ge nhondo zose du kuli munhu. Ninga umwene Mulungu, yo mwihuwilwa, nayo si kosuma kumulecenyi ho mujelwe kuciza vyono mosuma, ninga hamonga ne majelo gago, u mwene komupelenyi ne vilungo vyo kugakangalilila, sunga ne nzila yono yomukozenyi mu majelo gago mupolile.
46010014	Holeka ku soko yiyo mo wendece wangu, mwilegaje mu wuhemba vihwani.
46010015	Ane nghulongana nanye nhe wanhu we mahala, holeka mwihagulilaje nyo weneco muli zizo zono nghulonga.
46010016	Na lono cikumulumba u Mulungu mu nzila yiyilya ye cikombe co wumoteswe, wulenyi si cikuwa kuhanga i sakami ya Kilisito? Na lono cikuwubegula u mukate ma, si cikuwa kuhanga u muwili wa Kilisito?
46010017	Nha vyono mukate wuwo wo monga, ale, ase nase hamba ciwe nha cili wenji, ninga cikunoza muwili monga, vyono ase wose cikuhanga u mukate wuwo du wumonga.
46010018	Ale, ta, cisole i cihwanicizo ce Wayahudi weneco, kuli wene, wono walizaga vyono vikumbiciligwe mu cikumbicilo, wakondya kwilunza na cico icikumbicilo.
46010019	Alu nghusaka nonje cici? Wo wutya ndigwa yono yikumbiciywe vihwani yikuwa yili cinhu cinji 'mbi, kuciza ndigwa? Hamba vivyo vihwani wule, vikuwa vinhu vye mbeka kuciza vihwani?
46010020	Hamba hadodo! Nane yono nghulonga yoyi, i makumbiko gono wakumbikaga wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, wakumbikaga masetani, hamba si Mulungu ng'o. Ninga si nendile anye muhangahanje ne masetani.
46010021	Si mosuma kung'wela i cikombe co Muwaha, hamonga ne cikombe ce masetani, hamba si mosuma kuhanga mu meza yo Muwaha hamonga ne meza ye masetani.
46010022	Hamba cikuhila kumunoza u Muwaha yawone wivu? Hongo mukwihwesa ase cili vilungo si nho mwene?
46010023	Kuli'ne ivinhu vyose visina mwiko, ninga hamba nhavivyo, si vyose vyono vikwiliye. Vinhu vyose visina mwiko ninga si vyose vyono vizengaga.
46010024	Ninga u munhu yalece kwilondolela cambuzi cakwe mweneco, langa i cambuzi co muyagwe.
46010025	Ale, mweze kulya cinhu co cose cono cikuguzwa mu sokoni, ninga mulece kuwuza wuza ku soko ye viselinji vyenyu nyo weneco,
46010026	hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Yinze sunga na vyose vyono vili mumo, yo sawo yo Muwaha Mulungu.”
46010027	Holeka umunhu mono si yehuwiye, hono yamucemelenyi, nanye hono muvumile kubita, ale, mulye du vyose vyono komutenjelenyi, ninga mulece kuwuza wuza ku soko ye viselinji vyenyu.
46010028	Langa hono munhu yunji yamulonjelenyi yatye, “I zindigwa zizino zikumbicilwa vihwani.” Ale hodu mulece kulya ku soko ya yuyo mono yazize kumulonjelenyi, hamonga na ku soko ye ciselinji, holeka mulece kulya.
46010029	Nghutya vyono “Kusoko ye ciselinji, si ciselinji cenyu nyenye, aa ng'o, langa ciselinji ca yuyo mono yazize kumulonjelenyi.” Lunji mowuza mutye, “Kusoko ci welecele wangu wuwe wuli muli ciselinji ca munhu yunji?
46010030	Alu hono ane nghuyilya i ndigwa yiyo na akuno nghumulumba u Mulungu, alu ku soko ci wanji wasume kuhosa ku soko ye ndigwa yono ane nghondizye kumulumbila u Mulungu?”
46010031	Holeka muli yo yose yono mukwituma, hono yiwe kulya zindigwa, hamba kung'wa, ale mwitumaje zose ku soko yo lukumyo lo Mulungu.
46010032	Mulece kuwa cikobazo kuli Wayahudi, hamba kuli wono si Wayahudi, hamba mwi'kanisa lyo Mulungu.
46010033	Ale, wose muweze nha vyono ninha nene, ane nghujela kuwendeza wanhu wose mu zinzila zose, hamba kulondola cambuzi cangu no mweneco, langa nghulondola cambuzi ce wanhu wose, ho waponywe.
46011001	Ale munyigaje nene nha vyono ane nane nghumwiga Kilisito.
46011002	Nghumulumbenyi muno muno vyono mukunghumbucila, na vyono kanyhi muzibate muno na zizilya zono nghamulajilizenyi.
46011003	Ninga nhavivilya, nendile mumanye vyono Kilisito yo Muwaha kuli mulume wo wose, na kanyhi vyono u mulume nayo yo muwaha kuli mugolece wakwe nayo Mulungu yo Muwaha kuli Kilisito.
46011004	Holeka u mulume wo wose mono yakuhemba, hamba yakuganula nghani yo Mulungu akuno yagubicize no mutwe wakwe, ale yuyo yakumubedegala Kilisito.
46011005	No mucekulu nayo hono yawe yakuhemba hamba yakuganula inghani yo Mulungu akuno si yagubicize mutwe wakwe, nayo yakumubedegala mulume wakwe, nayo mucekulu mono yakunoza nhavivyo, wali sawa du no mucekulu mono yanyonyoye u mutwe wakwe.
46011006	Nayo u mucekulu mono si yagubice u mutwe wakwe, ale yali yiwe yili ciba hono yali yazinyonyole zimvili zakwe. Ninga co cevu kuli mucekulu hono yanyonyolwe zimvili zakwe, hamba kucetwa, holeka yili ciba hono yawugubicize u mutwe wakwe.
46011007	Si viswanu kuli mulume hono yagubicize u mutwe wakwe, vyono u mwene yo hwani yo Mulungu, kanyhi co cilole co lukumyo lo Mulungu, ninga u mucekulu, co cilole no lukumyo lo mulume.
46011008	U mulume yo si yalawa mo mucekulu, langa u mucekulu yo yalawa muli mulume.
46011009	Kanyhi u mulume yo siyawumbwa ku soko yo mucekulu, langa u mucekulu yo yawumbwa ku soko yo mulume.
46011010	Yo yikuleka u mucekulu kagubicizaga u mutwe wakwe, ho ciwe co citanjilo cono cikulajila vyono u mwene yali hasi yo wulajilize wo mulume wakwe, na kanyhi ku so Wamalayika.
46011011	Hamba nhavivyo hali Muwaha, u mucekulu, si cinji yaye lono hasina mulume, nayo u mulume si cinji yaye lono hasina mucekulu.
46011012	Nha vyono u mucekulu yalawa muli mulume, yo nhavivyo kanyhi u mulume nayo kalelwaga no mucekulu, navyo vyose vilawaga kuli Mulungu.
46011013	Ale mulamule nyo weneco, wulenyi yimunojeye u mucekulu yamulombe Mulungu akuno ho siyavwalile cinji mu mutwe wakwe?
46011014	Hambe miwumbile yeneco du yilajilaga calinze vyono u mulume hono yawe yena mvwili nhali co cevu kuli mwene,
46011015	ninga kuli we cicekulu hono yawe yena mvwili nhali, lo lukumyo kuli mwene, vyono yapegwa zimvwili zakwe ziwe nhali ho ziwe nha vivwalo kuli mwene.
46011016	Na hono munhu wo wose yasace kuleta wiwanganile mu nghani yiyi, ale yamanye vyono ase cisina moto wunji, hamba sunga ne makanisa go Mulungu du nago gasina moto wunji.
46011017	Na lono nghali nghumupelenyi i malajilizo gaga, si nosuma hamba hadodo kumulumbizenyi ku soko vyono u wihangulize wenyu anye nyo Wakilisito, wukuleta wambuce du, si nha cambuzi.
46011018	Mwamulizo wa zose, ane nghuhulika vyono, lono mwehanguliza hamonga, gakwijela matemanuko muli nyenye. Nane kunji nghwihuwila hadodo,
46011019	hambi nha vyo yinojeye mahweso gono gesimajiye gawe gali muli nyenye ho wasume kwijela wono wakamile.
46011020	I mbeka, heya mukwihanguliza hamonga, ninga mukwihanguliza si so wulye we ndigwa yo Muwaha!
46011021	Ku soko lono mukulya, munhu wo wose muli nyenye yakwenda kulya i ndigwa yakwe du mweneco, sunga wanji muli nyenye wakuwa wadabuce du, na akuno wanji wagalile!
46011022	Alu mwene, si mukusuma kulya no kung'wa mu zikaya zenyu? Hamba, ma, mukulibedegala i likanisa lyo Mulungu, no kuwapela cevu wawo wono wasina cinji? Alu mukusaka nimulonjelenyi nitye wule? Nimukumyenyi ku soko ye nghani yiyi? Aa ng'o hamba hadodo!
46011023	Hambi ane nha nabocela kuli Muwaha i malajilizo gagalya gono nghamulecelenyi, vyono mu cilo ci cilya cono u Muwaha yalavizywa, yasola u mukate,
46011024	yakamulumbo Mulungu, yakawubegula yakatya, “Awu wo muwili wangu wono weza kulavywa ku soko yenyu mweze kunoza nhavivi, so wukumbucila nene.”
46011025	Nhavivyo kanyhi wali weza kukondya kulya, yakacisola i cikombe yakatya, “Aci co cikombe ce cilagane cipya, cono cikukangazizwa mu sakami yangu. Mweze noza nhavivi ho hose lono mukung'wa, so wukumbucila nene.”
46011026	Hambi nha ho hose lono mukuwulya u mukate wuwu no kucing'wa i cikombe cici, nha mukwanza ze lifwa lyo Muwaha, sunga kono kolo kuziza.
46011027	Holeka u munhu wo wose mono yakuwulya mukate wuwo, hamba kung'wa i cikombe co Muwaha, na akuno si yanojeye, u munhu yuyo kowa no wuhoswe wuwaha muno, ku soko yo muwili ne sakami yo Muwaha.
46011028	Holeka munhu wo wose, yamule yeyihenje mweneco, ho yalye u mukate wuwo no kung'wa i cikombe cico,
46011029	hambi mono yakulya no kung'wa, akuno si yatanjile nhunizo yo muwili wo Muwaha, yuyo yakwiletela u wuling'anizwe wakwe mweneco.
46011030	Holeka mowali wenji muli nyenye wono wasoceye, kanyhi watamwa sunga na wanji wenji wafwiye.
46011031	Holeka hono cali camule kwiyihenga co weneco viswanu, si cali cituje wulipicizwe wo Mulungu wono winha wuwu.
46011032	Ninga lono cikuling'anizwa no kulipicizwa no Muwaha, ho baho cikwijizwa ho ciwe ne cogopo, ho cilece kuling'anizwa hamonga ne yinze.
46011033	Holeka wandugu zangu, lono mukwihanguliza so wulye ndigwa yo Muwaha, yinojeye mweze kwiyilindila nyenye wose.
46011034	Na hone ho yuli yunji mono yadabuce, ale, yalye ku kaya yakwe, ho wihangulize wenyu, wulece kumuletelenyi wuling'anizwe. Ninga kuli ze zinghani zinji, nomutonjenyi viswanu kolo neza kuwa kuko kwenyu.
46012001	Nye wandugu zangu, kuli ze vipegwa vyo Muhe, ane nyendile hono muzimanye viswanu zinghani zizino,
46012002	nanye mumanyile vyono lono mwali si munapituka, mwali mutemigwe no kwajilizwa ne vihwani vye bwete.
46012003	Ninga alu mumanye vyono u munhu wo wose mono yakutongwa no Muhe wo Mulungu si kosuma kutya, “Yesu mulijitwe!” Na kanyhi nha vivyo, u munhu wo wose si kosuma kutya, “Yesu yo Muwaha,” hono yalece kutongwa no Muhe Mono Yelile.
46012004	Ne vipegwa vyo Muhe vili henji, ninga u Muhe mono yakuvilavya yumonga du.
46012005	No witumami nawo wuli henji, ninga u Muwaha munya kwitumamilwa yo yumonga du.
46012006	Kanyhi ko wuli no witumami nawo wuli henji, ninga u Mulungu yo monga du, mono yakulavya ivilungo vyo witume muli wose.
46012007	No munhu wo wose kapegwaga u wuzelu wo Muhe so cambuzi ca wose.
46012008	U Muhe kamupelaga yunji i nghani ye mahala, na yunji i nghani yo wusome, nha vyono yendile u Muhe yuyo du.
46012009	Kanyhi u Muhe yuyo alu, kamupelaga yunji wihuwilo, na yunji kamupelaga cipegwa co kuponya,
46012010	kamupelaga yunji cipegwa co kunoza mapoto, na yunji cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, na yunji cipegwa co wutanje we vipegwa vyono vikulawa mu Muhe na vyono si vyo Muhe, kamupelaga yunji cipegwa co kulonga milonjele ye cijenzi, na yunji kanyhi cipegwa co wulolose.
46012011	Zizo zose yo milimo yo Muhe yuyo du monga, mono kamupelaga munhu na cipegwa cakwe cono cisimajiye, nha vyono yendile mweneco.
46012012	Nha vyono winha u muwili monga, ninga wina wilunzwa vinji, ninga vikunoza muwili monga, ale nhavivyo vyo yinha kuli Kilisito.
46012013	Hambi ase hamba ciwe cili Wayahudi, hamba ciwe si cili Wayahudi, hamba ciwe cili wawanda, hamba ciwe si cili wawanda, wose cabaputizizwa mu Muhe monga du, mu muwili wuwo monga, kanyhi ase wose cikang'weswa yuyo Muhe monga.
46012014	U muwili si vyono wina cilunzwa cimonga du, langa wina vilunzwa vinji.
46012015	Hambi alu hono u mugulu wali wutye, “Vyono ane no mugulu, si nili muwoko, hodu ane si nili wo muwili,” wule, alu mbeka wali wuwe si cilunzwa co muwili? Hamba hadodo!
46012016	Na hono likutu nalyo lyali litye, “Vyono ane si nili liso, hodu ane si nili wo muwili yaye,” wule ku soko yo wulonje wuwo du, hodu likutu lyowa si cilunzwa co muwili? Aa ng'o!
46012017	Na hono lu u muwili wose wali wuwe liso, alu likutu lyali liwe hayi? Na hono u muwili wose wali wuwe likutu, alu u munhu yali yasume nhawule kuhemvya.
46012018	Ninga nha vyono yinha, u Mulungu yaviwika i vilunzwa vivyo mu muwili nha vyono yenda mweneco.
46012019	Na hono i vilunzwa vyose vyali viwe cilunzwa cimonga, alu u muwili ma ho wali wuwe hayi?
46012020	Hambi i mbeka nha yoyi, i vilunzwa vyo muwili vyo vinji, ninga muwili wo monga du.
46012021	Holeka liso si lyosuma kuwutya muwoko, “Agwe si nghukusaka,” hambo mutwe nawo si wosuma kugatya magulu, “Anye, si nghumusacenyi.”
46012022	Hamonga na zizo, yikwijela vyono vilunzwa vivilya vyo muwili vyono vijelaga nha visoceye, alu vivyo kumbe vyo vikusakwa muno muno.
46012023	Kanyhi ne vilunzwa vivilya vyono cikuvihwesa vyono vyo si vikusaka lilumbo, kumbe vyo cikuvikamisa ko wulanjilile wono wucizize muno, ne vilunzwa vyo muwili vyono vijelaga kotya nha si vikwendeza, alu vivyo vyo cikuvidima muno muno,
46012024	na hovili vilunzwa vinji vyono si vikusaka wulanjililwe. U Mulungu mweneco yawuwicila muwili wityatye wayo, no kucinoza cilunzwa cono cicepuciywe, ho ciwe ne lilumbo muno,
46012025	ho halece kuwa na matemanuko mu muwili, langa vilunzwa vyose ho visume kwiyitaza hamonga.
46012026	Na hono cilunzwa cimonga du, cituje wusungu, i vilunzwa vyose vikuwona wusungu hamonga du na hono cituje lilumbo, ne vilunzwa vinji vyose navyo vikusangalalana hamonga naco.
46012027	Holeka anye wose muli muwili wa Kilisito, nanye wose muli vilunzwa vyo muwili wuwo.
46012028	Nayo u Mulungu yawika mwi'kanisa, walongozi, watumwa, we kejete, wawizi, we kadatu, wejizi, hanyuma yayo, yakawa kuwawika walya wono wena vipegwa vyo kunoza mapoto, kuponya, kutaza, walongola, na wono wakulonga nonga njenzi.
46012029	Alu wose watumwa? Wose wawizi? Wose wejizi? Wose wena cipegwa co kunoza mapoto?
46012030	Hamba wose wena cipegwa co kuponya? Wose wena cipegwa co kulonga nonga njenzi? Hamba wose walolosa milonjele?
46012031	Holeka mweze kusaka kupegwa vipegwa viswanu muno. Alu nane nomulajilenyi i nzila swanu muno muno yono yicizize zinzila zizi zose.
46013001	Hamba nonje i milonjele ye wanhu hamba na ye Wamalayika, ninga hono niwe sina wendo, ane nowa nihwanile nhe lizozo du lye lidebe lyono lisina cinji, hamba lunji nha kotya cenjele.
46013002	Na kanyhi yisumice niwe ne cipegwa ciswanu co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, no kuzimanya ze cinyele zose, sunga no kusuma kuzimanya zose, kanyhi ndahile kuwa no wihuwilo wono wukwilaniciye, sunga sume kugahamya matunda, ninga hamba nha vivyo hono niwe sina wendo, ane si nili cinji yaye.
46013003	Na hono ndavye i sawo yangu yose no kuwapela waciwa, na hamba niwulavye muwili wangu wunyanywe mu moto, ninga hono niwe sina wendo, azo zose si zonghwila cinji yaye.
46013004	Wendo wukangalilaga, wutazaga wenji, wendo wusina wivu, hamba si wikumyaga yaye, hamba siwuwezaga no wiwoni.
46013005	Wendo wukuwa wina cogopo, kanyhi si wukuwa kwilondolela weneco cambuzi, kanyhi wendo si wukolwaga ne'kuwo mbela, hamba si wukumbucilaga zimbi, hamba si wuwalaga wubi wono wapuluta yaye,
46013006	kanyhi wendo si wukuwa kusecelela wubi ng'o, langa wusecelelaga i mbeka.
46013007	Wendo wihuwilaga zose, witumbilaga zose, kanyhi wukangalilaga zose.
46013008	Wendo si wudumaga hamba hadodo. Na hone hovili i vipegwa vyo kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, avyo langa mwizuwa linji vilawuka, na hone vipegwa vyo wulonga zinonga zinjenzi, avyo vyoloduma, na hone kowuli wusomi, nawo nha vivyo du wolopuluta.
46013009	Hambi nha vyono yinha u wumanye wetu si wukwilaniciye, sunga ne cipegwa cetu co wuganula nghani yo Mulungu naco si cikwilaniciye.
46013010	Ninga cilaza kuwa caza cono cikwilaniciye, vyose vyono si vikwilaniciye vyolowuka.
46013011	Ane lono nali nghali nili mwana mudodo nalongaga cidodododo, natangaga cidodododo, nehwesaga cidodododo. Ninga aluno vyono neza nili munhu mututu, hodu nakondya kuzileka i zinghani zose ze cidodododo.
46013012	Cono cikuciwona alu cinha futa du mwi'lole, ninga baho hanyuma langa, ho colowona viswanu ciwonelela. Aluno manyile hadodo vivi du, ninga baho hanyuma langa, ho nolomanyila zose lukulu, nha vyono u Mulungu nayo yamanyile ane.
46013013	Holeka zikusigala zizino zidatu, nha cinji, u Wihuwilo, u Witumbilo no wendo, ninga kanyhi yono yicizize muli zizino zose, wo wendo.
46014001	Ale muhidimbale kuwa no wendo. Muhidimbale kanyhi nhavivilya, ho muvituje vipegwa vinji vye cimuhe, ko muno cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu.
46014002	Nayo mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, yuyo si yakulonga ne wanhu, langa yakulonga no Mulungu, hambi nha hasina mono yakumuhulika. Mwene, kalongaga mu vilungo vyo Muhe, zinghani zono zihundicigwe.
46014003	Ninga ayulya mono yena cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, ayo langa kalongaga ne wanhu, ku soko yo kuwazenga, no kuwatuza mitima yawo, kanyhi no kuwasikamya.
46014004	Mono yakulonga mu nonga njenzi, ayo yakwiyizenga mweneco du. Ninga mono yena cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, yuyo yakulizenga likanisa.
46014005	Heya, ane nali nyende anye wose mulonje mu milonjele mijenzi, ninga hamba nhavivyo, nali nyende ko muno muweze ne cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, hambi u munhu mono yena cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, yuyo nha yo muswanu muno, kuciza ayulya mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, mba langa, sunga hawe ho yuli yunji mono kosuma kuzilolosa zizo zono yakuzilonga, i likanisa nalyo ho lizengwe.
46014006	Alu mwene anye wandugu zangu, hono nimuzizenyi no kulongana nanye mu milonjele mijenzi, alu ho mowa na cambuzici? Si yomupelenyi cambuzi co cose, langa mba, hono nimulolosezenyi zo wugubule wo Mulungu, hamba zo wizuce wunji wo wose, hamba za muli nghani yo Mulungu, hamba za muli mejizo go wutunga.
46014007	Nha vyo yinha nhavivyo na kuli i vinhu vyono visina wumi, vyono navyo vilavyaga mazi gavyo, nha vyono kotya, filimbi, hamba cinanda. Alu munhu kosuma nhawule kulumanya u lwimbo lono lukwimbwa, hono i vinhu vivyo, si vikusuma kulavya mazi gavyo mu milizo yayo lono vikutowa?
46014008	Hamba ne ndulele yono yilalikaga wanhu ho wabite ku wulugu, hono yilile ko mulilo wono si wukutanjika, alu nani 'mbi, mono kosuma kwiwikaniza ho yabite?
46014009	Holeka vyo yinha sunga na kuli nyenye, vyono hono u lulimi lwenyu si lukusuma kulonga cinhu cono cikutanjika, alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kuzimanya zono mukulonga? Zinghani zenyu zokwajilila caka du.
46014010	Mono yinze, moyili milonjele minji muno muno, ninga hamba nhavivyo, hasina hamba nonga monga yono yisina nhunizo.
46014011	Alu ninga, ane hono niwe si nghuyimanya nhunizo ye nonga yono yunji yakuyilonga, kuli munhu yuyo, ane naweza mujenzi kuli mwene, sunga no mwene nayo nhavivyo yaweza mujenzi kulu bavu lwangu.
46014012	Holeka vyo yinha sunga na kuli'nye, holeka vyono mwina wuhile wo kuvituga vipegwa vyo Muhe, holeka muhidimbale ko muno, ho muvituje avilya vyono vyosuma kulizenga likanisa.
46014013	Holeka mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, yimunojeye yalombe, ho yasume kuyilolosa.
46014014	Ku soko hono niwe kulombela mu milonjele mijenzi, i nhumbula yangu du yo yikulomba, ninga i mahala gangu gakuwa gali bwete.
46014015	Alu ho noze nhawule lu? Ale, nolombela mu muhe wangu kanyhi nolombela na mu mahala gangu, nokwimbila mu muhe wangu, na kanyhi nokwimbila sunga na mu mahala gangu nha vivyo.
46014016	Na hono wumukumizye u Mulungu mu muhe wako du, alu u munhu mono si yayimanyile nonga yiyo baho mu wihangulize wenyu, ho kosuma nhawule kuvumiza u wulombe wako wo wulumbe, no kutya, “Heya” hono si yakucimanya cono wukulonga?
46014017	Na lunji u wulombe wako wo wulumbe, wudahile kuwa mbeka wuswanu, ninga yuyo yunji hamba si yomutaza cinji yaye.
46014018	Ane nghumulumba u Mulungu vyono nghusuma kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi kuciza nyenye wose.
46014019	Ninga mu wihangulize we Wakilisito, ane nyendile kulonga nawo mu nghani yihano zono zikutanjika ho niwejize na wanji, si nho kulonga makani elufu mu milonjele mijenzi.
46014020	Nye wandugu zangu, mulece kuwa nhe wana wadodo mu mahala genyu. Kuli zo wavu, muweze nhe wana wagalika, ninga mu wihwese wenyu, yinojeye muwe nhe wanhu wono wakangaye.
46014021	Hambi nha yandicigwe mu Wulajilize vyono, “U Muwaha yakutya nhavi, ‘Mu nzila ya mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi na kwe milomo ye wajenzi, ane nolongana ne wanhu wawa, hamba nhavivyo, siwohuliciza yaye.’ ”
46014022	Ale, holeka, i cipegwa co kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, co citanjilo du, ninga si kuli wanhu wono wena u wihuwilo, langa so kuli awalya wono wakali nehuwila, ninga cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, cili so wanhu wono wakondya kwihuwila hamba si so kuli awalya wono wakali nehuwila.
46014023	Holeka i likanisa lyose kolo lyeza kuwa lyehanguliza hamonga, hanyuma ho wose wamule kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, na kanyhi hono yenjile u munhu mono si yayimanyile nonga yiyo, hamba mono yakali si nehuwila, wulenyi, si womulonjenyi watye vyono anye mwina lukwale lu?
46014024	Ninga hono wose wawe wakuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, na hono yenjile u munhu mono si yayimanyile nonga yiyo, hamba mono yakali si nehuwila zose zono kozihulika, zomulajila u wubi wakwe mweneco, na zose zono kozihulika baho, mbeka zomuling'aniza.
46014025	Na ze cinyele zono zili mu nhumbula yakwe zogubulwa, nayo kufugama no kumuhemba u Mulungu, akuno yakutya, “Mbeka, u Mulungu yali hamonga nanye.”
46014026	Nye wandugu zangu, alu cilonje ciwe kutya nhawule? Ninga kolo mwehanguliza hamonga, yunji yembe lwimbo, na yunji yejize, na yunji yaweze no wugubulilwe wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu, yunji nayo yetumamilaje cipegwa co kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi na yunji yalolose zono zikulongwa. Na zose zitumwe ku soko yo kulizenga likanisa.
