46014027	Hono wawe wali baho wanhu wono wena cipegwa co kulonga milonjele mijenzi, ale, wadahile kulonga, wejete hamba wadatu, ninga walece kuciziliza liwalo lilyo, hamba nhavivyo, yiwanojeye wawe kulonga wakwiwalila monga monga, na kanyhi heze hoyuli munhu mono kosuma kuzilolosa zono zikulongwa.
46014028	Ninga hono hawe hasina u munhu mono kosuma kuzilolosa, hodu du, na yuyo mono yo yali yalonje mu milonjele i mijenzi, hodu yanojeye yanyamale yalece kulonga cinji kanyhi mu wihangulize wenyu, langa yalonje ne nhumbula yakwe yali wene, hamonga no Mulungu.
46014029	Kuli za walya wono wakuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, nawo wadahile kulonga wejete hamba wadatu du, na wayawo wanji, wawe kuzipima zinghani zawo.
46014030	Ninga yunji lono yakali yali mu wulonje, hanyuma ho yejele yunji muli wono wakuhuliciza, nayo yawe yatuga u wugubulilwe kulawa kuli Mulugu, hodu ayulya mono yakulonga yanyamale.
46014031	Hambi wose nha mudahile kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu akuno mukwiwalila, ho wose musume kwiyijiza no kusikamywa.
46014032	I cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, cinojeye ciwe citemigwe na munhu yuyo mono yapejigwe kanyhi munya cipegwa cico.
46014033	Hambi u Mulungu wetu, nha si Mulungu we mazozo, langa yo Mulungu wo mulamu.
46014034	Nha vyono winho moto wa mu makanisa gose ge wanhu wo Mulungu, yiwanojeye wacekulu, weze kwikala wanyamaye lono wali mu wihangulize we Wakilisito. Si wakukombolwa kulonga yaye, langa weze wena cihuliko nha vyono wukutya Wulajilize.
46014035	Hono wawe wena zinji zo kuwuza, ale, wawawuzaje i walume zawo ku zikaya zawo, hambi nha nghani ya cevu kuli mucekulu kulonga mu wihangulize we wakilisito.
46014036	Alu mukwihwesa lo, inghani yo Mulungu yalawa kwenyu nyenye, hamba lunji yikamuzizenyi nyenye muli wene du?
46014037	Hono hawe hoyuli u munhu wo wose mono yakwiwona vyono mwene yo mutumwa wo Mulungu, hamba lunji yena cipegwa co Muhe, ale yamanye vyono, zizino zono ane nghumwandicilenyi anye, lye 'lajilizo lyo Muwaha.
46014038	Ninga hono yunji si yakuzimanya zizo, hodu, nanye mulece kumutyatilila u munhu yuyo.
46014039	Holeka anye wandugu zangu, yinojeye kuli'nye muwe no wuhile wo kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, ninga hamba nhavivyo, mulece kumulemeza yunji ku wulonje milonjele mijenzi.
46014040	Ninga du soko zose zitumilwe mu cogopo na mu wulunji.
46015001	Alu wandugu zangu ane nyendile nimukumbucizenyi du, za kuli u Luganuzi Luswanu lono namuganulilenyi, nanye mukalubocela, kanyhi mwimile mukamile muli lulo.
46015002	Na vyono na mu nzila ya lulo Luganuzi Luswanu, mo mukuponyezwa, hono muzibate zinghani zono namuganulilenyi, na kanyhi hono yiwe si mwehuwila bwete.
46015003	Nane nghamupelenyi anye zinghani zi mbaha muno muno, zono nazibocela nene no mweneco, nha vyono, Kilisito yafwa so wubi wetu, nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile,
46015004	na vyono yakazikwa, na kanyhi na vyono yakazuka mwizuwa lye kadatu, nha vyono yandikwa,
46015005	na vyono kanyhi yejela kuli Kefa, na hanyuma yayo yakejela kuli awalya we likumi na wejete.
46015006	Na hanyuma yakejela lwa kamonga kuli awalya we zindugu wono wali wacizize liwalo lya wanhu magana mahano, ne wanji wenji wa muli wawo, wakali womi, ninga wanji wayawo wakondya kufwa.
46015007	Na hanyuma yayo yakejela kuli Yakobo, na hanyuma yakejela kuli watumwa wose.
46015008	Ne ndumilizo ya wose, ho yakejela sunga na kuli'ne, ane mono ninha u munhu mono yalelwa lono cipango co kulelelwa cali cikali.
46015009	Hambi ane nha nili mudodo muno muno muli watumwa wose, mono singhwiliye hamba kucemwa mutumwa, ku soko vyono naligaza muno i likanisa lyo Mulungu.
46015010	Ninga ku so lihewa lyakwe Mulungu, naweza nha vyono ninha lulu, ne lihewa lyakwe si lyali lya bwete. Nane netuma u mulimo si nha wose, kanyhi hamba si nene yaye, langa lihewa lyo Mulungu lyono likwitumana hamonga na nene.
46015011	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, hono yiwe weneco wo wakuganula, hamba nene mono nghuganula, si nghani yaye, hambi nha co cico cono ciganulaga, na co cico cono mwihuwiye.
46015012	Ninga nha vyono yikuganulwa, vyono Kilisito yazukulwa ku wulawa mu wafu, alu wanji wa muli nyenye, wosuma kutya nhawule vyono ati hasina wuzuce we wafu?
46015013	Holeka hono hawe hasina u wuzuce we wafu, ale, na Kilisito nayo si yazuka,
46015014	na hono Kilisito yawe si yazuka, hodu kumbe no wuganule wetu wa bwete, sunga no wihuwilo wenyu wa bwete.
46015015	Hamonga na zizo zose, ase cali ciwe cili wahomelezi wo wulambi hali Mulungu, hambi nha calonga cikatya vyono u Mulungu yamuzukula Kilisito muli wafu, kumbe mwene ho si yamuzukula yaye, hono yiwe i wafu mbeka si wazukulwaga.
46015016	Na hono yiwe yili mbeka i wafu si wazukulwaga, ale, na Kilisito nayo si yazuka yaye.
46015017	Na hono yiwe Kilisito si yazukulwa, ale, no wihuwilo wenyu weza nghani ya bwete, vyo mukali du mu wubi wenyu.
46015018	Hamonga na zizo na wawalya wono wafwa akuno ho vilunzize na Kilisito kumbe nawo wajilila.
46015019	Holeka u witumbilo wetu muli Kilisito, hono wuwe wuli so mikalile yiyi du ya lulu, ale baho, ase cowa cili wanhu mono cinojeye cikalalilwe muno si nhe wanji wose wa mono yinze yiyi.
46015020	Ninga i mbeka yoyi, vyono Kilisito yakondya kuzukulwa muli wafu, na yo yikulajila vyono, wawalya wono wagonile mu wufwe, wolozukulwa.
46015021	Nha vyono u wufwe waletwa mononze na munhu monga, ale, nhavivyo no wuzuce wa muli wafu, waletwa na munhu monga.
46015022	Nha vyono wanhu wose wafwizaga so wilunza na Adamu, yo nhavivyo kanyhi, wose wolozukulwa so wilunza na Kilisito.
46015023	Ninga munhu na hakwe mweneco nha vyono yawajigwe, na Kilisito, yo mulongozi muli wose, hanyuma ho awalya i wakwe Kilisito kolo yeza kuza.
46015024	Na hanyuma ya zizi, u mudumo ho wolokuza, mwidaha lono Kilisito komupelela u wutemi u Sogwe Mulungu, lono kowa yakondya kuwusiza lukulu, u wutemi wose, no wuwaha wose, sunga ne vilungo vyayo.
46015025	Hambi Kilisito nha si koleka kutema, sunga u Mulungu kolo yakondya kuwasuma i walugu wakwe, no kuwawika hasi ye magulu gakwe.
46015026	No mulugu we ndumilizo mono kolokongomezwa, lyo lifwa.
46015027	Hambi imandiko nha gakutya, “U Mulungu koviwika i vinhu vyose hasi ye magulu gakwe.” Ninga, Mandiko lono gakutya, “Vinhu vyose vyolowikwa hasi ye magulu gakwe ho yaviteme, yili calinze vyono u Mulungu si kosuma kwinjila mwipuga lilyo lye vinhu, vyono u mwene yo yakuviwika vinhu vivyo hasi ya Kilisito.”
46015028	Ninga i vinhu vyose, lono viwe vyakondya kuwikwa hasi yo wutemi wa Kilisito, baho nayo u Mwana, ho kosuma kwiwika hasi yo Mulungu, mono yaviwika vyose hasi yo wutemi wakwe, u Mulungu ho yateme muli vyose.
46015029	Alu hono hawe hasina wuzuce, i wanhu wawalya wono wabaputizwaga ku soko ye wafu, alu wetumbiye kutuga cici? Hono wafu wawe si wazukulwaga, so cici lu yunji yabaputizwe ku soko yawo.
46015030	Hamba nase ma, so cici lo cikwitajila mu mbali mu madaha gose?
46015031	Nye wandugu zangu, ane no muyenyu cidomile ne lifwa nhondo zose! U lukumyo lono nina nalo ku soko yo wilunza wenyu na Kilisito Yesu u Muwaha wetu, yiyo yo yikuleka nghuyanza nghani yiyi.
46015032	Na hono u wuhile wangu wali wuwe we cimunhu-munhu du, alu u wihome wangu wo kwihoma ne malimu makali baha ha Efeso, kwali kunghwile cici? Hono wafu siwazukaga, ale, “Cilye no kung'wa du, hambi i mitondo nha cofwa.”
46015033	Nye, mbeka mulece kukongwa bwete! U wiyendi wono si wuswanu, mbeka wuhodangaga i mikalile miswanu.
46015034	Ale, mwinukaje! Mwamulaje kanyhi kwikala mu mikalile miswanu, mulece kwituma wubi. Hambi wanji wa muli nyenye nha si wamumanyiye lukulu u Mulungu. Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono co cevu ciwaha kuli'nye!
46015035	Ninga u munhu kosuma kuwuza yatye, “Mwene i wafu wolozukulwa nhawule? Kanyhi wowa wena muwili we liwalaci walazakuwa wazuka kanyhi?”
46015036	Ago mawuzo ga wulele! Hono wuhadice mbeyu, nayo hono yilece kwamula kufwa, hamba si yocindika.
46015037	Ninga cono kuhadikaga 'gwe, si kuhadikaga u muwili wono wowa hanyuma, langa agwe kuhadikaga i mbeyu du, lunji ya wuhemba, hamba mbeyu ye liwala linji.
46015038	Ninga Mulungu kayipelaga yiyo yi mbeyu, u muwili wono yakwenda mweneco, ne mbeyu yo yose, yitugaga u muwili wayo yili wene wono wisimajiye ne mbeyu yinji.
46015039	Ne miwili ye viwumbwa vyose si yili sawa sawa yose. I miwili ye wanhu, yose yihwanile, nayo ye vilimu yisimile, na ye zindeje nayo yisimile, sunga ne miwili ye zisomba nayo nhavivilya yisimile.
46015040	Koyili i miwili ya ku wulanga, na kanyhi koyili ne miwili ya mono'nze, u wuswanu we miwili ya ku wulanga wisimajiye, no wuswanu we miwili ya mono'nze, nawo wisimajiye.
46015041	Howuli u wuswanu we lizuwa, na wo mwezi, na we zinyelezi, sunga ne zinyelezi nazo ziwezaga zisimajiye mu wuswanu wazo.
46015042	Ale no wuzuce we wafu vyo winha nhavivyo. Nha vyono yinha mbeyu, u muwili wukuwa kuzikwa mu kabuli, wukuzicilwa mu wuhodanjice, ninga wuzukulilwaga mu wusakalakale.
46015043	Wukuwa kuzicilwa mu wuwe we cevu, ninga wukuzukulilwa mu wuwe wo lukumyo, wuzicilwaga mu wuwe wo wusocele, ninga wukuwa kuzukulilwa mu wuwe we vilungo.
46015044	Nawo lono wukuzikwa, wuwezaga muwili wa mono'nze yiyi du, ninga lono wukuzukulwa wukuwa muwili we cimuhe. Kowuli muwili wa mono'nze, na kolowa no muwili we cimuhe.
46015045	Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Umunhu mulongozi Adamu yali ciwumbwa cono cina nhumbula nyumi.” Ninga Adamu we ndumilizo, Muhe wono wuwumifyaga.
46015046	Ninga u muwili we cimuhe wo si wulongoleye kuwa, langa u muwili we yinze yiyi, wo wulongoleye, hanyuma yayo, ho muwili we cimuhe.
46015047	Nayo Adamu u mulongozi, nha yawumbwa ko muhangha, holeka u mwene wa muhangha, ninga u munhu we kejete, ayo yalawa ku wulanga.
46015048	Holeka i wanhu wose vyono walawa mu muhangha, ale, wehwanile nha vyono yenha yuyo mono yawumbwa ko muhangha, awalya wa ku wulanga nawo, wehwanile nha vyono yenha yulya mono yalawa ku wulanga.
46015049	Alu nase, nha vyono cihwanile na ayulya mono yawumbwa ko muhangha, ale vyo nhavivyo kanyhi, vyo cokwihwana na yuyo mono yalawa ku wulanga.
46015050	Holeka wandugu zangu, nghutya nhavi, acilya cono canozwa ko muwili ne sakami, si cosuma kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu, naco cono cihodanjikaga, hamba si cosuma kuwa no wuwe wono si wuhodanjikaga.
46015051	Ale, muhulicize ta, nimulonjelenyi nghani ye cinyele, yili nhavi, ase hamba si cilafwa wose, langa wose colohunduswa,
46015052	kwa nhinicizo, lwa kamonga, mu cipango ce ndulele ye ndumilizo. Hambi yindulele nha yololila, ne wafu wolozukulilwa mu wuwe wono si wolofwa kanyhi, baho nase ho colohundusiswa.
46015053	Hambi nha yinojeye cono cihodanjikaga, civwale u wuwe wono si wuhodanjikaga, no muwili wuwuno wono wukusuma kufwa, wuvwale u wuwe wono si wufwizaga kanyhi.
46015054	Holeka u muwili wuwuno wono wuhodanjikaga, wula weza kuwa wavwala u wuwe wono si wuhodanjikaga, naco cono cifwizaga, cila ceza kuwa cavwala u wuwe wono si wufwizaga, ale baho nhondo, ho yoloficilila i nghani yono yandikwa, yono yikutya, “U wufwe wawusizwa lukulu, ne cisumisumi cakondya lu kukwilanicila!”
46015055	“Alu gwe go wufwe, i cisumisumi cako cili hayi? I vilungo vyako vyo wusungu, vili hayi?”
46015056	U wufwe wutugaga wusungu wayo ku wulawa mu wubi, nawo u wubi wutugaga i vilungo vyayo ku wulawa mu wulajilize.
46015057	Ninga yicinojeye cimulumbe Mulungu mono kacipelaga u wusume, mu nzila yo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
46015058	Holeka wandugu zangu wendece, mwime mukamile. Kanyhi mujendelele kuwituma u mulimo wo Muwaha kwe vilungo, nhondo zose, akuno mukumanya, u mulimo wuwo wo kumwitumamila u Muwaha wono mukwituma, vyono si wolokwajilila bwete.
46016001	Alu, kuli zo wuhangulize we vinhu ku soko ye wanhu wo Mulungu, munoze nha vyono nawalajiliza we makanisa ga ku Galatiya.
46016002	Wose muli nyenye, mu vilo vyose vye jumapili, mweze kuwika siya zipesa, nha vyono yinha, munhu ha nghango ya vyono katugaga, ho halece kuwa na soko kanyhi yo kuwa no wuhangulize wunji wo wose kolo nghuza.
46016003	Nane kolo nghuza kwenyu, nowatuma wanji wa muli nyenye, wono mowahagula nyenye, ho wategule i baluwa, hamonga ne vipegwa vyenyu vye lihewa ku Yelusalemi.
46016004	Na hono nane yiwe yinojeye mbite, ale cobitana nawo.
46016005	Nolokuza u kwenyu kolo nakondya kukolela Makedoniya, hambi nha nina wuhile wo kukolela kuko Makedoniya.
46016006	Lunji nolokwikalakala kuko kwenyu hadodo, hamba lunji nosuma kwikalana nanye mwipango lyose lye cinyuli, ho musume kunhaza njendelele no muhinzo wangu ko kose kono nobita.
46016007	Sinyendile ho nghole kuko kwenyu musunho musunho du, lono nghujendelela no muhinzo wangu. Ninga nitumbiye kwikalana nanye kwa cidaha, hono u Muwaha yende.
46016008	Ninga nowa nili baha hono Efeso sunga mwizuwa lye Pentekote.
46016009	Hambi nha ndiguliywe mulango mugazi muno muno ku soko yo mulimo wangu muwaha wono wuli baha, hamba hawe howali na wenji wono wakumhinga mhinga.
46016010	Na kolo Timoteyo yakuza kwenyu, ale mulanjilile, yalece kuwa na woga woga wo wose mwipango lono yali hamonga nanye, hambi u mwene nha yakwituma u mulimo wo Muwaha nha nene.
46016011	Holeka munhu wo wose yalece kumubedegala, langa mumutazaje ho yawe no mulamu mu wujendelela no muhinzo wakwe, ho yasume kuza kwangu kanyhi, hambi ane no mweneco, nha nimulanjiliye muno muno, hamonga ne wandugu zetu.
46016012	Kuli ze ndugu yetu Apolo, ane nimunena muno muno ho yaze kwenyu, hamonga na we zindugu wanji, ninga mwene si yakuhila kuza kuko lulu, langa kolokuza du kolo yikusumika.
46016013	Ale, mwikalaje meso, kanyhi mwimaje mukamile mu wihuwilo, akuno musina woga, kanyhi mweze muli vilungo.
46016014	Na zo zose zono mowa kunoza, muzinozezaje mu wendo.
46016015	Nye wandugu zangu, si kotya muyimanyile i mhuga ya Sitefano vyono i wene, wo wanhu walongozi muno muno wo kuwubocela u wihuwilo we Cikilisito mu Akaya, na vyono welavizye ho wawetumamile i wanhu wo Mulungu. Nane nghumunenenyi anye nyo wandugu zangu,
46016016	muwegaje i wanhu wono wenha wawo mu wutonji wawo, kanyhi no wutonji wo munhu wo wose mono vikwitumana nawo.
46016017	Nane nghusangalala muno muno so wuze wa Sitefano, Fotunata na Akayiko ku soko wakondya kuhomela uwanjile wono cali cina nawo lono anye muli hasina.
46016018	Hambi nha wayisangalaza nhumbula yangu, nha vyono wazisangalaza zinhumbula zenyu. Holeka yinojeye muwalumbe wanhu wawa.
46016019	I makanisa gose ga ku Asiya gakumulamusenyi. Nayo Akula na Pilisika, hamonga ne wanhu wose wo Mulungu, wono wali mu kaya yawo, wakumulamusizenyi mu Cikilisito.
46016020	We zindugu wose wakumulamusenyi. Nanye wose mwilamusizaje mu wendo wo Mulungu.
46016021	Nane Pawulo nghumulamusenyi muno muno, no wandice wo muwoko wangu nene no mweneco.
46016022	U munhu wo wose mono siyamwendile Muwaha, yaweze mulijitwe. Go Muwaha wuze!
46016023	Ilihewa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, liwezane nanye.
46016024	No wendo wangu wuweze hamonga nanye, mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
47001001	Kulawa kuli nene Pawulo, no mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu, so wuhile wo Mulungu, no ndugu yetu Timoteyo. Cikumwandicilenyi anye mono muli we likanisa lyo Mulungu, lyono lili kuko ku Kolinto, hamonga ne wanhu wose wo Mulungu we hanhu hose mu Akaya.
47001002	Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu, na kuli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, viweze muli nyenye.
47001003	Yalumbwe u Mulungu u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, Baba mono yena lusungu, kanyhi yo Mulungu mono kaletaga u wutuzwe wose.
47001004	Mwene yo kacitazaga ase mu wugazice wetu wose, nase ho cisume kuwatuza wanji mu wugazice wose, mu nzila yo wutuzwe wuwo wono cikulubocela kulawa kuli Mulungu.
47001005	Heya, mu nghango ye magayo ga Kilisito vyono gakucila muli'se, ale, mu nghango yiyo nase mo cikucilila kusindamikwa nayo.
47001006	Holeka hono ciwe cikutuga wugazice, cikugazika ku soko yo wusindamikwe ne mhonelo yenyu. Na kanyhi lono cikusindamikwa, cikusindamikwa ho nanye mutuje wusindamikwe, ne vilungo vyo wukangalila magazo gaga, gono sunga na sese cikagakangalila.
47001007	Holeka uwitumbilo wetu wa muli'nye, wusikame muno muno, kanyhi cimanyile vyono, hono muhanje nase i magazo getu, vyo mohanga no wusindamice wetu nhavivyo.
47001008	Nye nyo wandugu zetu, ase cikusaka kumumanyizenyi, ze magazo gono gacagana ku yisi ya Asiya, i magayo gago gali mawaha muno, sunga gakaciwusiza no witumbilo wose wo kwikala cili womi.
47001009	Heya, cikawa nha wanhu mono ciwiciywe kuwulagwa. Ninga zizi zose, zejela ho cisume kwiyijiza vyono yicinojeye cilece kwiyitumbila co weneco, langa cimwitumbile Mulungu, mono kawazukulaga i wafu.
47001010	U Mwene yaciponya mu mbali mbaha ye lifwa, kanyhi yakali yakujendelela kuciponya, nase cimuwiciye u witumbilo wetu du, nha vyono kajendelelaga kanyhi kuciponya,
47001011	nha vyono mukucitaza so wulombe wenyu. Holeka u wulombe wenyu wono mukucilombela muno, wopitulwa, no Mulungu kocilugutiza, na wanhu wenji wokwinula i mazi gawo, wawe kumulumbo Mulungu ku soko yetu.
47001012	Ase cikwilumbila cinhu cimonga du, vyono viselinji vyetu vikucihomelela vyono, mu wikale wetu wa mono yinze yiyino na ko muno muli'nye, cekala ko winenenyhezi wose hamonga no wele wa mu nhumbula, wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu, hamba si catongwa ne lihala lye cimunhu-munhu, langa catongwa ne lihewa lyo Mulungu.
47001013	Holeka cikumwandicilenyi nanye izinghani zono mosuma kuzisoma no kuzizuka.
47001014	Ninga hamba yiwe aluno mukucizuka hadodo du, nitumbiye vyono hanyuma mocizucila lukulu, Mwizuwa alilya lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu, ho muze musume kwilumbila muli sese, nha vyono nase colokwilumbila muli nyenye.
47001015	Holeka ku so witumbilo wuwo, nahilaga kwamula kuza kwenyu ho mutuje lihewa lye kejete.
47001016	Nahilaga ngholele kwenyu lono nghubita ku Makedoniya, na lono nghuwuya nhavivyo, ho nhuje u wutazi wenyu so muhinzo wangu wo kubita ku Wuyahudi.
47001017	Wulenyi! Mukwihwesa lono nahimaga zizo, nahimaga nha munhu mono yasina wusimyo? Mukwihwesa ane nghunozeza u wulamuzi wangu mu mahweso ge cimunhumunhu nha cinji nghutya “Heya” ne “Ng'o” ho baho hose?
47001018	Ninga u Mulungu yo we mbeka yose, holeka azilya zono camulonjelenyi anye, si zali nghani za “Heya” ne “Ng'o.”
47001019	Vyono Kilisito Yesu, u Mwana wo Mulungu, mono ane na Silivano na Timoteyo camuganulilenyi anye, si yali munhu wa “Heya” na “Ng'o,” langa u mwene yo “Heya” yo Mulungu nhondo zose.
47001020	Ku soko vyono muli mwene u wihuwizo wose wo Mulungu waweza “Heya.” Holeka ku soko yiyo, i “Heya” yetu yikuwa kulongwa mu nzila ya Kilisito, ku soko yo kumukumyo Mulungu.
47001021	U Mulungu mweneco yo kacisikamyaga ase hamonga na nyenye mu wilunza na Kilisito, kanyhi yo kacisiwanulaga,
47001022	kanyhi yo yaciwicila mutozo wo kuwela cili sawo yakwe mweneco, kanyhi yakacipela no Muhe Mono Yelile mu zinhumbula zetu, ho ciwe co cipingo ca zose zono yaciwiciye.
47001023	No Mulungu yo muhomelezi wangu, mwene yo yayimanyile i nhumbula yangu! Ane, sinawuyajila kanyhi kuza ku Kolinto, ku soko du yo kumuwonelenyi lusungu.
47001024	Ase si cikusaka cimutemenyi mu wihuwilo wenyu, anye mono mwakondya kuwa mukamile mu wihuwilo wenyu. Langa yicinojeye, ciwitume u mulimo hamonga nanye, ku soko ye nyemo yenyu.
47002001	Holeka ndumula nghani mu nhumbula yangu vyono, ndece kumuzizenyi kanyhi no kumukalazenyi.
47002002	Hambi hono nimukalazenyi anye, alu nani kanyhi mono konhuza? Hono si wawalya du wono nawakalaza!
47002003	Holeka namwandicilenyi vyono, si nasaka kumuzizenyi ho nghalazwe nanye, anye mono munojeye muwe yo nyemo yangu. Nane manyiye lukulu nha vyono, hono ane niwe nina nyemo, nanye wose mukuwa mwina nyemo nhavivilya.
47002004	Hambi ha lulongozi, nha namwandicilenyi hamonga no wukalale wuwaha ne mahozi, hamonga no wusungu mu nhumbula, ninga si namwandicilenyi ho nimukalazenyi, aa, ng'o, langa nasakaga ho nimulajilenyi nha vyono ane nimwendilenyi muno muno.
47002005	Holeka hono hawe hoyuli yunji mono yamukalaze muyagwe yunji, ale, si vyono kanghalaza nene, langa kamukalazenyi anye wose. Nane si nghusaka nijele niwe mukali muno muno muli mwene.
47002006	U wulipicizwe wono yakondya kuwutuga kulawa kuli wenji wa muli nyenye, hodu womukwila wuwo du.
47002007	Alu yono yisigaye ku lubavu lwenyu, yinojeye anye mumunenele munhu yuyo, kanyhi mumusindamice, ho yalece kucila muno kuwa no wukalale no kutukuwika mutima wakwe.
47002008	Holeka nghumunenenyi, anye mwilajilaje kuli mwene vyono mumwendile.
47002009	Na cono caleka nghandika baluwa yiyilya, nasakaga ho manye hono mweza muli cihuliko muli zose.
47002010	Hono mumunenele munhu cinji, ale, nane nghumunenela nhavivyo u munhu yuyo. Hambi ane hono nghulavya wunenezi, hono mbeka cili baho cinhu co kunenela, ale, nghunenela ku soko yenyu hali Kilisito,
47002011	ho cilece kumupela Setani cilejeho co kucikonjela, hambi u wuhile wakwe nha ciwumanyile vyono winha.
47002012	Lono nali neza kufika ku Tulowa kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito, nghagana u mulango wuli mwazi ku soko yo mulimo wo Muwaha.
47002013	Ninga si nasuma kutula mu mutima wangu, vyono si namwagana u ndugu yetu Tito. Na yo soko yono yikaleka nghamwilajenyi wose bahalya no kubita Makedoniya.
47002014	Ninga u Mulungu yalumbwe, mono yakucitonga nhondo zose mu wilunza na Kilisito. U mwene yakucipela wusume wo kutandaza i mbeka ya Kilisito, kotya nha mhunjile swanu muno hanhu hose.
47002015	Hambi ase nha cinha mhunjile swanu yono Kilisito yakumulavizyo Mulungu, i mhunjile swanu yono yikuwaficila wanhu wose wono wakupona, na wono wakwajilila.
47002016	Kuli'walya wono wakwajilila, i mhunjile yiyo yikuwa nha munungho mubi kuli wene, yikuleta 'fwa, ninga kuli'walya wono wakuponywa, i mhunjile yiyo, yikuwa mhunjile swanu kuli wene yono yikuleta wumi. Alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kuwituma u mulimo we liwala lilyo?
47002017	Ase si cinha wanji wono wayinozezaga nghani yo Mulungu wusuluza. Ninga ase cikuyiganula inghani yo Mulungu kwe nhumbula nzelu hali Mulungu, mono cakondya kwilunza na Kilisito, kanyhi nhe wanhu wono watumigwe no Mulungu.
47003001	Alo yiyi yikulajila nha vyono cikwamula kanyhi kwiyilumba co weneco? Hamba cikusaka baluwa zo wulumbwe wetu zizo kwenyu hamba zilawe kwenyu, nhe wanji?
47003002	Ninga anye nyo weneco yo nyenye mono muli baluwa yetu, kanyhi yo baluwa yono nyandikwe mu zinhumbula zetu, ho munhu wo wose yasume kuyiwona no kuyisoma.
47003003	Kanyhi yili calinze, nha vyono anye muli baluwa ya Kilisito yono yaletwa ne miwoko yetu. Ne baluwa yeneco siyandikwe ko wino, aa ng'o, langa nyandikwe ko Muhe wo Mulungu mumi, hamba si nyandikwe mu cibanhi ce'bwe, langa nyandikwe mu zinhumbula ze wanhu.
47003004	Nase cikulonga zizino ku soko yo witumbilo wetu wono cina nawo kuli Mulungu mu nzila ya Kilisito.
47003005	Ninga si vyono ase cosuma kwitumila nghani yinji yo yose mu vilungo vyetu co weneco, langa u wusume wetu wose, wulawaga kuli Mulungu,
47003006	hambi nha yo mweneco du mono yacipela u wusume wo kuwela i wetumami we cilagane Cipya, cono si cilagane co wulajilize wono mwandikwe, langa Cilagane co Muhe. Hambi u wulajilize wono mwandikwe, nha wuletaga yifwa, ningo Muhe, wuwumifyaga.
47003007	U Wulajilize waziza mu mandiko gono gali mandice mu vibanhi vye mabwe. Hamba yiwe u mudumo wayo waweza yifwa, u lukumyo lo Mulungu lukawa lucilile muno muno, sunga ne wanhu wa Isilayeli hamba siwasuma kwidoma no kuwulanga wusu wa Musa ku soko yo wung'alale wayo. Na kumbe u wung'ale wuwo, wali wa cipango cidodo du. Holeka u witumami wa cico cono caleta lifwa, kumbe ciketumilwa mu lukumyo luwaha nhavivyo,
47003008	ale, uwitumami wo Muhe, wo wina ulukumyo lono lucilile muno muno.
47003009	Holeka hono hawe hali howuli lukumyo mu witumami wuwo wono waleta i ning'aniza, ale, yili calinze muno, vyono u witumami wulya wono wukuleta u wuvumilwe hali Mulungu, wowa no lukumyo lono lucilile muno muno.
47003010	Holeka alu, ulukumyo lono lucilile muno muno, lwakondya kusola cilejeho co lukumyo alulya lono lwaza baho ha lulongozi, wono wilumbi wayo luno, wakondya kupuluta.
47003011	Holeka hono ci cilya cono cali ca cipango cidodo du, cali cino lukumyo lwayo, acilya cono cikalaga cibitilila, cowa cina lulumyo lono lucilile muno muno.
47003012	Vyono wo wuwu wo witumbilo wetu, holeka ase cikulonga cisina woga hamba hadodo.
47003013	Kanyhi ase, si cikwituma nha kotya Musa mono yakawa yimunojeye yawufunicize ne citambala wusu wakwe, wanhu wa Isilayeli ho walece kuwuwona u wung'alale wuwulya wono wali weza kufwililicila.
47003014	Ninga i mahala gawo gakamufywa. Sunga na lulu, lono cikusomwa i citabu ce Cilagane Cigwana, i cicitizo cico nha cikali cili baho du. Ne cicitizo cico cosuma kuwuswa du, lono munhu yakondya kwilunza na Kilisito.
47003015	Heya, sunga ne zuwalili du baha, ho hose lono wukusomwa Wulajilize wa Musa, mahala gawo gawezaga magubice.
47003016	Ninga i cicitizo cico cosuma kuwuswa, nha vyono gakutya i mandiko kuli za Musa, “Yali yeza kumupitucila Muwaha, ne cicitizo cakwe cikawa kuwuswa.”
47003017	Na ahano hono yikutya “U Muwaha,” nha cinji wo wutya, “U Muhe,” na ho hose hono ho yuli u Muhe wo Muwaha, baho ho ho wuli no welecele.
47003018	Holeka ase wose mono si cifunicize wusu wetu, cikululajila lukumyo lo Muwaha kotya nha mwi'lole, no lukumyo lulo nalo lono lukulawa kuli Muwaha, mono wo Muhe, wucikawanizaga ho cihwane muno muno ne cihwani cakwe, ku so lukumyo lono lucilile.
47004001	Holeka, u Mulungu ku soko yo lusungu lwakwe luwaha, yacipela u mulimo wuwuno ho ciwitume, holeka nase si cikutukuwika mitima.
47004002	Nase cakondya kuzilecela lukulu i zinghani zose ze cevu, na ze cinyele. Hamba si cili mu mikalile kanyhi yo wukonji, hamba kuyipitulasa nghani yo Mulungu, langa cikuyilajila i mbeka mu witume mbeka, na mu nzila yiyo, mo cikwiwicilila mu wulamuzi we viselinji vye wanhu, hali Mulungu.
47004003	Hambi u Luganuzi Luswanu lono cikuluganula, hono luhundikwe, lowa luhundikwe kuli wono wakwajilila du.
47004004	Wawo si wehuwiye vyono mulungu we yinze yiyino yawatajila wutitu mahala gawo, ho walece kuwuwona calinze u wuzelu wo Luganuzi Luswanu lo lukumyo lwa Kilisito, mono yo cihwani ce mbeka co Mulungu.
47004005	Hambi ase, nha si cikwiyiganula sese co weneco, langa 'se cikumuganula Kilisito mono yo Muwaha, nase nha cili wetumami wenyu ku soko ya Yesu.
47004006	U Mulungu mono yatya, “Uwuzelu wubulile mu wutitu,” yo yuyo kanyhi mono yakuwa kuzibulilila ne zinhumbula zetu, kanyhi yo kacipelaga u wumanye wose wo lukumyo lo Mulungu, wono wukuwa kung'alala mu wusu wa Kilisito.
47004007	Hamba nhavivyo, ase mono cina cico i ciwutwa co Muhe, cihwanile i viya vye lilongo, ho yijele calinze vyono i vilungo vivyo viwaha, vikulawa kuli Mulungu hamba si muli sese co weneco.
47004008	Cikugazika nhondo zose, ninga hamba nhavivyo si cikukatala, kanyhi cikwihwelela, ninga si cikutukuwika mitima yaye,
47004009	cina walugu wenji, ninga wutazi wuli baho, hamba ciwe cikugwiswa ho hasi, ninga si cikongomezwa yaye.
47004010	Ase cikalaga cidinghuye mu miwili yetu nhondo zose i lifwa lya Yesu, uwumi wa Yesu nawo nhavivilya ho wanzalikwe mu miwili yetu.
47004011	Heya, vyono mu mikalile yetu yose, cili mu mbali ye lifwa ku soko ya Kilisito, u wumi wakwe Yesu ho wanzalikwe mu muwili wetu wuwu wono wukufwa.
47004012	Nha cinji wo wutya, i lifwa likwituma mugati mwetu, ninga nawo wumi wukwituma mugati mwenyu.
47004013	I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Nehuwila, holeka nghalonga.” Nase nhavivyo ku soko yo wuwa ne nhumbula yiyo yo wihuwilo, cihuwiye, na holeka ku soko yiyo, nase cikulonga.
47004014	Nase cimanyile vyono, u Mulungu mono yamuzukula u Muwaha Yesu muli wafu, kocizukula nhavivilya na sese hamonga na Yesu, no kucinyasula hamonga nanye no kuciwika hali mwene.
47004015	Na zizi zose zili ku soko ye cambuzi cenyu nyenye, ho yiwe nha kotya, lihewa lyo Mulungu, likuwaficila wanhu wenji muno muno, nawo ho wasume kulavya lilumbo muno muno ko lukumyo lo Mulungu.
47004016	Holeka si cikutimba, u munhu wetu wa kunze hamba yakombipe, ninga mugati mwetu, cikunozwa wapya nhondo zose.
47004017	Hambi u wugaye wono cikuwutuga nha wudodo, kanyhi wa cidaha cidodo vivi du, ninga hamba nhavivyo, wosuma kucipela u lukumyo lono lucizize u wulanjilile wetu wose, u lukumyo lono lusina ndumo.
47004018	Holeka ase cikuvilanjilila muno muno vinhu vyono si vijelaga, hamba si vinhu vyono vijelaga. Ku soko vyono vijelaga, nha vya cidaha cidodo du, ninga avilya vyono si vijelaga, vyo vikalaga cibitilila.
47005001	Hambi nha cimanyile vyono, kaya yiyi ya kono'nze yono cikaye lulu, wo wutya u muwili wetu, kolo yeza yapambulwa, u Mulungu nha kocipela kaya yinji kuko ku wulanga, kaya yono yayinoza mweneco yo wikalo we cibitilila, yono si yizenjigwe ne miwoko.
47005002	Hambi mu wikala u kaya yiyi, nha citamikaga, cikuhila muno muno kuvwikwa mu wikalo wetu wono wuli ku wulanga.
47005003	Heya yicinojeye civwikwe nhavivyo, ho cize cilece kwima ha mwande yo Mulungu akuno cisina vivwalo.
47005004	Holeka lono cikali cili mu kaya yiyi ya kono'nze, cikulila vyono cikanyicizwe, ninga si vyono cikuhila kuwuvula u muwili wuwu wono wukufwa, aa ng'o, langa cikusulumila ho civwikwe awulya wono si wufwizaga, acilya cono cifwizaga, ho cimelelwe lukulu no wumi.
47005005	U Mulungu mweneco yaciwikaniziza u wukawanizwe wuwo, nayo yacipela u Muhe wakwe wuwe co cipingo ca vyose vyono yaciwiciye.
47005006	Holeka ase cina nhumbula yono yikamile nhondo zose. Kanyhi cimanyile vyono mu wikala mu muwili wuwu du, cikuwa cili kutali no Muwaha.
47005007	Hambi nha cikujendela wihuwilo, hamba si ko wuwone yaye.
47005008	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, cikamile du. Kanyhi cali cende cihame mu wikalo wuwuno wa mu muwili no kuhamila kuli Muwaha.
47005009	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, i mbaha yono yicizize muno, cikuhidimbala muno cimwendeze, lono cikali cili bahano mono yinze, hamba kuko.
47005010	Hambi ase wose nha yowa yicinojeye kwima he'goda lyo wuling'anizi lya Kilisito, u munhu wo wose, ho yabocele zono zimunojeye, nha vyono genha i metumo gakwe gono yetumaga, lono yali yakali yekaye mononze, hono maswanu, hamba mabi.
47005011	Ale, ase ciyimanyile soko yo kumogopela u Muwaha, holeka ku soko yiyi, cikwihinda kuwakwega wanhu. U Mulungu yacimanyiye lukulu, nane nitumbiye vyono na nyenye nhavivyo mucimanyiye lukulu mu viselinji vyenyu.
47005012	Si vyono cikusaka kwiyendeza kuli'nye, ng'o, langa cikusaka cimulajilenyi zisoko zetu, zono zikuleka cikwilumbila muli nyenye, ho mutuje soko yo kuwapitula awalya wono wakwiyilumbila vyono wenha, u wuwe wawo wa kunze, si nha vyono wenha mu nhumbula.
47005013	Hono ciwe cikwijela nha cina lukwale, ako ko ko Mulungu, na hono ciwe cina mahala gono gatulile, ayo cowa co cambuzi cenyu.
47005014	Hambi ase nha citemigwe no wendo wa Kilisito, mono cikwizuka nha vyono u munhu monga du, yafwa ku soko ya wose, nayo yiyo yikulajila nha vyono, wose wakuhangana i lifwa lyakwe.
47005015	Umwene yafwa ku soko ye wanhu wose, wawalya wono wakuwumipa, ho walece kwiwumipila weneco, langa wawe womi ku soko yo mwene mono yafwa, yakazukulwa ku soko yawo.
47005016	Holeka ku wulawa lulu, ase si comumanya munhu wo wose mu nzila ye cimunhumunhu. Hamba yiwe camumanyila Kilisito mu nzila ye cimunhumunhu, ninga alu si nhavivyo kanyhi.
47005017	No munhu wo wose hono vilunze na Kilisito, yakuwa ciwumbwa cipya, i ze katali zapuluta, alu zaweza mhya.
47005018	Na zizi zose wo mulimo wo Mulungu mweneco kucilamula ase no mweneco mu nzila ya Kilisito, yakawa kucipela nase u mulimo wo kuwanoza wanhu welamule nayo.
47005019	Wo wutya, u Mulungu yakuyilamula yinze no mwene mu nzila ya Kilisito, no kuleka kuwawalila wanhu u wubi wawo. Umwene yacipela nghani yo kuwalamula i wanhu no Mwene.
47005020	Holeka ase cili watumwa so Kilisito, nayo Mulungu mweneco yakucitumamila sese, cimunenenyi anye. Holeka cikumunenenyi ku so Kilisito, mwilamule no Mulungu.
47005021	Kilisito yali yasina wubi, ninga Mulungu yamunoza yawe wubi ku soko yetu, nase mu wilunza nayo, ho cisume kuhanga u wiling'ano wo Mulungu.
47006001	Holeka nase vyono cikwituma mulimo hamonga no Mulungu, cikumunenenyi mulece kuvumila i lihewa lyo Mulungu lyono mwabocela, lyajilile bwete.
47006002	Hambi u Mulungu nha yakutya nhavi; “Mwi'daha lyono lyali linojeye, lo nakuhulicila. Mwi'zuwa lyono lyali linojeye wuponywe, baho ho nakutaziza.” Lanje, aluno ho hanojeye muno muno, kanyhi izuwalili lyo lizuwa lye mhonelo!
47006003	Na kanyhi vyono si cikusaka ciwe ne lilema lyo lyose mu witumami wetu, holeka si cendile kumuwicila munhu wo wose cikobazo co cose.
47006004	Langa cikuhila kwilajila nha vyono ase mbeka cili wetumami wo Mulungu muli zose, ko wukangalizi wuwaha mwi'pango lyo wutamiswe, mu magayo na mu wusungu wuwaha.
47006005	Cikatowangwa, cikatajilwa mu jela, no kuhowelezwa cagalanze, cetuma mulimo kuciza sunga cikakatala, cikagona meso hamba kulya.
47006006	Cikwilajila nha vyono cili wetumami wo Mulungu mu nzila yo wele wa mu nhumbula, mu wumanye, mu wukangalile, mu wunhu wuswanu, ko Muhe Mono Yelile, na ko wendo we mbeka wono wusina hamba wukonji,
47006007	mu nghani ye mbeka, na kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu. No wiling'ano, co citwalo cetu co kwitaziza ku lubavu lo kulume no lubavu lo kucekulu.
47006008	Nhondo zose ciwikanize kutuga lukumyo, kupegwa lilumbo no kubedegalwa, kuhoswa no kukumywa. Cikwijela nha cili walambi, kumbe ase ho cikulonga mbeka,
47006009	cikwijela nha wanhu wono si wamanyice, kumbe ho cimanyice kuli wanhu wose, cikwijela nhe wanhu wono wafwiye, kumbe nha vyono mukuwona, ase ho cili womi du.
47006010	Hamba ciwe catuga wulipicizwe, ninga si cikawulagwa yaye, hamba ciwe cina wuzinguce, ninga cikusangalala nhondo zose, hamba ciwe ciciwape muno muno, ninga cikuwagolifya wanhu wenji, cijelaga nha cili wanhu mono cisina cinji co cose, ninga kumbe ho cina navyo i vinhu vyose.
47006011	Nye Wakolinto nyo wandugu zetu wendece, calongana nanye calinze, ne zinhumbula zetu zili calinze muno muno.
47006012	Na hono muwe mukuwona ko cili cikobazo co cose cilya, i cikobazo cico cili muli nyenye nyo weneco, ninga si cili kulubavu lwetu yaye.
47006013	Alu nghulongana nanye nha wanangu, nghutya, ale mudigule zinhumbula zenyu, nha vyono ase cikanoza.
47006014	Mulece kwihwana ne wanhu wono si wehuwiye. Alu 'mbi u wuswanu no wavu, vyosuma kwilumvya? Hamba u Wuzelu no wutitu, vyosuma kuwezana hamonga?
47006015	Alo Kilisito kosuma nhawule kwilumvya na Setani? Hamba mono yehuwiye, ho kosuma kulagana nhawule na mono si yehuwiye?
47006016	Hamba howuli wulaganeci we Nyumba yo Mulungu ne vihwani vyo wulambi? Hambi ase nha cili wuhembelo wo Mulungu mumi. Nha vyono Mulungu mweneco yalonga yakatya, “Nowunoza u wikalo wangu wuwe muli wene, na muli wene mo nowa jendela, nane nowa Mulungu wawo, nawo wowa wanhu wangu.”
47006017	Holeka u Muwaha kanyhi yakutya, “Ale muwuce muli wene, mweze musiwanuce mulece kupamiziza lukulu cinhu cavu nane ho nomubocelenyi.
47006018	Ane nowa Sogo yenyu, nanye mowa wanangu, we cilume na we cicekulu u Muwaha Mono u Mudaha Vyose, vyo yakutya.”
47007001	Holeka nyo wendece, vyono cakondya kupegwa i vilagane vivyo, yicinojeye nase ciyeze muli zose zono zosuma kucitipiza mu miwili, sunga na mu zinhumbula zetu, ho ciwe celile muno muno, no kwikala mu mikalile yono yimogopile Mulungu.
47007002	Ale cikulomba mu cipele cilejeho mu zinhumbula zenyu! Ase cikali namusutizya munhu wo wose, hamba ku muhodanga munhu wo wose, hamba kumukonga munhu wo wose.
47007003	Ane si nghulonga nhavivi ho nimuling'anize munhu wo wose, hambi nha nakondya kulonga vyono anye muli mugati mu zinhumbula zetu, sunga ku wufwizane, hamba ku wuwumipane hamonga.
47007004	Nina witumbilo wuwaha muno muno, lono nghulongana nanye, kanyhi nghwilumbila muli nyenye! Hamonga no wugaye wetu wose, alu nakondya kutuga wutuzwe no wusangalale wuwaha muno.
47007005	Hamba lono caficila Makedoniya, si casuma kuceha, hambi nha cali cipilimwe ne magayo mbavu zose, kudeha, milewo, kugati nako woga.
47007006	Ninga Mulungu mono yakuwapela vilungo wono wasoceye, yakacipela vilungo nase so wuze wa Tito.
47007007	Ninga si so wuze wakwe Tito du wono wacisangalaza, ku soko yo wusindamikwe wono mwamupela. Mwene yaciloloseza nha vyono mwendile muno kwiwona nane, kanyhi na vyono mwina wukalale, na vyono mukuhila kunhetela. Ne nghani yiyi yikusangalaza muno.
47007008	Holeka hamba niwe namukalazenyi so baluwa yangu, ninga ane no mweneco si nghuwona soko yo kukalala. Heya, manyile vyono baluwa yiyo yikamupelenyi wukalale, ninga wali wukalale wa cidaha cidodo du.
47007009	Ninga alu nina wusangalale, singhusangalala vyono namukalazenyi, langa vyono wukalale wenyu wamunozenyi mupitule wuhile wenyu no kunena. Wukalale wuwo wetumamilwa no Mulungu, holeka ku soko yiyi ase si camutendelenyi nghani yo yose'mbi.
47007010	Hambi u wukalale wono witumamilwaga no Mulungu, nha wuletaga wupituce wa mu nhumbula, u wupituce wono wuletaga mhonelo, holeka hasina soko yo kuwona nha wambuce. Ninga u wukalale we ciyinze-yinze, awo wuletaga 'fwa.
47007011	Alu mosuma kuwona vyono u Mulungu yawitumamila wuwo u wukalale wenyu. Lanje vyono mweza muli wahidimbazi, mu wilajile vyono musina malema go gose, mu makuwo, mu wutinuswe no woga, mu wuwa ne nyhilu yo wituma ziswanu, mu wogopo Mulungu, akuno mwiwikanize nhondo zose kwihoma ne zinghani zose zono si zinojeye. Mwakondya kwilajila nha vyono musina yilema lyo lyose mu nghani yiyi.
47007012	Holeka hamba niwe nghandika baluwa yiyilya, si nayandika ku soko yo munhu musutyi, hamba si nayandika ku soko yo munhu mono yasutizywe. Ane nayandika ho zijele calinze hali Mulungu vyono mwina no wuhidimbale ku soko yetu.
47007013	Holeka nase cikatuzwa muno muno. Hamba nhavivyo, si vyono catuzwa du, langa vyono na Tito nayo yakacisangalaza muno ne nyemo yono yali yena nayo, i nyemo yono yalawilila mu wusangalaze wenyu wono mwamusangalaza inhumbula yakwe.
47007014	Holeka nane nimukumizyenyi muno hali mwene, akuno manyiye lukulu, vyono si nghwikonga mu nghani yiyo. Hambi nha cikuwa kumulonjelenyi nghani za mbeka nhondo zose, holeka na lono cikumukumizyenyi ha mwande ya Tito, si nghani za wulambi yaye, langa za mbeka.
47007015	Holeka no wendo wa mu nhumbula yakwe kuli'nye, wokonjelezeka muno, ko muno lono yakukumbucila vyono anye wose muli cihuliko, na vyono mwamubocela mwene ne cogopo ciwaha hamonga no wucicime.
47007016	Nane nghusangalala muno muno vyono aluno nosuma kumwitumbilenyi muno muli zose.
47008001	Kanyhi nyo wandugu zetu, cendile cimumanyizenyi ze lihewa lyono u Mulungu yagapelile makanisa ga Makedoniya.
47008002	Wose wono wehuwiye wono wali kuko, vyono watuga majelo mawaha so wugaye, ninga hamba nhavivyo inyemo yawo yikonjelezeka muno, sunga wakawa wacemezi muno, hamba wawe wali waciwa muno muno.
47008003	Nosuma kuhomelela vyono wali wacemezi mu nghango ye vilungo vyawo no kuciziliza. Kanyhi ko wuhile wawo weneco du,
47008004	wakacinena muno wapegwe cilejeho co kuhanga nase mu witumami wuwu wo kuwataza wanhu wo Mulungu wono wali mu Wuyahudi.
47008005	Ayo yali yo nghani yono si cali ciyilanjiliye hamba hadodo! Hambi nha wamula kwiyilavya weneco kuli Muwaha, hanyuma ho wakawa kwiyilavya na kuli'se nhavivilya nha vyono winha uwuhile wo Muwaha.
47008006	Holeka cikamunena Tito mono yawamula u mulimo wuwu, yamutazilizenyi, ho musume kuwituma u witumami wuwuno wo wendo muli nyenye.
47008007	Vyono mukwizize vyose, mu wihuwilo, wulonje, wumanye, wupiligazi wo kwituma i ziswanu, sunga na mu wendo wenyu wa kuli'se. Holeka, cikuhila mucile muno mu witumami wuwuno wo wendo.
47008008	Si nghumupelenyi yilajilizo, langa nghuhila kulajila du nha vyono wanji wena wuhidimbazi wo wutazi, ho sume kuwumanya u wendo wenyu vyono wa mbeka.
47008009	Hambi anye nha mulimanyile lihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, nha vyono mwene hamba yawe yali yakwizize vyose, ninga yakenoza nha muciwa ku soko yenyu, anye ho mugolipile mu wuciwa wakwe.
47008010	Ku soko ye nghani yiyi, ane nghumutyenyi nhavi, yinojeye mwitume zizilya zono mwamula mwekazo. Vyono yo nyenye mwali walongozi kusola nghanzo yo kulamula kwituma nhavivyo.
47008011	Ale muwukondelezaje u mulimo wuwo, mu nghango ye nyhilu yono mwina nayo yo kulavyo 'tazi, mwitumaje nhavivyo ko wuhidimbazi, muwukondelezeze mu nghango nha vyono mosuma.
47008012	Hono munhu yawe yena mutima wo wutazi, u Mulungu nayo kabocelaga co cose cono u munhu yuyo kosuma kulavya, Mwene si kakanililaga yaye.
47008013	Ninga si munojeye monjelezwe wugaye wenyu, wanji ho wasume kucepulilwa umutegulo wawo wo kulavya wutazi, aa ng'o, ninga yicinojeye cilanje u muling'ano wa kose kose hamonga ne ling'ani.
47008014	Co cose cono mwina naco cono cicizize, yinojeye cico ciwataze awalya wono wena wanjile, nawo kolo watuga vyono vicizize, ho wamutazenyi nanye mu visakwa vyenyu, na mu nzila yiyo, ho mowa mweza muli muling'ano.
47008015	Nha vyono i Mandiko gakutya, “Mono yakonghola ko winji, hamba siyatuga kuciziliza, nayo mono yakonghola vicefu, hamba si yanjiza.”
47008016	Nghumulumbo Mulungu mono yamupela Tito i nhumbula yono yina nyhilu nhe yangu yo kumupelenyi wutazi.
47008017	Ninga si yalumba ku soko vyono camulomba yanoze nhavivyo, langa sunga no mweneco yali yena nyhilu muno yo wutazi, sunga yakasuma kulamula mweneco du, ho yaze kuko kwenyu.
47008018	Alu cikumutumiliza hamonga no ndugu yetu yunji mono u lukumyo lwakwe lutandaye mu makanisa gose ku soko yo wuganula u Luganuzi Luswanu.
47008019	Hamonga na zizo, mwene yehagwa ne makanisa gose, ho ciwe jendana nayo lono cikwitumama u witumami wetu wuwuno wo wendo, witumami wono cikwituma so lukumyo lo Muwaha no kulajila wuhile wetu wuswanu, wo kuhila kulavya wutazi.
47008020	Cikuhila kwilega yunji yalece kucihosa ku soko yo wulanjilizi we vipegwa vyono civilavizye sese.
47008021	Ninga wuhile wetu, cikusaka citume viswanu du hali Muwaha, sunga na hali wanhu nhavivyo.
47008022	Hamonga ne wandugu zetu wawo, cimutuma no ndugu yetu yunji, mono cakondya kumuwona kali kenji, vyono u mwene nayo yena wuhidimbazi wo wutazi, sunga na lulu yena witumbilo wuwaha na nyenye.
47008023	Tito yo muyangu, mono cikwituma hamonga u mulimo ku soko yenyu. Ninga kuli za awano wandugu zetu wanji wono vikuzana nawo, awo watumwa ne makanisa nu lukumyo lwa Kilisito.
47008024	Holeka muwalajilaje u wendo wenyu, i makanisa ho gasume kuwona vyono cina ling'ani yo kwilumba so nyenye.
47009001	Hambi nhe kataza lya bwete kumwandicilenyi kuli zo witumami wenyu wuwo, ku soko ye wanhu wo Mulungu wono wali ku Wuyahudi.
47009002	Manyile vyono mwina nhumbula yo wutazi, nane nghalumba ku soko yenyu so nghani yiyo kuli wanhu we Makedoniya. Nawalonjela nghatya, “Wandugu zetu wono wali ku Akaya, wali wewikanize kunoza wutazi ku wulawa mwekazo.” Holeka u wihinde wenyu, wakondya kuwaswaswaniza wanhu wenji muno.
47009003	Alu nghuwatuma wandugu zetu wawo, u wilumbe wetu wa muli'nye, ho wijele vyono si nghani ya bwete, na kanyhi vyono mwiwikanizize lukulu so wutazi wenyu nha vyono nalonga.
47009004	Yilece kuwa kanyhi i wanhu we Makedoniya kolo wakuza hamonga nane, cimwaganenyi mukali newikaniza, baho ase cowa cakozwa cevu, ne cevu naco cono mocituga nyenye nyo weneco, cowa si cakulonga, vyono ase cowa cakondya kumwitumbililenyi lukulu.
47009005	Holeka mbona viswanu vyono yinojeye niwanene wandugu zetu wawa, wanongolele kuza kwenyu, ho wasume kuviwikaniziza lukulu vipegwa vyenyu viwaha, navyo viwe vyawikanizwa kolo nghuza, vyono mwehuwiza. Ne vipegwa vivyo, vilajile mbeka, nha vyono vilavywa ko mutima muzelu, hamba si ko wudindimizwe yaye.
47009006	Ninga mweze kukumbucila vyono, “U munhu mono yakuhadika ko wucefu, nayo kolo dudula wucefu, nayo munhu mono yakuhadika ko winji, ale, kolodudula ko winji.”
47009007	Holeka munhu wo wose yalavye mu nghango nha vyono yalamuye, ninga yiweze ko mutima muzelu, hamba si ko wukalale, hamba kwe dindimiza, hambi u Mulungu, nha kamwendaga u munhu mono kalavyaga no wusangalale.
47009008	U Mulungu kosuma kumupelenyi kuciza vyono mukuhila, ho muwe muvikwizize vyose mu visakwa vyenyu, ho mucile kuwa watazi mu milimo yose miswanu,
47009009	nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gakutya, “Mwene kalavyaga ko wuswanu kawapelaga waciwa, no wuswanu wakwe wikalaga cibitilila.”
47009010	Nayo u Mulungu mono kamupelaga mbeyu mulimi, no kumupela i ndigwa yo kulya, komupelenyi nanye zimbeyu zono mukuhila, nayo kozicindisa no kuziwilusa, hamonga no kumupelenyi ndudula mbaha ku soko yo weza mutima wenyu.
47009011	Nayo komugolifyenyi nhondo zose muli vyose, wanhu ho wasume kumulumbo Mulungu, ku soko ye vipegwa vyenyu vyono wakuvibocelela mu miwoko yetu.
47009012	Hambi u mulimo wuwu wono welile wono mukuwituma, si vyono wowataza i wanhu wo Mulungu du, langa wowanoza wanhu wenji wamulumbe Mulungu.
47009013	Na ku soko ye citanjilo cono cikwijela so mulimo wetu wuwu, i wanhu womukumyo Mulungu ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito lono mukuluvumila, kanyhi na ku soko yo wuswanu wono mukuwatendela wene hamonga ne wanhu wose.
47009014	Holeka wojendelela kumulombelenyi ko mutima wose, ku soko ye lihewa lyono u Mulungu yamupelenyi.
47009015	U Mulungu yalumbwe so cipegwa cakwe cono ase si cosuma kucikumya nha vyono yicinojeye.
47010001	Ane yo nene no mweneco Pawulo, mono nghwijela nili mupolo lono nili hamonga nanye, ninga ho nili mukali lono nili kutali nanye, nghumunenenyi ko lusungu no wuswanu wa Kilisito.
47010002	Nghumunenenyi mulece kusagahiza ho niwe nili mukali kolo neza kuza, hambi nha manyiye lukulu, vyono nowakalipila wose wono wakwihwesa vyono, ase cikaye mu mikalile ye ciyinze yinze.
47010003	Heya mbeka cikaye mononze, ninga si cikwihoma ciyinze yinze.
47010004	Hambi i vitwalo vyono cikwitumamila mu wihomi wetu, nha si vitwalo vye ciyinze yinze, langa vyo vilungo vyo Mulungu vyono vigwisaga magomawakali gose. Nase cikusuma kuwugwiza u wusugu-sugu wose wo wulambi,
47010005	no kuvikumulanga vimizi vyose vyo wiwoni, vyono vikwimila u wumanyo Mulungu, cikugakwega i mahweso gose, no kuganoza gamuhulice Kilisito.
47010006	Mulawa mweza kuwa mwakwilanicila mu cihuliko, ale, ase ciwikanizize lukulu kuwulipiciza u wula cihuliko wose.
47010007	Anye waco mulangaga za kunze du. Wulenyi, ho yuli munhu wo wose mono yakwihwesa vyono mwene yo wa Kilisito? Ale viswanu! Ninga yehwesaje nhavivilya nha vyono nase cili wakwe Kilisito nha vyono mwene yuyo wa Kilisito.
47010008	Hamba niwe nghwijela nha naciziliza muno u wilumbi wangu so wulajilize wono u Mulungu yacipela, u wulajilize wo kumusikamyenyi nyenye, hamba si so kumugwisenyi yaye.
47010009	Si nyendile mwihwese nha vyono nghusaka kumogofyenyi so baluwa zangu.
47010010	Yunji yadahile kutya, “Baluwa za Pawulo nzito, kanyhi zina nghani zono zili vilungo, ninga mwene lono yali hamonga nase, yo munhu musocele, sunga lono yakuduwa du, koziwona i zinghani zakwe kotya si cinji ng'o.”
47010011	No munhu mono yakulonga nhavivyo, ciba yakumbucile vyono, hasina wisimajile na zono candikaga mu zibaluwa zetu lono cili kunji, na zono cokwituma lono cowa cili baho hamonga nanye.
47010012	Hamba nhavivyo, si cali cisume kwijelela kwiwika hamba kwiyihwananiza na awalya wanhu wono wakwiyikumya weneco. I wanhu wono wakwiyinoza weneco kuwa nha cipimo co kwiyipimila weneco, kanyhi wakwiyiling'aniza weneco wose, wawo wasina wizuce.
47010013	Ninga ase si cosuma kwiyilumba kuciza ha nghango, langa u wilumbe wuwo wowa wuli mu nghango yo mulimo wono u Mulungu yacipela, u mulimo wono cikuwituma sunga na kuko kwenyu.
47010014	Alu nanye vyono muli mu nghango yiyo, nase si casuma kuciza nghango yiyo lono cazizo kwenyu, kumuletelenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.
47010015	Holeka nase si cikwilumbila mulimo wono wanji wetuma, si nhe nghango yono capegwa, langa citumbiye vyono u wihuwilo wenyu wocila kuwiluka, nase ho cituje mulimo muwaha muno muli nyenye mu nghango yi yilya du yono yaciwicila Mulungu.
47010016	Baho lu, ho cosuma kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu na mu zisi zinji zono zili kutali na kono kwenyu, na yowa si nghani yo kwilumbila mulimo wono wetuma wanhu wanji kunhu kunji.
47010017	Nha vyono i Mandiko gakulonga gakutya, “U munhu wo wose mono yakusaka kwilumba, yimunojeye yelumbile muli yono yetumo Muwaha.”
47010018	Nayo mono yakuvumilwa, si yulya mono yakwiyikumya mweneco ng'o, langa yo yulya muno Muwaha yakumukumya.
47011001	Mwali munghangalilile hadodo du, hamba niwe nha nili mulele ku lubavu lunji! Heya, ale munghangalilile ta hadodo.
47011002	Ane nha nghumuwonelenyi wivu, ninga wivu wa kuli Mulungu, hambi anye nha mwihwanile u muhinza musindile mono nimubanyiye u mulume monga du, nayo yo Kilisito.
47011003	Ninga nghogopa yilece kuwa nhe lizoka lyono ko wusugu walyo wo wulambi, likamukoca Hawa, i mahweso genyu gadahile kwajilizwa no kuwuleka u wihuwilwa wenyu we mbeka kuli Kilisito.
47011004	Hambi nye nha mukumukangalila u munhu wo wose mono kokuza no kumuganula Yesu mono yesimajiye na yulya mono camuganula, kanyhi mukubocela muhe no luganuzi vyono visimajiliye lukulu no Muhe no Luganuzi vyono mwavibocela kulawa kuli'se.
47011005	Si nghwihwesa vyono ane nili mudodo si nha wawo “I Watumwa wenyu wono wakumucile!”
47011006	Lunji nowa sina wunghula wo wulolosa milonjele, ninga u wumanye awo langa nina nawo, ne nghani yiyi cayilajila calinze kuli'nye hanhu ho hose, na mu vipango vyose.
47011007	Hamba si namudayenyi musahala wo wose, lono namuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, langa nenenenyheza ho sume kumwinulenyi anye. Alo nanoza vibi?
47011008	Lono netumaga mulimo muli'nye, i visakwa vyangu nha vyalawaga mu makanisa ganji. Nha cinji wo wutya nawasolela sawo yawo, ho sume kumwitumamilenyi anye.
47011009	Na lono nali nanye, hamba si namugaza munhu wo wose so wusaka pesa, langa i wandugu zetu wono wakalawa Makedoniya, wo wandetela vyose vyono nasakaga. Kanyhi nelanjilila muno muno ho ndece kuwa mutegulo kuli'nye, mu nzila yo yose yilya, na nojendelela du kunoza nhavivyo.
47011010	Nane nghwihuwiziza mu mbeka ya Kilisito yono yili muli'ne, nha vyono hasina cono cosuma kunyimila mu wilumbe wangu so nghani yiyi hanhu ho hose mu Akaya.
47011011	Alo nhawule nghulonga nhavivi? Vyono si nimwendilenyi nyenye? Ninga Mulungu yamanyile vyono nimwendilenyi nyenye muno!
47011012	Nojendelela kwituma du nha vyono nghwituma alu, ho ndece kuwapela cilejeho awalya wono wakusaka kutuga icilejeho co kwilumbila nha vyono ati wakwituma mulimo nha sese.
47011013	Hambi wawo nha wo watumwa wo wulambi, wetumami wo wukonji, wono wakwinoza nha watumwa wa Kilisito.
47011014	Kanyhi hamba si nghani ya wizine, hamba na Setani mweneco nha kenozaga kawa nha malayika wo wuzelu!
47011015	Holeka si nghani mbaha yaye, hono wawo i wetumami wakwe wenoze nha wetumami wo wiling'ano. Ninga mudumo wawo, wocituga cico cono ciwanojeye vyono genhe metumo gawo.
47011016	Kanyhi nghutya, Munhu yalece kumbona ane nha nili mulele. Ninga hono munyihweseze nhavivyo, ale munozaje nha nili mulele nhavivyo du, nane ho nicituje co kwilumbila hadodo vivi.
47011017	Naco cono nghucilonga aluno, si nghulonga cono yandajiliza Muwaha, hambi mu nghani yiyi yo wilumbe, ane nghuyilonga du nha nili mulele.
47011018	Alu vyono kowali wenji wono wakwilumbila za mononze, ale nane nhavivyo nokwilumba.
47011019	Anye muli we mahala, na holeka mukuwakangalila i walele!
47011020	Mukusuma kumukangalilila sunga no munhu mono yakumunozenyi muwe wawanda, u munhu mono kumusolelenyi vinhu vyenyu, mono yakumwiwonelenyi, mono yakumubedegalenyi no kumutowenyi ku wusu!
47011021	Nane nghuvumilila cevu, vyono ase cali cisoceye mu wituma zizi zose. Ale du kanyhi, na yiwe vyono yowa, ninga hono hawe hoyuli yunji wo wose mono yakwijelela kwilumbila muli cinji co cose, alu nghulonga nha munhu mulele, nane nokwijelela nhavivyo.
47011022	Wule, alo wene Wahebelaniya? Ale na nene nhavivyo. Hamba wene Waisilayeli lo? Nane nhavivyo. Wene wamu lulelo lwa Abulahamu? Hamba na nene.
47011023	Alo iwene wetumami wa Kilisito? Na nene ye, alu nhondo, neza kulonga cimangha-lukwale, ane nili mwitumami wa Kilisito kuciza wene. Ane netuma mulimo muzito muno muno, nadindilwa mu jela kali kenji muno, nghatowangwa kali kenji, sunga nghawa nili behi no kufwa kali kenji.
47011024	Kali kahano nghakunwa viboko vivilya makumi madatu ne cenda ne Wayahudi.
47011025	Nakunangwa ne viboko kadatu, nghabogolangwa ne mabwe kamonga, kanyhi nghabenecelwa ne nghalawa mwi'lenga kali kadatu, na kamonga nekala mumo mu malenga cilo cose sunga wukela, kanyhi nghaswa muno misi yose.
47011026	Kenji na kenji mu mihinzo yangu, netang'anilaga na mbali nyinji, zimbali zo wulapuce we malenga mu makolongo, zimbali ze malimu makali, zimbali ze wahizi, zimbali zono zalawaga kuli wanyawusi wayangu Wayahudi, na zono zalawaga kuli waono si Wayahudi, ne zimbali za mu makaya mawaha, zimbali za mu mbago, zimbali za mwi'lenga, ne zimbali zono zikulawa kuli wandugu wo wulambi!
47011027	Netuma mulimo hamonga ne magayo, nekala meso hamba kugona cilo cose kali kenji, nghadabuka no kuwona nyhilu. Nghaleka kulya, nghekala mu mbeho nghali, akuno sina myenda.
47011028	Ninga hamonga na zinji nyinji, kocili cono cikumvuna nhondo zose, nha cinji u mulimo we makanisa gose.
47011029	Hono hoyuli yunji musocele, ale nane nili musocele nhavivyo, na munhu wo wose hono yakwejelwe mu wubi, nane nghutuga wukalale muno.
47011030	Holeka hono yiwe yinojeye nilumbe, ale, nokwilumbila wusocele wangu.
47011031	U Mulungu Sogo yo Muwaha Yesu, ilitagwa lyakwe lilugutwe cibitilila! U Mwene yamanyile vyono si nghulonga wulambi.
47011032	Lono nali Damesiki, u muwaha we yisi, mono yali yali hasi yo mutemi Aleta, yalidimaga likaya lya Damesiki, ho yasume kunyibata.
47011033	Ninga nghatimizizwa mu nhoto mbaha, nghakozwa mwidilisha sunga ko kunze, holeka nghatiga mu miwoko yakwe.
47012001	Mulece nilumbe, hamba yiwe si yinojeye. Ninga nolonga luno kuli zo wulajilwe no wugubulilwe vyono yamhela Muwaha.
47012002	Nimumanyile munhu yunji Mukilisito, mono mu myaka i kumi na mine yono yipulute, u munhu yuyo, yakasolwa yakategulwa sunga ko ku wulanga we kadatu. (Ninga langa simanyile vyono, lono yali yali kuko, hono yali yali mu muwili, hamba mu muhe azo zo Mulungu yamanyile.)
47012003	Nghuwuyajiza kanyhi kutya, manyile du vyono u munhu yuyo, yasolwa sunga ko ku Paladiso. (Langa si manyile hono yali yali kuko mu muwili hamba mu muhe, u Mulungu yamanyile.)
47012004	Ninga kuko yazihulika zinghani ze cinyele, zono u munhu siyanojeye kuzilonga.
47012005	Holeka nokwilumbila munhu yuyo, ninga si nokwilumba nene no mweneco, langa mu wusocele wangu du.
47012006	Na hono nali nyende kwilumba, si nali niwe nili mulele hamba hadodo, hambi nha nali niwe nghulonga ze mbeka du. Ninga alu si nosuma kwilumba, hambi nha sinyendile munhu yunji yanyihweseze kuziza nha vyono yakumbona no kuhulika kulawa kuli'ne.
47012007	Ninga ho ndece kwilumba so zinghani zizi zimbaha zono nagubulilwa, napegwa wusungu mu muwili wangu kotya yimiya, u mwitumami wa Setani, mono yakunhowa, ho ndece kwilumba kuciza.
47012008	Nane nghamunena Muwaha kadatu so nghani yiyi, ho yimbucile.
47012009	Ninga Mwene yakanhya, “Ilihewa lyangu likukwiliye, hambi vilungo vyangu nha vikwilanicizwaga lono wuli mu wusocele.” Ninga ane nyendile muno kwilumbila wusocele wangu, ho vilungo vya Kilisito vikale muli'ne.
47012010	Holeka nyheye kanyhi nyendezwe du, hono mu wusocele, mu wubedegalwe, mu wugaye, mu wuwinjilizwe, na mu magazo ku soko ya Kilisito, hambi lono nili musocele, nha ho nghuwela nili vilungo.
47012011	Alu naweza nha nili mulele, ninga yo nyenye mono mundindimize ho niwe nhavivyo. Hambi anye, nha yo nyenye mono mwali munojeye munumbe. Vyono, hamba niwe si nili cinji yaye, ninga hamba nhavivyo, ane si nili mudodo kuciza wawo i “Watumwa wenyu wono wakumucile.”
47012012	I mapoto ne mezino vyono vikulajila calinze vyono nane nili mutumwa, nha vyonozezwa muli nyenye ko wukangalizi wose.
47012013	Hambi cinhuci cono mwafutigwa kuciza makanisa ganji, langa hono si nene du mono si nasaka nimugazenyi ho mumhele u wutazi wenyu? Ninga hamba nhavivyo nghumulombenyi munenele so wuleka kumupelenyi i cilejeho cico co kumhela wutazi wenyu!
47012014	Ninga aluno nakondya kwiwikaniziza lukulu ku wuza kwenyu lwe kadatu, ninga si nomutunyenyi mumhele co cose. Hambi ane nha si nghulondola sawo yenyu langa nghumulondolenyi nyenye nyo weneco. Hambi nha yiwanojeye walezi wo wawawicile viwutwa i wana wawo, si nhe wana kuwawicila viwutwa i walezi wawo.
47012015	Ane nyendezwe muno nitumile cono nina naco, sunga ko ku wilavizya lukulu nene no mweneco, ku soko ye cambuzi ce zinhumbula zenyu. Alu hongo monyenda hadodo, vyono ati'ne nimwendilenyi anye muno muno?
47012016	Ale du kanyhi, ninga ane no mweneco si namuvunenyi yaye. Na lunji yunji kosuma kutya, “Pawulo vyono musugu, alu yakondya kumwibatenyi ko wusugu wakwe.”
47012017	Wulenyi nakondya kumukalipilenyi mu nzila ya munhu wo wose mono namutuma kwenyu?
47012018	Ane namucema Tito, nghawa kumutumilenyi mwene hamonga no ndugu yetu yunji. Ninga wulenyi, Tito yakamukalipilenyi? Alu si mumanyile vyono Tito na nene cikutongwa no Muhe yuyo yumonga? Na vyono cikalaga mu mikalile yono yihwanile?
47012019	Lunji mukwihwesa vyono, sunga nalu cikali cikwitetela hali'nye! Ninga cikuzilonjela i zinghani zizi hali Mulungu akuno cilunzize na Kilisito. Ninga soko ye zinghani zizo zose, nye nyo wedece wangu, ho musume kuzengwa.
47012020	Nane nghogopa vyono na lunji kolo nghuza kwenyu, nomwaganenyi mu wuwe wono si wukunyendeza, nane baho lu, si noleka kuwa mu wuwe wono si mwendile nanye. Nane nghogopa yilece kuwa lunji ko wuli wugombane, wivu, makuwo, wubuguci, maheho, nzwaji ze caka caka, wusomenghanya, wiwoni, no wisagale muli nyenye.
47012021	Kanyhi nghogopa, na lunji kolo neza kuza mu muhinzo wuwo wono nokuza, u Mulungu wangu komhela u wula nyemo hali nyenye, nane nolila ku soko ya wenji wa muli nyenye wono wetuma wubi hamba kunena wuwo wavu wawo, ne masulumizi gawo mabi, hamonga ne mawubi gawo go wusenyha wawo, gono wali wakondya kwituma.
47013001	Alu lo lwe kadatu lo kuza kwenyu. “I makamu go gose, gahulicizwe hamwande ye wahomelezi wejete hamba wadatu.” I Mandiko vyo gakutya.
47013002	Nakondya kulonga nha vyono yali yinha mu muhinzo we kejete, nalu nghulonga kanyhi lono nili kutali nanye, vyono wawalya wose wono wetuma wubi hamba kunena yaye, sunga na wawalya wanji, kolo nghuza, ale woviwona.
47013003	Alu langa ho mokwiwonelela nyo weneco, vyono Kilisito yakulonjela muli nene. Mono kuli'nye, Kilisito si yasoceye yaye, langa i vilungo vyakwe vikwituma muli nyenye.
47013004	Hamba yiwe nha yatumbicilwa mu musalaba mu wusocele, ninga alu yakuwumipa kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu. Nase cisoceye nhavivyo so wilunza nayo, ninga ciwumipana hamonga nayo kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu ku soko yenyu.
47013005	Ale mwiyijele nyo weneco ho mumanye hono mbeka mwina wihuwilo. Mwiyihenje nyo weneco. Alo si mumanyile vyono Kilisito Yesu yali muli nyenye? Na hono yiwe si nhavivyo, anye waco mwalemwa.
47013006	Ninga nitumbiye nha vyono anye mumanyile vyono ase cikali nalemegwa.
47013007	Cikumulomba u Mulungu, ho mulece kwituma wubi wo wose, ninga si vyono ho cijele nha wanhu wono wakondya kusuma, langa ho musume kwituma ziswanu, hamba ase ciwe kwijela kotya nha cilemigwe.
47013008	Hambi nha si cosuma kwituma cinji kusutana ne mbeka, vyono u wusume wono cina nawo, nha cina wusume wo kuyijendeleza mbeka.
47013009	Ninga cikusangalala vyono cili wasocele, langa anye muli vilungo, holeka cikulomba muwuficile u wukwilanicile.
47013010	Ale holeka nghuyandika baluwa yiyi lono nili kunji, nilawa neza kufika kuko, ho ndece kuwa nili mukali kuli'nye no kuwitumamila u wulajilize wono napegwa no Muwaha, u wulajilize wo kumusikamyenyi hamba si wo kumugwisenyi yaye.
47013011	Na ye ndumilizo, wandugu zangu, nghutya, mwikalaje! Mweze mukamile, muwibataje muno muno u wijize wangu, mweze mulaganiye kumonga, mwikalaje mwilamuye. Nayo u Mulungu wo wendo no mulamu, kowa hamonga nanye.
47013012	Mwilamusizaje mu winonele wono welile. I wanhu wose wo Mulungu wono wali akuno, wose wakumulamusenyi muno.
47013013	Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, no wendo wo Mulungu, no wuhanje wo Muhe Mono Yelile, viwezane nanye wose.
48001001	Ane Pawulo u mutumwa, hamonga na we zindugu wose, wono wali hamonga nane, cikwandika kuli makanisa gono gali ku Galatiya. Ane nacemwa kuwa mutumwa, ninga si so wulajilize we wanhu, hamba si mu vilungo vyo munhu,
48001002	langa mu vilungo vya Yesu Kilisito, na mu vilungo vyo Mulungu Baba, mono yamuzukula Yesu muli wafu.
48001003	Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu Baba, na kuli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, viwezane nanye.
48001004	Kilisito yelavya mweneco ku soko yo wubi wetu, ku soko yo wendo wo Mulungu wetu no Sogo yetu, ho yaciponye mu yinze yiyi yimbi ya lulu.
48001005	Kuli mwene lweze lukumyo sunga cibitilila ne cibitilila. Heya
48001006	Nghwizina vyono cidaha cidodo du cono capuluta, nanye mweza kuwuka kuli yulya mono yamucemenyi mwi'hewa lya Kilisito, na luno mweza kutyatya kanyhi u Luganuzi Luswanu lunji.
48001007	Ninga i mbeka, howali wanhu wanji wono wakumuhanza-hanzenyi, wo wanhu wono wakuhila kulwajiliza u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.
48001008	Ninga hamba yawe yunji muli sese, hamba wawe Wamalayika wa ku wulanga, hono yamuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lunji lono si lwinha lono camuganulilenyi, yuyo yeze mulijitwe!
48001009	Nha vyono camula kulonga, nhavivyo vyo nghulonga kanyhi, yunji wo wose hono yamuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lunji lono si lwinha lono mwalubocela, yuyo yeze mulijitwe!
48001010	Alu'mbi kanyhi nghusaka wukombolwe wa nani, we wanhu hamba wo Mulungu? Hamba nghusaka kuwendeza wanhu lo? Na hono noze nhavivyo, kwaco, ane si nali niwe mwitumami wa Kilisito.
48001011	Nye nyo wandugu zangu, nghusaka mumanye vyono u Luganuzi Luswanu lululya lono naluganula, si yali nghani yono yikulawa kuli wanhu.
48001012	Hambi ane nha si nalubocela kulawa kuli wanhu, hamba si nejizwa na munhu, langa Yesu Kilisito mweneco yo yangubulila.
48001013	Hambi nha manyile vyono, mwazihulika i ze mikalile yangu ye katali yo wibata dini ye Ciyahudi, kanyhi na vyono naligazaga muno muno likanisa lyo Mulungu, sunga nghawa nili behi no kulihodanjila lukulu.
48001014	Heya, sunga nghawaciza wenji wanyawusi wayangu we lizika lyangu mu wibata yiyo dini ye Ciyahudi, nane kanyhi nghasimbilila muno muno mu wibate myoto ye walezi wetu.
48001015	Ninga u Mulungu, so lihewa lyakwe, yali yakondya kuhagula lono nali nghali hamba si nalelwa, nayo yakawa kunyhema ho nimwitumamile.
48001016	Nayo yaza yeza kulamula du kungubulila zo Mwanagwe, ho niluganule u Luganuzi lwakwe Luswanu kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nane si nejelela kuwuza mahweso kuli wanhu wanji,
48001017	hamba si namula kubita ku Yelusalemi ho nghewone na awalya wono wanongolela kuwa watumwa, langa namula kubita ku Alabiya, na hanyuma nghawa kuwuya kanyhi ku Damesiki.
48001018	Na hanyuma yaza kupuluta myaka midatu, ho nghawa kubita ku Yelusalemi nghamumanye Kefa, nane cikekalana nayo vilo yikumi na vihano.
48001019	Nane hamba sicewona na watumwa wanji, langa cewona na Yakobo du u nduguye wo Muwaha.
48001020	Azi zono nghumwandicilenyi, no Mulungu yamanyile vyono si nghulonga wulambi.
48001021	Hanyuma yayo nghawa kubita ku mbavu za ku Suliya na Kilikiya.
48001022	Na mwi'daha lilyo, nene no mweneco nghawa nghali namanyika kuli mhuga ye Wakilisito wa kuko ku Yudiya.
48001023	I wene wali wacimanyile du cono wali wacihulice, vyono, “U munhu yuyulya mono yacigazaga baho ha lulongozi, alu yakuwuganula u wihuwilo wuwulya wono yajelaga kuwuhodanga.”
48001024	Nawo wakamukumya u Mulungu ku soko yangu.
48002001	Hanyuma yaza kupuluta myaka yikumi na mine, nghawuyajila kanyhi kubita ku Yelusalemi cina hamonga na Balanaba, nghamusola na Tito cikabitana nayo.
48002002	No wubite wangu walawilila mu wugubule wono yangubulila Mulungu. Na muwihangulize we cinyele, nghasuma kuwaloloseza wawo iwalongola ze nghani yo Luganuzi Luswanu lono naluganula kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Nanoza nhavivyo ho mulimo wangu wono nali nakondya kuwituma, sunga na wono nali nghali kuwituma, wulece kuwa nha nghani ya bwete.
48002003	Ninga sunga no muyangu Tito mono cali cina nayo mono yali Mugiliki, si yadindimizwa kwalama,
48002004	hamba yiwe hali howali wandugu wo wulambi wono wali wahijiliye Tito yalame. I wanhu wawa weyinjiza ko wusugu, wakawa kuwulondola u welecele wetu wono cina nawo muli Kilisito Yesu, ho wacinjize mu wuwanda.
48002005	Nase si celumbaniza nawo hamba hadodo, i mbeka yo Luganuzi Luswanu ho yikale muli nyenye nhondo zose.
48002006	Ninga i wanhu wawa wono wakutegwa wo walongola, hono mbeka vyo wali wenha, hamba yiwe si nhavivyo, kwangu si nghani yaye, hambi u Mulungu nha siyakuwa kuling'aniza so wulanga za kunze, ne wanhu wawa wali wasina cinji cono wali wadahile konjeleza mu Luganuzi lulu Luswanu nha vyono ane nghuluganula no mweneco.
48002007	Hamba nhavivyo, wali wamanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yanhuma kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nha vyono Petelo yali yatumigwe kuwaganulila i Wayahudi.
48002008	Ku soko vyono yuyo mono yamupela Petelo i vilungo vyo kuwela mutumwa kuli Wayahudi, yo yuyo kanyhi mono yamhela nane i vilungo vyo kuwela mutumwa kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
48002009	Holeka wa Yakobo na Kefa hamonga na Yohana, wono wakwijela nha wo walongola wawaha, wali wamanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yamhela lihewa lilyo, holeka wakawa kucilamusa ane na Balanaba kwe miwoko yawo, wakulajila i citanjilo co wuhangane hamonga. Na yikawa yicinojeye ase ciketume u mulimo kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wene nawo kuli Wayahudi.
48002010	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wacilomba ase cinhu cimonga, nha cinji ciwakumbucile wanhu waciwa, na yo nghani yono nghuhidimbala muno kuyituma.
48002011	Ninga Kefa yaza kuza ku Antiyokiya, namwimila cagalanze hamwande ya wose, ku soko yali yasutizye.
48002012	Ku soko vyono ha mwamulizo, i wanhu wanji wono watumwa na Yakobo, lono wali wakali si nafika baho, Petelo vyalizanaga hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Ninga waza kufika wanhu wawo, hodu Petelo yakawa kulecela lukulu kulizana ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ku soko vyono yawogopa i wanhu wawo wono wahilaga i wanhu wono si Wayahudi walame.
48002013	Sunga ne wandugu wanji we Ciyahudi wakevumila hamonga na Petelo mwi'tumo lilyo lyo wukoci, sunga na Balanaba yakenjizwa nayo mu wukoci wawo.
48002014	Holeka nane naza kuwuwona u wuwe wawo wa mu mbeka yo Luganuzi Luswanu, vyono si wuli mu nzila yono yili mu mbeka, hobaho nghawa kumulonjela Kefa hali wose, nghamutya, “Hamba wuwe agwe wuli Muyahudi, ninga wukwikala mu mikalile nha vyono wekaye wanhu wono si Wayahudi, hamba si wikaye kotya Muyahudi! Alu kosuma nhawule kujela kuwadindimiza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi wekale mu mikalile ye Wayahudi?”
48002015	Heya mbeka, ase kulawa katali cili Wayahudi, hamba si cili wanhu we wono si Wayahudi, wawo i wahodanji!
48002016	Ninga cimanyiye lukulu vyono u munhu si kosuma kuvumilwa hali Mulungu ku soko yo kuwibata u Wulajilize, langa so kumwihuwila Yesu Kilisito du. Na sese cimwihuwiye Yesu Kilisito nhavivyo ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo wetu kuli Kilisito, hamba si so wibate wo Wulajilize.
48002017	Alu hono yiwe mu wulondola wuvumilwe hali Mulungu muli Kilisito, cikwijela cili wabi nha vyono wenha i wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wule! Nghani yiyo yowa yina nhunizo yo wutya Kilisito yakutaza mu wituma wubi? Aa ng'o!
48002018	Langa hono niwe nghuzenga kanyhi cicilya cono nakondya kucikumula, baho langa nghwilajila vyono nili muhodanji.
48002019	Ku soko ane nakondya kufwa mu Wulajilize wuwo, u Wulajilize weneco wo wambulaga, ho niwe nili mumi muli Mulungu. Ane nawulagwa hamonga na Kilisito mu musalaba,
48002020	ninga nghuwumipa, ninga yo si nene kanyhi, langa Kilisito yo yakuwumipa muli nene. No wumi wuwu wono nina nawo lulu, nghuwumipila u wihuwilo, u wihuwilo wa muli Mwana wo Mulungu mono yanyenda sunga yakelavya wumi wakwe ku soko yangu.
48002021	Si nghwenda kulema lihewa lyo Mulungu. Hono yiwe munhu kanozwaga ling'ani hali Mulungu mu nzila yo Wulajilize, kumbe Kilisito yafwa bwete.
48003001	Anye mo Wagalatiya, mbeka mweza muli walele! Alo mono yamukulujenyi nani? Hamby inghani yo wutumbikwe wa Yesu Kilisito, nha mwanzalicilwa ha meso genyu.
48003002	Alu nghusaka kumanya nghani monga du kuli'nye. Alu mwamubocela u Muhe wo Mulungu ho musume kwituma i metumo go Wulajilize, hamba ku soko ho muluhulice no kulwihuwila u Luganuzi Luswanu?
48003003	Alo nha wule muli walele nhavivi? Mwamuliziza zose mu wutazi wo Muhe wo Mulungu, alu mukuhila kumaliliziza mu vilungo vyenyu mo weneco?
48003004	Alo wo wutya, i zinghani zose zilya zono zamutujenyi zawa za bwete? Si yosumika yaye!
48003005	Ma, u Mulungu, yakawa kumupelenyi u Muhe kanyhi no kwituma mapoto muli nyenye, vyono mukuzifisiliza za mu Wulajilize hongo, hamba vyono mukuluhulika u Luganuzi Luswanu no kulwihuwila?
48003006	Ta, cilanje za Abulahamu; u mwene yamwihuwila u Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu yakamuvumila no kumuwona yali ling'ani.
48003007	Holeka mumanye vyono i wanhu wono wakumwihuwila, wawo wo wana wa Abulahamu.
48003008	I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulajila vyono, u Mulungu kowanoza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi ho wavumilwe hali mwene mu nzila yo wihuwilo. Holeka i Mandiko Gono Gelile galongola kumulonjela Abulahamu u Luganuzi Luswanu gakutya, “I wanhu wose wono si Wayahudi wolomotesezwa muli gwegwe.”
48003009	Holeka wawo wono wena u wihuwilo, wolugutizwa nha vyono Abulahamu yalugutizwa vyono yali yehuwiye.
48003010	Holeka wose wono wetumbiye kufisiliza za mu Wulajilize du, wali mu wulijitwe, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “Muli wose mono si yakwibata no kufisiliza zose zono zandikwe mu citabu co Wulajilize, mulijitwe.”
48003011	Nha yanzalikwe, vyono u Wulajilize si wosuma kumunoza munhu ho yavumilwe hali Mulungu, hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Mono yakuvumilwa hali Mulungu ku so wihuwilo, yuyo kowumipa.”
48003012	Hambi u Wulajilize no wihuwilo, siyo cinhu cimonga yaye, langa i Mandiko gakutya, “Mono kozifisiliza zose zono zikusakwa mu Wulajilize, yuyo kowumipa.”
48003013	Kilisito yacikomboza mu wulijitwe wo Wulajilize, hambi nha yawusola u wulijitwe wuwo ku soko yetu, vyono i Mandiko gakulonga, “Muli wose mono kotumbikwa mu musalaba, yuyo mulijitwe.”
48003014	Nghani yiyi yanozwa ho wulugutwe awulya wono yapegwa Abulahamu, wusume kuwaziza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito, na mu nzila yo wihuwilo, cisume kuwubocela u Muhe yulya mono u Mulungu yacihuwiziza.
48003015	Wandugu zangu, nomulonjelenyi i cihwanicizo ca mu mikalile yetu ye nhondo zose. Mwihwesaje ta muli ze cilagane ca wanhu wejete. I cilagane cila kuwa cawikwa cakondya, hamonga no kutajilwa sayini, hasina munhu mono kacidelengulaga, hamba kuconjeleza cinji.
48003016	Ale Abulahamu nayo yapegwa cilagane mweneco hamonga no lulelo lwakwe. Ne Mandiko si gakutya, “Ne zindelo zakwe.” Nha kotya wenji, langa gakutya “No lulelo lwakwe” nha kotya yumonga du nayo yo Kilisito.
48003017	Na cono nghusaka kucilonga nha coci, u Mulungu yanoza i cilagane cakwe kanyhi yakacikangaza, holeka u Wulajilize wono waza lono yali yakondya kupuluta myaka magana mane na makumi madatu, si wosuma kucidelengula i cilagane hamba kucinoza ciwe nha nghani ya bwete.
48003018	Hambi i cipegwa co Mulungu hono ciwe cikwitumbila u Wulajilize, i cipegwa cico si cosuma kwitumbila kanyhi i cilagane co Mulungu. Ninga u Mulungu yamupela Abulahamu ku soko ye cilagane.
48003019	Alu u Wulajilize waci? Wonjelezwa ho wuwulajile u wuhodanji co cici, sunga kolo yakuza ayulya wo lulelo lwa Abulahamu mono yalaganizwa. U Wulajilize waletwa na malayika ko muwoko wo mulamuzi.
48003020	Yene yili mbeka vyono u mulamuzi si kasakwaga hono nghani yiwe kuli munhu monga, langa u Mulungu yo yumonga.
48003021	Alo u Wulajilize vikusutana ne vilagane vyo Mulungu? Ng'o si nhavivyo yaye! Hambi hono wali wulavywe Wulajilize wono wosuma kuwapela wanhu wumi, baho cali cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu mu nzila yo Wulajilize.
48003022	Ninga si nhavivyo, i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakondya kulonga nha vyono, i yinze yose yili mu vilungo vyo wubi, wono wehuwiye ho wapegwe i cilagane so wihuwilo muli Yesu Kilisito.
48003023	Na lono cali cikali si napegwa wuwo u wihuwilo, u Wulajilize wali wuciwopile, sunga wugubulwe u wihuwilo wuwo wono wazaga.
48003024	Holeka u Wulajilize wuwo wali nha mwijizi wetu sunga Kilisito yakaza, ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
48003025	Ninga alu vyono u wihuwilo waza, hodu, u Wulajilize wawa si mwijizi wetu kanyhi.
48003026	Na mu nzila yo wihuwilo, anye wose mwawa wana wo Mulungu muli Kilisito.
48003027	Nanye wose mono mwabaputizwa, mukelunza na Kilisito, alu mwamuvwala Kilisito.
48003028	Holeka hasina kanyhi wisimajile wa muli Muyahudi na mono si Muyahudi, hamba muwanda no munhu mulelele, mucekulu hamba mulume. Hambi anye wose nha mwaweza cinhu cimonga muli Kilisito Yesu.
48003029	Holeka anye hono muwe muli wakwe Kilisito, ale muli lulelo lwa Abulahamu, kanyhi mozibocela zizo ze cilagane co Mulungu.
48004001	Ninga nghutya nhavi, u muhazi lono yakali mudodo, si visimajiye no mwitumami, hamba yiwe yo munya sawo yose.
48004002	Mwipango lilyo lyose yakuwa yali mu mawoko ge walanjilizi ne wanyamhala, sunga vize vifice i vilo vyono vyatemezezwa no sogwe.
48004003	Nhavivyo nase lono cali cikali wadodo, cali cili wafugwa we myuhe yono yitemile mononze.
48004004	Ninga i vilo vyali vyeza kufika, u Mulungu yamutuma u Mwanagwe mono yalelwa no mucekulu, yakekala mu Wulajilize,
48004005	ho yawakomboze awalya wono wali mu Wulajilize, ase ho cinozwe wana wo Mulungu.
48004006	Alu vyono muli wana, u Mulungu yamutuma u Muhe wo Mwanagwe mu zinhumbula zetu, u Muhe mono kacemaga, “Aba,” wo wutya “Baba.”
48004007	Holeka alu agwe si wuli muwanda kanyhi, langa wuli mwana. Na vyono wuli mwana, holeka kozibocela zose zono u Mulungu yawawiciye i wanagwe.
48004008	I katali vyono mwali si mumumanyile u Mulungu, holeka mwayitumamilaga milungu yono si milungu ye mbeka.
48004009	Ninga alu vyono mwakondya kumumanya u Mulungu, lunji citye vyono mwakondya kumanyika no Mulungu, alu nhawule kanyhi mukuwuya ne nyuma no kuyitumamila kanyhi myuhe ayilya miciwa kanyhi yisoceye?
48004010	Mukuvicelelela i vilo, ne myezi, ne madaha, ne myaka!
48004011	Ane nghogopa ku soko, yilece kuwa lunji u mulimo wono netuma muli nyenye, wuwe wusina cambuzi.
48004012	Wandugu zangu, nghumunenenyi mweze mwinha nene, nha vyono nane ninha nyenye. Si mwanozeza wubi wo wose.
48004013	Mumanyile nha vyono u wutamwa wangu wo wamhela cilejeho co kumuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu ha lulongozi.
48004014	Hamba nhavivyo mwidaha lilyo si mwambedegala hamba kusemuna ku soko yo wusocele wangu, hamba muwe mwajelwa ho munoze nhavivyo, ninga mwambocela nha malayika wo Mulungu, kotya nha nali nawa yo Kilisito Yesu mweneco.
48004015	Nha mwali musangalaye, alu kanyhi cejela cici? Nghulonga mbeka, vyono mwipango lilyo mwali musume kugawusa meso genyu mumhele nene.
48004016	Alu ma! Neza nili mulugu wenyu vyono nghumulonjelenyi i mbeka?
48004017	Wawo i wanhu wanji wakumuhilenyi, ninga wuhile wawo si wuswanu. Wakuhila kumutemanulenyi na ane, ho muwendeze weneco, nha vyono wene wakumwendezenyi nyenye.
48004018	Heya, yene mbeka yo nghani swanu nhondo zose, hono wuwe no wuhile kwa wanji so ziswanu, kanyhi si mu cipango du cono ane nghali nili hamonga nanye.
48004019	Mo wanangu, ane kanyhi nghumugazicilenyi muno nha vyono kagazikaga mucekulu mono yali magulu mazito mu cipango co kusawa, sunga Kilisito yalaza kuwa yalunzwa muli nyenye.
48004020	Yali yiwe yili ciba hono nali niwe hamonga nanye alu, ho nhuje wuwe wono wusikame muli nyenye. Hambi nha nina mahwele menji ku soko yenyu.
48004021	Munonjelaje ta, anye mono mukali kusaka kutemwa no Wulajilize, Wulenyi muwuhulice u Wulajilize vyono wukutya?
48004022	Yandicigwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, vyono Abulahamu yali yena wana wejete, yumonga yali mwana wo mucekulu u muwanda, na we kejete yali wo mucekulu mono yali si muwanda.
48004023	Ayulya wo mucekulu muwanda yalelwa nha vyono yizoweywe, langa ayulya wo mucekulu mono yali si muwanda, yalelwa so cilagane co Mulungu.
48004024	I zinghani zizo zikuwa nha hwani, i wacekulu wawo wejete yo hwani ye vilagane vyejete, i cilongozi co acilya cono canozezwa mwitunda lya Sinayi, ne hanhu hayo yo Hagali, ne wanagwe walelelwaga mu wuwanda.
48004025	Nayo Hagali yakuwa nha lyo litunda lya Sinayi lyono lili ku Alabiya, nayo yo hwani ya Yelusalemi ya lulu yono yili mu wuwanda hamonga ne wanagwe.
48004026	Ninga Yelusalemi ya ku wulanga, lye'kaya lilelele, nayo yo nyina yetu ase.
48004027	Hambi nha yandikwe: “Wusecelele go mugumba mono si kulelaga wuzoze, wulile so nyemo agwe mono wusina wusungu wo kulela hambi i wana wa ayulya mono yalecigwe nha wenji, wacizize wa ayulya mono yena mulume.”
48004028	Holeka alu wandugu zangu, anye muli wana wo Mulungu, so cilagane cakwe, nha vyono yali Isaka.
48004029	Ninga nha vyono yinha mu vilo vivilya u mwana yuyulya mono yalelwa nha vyono yizoweywe, yamuwingaga ayulya mono yalelwa kwe vilungo vyo Muhe wo Mulungu, vyo yinha nhavivyo na mu vilo vivi.
48004030	Ninga I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya nhawule? Gakutya nhavi, “Wumuwingaje u mucekulu muwanda hamonga no mwanagwe, hambi u mwana wo muwanda nha si kosuma kuhala hamonga no mwana wo mucekulu mono si muwanda.”
48004031	Holeka wandugu zangu, ase si cili wana wo muwanda, langa wo mucekulu mono si muwanda.
48005001	Mu wulelele, Kilisito mo yaciwika, nayo yakasaka mo cikalaje mumo. Holeka mwime mukamile hamba mulece kuvumila kanyhi kuwa mu wuwanda.
48005002	Ta muhulicize! Yo nene Pawulo mono nghulongana nanye, nghutya, Hono muvumile walame, wo wutya, Kilisito si komukwilenyi co cose.
48005003	Nghumulonjelenyi kanyhi calinze, vyono, muli wose mono kosuma kuvumila kwalama yowa yimunojeye yawibate u Wulajilize wose.
48005004	Holeka hono mukulanjilila muvumililwe hali Mulungu mu nzila yo Wulajilize, hodu mwakondya kwiwagula muli Kilisito, mweza muli kunze ye lihewa lyo Mulungu.
48005005	Ninga ku lubavu lwetu ase, cikulindila ko witumbilo vyono, covumilwa hali Mulungu kwe vilungo vyo Muhe, mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
48005006	Hambi hono ciwe cakondya kuwa muli Kilisito Yesu, kwalama hamba wula kwalama, mose musina cambuzi, i nghani yono yina cambuzi, wo wihuwilo wono wukwitumila mulimo mu wendo.
48005007	I mijendele yenyu nha yali miswanu, alu mono yamwimilenyi ho mulece kuyihulika i mbeka, yo nani?
48005008	Mono yakuwuleta u wuwe wuwo, yo si Mulungu mono yamucemenyi.
48005009	“I cisase cidodo cikuwa kuswaza lizanga lyose lyo wusaje.”
48005010	Ku soko yo wilunze wetu no Muwaha, holeka nina witumbilo wuwaha vyono nanye si mowa kanyhi no wuwe wunji wono wisimajiye no wuwe wangu. Nayo yuyo mono yakumwivyajizenyi hamba yawe vyono yenha, u Mulungu komulipiciza.
48005011	Ane ku lubavu lwangu, anye mo wandugu zangu, hono niwe nghali kuganula vyono yinojeye kwalama, alu nhawule nghali kuwingwa-wingwa? Hamba nhavivyo u wuganule wangu muli zo musalaba wa Kilisito, si wali wulete cevu co cose.
48005012	Nali nyende wawo wono wakumwivyajizenyi, wetemanje.
48005013	Hambi anye mo wandugu zangu, nha mwacemelwa wulelele. Ninga u wulelele wuwo wulece kuwa cikojelo co kutemwa ne masulumizi ga mononze. Langa munojeye mweze kwiyitumamila mu wendo.
48005014	Hambi u Wulajilize wose nha wukuwa kufisilizwa mu nghani monga du, nayo yoyi, “Wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco.”
48005015	Ninga hono mukwiyiluma kanyhi mukwiyilya kotya malimu, ale mulanjilile, mulece kwiyimala nyenye wose.
48005016	Holeka ane nghutya nhavi, i mijendele yenyu yeze kulongozwa no Muhe, nanye ho si motyatizya lukulu i masulumizi ga mononze.
48005017	Hambi i masulumizi ga mono'nze, nha vipinganaga no wuhile wo Muhe, no wuhile wo Muhe nawo, vipinganaga no wuhile we masulumizi ga mono'nze. Ne zinghani zizo zi nyejete si zikuwa kubitana hamonga, ku soko yiyo holeka si mosuma kwituma zono mwali mwende nyenye nyo weneco.
48005018	Na hono mutongwe no Muhe, si mowa kanyhi mu Wulajilize.
48005019	Ale, ne metumo ge ciyinze yinze nha gali calinze; nago nha goga, wusenyha, wavu, yihede,
48005020	wukumbika vihwani, wuhawi, sili, wugombane, wivu, makuwo, wukowela, wiwanganile, ciyagalo,
48005021	simbili, wukolwe wo wujimbi, wubugu, na ganji gose gono genha gaga. Nghumulonjelenyi kanyhi nha vyono namula kumulonjelenyi, i wanhu wono wakwituma gono genha gago, si wokwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
48005022	Ninga zono zikwijela so wutongwa no Muhe, wo wendo, nyemo, mulamu, wukangalizi, wuswanu, wucemezi, wihuwilwa,
48005023	wupolo no wiyimile. Hasina u Wulajilize wono wukusuma kuzimila zizi.
48005024	I wakwe Kilisito, wakondya kuwuwulaga u wuwe wawo we ciyinze-yinze hamonga ne mahweso gayo i mabi ne masulumizi gayo.
48005025	Holeka hono cikale mu wutazi wo Muhe, ciwutyatyaje no wutonji wayo.
48005026	Cilece kuwa cili wedunhumuzi, cilece kwisagala, hamba kwiyiwonela wivu.
