48006001	Wandugu zangu, hono mumuwone munhu yunji yasutizye, anye mono mukutongwa no Muhe, mumukagaje u munhu yuyo ho yenozeleze, ninga mumunozeze nhavivyo ko wupolo, akuno mukwilanjilila nyenye nyo weneco ho mulece kwinjila mu majelo.
48006002	Mwidinghuzaje zono zikumuvunenyi mu mikalile yenyu, na nhavivyo, ho mowufisiliza u Wulajilize wa Kilisito.
48006003	Munhu hono yewone kotya nha yali cinji, na kumbe ho si yali cinji, yuyo yakwikonga mweneco.
48006004	Ninga yinojeye munhu wo wose yeyipime viswanu i mikalile yakwe mweneco. Hono yiwe miswanu, ho kowa na co kwilumbila muli cono yetumile mweneco, hamba kowa yasina soko yo kwiling'aniza na munhu yunji.
48006005	Hambi u munhu wo wose nha yena u mutegulo wakwe mweneco wono yawudinghuye.
48006006	Ninga mono yakwijizwa i nghani yo Mulungu, vihanje no mwijizi wakwe mu ziswanu zose zono yena.
48006007	Mulece kukongwa, u Mulungu si wakunozeza nzwaji. Cono u munhu yakucihadika, co cico du co kolodudula kanyhi.
48006008	Mono yakuhadika ze masulumizi ge ciyinze-yinze, kolodudula mumo wuhodanjice, ninga hono yahadice zo Muhe, kolodudula mu Muhe u wumi we cibitilila.
48006009	Holeka cilece kukatala mu wituma ziswanu, ku soko hono cilece kukatala, codudula i nhwanga mu cipango cayo.
48006010	Holeka lono cikali cina cilejeho, yicinojeye ciwatendele wanhu wose i ziswanu, na ko muno i wandugu zetu wa mu wihuwilo wetu.
48006011	Lanjenyi ta, vyono nyandice na mandiko mawaha gono nimwandicilenyi nene no mweneco no muwoko wangu.
48006012	Wawo wono wakusaka kwilajila nha vyono waswanu so metumo go muwili, wo wawo wono wakuhila kumudindimizenyi nanye mwalame. Nawo wakunoza nhavivyo ku soko ya nghani monga du, nha cinji weneco ho walece kuwinjilizwa ku so musalaba wa Kilisito.
48006013	Hambi sunga na wawo du weneco wono walame, nha si wakuwibata u Wulajilize, alu wakuhila anye mwalame ho wawe ne citanjilo co kwilumbila mu miwili yenyu.
48006014	Ninga ane si nokwilumbila muli cinji co cose, hono si mu musalaba wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito langa, ku soko mu nzila yo musalaba wuwo, yiyo yinze yikawulagwa kuli nene, nane nghawulagwa kuli yinze.
48006015	Holeka kwalama hamba wuleka kwalama si cinji yaye, langa u wuwumbwe wupya co cinhu ciwaha.
48006016	Na wose wono wakuwutyatya u wotonji wuwu, u mulamu no lusungu vyeze muli wene, kanyhi u mulamu no lusungu vyeze kuli Waisilayeli i wahagulwa wo Mulungu.
48006017	Vyono nghulawa lulu, yunji yalece kungaza kanyhi, hambi ane nha ndinghuye mu muwili wangu mitozo ya Yesu.
48006018	Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane nanye wandugu zangu. Heya.
49001001	Yo nene Pawulo u mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu so wuhile wo Mulungu, nghumwandicilenyi nyenye mo wanhu wo Mulungu mono muli ku [Efeso,] mo wehuwilwa mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
49001002	Nghumulombelenyi lihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu na kuli Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
49001003	Alenyi cimulumbe u Mulungu u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito! Hambi mu wilunza na Kilisito, mumo mo yacimotezye ko kucipela ivipegwa vyose vye cimuhe kulawa ku wulanga.
49001004	U Mulungu yacihagula lono yinze yali yikali si nawumbwa, ho ciwe cili wakwe mu wilunza na Kilisito, ho ciwe celile mono cisina hamba yilema hali mwene, ku soko yo wendo wakwe.
49001005	U Mulungu yali yehwesize ku wulawa mwa mulizo vyono yacilete kwakwe ho ciwe wakwe mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito. Vyo yali yendile na vyo yali yehwesize.
49001006	Ninga cimukumyaje u Mulungu ku soko ye lihewa lyakwe lyo lukumyo muli Mwanagwe mwendece.
49001007	Hambi nha cikukombozezwa mu sakami ya Kilisito, nha cinji u wubi wetu wukuwuswa, nhavivyo vyo winha u wuwaha we lihewa lyakwe,
49001008	lyono yacipela lisina cipimo! Kwe mahala no wumanye wakwe wose.
49001009	U Mulungu yacifisiliza cicilya cono yali yatemizye, yakacimanyiza zo wuhile wakwe wono wali wihundice, wono yali yewikanize kuwufisiliza mu nzila ya Kilisito.
49001010	U wuhile wuwo wono yali yawufisilize mwi'daha lyayo, wo wukongholeza hamonga iviwumbwa vyose, ho yavitowelele vyose viwe muli Kilisito, vya ku wulanga na vya kono'nze.
49001011	Ivinhu vyose vinozezwaga mu wuhile no wulamuzi wo Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu yakacihagula ase, ho ciwe wanhu wakwe mu wendo wakwe, so wilunze wetu na Kilisito, ku soko yo wutemye wakwe wo wulawa mwamulizo.
49001012	Holeka ase mono calongola kumwitumbila Kilisito, yicinojeye cilukumyaje u lukumyo lo Mulungu!
49001013	Nanye nyo wanhu we makungugo ganji, mwayihulika inghani ye Mbeka, wo wutya u Luganuzi Luswanu lono lwamuletelenyi u wukombozwe, mukamwihuwila Kilisito, nayo u Mulungu yakamuwicilenyi citanjilo so kumupelenyi u Muhe Mono Yelile mono yacihuwiziza, ho yalajile vyono ase cili wakwe.
49001014	Yuyo Muhe co cipingo co kuzibocelela zose zono u Mulungu yawehuwiziza iwanhu wakwe, ne nghani yiyi yo yikucimanyiza vyono u Mulungu kowakombozeza lukulu wose iwakwe. Cilukumyaje u lukumyo lwakwe!
49001015	Ku soko yiyi, nane naza kuhulika muli zo wihuwilo wenyu kuli u Muwaha Yesu, no wendo wenyu kuli wanhu wo Mulungu,
49001016	nghali si ninaleka kumulumba u Mulungu ku soko yenyu. Kanyhi nghumukumbucilenyi mu wulombe wangu,
49001017	ho u Mulungu wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito u sogo wo lukumyo, yamupelenyi u Muhe wakwe mono komupelenyi wizuce, no kumugubulilenyi ho mumumanye u Mulungu.
49001018	Nghumulomba u Mulungu yazidigule izinhumbula zenyu ho zisume kuwuwona u wuzelu wakwe, ho musume kuwutanga u witumbilo wono yamucemelenyi, no lukumyo luwaha lwe vipegwa vyono yawawicila iwanhu wakwe,
49001019	ho muvimanye ivilungo vyakwe vyono viwaha muno muno ku soko yetu sese mono cihuwiye. I vilungo vivyo vyono vikwituma mulimo muli sese, viling'aniye ne vilungo avilya iviwaha muno,
49001020	vyono vyamuzukulila Kilisito muli wafu, yakamwikaza u kulume kwakwe ku wulanga.
49001021	Na kuko Kilisito yatemile muli walongola wose, no wuwaha, ne vilungo, ne cisumisumi cose, nayo yatemile mu wutambule wo wose wono wudahile kuwa mono yinze yiyino, sunga na mu yinze yono yikuza.
49001022	U Mulungu yakaviwika vyose ha magulu gakwe hasi, yakamuwika mwi Kanisa ho yawe muwaha muli vyose.
49001023	Ilikanisa wo muwili wa Kilisito, no wukwilanicile nha wakwe mweneco mono yakuvikwilaniciza ivinhu vyose, hanhu hose.
49002001	Nanye mwali mufwiye ku soko ye masutya no wubi wenyu.
49002002	Na mwipango lilyo mwekalilaga mu mikalile mibi ya mononze yiyi, nanye mukawa mukumuhulika u muwaha wo muhe mubi we vilungo wa mu mwanya, wo muhe wono wuwatemile alu, iwanhu wono si wakumuhulika u Mulungu.
49002003	Hamba na sese cali cinha cinya wawo, cawutyatyaga u wusulumizi wetu we ciyinze yinze, no kwituma zinghani zizilya zono zayendezaga imiwili yetu ne mahala getu, kuciyinze yinze, vyono wenha wene nhavivyo na sese, ilikuwo lyo Mulungu lyali licinojeye licagane.
49002004	Ninga u Mulungu yo munya u lusungu lwinji. Yacenda ko wendo wuwaha,
49002005	hamba yiwe cali cifwiye ku cimuhe ku soko yo wubi wetu, yaciwumifya hamonga na Kilisito. Na ku so ilihewa lyo Mulungu, nanye mwaponywa.
49002006	Ku soko yo wilunza na Kilisito, Yesu, u Mulungu yacizukula hamonga nayo, ho cikateme hamonga nayo ku wulanga.
49002007	Nhavivyo vyo yenda kuwulajila kuli wanhu wa ku myaka yono yokuza, u wuwaha we lihewa lyakwe wono yacipela bwete so wilunze wetu na Kilisito Yesu.
49002008	Hambi nha mwakombozwa ku so lihewa lyo Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo. Ne nghani yiyi si yili mu wuhidimbale wetu, langa cipegwa co Mulungu du.
49002009	Hamba si so metumo getu co weneco, ho munhu yalece kwilumba mu nghani yo yose.
49002010	Ase cili viwumbwa vyo Mulungu, na mu wilunze hamonga na Kilisito Yesu, yaciwumba ho cikale mu mikalile yo kwituma ziswanu, zono yaciwikaniziza cizitume.
49002011	Nanye mono ku cihuma cenyu, muli wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi, mono mukucemwa, “Wono si mwalame” ne Wayahudi wono wakiyitya “Walame” u walame wono wanozwa ne miwoko mu miwili yawo, ninga mukumbucile nanye vyono mwali katali.
49002012	Nanye lululya mwali mu musina Kilisito, mwali musiwanuce muli Waisilayeli, kanyhi mwali wejenzi, kanyhi mwali musina lifungu lyo lyose muli cilagane cicilya mu wihuwizo wuwulya.
49002013	Ninga alu vyono mwelunza na Kilisito Yesu, anye mono mwali kutali ha mwamulizo, mwasejelezezwa mu nzila ye sakami ya Kilisito.
49002014	Hambi Kilisito mweneco nha yo yaciletela u mulamu ko kuwanoza i Wayahudi ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi wawe nha ndugu monga. Yakalipambula ko muwili wakwe, i libupa lyono lyali liwatemanuye, no kuwaletela wulugu munhu na muyagwe.
49002015	Yakawuwusa u Wulajilize wuwulya we Wayahudi hamonga ne malajilizo gayo hamonga ne myoto yayo, na muli wawo iwejete yawawumbilize hamonga wawe munhu yumonga mupya mu wumonga na Yesu, no kunoza mulamu.
49002016	Kilisito yakawusiza lukulu u wulugu wawo, ko muwili wakwe, na ko musalaba wakwe yakawalunza wose vyono wejete wakawa ndugu monga, yakawalamula no Mulungu.
49002017	Hambi Kilisito nha yaza, yakaganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo mulamu kuli nyenye mo wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi mono mwali muli kutali no Mulungu, sunga na kuli Wayahudi wono wali wali behi no Mulungu.
49002018	Holeka mu nzila yakwe ase wose, Wayahudi na wono si Wayahudi, cosuma kumubitila Baba mu Muhe monga.
49002019	Holeka alu anye si muli wajenzi kanyhi, hamba si muli wanhu wakola nzila kanyhi, langa muli Wanyawusi hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu, kanyhi muli wanhu we Nyumba yo Mulungu.
49002020	Kanyhi muzenjigwe mu musinji wono wawikwa ne watumwa ne wawizi, nayo Yesu Kilisito mweneco lyo libwe lyo musinji.
49002021	U mwene yo yalibatilize ilizengo lyose no kuliwilusa sunga liwe Nyumba yo Mulungu yono yelile mu nzila yo Muwaha.
49002022	Nanye nhavivyo mu wilunza nayo, mukuzengwa hamonga ne wanhu wanji, ho muwe wikalo wo Mulungu mu nzila yo Muhe wakwe.
49003001	Ku soko yiyo holeka ane no Pawulo no muwopwa wa Kilisito Yesu ku soko ya nyenye mono si muli Wayahudi, nghumulomba u Mulungu.
49003002	Nitumbiye mwakondya kuhulika vyono u Mulungu, so lihewa lyakwe, yamhela u mulimo wuwu, niwitume so cambuzi cenyu.
49003003	Ane namanyizwa zizi mu nzila yo wugubulilwe wo wuhile wakwe wono wali wuhundicigwe. Nizandice kwa cifupi, izinghani zizi,
49003004	nanye kolo mukuzisoma izinghani zangu, mosuma kuwutanga u wumanye wangu wa muli zono zihundicigwe za muli Kilisito.
49003005	Zono katali wanhu si wamanyizwa, ninga alu u Mulungu yakondya kuwamanyiza iwatumwa, ne wawizi wakwe wono welile mu nzila yo Muhe.
49003006	Ne nghani yiyo yono yihundicigwe nha yoyi, vyono mu nzila yo Luganuzi Luswanu, iwanhu wono si Wayahudi mo wakutujila ilifungu lyawo hamonga ne Wayahudi muli zo wulugutwe wo Mulungu, wene nawo nha wali vilunzwa vyo muwili wuwulya, kanyhi wahanji wo wihuwizo wuwulya wono u Mulungu yawunoza mu nzila ya Kilisito Yesu.
49003007	Ane nanozwa ho niwe mwitumami wo Luganuzi Luswanu, ha nghango ye cipegwa ce lihewa lilya lyo Mulungu, lyono napegwa ha nghango yo witume we vilungo vyakwe.
49003008	Ane nili mudodo si nhe wanhu wo Mulungu wose, ninga napegwa ilihewa lyakwe, ho niwaganulile iwanhu wono si Wayahudi u wugoli wa Kilisito, wono wusina cipimo,
49003009	kanyhi ho niwalajile iwanhu wose wawone vyono wukufisilizwa u wuhile wo Mulungu wono wali wuhundicigwe. U Mulungu mono yaviwumba vinhu vyose, yayihundika inghani yakwe yiyo kulawa katali,
49003010	alu i wawaha ne vilungo vya ku wulanga ho vimanyizizwe mu nzila ye Likanisa, ho wasume kugamanya i mahala go Mulungu gono gena mihilimo minji.
49003011	U Mulungu yayituma inghani yiyo nha vyono wali winha u wutemye wakwe we cibitilila, wono yawunozeza muli Kilisito u Muwaha wetu.
49003012	Holeka mu wilunza na Kilisito, na mu nzila yo wihuwilo muli Kilisito, ase cikwijelela kumusejelela u Mulungu cisina woga.
49003013	Holeka nghumunenenyi, mulece kuyitukuwika i mitima yenyu, ku soko ye magayo gono nghugatuga ku soko yenyu, hambi gago nha gali ku soko yo lukumyo lwenyu.
49003014	Ku soko yiyo, holeka nane nghumufugamila u Sogo yo Munhu,
49003015	mono wo mwamulizo wa vyose vyono vili mono'nze na vya ku wulanga.
49003016	Nghumulomba u Mulungu, mu nghango yo wugoli wo lukumyo lwakwe, yamupelenyi u wusume wo Muhe wakwe, i vilungo vyo kuwa musikame mu wunhu wa mugati,
49003017	nayo Kilisito yekalaje mu zinhumbula zenyu ko wihuwilo. Nghumulomba muwe mukamile mu musinji wo wendo,
49003018	ho musume kumanya hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu wose, nha vyono winha u wendo wa Kilisito, vyono wutandalaga mu wugazi no wutali, no wima na hasi yayo.
49003019	Kanyhi muwumanye no wendo wa Kilisito, wono wucizize wumanye wose, ho mumemywe u wukwilanicile wose wo Mulungu.
49003020	Ale kuli yuyo mono kwe vilungo vyakwe vyono vikwituma mugati yetu, yasumile kwituma zimbaha zono zicizize kuli zono cidahile kulomba hamba kwihwesa,
49003021	kuli yuyo lweze lukumyo mu Kanisa na muli Kilisito Yesu, mu mapango gose sunga ku myaka ne cibitilila. Heya.
49004001	Holeka ane mono nili muwopwa ku soko vyono nghumwitumamila u Muwaha, nghumunenenyi mwikalilaje mu mikalile yono yiwunojeye u lucemo lwenyu lono mwacemelwa.
49004002	Mweze muli wenenenyhezi nhondo zose, muli wapolo, mwina ngola, mwiyikangalilaje nyenye wose mu wendo.
49004003	Muhidimbale kuwibata wumonga wono wukuletwa no Muhe so wukamisa u mulamu wono wuli muli nyenye.
49004004	Ko wuli muwili wumonga no Muhe monga nha vyono winha u witumbilo wumonga wono mwacemelwa no Mulungu.
49004005	Koyuli Muwaha monga, wihuwilo wumonga no wubaputizo monga,
49004006	ko yuli u Mulungu yumonga yo Baba wa wose, mono yali kucanyha ya wose, nayo yakwituma mulimo muli vyose, kanyhi yali muli vyose.
49004007	Ninga capegwa wose yihewa munhu na lwakwe, mu nghango ye cipimo cono yapegwa na Kilisito.
49004008	Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko: “Lono yabitila ku wulanga yakasola mateka yakawagawila iwanhu vipegwa.”
49004009	Alu lono yikulongwa yabita kucanyha wo wutya nhawule? Nhunizo yayo yili nhavi, halulongozi yatima sunga hono hasi mono yinze.
49004010	Alu yuyo mono yatima baha hono yinze, yo yuyo mono yabita sunga kucanyha muno yo wulanga wose, ho yasume kuyimemya yinze.
49004011	Kanyhi yo mwene mono yawagawila iwanhu vipegwa. Wanji yakawawika wawe watumwa, wanji wawe wawizi, na wanji wawe waganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, na wanji wawe wadimi na wejizi.
49004012	Yanoza nhavivyo ho yawawikanize i wanhu wose wo Mulungu, ku soko yo mulimo wo kumwitumamila Kilisito ho muwili wa Kilisito wuzengwe.
49004013	Sunga cize ciwuficile u wumonga wo wihuwilo no kumumanya u Mwana wo Mulungu; ho ciwe wanhu wono cikangaye no kuwuficila u wukwilanicile wa Kilisito mweneco.
49004014	Ho cilece kuwa kanyhi nha wana, wono cowa kugumilwa no kupemheluswa ako na ako mu mbeho ye mejizo gono gakutulwa ne wanhu wakonji, ho wawajilize wanji ko wusugu.
49004015	Ninga hono ciyikamise i mbeka na nhumbula yo wendo, cocila kwihwana na Kilisito muli vyose, mono yo Muwaha,
49004016	na mu wutonji wakwe mo vikulunzizwa hamonga i vilunzwa vyose vyo muwili, no muwili wose wukwitumbila u wutazi we vilunzwa vyakwe. Holeka icilunzwa hono citume u mulimo waco nha vyono yinojeye, ale u muwili wose wukuwiluka no kwizenga weneco mu wendo.
49004017	Ale, nghumusugulenyi mwitagwa lyo Muwaha, mulece kujendelela kwikala kanyhi mu mikalile nha ye wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, wono i mahweso gawo gaweza wulele,
49004018	ne mahala gawo gali mu wutitu. Wali kutali no wumi wo Mulungu, ku soko yo wulele wono wuli muli wene so cibede cawo.
49004019	Wajiliye kanyhi wasina cevu, welavizye kwi'hede, wetumamilaga ividaha vyawo vyose mu wituma imakani ga cevu.
49004020	Ninga anye alu vyo simweyijiza nhavivyo muli za Kilisito.
49004021	Ninga yimanyice vyono mwahulika zinghani zakwe, na vyono muli watyatyi wakwe, mukejizwa vyono yi mbeka yili muli Yesu.
49004022	Holeka mulecele lukulu i mikalile yenyu ye katali, u munhu muhuma mono yakuhodanjika so masulumizi go wukoci.
49004023	Mwinozaje wupya mu zinhumbula na mu mahala genyu.
49004024	Muwuvwalaje u wupya wo wunhu wono wawumbwa ku hwani yo Mulungu, wono wilajilaga mu mikalile ye mbeka, no wiling'ano no wele.
49004025	Holeka muwulekaje u wulambi, yinojeye mweze kulongana ze mbeka munhu na muyagwe, vyono ase wose cili vilunzwa vyo muwili wa Kilisito.
49004026	Na hono muwe mukoligwe ne likuwo, mulece kulumba ilikuwo lyenyu limutegulenyi ku wituma wubi, kanyhi mulece kwikala ne likuwo lyenyu sunga lizuwa liswa.
49004027	Mulece kumupela Setani cilejeho.
49004028	Mono yali muhizi, yalece kuhiza kanyhi, langa yanze kwituma i milimo miswanu kwe miwoko yakwe, ho yatuje cinhu co kumutuziza u muciwa.
49004029	Ne makani mabi galece kuhulikwa muli nyenye hamba hadodo, izinghani zenyu ziweze zono zina cambuzi nhondo zose, zono zikuwazenga no kuwataza wanji, ho ziwapele lihewa wono wakumuhulicizenyi.
49004030	Mulece kumukalaza u Muhe Mono Yelile wo Mulungu, hambi yuyo u Muhe nha yo citanjilo co Mulungu kuli nyenye, vyono anye muli wanhu wakwe, kanyhi co cihomelezi vyono ilizuwa lyokuza lono u Mulungu kolomukombozenyi.
49004031	Holeka mugalecelaje lukulu matemanuko, simbili, makuwo, mazozo, maligo, no wavu wose, viwucile lukulu muli nyenye.
49004032	Mweze na nhumbula swanu, mukwiwonela lusungu nyenye wose, mweze kwiyinenela nyenye wose nha vyono nayo u Mulungu yamunenelenyi nyenye mu nzila ya Kilisito.
49005001	Alu vyono muli wana wendece wo Mulungu, yimunojelenyi muwe nha vyono yenha Mwene.
49005002	Imikalile yenyu yeze kulongozwa no wendo, nha vyono Kilisito yacenda, yakelavya ku soko yetu cilavywa ce mhunjile swanu ne likumbiko lyono limwendezaga u Mulungu.
49005003	Ninga wusenyha, no wavu wose, hamba wusulumizi, vilece kutambulilwa lukulu muli nyenye, hambi nha vyo yinojeye kuli anye mo wana wo Mulungu.
49005004	Kanyhi i zinghani ze cevu, na zo wulele, na zo wiwanganile, zose zizo si nghani swanu kuli nyenye, langa yili ciba mweze kumulumba u Mulungu.
49005005	Kanyhi yinojeye mumanye vyono, musenyha, hamba mwavu, hamba u musulumizi (hambi u wusulumizi nha wo wukumbika vihwani,) hamba munhu wo wose mono yenha nhavivyo, si kosuma kutuga co cose mu wutemi wa Kilisito na wo Mulungu.
49005006	Mulece kumuvumila yunji yamukonjenyi na nghani zono zisina cambuzi, hambi nha ku soko ye zinghani zizo, ilikuwo lyo Mulungu likuwa kuwaziza iwana wono si wakumuhulika.
49005007	Holeka mulece kuhanga nawo.
49005008	Hambi ikatali nha mwali mu wutitu, ninga alu mweza muli mu wuzelu so wilunze wenyu no Muwaha. Holeka mwikalaje nhe wana wo wuzelu,
49005009	hambi imana go wuzelu nha gali mu wuswanu wose no wiling'ano ne mbeka.
49005010	Mujele kuzimanya za hayi zono zikumwendeza u Muwaha,
49005011	kanyhi mulece kuhanga mu metumo ge citi gono si ganojeye, ninga mugawikaje mu wuzelu.
49005012	Hambi izinghani zono zitumwaga cinyele, nha cevu hamba kuzilonga.
49005013	Ninga izinghani zose zono zitumilwaga mu wuzelu, imbeka yayo yiwezaga yili cagalanze.
49005014	Na co cose cono cikwanzalikwa cikuwa wuzelu. Na co cikuleka i Mandiko gakutya, “Wusinhuce agwe mono wugonile: Kanyhi wuzuce muli wafu nayo Kilisito kokubulilila.”
49005015	Ale mwilanjililaje mu mikalile yenyu. Mulece kwikala nhe walele, langa nha we mahala.
49005016	Mucitumamilaje viswanu i cilejeho cono mwina naco, ku soko alu i vilo avi vyaweza vibi.
49005017	Holeka mulece kuwa walele, ninga mujele kuzimanya zono zikumwendeza u Muwaha.
49005018	Mulece kugala wujimbi, hambi wuwo nha wuletaga i mikalile ye caka caka, langa mweze mumemile u Muhe Mono Yelile.
49005019	Mweze kwiduwanila nyenye wose mu zinghani za mu Zabuli, na nyimbo no wimbe we cinya Muhe, mumwimbile u Muwaha zinyimbo na Zabuli, mukumulumba mu zinhumbula zenyu.
49005020	Mumulumbaje u Mulungu Baba nhondo zose ku soko ya zose, mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
49005021	Mweze kwiyihulika nyenye wose ku soko yo kumogopa Kilisito.
49005022	Iwacekulu wawahulikaje iwalume zawo nha kotya kumuhulika Muwaha.
49005023	Hambi u mulume nha yo yena uwulajilize kuli mugolece wakwe, nha vyono nayo Kilisito yena wulajilize mwi Kanisa, nayo Kilisito mweneco yo kayikombozaga Kanisa nha cinji u muwili wakwe.
49005024	Alu nha vyono Likanisa likumuhulika Kilisito, ale nhavivyo ne wacekulu wawahulikaje walume zawo muli zose.
49005025	Nanye mo walume muwendaje iwagolece zenyu nha vyono Kilisito yalyenda Likanisa, yakelavya mweneco cilavywa ku soko ye Likanisa.
49005026	Yanoza nhavivyo ho yalyezeze mu nghani yakwe, yaliwice siya kuli Mulungu, lono yakondya kulyeza ko kulihovuga kwe malenga,
49005027	ho yetujile Likanisa lyono lyelile, na lyono yiswanu, Likanisa lyono lisina manamha manamha hamba cilema, hamba ganji go gose gono genha gaga.
49005028	Holeka yiwanojeye i walume wawende iwagolece zawo nha vyono wayendile imiwili yawo weneco. Mono yamwendile u mugolece wakwe, ye yendile mweneco.
49005029	Hambi nha kusina munhu mono yawusulile u muwili wakwe mweneco, langa yakuwulisa kanyhi yakuwuvwika. Nhavivyo na Kilisito nayo vyo yakulidima Likanisa,
49005030	hambi ase nha cili vilunzwa vyo muwili wakwe.
49005031	Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Ku soko yiyo u mulume kowaleka u Sogwe no nyina, vilunze no mugolece wakwe, nawo vyono wejete wowa muwili monga.”
49005032	Mu zinghani zizi moyili i mbeka yono yihundikwe mumo, nane nghuwona vyono yidomile kuli Kilisito ne Likanisa lyakwe.
49005033	Ninga zikumupamizenyi na nyenye nhavivyo, vyono yimunojeye mulume wo wose yamwende mugolece wakwe nha vyono ye yendile mweneco, nayo u mucekulu, yimunojeye yamogope u mulume wakwe.
49006001	Mo wana, muwahulice walezi wenyu mu Cikilisito, hambi yiyi nha yo nghani swanu.
49006002	“Wuwogopaje u sogo no nyina yako,” ali lye 'lajilizo lilongozi lyono lyonjelezwe no wihuwizo, nha cinji,
49006003	“Ho wumote no kwikala myaka minji mononze.”
49006004	Nanye mo wasogo za munhu, mulece kuwasagala iwana wenyu mu nzila yo kuwakoza makuwo, langa muwalelelaje mu cogopo na mu mafundo ge Cikilisito.
49006005	Nanye mo wawanda, muwahulice iwawaha wenyu wa baha mononze kwa cogopo no wucicime, mweze kunoza nhavivyo na mitima mizelu kotya nha mukumwitumamila Kilisito.
49006006	Mulece kwituma nhavivyo lono wakumulanjenyi ho mwiyendeze kuli wene, langa mwitumaje kwe mitima yenyu nha vyono yendile u Mulungu, vyono anye muli wetumami wa Kilisito.
49006007	Mulece kwituma ku soko ye wanhu, langa mweze mwiwikanize kwituma ku soko yo Muwaha.
49006008	Mweze kukumbucila vyono munhu wo wose mono yakwituma ziswanu, kolobocela ziswanu kulawa kuli Muwaha, hamba yawe muwanda, hamba yawe munhu mono si muwanda,
49006009	Nanye mono mukwitumamilwa, muwatendelaje nhavivyo wawanda wenyu, mulece kuwogofya. Mweze kukumbucila vyono anye na wene nhavivyo, wose mwina u Muwaha yuyulya yumonga wa ku wulanga, mono lilumbo lyo munhu si cinji kuli mwene.
49006010	Ze ndumilizo, nghumusacenyi mweze muli vilungo muli Muwaha na ko wutazi we vilungo vyakwe viwaha.
49006011	Muvwale i vitwalo vyono u Mulungu yakumupelenyi, ho musume kuwimila u wusugu wose wa Setani.
49006012	Hambi u wulugu wetu nha si cikwihoma ne wanhu, langa cikwihoma ne litewa lyavu lya mu yinze ye cimuhe, cikwihoma ne watemi, ne wawaha na wono wena i vilungo, wono wayitemile i yinze yiyi ye citi.
49006013	Ku soko yiyo holeka muvwale vitwalo vyo Mulungu, ilizuwa lilyo kolo lyeza kufika, ho musume kuwimila u wihomi wo mulugu, na lono muwe mwehoma sunga ko ku mudumo, mwijele mukali mukamile.
49006014	Ale mwimaje mukamile! Ne mbeka yeze nha musipi mu viwino vyenyu, no wiling'ano weze nha civwalo co kumwimilenyi mu zimhambaga zenyu.
49006015	No wusaka kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo mulamu, wuweze nha malatu mu migulu yenyu.
49006016	Ninga ko muno, u wihuwilo, wuweze nha ngula mu miwoko yenyu nhondo zose, ho yimutazenyi kuzizimya i zisonga zo moto za ayulya u mubi.
49006017	Muyibocelaje mhonelo ho yiwe nha kofiya yenyu ya cuma, ne nghani yo Mulungu yiwe nha mumaje wono mukupegwa no Muhe Mono Yelile.
49006018	Mweze kulomba nhondo zose, mukulomba u wutazi wo Mulungu. Mweze kulomba madaha gose mu vilungo vyo Muhe. Mwikalaje meso, mulece kukatala, mukuwalombela i wanhu wose wo Mulungu.
49006019	Munombelaje na nene nha vivyo, lono nghuduwa, ho Mulungu yamhele cono nolonga, ho sume kuwamanyiza i wanhu sina woga, inghani yono yihundikwe yo Luganuzi Luswanu.
49006020	Ane nili mutumwa ku soko ya lulo Luganuzi Luswanu hamba niwe alu nili mu jela. Ale lombenyi ho sume kuwa sina woga mu wuganule nha vyono yinojeye.
49006021	U ndugu yetu mwendece Tukiko no mwitumami mwihuwilwa muli Muwaha, komulonjelenyi zangu zose, ho musume kumanya cono nghwituma.
49006022	Alu nghumutuma yaze kuko kwenyu, ho yamulolosezenyi za kono kwetu, nanye ho musindamikwe mu zinhumbula zenyu.
49006023	Nghulomba mulamu wuwe muli nyenye we zindugu wose, hamonga no wendo, no wihuwilo wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu Baba na kuli u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
49006024	Nghulomba, ilihewa lyo Mulungu liweze muli wose wono wamwendile u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito ko wendo wono wusina ndumilizo.
50001001	Yo nene Pawulo na Timoteyo, i wetumami wa Yesu Kilisito, cikumwandicilenyi anye nyo wanhu wo Mulungu kuko ku Filipi, mono mwalunzwa na Kilisito Yesu, hamonga nanye mo walongola ne watazi mu Kanisa.
50001002	Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu Sogo yetu, no kulawa kuli Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
50001003	Nghumulumba u Mulungu wangu kolo nghumukumbucilenyi ho hose,
50001004	na kolo nghumulombelenyi wose, nghulomba nina nyemo,
50001005	ku soko nha vyono mwanhaza mu mulimo wo Luganuzi Luswanu ku wulawilila mwi'zuwa alilya lilongozi sunga izuwali.
50001006	Holeka nitumbiye vyono, u Mulungu mono yawanza u mulimo wuwu muswanu muli nyenye, kowujendeleza sunga ko ku wukondelecele mwi'zuwa lilya lya Kilisito Yesu.
50001007	Na vyo yinojeye nimwihwesezenyi, hambi nha nghumukumbucilenyi nhondo zose mu nhumbula yangu. Hambi na nyenye wose, nha muhanjile na nene, mwi'hewa lyono yamhela u Mulungu ho nilutetele no kulukangaza u Luganuzi Luswanu, mwi'daha lili lono nili mu jela, na kanyhi sunga na bahalya ha lulongozi lono nali nghali nawopwa mu jela.
50001008	U Mulungu yamanyile vyono nghulonga mbeka, lono nghukangaza vyono, so wendo wuwulya du wa Yesu Kilisito, nghuhila muno kumuwonenyi.
50001009	U wulombe wangu wowu, nghulomba u wendo wenyu wucile konjelezeka muno muno, hamonga no wumanye we mbeka, hamonga no wutanje wose,
50001010	ho musume kuhagula zinghani ziswanu. Baho ho mowa mwina nhumbula nzelu, kanyhi musina yilema sunga ko Kwi'zuwa lya Kilisito.
50001011	I mikalile yenyu yomemywa zose zono zili mbeka na swanu, zono Yesu Kilisito mweneco kosuma kumupelenyi, ku soko yo lukumyo ne lilumbo lyo Mulungu.
50001012	Ale wandugu zangu, nghuhila mumanye vyono, zose zono zanyagana, zanhaza muno mu wujendeleza u Luganuzi Luswanu.
50001013	Hambi nha ku soko ya zizo, i walindilizi wose we likulu, hamonga na wanji wose wa baha, wamanyile vyono nili mu jela, ku soko vyono ane nghumwitumamila Kilisito.
50001014	Na wuwu wuwopwe wangu wawanoza we zindugu wenji wawe no wihuwilo muli Muwaha, sunga wakucila kuwa ne vilungo mu wuganula i nghani yo Mulungu wasina woga.
50001015	Yili mbeka, ho wali wayawo wanji wono wakumuganula Kilisito ku soko vyono wena wivu, kanyhi wo wanhu wono wendile wugombane, ninga wanji wakumuganula Kilisito kwa mutima muzelu.
50001016	Awa wakwituma nhavivyo ko wendo, hambi nha wamanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yamhelile u mulimo wuwu wo kulutetela u Luganuzi Luswanu.
50001017	Ninga wawo wanji wakumuganula Kilisito ko wisumanize hamba si kwa nhumbula nzelu, wakuganiciza nha vyono wonyonjelezeza i magayo mu wuwopwe wangu.
50001018	Ale du kanyhi, si nghani yaye, ninga ane nghusangalala vyono ceza cili wanhu mono cikumuganula Kilisito mu zinzila zose, hono yiwe mu mutima muswanu, hamba mu mutima mubi. Kanyhi nojendelela kusangalala.
50001019	Hambi nha manyile vyono, so wulombe wenyu na ku so wutazi wo Muhe wa Yesu Kilisito ane nokombozwa.
50001020	U wuhile wangu no witumbilo wangu, ho ndece kulemwa mu wufisiliza u mulimo wangu, langa nojendelela kuwa na nhumbula yono yikamile mu mapango gose na ko muno mwipango lili, ho mu mikalile yangu yose, hono niwe nghali mumi hamba hono niwe nafwa, nimutujile Kilisito lilumbo.
50001021	Hambi wumi co cici? Ane ku lubavu lwangu, ku wikala mumi nha Kilisito, na ku wufwe kukuleta cambuzi ciwaha.
50001022	Ninga hono mu wikala mumi nosuma kwituma u mulimo wono wina cambuzi ciwaha, baho nhondo cono nokwihaga co si manyile!
50001023	Ninga ha mwande yangu ho zili nghani nyejete. Nghusulumila kuwuka mu wumi wuwu, ho nghekale hamonga na Kilisito, hambi nha yo nghani swanu muno,
50001024	ninga hono njendelele kwikala mumi, yo nghani yono yina cambuzi muno kuli nyenye.
50001025	Kanyhi nina witumbilo so nghani yiyi, manyile vyono nojendelela kwikala mumi hamonga na nyenye wose, ho sume kuwonjeleza u wujendelele wenyu ne nyemo mu wihuwilo.
50001026	Ale nilaza kuwa hamonga nanye kanyhi, ho mowa mwina soko yo kwilumbila muli nene mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
50001027	Ninga nghani mbaha yoyi, i mikalile yenyu yiweze yilunojeye u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito, nane hono sume kuza kwenyu, hamba ndece kusuma kuza, hulice vyono mwimile mukamile mwina nhumbula monga, na vyono mukwihoma no wulugu muli hamonga, kanyhi mwina no mutima wumoga ku soko yo wihuwilo wo Luganuzi Luswanu.
50001028	Mulece kuwogopa walugu wenyu, langa mweze muli vilungo nhondo zose, na yiyo yo yomukangazizenyi vyono wene wosumwa, anye mosuma, hambi u Mulungu mweneco nha yo yakumupelenyi u wusume.
50001029	Hambi anye nha mwapegwa cipegwa co kumwitumamila Kilisito, si so kumwihuwila du, langa na so kugazwa ku soko yakwe nhavivilya.
50001030	Alu mudahile kuwa hamonga nane mu wihomi wo wulugu. U wulugu wuwuno, wo wulugu wuwulya wono mwawuwona cikwihoma nawo bahalya ha mwamulizo, na nghali kwihoma nawo sunga na lulu nha vyono mukuhulika.
50002001	Alu wulenyi mikalile yenyu ya muli Kilisito, yikumupelenyi vilungo? Hamba wendo wakwe wukumusindamicenyi? Aluno ma, mwina wumonga no Muhe Mono Yelile, kanyhi mukwiwonela lusungu no kwikalalila nyenye wose?
50002002	Ale muyifisilizizaje i nyemo yangu mu wuwa na mutima monga, wendo monga, nhumbula monga no wuhile wumonga.
50002003	Mulece kwitumila nghani yo yose mu mutima wo wivu, hamba mu widunhumuzi wa bwete, mweze mwina winenenyhezi nyenye wose, na munhu wo wose yamuwonaje muyagwe yo yamucizize lilumbo sinha mweneco.
50002004	Halece kuwa na yunji mono yakulondola cambuzi cakwe mweneco du, langa cambuzi co muyagwe.
50002005	Muweze no wuwe wuwulya wono yali yena nawo Kilisito Yesu.
50002006	U Mwene ku cihuma, nhondo zose yali Mulungu ninga si yehwesa vyono u wuwa sawa no Mulungu ceze nha cinhu cono cidahile kudindimilwa kwa vilungo.
50002007	Ninga yakenda kuzileka zizo zose mweneco, yakasola u wuwe wo mwitumami, yakawa yenha wanhu yakehwana kotya wanhu.
50002008	Yakenenenyheza, yakawa na cihuliko sunga ko ku wufwe, heya, wufwe wa mu musalaba.
50002009	Holeka u Mulungu yakamukumya muno yakamupela i litagwa lyono licizize i matagwa gose.
50002010	Ku so lilumbo lye litagwa lya Yesu ho vinhu vyose vya ku wulanga, na vya kono'nze na vya kusi ye yinze, vifugame hamwande yakwe,
50002011	Na munhu wo wose yavumile vyono Yesu Kilisito yo Muwaha, mu lukumyo lo Mulungu Baba.
50002012	Ale anye wendece wangu, lono nali nili hamonga nanye, mwahulikaga nhondo zose, sunga na lulu hambe nili kutali nanye, anye mujendelele ne cihuliko. Mweze kwituma milimo akuno mwina ne cogopo no wucicime ku soko ye mhonelo yenyu,
50002013	hambi u Mulungu nha yo ketumaga u mulimo muli nyenye nhondo zose, no kumupelenyi u wusume wo kusaka no kufisiliza zose zono zili mu wulunji wo wuhile wakwe mweneco.
50002014	Mwitumaje zose akuno musina wung'ung'ulice hamba wiwanganile,
50002015	ho muwe wanhu waswanu, wono wasina yilema, kanyhi mweze watelevu nha wana wo Mulungu wono wekaye mu yinze yiyi yo wubi yono yajiliye. Mobulila muli wene, kotya i zinyelezi vyono zikuwa kuwumulika u wulanga,
50002016	hono muyibate mukamile i nghani yo wumi. Nane baho ho notujila i nghani yo kwilumbila mwizuwa lilya lya Kilisito, hambi nha ho yolokwijelela vyono u wuhidimbazi wangu hamonga no mulimo wangu si vyajilila bwete.
50002017	Ninga hamba ndavywe hamonga no wihuwilo wenyu wono lye kumbiko kuli Mulungu, hodu nosecelela muno kanyhi nosangalalana na nyenye wose mu nyemo yiyo.
50002018	Holeka na nyenye nhavivyo, yiwanojeye musecelele no kusangalalana nane mu nyemo yenyu.
50002019	Mu wilunze no Muwaha, nina witumbilo vyono nosuma kumutuma Timoteyo kuko kwenyu vilo vivi, ho sinyhimale nane kolo nghumanya zenyu.
50002020	Hambi nha sina munhu yunji mono yenha yuyo, mono kozilanjilila zenyu nha yuyu.
50002021	Hambi wanji wose nha wakulondola i zawo weneco, si nho kulondola za Yesu Kilisito.
50002022	Nyenye weneco mumanyile vyono Timoteyo yakamile, u mwene na nene, cihwanile vyono yenha u mwana no sogwe, cali kwitumama hamonga ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu.
50002023	Holeka nitumbiye vyono nomutuma yaze kuko kwenyu nila neza kuwona vyono zowa zinha.
50002024	Nane nitumbiye muli Muwaha vyono si noleka kuza kuko kwenyu vilo vivi.
50002025	Ninga nawona cinojele nimutumilenyi ndugu yetu Epafulodito, u mwitumami muyangu no mulewani muyangu, mono mwanhumila, nayo yakanhaza mu visakwa vyangu.
50002026	Yena wuhile wuwaha wo kumuwonenyi nyenye wose, nayo yakukalala muno nha vyono mwahulika yali yatamigwe.
50002027	Heya nha yali yatamigwe behi no kufwa. Ninga u Mulungu yamuwonela lusungu, kanyhi si mwene du, langa na nene, ho ndece kuwa mu wukalale wono wucizize.
50002028	Holeka nghuhila muno nimutumilenyi, nanye kolo mukumuwona kanyhi, ho musecelele, nane u wuzinguce wangu wucepuce.
50002029	Ale mumubocelaje na nyemo kotya ndugu muli Muwaha. Kanyhi yiwanojeye muwapelaje lilumbo wanhu wono wenha mwene,
50002030	vyono yali yeza kufwa so mulimo wa Kilisito, ho yasume kumhela u wutazi, wono anye si mwasuma kumhela.
50003001	Ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, musecelelele muli Muwaha! Si nghukatala kwandika kanyhi zizilya zono nali nakondya kumwandicilenyi bahalya ha lulongozi, hambi nha zomonjelezenyi u wuswanu.
50003002	Mwilegaje na wawo wono wetumaga wavu, wawo wono wenha mabwa, wanhu wono wakukangaza u witemanje mu muwili.
50003003	Ne wanhu wono mbeka walame, yo sese, si wawo wene, hambi ase nha cikumuhemba u Mulungu mu nzila yo Muhe wakwe, kanyhi cikuwuwona u lukumyo mu wilunze na Kilisito Yesu. Nase si citumbiye zinghani za munze du.
50003004	Nane nhavivyo nali ndahile kwitumbila i zinghani za munze, na hono hawe hoyuli munhu mono yakwihwesa vyono yadahile kwitumbila zinghani za munze, ane nina i soko mbaha muno yo kwihwesa nhavivyo;
50003005	ane nalama lizuwa lyo munana mu wulawa mwi'zuwa lyono nalelelwa, ane nili we nghungugo ya Isilayeli, wo mulango wa Benyamini, nili Muhebelaniya mweneco. Na kuli zo wibata u wulajilize, ane nali nili Mufalisayo,
50003006	nane nali nili mupiligazi muno, ninga naligazaga likanisa. Na ku so wiling'ano wono wukutujilwa mu wuhulika u wulajilize, ane nghawa sina yilema lyo lyose.
50003007	Ninga muli zizo zose zono nali kwihwesa vyono zo ze cambuzi, nghaziwona vyono kumbe wambuce du, ku soko ya Kilisito.
50003008	Heya, hamba si nhavivyo du, ninga nghawona vyono vyose wo wambuce wa bwete, ku so wuswanu wo wumumanya Kilisito Yesu u Mutwa wangu. Hambi nha ku so mwene, ane navumila kugaleka gose, nane nghagawona gago gose nha takataka, ho nimutuje Kilisito,
50003009	no kwilunziza nayo lukulu. Alu ane si nghuwusacila lukulu kanyhi u wiling'ano wa mu wuhulika u wulajilize, hambi alu nha nawutuga u wiling'ano wono wukwijelela mu nzila yo kumwihuwila Kilisito, u wiling'ano wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu, wono wukuziza mu wihuwilo.
50003010	Nane cono nghuhila, ho nimumanye u mwene Kilisito, kanyhi nivimanye ne vilungo vyo wuzuce wakwe, no kuhanga i magayo gakwe, no kwihwana nayo,
50003011	nghwitumbila vyono nane nhavivyo nolozukulwa muli wafu.
50003012	Si nghwiwona vyono kotya nakondya kusuma, hamba vyono nakondya kuwa nghwilaniciye, langa nghujendelela kusimbilila ho nicituje i cipegwa cono nebatilwa na Kilisito Yesu.
50003013	Mbeka wandugu zangu, si nghwiwona nha vyono nakondya kucituga i cipegwa cico, ninga nghwituma nghani monga du, nghuzisemwa zono zakondya kupuluta, nghuhidimbalila za kumwande.
50003014	Holeka nili mu lumangho nanjile ku wulunji wangu ho nicituje i cipegwa cicilya cono lo lucemo lo Mulungu so mikalile ya kucanyha mu nzila ya Kilisito Yesu.
50003015	Ale, ase wose mono cikwilaniciye mu mikalile ye Ci kilisito, yicinojeye ciweze no wuwe wuwuno. Ninga hono wawe wanji muli nyenye wakwihwesa visimajiye, ale u Mulungu komugubulilenyi nghani yiyo.
50003016	Ninga yicinojeye cijendelele ku mwande mu nghango yo wulajilize wono cali cina nawo sunga nalu.
50003017	Wandugu zangu, mujendelele wose kunyiga nene. Camupelenyi wijizwe wuswanu wa muli sese, holeka muwahulikaje wawo wono wakuwutyatya u wijizwe wuwo.
50003018	Nakondya kumulonjelenyi nghani yiyi kali kenji, nalu kanyhi nghuwuyajila kumulonjelenyi kwa mahozi, vyono, howali wanhu wenji wono walugu wo Musalaba wa Kilisito.
50003019	Ninga u mudumo wawo wowa ku moto, vyono zinda zawo nha yo mulungu wawo, wakuwona nha lukumyo muli zinghani zono ziwanojeye waziwonele cevu, wehwesaga za kononze du.
50003020	Ninga ase cili wanya ku wulanga, nase cikumulindiliza cikaluce muno, u Mukombozi yaze ku wulawa ku wulanga, u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
50003021	Mwene koloyihundusa i miwili yetu yono yifwizaga, ho yiwe yihwanile no muwili wakwe wo lukumyo, so vilungo vyono yadahile kuviwicila vinhu vyose hasi yo wutemi wakwe.
50004001	Holeka wandugu zangu wendece, nina nyhilu muno yo kumuwonenyi, hambi anye nha yo nyenye nyemo yangu, no mukumbo wo lukumyo lo wusume wangu. Holeka nyo wendece wangu, vyo yinojeye kuli anye, mweze mukamile muli Muwaha.
50004002	Anye Ewudiya na Suntike, nghumulombenyi dedede mujele kuwa mwilumbanizize kumonga kotya munhu no mwanakwawe, muli Muwaha.
50004003	Nagwe go mwitumami muyangu mwihuwilwa, nghukunena wuwatazaje wadala wawo, hambi nha wetuma wahidimbaye u mulimo wo kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, hamonga nane na Kelementi, hamonga ne wetumami wayangu wanji wose, wono i matagwa gawo, gandicigwe mu citabu co wumi.
50004004	Holeka musecelelele nhondo zose, muli Muwaha! Kanyhi nghutya, Musecelele!
50004005	Muweze wapolo kuli wanhu wose. U Muwaha yali behi.
50004006	Mulece kwihwelela muli cinji co cose, langa mu wulombe wenyu, mumulombaje u Mulungu i visakwa vyenyu, mumulombaje akuno mukumulumba mu zinhumbula zenyu.
50004007	No mulamu wo Mulungu wono wucizize u wumanye wose we wanhu, womukamisenyi zinhumbula ne mahala genyu mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
50004008	Ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, mugamemyaje mahweso genyu ne zinghani ziswanu zono zili mbeka, swanu, na ze ling'ani, zono zilenguce, zono zikwendeza na ze cogopo.
50004009	Mwitumaje zono mweyijiza, na zono mwabocela kulawa kwangu, i zinghani zangu, ne metumo gangu. Nayo u Mulungu wo mulamu, kowezana nanye.
50004010	Mu wilunze wangu no Muwaha, yikawa nyemo mbaha kuli'ne, kanyhi mukatuga ne cilejeho co kulajila vyono mukali mukunghumbucila. Na hono cilonje i mbeka, munghumbucilaga vilo vyose, ninga du, si mwatuga cilejeho co kuyilajila nghani yiyo.
50004011	Si nghulonga nhavivi yiwe nha kotya nghusaka cinji, hambi nha neyijiza kuwa nyheye ne vinhu vyono nina navyo,
50004012	hono viwe vinji hamba vicefu. Nizoweleze kuwa nyheye no wuwe wo wose, ne hanhu hono nili hoyuli; u wuwe wo kuca no wuwe we nzala, no wuwe wo kuwa na vinji kuciza no wuwe wo wucepucilwe.
50004013	Nosuma kuwa mu wuwe wo wose, hambi Kilisito nha yo kamhelaga i vilungo.
50004014	Ninga anye mwanoza viswanu so wuhanga nane mu magayo gangu.
50004015	Nanye nyo Wafilipi mumanyile vyono yo nyenye muli wene mono mwanhaza ha mwamulizo wo wuganule wangu wo Luganuzi Luswanu, lono nawukaga kuwulawa ku Makedoniya, yo nyenye du muli wene mono mwali hamonga nane mu cambuzi na mu wambuce wangu.
50004016	Na lono nali kuko ku Tesalonike akuno nghuhila wutazi, anye mukandetela, kanyhi hamba si kamonga.
50004017	Mulece kwihwesa nha vyono nyendile kubocela vipegwa du, langa nghusaka i cambuzi conjelezwe mu viwutwa vyenyu.
50004018	Ale, nakondya kuvibocela vinhu vyose vyono mukamhela, kanyhi vicizize kuciza na vyono navihilaga. Alu nina navyo vyose ku soko Epafulodito yakondya kundetela i vipegwa vyenyu. Vipegwa vivino vikuwa nha vilavywa vye mhunjile swanu, likumbiko lyono likuvumilwa no kumwendeza u Mulungu.
50004019	Holeka u Mulungu wangu ku soko yo wugoli wakwe wuwaha mu nzila ya Kilisito, komupelenyi i visakwa vyenyu vyose.
50004020	Ale u lukumyo lweze kuli Mulungu wetu no Sogo yetu, cibitilila ne cibitilila. Heya.
50004021	Nghumulamusenyi anye mo wanhu wose wo Mulungu mono muli wa Kilisito Yesu. We zindugu wono wali hamonga nane wakumulamusenyi.
50004022	I wanhu wose wo Mulungu wono wali baha, na ko muno wono wali Mwikulu lyo Mutemi, wose wakumulamusenyi.
50004023	Ilihewa lyo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito liwezane nanye wose.
51001001	Yo nene Pawulo u mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu ko wuhile wo Mulungu, na ndugu yetu Timoteyo,
51001002	cikumwandicilenyi anye mo wanhu wo Mulungu mono muli ku Kolosayi, mo wandugu zetu wehuwilwa muli Kilisito. Ilihewa no mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu viwezane nanye.
51001003	Cikumulumba u Mulungu u sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, nhondo zose, mwi'daha lyono cikumulombelenyi.
51001004	Hambi nha cahulika zo wihuwilo wenyu muli Kilisito Yesu na muli zo wendo wenyu kuli wanhu wose wo Mulungu.
51001005	Hambi nha mwazihulika zo witumbilo, wono wukwijela muli mwene baho ha lulongozi du, lono mwayihulicila inghani ye mbeka yo Luganuzi Luswanu. Holeka aluno u wihuwilo wenyu, no wendo wenyu, vili mu nghani yiyilya yono mwayitumbila yono muwiciywe viswanu ku wulanga.
51001006	No Luganuzi Luswanu, lukucila kulela mikalo, no kutandala mono yinze mose, nha vyono lwaza kwenyu nyenye, ku wulawa mwi'zuwa lililya lyono mwahulicila ze lihewa lyo Mulungu no kumanya vyono yili mbeka.
51001007	Mweyijiza ze lihewa lyo Mulungu kulawa kuli Epafula u mwitumami muyetu, u mwitumami mwihuwilwa wa Kilisito ku soko yetu.
51001008	U mwene yo yacilonjela zo wendo wenyu wono mwapegwa no Muhe.
51001009	Ku soko yiyo nase kanyhi, vyono calawa lizuwa lyono cahulicila i zenyu, si cidilaga kumulombelenyi. Cikumulomba u Mulungu yamumemyenyi u wumanye wose wo wuhile wakwe, yamumemyenyi mahala gose no wutanje wono wukuletwa no Muhe wakwe.
51001010	Baho langa ho mosuma kwikala nha vyono yikumunojeza u Muwaha, no kwituma nhondo zose zo wuhile wakwe. Ne mikalile yenyu yowa yina mana gose ge metumo maswanu, nanye mocila muno kuwiluka mu wu mumanya u Mulungu.
51001011	U Mulungu yamupelenyi vilungo no wusume wakwe wo lukumyo, ho muwe na ngola muli vyose kanyhi hamonga no wukangalile.
51001012	Akuno mukumulumba kwa nyemo u Sogo yo munhu mono yamupelenyi u wusume ho muwe ne 'fungu lyenyu mu zinghani zo Mulungu zono yawawicila i wanhu wakwe mu wutemi wo wuzelu.
51001013	U Mwene yacikomboza mu wulawa mu vilungo vye citi, yakacileta cipolile mu wutemi wo Mwanagwe u mwendece,
51001014	muli yuyo mo cikukombozezwa, nha cinji u wubi wetu wukunenelwa.
51001015	Kilisito yo hwani yeneco yono yikwijela yo Mulungu mono si kejelaga. U mwene yo Mwana u mulongozi kulelwa, kanyhi yo muwaha yacizize viwumbwa vyose.
51001016	Hambi nha muli mwene mo Mulungu yaviwumbila vinhu vyose vyono vili mono yinze na vyono vili ku wulanga, vinhu vyono vijelaga ne vinhu vyono si vijelaga, we magoda matambule, ne Watemi, i Wawaha na wose wono wena u wulajilize. Vivi vyose u Mulungu yaviwumbila muli mweneco, na ku soko yakwe.
51001017	Kilisito yali yali baho na lono viwumbwa vyose vikali si nawa, na vyose vikamisizwe muli mwene, navyo vyose vikalaga nha vyono vyawikwa.
51001018	U Mwene Kilisito wo mutwe wo muwili wakwe, nha cinji likanisa, u Mwene wo mwamulizo wo wumi wa wuwo umuwili. U Mwene yo Mwana mulongozi kulelwa mono yazukulwa muli wafu, u Mwene ho yawe mulongola du kutali muli vinhu vyose.
51001019	Hambi u Mulungu nha yawona vyono u Mwana nayo yena u wukwilanicile wose wo wulungu muli mwene.
51001020	Holeka u Mulungu yadumula nghani kuyilamula yinze no mweneco. U Mulungu yakanoza mulamu mu nzila ye sakami ya Kilisito mu musalaba, holeka yakawa yakondya kuvilamula vinhu vyose no mwene, ivinhu vya mono'nze na vya ku wulanga.
51001021	Na nyenye katali mwali mutemanuywe no Mulungu, kanyhi mwali walugu wakwe ku soko ye mahweso genyu ne metumo i mabi.
51001022	Ninga alu so wufwe wo Mwanagwe mono yekala baha mono'nze, u Mulungu yakondya kwilamula nanye, ho yamuletenyi hali mwene mwelile, musina yilema.
51001023	Ninga munojeye mujendelele kuwa wehuwilwa mu wusimyo wono wukamile, hamba kutezwa mu witumbilo wo Luganuzi Luswanu lono mwaluhulika. Ane Pawulo nili mwitumami wa lulo u Luganuzi Luswanu lono lwakondya kuganulwa kuli wanhu wose wa mono'nze.
51001024	Alu nghusecelela mu matamiso gangu so nyenye, hambi nha ku soko ye magayo gangu ga baha hono yinze, nghumemeleza cono cali cicepuce mu magayo ga Kilisito ku soko yo muwili wakwe, likanisa.
51001025	Nane nanozwa ho niwe mwitumami we likanisa, nha vyono winha u mulimo wo Mulungu wono yamhela so cambuzi cenyu, wuwikanize wo kuyiganula inghani yakwe ko wukwilanicile,
51001026	yo nghani yono yali hundikwe kuli wanhu wose kulawa katali na katali, ninga aluno yakondya kuwamanyiza wanhu wakwe.
51001027	Ninga u wuhile wo Mulungu, yakusaka yawamanyize i wanhu wakwe ze nghani mbaha yiyi na zo lukumyo, vyono vili so wanhu wose. Ne nghani yeneco nha yoyi: Kilisito yali muli nyenye, ne nghani yiyo yo yikumanyiza vyono anye mohanga u lukumyo lo Mulungu.
51001028	Na ku soko yiyo, holeka cikumuganula Kilisito kuli wanhu wose, cikuwasugula wose kanyhi cikuwafunda wose mu mahala gose, ho cisume kuwaleta wose hali Mulungu akuno wakondizye kuwa wakangaye muli Kilisito.
51001029	Holeka ku soko yiyo, ane nghwituma mulimo akuno hidimbaye mu vilungo vya Kilisito vyono vikwituma muli nene.
51002001	Hambi nha nghusaka mumanye vyono netuma mulimo ko wuhidimbazi ku soko yenyu, ku soko ya wanya Lawodikeya, na ku soko ya wose wono wakali si nambona wusu wangu.
51002002	Nghunoza nhavivi, i zinhumbula zawo ho zitule, no kulunzizwa hamonga mu wendo, ho wamemywe mbeka yono yikuletwa no wumanye we mbeka. Na mu nzila yiyo, ho woyimanyila ne nghani yo Mulungu yono yihundikwe, hambi nha yo Kilisito mweneco.
51002003	Muli mwene mo wuhundikwe u winji wose we mahala no wumanye.
51002004	Holeka nghumulonjelenyi vyono, munhu wo wose yalece kumukonjenyi na nghani za wulambi, hamba ziwe nha swanu muno.
51002005	Hambi ane hamba niwe nili kutali nanye ku muwili, ninga ku cimuhe nili hamonga nanye, kanyhi nghusangalala kuwona u wusikame wenyu wono mwimiye hamonga, mu wihuwilo wenyu muli Kilisito.
51002006	Alu vyono anye mwakondya kumuvumila Kilisito Yesu yawe Muwaha, ale mwikalilaje lukulu muli mwene.
51002007	Kanyhi munojeye muhomele milela muli mwene no kwizenga muli mwene kanyhi musikame mu wihuwilo wenyu nha vyono mwejizwa. Muweze ne lilumbo iwaha.
51002008	Mulanjilile, munhu yunji yalece kumwajilizenyi ko wusugu no wukoci we wanhu wono wusina cambuzi, wono wukulawilila mu mejizo ge zisimo ze wanhu, na mu myuhe yono yitemile, hamba si Kilisito mweneco!
51002009	Ku soko muli mwene Kilisito mu hwani yo munhu, mo mowuli wukwilanicile wose wo Mulungu.
51002010	Nanye mwapegwa wumi wono wukwilaniciye mu wilunza hamonga nayo. U Mwene yo Muwaha kuli myuhe yose yono yitemile sunga na kuli wawaha wose.
51002011	Na mu wilunza hamonga na Kilisito, anye mwakondya kwalama, ninga si walame wono wukunozwa ne wanhu, langa u walame wono wukunozwa na Kilisito mweneco, u walame wa mu wukombozwe mu wuwe wo wubi.
51002012	Hambi lono mwabaputizizwa, nha mwazikanwa hamonga na Kilisito, na kanyhi mumo mu wubaputizo nha mwazukulanwa hamonga nayo mu nzila yo wihuwilo wenyu mu vilungo vyo Mulungu mono yamuzukula muli wafu.
51002013	Mu mapango ganji, anye mwali mufwiye ku soko ye masutya genyu, na ku soko vyono mwali muli wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi. Ninga u Mulungu yamupelenyi anye wumi hamonga na Kilisito. U Mulungu yakondya kucinenela u wubi wetu wose,
51002014	yakapatila lukulu u lwandiko lono lwacizijilaga lono lwali lucidomile, hamonga no wulajilize wayo, yakaluwusiza lukulu, yakalukomanhila mu musalaba.
51002015	Kuko Kilisito, ko yavisumila i vilungo vyose vya yiyo i myuhe yono yitemile, hamonga ne vilungo vye wawaha, yakawanoza kuwa cinhu ca cevu, cagalanze, ko kuwakwejenha kotya ngaluzi mu wujendelele wo wusume wakwe.
51002016	Holeka mulece kuvumila munhu wo wose yamuwicilenyi wulajilize wo wose muli vyono mukulya hamba kung'wa, hamba mu wuwala i mazuwa mawaha, hamba zi sikukuu zo mwezi mupya, hamba Sabato.
51002017	I zinghani zizo nha muzizi du wa zono zolowa, ninga i mbeka yeneco, yo Kilisito.
51002018	Kanyhi mulece kuvumila kuling'anizwa na munhu yunji, mono yakwinoza nha munhu we lilumbo ku soko yo wuwona wugubulilwe wakwe, no kwisacila u winenenyhezi wo wulambi, no wuhembi wo kuhemba wamalayika. U munhu mono yenha nhavivyo yalelepeye mu mahala go wulele ge ciyinze yinze.
51002019	Kanyhi yetemanuye na Kilisito mono wo mutwe wo muwili wuwo. Muli Kilisito, u muwili wose wukuliswa no kulunzwa hamonga i vilunzwa ne zinghwali zayo, nawo wuwilukaga nha vyono u Mulungu yendile.
51002020	Anye mwafwizana hamonga na Kilisito no kukombozwa mu vilungo vye myuhe yono yitemile ya mononze. Alu nhawule kanyhi mwikaye mu mikalile ya kotya muli we yinze yiyi? Na so cici muwicilwe wulajilize,
51002021	“Mulece kwibata aci! Mulece kujeza acilya, hamba Mulece kupamiza acilya!”
51002022	I zinghani zizo zose zili mu vinhu avilya vyono vihodanjikaga kamonga du lono vikwitumamilwa, ago nha malajilizo ne mafundo ge ci munhu munhu du.
51002023	I mbeka, malajilizo gago gakwijela galawiliye mu mahala ga mu wuhembi wo kwisacila weneco, no winenenyhezi wo wulambi, no kuwugaza u muwili, ninga mbeka si gakwiliye hamba nhavi ku wimila u wusulumizi wo muwili.
51003001	Holeka hono muwe mwazukulanwa hamonga na Kilisito, muhidimbale kulondola za kucanyha, kono ko yuli Kilisito, yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu.
51003002	Mwibataje mukamise zinghani za ku wulanga, ninga si zono zili mono'nze.
51003003	Hambi anye nha mwafwa, no wumi wenyu wuhundikanwe hamonga na Kilisito muli Mulungu.
51003004	Na Kilisito wo wumi wenyu we mbeka, yalaza kwijela, ale, anye nanye baho ho molokwijela hamonga nayo mu lukumyo.
51003005	Holeka muwuwulajilaje lukulu u wusulumizi wa mono'nze wono wukali wuli muli nyenye, nha kotya, wusenyha, wavu, wumala-nyinji, wuhile wubi, wusulumizi, wo wuhemba vihwani.
51003006	Na ku soko ye makani gago, holeka i likuwo lyo Mulungu likuwa kuwaziza wose wono wasina cihuliko kuli mwene.
51003007	Mu mapango ganji, nanye mwekalaga mu mikalile ya muli gago lono mwali mukali mutemigwe nago.
51003008	Ninga alu yiwanojeye mugalecele lukulu gago gose, likuwo, wusungu, simbili, maligo, hamba i zinghani zono si zinojeye ze cevu, zilece kulonjelwa lukulu mu milomo yenyu.
51003009	Mulece kwiyilambila nyenye wose, vyono anye mwakondya kuwuvula u wunhu wuhuma hamonga ne metumo gayo gose,
51003010	no kuwuvwala u wunhu wupya. Wono wukujendelela kunozelezwa no Mulungu mono yawuwumba, nha vyono yinhe hwani yakwe, ho mumumanye u Mulungu mu wukwilanicile wose.
51003011	Na mu wuwe wuwo, musina kanyhi wisimajile kuli mono si Muyahudi no Muyahudi, kuli mono yalame na mono si yalame, u musomi na mono si yasomile, u muwanda no munhu mwelecele. Langa vyose vili muli Kilisito du, nayo Kilisito yali muli vyose.
51003012	Anye muli wanhu wo Mulungu, u mwene yamwendenyi anye kanyhi yakamuhagulenyi. Holeka nanye muvwale i nhumbula yo lusungu, wuswanu, winenenyhezi, wupolo, no wukangalizi.
51003013	Mwikangalilaje no kwinenela nyenye wose hono yunji yawe yena nghani kuli muyagwe, yiwanojeye mweze kwiyinenela nyenye wose nha vyono u Muwaha yamunenelenyi anye, nanye vyo mweze kunoza.
51003014	Ne mbaha yono yicizize zose, mwikalanaje mu wiyendi nyenye wose. Hambi u wendo nha wo wukuwa kuvilunziza i vinhu vyose mu wumonga wono wukwilaniciye.
51003015	No mulamu wa Kilisito wuteme mu zinhumbula zenyu, hambi ku soko yiyo, nanye nha mwacemwa ho muwe muwili wuwo wumonga. Kanyhi muwe mwina lilumbo!
51003016	I nghani ya Kilisito yikalaje muli nyenye, hamonga no wugoli wayo wose. Mwiyijizaje nyenye wose munhu na muyagwe, akuno mukwiyilanjiziza mu mahala gose. Mwimbaje Zabuli, na nyimbo, no wimbe we cinya Muhe, mumwimbilaje u Mulungu mu zinhumbula zenyu kwe lilumbo.
51003017	Na zose zono mukwituma, mu wulonje, hamba mu witume, mwitumilaje zose mwitagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu, akuno mukumulumbila u Mulungu Baba muli mwene.
51003018	Anye mo wagolece, muwahulice walume zenyu, hambi nha vyo yendile u Muwaha.
51003019	Nanye mo walume, muwendaje wagolece zenyu, kanyhi mulece kuwa wakali kuli wene.
51003020	Nanye mo wana muwahulice walezi wenyu nhondo zose, hambi nha vyo yinojeye muli Muwaha.
51003021	Anye nanye mo walezi, mulece kuwakalaza i wana wenyu ho walece kuyitukuwika i mitima yawo.
51003022	Nanye mo wetumami, muwahulikaje i wawaha wenyu wa mononze muli zose, si mwipango lono muli hamwande yawo du ho mwiyendeze kuli wene, langa mwitumaje kwe mitima yenyu yose, akuno mukumogopa u Muwaha.
51003023	Na zose zono mowa kwituma, muzitumaje kwe mitima yenyu yose, ku soko yo Muwaha hamba si ku soko ya munhu.
51003024	Akuno mukumanya vyono u Mulungu kolomupelenyi i mafungu go wuhazi gono yawawiciye i wanhu wakwe. Mumwitumamilaje Kilisito u Muwaha!
51003025	Mono yakwituma i zimbi, nha kololipwa nha vyono genha i metumo gakwe i mabi. Hambi u Mulungu nha yasina wuhijila mbejele.
51004001	Nanye mo wawaha, muwatendelaje kwe ling'ani ne mbeka i wetumami wenyu, akuno mukukumbucila vyono nanye nha vivyo mwina u Muwaha wenyu ku wulanga.
51004002	Mweze kulomba nhondo zose, kanyhi mweze kulanjilila lono mukulomba, akuno mukumulumba u Mulungu.
51004003	Mucilombelaje na sese nhavivyo, u Mulungu ho yacipele i cilejeho co kuyiganulila i nghani yakwe Kilisito yono hundikwe. Alu ane nili mu jela ku soko ya yiyo.
51004004	Holeka munombelaje ho sume kulonga nha vyono yinojeye, mu nghango yono yosuma kuyanzalika i nghani yiyo.
51004005	Mwikalaje nawo kwa mahala wono si wehuwiye, kanyhi mwitumamilaje viswanu i cilejeho cono mwina naco.
51004006	No wulonje wenyu nhondo zose weze wuswanu, wono wukwendeza, kanyhi mumanye vyono yimunojelenyi kuwapitula viswanu i wanhu wose.
51004007	U ndugu yetu mwendece, Tukiko, u mwitumami mwihuwilwa, no mwitumami muyetu mu mulimo wo Muwaha, yo komulonjelenyi zose.
51004008	Yo yilecile nghumutuma, ho yamusindamicenyi zinhumbula zenyu kolo mwahulika i zetu.
51004009	Nayo yakuza yena na Onesimo u ndugu yetu mwendece kanyhi mwihuwilwa, u munyawusi muyenyu. Nawo womulonjelenyi zose zono zikwitumwa baha.
51004010	Na Alisitaliko mono yali mu jela hamonga na nene, yakumulamusenyi, sunga na Maluko u mwihwawe wa Balanaba, nayo nha vivyo, (Mono mwalajizizwa, vyono hono yaze kwenyu mumubocelaje.)
51004011	Nhavivilya na Yoshuwa mono kacemwaga Yusito, nayo yakumulamusenyi. Na muli wanji Wayahudi wono wabocela u wihuwilo, wo wawa du wali wene wono cikwitumana nane mulimo ku soko yo wutemi wo Mulungu, na kanyhi wo wakunhaza muno muno.
51004012	Na Epafala nayo u munyawusi muyenyu, kanyhi u mwitumami wa Kilisito Yesu, nayo yakumulamusenyi. Kanyhi yakumulombelenyi nyenye nhondo zose ko wupiligazi, ho mwime mukamile, mukangale, mulece kusinjisika muli zose zono yakuzisaka u Mulungu.
51004013	Ndahile kumuhomelela vyono yakwituma yahidimbaye ku soko yenyu na ku soko ye wanhu wanya Lawodikeya, na wanya Hiyelapoli.
51004014	Luka, u muganga wetu mwendece, hamonga na Dema, wose wakumulamusenyi.
51004015	Muwalamusaje i wandugu zetu wose wa kuko ku Lawodikeya, mumulamusaje no lumbu lyetu Nimufa, hamonga na wono wehuwiye wose wono wetang'anililaga mu nyumba yakwe.
51004016	Kolo mwakondya kuyisoma i baluwa yiyi, nhondo yisomwe ne Wakilisito wa ku Lawodikeya, nanye nhondo muyisomaje i baluwa yono wayituga wene.
51004017	Mumulonjelaje na Alikipo yawitumaje viswanu u mulimo wono yapegwa no Muwaha.
51004018	Nghwandika zizino ko muwoko wangu nene no mweneco, u Mulamu wono wukulawa kwangu nene Pawulo. Mweze kukumbucila vyono ane mbopigwe ne manyolo. Ilihewa lyo Mulungu lyeze na nyenye.
52001001	Ane Pawulo, hamonga na Silivano na Timoteyo, cikumwandicilenyi anye mo mhuga ye likanisa lya ku Tesalonike, mo wanhu wo Mulungu Baba, no Muwaha Yesu Kilisito. Lihewa lyeze muli nyenye hamonga no Mulamu.
52001002	Cikumulumba u Mulungu, ku soko yenyu nyenye wose nhondo zose, no kumukumbucilenyi nhondo zose mu wulombe wetu.
52001003	Nase cikumukumbucilenyi hali Mulungu Baba, vyono mukulajila u wihuwilo wenyu mu witume, na vyono u wendo wenyu wo wukumupelenyi u witume wo wupiligazi, kanyhi na vyono u witumbilo wenyu wukamile muli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
52001004	Mo wandugu zangu, hambi nha cimanyile vyono, u Mulungu yamwendilenyi, kanyhi na vyono yamuhagulenyi muwe wanhu wakwe,
52001005	vyono lono camuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu, si wali mu wulonje du, langa na mu vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, akuno cimanyiye lukulu, vyono, i nghani yiyo yali ya mbeka. Mumanyile vyono cekalanaga hamonga nanye, cekalaga ku soko ye cambuzi cenyu.
52001006	Nanye mukega u wuwe wetu, hamonga no kumwiga u Muwaha. Hamba muwe mwatuga wugaye, ninga mwayibocela nghani mu nyemo yono yikulawa mu Muhe Mono Yelile.
52001007	Holeka anye mweza muli musambo muswanu kuli wose wono wehuwiye we Makedoniya na ku Akaya.
52001008	Hambi nha ku soko yo wuhidimbazi wenyu, i nghani yo Muwaha yakondya kuhulikwa, hamba si kuko ku Makedoniya na ku Akaya du, langa sunga no wihuwilo wenyu wa kuli Mulungu, nha wakondya kuhulikwa hanhu hose. Kanyhi cisina za kulonga.
52001009	Hambi i wanhu wawo weneco nha wakuciganulila nha vyono caza kwenyu, ne nghango ya vyono mwacibocela, na vyono mukaleka vihwani, no kumupitucila u Mulungu mumi na we mbeka,
52001010	na luno mumulindilize u Mwanagwe yatime kulawa ku wulanga, mono u Mulungu yamuzukula muli wafu, yo Yesu, mono yakuciponya ne likuwo lyo Mulungu lyono likuza.
52002001	Hambi nha mumanyile nyo weneco wandugu zetu, u wuze wetu wa kuko kwenyu vyono si wali wa bwete.
52002002	Mumanyile vyono catamiswa, no kutovulwa akulya ku Filipi, lono cali cikali si nafika u kwenyu ku Tesalonike. Hamba kuwe kwali kowuli wiwanganile winji, ninga u Mulungu wetu, yakacipela wuluwuce wo kumuganulilenyi u Luganuzi lwakwe Luswanu.
52002003	Ne nghani yono cikumusinjenyi, si nghani ya wulambi, hamba lunji yono yina wuhile wubi, hamba si cendile ho cimukonje munhu wo wose.
52002004	Ase cilongaga nhondo zose nha vyono yendile u Mulungu, hambi nha yo mweneco mono yaciwona ase cikwiliye, yakawa kucipela u mulimo wuwu wo Luganuzi Luswanu. Wo si wuhile wetu hamba hadodo ho ciwendeze wanhu, langa cikuhila kumwendeza u Mulungu, mono yazimanyile zinhumbula zetu sunga mo mugati.
52002005	Nanye mumanyile vyono lono caziza kwenyu, si caza ne zinghani zo wutelemezi, hamba si cetumamila u wulonji wo wusugu wo kwihundika cinji muli sese, u Mulungu yo muhomelezi!
52002006	Hamba si calondola lilumbo muli wanhu hamba muli nyenye, hamba kulawa kuli munhu wo wose,
52002007	ninga ase nha vyono cili wetumami wa Kilisito, cali cisume kusaka cinji kwenyu. Ninga ase cikawa wapolo lono cali cili hamonga nanye, nha vyono yenha u nyina yo munhu muli wanagwe.
52002008	Ale nhavivyo, vyono cikamwendenyi anye muno muno, cikawa ciwikanize kumugawilenyi si u Luganuzi Luswanu du lo Mulungu, langa sunga no wumi wetu. Nhavivyo nanye vyo mwali mo wendece wetu!
52002009	Nye wandugu zangu, mukumbuciye vyono cetuma u mulimo hamonga ne magaziko. Lono camuletelenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, hambi nha cetumaga mulimo ku misi na ku cilo, ho cilece kuwa mutegulo kuli munhu wo wose muli nyenye.
52002010	Nanye nyo weneco muli wahomelezi, no Mulungu nayo muhomelezi nha vivyo, vyono i mikalile yetu hali nyenye mono mwihuwiye, vyono yali miswanu kanyhi ye ling'ani yono yisina yilema.
52002011	Kanyhi mumanyile nyo weneco vyono ase camutendelenyi nyenye yumonga yumonga, nha vyono u sogo yo munhu kawatendelega wanagwe mweneco.
52002012	Cikamulanjizenyi, kanyhi cikamusindamicenyi, no kumuswaswanizenyi, ho mwikale mu mikalile yono yikumwendeza u Mulungu mono yamucemenyi ho muhanje u Wutemi no lukumyo lwakwe mweneco.
52002013	Kanyhi cina ne soko yinji yo kumulumbila u Mulungu; lono camuletelenyi i nghani yo Mulungu, anye mwayihulika kanyhi mukayibocela si nha vyono yinha nghani yono yikulawa kuli wanhu, langa mwayibocela nha nghani yo Mulungu, nayo mbeka vyo yinha. Hambi u Mulungu nha yakwituma muli nyenye mono mwihuwiye.
52002014	Nye wandugu zangu, nanye nha zamwaganenyi zono zagagana i Makanisa go Mulungu ga ku Yudiya, zinghani zono zawagana i wanhu wa Kilisito Yesu. Nanye mwatamiswa ne wanyawusi wayenyu, nha vyono iwene nawo wagazwa ne Wayahudi wayawo,
52002015	wono wamuwulaga u Muwaha Yesu ne wawizi, wakacigaza sunga na sese nhavivyo. Iwanhu wono si wakumwendeza u Mulungu, kanyhi wali sili ne wanhu wose.
52002016	Kanyhi wakajela kucimila cilece kuwaganulila wanhu wono si Wayahudi i nghani yono yosuma kuwapela mhonelo. Na mumo mo wakumemelezeza i liwalo lyo wubi wawo wono wetumaga nhondo zose. Ninga alu i likuwo lyo Mulungu liwagwiliye.
52002017	Nye wandugu zangu, u witemanuce wetu na nyenye, wali wa cipango du, kanyhi no witemanuce wuwu wali wa mu muwili du hamba si wa mu nhumbula. Ninga hanyuma ye cipango cifupi, cikamwisukwenyi muno no kuhila kumuwonenyi kanyhi!
52002018	Holeka cikawona viswanu ho cize kuko kwenyu kanyhi. Nane no Pawulo najela ho nize kuko kwenyu nghanghulo monga hamba ne kejete, ninga Setani yakacimila.
52002019	Wulenyi cilaza kwima hali Muwaha Yesu yalaza kuza, u lukumyo lo wusume wetu wolowa cici? Wolowa nyenye nyo weneco, vyono anye yo nyenye, wo witumbilo wetu ne nyemo yetu.
52002020	Heya, hambi nha yo nyenye lukumyo lwetu ne nyemo yetu!
52003001	Holeka vyono si casuma kukangalila kanyhi, cikawona vyowa viswanu cilekwe cili wene ku Atene,
52003002	cikamutumilenyi ndugu yetu Timoteyo, kanyhi mwitumami muyetu muli Mulungu mu wuganule u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito. Cikamutumilenyi ho yaze yamusikamyenyi no kumusindamicenyi,
52003003	ho wihuwilo wa yunji muli nyenye wulece kucepuka ku soko ye magazo gago. Ninga anye mumanyile nha vyono yicinojeye cinjile mu magazo.
52003004	Hambi mbeka lono cali kwenyu, nha camula kumulonjelenyi vyono cowa kutamiswa, na vyono mumanyile, na mbeka vyo yikawa.
52003005	Ku soko yiyo holeka nane nghamutumilenyi Timoteyo. Vyono si nasuma kulindila kanyhi, holeka nghamutumilenyi ho hulice muli zo wihuwilo wenyu. Yilece kuwa na lunji u mukonji yamujelenyi, no mulimo wose wono cawituma muli nyenye wuwe wa bwete!
52003006	Ninga alu Timoteyo yakondya kuwuya kono kwetu, yakulawa u kwenyu, nayo kacilonjela nghani za nyemo kuli zo wihuwilo wenyu no wendo wenyu. Kacilonjela kanyhi vyono mukucikumbucila nhondo zose na vyono mwina wuhile wo kuciwona ase, nha vyono na sese cina wuhile wo kumuwonenyi nyenye.
52003007	Nase cisindamikwa muno mu wugaye ne matamiso getu gose, ku soko yo wihuwilo wenyu.
52003008	Hambi alu nha cili womi mbeka, hono mwime mukamile muli Muwaha.
52003009	Alu cosuma kumulumba u Mulungu wetu ku soko yenyu. Cikumulumba so nyemo yono cina nayo hali mwene ku soko yenyu.
52003010	Cikumulomba u Mulungu cihidimbaye kwe mitima yetu yose cilo na misi, ho yacipele i cilejeho co kumuwonenyi wusu na wusu, ho cisume kuzinozeleza zono zikali zicepuce mu wihuwilo wenyu.
52003011	Nase cikumulomba u Mulungu u Sogo yetu mweneco, no Muwaha wetu Yesu, yaciwikanizize nzila yo kuza u kwenyu.
52003012	U Muwaha yamupelenyi wiyendi nyenye wose, no kucila muno kuwenda i wanhu wose, nha vyono ase cimwendilenyi nyenye.
52003013	Holeka nayo komukamyenyi zinhumbula zenyu, nanye mowa mukwilaniciye mu wele hali Mulungu no Sogo yetu, mwipango lono kolokuziza u Muwaha wetu Yesu hamonga ne wakwe wose.
52004001	Ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, nha vyono mweyijiza kuli sese vyono munojeye mwikale ho mumwendeze u Mulungu. Nayo yili mbeka vyo mwikalaga. Alu cikumulombenyi kanyhi cikumunenenyi mwitagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu, vyono alu ho mucile muno kuwituma viswanu.
52004002	Hambi nha mumanyile i malajilizo gono camupelelenyi mu wulajilize wo Muwaha Yesu.
52004003	U Mulungu yakumusacenyi anye mweze mwelile kanyhi mwilejele lukulu mu mikalile yo wusenyha.
52004004	Anye nyo walume, yinojeye munhu na lwakwe yeyijize nha vyono yimunojeye kwikala no mugolece wakwe mu wele ne lilumbo,
52004005	ninga si mu masulumizi mabi nhe wanhu we makungugo ganji wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu.
52004006	Holeka munhu wo wose yalece kumusutizya hamba kumukapa u muyagwe mu nghani yiyi. Hambi nha cakondya kumulonjelenyi muli zizo kanyhi cikamusugulenyi vyono u Muwaha kowalipiciza wono wakwituma zono zinha zizo.
52004007	U Mulungu si yacicema ho cikale mu mikalile yo wusenyha, langa ho cikale mu wele.
52004008	Holeka mono yakugabedegala i mejizo gago, si yakumubedegala munhu, langa yakumubedegala u Mulungu mweneco mono yakumupelenyi u Muhe wakwe Mono Yelile.
52004009	Hasina soko yo kumwandicilenyi vyono munojeye kuwenda i wandugu zenyu wono wehuwiye. Hambi nha mwijizwe no Mulungu vyono munojeye kwiyenda nyenye wose.
52004010	Hambi nha vyo mukunoza nhavivyo kuli wandugu zenyu wose mu Makedoniya mose. Holeka wandugu zangu cikumulombelenyi ho mucile muno.
52004011	Kanyhi mweze no wuhile wo kwikala mu mikalile yo wutuvu, munhu wo wose yepiganzizaje i zakwe mweneco, kanyhi yetume i milimo ne miwoko yakwe mweneco nha vyono camulonjelenyi bahalya ha lulongozi.
52004012	Na muli zizo mo mokwitujila lilumbo yiswanu kuli awalya wono wakali si wanawa Wakilisito, kanyhi mowa musina soko yo kuwetumbila wanji ku soko ye visakwa vyenyu.
52004013	Nyo wandugu zangu, cikuhila muyimanye i mbeka ya kuli walya wono wakondya kufwa, ho mulece kuwa na wukalale nhe wanhu wono wasina u witumbilo.
52004014	Ase cihuwiye vyono Yesu yafwa, yakazuka, na ku soko yiyo, holeka nase cihuwiye vyono u Mulungu kowaleta hamonga na Yesu wawalya wose wono wawuka mononze akuno wamwihuwiye u mwene.
52004015	Na yiyi yono cikumulonjelenyi go mejizo go Muwaha, ase mono cili womi, mono cowa cikali cisigaye, mwidaha lyono yakuziza u Muwaha, si colowalongolela awalya wono wakondya kuwuka mononze.
52004016	Hambi nha wololavywa u wulajilize, lizi lya malayika muwaha, ne lizi lye ndulele yo Mulungu, nayo u Muwaha mweneco kolotima kulawa ku wulanga. Hobaho awalya wono wawuka kononze akuno wamwihuwiye Kilisito, wololongola kuzukulwa.
52004017	Hanyuma nase nhondo mono cili womi mwidaha lilyo, colonyasulanwa nawo mu mavunde no kumuhinjiliza u Muwaha, ale nhavivyo colowezana no Muwaha cibitilila.
52004018	Ale mwisindamicilaje mu zinghani zizi.
52005001	Nye wandugu zangu, hasina soko yo kumwandicilenyi muli ze madaha ne vipango vya muli zizo zono zokuza.
52005002	Hambi nha mumanyile nyo weneco vyono, i lizuwa lyo Muwaha lyolokuza nha muhizi vyono kazaga ku cilo.
52005003	I wanhu kolo wakutya, “Mulamu kanyhi kupolile.” Hobaho ho wukuziza u wuhodanji wono wukuwaziza nhinicizo! Nazo zizo zowaziza nhinicizo nho wusungu wo kulela vyono wukuwa kumuziza u mucekulu lono yakusawa, ne wanhu hamba si wosuma kwilega.
52005004	Ninga anye nyo wandugu zangu si muli mu citi yaye, holeka ne lizuwa lilyo si linojeye limuzizenyi nhinicizo nho muhizi.
52005005	Anye wose muli wanhu wono mwikaye mu wuzelu, muli wanhu wa mu misi. Ase si cili wanhu wa ku cilo hamba wa mu wutitu.
52005006	Holeka cilece kugona zinhongo nha vyono wanji, langa yicinojeye cikale meso kanyhi ciweze no wiyimile.
52005007	Wono wagonaga, wagonaga ku cilo, na wono wagalaga, wakuwa kugala ku cilo.
52005008	Ninga ase cili wanhu wa mu misi, holeka yicinojeye ciwe no wiyimile. Yicinojeye civwale u wihuwilo no wendo viwe nha civwalo cono cosuma kucicitiza mu mhambaga, kanyhi no witumbilo wetu we mhonelo, yiwe nha kofiya ya cuma.
52005009	Hambi u Mulungu nha si yacihagula ho citamiswe mwi'kuwo lyakwe, langa ho ciyituje i mhonelo mu nzila yo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito,
52005010	mono yafwa ku soko yetu, ho cikalane hamonga nayo, hamba ciwe cili womi, hamba hono ciwe cakondya kufwa.
52005011	Holeka mwisindamikaje no kwitaza munhu na muyagwe nha vyono mukunoza lulu.
52005012	Ninga cikumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muwapelaje cogopo awalya wono wakwituma muli nyenye, wawo wono wakumutonjenyi no kumwijizenyi muli ze mikalile ye Cikilisito.
52005013	Muwalumbizaje muno no kuwenda ku soko yo mulimo wono wakwituma. Kanyhi mweze mwilamuye nyenye wose.
52005014	Kanyhi cikumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muwafundaje i wanhu wadoba, muwasinyhimikaje we zinhumbula zinyoga, muwebatilizaje wono wasoceye, kanyhi mweze na ngola kuli wose.
52005015	Mulanjilile, munhu wo wose yalece kumugomolezeza u muyagwe wubi na wubi, langa wuhile wenyu, weze wo kwitendela ziswanu nhondo zose munhu na muyagwe, no kuwatendela ziswanu wanhu wose.
52005016	Mweze museceleye nhondo zose,
52005017	akuno mukulomba musina wudile,
52005018	mweze mwina ne lilumbo muli zose. Hambi wuwo nha wo wuhile wo Mulungu kuli nyenye mu wilunze wenyu na Kilisito Yesu.
52005019	Mulece kumwimila u Muhe Mono Yelile;
52005020	mulece kuwubedegala wuwizi.
52005021	Ninga mweze kuvijela vinhu vyose; mukamise muno muno ziswanu,
52005022	kanyhi mwilegaje mu mawala gose ge zimbi.
52005023	No Mulungu mono kacipelaga mulamu, yamunozenyi muwe mwelile muli zose, yamukamisenyi nyenye, u muhe, no wumi ne miwili yenyu, ho mulece kuwa na yilema lyo lyose ha wuze wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
52005024	Nayo mono yamucemenyi nyenye, nha konoza nhavivyo, hambi Mwene nha mwihuwilwa.
52005025	Nye wandugu zangu, mucilombelaje na sese nhavivyo.
52005026	Muwalamusizaje wandugu zetu wose mu citanjilo co wendo.
52005027	Nghumukong'onhezenyi mwitagwa lyo Muwaha, vyono muwasomelaje we zindugu wose i baluwa yiyi.
52005028	Ilihewa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, liwezane na nyenye wose.
53001001	Ane Pawulo na Silivano hamonga na Timoteyo, cikumwandicilenyi anye nyo we likanisa lya kuko ku Tesalonike, mono muli wanhu wo Mulungu Baba na wo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
53001002	Ilihewa no Mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu Baba na ko Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, weze muli nyenye.
53001003	Nye wandugu zangu, yicinojeye ceze kumulumbo Mulungu nhondo zose ku soko yenyu. Kanyhi yicinojeye cinoze nhavivyo, vyono u wihuwilo wenyu wukucila muno muno, sunga no wiyendi wenyu wukucila konjelezeka muno muno.
53001004	Holeka nase cikwilumbila muli nyenye mu makanisa go Mulungu, cikuwona lukumyo luwaha, vyono mukujendelela mu wihuwilo hamonga no wukangalizi wenyu wa mu wuwingwe, hamonga ne magazo gono mukugatuga.
53001005	Na zizo zose, zikucimanyiza vyono u wuling'anizi wo Mulungu wo we ling'ani, ne ndumilizo yayo ho mowa muwunojeye u Wutemi wakwe wono wukuleka anye mukugazwa.
53001006	No Mulungu kokwituma ling'ani; kowalipa u wugaye, wawo wono wukumugazenyi anye,
53001007	nayo komupelenyi wuceho anye mono mukugazika, na sese nhavivyo. Nayo kokwituma i nghani yiyo mwidaha lyono u Muwaha kolokwijelela kulawa ku wulanga, hamonga ne wamalayika wakwe wawaha,
53001008	hamonga ne malambi go moto, ho yawalipicize wawalya wose wono wakumulema u Mulungu, na wawalya wono si wakuluhulika u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Muwaha wetu Yesu.
53001009	No wulipicizwe wawo, wolowa wajilile we cibitilila, no kutemanulilwa lukulu no lukumyo lwakwe luwaha,
53001010	kolo yakuza mwizuwa lilyo no kulubocela u lukumyo ne lilumbo kulawa kuli wanhu wose wono wamwihuwiye. Nanye nhavivyo, molowa wayagwe na wawo, hambi nha mwayibocela i nghani yono camuletelenyi.
53001011	Na ku soko yiyo, holeka si cidilaga kumulombelenyi. Cikumulomba u Mulungu wetu yamupelenyi vilungo vyo kusumila kukangalila kwikala mikalile yono yamucemelenyi. Cikumulomba, kwe vilungo vyakwe, yawukwizilize u wuhile wenyu wo wituma i ziswanu, hamonga no kuwufisiliza u mulimo wenyu wo wihuwilo.
53001012	Na muli zizo, i litagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu mo lyotujila lukumyo muli nyenye, nanye mowutuga lukumyo muli mwene ku soko ye lihewa lyo Mulungu wetu na lyo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
53002001	Alu zo wuze wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, na zo wukongholwa hamonga wetu, ho cikale nayo. Cikumunenenyi muno muno wandugu zetu,
53002002	vyono mulece kuwa na mahwele ge mbela mbela mu zinhumbula zenyu, hamba mulece kogopa so wulonje wo wutya, “I lizuwa lyo Muwaha lyakondya kuza.” Lunji yikwihweswa vyono i nghani yiyi yikulawilila mu wuwile wunji wunji, hamba mu wuganule, hamba mu baluwa yono yikutegwa vyono yilawiliye kono kwetu.
53002003	Mulece kukongwa na munhu wo wose mu nzila yo yose yilya. Hambi i lizuwa lilyo nha silyosuma kuza, sunga awulya u Wubezi Wuwaha wamule kuza, ayulya u Munhu mubi yamule kwijela mono u mudumo wakwe wo wajilile wo lukulu.
53002004	U Mwene kovibeza vyose vyono i wanhu wakuviwona nha Mulungu, hamba cono wakucihemba. Heya, yadahile kwinjila no kwikala sunga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu no kwiyitya mweneco yo Mulungu.
53002005	Alo si mukukumbucila vyono namulonjelenyi zizi zose lono nali nili hamonga nanye?
53002006	Ninga alu hocili cinhu cono cikumwimila, sunga na nyenye mucimanyile i cinhu cico. Holeka, yuyo u Mubi kolokwijelela mwi'daha lyakwe lyono limunojeye yejele.
53002007	Hamba nhavivyo, yuyo u Mubi mono si yakwijela luno, yakwituma i milimo yakwe lulu, ninga si kosuma kwijela sunga ayulya mono yakumwimila yawuswe.
53002008	Ale baho ho yuyo nayo u Mubi ho kolokwijelela, ninga u Muwaha Yesu kolo yakuza, kolomuwulaga ko muhe wo mulomo wakwe, no kumwajiliziza lukulu ko wung'alale wo wuze wakwe.
53002009	Nayo yuyo u Mubi, kolokuziza mu vilungo vya Setani, no kunoza vitanjilo vye mawala gose ne mezino go wulambi,
53002010	nayo kokwitumamila u wulambi we mawala gose kuli awalya wono wali mu wajilile. Wawo nawo wolokwajilila ku soko vyono si wawubocela hamba si wayenda yiyilya i mbeka ho wapone.
53002011	Holeka nayo u Mulungu yakawawika hasi ye vilungo vyo wajilile, ho wawihuwile u wulambi.
53002012	Ne ndumilizo yayo ho yiwe, wose wono si wakuyihuwila i mbeka, langa wakwiyendeza no wubi woling'anizwa.
53002013	Yicinojeye cimulumbe u Mulungu nhondo zose ku soko yenyu anye i wandugu zetu, anye mono mwendigwe no Muwaha, hambi u Mulungu nha yamuhagulenyi ku wulawa ku mwamulizo ho muponywe kwe vilungo vyo Muhe, ho munozwe muwe wanhu wakwe wono mwelile mu nzila yo wihuwilo wenyu mu mbeka.
53002014	Nayo u Mulungu yamucemelenyi mu nzila yo Luganuzi Luswanu lono camuganulilenyi; nayo yamucemenyi ho mubocele i lifungu lyenyu mu lukumyo lo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
53002015	Holeka wandugu zangu, mwibatilaje lukulu i mejizo gagalya gono camwijizizenyi mu wuganule wetu, na mu zibaluwa zetu.
53002016	Nase cikumulomba u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito mweneco, hamonga no Mulungu Baba mono yacenda, na so lihewa lyakwe yakacipela u wutuzwe we cibitilila hamonga no witumbilo wuswanu,
53002017	yazituzaje zinhumbula zenyu kanyhi yamusikamyenyi ho musume kwituma no kulonga ziswanu nhondo zose.
53003001	Ale, ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, mucilombelaje, nghani yo Muwaha ho yicile kutandala mbela mbela, kanyhi ho yibocelwe kwe lilumbo nha vyono yinha muli nyenye.
53003002	Lombenyi, kanyhi ho Mulungu yaciponye mu mawoko ge wanhu wono wajiliye kanyhi wabi, hambi nha si wose wono wayihuwiye nghani yiyi.
53003003	Ninga u Muwaha yo mwihuwilwa. U Mwene komusikamyenyi kanyhi komudimenyi viswanu kuli ayulya mubi.
53003004	Nayo u Muwaha yakucipela u witumbilo wuwaha ku soko yenyu, nase citumbiye du vyono mokwituma, kanyhi vyono mojendelela kwituma zizilya zono camulonjelenyi.
53003005	U Muwaha yamutonjenyi zinhumbula zenyu mu wendo wo Mulungu, kanyhi na mu wukangalizi wono Kilisito yakucipela.
53003006	Nye wandugu zangu, cikumulajilizizenyi mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, mwilegaje na we zindugu wose wadoba na wono kanyhi si wakugatyatya malajilizo gono cawapela.
53003007	Nanye nyo weneco mumanyile nha vyono munojeye mutyatye luzu lwetu. Vyono ase lono cali cili hamonga nanye, si cali wadoba.
53003008	Hamba si calya ndigwa ya munhu wo wose bwete si cimulipile. Cetumaga milimo cihidimbaye hamonga no wugazice ku misi na ku cilo, ho cilece kuwa mutegulo kuli munhu wo wose muli nyenye.
53003009	Canoza nhavivyo, si vyono kotya si yali yicinojeye citazwe nanye, langa vyono cikusaka kumupelenyi luzu.
53003010	Lono cali cili hamonga nanye, cali kumulonjelenyi cikutya, “U munhu wo wose mono yakulema kwituma i milimo, nayo yalece kupegwa zindigwa yalye.”
53003011	Cikuzilonga zizo vyono cihulika vyono muli nyenye mo wali wanji wayenyu wadoba kanyhi wono si wendile kwituma mulimo wo wose, langa wene wendile kwiyinjiza du mu zinghani za wanhu wanji.
53003012	Mwitagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, cikuwalajiliza kanyhi cikuwasugula wanhu we liwala lilyo vyono yiwanojeye wawe no wunhu wuswanu, kanyhi wetume milimo ho wetujile vyawo weneco.
53003013	Ninga anye nyo wandugu zangu, mulece kukatala mu wituma ziswanu.
53003014	Yidahile kuwa kuko koyuli munhu yunji mono si yakuyihulika nghani yiyi yono cikumuletelenyi mu baluwa yiyi. Na hono yiwe nhavivyo, ale yinojeye anye mumwanzalice u munhu yuyo, kanyhi mulece hamba kuhanga nayo mu nghani yo yose, nayo ho yawone cevu.
53003015	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, mulece kumunoza u munhu yuyo nha mulugu, langa mumufundaje nha kotya ndugu yenyu.
53003016	U Muwaha mweneco, yo mwamulizo wo mulamu, yamupelenyi mulamu nhondo zose muli zose. U Muwaha yawezane na nyenye wose.
53003017	Ko muwoko wangu nene no mweneco nghwandika nhavi: U mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Pawulo! Navyo nhavivi vyo nghuwa kutajila sayini mu zi baluwa zose, na vyo nghuwa kwandika.
53003018	Ilihewa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane na nyenye wose.
54001001	Nene Pawulo mutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito ku soko ye lilajilizo lyo Mulungu u Mukombozi wetu na Yesu Kilisito u witumbilo wetu,
54001002	nghukwandicila gwegwe Timoteyo umwanangu tuti mu wihuwilo. Ilihewa liweze kuli'gwe, hamonga no lusungu no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu na kuli Kilisito Yesu Mutwa wetu.
54001003	Nyendile 'gwe wikale kuko ku Efeso, nha vyono nakunena lono nabitaga ku Makedoniya. Iwanhu wanji wali kuko wono wakwijiza imejizo go wulambi. Wuwagomezaje wanhu wawo wapelele lukulu.
54001004	Kanyhi wuwalonjelaje walecele lukulu zisimo zizilya zono zisina nhunizo yo yose hamba hadodo, hamonga ne zinghomo zinhali ze zindelwa ze walezi wetu, zono ziletaga wiwanganile wa bwete, hamba siziwazengaga wanhu mu wuhile wo Mulungu wono wumanyice mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
54001005	Ale u wulunji we lilajilizo lili, nha wukukong'onheza uwendo wono wukulawa mu nhumbula nzelu, no mutima muswanu, na mu wihuwilo we mbeka.
54001006	Hambi iwanhu wanji nha wajilila no kupitucila ku wulonga zinghani zo wulele zono zisina cambuzi co cose.
54001007	Wendile kuwa wejizi wo Wulajilize, ninga akuno ho si wakuzizuka ne zinghani zawo weneco, hamba kuzimanya bwete na zizo zono wakuzikong'onheza muno muno.
54001008	Cimanyile vyono u wulajilize wuswanu, hono witumamilwe vyono yinojeye.
54001009	Ninga yicinojeye cikumbucile vyono u wulajilize si wukuwa kuwikwa so wanhu waswanu, langa wuwikwaga ku soko ye wahodanji na wono wasina cihuliko, wono siwamogopile u Mulungu ne wanyo wubi, iwanhu wono wasina dini, kanyhi we ciyinze yinze. Kanyhi wuwikwaga ku soko ye wanhu wono wawulagaga i wasogo zawo ne wanyina zawo, wawulaga wanhu,
54001010	kanyhi wulajilize nha wuwicigwe ku soko ye wanhu wasenyha, i wamelopezi, i wahiza wanhu, walambi, na wono welahaga ko wulambi, hamba na wono wetumaga zono zili suta ne mejizo ge mbeka.
54001011	Hambi imejizo gaga nha gali mu Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu wo lukumyo kanyhi u mulugutwe.
54001012	Nghumulumba u Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito mono yamhela i vilungo ku soko yo mulimo wangu. Kanyhi nghumulumba vyono yambona ane nili mwihuwilwa, yakahagula nimwitumamile,
54001013	hambe bahalya halulongozi nene no mweneco nghamuliga no kumugaza no kumugalila. Ninga mwene Mulungu yakambonela lusungu, ku soko nali nghali sina wihuwilo, na holeka si nali manyile cono netumaga.
54001014	Ninga u Mutwa wetu yakamhela i lihewa lyakwe ko winji, kanyhi yakamhela wihuwilo no wendo mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
54001015	No wulonje wuwu nha wa mbeka, na kanyhi wunojeye wuvumilwe muno muno, vyono Kilisito Yesu yaza kononze kuwaponya wanyo wubi. Nane nha nili mubi kuciza wawo wose.
54001016	Ninga mwene Mulungu yakambonela lusungu, ho Kilisito yawulajile wukangalizi wakwe wose kuli'ne, wuwe nha musambo kuli awalya wono hanyuma yayo wolomwihuwila no kubocela wumi we cibitilila.
54001017	Ale, kuli mwene Mutemi we cibitilila na we sakalakale, mono sikawonagwa, umwene Mulungu we ciwene, lyeze lilumbo no lukumyo cibitilila na cibitilila! Heya.
