54001018	Go mwanangu Timoteyo, nghukupela lilajilizo lili, nha vyono zinha i zinghani zo wuwizi, zono zawilwa katali muli gwegwe. Ale wuzitumamilaje i zinghani zizo ziwe nha citwalo cako, ho wusume kulewa milewo miswanu,
54001019	kanyhi wuwukamisaje u wihuwilo wako ne ciselinji ciswanu. Hambi iwanhu wanji vyono si wasaka kuvihuliciza i viselinji vyawo, holeka wakawuhodanga u wihuwilo wawo.
54001020	Na muli wawo, wo wa Himenayo na Alekizanda, wono nawakombola kuli Setani, ho wejizwe wapele kumutovula u Mulungu.
54002001	Ale, yinongozi muli zose, nghukong'onheza vyono wilombela ziswanu, wolombe, wulombezi, no wulumbe, vilavywe kuli Mulungu so wanhu wose,
54002002	so watemi na kuli wose wono wena u wulajilize, ho cikale mu mikalile yo wutuvu no mulamu, hamonga no wogopo Mulungu ne mijendele miswanu.
54002003	Ne nghani yiyi nha swanu kanyhi yikumwendezo Mulungu u Mukombozi wetu,
54002004	mono yakuhila i wanhu wose waponywe, kanyhi wafice ku wumanye mbeka.
54002005	Hambi nha hoyuli Mulungu yumonga du, na kanyhi hoyuli yumonga mono kawalamulaga iwanhu no Mulungu, yo munhu, Kilisito Yesu,
54002006	mono yelavya mweneco ho yawakomboze iwanhu wose. Wuwo wali wo wuhomelezi we cipango cono u Mulungu yakuhila kuwaponya wanhu wose.
54002007	Na ku soko yiyo, ane nghatumwa niwe mutumwa na mwijizi we wanhu wono si Wayuda, ho niyiganule i nghani yo wihuwilo ne mbeka. Nghulonga mbeka, hamba singhulonga wulambi yaye!
54002008	Ale, ho hose mu kanisa, kolo mukwitang'anila mu wuhembi, nghusaka iwalume weze kulomba akuno welavizye lukulu kuli Mulungu, na kanyhi wono wosuma kunyasula imiwoko yawo, kuno wakulomba wasina likuwo hamba wuwanji.
54002009	Nhavivyo, nghusaka iwacekulu nawo, weze wali cisindo, no kuvwala myenda yono yikuleta lilumbo liswanu muli wene, wavwale viswanu, ninga si ko wihambo wo wutawa zimvili, no wihambo we zizahabu, zilulu, hamba ku wuvwala ivivwalo vyo wuguzi wukamu muno muno,
54002010	langa wehambaje kwe metumo maswanu nha vyono yiwanojeye i wacekulu wono wamogopilo Mulungu.
54002011	Hambi iwacekulu nha yiwanojeye weyijize watulile, kanyhi wawe wenenenyhezi.
54002012	Ninga singhuwakombola iwacekulu wejize hamba kuwatema i walume, langa yiwanojeye weze wekaye watulile du.
54002013	Hambi Adamu nha yo yalongola kuwumbwa, na hanyuma yayo, ho Hawa.
54002014	Na kanyhi, Adamu yo si yakongwa ng'o, langa u mucekulu yo yakongwa, no kuwubena u Wulajilize wo Mulungu.
54002015	Ninga hamba nhavivyo umucekulu koloponywa so wulela wana, hono yekale mu wihuwilo, wendo, wele, no winenenyhezi.
54003001	Uwulonje awu, nha wo we mbeka: vyono kolo munhu yakusaka kuwa mulongola mwi kanisa, yuyo yakwilowa mulimo muswanu.
54003002	Ninga u mulongola we likanisa, yimunojeye yeze munhu mono yasina yilema, na kanyhi yimunojeye yeze mono yena mugolece yumonga du, kanyhi yeze mwiyimizi, mulula, we cisindo, kanyhi yimunojeye yeze mucemezi na mono yasumile kwijiza,
54003003	yalece kuwa mukolwa, hamba munhu we ciwuma wuma, langa yeze mupolo, mono yendile mulamu, kanyhi yalece kuwa munhu mwenda pesa,
54003004	kanyhi yimunojeye yeze munhu mono yasumile kuyitonga viswanu mhuga yakwe, no kuwanoza i wanagwe wawe ne cihuliko ne cogopo cose.
54003005	Hambi hono munhu yawe si yakusuma kuyitonga viswanu i mhuga yakwe mweneco, ho kosuma wule kulidima likanisa lyo Mulungu?
54003006	Kanyhi u munhu mono yakali nakangala mu wihuwilo, yalece kunozwa kuwa mulongola mwi kanisa, ho yalece kumema wiwoni, no kuling'anizwa nha vyono Setani yakaling'anizwa.
54003007	Yimunojeye yawe munhu mono yena lilumbo yiswanu muli wanhu wono wali kunze ye likanisa, ho yalece kuhoswa no kugwila mu mutego wa Setani
54003008	Ne wetumami nawo mwi kanisa yiwanojeye wawe wanhu wono wena mikalile miswanu, kanyhi walonga mbeka, walece kuwa wang'wela muno we divayi, hamba kuwa ne masulumizi ga pesa,
54003009	hambi nha yiwanojeye kwibata ko mutima muswanu imbeka ya mugati yo wihuwilo.
54003010	Ku soko yiyo, yiwanojeye wamule wajelwe, na kolo wakwijela vyono wosuma, ho wawe wetumami mu witumami wawo.
54003011	Ne wagolece zawo nawo, yiwanojeye wawe ne mikalile miswanu, si waheha wanhu, wono si wakolwa, kanyhi wehuwilwa muli zose.
54003012	Nayo mwitumami mwi kanisa yimunojeye yeze no mugolece yumonga du, kanyhi yeze mono kasumaga kutonga viswanu iwanagwe ne mhuga yakwe.
54003013	Hambi i wetumami wono wetumaga mulimo wawo viswanu, nha wetujilaga musambo muswanu, no kusuma kulonga kuno wasina woga zo wihuwilo wawo wono wuli muli Kilisito Yesu.
54003014	Nghukwandicila baluwa yiyi, akuno ninga nitumbiye vyono nokuza kwako mu vilo vivi baha.
54003015	Ninga hono nyhezwe muno, baluwa yiyi yokumanyiza imikalile yono yicinojeye ciwe nayo mu mhuga yo Mulungu, lyono lyo likanisa lyo Mulungu mumi, lyono lye 'sumbili no musinji we mbeka.
54003016	Hambi nha hasina mahwele go gose kuli zo wuwaha wa ze cinyele ze dini yetu, vyono: Yejela mu hwani yo munhu yahomelelwa no Muhe vyono yali ling'ani, yawonwa ne wamalayika. Yaganulwa mu zinghungugo, yehuwilwa kononze kose, yakabocelwa kucanyha ku wulanga mu lukumyo.
54004001	Ningo Muhe yakulonga ciwonelela vyono mu vilo vyono vikuza, iwanhu wanji wolowulecela lukulu u wihuwilo, nawo woloyihulicila i myuhe yo wukoci, no kwibata mafundo ge masetani.
54004002	Imafundo ge liwala lilyo, gatandazwaga ne wanhu walambi kanyhi wakonji, wono i viselinji vyawo vinha kotya nha vinyanywe ne cuma cono cili moto.
54004003	Iwanhu we liwala lilyo, wejizaga wakutya, gowa masutya kwitola, sunga no kulya zindigwa zinji zinji. Ninga u Mulungu nha yaziwumba i zindigwa zizo, ho wawalya wono wehuwiye na wono watuga kuyimanya imbeka, wazitumamile kwe lilumbo.
54004004	Hambi vyose vyono yaviwumba Mulungu nha viswanu, hamba hasina cono cinojeye kusemunwa, langa yinojeye vyose vibocelwe kwe malombo no wulumbe,
54004005	ku soko inghani yo Mulungu hamonga no wulombe, vicinozaga i cinhu cico ciwa celile hali Mulungu.
54004006	Hono wuwapele i wandugu wose imalajilizo gaga, kowa mwitumami muswanu wa Yesu Kilisito, akuno wukwijendeleza mu cimuhe mu zinghani zo wihuwilo ne mejizo ge mbeka, gono go mweneco kugatyatyaga.
54004007	Ninga wulecele lukulu zisimo zono zisina dini na zono zisina nhunizo yo yose. Wizowelezaje kwikala mu mikalile yo wogopa Mulungu.
54004008	Hambi wizoweleze wo muwili nha wina cambuzi cayo, ninga wizoweleze we cimuhe, wina cambuzi ce mawala gose, hambi nha wukucihuwiza zo wumi we vilo vivi na wuwo kanyhi we vilo vyono vikuza.
54004009	Hambi wulonje awu nha wa mbeka, kanyhi wunojeye wubocelwe kanyhi wihuwilwe.
54004010	Ase cikupiligala no kwituma cihidimbaye, hambi nha cimuwiciye witumbilo wetu u Mulungu mumi, mono yo Mukombozi wetu co wanhu wose, na ko muno wa walya wono wehuwiye.
54004011	Ale wuwapelaje malajilizo gaga ne mejizo gaga.
54004012	Wulecele lukulu kulumba munhu wo wose ho yakubedegale ku soko yo wudodo wako, langa weze wuli musambo kuli wono wehuwiye: mu wulonje wako, mu mijendele yako, mu wendo, wihuwilo, na mu mikalile miswanu.
54004013	Witumamilaje madaha gako hamonga ne vilungo vyako, mu wusoma calinze Imandiko Gono Gelile, mu wuganule na mu wijize, sunga kolo nghuza.
54004014	Wulece kuleka kucitumamila i cipegwa cicilya ca Kilisito cono cili muli'gwe, cono wapelelwa mu zinghani ze wawizi, na mu wuwicilwe miwoko ne wanyamhala.
54004015	Wuzihwesaje zizo zose muno muno, hamonga no kuzitumama, u wujendelele wako ho wusume kwijela hali wose.
54004016	Wiyikamisaje muno muno go mweneco hamonga ne mejizo gako. Wuhidimbale muno muno mu wituma zizo, hambi nha kokwiponya go mweneco, hamonga na wawo wono wakukuhuliciza.
54005001	Wulece kumutacila u munhu muwaha, langa wumunenaje kotya nha Sogo mono yakulelile. Wuwatendele Iwadodo we cilume nawo, kotya nha wanduguzo,
54005002	nawo iwacekulu wadala, kotya nha wanyina zako, ne wahinza nawo, wuwatendelaje nha kotya walumbuzo, mu wele wose.
54005003	Wuwapelaje cogopo iwacekulu wafwile wono mbeka wafwile.
54005004	Ninga u mufwile mono yena wana hamba wezukulu, awo wawo yiwanojeye wamule weyijize kuwanozeza viswanu we mhuga zawo weneco, na mu nzila yiyo, ho wosuma kuwanemya i walezi wawo hamonga ne wakuku zawo nhavivyo, hambi yiyo nha yo nghani yono yimwendezago Mulungu.
54005005	Ale, umucekulu mono mufwile mbeka, mono yasina munhu wo kumutaza, yakondya kumuwicilo Mulungu witumbilo wakwe, kanyhi yakujendelela kumulomba Mulungu no kuneneleza u wutazi wakwe cilo ne misi.
54005006	Ninga mucekulu mono yakwikala mu mikalile yo wiyendezi mweneco, yuyo yakondya kufwa akuno ho yakali mumi.
54005007	Wuwapelaje malajilizo gaga, ho walece kuwa na yilema.
54005008	Ninga munhu mono si kawalulaga wanhu we mhuga yakwe, ko muno wawalya wa mu kaya yakwe, umunhu yuyo yakondya kuwukana wihuwilo, kanyhi mubi kuciza no munhu mono siyehuwiye.
54005009	Ale, wulece kumwandika mu wityatye we matagwa ge wafwile, u mufwile wo wose mono yakali sinafisa myaka makumi mutandatu. Nayo kanyhi yeze mono yakatolwa kali kamonga du,
54005010	yeze mono yena lilumbo yiswanu, umucekulu mono yawawiluse wanagwe viswanu, mono yawabocela wajenzi mukaya yakwe, mono yawazuguza magulu iwanhu wo Mulungu, yawataza wanhu mu wugaye wawo, kanyhi yelavya ku wituma metumo maswanu.
54005011	Ninga wulece kuwandika i wafwile we lizika lidodo, hambi nha kolo i masulumizi gawo ge mumbwa yawo gakucila kuwa ne vilungo muno, si nho wilavye wawo wa kuli Kilisito, baho nha wosaka kutolwa kanyhi,
54005012	holeka wokwijela wasutyi, vyono weza si wehuwilwa mu cilagane cawo i cilongozi.
54005013	Ne wafwile wono wenha wawo wajilizaga i vilejeho vyawo ko wupilima-pilima mu kaya na kaya. Ne nghani 'mbi muno muno, wendaga maheho muno mu wupilime wawo, wenjizaga wuhesi kuli wayawo wanji, kanyhi no kwitajila mu zinghani ze wanhu wanji, akuno kanyhi wakulonga sunga ne zinghani zono siziwanojeye kulonga.
54005014	Holeka nali nyende wawo i wafwile we lizika lidodo watolwe, walele wana no kuzikamisa zikaya zawo, iwalugu wetu ho walece kutuga cilejeho co kucitovulila.
54005015	Hambi iwafwile wanji nha wakondya kwajilila no kumutyatya Setani.
54005016	Ninga hono mucekulu Mukilisito yawe yena wafwile mu mhuga yakwe, umwene yimunojeye yawataze, ninga yalece kulilecela likanisa u mutegulo wuwo, i likanisa ho lisume kuwataza iwafwile wawalya wono wasigaye wali wene du.
54005017	Iwanyamhala wono watongaga wanhu viswanu yiwanojeye watuje musahala kali kejete, ko muno wawalya wono wahidimbalaga mu wuganule na mu wijize.
54005018	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gatezaga: “Wulece kuyidinda mulomo i ng'ombe yono wukuyitumamila kutowa wuhemba mu cuga,” na kanyhi, “Umwitumami yimunojeye yatuje musahala wakwe.”
54005019	Wulece kuvumila wusonjezwe kuli munyamhala, lono i nghani yiyo yisina wuhomelezi wa wanhu wejete hamba wadatu.
54005020	Awalya nawo wono wakwituma wubi, wuwatacilaje calinze, ho iwanji nawo wogope.
54005021	Nghukukong'onheza hali Mulungu, na hali Kilisito Yesu, na hali wamalayika wono welile, wukamise imalajilizo gaga wulece kuleka hamba limonga, kanyhi, pogola, wulece kumwendeza munhu wo wose muli zose zono kokwituma.
54005022	Kanyhi wulece kumuwicila miwoko munhu wo wose musunho, ku soko yo kumwitumamila Muwaha. Wulece kuhanga u wubi we wanji, langa wikamisaje welile mu nhumbula yako.
54005023	Wulece kuwa kung'wa malenga gali wene du, langa 'ng'weze ne divayi ndodo so'nda yako, hambi nha kutamwaga kali kenji na kenji.
54005024	Uwubi we wanhu wanji wijelaga calinze, nawo wukuwa kuwalongolela ku wuling'anizwe, ninga wubi we wanji, wijelaga du lwa hanyuma yayo.
54005025	Nhavivyo, ne metumo maswanu gejelaga calinze, hamba na gagalya gono si gali calinze, sigosuma kuhundikwa.
54006001	Iwawanda wose yiwanojeye wawapele lilumbo iwatwa zawo ho wanhu wawe wasina soko yinji yo kulitovulila i litagwa lyo Mulungu ne mafundo getu.
54006002	Ne wawanda wono wena watwa zawo Wakilisito, walece kuwabedegala, hambi nha wandugu zawo. Langa yiwanojeye wawetumamile mu wuswanu muno wose, hambi wawo wono watugaga cambuzi mu mulimo wawo, nha wo wawo wono wehuwiye kanyhi wendece kuli Mulungu. Yikunojeye kwijiza no kuziganula izinghani azi:
54006003	U munhu wo wose mono yakwijiza suta ne zinghani zizi, kanyhi mono si yakuzivumila i zinghani ze mbeka zo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito ne mafundo ge dini yetu,
54006004	yuyo yamemile widunhumuzi, kanyhi hamba siyamanyile cinji co cose. Yo munhu mono yendile wiwanganile no wisonji we zinghani ze bwete, ne zinghani ze liwala lilyo, ziletaga wivu, wisonji, maligo, maganicizo mabi,
54006005	no wiwanganile wono wusina ndumo, wono wukulawa kuli wanhu we mahala gono gavizice, kanyhi wono wayisina imbeka. Wono wehwesaga vyono dini, mba yo nzila yo kutujila wugoli.
54006006	Yene mbeka dini, yimunozaga munhu kawa mugoli muno, u munhu yuyo hono yawe yaceye ne vinhu vyono yena navyo.
54006007	Hambi nha sicaleteleza cinji co cose kononze, kanyhi hamba sicolosoleleza cinji co cose.
54006008	Ale holeka, hono ciwe cina ndigwa ne vivwalo, yicinojeye cituzwe mutima navyo.
54006009	Ninga wawalya wono wasakaga wagolipe, wagwilaga mu wujelwe, no kugwila mu mutego we masulumizi menji mabi go wulele, gono gawakwegaga sunga ko ku wuhodanjice.
54006010	Hambi u wenda muno we zipesa nha wo mwamulizo wo wubi wose. Iwanhu wanji wasulumilaga muno kutuga mapesa, sunga wawuleka no wihuwilo wawo, no kudumanjila dumanjila ako na ako, kutali no wihuwilo wawo no kutukuwika i mitima yawo ko wusungu wuwaha muno.
54006011	Ninga 'gwe, go munhu wo Mulungu, wilegaje mu zinghani zizo. Wukamise wiling'ano, no wogopo Mulungu, no wihuwilo, no wendo, ne ngola, no winenenyhezi.
54006012	Wumanyhe kwe vilungo vyako vyose wicize lumangho lo wihuwilo, ho witujile cihumbilizwa co wumi we cibitilila, wono wacemelwa lono wawuvumilila u wihuwilo wako hali wahomelezi wenji.
54006013	Hali Mulungu mono kavipelaga i vinhu vyose wumi, na hali Yesu Kilisito mono yayihomelela no kuyivumila imbeka hali Pontiyo Pilato,
54006014	nghukulajiliza, wugebataje muno i Malajilizo gako no kugakamisa muno muno, sunga lizuwa lililya kolo yakwijela Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
54006015	No wijele wakwe, wolokuziza mwipango lyono linojeye lyono lyawikwa no Mulungu umulugutwe kanyhi mono yo Mutemi yali wene, u Mutemi we watemi no Muwaha we wawaha.
54006016	Umwene yali wene du yo kekalaga mumi cibitilila, kanyhi kekalaga mu wuzelu wono hasina munhu wo wose mono yadahile kuwusejelela. Hasina munhu mono yasuma kumuwona, hamba mono kosuma kumuwona. Kuli mwene lyeze yilumbo ne vilungo vye cibitilila! Heya.
54006017	Wuwalonjelaje iwanhu wagoli we vinhu vye mikalile ya lulu, walece kwidunhumula, hamba kuwika u witumbilo wawo mu sawo yono siyidahile kwitumbilwa, langa wamwitumbilaje Mulungu, mono ko wuswanu wakwe, kacipela i vinhu vyose civisangalalile.
54006018	Wuwalonjelaje wetume viswanu, wawe wagoli mu metumo maswanu, kanyhi wawe wacemezi, wono wewikanize mu wuhanga ne wanji zisawo zawo.
54006019	Na mu wunoza nhavivyo wakwiyiwutila ciwutwa cono cowa kuli wene musinji wono wukamile kuli cipango cono cikuza. Ho wasume kwiyitujila u wumi wono wo wumi we mbeka.
54006020	Gwe, Timoteyo wukamise viswanu zose zono wakozwa. Wilegaje mu miduwo ye ciyinze-yinze, hamonga no wiwanganile wo wulele, muli cico cono wanhu wanji wacemaga: “Wumanye” ninga vyo si vinha.
54006021	Hambi wanji nha watezaga vyono wene wakondya kuwa no “Wumanye” wuwo, na ku soko yiyo holeka wakondya kuyajiliza i nzila yo wihuwilo. Lihewa lyo Mulungu, liweze muli nyenye wose!
55001001	Ane yo nene Pawulo, mono u Mulungu yakasaka ho niwe mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu,
55001002	nane nghukwandicila agwe Timoteyo, go mwanangu u mwendece. Lihewa, no lusungu no mulamu, vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu Baba na kuli Kilisito Yesu u Muwaha wetu, vyeze hamonga nagwe.
55001003	Nghumulumbo Mulungu mono nghumwitumamila ne ciselinji ciswanu, nha vyono wanoza i wasogo zangu, nghumulumbo Mulungu nhondo zose lono nghukukumbucila mu wulombe wangu misi ne cilo.
55001004	Kanyhi nghugakumbucila i mahozi gako, nane nghusulumila muno muno ciwone nagwe, i nyemo yangu ho yimeme.
55001005	Nane nghuwukumbucila wihuwilo wako we mbeka, no wihuwilo wono yali yena nawo mamayo Loyisi, hamonga no nyina yako Ewunike. Nane nitumbiye vyono na gwegwe vyo winha.
55001006	Co cikuleka nghukukumbuciza, wucifwanghanizaje i cipegwa cono wapegwa no Mulungu, lono nakuwicilila i miwoko yangu.
55001007	Hambi u Muhe mono capegwa no Mulungu, si Muhe mono kocinoza ciwe woga, a, a, ng'o, langa yo Muhe mono kocipela wendo no wiyidime.
55001008	Ale, holeka wulece kuwona cevu kumuhomelela u Muwaha wetu Yesu, hamba wulece kuwona cevu ku soko yangu nene no mufungwa, mono funjigwe ku soko yakwe, Yesu. Ninga wuhanje magazo ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, mu nghango ye vilungo vyono Mulungu yakukupela.
55001009	Mwene yacikomboza, kanyhi yakacicema ciwe wanhu wakwe mweneco, si ku soko vyono cinojeye so metumo getu, aa, ng'o, ninga ku so wuhile wakwe mweneco, na so lihewa lyakwe. Nayo yakacipela i lihewa lilyo ku soko ya Kilisito Yesu, lono vilo vyali vikali si vinawa.
55001010	Ninga alu cakondya kugubulilwa so wuze wo Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito, u mwene yakondya kuvidumizya lukulu i vilungo vye lifwa, nayo yakawanzalika u wumi wono wusina lifwa, mu nzila yo Luganuzi Luswanu.
55001011	Nayo u Mulungu yahagula nene, ho niwe mutumwa, kanyhi niwe mwijizi ku soko yo kuluganula Luganuzi Luswanu,
55001012	na ku soko yiyo, holeka nghutamiswa nhavivi. Holeka nghali nina witumbilo wuwaha, hambi nha nimumanyile mono namwihuwila, kanyhi manyiye lukulu vyono mwene kocikamisa cicilya cono yanghoza, sunga Mwizuwa lilya.
55001013	Holeka wugakamisizaje lukulu i mafundo gagalya ge mbeka gono nakwijiza, kanyhi wikalaje du mu wihuwilo na mu wendo wetu wuwo, mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
55001014	Inghani yiyilya swanu yono wakozwa, wuyikamisizaje mu nzila ye vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, mono kekalaga muli sese.
55001015	Kanyhi nha vyono wumanyile, i wanhu wose wono wali mu yisi ya Asiya, wakondya kundeka, na muli wawo, moyuli Fugelo na Helimogene.
55001016	U Muwaha yayiwonelaje lusungu mhuga ya Onesifolo, vyono yasangalazaga kali kenji mu nhumbula yangu, hamba si yawona cevu vyono ane nali funjigwe mu jela,
55001017	langa yali yeza kufika du ku Lumi, hobaho yakamula kunondola yasimbiliye muno, sunga yakambona.
55001018	U Muwaha yamuwonele lusungu Mwi'zuwa lilya! Kanyhi na gwegwe nhavivyo, wuzimanyile viswanu zi nyinji zono yanyitumamila kuko ku Efeso.
55002001	Holeka agwe mwanangu Timoteyo, weze ne vilungo mwihewa lyono cikulituga so wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
55002002	Ale, wugasolaje i mafundo gono wagahulika nghuganula ha mwande ye wahomelezi wenji, nagwe wuwakoze wanhu wehuwilwa, wono nawo wosuma kuwejiza wanji nhavivyo.
55002003	Wuhanje mu magazo nha musilikale mwihuwilwa wa Kilisito Yesu.
55002004	U musilikale lono yali ku wulugu, keyimilaga zose ze mikalile ye nhondo zose, ho yasume kumwendeza u muwaha wakwe mono yamwandika wusilikale.
55002005	Nayo u munhu wo wose mono kesumanizaga mu midawalo, si kosuma kwisumaniza viswanu no kusuma, sunga yabocele ne cipegwa co wusume wakwe, hono yalece kutyatya u wityatye wono wukusakwa mu midawalo.
55002006	Nayo u mulimi mono yakondya kwituma mulimo muzito, yuyo yanojeye yabocele i lifungu lilongozi lye nhwanga.
55002007	Ale, Timoteyo, wuzihwesaje muno zizo zono nghulonga, hambi u Muwaha nha kokupela wusume wo kuzizuka zose.
55002008	Wumukumbucilaje Yesu Kilisito mono yazukulwa muli wafu, mono yali wa mululelo lwa Dawudi, nha vyono lukulonga u Luganuzi Luswanu lono niluganulaga.
55002009	Na ku soko yiyo yo kuluganula Luganuzi Luswanu, holeka ane nghugazika, na kanyhi holeka mbopigwe ne manyolo nha nili musutyi. Ninga inghani yo Mulungu siyosuma kuwopwa ne manyolo,
55002010	holeka nghukangalila muli vyose ku soko ye wahagulwa wo Mulungu, nawo nhavivyo ho watuje u Wukombozi wono wukuziza mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito, kanyhi wono wuletaga lukumyo lwe cibitilila.
55002011	No wulonji wuwu wo we mbeka, wono wukutya, “Hono ciwe cafwizana nayo, ale, cowumipana nayo nhavivyo.
55002012	Na hono cijendelele no wukangalile, ale, colotemana nayo nhavivyo. Ninga hono cimukane, ale, kolocikana nayo nhavivyo.
55002013	Na hono cilece kuwa wehuwilwa, ninga mwene kekalaga mwihuwilwa cibitilila. Hambi mwene nha sikosuma kwiyikana mweneco.”
55002014	Ale, wuwakumbucizaje wanhu wako izinghani zizino, kanyhi wuwalonjelaje hali Mulungu, vyono walecele lukulu wiwanganile wa mu zinghani. Hambi wiwanganile wuwo, nha si wukwiliye cinji hamba hadodo, langa wuletaga wuhodanjice wuwaha kuli awalya wono wakuwuhulika.
55002015	Wupiligale muno kwiwika mu mikalile ye lilumbo hali Mulungu nha mwitumami mono si yakuwuwonela cevu u mulimo wakwe, kanyhi mono yakwijiziza mu wulunji inghani ye mbeka.
55002016	Kanyhi wilegaje mu wiwanganile we ciyinze-yinze na wo wulele, hambi zizo nha zicilaga kuwatemanula wanhu, no kuwawika kutali no Mulungu.
55002017	I mafundo ge liwala lilyo, genha lilonda lyono lilizaga muwili. Ne wanhu wono wejiza imejizo gago, muli wawo wo wa Humenayo na Fileto.
55002018	Awo wajilila, kanyhi wali kutali ne mbeka, kanyhi wakuwatajila wanji mu wukangamyanje mu wihuwilo wawo, vyono ti, u wuzuce wetu wakondya kupuluta.
55002019	Ninga musinji wono wukamile, wono wawikwa no Mulungu si wusinjisikaga yaye, na mucanyha yo musinji wuwo, zandikwe zinghani azi, “U Muwaha yawamanyile i wakwe,” na kanyhi, “Na muli wose mono yakwiyitya, mwene yo wo Muwaha, yimunojeye yeleje no wavu.”
55002020	Mu makaya mawaha, mozili bakuli ne viya vye mawala gose, viya vinji vya fweza, vinji vya zahabu, vinji vya mbawo, na vinji vya wulongo, na vinji viwicigwe viwe vitumamilwa vye siya, na vinji kanyhi viwe vitumamilwa vye nhondo zose.
55002021	Holeka hono munhu yeyeze ko kwilega ne makani gago gose go wavu, yuyo yo kowa co ciya ce vitumamilwa vye siya, vyono yakondya kuwikwa siya, nayo yuyo yakumunojezo Muwaha wakwe, nayo kanyhi yakuwa yewikanizize lukulu so mulimo wo wose muswanu.
55002022	Ale, kanyhi wilegaje no wusulumizi we cizelelo zelelo, wutyatye wiling'ano, wihuwilo, wendo, mulamu, hamonga ne wanhu wose wono wakumulomba Muwaha kwe nhumbula swanu.
55002023	Kanyhi wilegaje no wuwanji wo wulele, na we ciwula mahala, wumanyile vyono zizo ziletaga wugombane.
55002024	Yimunojeye mwitumami wo Muwaha yalece kugombana ne wanhu. Langa yimunojeye yawe mupolo kuli wanhu wose, yeze mwijizi muswanu, kanyhi mono yena no wukangalizi,
55002025	mono mupolo, lono yakuwalanjiza walugu wakwe, lunji u Mulungu kowapela cilejeho co kunena, nawo ho wayimanye i mbeka.
55002026	Nawo u wizuce wawo, ho wowawuyila kanyhi, nawo ho wawuce mu mutego wa Setani mono yali yakondya kuwebata no kuwanoza wamuhulice muli zose zono yakuzisaka mwene.
55003001	Weze kukumbucila vyono, mu vilo vya ku ndumo, vyolokuza vipango vyo wugaye.
55003002	Iwanhu wolowa weyenda weneco, wono wena masulumizi ge mapesa, wewoni, wenyanyaguzi, waligo Mulungu, wolowa wasina cihuliko kuli walezi wawo, wono wasine 'lumbo, kanyhi wabi,
55003003	wolokuza wanhu wono wolowa wasina wendo mu zinhumbula zawo, wono wasina lusungu, wasonjezi, wabuguci, kanyhi wakali, nawo wocisula cinhu co cose i ciswanu,
55003004	wolowa wagaluci, we lizeze, kanyhi wamemile widunhumuzi, nawo wokwenda zo wiyendeza weneco, si nho kumwendo Mulungu.
55003005	Kunze yawo wokwijela nha wanhu wono wamogopilo Mulungu, ninga akuno ho wakuvilema ivilungo vyakwe. Holeka wilejelaje lukulu ne wanhu we liwala lilyo.
55003006	Na wanji muli wene, wo wabitaga mu zinyumba ze wanhu, no kuwateka wacekulu wasocele, wono wavunice ne mitegulo yo wubi, na wono wakutongwa no wusulumizi we mawala gose,
55003007	wacekulu wono wajelaga kwiyijiza nhondo zose, ninga siwasumaga hamba hadodo kuyimanya i mbeka.
55003008	Ne wanhu we liwala lilyo wawanganaga ne mbeka nha vyono Yane na Yambule, wawangana na Musa.
55003009	Ninga hamba si wosuma kujendelela muno, hambi u wulele wawo nha wokwijela calinze hali wose. Na vyo yali kuli Yane na Yambule.
55003010	Ninga agwe Timoteyo, wagebata i mejizo gangu, ne mikalile yangu, no wuhile wangu mu mikalile yangu, u wendo wangu, ne ngola yangu,
55003011	wuwinjilizwe no wugazwe wangu. Kanyhi wuzimanyile zose zono zikanyagana ku Antiyokiya, na ku Ikoniyo, na ku Lusitela. Nane nakangalila wuwinjilizwe wuwaha muno! Ninga Muwaha yakamhonya muli zose zizo.
55003012	Na muli wose mono yakuhila kwikala mu mikalile yono yikumwendeza Mulungu, mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu, yimunojeye sunga yawinjilizwe du.
55003013	Ninga i wanhu wabi ne wakonji, awo wojendelela kuwa wabi du, wakuwakonga wayawo, kanyhi sunga na weneco wakukongwa.
55003014	Ninga agwe go mweneco, wikalaje mu mbeka yiyilya yono wejizwa kanyhi wukayivumila muno muno. Na wono wakwijiza wuwamanyile,
55003015	kanyhi wukumbuciye vyono wulawa wudodo wako wagamanya i Mandiko Gono Gelile gono gosuma kukupela lihala lyono lyokuletela mhonelo mu nzila yo wihuwilo wono wuli muli Kilisito Yesu.
55003016	I Mandiko gose Gono Gelile, gandikwa mu nzila yo wutonji wo Mulungu, nago gakwiliye mu mikalile yo wiling'ano,
55003017	u munhu mono yakumwitumamilo Mulungu ho yawe yakwilaniciye, kanyhi yakondelezezwe lukulu ku wituma i milimo miswanu yose.
55004001	Nane nghukukong'onheza hali Mulungu na hali Kilisito Yesu, mono kowaling'aniza wanhu i womi ne wafu, na ku soko vyono yakuza kutema nha Mutemi,
55004002	holeka wuyiganulaje nghani yiyo, wiyohaje du kuyiganula (mu cipango cono cinojeye, hamba yiwe mu cipango cono si cinojeye), kalipile no kulanjiza, kanyhi wuwaswaswanizaje wanhu wose, akuno wukuwejiza ko wukangalizi wose.
55004003	I lipango lyokuza lyono wanhu si wolokwenda kugahuliciza i mejizo ge mbeka, langa wene wokwenda kutyatya masulumizi gawo weneco, no kwilundila wejizi wenji wono wowalonjela zinghani zizo du zono i makutu gawo gowa gewikanize kuwuhulicize.
55004004	Hamba si wokwendela lukulu kuyihulika imbeka, langa wokwenda kuzihulicila zisimo zo wulambi.
55004005	Agwe, ninga wikalaje meso muli zose, wukangalile magazo, witumaje u mulimo wo muganula Luganuzi Luswanu, wuwufisilizizaje lukulu u witumami wako.
55004006	Ninga ane ku lubavu lwangu, niwikanize du, ku wulavywa niwe yikumbiko, ne lidaha lyo wufwe wangu nha lyasejelela.
55004007	Hidimbala muno mu wisumanize, muhinzo niwumala viswanu, sunga no wihuwilo nawo niwukamisa.
55004008	Alu yisigaye yo wubocela i cipegwa co wisumanize wangu, ku soko ye mikalile yo wiling'ano, i cipegwa cono Muwaha Muling'anizi we ling'ani, kolomhela Mwizuwa lilya, kanyhi hamba si nene du nili wene, langa na wose wono wakulanjilila ko wendo i mazizo gakwe.
55004009	Wuhidimbale kuza kuli'ne mbela.
55004010	Hambi Dema nha yandeka, mwene yenda ze yinze ya lulu, yakabita ku Tesalonike. Kileseke nayo yabita ku Galatiya, na Tito yabita ku Dalumatiya.
55004011	Alu yo Luka yali wene du mono yali hamonga nane bahano. Wumusolaje Maluko muzane nayo, hambi nha kosuma kumhelo'tazi mu mulimo wangu.
55004012	Tukiko nayo, namutuma akulya ku Efeso.
55004013	Nagwe kolo wukuza, wundetelezezaje ne likoti lyangu lyono nalileka kwa Kalupo ku Tulowa, wundetelaje ne vitabu vivilya, ko muno avilya vyono vinozezwe nyhingo.
55004014	Ayulya u mutyani we vyuma vidunghu, mono kacemwaga Alekizanda, yanhendela vibi muno muno, ningo Muwaha komulipa nha vyono genhe metumo gakwe.
55004015	Ale, wilanjililaje kuli mwene, hambi nha yayibezaga inghani yetu ko wukali muno.
55004016	Ha witetele wangu wulongozi, hasina hamba munhu monga mono yema ku lubavu lwangu, langa wose wandeka. Ninga Mulungu yalece kuwawalila wubi wawo!
55004017	Ningo Muwaha yali yali hamonga nane, yamhela vilungo, sunga nghasuma kuyiganula inghani nha vyono yinha, i wanhu wono si Wayahudi ho wayihulice, kanyhi nghaponywa mu waling'anizwe wo kuwulagwa.
55004018	Holeka u Muwaha si koleka kumhonya muli makani gose i mabi, kanyhi konghamisa sunga ko ku wutemi wakwe wa ku wulanga. Ale, kuli Mwene, lweze lukumyo cibitilila ne cibitilila! Heya.
55004019	Ale, wuwalamusaje wa Pilisika na Akila, hamonga ne mhuga ya Onesifolo.
55004020	Elasito yasigala ku Kolinto, nayo Tulofimo namuleka ku Mileto, vyono yali yatamigwe.
55004021	Ale, wusimbilile kuzo kwangu lono lipango lye cinyuli likali sinafika. Ewubulo, Pude, Lino, na Kilawudiya wose wakukulamusa, sunga na we zindugu wanji, wose wakukulamusa.
55004022	Ale, du, u Muwaha yawezane nagwe mu nhumbula yako. Ne lihewa liwezane nanye wose.
56001001	Ane yo nene Pawulo, u mwitumami wo Mulungu, kanyhi mutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito nghwandika. Ane haguywe ho niwuzenje u wihuwilo we wahagulwa wo Mulungu no kuwatonga ho wayimanye i mbeka yo wuhembi wetu,
56001002	wono u musinji wayo wo wowitumbilo wo kuwutujila u wumi we cibitilila. U Mulungu mono si kalongaga wulambi, yacihuwiziza u wumi wuwo mu myaka ye katali lono yali yikali si nawa,
56001003	ne lidaha lyono likwiliye lyali lyeza kufika, yakalyanzalicila mu nghani yakwe. Ane napegwa i nghani yiyo, ho niyanzize mu wulajilize wo Mulungu, u Mukombozi wetu.
56001004	Nghukwandicila agwe Tito go mwanangu we mbeka mu wihuwilo wono cihanjile sese wose. Ilihewa no mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu Baba, na kuli Kilisito Yesu, u Mukombozi wetu.
56001005	Ane nakuleka ku Kilete ho wunozeleze zono zasigala zono zali zikali nakamilicila, kanyhi ho wuwahagule wanyamhala wa Kanisa no kuwawika mu makaya gose. Ninga weze kukumbucila zono nakulajiliza,
56001006	vyono yimunojeye u munyamhala wa Kanisa yawe munhu mono yena mugolece yumonga du, kanyhi yinojeye ne wanagwe weze wehuwiye, wono si wali nyono hamba si wali cibede.
56001007	Nayo Asikofu vyono yo mulanjilizi wo mulimo wo Mulungu, holeka yimunojeye yawe munhu mono yasina yilema. Yalece kuwa mwidunhumuzi, hamba kuwa mukolwa ne likuwo mbela, hamba mukolwa ku wujimbi, hamba mufyuzi, hamba si musulumila cambuzi cono si ce ling'ani.
56001008	Langa yimunojeye yawe mucemezi, kanyhi mono yakwenda iziswanu. Kanyhi yimunojeye yawe munhu mutuvu, we ling'ani.
56001009	Yimunojeye kanyhi, yebatile lukulu i nghani huwilwa nha vyono wukwijizwa. Holeka kosuma kuwataza wanji so mafundo ge mbeka no kusuma kuwalajila i masutya gawo wono wakuwanga kuli ze mafundo gago.
56001010	Hambi nha ko wali wenji wono wasina cihuliko, ko muno wa walya wono wapituka wakulawa mu dini ye Ciyahudi na wo wawo wono wasina cihuliko, wono wakuwajiliziza na wanji mu wulele wawo.
56001011	Yiwanojeye i milomo yawo yidindwe, hambi nha weza kuwahodanga i wanhu wose so mejizo gawo gono si gawanojeye wejize, nawo wakwituma zizo ko wuhile wubi wo kusaka ho watuje mapesa.
56001012	Sunga muyawo monga; muyagwe ne wawizi wawo yalonga mbeka lono yatela, “Wakilete walambi nhondo zose, wenha malimu, wabugu na kanyhi wadoba!”
56001013	Holeka ku soko yiyo yikunojeye wuwakalipile muno muno, ho wawe no wihuwilo wono wukwilaniciye.
56001014	Walece kujendelela ne zisimo ze bwete ze Ciyahudi, hamba i malajilizo ge wanhu gono gakwibuka muli wanhu wono wayilema i mbeka.
56001015	Zose zelile kuli wono welile, ninga kuli we makomaza na wono si wehuwiye, kusina cono celile, hambi i mahala gawo sunga ne viselinji vyawo nha vitipizwe.
56001016	I wanhu wono wenha wawo, watezaga ati wamumanyile u Mulungu, ninga kumbe mu metumo gawo ho wamukanaga. Wo wanhu we makomaza, kanyhi wali cibede, hamba si wakwiliye kanyhi mu nghani yo yose i swanu.
56002001	Ninga agwe yikunojeye wuganule ze mafundo ge telele.
56002002	Wuwalonjelaje i wakombi vyono yiwanojeye waweze ne cisindo, wawe watuvu, weyimizi, kanyhi waweze no wihuwilo we telele, wawe no wendo hamonga no wukangalizi.
56002003	Wuwalonjelaje sunga ne wadala nawo nhavivyo yiwanojeye wawe ne mikalile yo wumogopa u Mulungu, walece kuwa wasonjezi hamba kuwa wawanda wo wujimbi. Yiwanojeye wawe kwijiza i ziswanu,
56002004	ho wawazoweleze i wahinza kuwenda i walume zawo hamonga ne wana wawo,
56002005	kanyhi weze weyimizi akuno wali cisindo, wawe kuzilanjilila viswanu i zinghani za mu zinyumba zawo, kanyhi waweze ne cihuliko kuli walume zawo, ho nghani yo Mulungu yilece kubedegalwa.
56002006	Ne wazelelo nawo nha vivyo, wuwafundaje wawe no wiyimizi.
56002007	Yikunojeye gwegwe go mweneco weze wina musambo we metumo maswanu. Weze wuli mutuvu, ne mafundo gako geze gena wuzito.
56002008	Ne zinghani zako zilece kuwa na wuhoswe wo wose, i walugu wako ho wapuwe, walaza kuwa wasina cibi cinji co cose cono wocilonga muli'se.
56002009	Yiwanojeye nawo i wetumami wawahulice iwawaha wawo, no kuwendeza muli zose. Walece kuwangana nawo,
56002010	hamba kuwahiziza i vinhu vyawo. Ninga yiwanojeye walajile vyono wene waswanu, kanyhi wehuwilwa nhondo zose, ho wasume kugatujila lilumbo yiswanu i mafundo go Mulungu u Mukombozi wetu ku soko ye metumo gawo gose.
56002011	Hambi ilihewa lyo Mulungu nha lyanzalikwe ku soko yo wukombozwe we wanhu wose.
56002012	Ne lihewa lilyo likucijiza ciwulekaje wavu wose no wusulumizi wose wa mononze, ciweze no wiyimizi, ho cikale mu mikalile ye ling'ani yo kumogopa u Mulungu mono yinze yiyi ya lulu,
56002013	akuno cikulilindila lizuwa alilya i liswanu lyono cilitumbiye, mu cipango cono lokwijelela u lukumyo lo Mulungu Muwaha no Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito.
56002014	Mono yelavya mweneco ho yacikomboze mu wavu wetu wose, ho yacinoze ciwe cisina yilema ase co wanhu wakwe mweneco, wanhu wono wena wuhile wo kwituma metumo maswanu.
56002015	Ale, wuwafundaje zizo, kanyhi wuwitumamilaje u wulajilize wako wose, akuno wukuwaswaswaniza no kuwasugula wono wakukuhuliciza. Munhu wo wose yalece kukubedegala.
56003001	Wuwakumbucizaje wanhu wawogope i walongola, na wono wena u wulajilize, wawahulice, kanyhi weze wewikanizize lukulu ku wituma zose ziswanu.
56003002	Wuwalonjelaje vyono walece kumuliga munhu wo wose, langa wekalaje welamuye akuno wakwiyihulika, kanyhi weze wapolo kuli wanhu wose.
56003003	Hambi mu vipango vinji, nase nha cali walele, kanyhi cili cibede, cali cajiliye. Cali cili wawanda we masulumizi ne makani ga mononze. Cekalilaga mu mikalile yo wavu no wivu, wanhu wakacisula, nase cikawasula.
56003004	Ninga caza kugubulwa i cidaha co wuswanu no wendo wo Mulungu, Mukombozi wetu,
56003005	yakacikomboza. Si yacikomboza ku soko ye nghani yo yose swanu yono cetuma sese, langa yacikomboza ku soko yo lusungu lwakwe, mu nzila yo Muhe Mono Yelile mono yakucipela ho cilelwe wupya, no kuwa ne mikalile mipya ko kucikwema kwe malenga.
56003006	U Mulungu yakacijidila yasina cipimo zo Muhe Mono Yelile muli Yesu Kilisito, Mukombozi wetu,
56003007	na ku so lihewa lyakwe ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu no kuwubocela u Wumi we cibitilila wono ciwitumbiye.
56003008	Ne nghani yiyi ya mbeka. Nghukulomba wuzilongaje wusimbiliye zinghani zi zino, ho wawalya wono wamwihuwiye u Mulungu wawe no wuhile wo kucitumamila cilejeho cawo mu wituma ziswanu, zono swanu na zono zina cambuzi kuli wanhu.
56003009	Ninga wilegaje mu wuwanji wo wulele, hamba mu wiwanganile wo wuwale we zindelo ze wakoko, no wugomvi, no wiwanganile muli zo Wulajilize. I zinghani zizo zisina hamba cambuzi kanyhi za bwete du.
56003010	U munhu mono yakuleta matemanuko, wumukagaje kamonga ne kejete, ninga hanyuma wumulekaje nha vyono yenha.
56003011	Nagwe wumanyile vyono munhu we liwala lilyo yakondya kwajililila lukulu, no wubi wakwe wukumuhomelela nha vyono musutyi.
56003012	Nilawa kuwa namutuma u kwako Alitema hamba Tukiko, wuhidimbale wuze kono Nikapoli wumbone, hambi nha nalamula vyono nowa kuko mwipango lye cinyuli.
56003013	Wuhidimbale kumutaza u mwana Zena u mukamisa uwulajilize hamonga na Apolo, ho wasume kwanza ze mihinzo yawo, kanyhi wulanjilile walece kwanjila cinji co cose cono wakusaka.
56003014	Yiwanojeye wanhu wetu weyijize vyono yiwanojeye kuvitumila vidaha vyawo mu wituma ziswanu, ho wawataze wono wena wanjile we mbeka, ne mikalile yawo nayo yeze mikalile yono yinojeye.
56003015	Wose wono nili hamonga nawo, wakukulamusa. Wuwalamusaje wose wono wacendile mu wihuwilo. Ilihewa lyo Mulungu liwezane na nyenye wose.
57001001	Ane yo nene Pawulo mono mbopigwe mu jela ku soko ya Kilisito Yesu, na Timoteyo ndugu yetu, cikukwandicila agwe Filemoni u mwendece wetu no mwitumami muyetu,
57001002	hamonga ne likanisa lyono likuwa kwitang'anilila mu nyumba yako, na kuli Afiya u lumbu lyetu, na kuli Alicipo u musilikale muyetu.
57001003	Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu na kuli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, viwezane nanye.
57001004	Nghuwa kukukumbucila nhondo zose mu wulombe wangu agwe Filemoni, kanyhi nghumulumba u Mulungu,
57001005	nha vyono nghuzihulika zo wihuwilo wono wina nawo kuli Muwaha wetu Yesu, na zo wendo wako kuli wanhu wo Mulungu wose.
57001006	Nghulomba u wihuwilo wono wina nawo kotya sese, wukupele u wusume wo kumanyila lukulu i ziswanu zose zono cikuzituga so wilunze wetu na Kilisito.
57001007	Gwe mwendece, u wendo wako wamhela nyemo mbaha muno muno, no kumhela vilungo mu nhumbula yangu! Ne zinhumbula ze wanhu wo Mulungu zikasangalala muno muno ku soko yako.
57001008	Na ku soko yiyo, hamba niwe nali sume kukulonjela witume cono wunojeye kwituma, nha nili nduguyo muli Yesu.
57001009	Ninga ku soko yo wendo, mbona yili ciba hono nghulombe. Nghunoza nha vivi, hamba yiwe ane Pawulo nili mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu, nalu kanyhi nili mufungwa mu jela ku soko yakwe.
57001010	Alu nina nghani monga du yono nghukulomba ku soko yo mwanangu Onesimo, u mwanangu muli Kilisito, hambi nha neza nili sogwe mono nimuleleye lono nili mu cifungo.
57001011	Yo Onesimo yuyulya mono mwidaha linji si yakutazaga cinji, ninga alu yakunhaza ane sunga na gwegwe.
57001012	Alu nghumugomola u kwako, nayo yenha i nhumbula yangu nene no mweneco.
57001013	Nali nyende Onesimo yajendelele kwikalana nane bahano, ho yanhaze njele yo gwegwe Filemoni, ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, lono ane nghali nili mu cifungo.
57001014	Ninga si nosuma kwituma nghani yinji lono nghali nakombolwa na gwegwe. Si nyendile nghudindimize ho wunhaze, vyono u wuswanu wako wunojeye wulawilile mu wuhile wako gwegwe go mweneco, hamba si mu wudindimizwe.
57001015	Lunji Onesimo yawuka kwako so cidaha cidodo du, ho wusume kuwezana nayo kanyhi mu myaka yose.
57001016	Naluno mwene, si yenha muwanda du kanyhi, langa yawa muswanu kuciza muno si nho muwanda, u mwene yaweza ndugu yetu mwendece. Kanyhi yaweza munhu wa cambuzi ciwaha u kwangu, sunga no kwako nhavivyo, si koleka kuwa munhu wa cambuzi ciwaha kotya muwanda na kanyhi kotya ndugu yetu muli Muwaha.
57001017	Ale, holeka hono wuwe wukumbona ane nili muyago, ale, wumubocelaje kanyhi nha vyono wali wumbocele nene no mweneco.
57001018	Na hono yawe yali yakusutizye cinji, hamba lunji yena mugawa kuli 'gwe, ale, wundayaje nene.
57001019	Nghuyandika i nghani yiyi no muwoko wangu nene no mweneco. Nene Pawulo nolipa! (Hamba sina soko yo kulonga vyono nagwe wina mugawa kwangu gwegwe go mweneco.)
57001020	Ale du kanyhi ndugu yangu, wunozezaje i nghani yiyo ku soko ye litagwa lyo Muwaha, wusangalazizaje i nhumbula yangu muli Kilisito.
57001021	Nghwandika, akuno nina no witumbilo, vyono si koleka kuvumila u wulombe wangu. Akuno manyile, vyono kokwituma kuciza ya zizi zono nghukulomba witume.
57001022	Hamonga na zizo, wumbikanizizaje ha wugono, hambi nha nitumbiye vyono so wulombe wenyu, u Mulungu nha komhela cilejeho, ho nize nimulamusenyi
57001023	Epafala u mufungwa muyangu mu jela muli Kilisito Yesu, yakukulamusa.
57001024	Nawo wa Maluko na Alisitaliko na Dema na Luka, i wetumami wayangu, wose wakukulamusa.
57001025	Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane na nyenye wose.
58001001	I katali u Mulungu yalonga ne wasetu kali kenji, na mu nzila nyinji, mu nzila ye wawizi,
58001002	ninga mu vilo avi vyo mudumo, kalongana nase mu nzila yo Mwanagwe. Na muli mwene, u Mulungu mo yayiwumbila yinze, kanyhi yakamuwika ho yaviteme vinhu vyose.
58001003	U mwene wo wubulile wo lukumyo lo Mulungu, kanyhi yo hwani ye mbeka yo Mulungu mweneco, nayo yakuyisikamizya yinze mu nghani yakwe ye vilungo. Lono yali yakondya kuwanenela wanhu u wubi wawo, yakekala ku wulanga ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye.
58001004	U Mwana yo muwaha yacizize wa malayika, nha vyono i litagwa lyono yapegwa no Mulungu, yiwaha muno si nhe litagwa lyawo.
58001005	Hambi u Mulungu nha si yamulonjela hamba hadodo malayika wakwe yunji yatye, “Agwe wuli Mwanangu, Ane neza nili sogo zuwali?”
58001006	Ninga u Mulungu lono yamutumila kononze u Mwanagwe mulelwa mulongozi, yatya nhavi, “Ne wamalayika wose wo Mulungu, yiwanojeye wamuhembe.”
58001007	Na kuli ze wamalayika, u Mulungu yakutya, “U Mulungu yakuwanoza wamalayika wakwe kuwa myuhe, ne wetumami wakwe kuwa lilambi lyo moto.”
58001008	Ninga kuli zo Mwana, u Mulungu yakutya, “U wutemi wako agwe go Mulungu, wikalaga cibitilila ne cibitilila. Nagwe kuwadimaga i wanhu wako kwe ling'ani.
58001009	Agwe wendile u wiling'ano, wukazisula i zimbi. Na ku soko yiyo holeka u Mulungu, u Mulungu wako yakuhagula, kanyhi yakakupela nyemo mbaha muno muno kuciza i wayago.”
58001010	Kanyhi yakutya, “Muwaha, agwe yo gwegwe mono wayiwumba yinze baho ha mwamulizo, no wulanga wo mulimo wo muwoko wako,
58001011	Azo zomalika, ninga agwe kokwikala cibitilila, na zose zosakala kotya mwenda,
58001012	Nagwe kozipetya nha civwalo nazo zokawanizwa nha mwenda, ninga agwe, yo gwegwe du cibitilila, ne myaka yako si yiladuma yaye.”
58001013	Kanyhi u Mulungu si yamulonjela hamba hadodo yunji wa muli wamalayika wakwe yatye, “Wikalaje ku muwoko wangu wo kulume sunga kolo nakondya kuwanoza i walugu wako wawe nha wukanyago we magulu gako.”
58001014	I Wamalayika, yo myuhe du yono yikumwitumamila u Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu kawatumaga ho wawataze wawalya wono wowubocela u wukombozwe.
58002001	Holeka yicinojeye cicile kuzikamisa muno zose zono cazihulika, ho cilece kwajilizwa.
58002002	Inghani yi yilya yono wapegwa i walezi wetu na malayika, yikejela vyono yali nghani ya mbeka, sunga muli wose mono si yasuma kuyityatya hamba kuyihulika, yalipicizwa nha vyono yali yimunojeye.
58002003	Alu ase ma! Ho coponela hayi hono ciyileceleze mhonelo mbaha nha yiyi? Yono yamula kulongwa no Muwaha mweneco, na wono wahulika, wakacihomelela vyono yili mbeka.
58002004	Nayo u Mulungu yakonjeleza u wuhomelezi wakwe nhavivyo, lono yanozeza vitanjilo ne mezino ge mawala menji, na lono yawagawila wanhu i vipegwa vyo Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono mweneco yali yendile.
58002005	U Mulungu si yawawika Wamalayika ho wawe watemi mu yinze yilya yono cikuyilonga.
58002006	Kanyhi hanji mu Mandiko hakutya nhavi: “Hambi u munhu co cici, agwe go Mulungu sunga wumukumbucile, hamba u mwana wo munhu co cici sunga wumulanjilile?
58002007	Wamunoza mudodo si nhe wamalayika kwa cipango cidodo. Wamuvwika mukumbo wo lukumyo ne lilumbo.
58002008	Nagwe wukaviwika vyose ha magulu gakwe ho yaviteme.” Nha vyono yikulongwa vyono, u Mulungu yamuwika u munhu ho yawe mutemi muli vinhu vyose, hamba si yasigaza cinji hamba cimonga. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, cikali si cikumuwona munhu mono yatemile i vinhu vyose kwa lulu.
58002009	Langa cikumuwona Yesu mono yanozwa mudodo kwa cipango cidodo si nhe wamalayika, na so i lihewa lyo Mulungu, yafwe ku soko ye wanhu wose. Sunga nalu cikumuwona yakondya kutemywa ko lukumyo ne lilumbo, ku soko yo wutamiswe we lifwa.
58002010	Nayo yali yili ling'ani, vyono u Mulungu mono kaviwumbaga i vinhu vyose no kuvibatiliza, yo yamunoza Yesu yawe yakwilaniciye mu nzila yo wugazwe wakwe, ho yasume kuwaleta wana wenji ku lukumyo lwakwe. Hambi Yesu nha yo yakuwatonga ku mhonelo.
58002011	Hambi u mwene nha yo yakuweza wanhu u wubi wawo, hanyuma mwene hamonga na wose wono wakondya kwezwa, wose wakuwa na Baba yumonga. Holeka nayo Yesu si yakuwona soni kuwatya wawo wanduguze,
58002012	nha vyono yakutya, “Gwe go Mulungu, nowalonjela i wandugu zangu ze metumo gako. Nane nokukumizya mu ciligati yo wihangulize wawo.”
58002013	Kanyhi yakutya, “Nowuwika u witumbilo wangu muli Mulungu.” Na kanyhi, “Ane nili baha hamonga ne wana wono wamhela agwe go Mulungu.”
58002014	Alu nha vyono yinha, i wana wawo nha vyono mwene yakuwacema, wo wanhu wono wena muwili ne sakami, nayo Yesu mweneco, yakawa nha vyono wenha wene, nayo yakasola i hwani yawo yakawa munhu. Yanoza nhavivyo, ho yiwe so wufwe wakwe, yamusumile lukulu Setani, mono yena i vilungo vye lifwa,
58002015	na mu nzila yiyo ho yawakomboze wose wono mu mikalile yawo yose wali mu wuwanda wo woga we lifwa.
58002016	Hambi nha yili calinze, vyono u mwene si yaza ho yawataze wamalayika, langa nha vyono i Mandiko gakutya, “Yakuwataza wo lulelo lwa Abulahamu.”
58002017	Holeka yali yimunojeye yehwane wanduguze muli zose, ho yawe Mukohani wawo Muwaha, mono yali lusungu kanyhi mwihuwilwa muli zose zono zibitile kuli Mulungu, ho wubi we wanhu wunenelwe.
58002018	Nayo alu kosuma kuwataza wono wakujelwa, hambi nayo mweneco nha yajelwa kanyhi yakatamiswa.
58003001	Ale, anye wandugu zangu, mo wanhu wo Mulungu, mono mwacemwa no Mulungu, mwihwesaje za Yesu mono u Mulungu yamutuma yawe Mukohani Muwaha wo wihuwilo wetu.
58003002	U mwene yali mwihuwilwa kuli Mulungu mono yamuhagula ho yetume u mulimo wakwe, nha vyono Musa nayo yali mwihuwilwa mu nyumba yose yo Mulungu.
58003003	Nha vyono u muzenji we kaya yo katugaga i lilumbo muno si nhe kaya yeneco. Nayo Yesu nhavivyo yo yanojeye yatuje lilumbo yiwaha si nha Musa.
58003004	Hambi i zikaya zose, nha zina u muzenji wayo, ninga u Mulungu yo muzenji we vinhu vyose.
58003005	Musa yali mwihuwilwa mu nyumba yose yo Muwaha nho mwitumami, nayo yakazilonga i zinghani zono u Mulungu yali yazilonje hanyuma.
58003006	Langa Kilisito yo mwihuwilwa nho mwana mono yena wulajilize mu nyumba yo Mulungu. Ne nyumba yakwe yo sese, hono cibatilile lukulu zo wuluwuce wetu wa muli cono citumbiye.
58003007	Holeka nha vyono yakulonga u Muhe Mono Yelile, yakutya: “Holeka i zuwali hono muhulice lizi lyo Mulungu,
58003008	Mulece kuzikamufya zinhumbula zenyu, nha vyono wali i wasogo zenyu, lono wamubezeza u Mulungu, nha vyono wanoza ku nyika mwizuwa lililya, lono wamujelela u Mulungu.
58003009	Kuko i wasogo zenyu wasagala, wakanjela yakutya u Muwaha, hamba wawe wali waziwona zono nali nakondya kwituma mu myaka makumi mane.”
58003010	Ku soko yiyo nane nghawakolelwa likuwo i wanhu wawa, nghawa kutya, “I mahweso ge wanhu wawa gajiliye, wakali si nazimanya zinzila zangu.”
58003011	Holeka nghakolwa ne likuwo, nghawa kwilahiza nghutya, “Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.”
58003012	Holeka wandugu zangu, mwilanjililaje, halece kuwa na yunji muli nyenye, mono yena i nhumbula yimbi nhavivyo, mono si yehuwiye no kumuleka u Mulungu mumi.
58003013	Ninga mweze kwiyilanjiza nhondo zose, lono hakali kutegwa, “I zuwali,” muyenyu yunji yalece kukamufywa no wukoci wo wubi no kuwa ne cibede.
58003014	Hambi ase nha ceza cili hamonga na Kilisito, soko ciwe ciwukamise muno muno u witumbilo wetu wono cali cina nawo hamwamulizo.
58003015	I Mandiko gakutya nhavi: “I zuwali hono muhulice lizi lyo Mulungu mulece kuzikamufya zinhumbula zenyu nha vyono wanoza wasogo zenyu lono wamubezeza u Mulungu.”
58003016	Hambi wa nani wono walihulika lizi lyo Mulungu ninga wakamubeza? Wo wawo wose wono watongwa na Musa ku wulawa ku Misili.
58003017	Kanyhi wa nani wono u Mulungu yawakolelwa likuwo mu myaka makumi mane kuko ku nyika?
58003018	U Mulungu lono yelahiza yakutya, “Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.” Yawalongaga wa nani? Yalongaga muli za wawo i wabezi.
58003019	Holeka cikuwona vyono si wasuma kwinjila kuko, vyono wali si wehuwiye.
58004001	U Mulungu yacihuwiza vyono cosuma kuwutuga u wuceho wuwo wono yawulonga. Holeka ceze kogopa, yilece kuwa na lunji, muyenyu yunji yanjile ku winjila mu wuceho wuwo.
58004002	Hambi nha caganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu nha vyono lwaganulwa kuli wawo wanhu we katali. Ninga i nghani yiyo si yawakwila cinji, hamba wawe wayihulika, ninga si wasuma kuyibocela ko wihuwilo.
58004003	Ninga ase mono cihuwiye, cikwinjila mu wuceho wuwo wono u Mulungu yawihuwiza. Nha vyono yatya, “Nghakolwa ne likuwo, nghelahiza, nghatya, ‘Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.’ ” U Mulungu yazilonga zizo, hamba yiwe u mulimo wakwe wali wakondya kumalika ku wulawilila lono yayiwumbila yinze.
58004004	Hambi i Mandiko nha gakulonga hanji ze lizuwa lyo mupunghati. “U Mulungu yakaceha mwizuwa lyo mupunghati, yakayileka milimo yakwe yose.”
58004005	Ne nghani yiyi yikulongwa kanyhi, “Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.”
58004006	Wawo wono walongola kuganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu si wasuma kwinjila mu wuceho wuwo so wuwula kwihuwila kwawo. Ninga ho wali wanji wono wapejigwe kwinjila mumo.
58004007	Ne nghani yiyi yili calinze, hambi u Mulungu nha yaliwika lizuwa linji lyono likucemwa “I zuwali.” U Mulungu yalilonjela lizuwa lilyo muli Dawudi mu myaka minji yono yali yakondya kupuluta, nha vyono i Mandiko gono gatambuywe. “Hono muhulice lizi lyo Mulungu zuwali mulece kuzikamufya zinhumbula zenyu.”
58004008	Hono Yoshuwa yali yawapele u wuceho wuwo wanhu wawo, Mulungu si yali yalonje kanyhi ze lizuwa linji.
58004009	Holeka u wuceho wuli baho kuli wanhu wo Mulungu, nha vyono u mwene Mulungu yaceha mwizuwa lyo mupunghati.
58004010	Hambi muli wose mono kowutuga u wuceho wono u Mulungu yehuwiza, nha koceha mu milimo yakwe, nha vyono u Mulungu yaceha mu mulimo wakwe.
58004011	Holeka cihidimbale, ciwutuje u wuceho wuwo, ho halece kuwa yunji muli nyenye yanjile kuwinjila mu wuceho wuwo, nha vyono wanoza wawo, ku soko yo wuleka kwihuwila kwawo.
58004012	Hambi nghani yo Mulungu nha nyumi kanyhi nyitumi, kanyhi nghali yicizize u mumaje mukali kose kose, kanyhi yicinyaga sunga ku wutemanula i nhumbula no Muhe, sunga hono vihanjiye i vilunzwa vyo muwili no musopo. Ne nghani yiyo yisalangulaga u wuhile ne mahweso ga mu zinhumbula ze wanhu.
58004013	Kanyhi hasina hamba ciwumbwa co cose cono cihundice hali Mulungu, ninga vyose vili calinze ha meso gakwe. Na ase wose cololonga hali mwene ze metumo getu munhu na lwakwe.
58004014	Hambi nha yicinojeye ciwibatilile lukulu u wihuwilo wetu. Hambi nha cina u Mukohani Muwaha, Yesu u Mwana wo Mulungu, mono yenjila mweneco sunga kuli Mulungu.
58004015	Nayo yuyu u Mukohani wetu Muwaha si yenha mono si kosuma kuhanga nase mu wusocele wetu, langa u mwene yo Mukohani Muwaha mono yajelwa nha sese muli zose, ninga si yetuma wubi.
58004016	Holeka cisejelele kwi'goda lye lihewa lyo Mulungu, cisina woga, ho ciwonelwe lusungu, kanyhi cilituje ne lihewa lyono lyosuma kucitaza mwidaha lono cikusaka u wutazi.
58005001	U Mukohani wo wose Muwaha, kahagulwaga kulawa muli wanhu ho yamwitumamile u Mulungu so wanhu, ho yalavye i vilavya ne makumbiko ku soko yo wubi wawo.
58005002	Na vyono u mwene nayo yali mu wusocele, holeka kosuma kuwawonela u lusungu wono si wamanyile cinji ne wasutyi.
58005003	Vyono na mweneco nayo musocele, holeka yimunojeye yalavye likumbiko, si ku soko ye wanhu du, langa na ku soko yo wubi wakwe mweneco.
58005004	Hasina munhu mono kosuma kwisolela mweneco lilumbo lyo kuwa Mukohani Muwaha. Langa munhu wo wose yakuwa kuhagulwa no Mulungu yawe Mukohani Muwaha nha vyono Haluni.
58005005	Nha vivyo na Kilisito nayo, si yesolela mweneco i lilumbo lyo kuwa Mukohani Muwaha, langa u Mulungu yo yamutya: “Agwe wuli Mwanangu ane neza nili Sogo zuwali.”
58005006	Nha vyono yalonga kanyhi hanji: “Agwe wuli Mukohani cibitilila mu wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.”
58005007	Nayo Yesu lono yekalaga baha mono yinze, yakalila muno muno ne mahozi, lono yamuhembaga no kumulomba u Mulungu, mono yali yena vilungo vyo kumuponezya mwifwa, nayo yahulicizwa ku soko yali yamogopile u Mulungu.
58005008	Ninga u mweneco hambe yali Mwana wo Mulungu, yeyijiziza i cihuliko mu nzila yo wutamiswe wono wamwagana.
58005009	Nayo yaza kukwilanicizwa, yakawa wo mwamulizo wo wukombozi we cibitilila kuli wose wono wakumuhulika,
58005010	nayo u Mulungu yakamuhagula ho yawe Mukohani Muwaha mu wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.
58005011	Cina nyinji zo kulonga mu nghani yiyi, ninga kukamu kumulolosezenyi, ku soko anye si muli wapelu ku wizuce.
58005012	Ninga alu yali yimunojelenyi muwe mweza muli wejizi, ninga kumbe mukali mukusaka munhu yunji wo kumwijizenyi i mejizo malongozi ge nghani yo Mulungu, holeka mwaweza nha mukusaka mele, hamba si ndigwa nghavu yaye.
58005013	Na muli wose mono yimunojeye yang'we mele, yuyo yakali mugalika, yakali nawumanya u wiling'ano co cici.
58005014	Ninga i ndigwa i nghavu, yiwanojeye i wanhu wono wakangaye, wono wakusuma kuzitanga no kuzihagula i ziswanu ne zimbi.
58006001	Holeka cijendelele kumwande kuli zono zikangaye, kanyhi cilece kwikala mu mejizo ge myamulizo ge Cikilisito. Si yicinojeye ciwice u musinji mu wuwuyajila kanyhi mu mafundo gagalya go mwamulizo, nha vyono kotya i metumo mafu, kumwihuwila u Mulungu,
58006002	i mafundo go wubaputizo, no wuwicilwe we miwoko, wuzuce we wafu, no wuling'anizwe we cibitilila.
58006003	Ase cijendelele kumwande! Na yiyo yo conoza, hono u Mulungu yendile.
58006004	Hambi alu kuli wanhu wono wakondya kuwubeza u wihuwilo wawo, yosumika nhawule kuwagomola ho wanene kanyhi? Ku soko i wanhu wawo wali wakondya kuwa mu wuzelu wo Mulungu, wali wakondya kucijeza ne cipegwa ciswanu ca ku wulanga, kanyhi no kuhanjizwa mu Muhe Mono Yelile,
58006005	wali wakondya kuwujeza no wuswanu we nghani yo Mulungu, ne vilungo vya mu yinze yono yikuza,
58006006	hanyuma kanyhi wakawa kuwubena u wihuwilo wawo! Si yosumika kuwagomola ho wanene kanyhi, vyono wakumutumbika kanyhi u Mwana wo Mulungu kejete, kanyhi wakumupela cevu ca cagalanze.
58006007	U Mulungu kawulugutizaga u muhangha wono wuyibocelaga i mvula yono yikuwutonyela kenji na kenji, no kucindya i zimbeyu zono zina cambuzi kuli wono walimilwa.
58006008	Ninga hono u muhangha wuwo wucindye mabici ge mamiya, na ganji caka, wukuwa wusina cambuzi, wukuwa wuli behi no wulijitwa no Mulungu, no mudumo wayo wukuwa wutakamizwe mu moto.
58006009	Ninga hamba ciwe cikulonga nhavivi, mo wendece wetu, cina witumbilo wuwaha muli zo wuwe wenyu, cimanyile vyono mwabocela u wulugutizwe muli azilya i ziswanu ze mhonelo yenyu.
58006010	Hambi u Mulungu nha si kawezaga yasina ling'ani, u mwene si kowusemwa mulimo wenyu wono mwetuma, hamba u wendo wono mwawulajila ku soko ye litagwa lyakwe, mu witumami wenyu wono mwawetumamila, na vyono sunga na lulu mukali mukuwetumamila i wanhu wakwe.
58006011	Hambi u wuhile wetu kuli nyenye nha wowu, cikumusacenyi wose muli nyenye, munhu yalajile u wuhijilile wuwo du, sunga ko ku mudumo wo wumemelecele wo witumbilo wenyu.
58006012	Mulece kuwa wadoba, langa muweze nha awalya wono wehuwiye, na wono wena u wukangalizi, ho wazibocele zono u Mulungu yazihuwiza.
58006013	U Mulungu lono yamupelela Abulahamu u wihuwizo, yelahiziza mwitagwa lyakwe mweneco, hambi nha hasina yunji muwaha mono yamucizize u Mulungu, mono u Mulungu yali yelahize.
58006014	U Mulungu yatya, “Mbeka nghukwihuwiza vyono nokumotya, kanyhi no lulelo lwako lokonjelezeka.”
58006015	Abulahamu yalindiliza ko wukangalizi, holeka yakacibocela cono u Mulungu yamwihuwiziza.
58006016	I wanhu lono wakwilahiza, welahizizaga kuli muwaha mono yawacizize, no wilahize wuwo wumalaga u wuwanji wose.
58006017	Nayo u Mulungu, yawukangaziza u wihuwizo wakwe mu wilahize, na muli zizo, yakawalajila calinze, wawo wono yawehuwiziza, vyono si kowupitula kanyhi u wuhile wakwe wuwo.
58006018	Holeka ho vili vinhu vi vyejete, u wihuwizo no wilahize, vyono si vyosuma kukawanika, na hamba muli zizo, u Mulungu si kosuma kulonga wulambi. Holeka ase mono camanyhilila ku wukamiswe wakwe, cikupegwa mu mitima yo wukamisa muno u witumbilo wono wuli ha mwande yetu.
58006019	No witumbilo wuwo wukuwa nha cimizo mu mikalile yetu. No witumbilo wuwo wukamile kanyhi wa mbeka mbeka, kanyhi wukwinjila sunga ko kwi'bupa lye Nyumba yo Mulungu ya ku wulanga, sunga ko kugati ya hono helile hayo.
58006020	Nayo Yesu yo yalongola kwinjila mumo ku soko yetu, nayo yawa Mukohani Muwaha cibitilila, mu wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.
58007001	Melicizedeki yali mutemi wa Salemi, kanyhi yali Mukohani wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli Vyose. Nayo Abulahamu lono yalawaga ku wulugu kono yawawulaga i watemi, Melicizedeki viketang'anila nayo, yakamuluguta,
58007002	nayo Abulahamu yakamugawila i lipinga lye likumi lya muli vyose vyono yali yena navyo. (Ne nhunizo nongozi ye litagwa lili lya Melicizedeki, wo wutya, “U mutemi wo wiling'ano,” na vyono u mwene yali mutemi wa Salemi, ilitagwa lilyo nalyo lina nhunizo yo wutya, “U mutemi wo Mulamu.”)
58007003	U sogwe no nyina si wakutambulwa, sunga ne ndelwa yakwe si yitambuywe, si yikulongwa hamba nili lono yalelelwa, hamba nili lono yafwila. Langa yanozwa yenha Mwana wo Mulungu, kekalaga Mukohani cibitilila.
58007004	Holeka mudahile kuwona vyono u munhu yuyu yali munhu we lilumbo muno. Baba Abulahamu yamupela i lipinga limonga lye likumi lya mu vinhu vyose vyono yavigalula ku wulugu.
58007005	Kanyhi cimanyile nhavivilya nha vyono winha u wulajilize, i wana wa Lawi wono wo Wakohani, wena ling'ani yo kusola lipinga lye likumi kuli wanhu, wo wutya kuli wandugu zawo, hamba wawe nawo wo wana wa Abulahamu.
58007006	Ninga yuyo Melicizedeki si yali we ndelwa ya Lawi, ninga hamba yiwe nhavivyo, yabocela lipinga lye likumi kuli Abulahamu, kanyhi yakamuluguta u mwene mono yali yapegwa u wihuwizo wo Mulungu.
58007007	Ninga mbeka si za kuwanga hamba hadodo, vyono mono kalugutaga yo muwaha yacizize ayulya mono yakulugutwa.
58007008	Kanyhi na wawo i wakohani wono wakubocela lilyo lipinga lye likumi, nha wanhu wono wafwizaga, ninga ahano mono yakubocela lye likumi, nha cinji Melicizedeki, yikulongwa vyono si kafwizaga.
58007009	Holeka cidahile kutya vyono, Abulahamu lono yalavyaga lipinga lye likumi, Lawi, (mono wanagwe wabocelaga lipinga limonga lye likumi) nayo yalavya, lipinga lye likumi nhavivilya.
58007010	Hambi Lawi nha yali yakali si nalelwa, langa kotya nha yali yakali mu muwili wo sogwe Abulahamu, mu cipango lono Abulahamu wetang'anilila na Melicizedeki.
58007011	No wulawilila mu wukohani wa Lawi, i wanhu wa Isilayeli wapegwa u Wulajilize. Holeka mhali u witumami we Walawi wali wuwe wukwilaniciye, mhali hawe hasina soko yo kuza u wukohani wunji wono wisimajiye, u wukohani wono wukutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki, hamba si awulya wa Haluni.
58007012	Holeka hono u wukohani wukawanice, hobaho yinojeye no Wulajilize nawo wukawanice.
58007013	Nayo u Muwaha wetu mono zizi zose zikulongwa muli mwene, yali wa mbeyu yinji, na hasina hamba yumonga wa mu mbeyu yakwe mono yetuma mulimo nha mukohani ha wukumbicilo.
58007014	Langa yimanyice calinze vyono u mwene yalelelwa mu mulango wa Yuda yono Musa si yawutambula lono yalongaga muli ze wakohani.
58007015	Kanyhi ne nghani yiyi yili calinze muno, vyono mukohani yunji mono yehwanile na Melicizedeki yakondya kuza.
58007016	U mwene si yanozwa yawe mukohani mu nzila yo wulajilize ne malajilizo ge cimunhumunhu, langa mu vilungo vyo wumi wono wusina mudumo.
58007017	Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya: “Agwe wuli mukohani cibitilila ku wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.”
58007018	Holeka i lilajilizo lililya lilongozi likapatwa, ku soko vyono lyali lisina vilungo, kanyhi lyali si likwiliye cinji.
58007019	Vyono i lilajilizo lya Musa si lyasuma kukwilaniciza cinji. Ninga aluno i hanhu hayo, hakondya kuwicilwa u witumbilo u wuswanu wucizize, wono so wuwo, ase cosuma kumusejelela u Mulungu.
58007020	Hamonga na zizo, ahano ho wuli no wilahize wo Mulungu. Ninga mu cipango lono wanji walya wanozwaga kuwa wakohani, u wilahize hali hasina.
58007021	Ninga Yesu yanozwa kuwa mukohani mu nzila yo wilahize, lono u Mulungu yamulonjela yakutya, “U Muwaha yelahiza hamba si kowukawaniza kanyhi u wuhile wakwe. Agwe wuli mukohani cibitilila.”
58007022	Holeka ku wulawa mu wisimajile wuwuno, Yesu yaweza wukangaze we cilagane ciswanu cicizize.
58007023	Kanyhi kowuli wisimajile wunji nhavivyo, wawo i wakohani wanji, wali wenji, ku soko vyono wafwizaga, na holeka si wasumaga kujendelela no mulimo wawo.
58007024	Ninga Yesu si yehwanile na wawo, vyono u mwene kekalaga cibitilila, no wukohani wakwe si wuladuma yaye.
58007025	Holeka u mwene, yadahile nhondo zose kuwaponezya lukulu wose wono wakumubitila u Mulungu muli mwene, hambi u mwene nha kekalaga cibitilila yakuwalombela hali Mulungu.
58007026	Holeka Yesu yo Mukohani Muwaha mono kocikwila muno muno mu visakwa vyetu. U mwene Yelile, yasina hamba yilema, hamba wubi muli mwene musina, yali musina mwipuga lya wanyo wubi, nayo yenuywe sunga ko ku wulanga.
58007027	Mwene si yenha awalya i wakohani wanji, yasina soko yo kukumbika nhondo zose, yinongozi ku soko yo wubi wakwe mweneco, na hanyuma ku soko yo wubi we wanhu. Mwene nha yanozeza lukulu kamonga du, mwipango lono yelavizya mweneco, nayo yakwiliye vilo vyose.
58007028	U Wulajilize wa Musa, wawahagulaga wanhu wono wali wena wusocele, wo wawe wakohani wawaha, ninga u wihuwizo wo Mulungu, wono yawunoza mu nzila yo wilahize, wono waza hanyuma yo Wulajilize, wakondya kumuhagula u Mwana mono yanozwa yakwilaniciye cibitilila.
58008001	Ale ne nghani mbaha yono cikuyilonga nha yoyi: Ase cina u Mukohani Muwaha we nhavivi, mono yali ku wulanga mono yekaye ku muwoko wo kulume we ligoda lyo wuwaha lyo Mulungu u Mudaha vyose.
58008002	Mwene ketumaga u mulimo wo Wukohani Muwaha i Hanhu Hono Helile muno, nha cinji, mugati ye lihema lililya lye mbeka lyono lyazengwa no Muwaha, hamba si na munhu yaye. |78A.tif|span|||U mukohani muwaha (8:1-2) |
58008003	Hambi u Mukohani Muwaha wo wose, nha yakuwikwa ho yamulavizye u Mulungu vilavya ne makumbiko, holeka no Mukohani wetu Muwaha yimunojeye nayo yawe ne cinhu co kulavya.
58008004	Holeka u Mwene mhali yawe munya baha hono'nze, si yali yasume kuwa mukohani hamba hadodo, hambi nha kowali wakohani wanji, wono wakulavya vilavywa mu nzila yo Wulajilize.
58008005	No witumami wawo wuwo wo wukohani, co cihwani du no muzizi wa azilya zono zili ku wulanga. Na vyo yali na kuli Musa. Lono yali yeza behi no kunoza i lihema lililya, u Mulungu yamulonjela yakatya, “Wunoze zose ziwe nhe hwani yono walajilwa kwi'tunda.”
58008006	Alu ninga Yesu, yakondya kupegwa u witumami we cikohani, wuswanu wucizize si nha wawo, nha vyono yacikangaza i cilagane ciswanu cicizize muli wanhu no Mulungu, hambi u musinji wayo nha wuli mu wihuwizo mu zinghani ziswanu zicizize muno.
58008007	Hambi i cilagane cicilya i cilongozi mhali ciwe cisina yilema, nha mhali kuwe kusina soko ye cilagane ce kejete.
58008008	Ninga u Mulungu yawahosa wanhu wakwe lono yalonjela yakutya: “Langa ta, i vilo vyolokuza yakutya u Muwaha, lono nolonozeza i cilagane cipya ne wanhu wa Isilayeli, hamonga na womulango wa Yuda.
58008009	Ne cilagane cico si cowa cihwanile ne cilagane acilya lono nawebatila muwoko niwahamye mu yisi ya Misili. Hambi nha si wekalaga mu cilagane cangu. Holeka nane sinawalanga, yakutya u Muwaha.
58008010	Ne cilagane cono nonoza ne wanhu wa Isilayeli mu vilo vyono vikuza nha cocino, nologenjiza i malajilizo gangu mu mahala gawo, kanyhi nologandika mu zinhumbula zawo. Nane nolowa Mulungu wawo nawo wolowa wanhu wangu.
58008011	Hasina kanyhi munhu mono kolomwijiza u muyagwe. Hamba mono kolomutya u nduguye yatye, ‘Wumumanyaje u Muwaha.’ Hambi wanhu wose i wadodo ne wawaha nha wolomanya nene.
58008012	Nane nolowanenela u wubi wawo hamba si nowukumbucila kanyhi yaye.”
58008013	Na muwulonje wa muli ze cilagane cipya, u Mulungu yakondya kucisakaza acilya i cilongozi, na muli co cose cono cikusakala no kuhumapa, cokwajilila mbela.
58009001	I cilagane cilongozi cali cina u wityatye wayo wo wuhembi ne hanhu hono helile ha wuhembelo, hono hali hazenjigwe ne wanhu.
58009002	Hali holili lihema linozwe, lyono hanze yayo lyali lina hanhu hono hacemwaga i “Hanhu Hono Helile.” Na baho ho hali no wuwiko we tala, ne meza ne mikate yono yali cilavywa kuli Mulungu.
58009003	Na hanyuma ye libupa lye kejete, hali ne lihema lyono lyacemwaga i “Hanhu Hono Helile muno.”
58009004	Mumo mo mwali cifusizo ca zahabu so kufusiza wuvumba ne lisanduku lye cilagane, nalyo lyali yihiliwe zahabu mbavu zose, na mugati yalyo, mwali na ciya ca zahabu cono cali cina mana, ne nghome ya Haluni yono yali yitulile mahamha, hamonga na azilya i zimbawo zi nyejete zono zali zandicigwe i cilagane.
58009005	Na mucanyha ya lilyo lisanduku, mwali na viwumbwa vyono vyalajilaga vyono u Mulungu yali baho, ne mabawa gavyo gali gacitile mubeho hanhu hono u wubi wukuwusizwa. Ninga alu si cosuma kulonga monga monga muli zinghani zizo.
58009006	I mipango yiyo yikafisilizwa, nawo wukawa wo moto kuli wakohani, wo kwinjila nhondo zose mwihema lilongozi lya kunze wakwituma u witumami wawo.
58009007	Ninga mwihema lye kejete, u Mukohani Muwaha du, yo yenjilaga yali wene, nayo yanozaga nhavivyo kwa mwaka kamonga du. Na lono yakwinjila mugati, yategulizaga ne sakami ho yamulavizye u Mulungu ku soko yakwe mweneco na ku soko yo wubi wono wanhu wetumiye mu wuwula kumanya weneco.
58009008	Na ku wulawa mu wityatye wuwo, u Muhe Mono Yelile yakwijiza calinze vyono, mu cipango cico lono lihema lilongozi lya kudeha likali limile, ne nzila yo kwinjilila i Hanhu Hono Helile nayo yikali si yinadigulwa.
58009009	Ne nghani yiyi yo hwani ye vidaha vya lulu. Yikulajila vyono vilavywa ne makumbiko, vyono vikulavywa kuli Mulungu, si vyosuma kuzinoza zinhumbula za wono wakuhemba, ziwe zikwilaniciye,
58009010	hambi zizi zose zono zili mu zindigwa, no wung'we na mu wityatye wunji wunji wo wihovuji. Vyose vivyo go malajilizo ga munze du; ne vilungo vyayo vyoficila ku mudumo wayo, kolo u Mulungu yakuvinoza wupya i vinhu vyose.
58009011	Ninga Kilisito lono yaza, u Mukohani Muwaha we ziswanu zose zono aluno zakondya kuza. U Mwene yakwituma u mulimo wakwe mwihema liswanu, na lyono likwilaniciye muno, lyono si yinozwe ne miwoko ye wanhu, nha cinji lyono si lya mononze yiyi yono yawumbwa.
58009012	U Mwene yenjila i Hanhu Hono Helile kamonga du, kanyhi hamba si yasoleleza ne sakami ye mhene, hamba ya ng'ombe, langa yenjila so sakami yakwe mweneco, yakaciletela u wukombozi we cibitilila.
58009013	I wanhu wono wali wetipiza ku ci dini wasumaga kwezwa no kuwa welile, lono wamizizwa i sakami ye mhene na ye ng'ombe, hamonga ne mavu ge ndama.
58009014	Ninga mu sakami ya Kilisito zitumwaga nghani mbaha kuciza! Vyono mu vilungo vyo Muhe we cibitilila, Kilisito yelavya mweneco ho yawe likumbiko lyono likwilaniciye kuli Mulungu. I sakami yakwe yocikwema i viselinji vyetu mu metumo gono gakuleta u wufwe, ho cimwitumamile u Mulungu u mumi.
58009015	Holeka Kilisito yo munoza i cilagane cipya mono wa walya wono wacemwa no Mulungu, ho wawubocele wihuwizo wono wehuwizwa wo wuhazi we cibitilila. Vyono i lifwa lyakwe likuwakomboza wanhu mu wulawa mu masutya ga galya gono wasutya mwidaha li lilya lye cilagane cilongozi.
58009016	Hambi nha vyo yinha, i zinghani ze ndumilizo zono kalajilizaga munhu, nha zikuwa kuvumilwa du lono u wufwe wo munhu yuyo mono yawulavivye u wulajilize wuwo wakondya kukangazwa.
58009017	U wulajilize si wosuma kufisilizwa, sunga langa i lifwa liwe lyakondya kwijela, vyono u wulajilize wusina nhunizo, hono mono yawulavizye yakali mumi.
58009018	Si holeka sunga ne cilagane cicilya i cilongozi, si casuma kuwikwa hono hasina sakami.
58009019	U lulongozi, Musa yawanziza wanhu wose ze malajilizo gose nha vyono yali mu Wulajilize, hanyuma yakasola i sakami ye ndama hamonga ne malenga, yaketumamila mahamha go mubici wono wukucemwa hisopo, hamonga no wuhamba wudunghu, yakacimiziza i citabu cicilya co Wulajilize hamonga ne wanhu wose.
58009020	Musa yakatya, “Ayi yo sakami yono yikukangaza i cilagane cono yamulajilizenyi u Mulungu, holeka mucihulikaje.”
58009021	Musa yakalimiziza sakami lililya lihema nhavivilya hamonga ne viya vyo witumami.
58009022	Holeka nha vyono winha u Wulajilize, i vinhu vyose vyosuma kwezwa ne sakami, holeka no wubi nawo wukuwuswa du lono sakami yetika.
58009023	Ale, i vinhu vivi vyono yo hwani du ya vye mbeka vya ku wulanga, vikawa vinojeye navyo vyezwe mu nzila yiyo. Ninga alu vya ku wulanga vikusaka likumbiko liswanu lyono licizize.
58009024	Hambi Kilisito nha si yenjila i hanhu Hono Helile hono hazenjigwe ne miwoko ye wanhu, hono henha hwani du ya acilya ce mbeka. Langa u Mwene yenjila ku wulanga du kweneco kono aluno yemile hali u Mulungu ku soko yetu.
58009025	U Mukohani Muwaha we Wayahudi kenjilaga i Hanhu Hono Helile mwaka na mwaka akuno yadinghuye ne sakami ye zi mitugo; ninga Kilisito si yenjila mumo ko kwilavya mweneco kali kenji,
58009026	hambi nha hono yali yiwe nhavivyo, nha yali yimunojele Kilisito yagazwe kali kenji ku wulawa mu mwamulizo wo wuwumbwe we yinze. Ninga alu vipango avi lono vikusejelela ku mudumo wayo, u mwene yejela kamonga du, ho yawuwuse u wubi mu wilavya mweneco kuwa yikumbiko.
58009027	Ale nha vyono wanhu wose wafwizaga kamonga du, na lono wakondya kufwa wakwima ha mwande yo wuling'anizwe wo Mulungu,
58009028	nhavivyo nayo Kilisito, yelavya likumbiko lwa kamonga du ho yawuwuse u wubi wa wenji. Nayo yalaza kuza lwe kejete, ho yalece kuziza so wihoma no wubi, langa so kuwakomboza wawo wono wakumulindila.
58010001	U wulajilize we Wayahudi yo si hwani yono yikwilaniciye ya ze mbeka, langa muzizi du we ziswanu zono zikuza. I makumbiko gago gakuwa kulavywa nhondo zose mu mwaka na mwaka. Alu u Wulajilize wosuma nhawule kuwanoza awalya wono wakuhemba mu nzila ye makumbiko gago, ho wawe wakwilaniciye.
58010002	Mhali wawo i wanhu wo Mulungu wakondizye kwezwa u wubi wawo, si wali wewone kanyhi vyono wena wubi, ne makumbiko gago gose gali gadume.
58010003	Hamba nhavivyo, makumbiko gago ganozwaga mwaka na mwaka so kuwakumbuciza wanhu u wubi wawo.
58010004	Nha vyono i sakami ye zinzeku ne zimhene nha si yosumila lukulu kuwuwusa u wubi.
58010005	Holeka nayo Kilisito lono yazaga kononze, yamulonjela u Mulungu yakatya: “Si wasaka likumbiko hamba cilavywa, ninga wanozelezezo muwili.
58010006	Si wukwendezwa ne vilavywa vyo kunyanywa vili muvilima vyono si vitemasetemase, hamba vyo kuwusa wubi.”
58010007	Baho nane nghatya, “Ane nili baha 'gwe go Mulungu niwikanize kuwituma u wuhile wako, nha vyono nandicilwa mu citabu co Wulajilize.”
58010008	Ha lulongozi yakatya, “Si wukusaka, hamba si wukwendezwa ne likumbiko ne cilavywa, hamba i vilavywa vyo kunyanywa vili muvilima so wubi.” Yalonga nhavivyo, hamba yiwe i vilavywa vivi vyose vikuwa kulavizywa mu wityatye wo Wulajilize.
58010009	Kanyhi yakatya, “Ane nili baha 'gwe go Mulungu, ho nitume zo wuhile wako.” Baho u Mulungu ho yagawusiza i makumbiko ge katali, ne hanhu hayo yakawika i likumbiko linji limonga.
58010010	Holeka vyono Yesu Kilisito yafisiliza u wuhile wo Mulungu, ase mo cikwezezwa u wubi wetu mu nzila ye likumbiko lyo muwili wakwe lyono yalilavya, lyono lyakondya kamonga du.
58010011	U Mukohani wo wose we Ciyahudi, ketumaga u witumami wakwe mu wuhembi nhondo zose, akuno yakulavya makumbiko ga galya du kali kenji, i makumbiko gono si gasumaga kuwuwusa wubi.
58010012	Ninga Kilisito yalavya ilikumbiko limonga du ku soko yo wubi, i likumbiko lyono likondizye cibitilila, hanyuma yakekala ku lubavu lo muwoko wo kulume wo Mulungu.
58010013	Na kuko yalindiye sunga kolo i walugu wakwe wakuwikwa hasi ye migulu yakwe.
58010014	Na ku so cilavywa cakwe cimonga, yawanoza no kuwa wakwilaniciye cibitilila, wawo wono wakwezwa u wubi wawo.
58010015	Nayo u Muhe Mono Yelile yakucilonjela uwuhomelezi wakwe, Lulongozi yakutya,
58010016	“Aci co cilagane cono nolagana nawo mu vilo vyono vikuza, yakutyo Muwaha: Nolowika i malajilizo gangu mu zinhumbula zawo, no kugandika mu mahala gawo.”
58010017	Kanyhi yakutya, “Si nolowukumbucila kanyhi u wubi wawo, hamba ne metumo gawo go wuhodanji.
58010018	Holeka u wubi lono wakondya kuwuswa, howa hasina kanyhi soko yo kulavizya i cilavywa co kuwusizo wubi.”
58010019	Ale wandugu zangu, mu sakami ya Yesu, mo capelelwa i nhumbula yono yisina woga yo kwinjilila i Hanhu Hono Helile.
58010020	Mwene yo yacitulila i nzila mhya, nzila yo wumi, yono yikoleye mwibupa, nha cinji mu nzila yo muwili wakwe mweneco.
58010021	Holeka cina u Mukohani Muwaha mono yena u wulajilize mu nyumba yo Mulungu.
58010022	Holeka cimusejelelaje u Mulungu ne nhumbula yo winenenyhezi no wihuwilo wono wumemeleceye, mu nhumbula yono yezigwe mu ciselinji cibi, na mu miwili yono yihovugwe ne malenga mazelu.
58010023	Ciwukamisaje u witumbilo wetu wono cikuwuvumila, hambi u Mulungu mono yawunoza u wihuwizo wakwe nha mwihuwilwa.
58010024	Kanyhi cihindaje mu wikombaniza sese wose munhu na muyagwe, akuno cikwiyoha kwiyikwejenhela ku wendo no wituma ziswanu.
58010025	Cilece kuwuleka u wityatye wuwulya wo witang'anila hamonga, nha vyono wanozaga wanji. Kanyhi yicinojeye kwiyitaza sese wose, nha vyono mukuwona, i lizuwa lilya lyo Muwaha lyeza lili behi.
58010026	Hambi hono cijendelele kwituma wubi ne nyono, na lono cakondya kuyimanya i mbeka, hasina kanyhi likumbiko lyono lyosuma kulavywa so wuwusizwe wo wubi.
58010027	Langa yono yisigaye yowa yo wulanjilila ko woga, u wuling'anizwe wo Mulungu no moto mukali wono wolowamala wose wono wakumulema u Mulungu.
58010028	U munhu wo wose mono yabezaga u wulajilize wa Musa yawulagwaga hamba kuwonelwa lusungu, hamwande yo wuhomelezi we wanhu wejete hamba wadatu.
58010029	Wulenyi, u munhu mono yakumubedula u Mwana wo Mulungu, no kuyibedegala i sakami ye cilagane co Mulungu cono ca mweza, u munhu yuyo mono yakumutovula u Muhe wo Mulungu, yimunojeye yapegwe wulipicizwe wuwaha nha cici?
58010030	Hambi nha cimumanyile ayulya mono yatya, “U wulipicize wina nene, ane nolipiciza.” Na kanyhi mono yatya, “U Muwaha kolowaling'aniza i wanhu wakwe.”
58010031	Ku wugwila mu miwoko yo Mulungu mumi yo nghani ya kogofya muno muno.
58010032	Ninga muzikumbucilaje zono zejela mu vilo vivilya i vilongozi lono mwali mwenzeluswa no wuzelu wo Mulungu. Ku soko hamba yiwe mwatuga wugazwe winji mu vilo vivyo, ninga mwakangalila.
58010033	Hanji mukawa kutovulwa no kukozwa cevu cagalanze, na hanji mwali mwendezwe kwilunza na walya wono wagazwaga nhavivyo.
58010034	Mwahangana u wugazwe ne wafungwa, na lono mwabokwaga zisawo zenyu, mwakangalila na nyemo, hambi nha mwali mumanyile vyono mwina sawo yono swanu muno muno kanyhi yono yikalaga cibitilila.
58010035	Holeka mulece kuwutaga u wuluwuce wenyu, hambi nha womuletelenyi wuhumbilizwe wuwaha.
58010036	Ninga mukusaka muwe no wukangalile, ho musume kwituma zono yakuzisaka Mulungu, ho mucibocele cono yehuwiza.
58010037	Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko: “Hambi nha cikali cidaha cidodo du, nayo mono yakuza, ho kokuza, hamba si kotinya yaye,
58010038	Ninga u munhu wangu we ling'ani kokwihuwila no kuwumipa, ninga hono yawuye kanyhi ku nyuma, ane sinokwendezwa nayo.”
58010039	Ninga ase si cili wayagwe na walya wono wakuwuya ne nyuma, no kwajilila, langa ase cihuwiye no kuponywa i zinhumbula zetu.
58011001	Wuwa no wihuwilo, wo wutya wo wumanyile lukulu we vinhu vyono citumbiye, kwitumbilila lukulu muli vyono siciviwonaga kwe meso.
58011002	Hambi i wanhu we katali, nha watujila u wuvumilwe no Mulungu ku soko yo wihuwilo wawo.
58011003	Na so wihuwilo, ase cimanyile nha vyono yinze yawumbilwa mu Nghani yo Mulungu; i vinhu vyono vijelaga ku wulawa mu vinhu vyono si vijelaga.
58011004	So wihuwilo, Habeli yamulavizya u Mulungu likumbiko lyono lyali yiswanu muno licizize lya Kayini. Na so wihuwilo wakwe yavumilwa no Mulungu nha munhu we ling'ani; u Mulungu mweneco yavivumila i vilavywa vyakwe. Na so wihuwilo wakwe, hamba yawe yakondya kufwa, ninga yakali yakulonga.
58011005	So wihuwilo, Enoci yanyasulwa no Mulungu, hamba si yafwa. Hamba si yejela kanyhi, hambi u Mulungu nha yali yamunyasula. Ne Mandiko gakutya, vyono yamwendezaga u Mulungu lono yali yakali si nanyasulwa no Mulungu.
58011006	Holeka si yosumika kumwendeza u Mulungu hono hasina wihuwilo. Vyono u munhu wo wose mono yakusaka kumwendeza u Mulungu, yimunojeye yehuwile vyono u Mulungu yali baho, na kanyhi vyono u Mwene kawakamisaga wose wono wakumulondola.
58011007	So wihuwilo, Noha yasugulwa no Mulungu kuli za kumwande zono yali yakali si yanasuma kuziwona yaye. Yamuhuliko Mulungu, yakanoza ligalawa lyono yaponela u mweneco hamonga na we mhuga yakwe wose. Na mu wulawilila muli zizo, i yinze yikaling'anizwa, nayo Noha yakatuga u wiling'ano wono wukulawilila mu wihuwilo.
58011008	So wihuwilo, Abulahamu yamuhuliko Mulungu lono yacemelwa yabite ku yisi yono u Mulungu yali yamupele yiwe yakwe. Hamba yiwe si yali yamanyile kono yabitaga, ninga yakahama.
58011009	So wihuwilo, yakekala nha mujenzi mu yisi yono u Mulungu yamwihuwiziza. Yakekala kuko mwihema nha vyono wekalaga wa Isaka na Yakobo, wono nawo wahanga u wihuwizo wuwo.
58011010	Hambi Abulahamu nha yalindilaga likaya lyono lina u musinji wono wukamile, i likaya lyono u Mulungu mweneco yo munghula mono yalihwesa no kulizenga.
58011011	So wihuwilo, sunga Sala yehuwila vyono u Mulungu kawufisilizaga u wihuwizo wakwe, holeka yakapegwa vilungo vyo kutuga 'nda, hamba yawe yali yakondya kupuluta i vilo vyo kutujila i mida so wukombi.
58011012	Holeka mu wulawa mo munhu yuyo yumonga, Abulahamu hamba yawe yali yeza nha yafwiza, walelwa i wanhu wono si wakuwala, wenha i zinyelezi za ku wulanga no musawawa wa mwi'lenga.
58011013	Ne wanhu wawa wose wafwa wena no wihuwilo. Nawo wafwa lono wakali si nabocela u wihuwilo wono u Mulungu yali yehuwize, ninga waziwonela kutali, wakasecelela, no kuvumila calinze vyono wene wali wajenzi kanyhi wajendi kono'nze.
58011014	Ne wanhu wono wakulonga nha zizo, wakulajila calinze vyono wakuyilondola yisi yawo weneco.
58011015	Na hono wali wawe wakuyikumbucila yisi kono walawilila katali, wali watuje i cilejeho co kuwuyila kuko kanyhi.
58011016	Ninga alu wakusaka i yisi ya ku wulanga. Holeka u Mulungu nayo si yakuwona soni hono wamutye Mwene Mulungu wawo, ku soko vyono Mwene yakondya kuwawikaniziza i kaya.
58011017	So wihuwilo, Abulahamu yamulavya u mwanagwe Isaka ho yawe likumbiko, lono u Mulungu yamujelaga. Na yuyo Abulahamu yali yabocela u wihuwizo wo Mulungu, ninga, hamba nhavivyo, yavumila kumulavya yikumbiko u mwanagwe we ciwene,
58011018	hamba yiwe u Mulungu yali yakondya kumulonjela. “U lulelo lwako lolawa muli Isaka.”
58011019	Abulahamu yehuwila vyono u Mulungu kosuma kuwazukula i wafu: na ku lubavu lunji, mbeka Abulahamu yamutuga kanyhi u mwanagwe kulawa kuli wafu.
58011020	So wihuwilo, Isaka yawaluguta wa Yakobo na Esawu, ho watuje u wumoteswe wono wolokuza hanyuma.
58011021	So wihuwilo, Yakobo lono yali yeza behi no kufwa, yawaluguta wana wose wa Yusufu, yakamuhembo Mulungu akuno yayegamiye ne nghome yakwe.
58011022	So wihuwilo, Yusufu lono yali yeza behi no kufwa, yazilonga zo luhamo lwe Waisilayeli ku wulawa ku yisi ya Misili, yakawalecela ne malajilizo kuli ze mafupa gakwe.
58011023	Sowihuwilo, i walezi wa Musa wamuhundika yuyo mwana mu myezi midatu, lono yali yalelwa. Wamuwona vyono yali mwana muswanu, hamba si wawogopa u wulajilize wo mutemi.
58011024	So wihuwilo, Musa lono yali yeza munhu mututu, yalema kucemwa mwana wo muhinza wa Falawo.
58011025	Yakawona vyono yili ciba yagazanwe hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu, si nho kwiyendeza no wuswanu wo wubi kwa cidaha cidodo.
58011026	Yakamanya vyono, ku wutuga magazo ku soko ya Kilisito, ko cili cambuzi ciwaha muno muno, si nho u wugoli wose wa mu Misili, hambi nha yali yalanjiliye u wuhumbilizwe wa hanyuma.
58011027	So wihuwilo, Musa yahama ku wulawa ku yisi ya Misili, hamba kogopa i likuwo lyo mutemi, na hamba si yawuya ku nyuma, hambi nha yali nha munhu mono yakondya kumuwona u Mulungu yu yulya mono si kejelaga.
58011028	Na so wihuwilo, yanoza Pasaka, yakalajiliza i sakami yimizwe mu milango, ho yu yulya malayika u muwulaji yalece kuwawulaga wana walelwa i walongozi wa Isilayeli.
58011029	So wihuwilo, i wanhu wa Isilayeli walowoka lilenga lya Shamu, kotya nha yali yisi nghavu; ninga Wamisili wali weza kujela nawo kunoza nhavivyo, wakafwila wose mu malenga.
58011030	So wihuwilo, i majinji ge likaya lya Yeliko gakagwa, lono wanhu wa Isilayeli wali wakondya kugapilima mu vilo mupunghati.
58011031	Na so wihuwilo, Lahabu mono yali musenyha, si yajililana hamonga na awalya wono wamubeza Mulungu, ku soko vyono yawacemela ko mulamu awalya i watandizi.
58011032	Alu nolonga cici kanyhi, hambi cilejeho nha si conghondya ho nonje za Gidiyoni, Balaki, Samusoni, Yefuta, na Dawudi, na Samwili na ze wawizi.
58011033	So wihuwilo, wawa wose wehoma ne watemi, wakasuma. Wetuma zo wiling'ano, nawo wakabocela zono yehuwiza u Mulungu. Wadinda i milomo ye masimba,
58011034	wayizimya myoto mikali, wakapona mu wuwulagwe no mumaje. Wali wasocele, ninga wakatuga vilungo. Wali wena inhumbula yono yisina woga mu wulugu, wakagasuma i malugu ge wajenzi.
