58011035	Ne wacekulu wono wali wehuwiye, wakagomolelwa i wafu wawo wakondya kuzukulwa. Wanji muli wene wakalema kuwopolelwa, wakatamiswa vibi sunga wakafwa, ho watuje u wuzuce no kwinjila mu mikalile imiswanu yono yicizize muno.
58011036	Wanji wakazwajizwa no kukunangwa ne viboko, na wanji kanyhi wakawopwa ne manyolo no kutajilwa mu jela.
58011037	Watowangwa ne mabwe, wakademulangwa, wakawulagwa no mumaje. Wakawa kupilima-pilima wavwalile nyhingo ze zingholo ne zimhene, wakawa waciwa, wono wagazwa no kutendelwa vibi.
58011038	Hamba ne yinze si yali yinojeye kuwa ne wanhu wawo. Wakawa kudumanjila mu nyika na mu matunda; wekalaga mu mapango na mu makolongo ge yisi.
58011039	Ne wanhu wawa wose wejela vyono wali wali vilungo so wihuwilo wawo. Hamba nha vivyo, si wabocela zono u Mulungu yawehuwiziza,
58011040	hambi u Mulungu nha yali yehwesize i nghani swanu muno kuciza ku soko yetu; wo wutya wene ho waze wawutuje u wukwilanicizwe hamonga na sese.
58012001	Ase cina yipuga yiwaha lye wahomelezi wono wali ha mwande yetu. Holeka ku soko yiyo ciyilegaje muli vimizi vyose vyono vikucimila, hamonga no wubi wono wucinamatiye muno muno. Kanyhi cimanyhe ko wukangalizi mu witije wono wuli ha mwande yetu.
58012002	Akuno cikumulanga Yesu mono wo mwamulizo wo wihuwilo wetu, no kuwukwiza. Mono, ku soko ye nyemo yono yali yawiciywe u mwene, yakangalila u wufwe wa mu musalaba, hamba kulanga ze cevu cakwe, alu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lwe ligoda lyo lukumyo lyo Mulungu.
58012003	Ale, mwihwesaje ta, kuli zono zamwagana Yesu, nha vyono yakangalila u wiwanganile wuwaha nha wuwu kuli wanhu wanyo wubi. Holeka mulece kutukuwika mitima yenyu hamba kukatala.
58012004	Hambi nha mukali si nehoma mukwisumaniza no wubi, sunga muficile ku wita sakami yenyu.
58012005	Wulenyi, alu mwazisemwa i zinghani zono u Mulungu yakulonga nanye nha wanagwe? “Mwanangu, wulece kubedegala i mafundo go Muwaha, hamba wulece kutukuwika u mutima wako kolo yakukukalipila.
58012006	Hambi u Muwaha nha kamufundaga wo wose mono yamwendile kanyhi kawatowaga iwana wose wono yakuwabocela.”
58012007	Holeka muwukangalililaje u wutowe, hambi nha wo wufundwe; u Mulungu yakumutendelenyi anye nha wanagwe. Hambi yo mwanaci mono si kafundwaga no sogwe?
58012008	Ninga hono mulece kufundwa nhe wana wanji, ale kumbe si muli wanagwe, langa muli wana watumulwa.
58012009	Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ase ciwogopile walezi wetu wono wacilela, hamba na hono wakucifunda. Holeka yicinojeye cimuhulice muno muno u Sogo yetu we cimuhe ho ciwumipe.
58012010	I walezi wetu wa baha hono yinze, wacifunda kwa cipango du, nha vyono wawonaga viswanu weneco, ninga u Mulungu yakucifunda ku so cambuzi cetu sese co weneco, ho cihanje u wele wakwe.
58012011	No wufundwe wo wose, si cinhu ca nyemo, langa co cinhu ca kukalaza. Ninga awalya wono wafundwa no kuwa no wunhu wuswanu, i ndumilizo nha wodudula wuhumbilizwe wo mulamu wono wukulawa mu mikalile yo wiling'ano!
58012012	Holeka muyinulaje i miwoko yenyu yono yidejepe, no kugasikamya mafugamilo genyu gono gatimbile.
58012013	Mujendelele kujendela mu nzila yono yigoloce, u mugulu wono wulemaye ho wulece kutamiswa, langa wuponywe.
58012014	Muweze no wuhile wo kuwa na mulamu ne wanhu wose. Mwikalaje mu mikalile yono yelile, ku soko vyono, hasina u munhu mono kosuma kumuwona u Muwaha Mulungu, hono yawe yayisina mikalile yono yinha yiyo.
58012015	Muhidimbale muno muno, ho yunji yalece kulyajiliza i lihewa lyo Mulungu. Mwilanjililaje, lisina lyo wusungu lilece kutula muli nyenye, no kuwawulaga wanhu wenji ko wusungu walyo.
58012016	Muhidimbale, ho halece kuwa muli nyenye na munhu yunji, musenyha hamba munhu mono si yakumogopo Mulungu nha vyono Esawu, mono yawuguza u wiling'ano wakwe wo kuwa u mulelwa u mulongozi ku soko yo wulye wa kamonga.
58012017	Nanye mumanyile nha vyono, sunga na lono yasakaga kuwutuga kanyhi wuwulya u wulugutwe wono wali wakwe, yakalemwa, hambi nha si yacituga kanyhi cilejeho co kunena, hamba yiwe yacilondola muno akuno ne mahozi.
58012018	Hambi nha simuficile kwi'tunda lya Sinayi, lyono lyosuma kwibatika nha vyono wanoza wanhu wa Isilayeli, kanyhi mukali nafika kono kowuli moto wono wakaga, ha wutitu, ne citi, na ha mukukunzo,
58012019	no mulizo we ndulele ne lizi lye zinghani. Wawo wono walihulika lizi lilyo, wakanena walece kuyihulika kanyhi nghani yinji,
58012020	hambi nha si wasuma kulikangalilila lilajilizo lyono walajilizwa. “Mono kolipamiza litunda lili hamba wuwe mutugo, kopondangwa ne mabwe sunga yafwe.”
58012021	Na zizi zose zikejela nha nghani za kogofya muno, sunga na Musa yakatya, “Ane nghogopa muno no kucicima.”
58012022	Ninga anye muficile mwi'tunda lya Sayuni, ku kaya yo Mulungu mumi. Muficile Yelusalemi, ilikaya lya ku wulanga, kono wekonghoye wa malayika maelufu menji si wakuwala.
58012023	Mwaficila ku wutang'ano wuwaha we walelwa iwalongozi wo Mulungu, wono matagwa gawo gandicigwe ku wulanga. Mwimile hali Mulungu u muling'anizi wa wose, na hamwande ye myuhe ye wanhu we ling'ani wono wanozwa wakwilaniciye.
58012024	Muficile kuli Yesu u munoza i Cilagane, Cipya mono i sakami yakwe yamwajika yikulonga ziswanu muno si nha ya Habeli.
58012025	Holeka mulanjilile, mulece kulema kumuhuliciza mono yakulongana nanye. Nha vyono awalya wono walema kumuhuliciza ayulya mono yawasugula hono yinze, si wapona yaye. Alu ase cosuma kupona wule hono cileme kumuhuliciza ayulya mono yakucisugula, mono yalawa ku wulanga?
58012026	Mwi'pango lilyo lizi lyayisinjisa yinze, ninga alu yehuwiza yakutya, “Noyisinjisa yinze, kanyhi hamba si yinze du langa sunga no wulanga nhavivyo.”
58012027	I nghani yiyi kanyhi, yikucilajila vyono i vinhu vyose vyono vyawumbwa vyosinjiswa no kuwuswa, ho visigale avilya vyono si vikusinjiswa.
58012028	Holeka ase, yicinojeye cilumbe muno, vyono cikuwubocela u wutemi wono si wukusinjisika. Ciweze ne lilumbo no kumuhemba u Mulungu mu nzila yono yikumwendeza, hamonga no winenenyhezi ne cogopo;
58012029	hambi u Mulungu wetu mbeka nha moto mukali wono wukutakamiza.
58013001	Mujendelele mu wendo we cindugu.
58013002	Mulece kusemwa kuwacemela wajenzi; hambi mu wituma nhavivyo, wanji nha wawacemela i wamalayika wula kumanya.
58013003	Mweze kuwakumbucila i wawopwa nanye muwe nha kotya muwopanwe nawo. Kanyhi mweze kotya mukugazika nha weneco.
58013004	U wutole wuweze ne cogopo kuli wanhu wose, i walume ne wacekulu yiwanojeye weze wehuwilwa kuli munhu na muyagwe. Hambi u Mulungu nha kowaling'aniza i wanhu we mikalile mibi ne wasenyha.
58013005	Mulece kuwa muli wasulumizi ku zipesa, langa mweze muceye ne vinhu vyono mwina navyo. Hambi u Mulungu mweneco nha yatya, “Si nokulecela lukulu, hamba si nokutaga.”
58013006	Holeka cikulonga cisina woga: “U Muwaha yo mutazi wangu, si nokogopa. Hambi u munhu konoza cici?”
58013007	Mweze kuwakumbucila i walongola wenyu wono wamulonjelenyi i nghani yo Mulungu. Mwihwesaje ze njenda yawo, muwegaje u wihuwilo wawo.
58013008	Yesu Kilisito yo yuyo du igolo ne zuwali, na ku cibitilila.
58013009	Mulece kutyatya ze mafundo ganji ganji ge cijenzi. I lihewa lyo Mulungu lyo likucisikamya i zinhumbula zetu, hamba si myoto ya mu wulye; hambi i malajilizo nha si gamutaza hamba hadodo u munhu wo wose mono yagatyatya.
58013010	Ase cina cikumbicilo cono awalya wono wakwituma mwihema lye Wayahudi, wasina wukombolwe wo kulya vinhu vyayo.
58013011	U Mukohani Muwaha we Ciyahudi, kaletaga i sakami ye mitugo, i Hanhu Hono Helile, no kulavya makumbiko ku soko yo wubi ninga i zinyama ze mitugo zizo nha zikuwa kuticimizizwa kunze ye nghambi.
58013012	Yo soko, nayo Yesu, yagazizwa kunze ye likaya, sunga yakafwa, ho yaweze i wanhu so sakami yakwe mweneco.
58013013	Ale nase cimubitile kuko kunze ye nghambi, akuno cidinghuye u wumondwe wakwe.
58013014	Hambi akuno kono yinze nha cisina likaya lyono likalaga; langa cikulilondola lyono likuza.
58013015	Ale nhondo, mu nzila ya Yesu, cimulavizyaje u Mulungu, likumbiko lyo lukumyo nhondo zose, wo wutya, u lukumyo lono lukuletwa ne wanhu wono wakulivumila litagwa lyakwe.
58013016	Mulece kusemwa kwituma i ziswanu no kwitaza nyenye wose, hambi zizo nha lye kumbiko lyono likumwendeza u Mulungu.
58013017	Muwahulikaje i walongola wenyu, no kwibata zono wakulonga; hambi nha wakuzidima i zinhumbula zenyu mu cilo na mu misi, kanyhi si woleka kulolosa zo witumami wawo hali Mulungu. Na hono muwahulice, nawo ho wokwituma i milimo yawo kwa nyemo, ninga hono yilece kuwa nhavivyo, wokwituma no wukalale, na si yo wana cambuzi kuli nyenye.
58013018	Mucilombelaje na sese. Cimanyiye lukulu vyono cina ciselinji ciswanu, hambi nha cendile kwituma yono yili ling'ani nhondo zose.
58013019	Nghumunenenyi muno muno, munombelaje, ho Mulungu yangomole u kwenyu mbela mbela, nha vyono yosumika.
58013020	U Mulungu yamuzukula u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito mono yo Mudimi wetu Muwaha we zingholo, ku soko yo wumwaje we sakami yakwe yono yakangaza i cilagane ce cibitilila.
58013021	U Mulungu wo mulamu, yamukwilanicizenyi mu ziswanu zose, ho mwitume wuhile wakwe; nayo yetume muli sese, zono zikumwendeza mweneco mu nzila ya Kilisito. Kuli mwene, weze lukumyo cibitilila ne cibitilila. Heya.
58013022	Holeka nghumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muyihulicizaje mutulile i nghani yiyi yo wulanjizwe. Hambi ayi nha baluwa fupi du yono nimwandicilenyi.
58013023	Nyendile kumumanyizenyi nha vyono u ndugu yetu Timoteyo yakondya kudigulilwa kulawa mu jela. Na hono yeyandile kuza akuno, nolokuzana nayo kolo nghuza u kwenyu.
58013024	Ale, muwalamusaje i walongola wenyu wose, hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu! I wandugu zetu wanya akuno ku Italiya, wakumulamusenyi.
58013025	Lihewa lyo Mulungu liwezane nanye wose.
59001001	Nene Yakobo, umwitumami wo Mulungu, na wo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, nghumwandicilenyi nyenye, nyo we milango yikumi na myejete, mono mwiyagaye kono'nze kose. Lamucenyi!
59001002	Wandugu zangu, muweze na nyemo kolo mukuzizwa ne majelo ganji ganji,
59001003	hambi nha mumanyile vyono, kolo wihuwilo wenyu wukusuma kulewana ne majelo, womupelenyi ngola.
59001004	Kanyhi mweze mumanyile vyono, ingola yenyu yomutazenyi sunga ku ndumo, ho muwe mukamile kanyhi mukwilaniciye, ho mulece kucepucilwa na cinji co cose.
59001005	Na hono muyenyu yunji yawe yanjiye mahala, ale, yimunojeye yamulombe Mulungu mono komupela, hambi Mulungu nha kawapelaga wose ko winji, na kwe nhumbula swanu.
59001006	Ninga yimunojeye yalombe yehuwiye akuno yasina mahwele, go gose. Hambi u munhu mono yena mahwele nha yehwanile mawingo ge lilenga, gono gapemheluswaga no kugumilwa ako na ako ne mbeho.
59001007	Umunhu mono yenha nhavivyo, mono yena mahweso gono gali hejete,
59001008	nha kekalaga yakukangamyanga mu mikalile yakwe yose, holeka yalece kutya kopegwa co cose kulawa kuli Muwaha.
59001009	Ninga u Mukilisito muciwa, yimunojeye yawe na nyemo lono Mulungu yakumwinula,
59001010	nayo mugoli, yimunojeye yawe na nyemo lono yakugwiswa no Mulungu. Hambi umugoli nha kokwajilila nhe liluwa lya mu mbago.
59001011	Hambi lizuwa nha lidulaga, na kolo likukalipa linyazaga mahanze, ne maluwa gayo gakung'unhikaga, no wuswanu wayo wose wuhodanjikaga. Ale nhavivyo, no mugoli nayo, kolo kongomezezwa mu metumo gakwe.
59001012	Mumoti munhu mono yakukangalila wujelwe, hambi kolo yeza yasuma, nha kopegwa i cihumbilizwa co wumi cono Mulungu yawatemezezya wawalya wono wamwendile.
59001013	Na lono munhu yakujelwa, yalece kutya, “Nghujelwa no Mulungu.” Hambi u Mulungu nha sikosuma kujelwa no wubi, hamba mweneco, sikamujelaga munhu wo wose.
59001014	Ninga u munhu kajelwaga lono yakukwegwa no kusumwa ne masulumizi gakwe mweneco.
59001015	Na lono wusulumizi wenjipa wulelaga wubi, nawo wubi kolo wakangala, wulelaga lifwa.
59001016	Nye wandugu zangu wendece, mulece kukongwa.
59001017	Ivipegwa vyose viswanu ne vilavywa vyose vyono vikwilaniciye vilawaga ku wulanga, vilawaga kuli Sogo yo munhu, u Muwumbi we mazelu ga ku wulanga, mono yasina cipitupitu hamba yasina cinji co cose cono cosuma kumuletela wupituce.
59001018	So wendo wakwe mweneco, yacilela mu nghani yakwe ye mbeka, ho ciwe nha cili mikalo milongozi wa muli viwumbwa vyakwe.
59001019	Wandugu zangu wendece, kumbucilenyi nghani yiyi! Umunhu wo wose yeze mupelu kuhulika, ninga yalece kuwa mupelu kulonga, hamba yalece kuwa mupelu kusimba.
59001020	Hambi u munhu mono yena likuwo, nha sikosuma kwituma zo wuhile wo Mulungu wono wuli ling'ani.
59001021	Holeka, muyilecelaje lukulu i mikalile yenyu mibi, ne mijendele yose yo wavu, mwiwice mu miwoko yo Mulungu, no kuyibocela nghani yiyilya yono hadikwe mu zinhumbula zenyu, yono yosuma kuziponya zinhumbula zenyu.
59001022	Mulece kwiyikonga nyo weneco, mu wuhuliciza i nghani yakwe du, langa mweze wetuma i nghani yakwe.
59001023	Wo wose mono kahulikaga nghani yiyo, hamba kuyituma, yuyo yehwanile u munhu mono yakwilanga futa yakwe mwi'lole.
59001024	Hambi nha kelangaga mweneco, hanyuma yayo kabita, na lulo lulo baho du kawa kwiyisemwa nha vyono yali yenha.
59001025	Langa umunhu mono yakuwulanjisa muno muno wulajilize wono wukwilaniciye, wono wupelaga wanhu welecele, no munhu mono yakujendelela kuwibata, hamba sikuwuhulika du, no kuwusemwa hanyuma yayo, langa yakuwitumama, umunhu yuyo kowa mumoti muli vyose vyono yakwitumama.
59001026	Na hono munhu yewone mweneco nha munhu mono yebate dini muno muno, ninga kuno siyakusuma kulwimila lulimi lwakwe, dini yakwe u munhu yuyo yikuwa yisina hamba cambuzi co cose, langa yakwikonga mweneco du.
59001027	Hambi dini yono yelile, na yono yisina manamha manamha ha mwande yo Mulungu u Sogo yo munhu, nha yoyi: Kuwataza wana wono wasina walezi wawo, ne wacekulu wafwile mu wugaye wawo, no kwiyilanjilila go mweneco ho wulece kutipizwa ne yinze yiyi.
59002001	Wandugu zangu, hono muwe mumwihuwiye u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, u Muwaha wo lukumyo, mulecele lukulu kuwawagula wanhu.
59002002	Lunji cilonje citye, munhu yunji mono yavwalile nyamwidole ye zahabu, ne vivwalo vitambule, hono yenjile mu mukung'ano wenyu, na baho kanyhi yenjile no munhu muciwa mono yavwalile vivwalo vitipiye.
59002003	Hono mumupele lilumbo lyono licizize hawaha, yuyulya mono yavwalile vivwalo vyono vikung'alala, no kumutya, “Agwe wikale ahano haswanu,” no kumutya yuyulya muciwa, “Agwe nagwe wime ahalya,” hamba “Wikale ahano hasi hono magulu gangu,”
59002004	wulenyi ma, wuwo wuwaguzi muli nyenye? Ma, na wuwo wulamuzi wenyu si wukulawilila mu mahweso mabi?
59002005	Wandugu zangu, wendece, hulicizenyi ta! U Mulungu yakondya kuwahagula iwanhu waciwa wa mu yinze yiyi, ho wawe wagoli wo wihuwilo, kanyhi wawubocele wutemi wono yawatemezeza wa walya wono wamwendile.
59002006	Ninga nye mukuwabedegala wanhu waciwa! Ninga iwagoli wo wawo wono wakumugazenyi no kumutegulenyi kuli Mahakama?
59002007	Wulenyi, si wo wawo wono walitovulaga litagwa lyenyu liswanu lyono mucemeywe?
59002008	Na hono muwe mukuwufisiliza u wulajilize wulya wo Wutemi, nha vyono yandicigwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile: “Wumwendaje munhu muyago nha vyono wiyendile gwegwe go mweneco,” ale mowa mukunoza viswanu muno muno.
59002009	Ninga hono muwawagule wanhu, mukwituma wubi, nawo Wulajilize nha wukumuhosenyi nyenye vyono mwina wusutye.
59002010	Na mono yakubena lilajilizo limonga du lya mu Wulajilize, kowa wuhoswe wo kuwuhodanga Wulajilize wose.
59002011	Hambi yu yulya mono yakatya, “Wulece kusenyha,” nha yo yatya kanyhi “Wulece kuwulaga.” Holeka hamba wuwe siwukuwa kusenyha, ninga wukuwulaga, agwe wakondya kuwubena wulajilize.
59002012	Ale, holeka mweze kulonga no kwituma nhe wanhu wono wololing'anizwa no Wulajilize wono wuletaga welecele.
59002013	Hambi, u Mulungu nha kolowa yasina lusungu kolo yakumuling'aniza munhu mono yasina lusungu. Ninga lusungu lucizize wuling'anizi.
59002014	Nye wandugu zangu, alu kocili cambuzici, hono munhu yatye yena wihuwilo, ninga kuno ho siyakulajila imetumo gayo? Alu wuwo wihuwilo wosuma kumuponya wule?
59002015	Citye lunji, ndugu we cilume hamba we cicekulu yawe yasina mwenda hamba ndigwa.
59002016	Cowa cambuzici kuli'nye co kuwatya wawo, “Bitenyi mupolile mukote moto, mwigute,” hamba simukuwapela visakwa vyawo vyono wakuhila mu mikalile yawo?
59002017	Ale nhavivyo no wihuwilo weneco du wuli wene wono wusina metumo, wufwiye.
59002018	Ninga munhu yadahile kutya, “Agwe wina wihuwilo, ane nina metumo!” Ale! Wundajile ta vyono munhu kowa yena wihuwilo wono wusina metumo, nane nokulajila wihuwilo wangu mu metumo gangu.
59002019	Ma, agwe wukwihuwila vyono Mulungu yo yumonga? Viswanu! Ninga hamba ne macisi nago gehuwiye nhavivyo, na kuno gakucicima so woga.
59002020	Go mulele 'gwe, ma, wukusaka kulajilwa vyono u wihuwilo wono wusina metumo wufwiye?
59002021	Ma, usetu Abulahamu yanoza wule sunga yakavumilwa no Mulungu? Yavumililwa mu metumo gakwe, lono yamulavizya mwanagwe Isaka mu cikumbicilo.
59002022	Ale, wona ta, vyono wihuwilo wakwe, wetumana ne metumo gakwe, u wihuwilo wakwe wukakwilanicizwa mu metumo gakwe.
59002023	Holeka gakafisilizwa gagalya i Mandiko Gono Gelile gono gatezaga: “Abulahamu yakamwihuwilo Mulungu, na mu wihuwilo wakwe, yakavumilwa yawe munhu we ling'ani, holeka Abulahamu yakacemwa mwendece wo Mulungu.”
59002024	Ale, mukuwona ta, vyono munhu kavumilwaga no Mulungu mu metumo gakwe hamba si mu wihuwilo wuli wene du.
59002025	Na vyo yali yinha na kuli Lahabu u musenyha, nayo yavumilwa yawe we ling'ani ku soko vyono yawabocela wa walya i watandizi, no kuwatonga wakole nzila yinji.
59002026	Ale, nha vyono umuwili wezaga wufwiye hono wusina muhe, nhavivyo no wihuwilo nawo, wezaga wufwiye hono wusina metumo.
59003001	Wandugu zangu, wenji wa muli nyenye, mulece kuwa wejizi. Hambi nha vyono mumanyile, sese co wejizi colotuga wuling'anizwe wuwaha muno muno kuciza wanji.
59003002	Hambi na sese wose nha cisutyaga kali kenji. Ninga hone munhu sikasutyaga mu wulonje wakwe, munhu yuyo kowa yakwilaniciye, kanyhi kosuma kuwimila muwili wakwe wose.
59003003	Ase ciziwicilaga zifwalasi lijamu mu milomo yazo ho zicihulice, na muwunoza nhavivyo mo cisumilaga kuzitegula ko kose kono cendile co weneco. |4B.tif|span|||I zifwalasi zono ziwopigwe no lubano (3:3) |
59003004	Ne zingalawa nazo kanyhi, hamba ziwe mbaha muno, nha zipitulwaga ne mabeho mawaha, ninga zipitulwaga ne cisukani cidodo vivi, ko kose kono mutonji yendile.
59003005	Ale nhavivyo no lulimi nalo, hamba luwe nha cilunzwa cidodo vivi co muwili, cikuwa kwiyikumya makani mawaha muno muno. Ne cinyesela cidodo vivi co moto naco citakamizaga mbago mbaha.
59003006	Ale nhavivyo no lulimi nalo, lwinha moto. Hambi nha lumemile wubi winji muno, nalo lwina cilejeho mu miwili yetu, kanyhi lutajilaga wubi mu miwili yetu yose. Wutakamizaga u wumi wetu wose nho moto wono wulawaga ku Gehena yeneco.
59003007	No munhu nayo, nha kasumaga kugafuga malimu, kanyhi yakondya kusuma kuvifuga i viwumbwa vyose vye malimu ga mu mbago, ne zindeje, ne mazoka, ne malimu ga mwilenga.
59003008	Ninga hasina munhu mono yasuma kulufuga lulimi. Lulimi co cinhu cibi, cono sicimilwaga, kanyhi lumemile sumu mbulaji.
59003009	Ko lulimi, cimulumbaga Muwaha no Sogo yetu. Na ko lulimi lulo kanyhi, ciwalijitaga wanhu, wanhu wono wawumbigwe mu hwani yo Mulungu.
59003010	Izinghani ze malijito na zo wulumbe, zose zilawaga mu mulomo monga. Nyo wandugu zangu, izinghani zizi sizinojeye ziwe nhavivi.
59003011	Ma, cisima cimonga co muvwilo monga cisumaga 'mbi kuvwiza malenga mapolo ne malenga makali hamonga?
59003012	Wandugu zangu, libici lyo mukuyu ma, lisumaga kulela zeyituni? Hamba muzabibu wusumaga kulela nghuyu? Hamba ne cisima co muvwilo we malenga ge cimwino mwino, sicisumaga kuvwiza malenga mapolo.
59003013	Ma, nani mono yena mahala no wizuce muli nyenye? Ale, yayilajilaje ta inghani yiyi, mu mikalile yakwe miswanu, na mu metumo gakwe maswanu, gono ganozwaga mu winenenyhezi ne mahala.
59003014	Ninga hono zinhumbula zenyu ziwe zimemile wivu, simbili no wiyendezi, ale, mulece kwikumya no kuyilambiza i mbeka, ku soko yo wikumizya i mahala genyu.
59003015	Mahala gono genha nhavivi, sigalawaga kucanyha ku wulanga, langa imahala gago ga kononze, kanyhi ga ciyinze yinze, na kanyhi ga cisetani.
59003016	Hambi nha ho hose hono howuli wivu no wiyendezi, baho ho howuli no wuma ne mabi mabi gose.
59003017	Ninga imahala gono galawaga kucanyha ku wulanga, gene gelile, gendile mulamu no wupolo, kanyhi galulaga wanhu, gamemile lusungu kanyhi galelaga mikalo ye metumo maswanu, gasina wuwaguzi hamba wukoci.
59003018	No wiling'ano, yo mikalo ye zimbeyu za wono wendile mulamu wahadicilaga mu mulamu.
59004001	U wulugu no wisonji wose muli nyenye vilawaga hayi? Vilawaga mu masulumizi genyu mabi, gono galewanaga nhondo zose muli nyenye.
59004002	Musulumilaga vinhu, na kolo mweza simukuvituga, hobaho mukwiwikaniza kuwulaga, mukusulumila muno kuvituga vinhu, ninga simukuvituga, holeka mwisongaga no kwitowa. Hambi nha simutugaga cico cono musakaga vyono simucilombaga kuli Mulungu.
59004003	Kanyhi kolo mukulomba simupegwaga, vyono mulombaga ko wuhile wubi, hambi nha mulombaga ho mwigutye imasulumizi genyu.
59004004	Anye muli wanhu mono si muli wehuwilwa, mwihwanile wasenyha. Simumanyile vyono munhu hono yawe kuyenda yinze, yawa mulugu wo Mulungu? Wo wose mono yakusaka yawe kuyenda yinze, yakwinoza yawe mulugu wo Mulungu.
59004005	Mulece kwihwesa mba vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile galongaga zinghani za bwete, lono gatezaga, “Umuhe wono Mulungu yawika muli sese, wina wivu wuwaha.”
59004006	Ninga, lihewa lyono cikupegwa no Mulungu lili vilungo muno muno, nha vyono gatezaga i Mandiko, “Mulungu kawemilaga iwedunhumuzi, langa kawapelaga lihewa iwenenenyhezi.”
59004007	Holeka mwiwikaje mu wukamiswe wo Mulungu, mumwimile Setani, nayo komutizenyi.
59004008	Mumusejelelaje Mulungu, nayo komusejelelenyi. Kwemenyi miwoko yenyu nyo wahodanji! Mweze zinhumbula zenyu nyo wakoci!
59004009	Muzinguce, mugaye no kulila, uluseko lwenyu luweze cililo, ne nyemo yenyu yiweze wuzinguce wuwaha.
59004010	Mwinenenyheze hali Mulungu, nayo komwinulenyi.
59004011	Wandugu zangu, mulece kwihosa nyenye wose. Mono yakumuhosa nduguye no kumuling'aniza, yuyo, yakuwuhosa kanyhi yakuwuling'aniza Wulajilize. Na hono wuwuhose Wulajilize, agwe siwukuwibata Wulajilize, langa wukuwuhosa.
59004012	Hambi nha Mulungu yali wene du yo kawikaga wulajilize no kuling'aniza. Yo mweneco yali wene du mono yasumile kuponya no kongomeza. Alu, wuli nani gwegwe mono wukumuling'aniza u munhu muyago?
59004013	Ale, hulicizenyi ta, anye mono mutezaga, “Izuwali hamba mitondo, cobita kwikaya lyo wutunga, no kwikala kuko mwaka wose cikusuluza no kutuga cambuzi.”
59004014	Hamba simumanyile vyono wumi wenyu wowa wule ku mitondo! Hambi anye nha mwihwanile linghungulyosi lyono lijelaga cipango cidodo vivi du no kwajilila kanyhi.
59004015	Langa yali yinojeye mutye, “U Muwaha hono yacitaze cokwikala womi no kunoza aci hamba acilya.”
59004016	Ninga lu, mukwidunhumula no kwisaja, no widunhumuzi wono winha wuwu wo wubi.
59004017	Ale, no munhu mono siketumaga ziswanu zono yazimanyile, vyono zo zimunojeye yetume, ale yuyo yakwituma wubi.
59005001	Nalu ta hulicizenyi anye nyo wagoli! Mulile no le kwikunguza so wugaye wenyu wono womuzizenyi.
59005002	Isawo yenyu nha yawola, ne vivwalo vyenyu nha vyaligwa ne makuni.
59005003	Zizahabu zenyu ne mapesa genyu, gatuga nghangaga, ne nghangaga yiyo yowa wuhomelezi kuli'nye, nayo yomulyenyi miwili yenyu nho moto. Anye mwiwutila isawo mu vilo vivi vye ndumo!
59005004	Simwawalipa misahala i wetumami wono wetumo mulimo mu migunda yenyu. Lanjenyi ta vyono wakukalala? Icililo ca wawo wono wakududula mu migunda yenyu, cafika mu makutu go Muwaha Mulungu u Mudaha vyose.
59005005	Hambi nha mwekala kono'nze ne mikalile ye cinyemo-nyemo na yo kwiyendeza nyo weneco. Mwakondya kuzijinya zinhumbula zenyu nyo weneco so lizuwa lyo wuwulagwe.
59005006	Mwaling'anizwa no kumuwulaga munhu mono yasina wusutye, nayo hamba siyamugomolezezenyi nghani yo yose yono'mbi.
59005007	Ale, wandugu zangu, mweze no wukangalile sunga Muwaha kolo kokuziza. Lanjenyi ta u mulimi vyono kalindilaga ko wukangalile i ndudula yakwe yilete ndigwa swanu. Umwene kalindilaga ko wukangalile i mvula ye lifuku ne ye lihwela.
59005008	Na nyenye nhavivyo yimunojelenyi muwe na ngola, musikamye zinhumbula zenyu, hambi lizuwa lyo wuze wakwe Muwaha nha lyasejelela.
59005009	Wandugu zangu, mulece kwing'ung'ulicila nyenye wose, ho mulece kuling'anizwa no Mulungu. Hambi u Muling'anizi nha yeza behi no kwinjila ha mulango.
59005010	Wandugu zangu, hono muwe mukusaka kuwona musambo we ngola no wukangalile muli magazo, mwihwesaje ze wawizi wono waganulaga mwitagwa lyo Muwaha.
59005011	Holeka ciwacemaga wawo wo wamoti ku soko vyono wakangalila. Mwakondya kuhulika zo wukangalile wa Jobu, kanyhi mumanyile vyono u Muwaha yamutendela ha ndumilizo. Hambi Muwaha nha yamemile nheto no lusungu.
59005012	Ninga ko muno, wandugu zangu mulece kwilaha. Mulece kwilahiza ku wulanga, hamba mono'nze, hamba ku cilaha cinji co cose. Langa mutye “Heya” hono nhunizo yenyu yo heya, na “Ng'o” hono nhunizo yenyu yo ng'o, ho simoling'anizwa no Mulungu.
59005013	Ma, hoyuli munhu wo wose muli nyenye mono yena wugaye? Yimunojeye yalombe. Ma, hoyuli yunji musangalafu? Yimunojeye yembe zinyimbo zo wulumbe.
59005014	Ma, hoyuli yunji mono yatamigwe muli nyenye? Yimunojeye yawaceme iwanyamhala we Likanisa, nawo womulombela no kumubacila mafuta mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha.
59005015	Na hono walombe wehuwiye yuyo mutamwa koponywa, u Muwaha komupela ciba, no wubi wono yali yetuma wonenelwa.
59005016	Ale, mweze kwiyivumilila mabi genyu, mwilombelaje, ho muponywe. Uwulombe wo munhu we ling'ani wina vilungo vyo kwituma nyinji.
59005017	Eliya yali munhu yenha sese. Yakalomba muno imvula yilece kutonya, nayo siyatonya mu'si myaka midatu na myezi mutandatu.
59005018	Ale, yakalomba kanyhi, ne mvula yikatonya kulawa ku wulanga, ne'si yikacindya zindigwa zayo.
59005019	Wandugu zangu, muyenyu yunji hono yajilile mu mbeka, na muyenyu yunji yamupitule,
59005020	manyenyi vyono, yuyo mono yakumupitula munyo wubi, ku wulawa mu nzila yakwe yo wajilile, koyiponya i nhumbula yakwe mwi'fwa, no wubi winji wonenelwa.
60001001	Nene Petelo, umutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito. Nghumwandicilenyi nyenye nyo wahagulwa wo Mulungu Sogo yo munhu, mono mwiyagaye no kwikala kuko ku Pontiyo, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asiya na Bituniya kotya muli watizizi.
60001002	Nayo Mulungu u Sogo yo munhu yakamuhagulenyi nyenye ko wuhile wakwe, no kwezwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, ho mumuhulice Yesu Kilisito no kukwemwa ne sakami yakwe. Lihewa no mulamu vyonjelecele kuli'nye.
60001003	Yalumbwe Mulungu, u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito! Ko lusungu lwakwe luwaha, yacinoza cilelwe wupya, ko kumuzukula Yesu muli wafu. Yakondya kucipela u witumbilo wo wumi,
60001004	holeka cilindiye kuwutuga wumoti awulya wono Mulungu yawawiciye wanhu wakwe. No Mulungu yakondya kumuwicilenyi wumoti wuwo ku wulanga, kono siwuwolaga, hamba kuhodanjika, hamba kufwifwiza.
60001005	Zizo zolowa zenyu nyenye mono ko wihuwilo, mukudimwa viswanu telele, kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu, so mhonelo yono yikondizye kugubulwa ku ndumo ye vilo.
60001006	Ale, musangalale, so nghani yiyo, hambe yiwe alu mu cidaha cidodo vivi, simoleka kukalazwa so majelo ganji ganji gono mukugazika ngo.
60001007	Ne nhunizo yayo, anye ho musume kukangazwa mu wihuwilo wenyu. Hambe zizahabu zeneco, zono zihodanjikaga, zijelwaga no moto, nhavivyo sunga no wihuwilo wenyu, wono yo sawo kuciza zizahabu, siwoleka kujelwa ho wuwe wuli vilungo. Hanyuma ho mubocele lilumbo no lukumyo no wutogoze, lizuwa lilyo kolo Yesu Kilisito yakugubulwa.
60001008	Anye mumwendile, hamba muwe simunamuwona, na kanyhi mumwihuwiye hamba muwe simukumuwona lulu. Holeka, mukusecelela muno ne nyemo yo lukumyo siyakulonga.
60001009	So wubocela uwukombozwe we zinhumbula zenyu, wono wo wulunji wo wihuwilo wenyu.
60001010	Iwawizi walondola londola muno, no kutikula zo wukombozwe wuwo, wakawila ze lihewa lilyo, lyono anye mwali mupegwe.
60001011	Wakajela kumanya ivilo ne ndawililo ye litumo lilyo, nha cinji vilo vyono yalonga u Muhe wa Kilisito mono yali yali muli wene, lono yawilaga ze magazo gono gomuziza Kilisito, no lukumyo lono lotyatya.
60001012	Nayo Mulungu yakawagubulila mu vilo vyono walongaga ze zinghani zizo, zono anye, alu mwakondya kuzihulika, kulawa kuli wawalya watumwa wono wakamuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu, lwe vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, mono yatumwa ku wulawa ku wulanga, vyono wuwo mulimo wawo, si wali so cambuzi cawo weneco, langa ku soko yenyu. Zizo zo nghani zono hamba wamalayika wali wende kuzimanya.
60001013	Ale, holeka mwiwikanizizaje lukulu ko wuhile no kwikala meso. Wicenyi witumbilo wenyu wose mu wumoti wulya wono molopegwa mwi'daha lono Yesu Kilisito yakwijela!
60001014	Kanyhi nha vyono yinha nhe wana wo Mulungu we cihuliko, holeka mulece kugatyatya kanyhi imasulumizi mabi, gono mwali mwina nago lono mwali mukali walele.
60001015	Langa munojeye mweze mwelile mu mikalile yenyu yose, nha vyono yelile yu yulya mono yamucemenyi
60001016	Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Mweze mwelile, nha vyono ane nyelile.”
60001017	Lono mukumutambula u Mulungu, anye Mumucemaga mukutya Baba. Ale, manyenyi vyono mwene kowaling'aniza i wanhu wose mu metumo gawo yasina wuhijila-mbejele. Holeka muvitumamilaje ivilo vyenyu vyono visigaye mu mikalile yenyu, mu wogopo Mulungu.
60001018	Hambi nha mumanyile vyono, anye mwakombozwa mu mikalile yenyu mibi, yono mwalecezwa kulawa ku wasenyu, si ne vinhu vyono vihodanjikaga, zipesa ne zizahabu,
60001019	langa mwakombozwa kwe sakami yo lukumyo ya Kilisito, mono yali yenha nyana ye ngholo yono yisine'lema hamba ma namha.
60001020	Umwene yali yahaguywe no Mulungu lono yinze yali yikali nawumbwa, yakagubulwa mu vilo vivi vye ndumo ku soko ya nyenye.
60001021	Na mu nzila yakwe, anye mukumwihuwilo Mulungu mono yamuzukula muli wafu no kumupela lukumyo, holeka uwihuwilo no witumbilo wenyu wuli kuli Mulungu.
60001022	Alu vyono mu wuhulika mbeka, anye mwakondya kweza i zinhumbula zenyu, no kuwenda iwayenyu musina wukoci, ale, mwiyendaje yendi yendi kwe nhumbula yose.
60001023	Hambi nha mu nzila ye nghani nyumi yo Mulungu, inghani ye cibitilila, anye mwalelwa wupya, si mwinha i wana wo sogo ya munhu mono yadahile kufwa, langa usogo yo munhu mono siyadahile kufwa cibitilila.
60001024	Nha vyono i Mandiko gatezaga: “U munhu wo wose nha yenha mahanze no lukumyo lwakwe lose nha lwinha maluwa ga mu mbago. Imahanze ganyalaga ne maluwa gakung'unhikaga.
60001025	Ninga inghani yo Muwaha yikalaga cibitilila.” Inghani yiyo, yo nghani yo Luganuzi Luswanu lono lwaganulwa kuli'nye.
60002001	Holeka, lecenyi wubi wose: no wulambi, no wukoci, ne zinghani zose ze nhovu, vivyo vyose viwucile lukulu muli nyenye.
60002002	Nha vyono iwana wadodo wasulumilaga mele, na nyenye nhavivyo munojeye muwe no wusulumizi we mele geneco ge cimuhe, na mu vilungo vyago, ho musume kuwiluka no kukombozwa.
60002003	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile, nha gakutya, “Mwezuka vyono Muwaha yali lusungu.”
60002004	Ale, mubitilenyi Muwaha! Umwene lyo libwe lyumi lyono lyalemwa ne wanhu, ninga hali Mulungu, lyo libwe lyono lihaguywe, lyono lina wuguzi wukamu.
60002005	Ale mubitilenyi mwene nha mabwe momi, mukazenjece, no kuwa nyumba ye cimuhe, mono mosuma kwitumama nhe wakohani wono welile, ku wulavya i makumbiko ge cimuhe gono gakumwendeza Mulungu mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito.
60002006	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “Langa ta! Nghuwika kuko ku Sayuni libwe liwaha lyo musinji. Ilibwe lyo wuguzi wukamu, lyono nilihaguye. Umunhu mono komwihuwila umwene mono yo lilyo libwe, sikolokozwa soni ng'o.”
60002007	Ale kuli'nye mono mwihuwiye, ilibwe lilyo lyo lyo wuguzi wukamu, ninga kuli walya wono siwehuwiye, “I libwe lyono walilema iwazenji, ninga alu lyo lyeza libwe liwaha lyo musinji.”
60002008	Kanyhi i Mandiko gakutya, “Libwe lilyo lyo libwe lyo wikobale, litalawe lyo kuwagwisa wanhu.” Ne wanhu wekobalaga vyono siwehuwila inghani yiyilya. Ku soko vyo watemezezwa ku wulawa mwamulizo.
60002009	Ninga anye muli ndelwa hagulwa, iwakohani wo Mutemi, inghungugo yono yelile, i wanhu wo Mulungu mweneco, mono muhaguywe ho mwanze ze metumo mawaha go Mulungu mono yamucemenyi kulawa ku wutitu, yakamwinjizenyi mu wuzelu wakwe wo kwizina.
60002010	Mu mapango ganji, anye mwali si muli wanhu wo Mulungu, ninga'lu anye mweza muli wanhu wakwe, kanyhi mwali si muwoneywe lusungu lo Mulungu, alu ninga mwawonelwa lusungu.
60002011	Nye nyo wendece wangu, nghumunenenyi nyenye nha wajenzi kanyhi wakola nzila mononze! Mwiyilegaje mu masulumizi go muwili gono vikulewana ne nhumbula.
60002012	I mijendele yenyu muli wanhu wono siwamumanyile Mulungu, yinojeye yiwe miswanu muno muno, na kolo wakumuvilenyi nha muli wetuma vibi, wasume kugawona i metumo genyu maswanu, ho wamulumbile Mulungu mwizuwa lyo wuze wakwe.
60002013	Ale, mweze muli cihuliko kuli zose zono zikutemywa ne wanhu ku soko yo Muwaha. Cihuliko kuli mutemi u munya wutemi,
60002014	cihuliko kuli wawaha we'zisi wono wahaguywe nayo, ho wawalipicize i wahodanji no kuwalumba i wetuma viswanu.
60002015	Hambi u Mulungu nha vyo yakuhila, ho musume kuzinyamaziza i zinghani zo wulele, ze wanhu wono wasina mahala mu metumo genyu maswanu gono mukwituma.
60002016	Mwikalaje nhe wanhu welecele, ninga mulece kuwitumamila u welecele wenyu wuwe nha cigubicizo co wubi, langa i mikalile yenyu yeze nhe wetumami wo Mulungu.
60002017	Mweze na cogopo kuli wanhu wose, mu wendaje i wandugu zenyu wono wehuwiye, mumogopaje Mulungu, mumupelaje lilumbo mutemi.
60002018	Nye nyo wetumami wa mu zikaya, mweze na cihuliko kuli wawaha wenyu hamonga ne cogopo cose, kuli i waswanu ne wapolo, hamba na kuli wono wali caka.
60002019	Hambi hono muwe mukukangalila mawine ge magazo gono simuganojeye gamutujenyi, akuno mumanyile vyono u Mulungu yakusaka muwe nha vivyo, ale Mulungu kumutazenyi.
60002020	Hambi, motuga cambuzici kolo mukukangalila so wutowe wono mukutowa ku soko ye masutya genyu? Ninga hono muwe mukukangalila i magazo, hamba muwe nha mwetuma ziswanu, ale, nayo Mulungu komulugutenyi ku soko yiyo.
60002021	Na zizo zo mwacemelwa, hambi Kilisito mweneco nha yagazwa ku soko yenyu, yakamulecelenyi musambo, ho muyityatye i mikalile yakwe.
60002022	Umwene siyetuma wubi, hamba nghani yo wulambi, siyahulikwa mu mulomo wakwe.
60002023	Na lono wamuligaga, mwene siyawapitula ne'ligo, lono yagazizwa, mwene siyawapinjicila langa yamuwicila u Mulungu u witumbilo wakwe wose, u muling'anizi we ling'ani.
60002024	U mwene yawudinghulila u wubi wetu mu muwili wakwe mu musalaba, ho cisume kufwa ku lubavu lo wubi, no kuwumipila ku wiling'ano. Na muzinghomele zakwe, anye mo mwaponyezwa.
60002025	Nanye mwali mwinha zingholo zono zali zajiliye, ninga lu mumuwuyila Mudimi no mulanjilizi we zinhumbula zenyu.
60003001	Nanye nyo wacekulu, mweze ne cihuliko kuli walume zenyu, ho yiwe, hono hawe howali i walume wono si wayihuwiye i nghani yo Mulungu, ho wasume nawo kwihuwila, kolo wakuyiwona i mikalile yenyu. Hambi nha kowa kusina soko yo kulonga kuli'nye, nghani yo yose,
60003002	hambi nha woyiwona weneco i mikalile yenyu vyono yelile, yono yimogopile Mulungu.
60003003	Na mu wihambe wenyu, mulece kucelelela muno izinghani za munze du, nha zo wutawa zimvili, nazo wuvwala i vinhu vye zizahabu, ne myenda ye cimalidadi.
60003004	Langa wuswanu wenyu wunojeye wulawe mu wuwe wa mugati wo wunhu we mbeka, wono siwusakalaga, wo wuswanu no watuvu we nhumbula, wono wina wuguzi wukamu hali Mulungu.
60003005	Nhavivyo i katali, vyo wehambaga iwacekulu we ling'ani, wono wali wamwitumbiye Mulungu, wakawa wali cihuliko kuli walume zawo.
60003006	Nha vyono Sala nayo, yamuhulikaga Abulahamu, sunga yamutezaga mutwawe. Nalu nanye mweza wanagwe we cicekulu, hono mwitume viswanu hamba kugofywa na cinhu cinji co cose.
60003007	Nhavivyo nanye nyo walume, mu wikalana ne wacekulu zenyu, munojeye mumanye vyono, wene wasocele, holeka munojeye muwatendele kwe cogopo, no kuwanemya, hambi nawo nha wolohalana hamonga nanye i lihewa lyo wumi, wono yakumupelenyi Mulungu. U wulombe wenyu, ho wulece kwimilwa.
60003008	Ale, ze ndumilizo nghutya nhavi: yiwanojeye muwe na nhumbula monga, ne 'hweso limonga, yiwanojeye kwiyenda nha ndugu, mweze wapolo kanyhi muli wenenenyhezi nyenye wose.
60003009	Mulece kuwagomolezeza wanhu wubi na wubi, hamba yiligo ne 'ligo, langa muwalombele wumoteswe, hambi anye nha mwacemwa no Mulungu ho muwubocele wumoti.
60003010	Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gatezaga, “Mono yakusaka yawumipe no wusangalale, sunga yawone ne cambuzi ce vilo vyakwe, yimunojeye yalece kulonga zimbi, kanyhi yalece kulonga wulambi.
60003011	Kanyhi yeleje ne zimbi, yetume ziswanu, yawulondole mulamu no kuwukamisa,
60003012	Hambi Muwaha nha kawalangaga viswanu i wanhu we ling'ani no kuwuhuliciza u wulombe wawo. Ninga Mulungu kawatumbilaga mugongo iwetuma zimbi.”
60003013	Nani 'mbi mono komutendelenyi anye vibi, hono muzikamise zo wituma ziswanu?
60003014	Ninga, hamba yiwe yimunojelenyi kugazika ku soko yo wituma ziswanu, ale, mowa wamoti. Kanyhi mulece kumogopa munhu wo wose, hamba mulece kuvumila kwinjizwa mu mahwele.
60003015	Langa mumukumyaje Kilisito nho Muwaha mu zinhumbula zenyu. Kanyhi mweze mwiwikanize nhondo zose kumupitula yunji wo wose mono komuwuzenyi zo witumbilo wono wuli muli nyenye,
60003016	ninga nozenyi nhavivyo ko wupolo ne cogopo. Mweze ne ciselinji ciswanu, hono mukuligwa ho wakozwe soni wa walya wono wakuyilonga vibi i mikalile yenyu miswanu ye Cikilisito.
60003017	Hambi nha viswanu kugazika ku soko yo wituma ziswanu, hono Mulungu yende. Si nha kugazika ku soko yo wituma zimbi.
60003018	Hambi Kilisito mweneco nha yafwa ku soko yo wubi wetu, yafwa kamonga du yikakwila, u munhu we ling'ani ku soko ye wabi, ho yamutegulenyi anye kuli Mulungu. Yawulagwa mu muwili ninga yakanozwa mumi mu Muhe,
60003019	na mu mikalile yakwe ye cimuhe yakabita kuwaganulila yiyilya myuhe yono yali mu cifungo.
60003020	Wawo wo wa walya wono wakalema kumuhulika Mulungu, lono yawalindilila ne ngola mu cipango lono Noha yawikanizaga yiyilya safina. Na mugati ye ciya cico wanhu wacefu du, wo wanhu munana du, wono wakaponywa mwilenga.
60003021	I lilenga lyono lyali yo hwani yo wubaputizo wono wukumuponyenyi nyenye'lu. Wubaputizo si nghani yo wuwusa makwe mu muwili, langa co cilagane kuli Mulungu cono cinozezwaga mu ciselinji ciswanu. Cikumuponyenyi mu nzila yo wuzuce wa Yesu Kilisito,
60003022	mono yabita ku wulanga, nalu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu, yawatemile wamalayika, ne wawaha, na wono walawiliciye.
60004001	Ku soko lu vyono Kilisito yagazicila mu muwili, holeka nanye yimunojelenyi mwisikamizizye mu wuhile wakwe wuwo, hambi mono yakugazicila mu muwili, nha vyakondya kwileka no wubi.
60004002	Holeka ku wulawa lulu, imikalile yenyu yono yisigaye kwikala kukuno kono'nze, yinojeye muwe kutongwa no wuhile wo Mulungu, hamba si ne masulumizi ge cimunhu-munhu.
60004003	Hambi i vilo vyono vyakondya kupuluta, nha mwali mwina cilejeho ciwaha, co kwituma zono wanozaga wanhu wono siwamumanyile Mulungu. Mukekala mu mikalile yo wiyendeza nyo weneco, yo wiwoni, yo wukolwa, yo wisonji, wung'wela, na yo wuhemba vihwani.
60004004	Ninga'lu, iwanhu wawo wono siwamumanyile u Mulungu, wakwizina kolo wakuwona vyono simukuwezana kanyhi na wene mu mikalile mibi, na holeka wakumulijenyi.
60004005	Ninga siwololeka kwibombola ze nghani yiyi hali Mulungu mono yewikanize kuwaling'aniza i womi ne wafu!
60004006	Ku soko yiyo, wawo wono wafwa wono wali wakondya kuling'anizwa muli ze mikalile yawo ye cimunhu-munhu nha vyono waling'anizwaga wanhu wose, waganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu, ho wasume kwikala mu mikalile yawo ye cimuhe, nha vyono kekalaga Mulungu.
60004007	Ale, u mudumo we vinhu vyose wasejelela. Holeka munojeye muwe no wiyimile no kwikala meso, ho musume kulomba.
60004008	Ne nghani mbaha muno muno, mwiyendaje yendi-yendi kwe nhumbula yose, hambi uwendo nha wuhiliwizaga wubi winji.
60004009	Mwiyicemelaje viswanu nyenye wose akuno musina wung'ung'ulice.
60004010	Kanyhi anye wose munojeye mwitumamile cipegwa cono mwapegwa no Mulungu so cambuzi ca wanji, nha vyono u mukozwa muswanu we vipegwa hayo hayo vyo Mulungu.
60004011	Na mono yakulonga nghani yo yose, u wulonje wakwe, weze nho wulonje we zinghani zo Mulungu, na mono yakuwetumamila wanji, yimunojeye yawetumamile ne vilungo nha vyono yakupegwa no Mulungu. U Mulungu ho yakumizwe muli vyose, mwitagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, mono ulukumyo ne vilungo nha vyakwe cibitilila na cibitilila! Heya.
60004012	Nye wandugu zangu wendece, mulece kwizina ze majelo mawaha gono gakumuzizenyi yiwe nha mukuzizwa na cinhu cijenzi.
60004013	Langa musangalale vyono mukuhanga imagazo ga Kilisito, ho musume kuwa na nyemo mbaha muno muno mwidaha lono ulukumyo lwakwe lukugubulwa.
60004014	Hambi nha muli wamoti, hono muli'gwe ku soko ye litagwa lya Kilisito, ne nghani yiyo, yikulajila vyono Muhe Mono Yelile, yuyo Muhe wo Mulungu kekalaga muli'nye.
60004015	Ninga halece kuwa na munhu wo wose muli nyenye mono kogazwa so wuwulaji, hamba so wuhizi, hamba so wuhodanji, hamba so wituma zimbi.
60004016	Ninga hono munhu yagazwe vyono mwene Mukilisito, ale, yalece kuwona soni, langa yamukumyaje Mulungu vyono mwene yakucemwa mwitagwa lya Kilisito.
60004017	I cidaha co wuling'anizwe nha cakondya kuza, no wuling'anizwe wuwo, wukwamulila kuli wanhu wo Mulungu mweneco. Na hono wulinga'nizwe wuwo wamulile kuli sese, co weneco, alu ma, i ndumo ya wawalya wono siwehuwilaga u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, ho yolowa wule?
60004018	Nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Hono vikamu kuli wanhu we ling'ani kuponywa, yolowa wule lu, kuli wanhu wono siwamogopaga Mulungu ne Wanyo wubi?”
60004019	Holeka, wawo wono wakugazika ku so wuhile wo Mulungu, yiwanojeye, wamukoze u Muwumbi mwihuwilwa nhumbula zawo, mu wituma ziswanu.
60005001	Nyo wanyamhala! Ane no munyamhala muyenyu, nghumulombenyi nghani yi monga du, nyo wanyamhala wayangu. Hambi nene no mweneco nha newonelela ne meso gangu, imagazo ga Kilisito kanyhi nitumbiye kuhanga lululya u lukumyo lono lologubulwa. Ale, ane nghumunenenyi,
60005002	muyidimaje yiyilya imhuga yo Mulungu yono mwapegwa, muyilanjilile, si ne dindimiza langa kwe nhumbula, nha vyono kasakaga Mulungu. Muwitumaje u mulimo wuwo si kwe masulumizi ge zipesa, langa kwe nhumbula zenyu zose.
60005003	Mulece kuwatema kwe vilungo wawo wono wawicigwe mu wulanjilizi wenyu, langa mweze nha musambo kuli mhuga yiyo.
60005004	Na mu cidaha kolo u Mudimi Muwaha yakwijela, nanye molobocela u mukumbo wo lukumyo wono siwunyalaga.
60005005	Nanye nhavivyo mo wadodo, munojeye mwiwice mu wulajilize we wanyamhala. Nanye wose munojeye muwe no winenenyhezi ho musume kwiyitumila nyenye wose, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “U Mulungu sikawasakaga wono wena widunhumuzi, langa kawapelaga lihewa iwenenenyhezi.”
60005006	Holeka mwinenenyheze mu muwoko wo Mulungu wono wuli vilungo, ho yamunyasulenyi mu cidaha cono cinojeye.
60005007	Mumulecelaje u Mulungu zose zono zikumugazenyi mu zinhumbula zenyu. Hambi mwene nha yo yakumudimenyi.
60005008	Mwikalaje meso, kanyhi mweze musujile. Hambi umulugu wenyu Setani, yakupilima pilima nha simba yikukoloma, yikulondola yunji yimuhawanje.
60005009	Holeka mumwimilaje, kanyhi mweze mukamile mu wihuwilo wenyu, kuno mumanyile vyono i wandugu zenyu wono wali kono'nze, nawo wakugatuga i magazo gono genha gaga.
60005010	Ninga kolo mukugazika cidaha cidodo vivi, Mulungu mono yo ndawililo ye lihewa lyose na mono yakumucemenyi muwuhanje ulukumyo lwakwe we cibitilila muwilunza na Kilisito, umweneco komukwilanicizenyi no kumukangazenyi, kanyhi komupelenyi vilungo no musinji wono wukamile.
60005011	Kuli mwene wuwe wuwaha cibitilila! Heya.
60005012	Nimwandicilenyi i baluwa yiyi fupi, ko wutazi wa Silivano u ndugu yetu mono nimumanyile kanyhi mono nimwitumbiye. Nghusaka kumusikamyenyi no kuhomelela vyono ali lye'hewa lyo Mulungu lye mbeka. Holeka mwikalaje mukamile mwihewa lilyo.
60005013	Ne mhuga ye wayenyu i wahagulwa wo Mulungu wono wali mwi'kanisa lya ku Babiloni wakumulamusenyi. No mwanangu Maluko nhavivyo nayo yakumulamusenyi.
60005014	Mwiyilamusaje mu citanjilo co wendo wa Kilisito. U mulamu kuli'nye wose mono muli wakwe Kilisito.
61001001	Ane yo nene Simoni Petelo, u mwitumami no mutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito. Nghumwandicilenyi nyenye mono so wuswanu wo Mulungu wetu, hamonga no Mukombozi Yesu Kilisito, mwapegwa u wihuwilo wuwulya wo wuguzi wukamu wono capegwa na sese.
61001002	Ilihewa no Mulamu vyeze kuli'nye mu wumumanyo Mulungu, na Yesu Kilisito Mutwa wetu.
61001003	Mu vilungo vyakwe vyo wulungu, u Mulungu yacipela vyose vyono cisakaga, ho cisume kwikala mu mikalile yo kumogopo Mulungu, no kumumanya mwene mono yacicema ho ciwuhanje ulukumyo no wuswanu wakwe mweneco.
61001004	Hambi muli zizo nha yakondya kucipela vipegwa viwaha vyo wuguzi wukamu vyono yacihuwiziza, na ku so vipegwa vivyo, ho musume kuhanga u wuwe wakwe wo wulungu.
61001005	Holeka mupiligale muno konjeleza wuswanu wo wihuwilo wenyu, kanyhi monjeleze no wizuce mu wuswanu wenyu,
61001006	mu wizuce namo, monjeleze wiyimile, na mu wiyimile namo, monjeleze ngola, mu ngola namo, monjeleze wogopo Mulungu.
61001007	Mu wogopo Mulungu namo, monjeleze wenda ndugu, na mu wenda ndugu namo, monjeleze wendo.
61001008	Na kolo mukuwa no winji wa zizi zose, zomunozenyi muwe muli wetumi, no kutuga cambuzi mu wumumanya Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
61001009	Ninga munhu mono yazisina zizi zose, yaweza mubofu, hambi nha si yakusuma kuwona, kanyhi yasemwa vyono yakondya kukwemwa u wubi wakwe we katali.
61001010	Ale, holeka, wandugu zangu, piligalenyi muno muno kulunoza lulo ulucemo lwenyu lono mwacemelwa no Mulungu, luwe nghani ye cibitilila mu mikalile yenyu, na hono mwikale nhavivyo, simosuma kuwulecela lukulu uwihuwilo wenyu.
61001011	Na yiyo yo yoleka mosuma kupegwa wiling'ano wono wukwilaniciye, wo kwinjilila mu wutemi wo Mutwa wetu no Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito.
61001012	Holeka nane nojendelela kumukumbucizenyi nhondo zose zinghani zizi, hamba muwe mwakondya kuzimanya, kanyhi mukamile mu mbeka yono mwayibocela.
61001013	Nghwihwesa yowa nghani swanu kuli'ne, mu mapango gose gono nowa nghali nili mumi kononze, njendelele kumusikamyenyi no kumukumbucizenyi ze zinghani zizi.
61001014	Hambi nha manyile vyono naza behi kuwuwika mu citenjelo umuwili wangu wuwu wono wufwizaga, nha vyono u Muwaha yanonjela calinze.
61001015	Holeka nopiligala kumupelenyi nzila yo kuzikumbucilila zinghani zizi nhondo zose, hamba lono niwe nakondya kufwa.
61001016	Mu vilo vyono cawejizenyi ze nyiza yakwe mbaha u Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, sicatyatya zisimo ze cibwete bwete zono zisina nhunizo yo yose. Ase cikawuwona ulukumyo lwakwe ne meso getu co weneco.
61001017	Ase cali baho mu cipango lono yapelelwa lilumbo, no kukumywa no Mulungu Sogo yo munhu, lono lizi likamuziza kulawa kuli mwene, mono yo Lukumyo Luwaha, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu mwendece mono nyendezwe nayo.”
61001018	Kanyhi, sese co weneco cikalihulika lizi lilyo kulawa ku wulanga lono cali cili hamonga nayo kucanyha ye litunda lililya lyono lyelile.
61001019	Kanyhi sunga ne zinghani ze wawizi zikuyihomelela nghani yiyi, nanye mukunoza viswanu hono mukuyibata, hambi nha yinha tala yono yikumulika hanhu hatitu, sunga lizuwa lililya kolo likusomoza, no wuzelu we nyelezi yimwacinghunghu, kolo wukubulila mu zinhumbula zenyu.
61001020	Ninga hamonga na zizo, mukumbucile vyono, hasina munhu wo wose, mono kosuma kulolosa mweneco zo wuwizi wono wuli mu Mandiko Gono Gelile.
61001021	Hambi nha hasina nghani yo wuwile yono yina ndawililo ye cimunhumunhu, langa iwanhu wayilonga inghani yo Mulungu nha vyono watongwaga no Muhe Mono Yelile.
61002001	Wakalawila wawizi wo wulambi muli wanhu, nhavivyo kanyhi, iwejizi wo wulambi wololawila sunga na muli nyenye. Ne wanhu we liwala lilyo, wololeta i mafundo go wiwajize no kumukana Muwaha mono yakawakomboza, na mu nzila, yiyo wokwiletela musunho u wongomezwe wawo weneco.
61002002	Kanyhi ne wanhu wenji wolozityatya zizo zinzila zawo zimbi, sunga na wanji woloyibedegala Inzila ye mbeka ku soko yawo.
61002003	Na ku soko ye masulumizi gawo mabi, wolokwisavizya muli nyenye, kolo wakumulonjelenyi zinghani zo wulambi-lambi. No wulipicizwe wawo wakondya kuwikanizwa kulawa katali, siwocela yaye. Nayo mono kowongomeza, yali meso!
61002004	Na lono wamalayika wetumila u wubi, u Mulungu si yawawonela lusungu yaye, langa yakawataga mu moto we Gehena, nawo wafunjigwe mumo walindiye Lizuwa lililya lyo wuling'anizwe.
61002005	Kanyhi u Mulungu hamba siyayitetela yinze ye katali, yaleta lihwazi lye malenga mu'si yiyilya ye wanhu wono si wamogopago Mulungu, ninga Noha mono yaganulaga u wiling'ano, u Mulungu yakamuponya hamonga ne wanhu wanji mupunghati.
61002006	Kanyhi Mulungu yakagalipiciza makaya ga Sodoma na Gomola, yakagaticimiza no moto tici-tici, yakaganoza gawe nha suguzi kuli wanhu wono siwamogopaga Mulungu.
61002007	Yakamuponya Loti munhu muswanu, ne mikalile mibi ye muswanu, wanhu wawo wafyuzi.
61002008	Hambi Loti nha yakekalana ne wanhu wawo, na mu vilo vinji, inhumbula yakwe yali yina mahwele mawaha, yeza kuhulika ze metumo gawo mabi.
61002009	Ale, holeka, Muwaha yamanyile kuwaponya mu wulipicizwe sunga Mwizuwa lililya lyo wuling'anizwe.
61002010	Na ko muno wa walya wono watyatyaga imasulumizi mabi go muwili na wono wakubedegala no kulema kutemwa no Mulungu. Iwanhu we liwala lilyo, wasina cihuliko kanyhi wedunhumuzi, hambi nha watovulaga, kanyhi wasina cogopo kuli viwumbwa vyono vyelile vya kucanyha.
61002011	Ninga wamalayika wono wena u wulajilize ne vilungo kuciza wawo iwejizi wo wulambi, siwawasitakaga no kuwaliganga wene wawo hamwande yo Muwaha.
61002012	Iwanhu wawo wono waligaga co cose cilya cono siwacimanyile, wenha i malimu gono gasina mahala, gono gakuwa kulelwa, na hanyuma yayo gebatagwa no kuwulagwa. Wokongomezwa ku soko yo wuhodanji wawo weneco.
61002013	Kanyhi wolipwa magazo ku soko ye magazo gono wesaciye weneco. Ne nyemo yawo yili mu wunoza, co cose cono cikwigutya imasulumizi gawo go muwili, kanyhi wakuzinoza zizo mu misi du mugati. Iwanhu we nhavivyo wakuleta cevu hamonga na soni mbaha, kolo mwekonghola hamonga nawo, mu wulye we zindigwa zenyu ze zisikukuu, akuno wakuzisecelela i zinzila zawo zo wukoci.
61002014	Ne meso gawo gamemile wusenyha wose, sunga ne masulumizi gawo go kwituma wubi, si gamalikaga hamba hadodo. Wawo wo wakuwa kuwakonga-konga wanhu wono wasoceye sunga wawagwiziza mu mitego. Ne mitima yawo yizoweleze mu wusulumizi we zisawo. Iwanhu wawo wali mu wulijitwe wo Mulungu!
61002015	Hambi nha wayileka inzila yono yigolocile, wajilila no kuyityatya nzila yono yayityatya Balamu, mwana wa Beyoli, mono yenda yatuje cambuzi mu wituma zo wulambi-lambi,
61002016	yakatacilwa ku soko yo wubi wakwe. Ne ndogowe yono siyilongaga, yikalonga ne lizi lye wanhu, ndogowe yikawupezezya lukulu ulukwale lwa yuyo muwizi.
61002017	Iwanhu wawo wenha mivwilo yono yinyalile, kanyhi wenha mavunde gono gapemheluswaga ne mbeho mbaha, no wikalo wawo wono wawiciywe, nha hanhu hono howuli wutitu wuwaha.
61002018	Hambi nha walongaga zinghani zo wiwoni zono zisina nhunizo, kanyhi wegetumamilaga imasulumizi gawo mabi go muwili ho wawagwise awalya wono wakondya kwilega mu wanhu wono wekalaga mu wajilile.
61002019	Wawehuwizaga wanhu wanji, wakutya, ati wowa welecele, akuno kumbe weneco ho wawanda wo wuhodanjice. Hambi u munhu nha yakuwa muwanda wa cinhu co cose cilya, cono cikondizye kumusumiza.
61002020	Ne wanhu wono wali wakondya kupona mu muwuhodanjice we yinze, mu nzila yo kumumanya Muwaha no Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito, kanyhi hanyuma yayo, wakeyendela weneco kugwizwa no kutemwa kanyhi no wuhodanjice wuwo, i mikalile yawo yowa mibi muno kuciza ya halulongozi.
61002021	Hambi nha yanda yiwe ciba kuli wene hono wali walece kuyimanya hamba hadodo, inzila yiyo yo wiling'ano, sinha kuyimanya, na hanyuma yayo, kuyileka no kulitaga lilajilizo lyono lyelile lyono walibocela.
61002022	Hambi nha howuli mulongo wono wutezaga, Libwa ligawuyilaga kanyhi imadeko galyo lyeneco. “No mulongo wunji wutezaga, Ligubi lyono lihovugwe, libiducizaga kanyhi mu madabaga!” Nhavivyo vyo yimile lu kuli wene.
61003001	Nyo wendece wangu, ayi yo baluwa yangu ye kejete yono nghumwandicilenyi. Na mu zibaluwa zizo zinyejete, nali kujela kumuswaswanizenyi i mahweso maswanu ga mu mahala genyu, ko kumukumbucizenyi zinghani zizi.
61003002	Nyendile mumanye, kanyhi mukumbicile zinghani zono zalongwa ne wawizi wono welile, na lililya lilajilizo lyo Muwaha no Mukombozi, lyono mwapegwa ne watumwa wenyu.
61003003	Mukwamula kumanya vyono mu vilo vya ku ndumo wolokuza wanhu wono mikalile yawo yitemigwe ne masulumizi gawo mabi. Wolomuzwajizenyi nyenye,
61003004	no kutya, “Yehuwiza vyono kolokuza! Ninga lu yali hayi? Hambi nha zinghani zo zizo du vyo yinha, ku wulawa lono wafwila wa kuku zetu ne nyikala ye vinhu vyo yiyilya du, nha vyono yali kulawo mwamulizo we yinze!”
61003005	Iwanhu wawo, wasemwaga na vyono Mulungu yalonga, u wulanga ne yinze vikawa kuwumbwa. Ne yinze yikawumbwa ku wulawa mu malenga, na kwe malenga,
61003006	na kwe malenga gago nha cinji i malenga gagalya ge lihwazi liwaha, yinze ya lululya yikongomezwa.
61003007	Ninga wulanga ne yinze za lulu mbikwe ne nghani yo Mulungu, ziwiciywe moto. Ziwicigwe ku soko ye lizuwa lililya lono wanhu wono siwamogopile Mulungu wololing'anizwa no kongomezwa.
61003008	Ninga nyo wendece wangu, mulece kusemwa cinhu cimonga! Hamwande yo Muwaha, hasina wisimajile we lizuwa limonga, ne myaka elufu, kuli mwene vyose co cimonga du.
61003009	Hambi Muwaha nha sikacelaga kuzifisiliza zizilya zono yehuwiza, nha vyono wanhu wanji wehwesaga vyono kocela. Umwene yena ngola ku soko yenyu, hambi nha siyendile hamba hadodo muyenyu yunji yajilile, langa yakuwasaka wose wafice ku wunene.
61003010	Lizuwa lyo Muwaha lyolokuza nha muhizi. Mwizuwa lilyo, wulanga wolokwajilila ne cihumbi ciwaha, ne vinhu vyayo vyo kulawa katali vyolokongomezwa no moto, nayo yinze yolokwajilila, hamonga ne vinhu vyose vyono vili mumo.
61003011	Ale, hono vinhu vyose vyohodangwa nha vivi, ma, anye munojeye muwe wanhu we nha wule? Munojeye muwe ne nyikala yono yelile no kumogopo Mulungu,
61003012	akuno mulilindiye lizuwa lilya lyo Mulungu, no kulisunhaniza lize mbela mbela, i lizuwa lyono wulanga wolokongomezwa no moto no kuhodangwa, ne vinhu vyayo vye katali, vyolokwenjedulwa.
61003013	Ninga'se, ku so wihuwizo wakwe, cilindiye wulanga wupya ne'nze mhya, mono wumemile wiling'ano.
61003014	Holeka nyo wendece wangu, vyono mulilindiye lizuwa lilyo, mupiligale kwiyeza muno muno, muwe musina manamha-manamha hali Mulungu, ho mowa no mulamu nayo.
61003015	Munojeye muwuwone u wukangalizi wo Muwaha, vyono co cilejeho cono yakumupelenyi, ho muponywe, nha vyono Pawulo ndugu yetu mwendece yakamwandicilenyi, kuno yakwitumamila i mahala gono yapegwa no Mulungu.
61003016	Zizo zo kalongaga mu zibaluwa zakwe zose, lono yakuduwila ze nghani yiyo. Hozili nghani nyhefu mu zibaluwa zakwe zono nghamu kuwizuce, zo nghani zono i wanhu walele, wono wasina musinji wazipitulanyaga nha vyono wazipitulaga zinji ze Mandiko Gono Gelile. Wakwiyiletela uwongomezwe wawo weneco.
61003017	Ninga'nye, nyo wendece wangu, mwakondya kuyimanya nghani yiyi, holeka mweze musujile, ho mulece kwajilizwa ne masutya ge wahodanji, no kugwa ku wulawa mu wusikame wenyu wono wukamile.
61003018	Ninga mujendelele kuwilucila mwihewa no mu wumanyo Mutwa wetu no Mukombozi Yesu Kilisito. U lukumyo lweze kuli mwene, kulawa lulu na ku cibitilila Heya.
62001001	Cikukwandicila zizi so i nghani yo wumi yono yali yili baho ku wulawa mwamulizo. Ase cayihulika no kuyiwona ne meso getu sese co weneco, cayiwona no kuyibata kwe miwoko yetu sese co weneco.
62001002	No wumi wuwo wali weza kwanzalikwa, ase cawuwona, nalu cikulonga, kanyhi cikumulonjelenyi zo wumi wuwo we cibitilila, wono wali ko Sogo yo munhu, hanyuma wukanzalikwa kuli'se.
62001003	Cico cono cawona, na cono cahulika, co cikumwanzizenyi nanye, nanye ho muhanje nase mu wumonga wono cina nawo no Sogo yo munhu no Mwanagwe Yesu Kilisito.
62001004	Cikumwandicilenyi nanye zizi, i nyemo yenyu ho yimemelecele.
62001005	I nghani yono cayihulika kuli Yesu, yono cikumulonjelenyi, nha yoyi, u Mulungu wo wuzelu, na muli mwene, musina hamba citi.
62001006	Holeka hono ciwe kutya cili wumonga nayo, na kuno ho cikwikala mu wutitu, cowa calonga wulambi mu wulonje na mu metumo.
62001007	Langa hono cikale mu wuzelu, nha vyono u mwene yali mu wuzelu, baho langa cowa no wumonga sese kwa sese, ne sakami yakwe Yesu Kilisito u Mwanagwe, yocikwema mu wubi wose.
62001008	Na hono ciwe kutya cisina wubi, cikwikonga co weneco, ne mbeka muli sese musina.
62001009	Langa hono ciwuvumile u wubi wetu, u mwene u Mulungu yo mwihuwilwa, kanyhi yali ling'ani, nayo kocinenela u wubi wetu wose, no kucikwema ne masutya getu gose.
62001010	Na hono ciwe kutya cikali sinetuma wubi, cowa camunoza u Mulungu nha mulambi, ne nghani yakwe yili musina muli sese.
62002001	Mo wanangu nghumwandicilenyi zizi, ho mulece kwituma wubi. Ninga yisolaga munhu ketuma wubi, cina nayo yumonga mono kacilombelaga kuli Baba, yo Yesu Kilisito, mono yali ling'ani.
62002002	Kilisito lye kumbiko lyono likuwuwusa u wubi wetu, hamba si wubi wetu sese du, langa u wubi we yinze yose.
62002003	Hono cigakamise i malajilizo go Mulungu, ale ho cosuma kumanyila lukulu vyono cimumanyile.
62002004	Na munhu hono yatye yamumanyile Mulungu, ninga kuno ho siyakugakamisa i malajilizo gakwe, u munhu yuyo mulambi, hamba ne mbeka yose yili musina muli mwene.
62002005	Ninga u munhu wo wose mono yakuyibate i nghani yo Mulungu, yuyo langa yo yena u wendo wo Mulungu muli mwene. Na mu nzila yiyo mo cikusuma kumanyila lukulu vyono cili muli mwene,
62002006	u munhu wo wose mono yakutya yali muli Mulungu, yimunojeye yawe yena i mikalile, nhe mikalile ya Yesu Kilisito.
62002007	Nyo wendece wangu, i lilajilizo lili lyono nghumwandicilenyi, si yilajilizo yipya yaye, langa lye lajilizo lililya lye katali du, lyono mwali mwina nalyo ku wulawa mwamulizo. Ne lilajilizo lilyo lye katali, yo nghani yi yilya yono mwayihulika.
62002008	Hamba nhavivyo i lilajilizo lili lyono nghumwandicilenyi, lye 'lajilizo lipya, ne mbeka yalyo, yikwijelela muli Kilisito na muli nyenye nhavivyo. Hambi u wutitu nha weza kuwuka, no wuzelu we mbeka weza kwamula kubulila.
62002009	Holeka mono yakutya yali mu wuzelu, akuno ho yamusulile u nduguye, munhu yuyo yakali yali mu wutitu.
62002010	Na mono yamwendile u nduguye, yuyo yali mu wuzelu, na muli mwene musina cinhu cinji co cose cono cosuma kumukobaza munhu yunji.
62002011	Ninga mono yamusulile u nduguye, yuyo yakali mu wutitu, kanyhi yakujendela mu wutitu, hamba siyamanyile na kono yakubita, hambi u wutitu nha wumubofuze i meso.
62002012	Nghumwandicilenyi nanye mo wana, vyono u wubi wenyu wakondya kuwusizwa mwitagwa lya Kilisito.
62002013	Nghumwandicilenyi nanye mo wasogo za munhu, hambi nha mumumanyile u mwene mono yali ho yuli, ku wulawa ha mwamulizo. Nghumwandicilenyi nanye mo wazelelo, vyono mumusumile ayulya u mubi.
62002014	Nghumwandicilenyi nanye mo wadodo, vyono mumumanyile u Sogo yo munhu. Nghumwandicilenyi nanye mo wa sogo zo munhu, vyono mumumanyile u mwene mono yali ho yuli ku wulawa ha mwamulizo. Nghumwandicilenyi nanye mo wazelelo, vyono muli vilungo, ne nghani yo Mulungu yikwikala muli nyenye, kanyhi mumusumile ayulya u Mubi.
62002015	Mulece kuzenda ze yinze, hamba zono zili mononze. U munhu mono yazendile za mononze, u wendo wo Mulungu siwosuma kwikala muli mwene.
62002016	I vinhu vyose vya mononze, wusulumizi wo muwili, i vinhu vyono i wanhu wakuviwona, wawa kuvisulumila, hamonga no wiwoni wono wukuletwa so sawo, vyose vivyo sivikulawa muli Baba, langa vikulawa mononze.
62002017	I yinze nayo yimalikaga hamonga ne vinhu vyayo vyono vikuleta masulumizi, langa mono ketumaga u wuhile wo Mulungu, yo yakwikala cibitilila.
62002018	Mo wanangu, alu ilipango lyo mudumo lyasejelela! Nanye mwali mwakondya kuhulika vyono u mulugu wa Kilisito yakuza, ne walugu wa Kilisito aluno wenji wakondya kuza, ku soko yiyo, holeka cikumanya vyono lipango lyo mudumo lyeza lili behi.
62002019	Ne wanhu wawo wakulawilila muli sese, ninga i mbeka, si wali wayetu, na ku soko yiyo holeka wakawuka, hambi mhali wawe mbeka wayetu, wali wawe wali hamonga na sese. Ninga alu wawuka, wakabita kono wakusaka, ho yijele calinze vyono si wali wayetu.
62002020	Anye mwina u Muhe Mono Yelile mono mwajidilwa na Kilisito, holeka muyimanyile i mbeka.
62002021	Ninga nghumwandicilenyi si vyono lunji simuyimanyile i mbeka, aa, ng'o, langa ku soko vyono muyimanyile, na kanyhi mumanyile vyono wulambi wo wose siwulawaga mu mbeka.
62002022	Alu u mulambi yo nani? Yo yuyo mono si yakuvumila vyono Yesu yo Kilisito. No munhu we nhavivyo, yo mulugu wa Kilisito, si yakuwavumila wose, u Sogo yo munhu no Mwana.
62002023	Hambi muli wose mono si yakumuvumila u Mwana, siyakumuvumila sunga no Sogo yo munhu, na muli wose mono yakumuvumila u Mwana, yo yena no Sogo yo Munhu.
62002024	Holeka i nghani yiyilya yono mwayihulika ku wulawa mwamulizo, yikalaje mu zinhumbula zenyu. Ne nghani yiyilya yono mwayihulika, hono yikale muli nyenye, mokwikala nhondo zose muli mu wumonga no Mwana no Sogo yo Munhu.
62002025	No wihuwizo wono yacihuwiziza ase, nha wowu, u wumi we cibitilila.
62002026	Nimwandicilenyi zi zino ku soko ya awalya wono wakuhila kumwajilizenyi nyenye.
62002027	Ninga ku lubavu lwenyu anye, Kilisito nha yamupelenyi u Muhe wakwe. Holeka hono yajendelele kwikala muli nyenye, mowa musina wuhile wa yunji wo wose kanyhi ho yamwijizenyi. Vyono u Muhe wakwe yo yakumwijizenyi zose, ne mejizo gakwe go ge mbeka, hamba si ga wulambi. Holeka mugebataje i mejizo go Muhe yuyo no kwikala muli Kilisito.
62002028	Holeka mo wanangu mwikalaje muli mwene, ne lidaha lilaza kuwa lyaza, ciwe cikamile, ho cilece kuwa na soko yo kwihundika so cevu, mwizuwa lyo wuze wakwe.
62002029	Mumanyile nha vyono Kilisito yo we ling'ani muno, holeka yinojeye munhu wo wose yamanye vyono mono yakwituma zo wiling'ano, yuyo yo mwana wo Mulungu.
62003001	Alu lanjenyi ta, vyono u Sogo yo munhu yacenda muno muno, sunga citegwe cili wana wo Mulungu! Na mbeka vyo cinha. Na co cikuleka i yinze siyikucimanya, hambi nha si yimumanyile u Mulungu.
62003002	Mo wendece wangu, alu ase cili wana wo Mulungu, ninga yikali sinejela calinze vyono colowa. Ninga cimanyile du vyono i cipango Kilisito kolo yakwijela, colokwihwana nayo, hambi nha colomuwona vyono yenha.
62003003	Na muli wose mono yena u witumbilo wuwu muli Kilisito yakwiyeza, nha vyono u mwene Kilisito yelile muno.
62003004	Munhu wo wose mono yakwituma wubi, yakuwubena u wulajilize wo Mulungu, hambi u wubi nha wo wubena u wulajilize.
62003005	Kanyhi mumanyile nha vyono Kilisito yaza ho yawuwuse u wubi wetu, na vyono, kanyhi muli mwene musina wubi wo wose.
62003006	Holeka muli wose mono yali muli Kilisito, siketumaga wubi, ninga u munhu wo wose mono yakwituma wubi, yakali si namuwona Kilisito, hamba kumumanya kose.
62003007	Anye wanangu, mulece kuvumila munhu yunji yamwajilizenyi. Na munhu wo wose mono yakwituma ze ling'ani, yuyo yo we ling'ani nha vyono Kilisito yali ling'ani muno.
62003008	Ninga mono yakwituma wubi, yuyo yo wa Setani, hambi Setani nha ketumaga zo wubi ku wulawa mwamulizo. Ninga u Mwana wo Mulungu yakaza mononze ho yayihodanje i milimo ya Setani.
62003009	Munhu wo wose mono yaleleywe muli Mulungu, siketumaga wubi, vyono yakondya kuwa no wuwe wa cinya Mulungu muli mwene, nayo sikosuma kwituma wubi vyono u mwene yawa mwana wo Mulungu.
62003010	Ninga muli wose mono siketumaga ze ling'ani, hamba mono siyamwendile u nduguye, yuyo yo si mwana wo Mulungu. Na wuwo wo wisimajile wa muli wana wo Mulungu ne wana wa Setani.
62003011	Ne nghani yono mwayihulika ku wulawa mwamulizo nha yoyi. Yicinojeye ciyendaje!
62003012	Cilece kuwa nha Kayini mono yatongwa na ayulya u Mubi, yakawa kumuwulaga u mwanakwawe. Na ku sokoci yamuwulaga? Ku soko i metumo gakwe gali mabi, ninga i metumo go mwanakwawe gali maswanu!
62003013	Holeka wandugu zangu, mulece kwizina lono i yinze yikumusulenyi.
62003014	Ase cimanyile vyono cakondya kuwuka mwifwa, cenjila mu wumi vyono ciwendile wandugu zetu. No munhu mono yasina wendo, kekalaga mwifwa.
62003015	Na mono yamusulile u nduguye, yuyo muwulaji, nanye mumanyile vyono u muwulaji wo wose, musina wumi we cibitilila muli mwene.
62003016	Ase cakondya kuwumanya wendo vyono co cici, hambi Kilisito nha yelavya u wumi wakwe ku soko yetu. Holeka nase yicinojeye ciwulavye u wumi wetu ku soko ye wandugu zetu.
62003017	Holeka munhu hono yawe yena zisawo za baha mononze, na hanyuma yamuwone nduguye yali mu wugaye, ninga ho yawe na nhumbula nghamu hamba kumuwonela lusungu ng'o, alu kosuma nhawule kutya yamwendile Mulungu?
62003018	Nye wanangu, wendo wetu wulece kuwa wa nonga du, langa wuweze wendo wa mu mbeka na mu witume.
62003019	Nhavivi vyo comanyila vyono ase cili wanhu wa mu mbeka, kanyhi cowa cisina mahwele hali Mulungu.
62003020	Ku soko hamba yiwe ciselinji cetu cikucihosa, ninga cimanyile vyono u Mulungu yo muwaha yacizize ciselinji, na vyono u mwene yazimanyile zose.
62003021	Nye mo wendece wangu, i ciselinji cetu hono ciwe sicikucihosa cinji, ho ceza cina u wuluwuce hali Mulungu,
62003022	nase cosuma kubocela co cose cono colomba, hambi nha cigebate malajilizo gakwe, no kwituma zono zikumwendeza.
62003023	Ne lilajilizo lyakwe nha lyoli, Cimwihuwile u Mwanagwe Kilisito, no kwiyenda sese wose, nha vyono yacilajiliza.
62003024	Mono yakugebata malajilizo go Mulungu, yo kekalaga muli Mulungu, nayo Mulungu yakwikala muli mwene. Mu nzila yo Muhe mono Mulungu yacipela, nase mo cikumanyila vyono Mulungu yakwikala muli sese.
62004001	Mo wendece wangu, mulece kumwihuwila munhu wo wose mono yakwiyitya yena Muhe wo Mulungu, langa mwamulaje mumulanjilile muno muno, ho muwone hono u munhu yuyo yakutongwa no Muhe wo Mulungu, hamba ng'o. Hambi i wawizi wenji wo wulambi nha wakwijela mononze.
62004002	Na ayi yo nzila yo kumumanyila u munhu hono yakutongwa no Muhe wo Mulungu, muli wose mono yakuvumila vyono Kilisito yaza, yakawa munhu, u munhu yuyo yena Muhe wo Mulungu.
62004003	Ninga munhu wo wose mono si yakumuvumila Kilisito mu nzila yiyo, yuyo yasina u Muhe mulawa kuli Mulungu. U munhu yuyo yena u muhe mono yakulawa kuli ayulya u mulugu wa Kilisito, nanye mwakondya kumanya vyono yakuza, na aluno yakondya kuza yali mononze.
62004004	Ninga anye mo wana, muli wo Mulungu, kanyhi mwakondya kuwasuma wawo wawizi wo wulambi, hambi Muhe mono yali muli nyenye, nha yali vilungo muno muno, kuciza muhe mono yali muli wene, vyono wene wawo wo wanhu wa kononze.
62004005	I wene walongaga za mononze, nayo yinze yikuwa huliciza vyono wene wo wa mononze.
62004006	Ninga ase cili wo Mulungu. No munhu mono yamumanyile Mulungu, yuyo langa kacihulikaga, no munhu mono si wo Mulungu, ase si kacihulikaga. Holeka mumo mo cikusuma kumanyila u wisimajile wo Muhe we mbeka, no muhe wo wulambi.
62004007	Mo wendece wangu, ciyendaje, hambi u wendo nha wulawaga kuli Mulungu. Muli wose mono yena wendo, yuyo yo mwana wo Mulungu, kanyhi yamumanyile u Mulungu.
62004008	U munhu mono yawusina u wendo, yuyo siyamumanyile no Mulungu, hambi u Mulungu nha wo wendo.
62004009	Nayo Mulungu yawulajila u wendo wakwe kuli sese, vyono yamutuma mwanagwe we ciwene kononze, ho ciwutujile wumi muli mwene.
62004010	No wendo vyo winha nhavivi, si vyono ase camula kumwenda Mulungu, langa u mwene Mulungu yo yacenda, sunga yakawa kumutuma u Mwanagwe ho yawe yikumbiko lyo kuciwusiza wubi wetu.
62004011	Nye mo wendece wangu, hono Mulungu yawe yacenda nha vivyo, yicinojeye nase ciyendaje.
62004012	Hasina hamba hadodo u munhu mono yakondya kumuwona Mulungu, ninga hono ciyende, Mulungu yakwikala muli sese, no wendo wakwe wukuwa wukwilaniciye muli sese.
62004013	Cimanyile nha vyono, cikaye cili mu wumonga no Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu yakwikala yali mu wumonga nase, hambi u mwene nha yacipela u Muhe wakwe.
62004014	Ase cakondya kumuwona no kuwalonjela i wanji vyono u Sogo yo munhu, yamutuma yawe Mukomboza yinze.
62004015	Munhu wo wose mono yakuvumila vyono Yesu yo Mwana wo Mulungu, u Mulungu yakwikala muli munhu yuyo, nayo yakwikala muli Mulungu.
62004016	Holeka ase cimanyile, kanyhi cihuwiye u wendo wono Mulungu yena kuli sese. U Mulungu wo wendo, no munhu wo wose mono yakwikala mu wendo, yakwikala muli Mulungu, no Mulungu nayo yakwikala muli mwene.
62004017	U wendo wukwilaniciye muli sese, ho cisume kuwa cisina woga kwi'zuwa alilya lyo wuling'anizi, vyono mikalile yetu ya baha hono'nze, nha yihwanile na ayilya ya Kilisito.
62004018	Na hono howuli wendo, hasina woga, heya, vyono u wendo wono wukwilaniciye wukuwa wusina woga wo wose. Holeka u munhu mono yakali yena woga, yuyo yakali siyanakwilanicila mu wendo, vyono woga nha vihanjile no wulipicizwe.
62004019	Ase cina wendo, vyono Mulungu yamula kucenda.
62004020	No munhu hono yatye vyono yamwendile Mulungu, akuno ho yamusulile nduguye, ayo yuyo mulambi. Vyono munhu mono si yamwendile nduguye mono yakumuwona ne meso, si kosuma kumwenda Mulungu mono si yakumuwona kwe meso.
62004021	Holeka ali lye lajilizo lyono Kilisito yacipela; Mono yamwendile Mulungu, yimunojeye yamwende no nduguye.
62005001	U munhu wo wose mono yehuwiye vyono Yesu yo Kilisito, yuyo yo mwana wo Mulungu, na mono yamwendile u mulezi, yakuwa kumwenda no mwana wa yuyo mulezi.
62005002	Mumo mo cikumanyila vyono ciwendile wana wo Mulungu, ko kumwenda u Mulungu no kugebata malajilizo gakwe,
62005003	vyono kumwenda Mulungu, wo wibate we malajilizo gakwe. Ne malajilizo gakwe si mazito.
62005004	Hambi muli wose mono yawa mwana wo Mulungu nha kosuma kuyisuma i yinze. Mumo mo cikuyisumila i yinze, u wihuwilo wetu.
62005005	Alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kuyisuma i yinze? Yo yuyo mono yehuwiye vyono Yesu yo Mwana wo Mulungu.
62005006	Yesu Kilisito mono yaziza mu malenga go wubaputizo wakwe na mu sakami yo wufwe wakwe. Siyaziza mu malenga du, langa mu malenga ne sakami. No Muhe nayo yakuhomelela vyono yili mbeka, hambi u Muhe nha yo mbeka.
62005007	Holeka wali baho wahomelezi wadatu.
62005008	U Muhe, ne malenga, ne sakami, no wuhomelezi wa wawa wadatu wukilumba.
62005009	Holeka hono ciwe cikuwulumba u wuhomelezi we wanhu, u wuhomelezi wo Mulungu wo wucizize muno muno, na awuno wo wuhomelezi wono Mulungu yawulavya mweneco muli Mwanagwe.
62005010	Mono yakumwihuwila u Mwana wo Mulungu, u wuhomelezi wuwo muli mwene yena nawo, ninga mono siyamwihuwiye Mulungu, yakumunoza u Mulungu mulambi vyono siyehuwiye u wuhomelezi wono u Mulungu yawulavya muli Mwanagwe.
62005011	No wuhomelezi weneco nha wowu: U Mulungu yacipela wumi we cibitilila, no wumi wuwo wuli muli Mwanagwe.
62005012	Muli wose mono yena u Mwana wo Mulungu, yo yena u wumi wuwo, na mono yamusina u Mwana wo Mulungu, no wumi yawusina.
62005013	Nghumwandicilenyi ho mumanye vyono mwina wumi we cibitilila, anye mono mwihuwiye mwitagwa lyo Mwana wo Mulungu,
62005014	Nase cina wuluwuce hali Mulungu, hambi nha cimanyiye lukulu vyono hono cimulombe cinji ca mu wuhile wakwe, u Mwene yakuwa kucihulika.
62005015	Mwene yakuwa kucihulika lono cikumulomba, na kanyhi cimanyile vyono u mwene kacihulikaga lono cikumulomba, kanyhi cimanyile vyono kacipelaga vyose vyono cimulombaga.
62005016	U munhu hono yamuwone nduguye yakwituma wubi wono siwomufisa ku wufwe, yimunojeye yamulombele kuli Mulungu, nayo Mulungu komupela wumi. Nghulonga yiyi kuli awalya wono wetumile wubi wono si wo wufwe. Ninga ho wuli u wubi wono wudahile kumufisa munhu ku wufwe, nane singhutya vyono munojeye mumulombe Mulungu ku so wuwo.
62005017	I litumo lyo lyose lyono si lili mu ling'ani, wo wubi, ninga ko wuli wubi wono siwomufisa munhu ku wufwe.
62005018	Ninga cimanyile vyono muli wose mono yakondya kuwa mwana wo Mulungu, siketumaga wubi, ku soko u Mwana wo Mulungu yakumukamisa. Na yuyo u Mubi si kosuma kumutamisa yaye.
62005019	Cimanyile vyono ase cili wo Mulungu, hamba yiwe i yinze yose yili mu vilungo vya ayulya u Mubi.
62005020	Cimanyile kanyhi, vyono Mwana wo Mulungu yakondya kuza, yakacipela ne mahala ho cimumanye Mulungu we mbeka, kanyhi cikale muli Mulungu we mbeka, muli Mwanagwe Yesu Kilisito. Na yuyu yo Mulungu we mbeka, na wuwu wo wumi we cibitilila.
62005021	Mo wanangu, mwilegaje ne milungu yo wulambi!
63001001	Ane no munyamhala nghukwandicila agwe go mugolece muhagulwa, hamonga ne wanago, mono nimwendilenyi mu mbeka. Kanyhi hamba si nene du mono nimwendilenyi, langa sunga na wono wayimanyile i mbeka, wose wamwendilenyi nyenye,
63001002	vyono yimbeka yikalaga nase cibitilila.
63001003	Ilihewa no lusungu no mulamu zono zilawaga kuli Mulungu Baba, na kuli Yesu Kilisito, u Mwana wa Baba, zowezana hamonga nase mu mbeka na mu wendo.
63001004	Nghusecelela muno vyono mbwene wanago wanji wakujendela mu mbeka, nha vyono cabocela i lilajilizo kuli Sogo yo munhu.
63001005	Nalu go mugolece, nghulomba nghani monga du kwako, “Ciyendaje.” Si nha vyono nghukwandicila lilajilizo yipya, langa lye 'lajilizo lililya du lyono cawezaga nalyo na katali.
63001006	Ne nhunizo yo wendo, wo wutya, i mikalile yo wibate we malajilizo go Mulungu. Ne lilajilizo lyono mwalihulika ku wulawa u mwamulizo nha lyoli, yimunojelenyi wose mwikalaje mu wendo.
63001007	Hambi i wakoci wenji nha wemuka kononze wono siwakuvumila vyono Yesu Kilisito yaza kono kwetu yakawa munhu. No munhu mono yakulonga nha vivyo, yuyo yo mulugu wa Kilisito.
63001008	Holeka mulanjilile, ho muze mulece kwajiliza cono mwali mucipiligaliye, langa muze mutuje cihumbilizwa cono cikwilaniciye.
63001009	Nayo mono siyakwibata no kwikala mu mafundo ga Kilisito hamba kugatyatya, yuyo yamusina u Mulungu. Langa mono yakwikala mu mafundo gago, yuyo yo yena u Sogo yo munhu kanyhi no Mwana.
63001010	Holeka yunji hono yaze kwenyu, siyakuleta i mafundo gaga, yuyo mulece kumubocela mu zinyumba zenyu, hamba kumulamusa.
63001011	Hambi mono yakumulamusa nha yakuhanga nayo mu metumo gakwe mabi.
63001012	Nina nyinji zo kumulonjelenyi, ninga sinyendile kumwandicilenyi mu kalatasi no wino, langa nitumbiye kuza kuko kwenyu ho ciduwane nanye cidomile, i nyemo yetu ho yimemelecele.
63001013	I wana wo lumbulyo muhagulwa, wakukulamusa.
64001001	Ane no munyamhala, nghukwandicila agwe Gayo, u mwendece wangu, mono nghwendeye mu mbeka.
64001002	Go mwendece, nghulomba wumote muli zose, kanyhi nghulomba weze wuli muswanu telele mu muwili, nha vyono winha mu nhumbula.
64001003	Hambi nha nasecelela muno lono we zindugu wanji waziza baha, wakanonjela zo wihuwilwa wako wa mu mbeka, nha vyono agwe wukujendela mu mbeka nhondo zose.
64001004	Hasina cinji cono cikusangalaza muno, si nho kuhulika vyono i wanangu wakujendela mu mbeka.
64001005	Go mwendece wangu, agwe nhondo zose kuwezaga wuli mwihuwilwa lono wukuwetumamila wandugu, hamba wawe wajenzi.
64001006	We zindugu wawo, waliloloseza likanisa lya bahano zo wendo wako. Alu nghukulomba, wuwatazaje ho wajendelele no muhinzo wawo, mu nzila yono yomwendeza u Mulungu.
64001007	Hambi nha wakwanziza u muhinzo wawo mu witumami wa Kilisito, hamba si wobecela wutazi wo wose kulawa kuli wanhu wono si wehuwiye.
64001008	Holeka ase yicinojeye ciwapele wutazi wanhu wawa, nase ho cihanje u mulimo wawo ku soko ye mbeka.
64001009	Nandika baluwa fupi ku kanisa yiyo, ninga Diyotelefe mono kahijililaga kuwa mulongola wawo, si yakusaka kuhuliciza hamba hadodo.
64001010	Holeka nane kolo nghuza, nozilajila zose zono yakwituma, sunga ne zinghani i zimbi zono yakucilonga, hamonga no wulambi wono yakuwulonga. Kanyhi hamba si nhavivyo du, ninga u mwene kanyhi, si yakuwa kusaka hamba kuwacemela kwakwe, wawo i wandugu wono wali mu muhinzo, kanyhi yakuwa kuwalemeza sunga na wanji wono wakusaka kuwacemela, kanyhi yakujela kuwawinjila kunze ye likanisa.
64001011	Gwe mwendece wangu, wulece kutyatya u musambo mubi, langa u musambo muswanu. Munhu wo wose mono yakwituma i ziswanu, yo wo Mulungu, ninga mono yakwituma i zimbi, yuyo yakali si namuwona u Mulungu.
64001012	I wanhu wose wakumukumya Demeteliyo, heya, sunga ne mbeka yeneco yikumukumya. Sunga na sese wose cikumuhomelela, nagwe wumanyile vyono zono cikulonga zo ze mbeka.
64001013	Nali nina nyinji zo kukwandicila, ninga si nyendile kwandicila wino ne kalamu.
64001014	Ninga nitumbiye vyono si notinya kukuwona, baho ho coduwana cidomile.
64001015	U mulamu wuwezane nagwe. I wendece wako wakukulamusa. Wuwalamusaje i wendece wetu wose munhu ne 'tagwa lyakwe.
65001001	Ane Yuda u mwitumami wa Yesu Kilisito, kanyhi mono nili muwahawe wa Yakobo, nghumwandicilenyi anye mono mwacemwa no Mulungu, mono muli mu wendo wo Mulungu Baba, na mu wukamiswe wa muli Yesu Kilisito.
65001002	U lusungu luweze muli nyenye, hamonga no mulamu no wendo ko winji.
65001003	Anye wandugu zangu wendece, lono nghali nili mu wupiligazi wo kumwandicilenyi muli zo wukombozi awulya wono cihanjile wose hamonga, mbona vyono yinojeye nimwandicilenyi, kanyhi nimuswaswanizenyi ho mujendelele no wihomi ku soko yo wihuwilo wono Mulungu yawapelela lukulu i wanhu wakwe lwa kamonga du.
65001004	Hambi nha howali wanji wono siwamwihuwiye u Mulungu, wono weyinjize cinyele muli sese, i wanhu wono so cambuzi ce mikalile yawo mibi, wakuyipitulasya inghani ye lihewa lyo Mulungu wetu, no kumukana Yesu Kilisito u mulongola wetu we ciwene no Muwaha wetu. Ninga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gali gakondya kulonga ku wulawa katali zo wuling'anizwe wono wuwalindiye i wanhu wawo.
65001005	Aluno nghusaka nimukumbucizenyi zinghani zono muzimanyiye lukulu, mukumbucile vyono u Muwaha yawaponya i wanhu wa Isilayeli, yakawawusa na mu yisi ya Misili, ninga hanyuma kanyhi yakawongomeza wose wono si wehuwila.
65001006	Ne wamalayika wono si wawukamisa u wuwaha wawo, wakayileka ne nyikala yawo yono yiwanojeye, u Mulungu yawawopile ne manyolo ge cibitilila mu citi, sunga mwizuwa Liwaha lyo wuling'anizwe.
65001007	Kanyhi mukumbucile za ku Sodoma na Gomola, ne matumbi ga mu mhelo mhelo yayo, i wanyawusi wayo wanoza nha vyono wanoza wamalayika, weyinjiza mu wusenyha, na mu makani gono gasutane ne mumbwa, wakawa kutemezezwa u wulipicizwe wo moto we cibitilila, ho yiwe suguzi kuli wanhu wose.
65001008	Nhavivyo ne wanhu wawa vyo wenha. Ne zindoto zawo zikuwa kuwapela wihodanga i miwili yawo weneco, kanyhi wakubeza u wulajilize wo Mulungu, kanyhi wakuvitovula ne viwumbwa vyo lukumyo vyono vili ku wulanga.
65001009	Hamba na Mikayeli Malayika u muwaha, si yanoza zono zinha zizo. Na muwiwanganile wawo u mwene na Setani lono wewanganilaga zo muwili wa Musa, Mikayeli si yejelela ho yamuhose Setani na nhovu, langa yamanya kutya du, “U Muwaha mweneco yakukalipilaje.”
65001010	Ninga i wanhu wawa watovulaga co cose cono si wakucimanya. I zinghani zono wazimanyile ku cihuma, nha vyono winha u wutanje we zinimu zono zisina mahala, muli zizo mo wakwiyongomezeza.
65001011	Woyi he! Iwanhu wawo wakugatyatya i metumo ga Kayini. Nawo weyinjiza mu masutya ga Balamu ku soko ya wenda pesa. Wakondya kuwa wabezi kotya Kola vyono yali mubezi, wakondya kongomezwa nha vyono Kola yongomezwa.
65001012	Na ku so mazozo gawo gono gasina cogopo, i wanhu wawo waweza manamha mabi mu wihangulize wenyu mu ndigwa yo Muwaha, wakuwa kwiyilanga weneco du, kanyhi wenha i mavunde gono gasina malenga, gono gakupemheluswa ne mbeho no kutegulwa ako na ako. I wene wenha mibici yono si yilelaga mana hamba yiwe co cipango cayo co kulela, wenha kotya i mibici yono mikulwe ne milela yayo, wafwiliye lukulu.
65001013	I wanhu wawo wehwanile i mawingo ge lilenga gono gagalile, ne metumo gawo ge cevu, gejeye calinze nha mafulo ge mawingo. Wene wawo wehwanile i zinyelezi zono zikuyumba-yumba, wono u Mulungu yawawiciye i hanhu hawo cibitilila ha wutitu wuwaha.
65001014	Nayo Enoci u kuku yetu wo mupunghati vyono yalawa Adamu, yawawilila i wanhu wawo yakutya, “Langa ta, u Muwaha yaza na maelufu ga wamalayika wakwe wono welile,
65001015	ho yalavye u wuling'anizwe kuli wanhu wose, kuwaling'aniza wose so metumo gawo i mabi gono wetuma, hamonga ne makani gawo gono i wanhu wabi wamutovulaga.”
65001016	I wanhu wawa wekalaga du wakung'ung'ulika nhondo zose, no kuwahosa wanhu wanji. Wekalaga mu masulumizi gawo i mabi, wakwilumba no kuwakumya muno wanhu wanji, ho wetujile cambuzi muli zono wasakaga wene.
65001017	Ninga anye mo wendece wangu, mukumbucile zono mwalonjelwa ne watumwa wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito ha mwamulizo.
65001018	Wamulonjelenyi wakatya, “Mu vilo vya ku ndumo vilakuza, wolokuza wanhu wono wolowa kumuzwajizenyi, wanhu wono wakutyatya masulumizi gawo mabi.”
65001019	Wo wanhu wono wakuleta matemanuko, wo wanhu wono watemigwe ne masulumizi gawo ga mononze, wo wanhu wono wasina Muhe wo Mulungu.
